Comment: On rails behind midfield of bunched field most of way, snuck up on inside turning in, but then baulked for a run until 200 M out, quickened well to soon assert authority.
Towards the rear of the bunched field, saved ground turning in, baulked for a run until 300 M out, made up good ground inside final 200 M to be nearest at finish.
Jumped moderately, never far off on rails, baulked for a run upon straightening, failed to quicken under pressure.
Amongst leaders early, positioned in half length 2nd on rails around the bend, hit the front and broke 1L clear over 300 M out, died on its run inside final 100 M.
Began fairly, well there early, steadied to 4th or 3rd and within 2L of lead around the bend, failed to quicken under pressure and faded inside final 100 M.
Settled in rear of midfield, drifted out under pressure after straightening, ran home one-paced.
Jumped awkwardly, soon dropped to the rear, did not find much room behind runners the majority of straight, kept on to the line.
Began moderately, settled in midfield, similar into straight, one-paced before fading closing stages. (Blood in trachea.)

Raced very wide without cover throughout after beginning well from a wide gate, gradually dropped back under pressure to forward of midfield coming onto home bend, similar turning in, found nil in the run home.
Jumped awkwardly, raced wide in rear of midfield of bunched field, shuffled backward rounding home bend, no further impression.
Travelled wide in forward of midfield of the bunched field, took closer order home bend, 3-wide into straight, soon weakened.
Began fairly, ridden to eventually take up running coming out of back straight, gradually weakened out of contention after straightening. (Blood in trachea.)
Soon taken back from a wide gate, trailed the field most of way despite saving a lot of ground on the bend, found nil in the run home.
Broke fairly, raced wide without cover throughout, well there early, yielded ground rounding home bend, fading when tightened over 300 M out, no further impression.
Couldn't go the early speed and settled towards the rear of the field, coursing 3-4 deep with cover. Ran on well towards the outside to claim the prize close to home.
Raced prominently in 4th position, settling a tight 3 deep with cover. Took some time to wind up in the straight, hit the lead near the 50m, but was nabbed close to the post.
Rated just behind midfield 3 wide with cover. Peeled out about 5 deep turning for home and ran on soundly.
Enjoyed an uncontested lead on the fence. Was overhauled over about the last 100m, but managed to stay in the frame.
Had a nice run in the race behind the leader in 3rd position on the rails. Didn't quicken over the last 200m after having every hope.
Camped close to midfield, 1 off with cover. Worked home fairly without menacing.
Settled in 2nd last position, 2 deep with cover. Made some headway in the straight without threatening.
Sent forward and eventually settled in 2nd position, 1 off no cover. Was a spent force after the 150m.
Settled back in the field, 1 off with cover. Plodded away at the same pace in the home straight.
Settled handy in the run, 2 deep with cover. Raced tight for some distance after the 700m, gave no response in the final stretch. Gave ground in the run to the wire.
Never likely after being posted 3-4 deep without cover for most of the trip while racing in about a midfield position. Tired quickly over the latter stages.
Travelled in 3rd last position, 3 deep with cover. Weakened noticeable over the final furlong.
Settled worse than midfield the fence had cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Settled in last position near the rail & failed to pass another runner, finishing tailed out. (Vet reported post-race, horse to be a roarer & to have an irregular heart rhythm.
Camped handy, 3Ls off the pace 2 wide, ran on strongly to take the victory.
Midfield, 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, dashed on well to claim 2nd but couldn't match with the winner.
Raced midfield, travelled 4.5Ls behind the leader 3 wide, dashed well over the last furlong to get 3rd.
Camped handy, 3Ls behind the leader, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, just held ground in the straight.
Settled worse than midfield, 6.5Ls off the pace 2 wide, made some late ground.
Rolled forward to share the lead, stayed on well until 150M flattened.
Taken back from a wide gate, travelled 7Ls behind the leader 3 wide, ran on fairly.
Raced midfield, settled 6Ls off the pace 3 wide, finished off only one pace.
Eased back, settled 9Ls behind the leader, peeled widest, ran on only fairly. (Rider reported the horse was reluctant to stretch out during the race)
Eased back, settled 7Ls behind the leader on the fence, never ran on.
Settled 3 back on the fence, finished off one pace, weakened 100M.
Box seat, soon weakened after straightening.
Rolled forward to take the rail and lead, weakened badly 300M.
Settled worse than midfield on the fence, never a factor, tailed off.
Good break, settled back on rail behind midfield, shaken up & switched 4 wide home turn, relentless progress to peg victory on the nod.
Sharp start to dispute early lead, camped handy 1 off with cover, 3 wide advance to lead turning for home, kicked on, mugged at wire.
Sharp start to lead on rail 1st turn, headed 1200m, tracked pace 1 back, outpaced final turn, stayed on soundly without threatening.
Smart start, settled near rear 1 off with cover, switched wide turning in, sound closer to wire.
Good break, trapped wide, advanced to lead 1200m, taken to rail, headed 430m, boxed on one pace until faded late.
Sharp break, snagged back to rail last pair, switched 1 off 1400m, driven at tail 450m, stayed on for modest gains.
Missed break, recovered to race handy 5th on fence, off heels 1200m, outpaced home turn, plugged on one pace.
Fast break to dispute lead, settled close up 2nd 1 off no cover, driven 500m, faded out in stretch.
Fair break, taken behind to rail last pair, ridden under pressure home turn, struggled in stretch run.
Fair start, raced midfield 1 off with cover, driven 600m, weakened early in stretch & faded right out.
Smart break, settled 5th 1 off with cover, shaken up 430m, led 250m, drew clear for commanding win.
Fast break, sat 2nd 1 off no cover, edged to lead 400m, all out & headed 250m, battled on to wire.
Decent start, camped midfield 1 off with cover, over-raced 1200m, driven in pursuit 350m, ran on soundly to edge 3rd late.
Tardy start, raced rail midfield, switched out final turn, hard-ridden 300m, solid progress to wire.
Bumped at break, raced midfield 3 deep with cover, switched wide into final turn, closed out soundly to line.
Slow start, bustled to sit rail behind midfield, switched out & driven 400m, tacked across to centre track for sound gains to wire.
Awkward & shifted left at break, pace to lead on fence, headed 400m, boxed on same speed.
Tardy break, sat 1 off near rear, driven 350m, stayed on evenly centre track without threatening.
Smart start, rolled forward to sit 1 back on fence, driven final turn, head up & hung throughout stretch run.
Speed at break to race handy, trapped 3 wide no cover, hard-ridden final turn, plugged on one pace.
Taken behind at break, raced 3 deep with cover behind midfield, shaken up wide off home turn, one-paced & weakened out.
Awkward break, raced last trio 1 off with cover, hard-ridden at tail 500m, found little, passed beaten rivals in run home.
Slow start, bustled early strides, sat last trio 3 deep with cover, driven wide home turn, never a factor.
Squeezed at break, taken behind to rail from wide gate, settled last trio, niggled 850m, found nothing for pressure, tame effort.
Pushed to take rail and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, hung out under pressure in straight, just won by a short head.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5Ls off the leaders 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M, just beaten by narrow margin in 2nd.
Hard ridden forward to share the lead 2 wide at advantageous slow sectionals, closed off strongly for 3rd.
Pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the slow tempo, trapped 3 wide, dashed well 300M.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 8Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed impressively 300M without the whip.
Eased at start to cross at rear, 10Ls off the leaders 2 wide, demonstrated strongly finishing efforts 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the slow pace on the fence, flattened 250M.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leaders 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Very slow away, 6Ls off the leaders on the rails, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed fairly.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Pressed forward to share the lead at slow sectionals, trapped 3 wide, hung out badly at turns, out of fuel 350M.
Hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, weakened quickly 400M.
Midfield along the fence, 3.5Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow tempo, emptied 300M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, weakened 250M.
Crowded start and dropped behind midfield, taken 4-wide 700m, covered extra ground turn but ran on strongly to win close home.
Snagged back after start and raced between horses to turn, raced close to heels 500m, swung out 400m and ran on strongly.
Jumped well but kept three-wide back stretch and turn. Shaken up 500m, took lead 300m but unable hold off first two.
Taken back from wide draw but made up ground before turn. Swung wide into straight and doing best work at the finish.
Taken forward but raced keenly on hind quarters of leader. Joint-leader 400m and kept on steadily before turning one-paced.
Taken back soon after start and was last into the turn. Taken very wide entering straight but only one-paced final 400m.
Ridden up from inside draw before being restrained to sit 3-back the fence 800m. Improved turn but no run 400m-200m. One-paced.
Ridden up from wide draw and caught three wide. Covered extra ground turn, 3rd into straight before running out of gas.
No early speed and raced between horses to 800m. Lost position around turn, turning one-paced final 400m.
Jumped best and led for a few strides before settling 3rd along rail behind leader. Was still there turning for home before tiring final 300m.
Jumped OK and held spot 3-back and 1-off to the turn. Temporarily held up early in straight but found little when clear.
Began awkwardly but held rail inside eventual runner-up. Taken out turning for home but found little under pressure.
Beaten for early speed but held on to rail position to turn when raced in restricted space and lost position. One-paced in straight.
Hard ridden from wide draw to take lead and cross to rail before turn. Joint leader into straight before tiring.
Reserved in last 7-8Ls off the pace, worked his way forward down inside, came through to lead nearing 50M.
Held up towards the rear along the fence, maneuvered out nearing 200M, ran on gamely but was always held by winner.
Held up near last, taken widest to challenge passing 400M, closed off well, nearest finish.
Lacked early pace, niggled along and improved to midfield before the turn, ran on steadily down the fence but not pace of first three final 100M.
Tracked leader along the fence, loomed at the 300M, given every chance but his run peaked 150M.
Led, took keen hold, kept on well until weakening inside 100M.
Settled in midfield along the 3-path, had every chance when switched wide into straight, stayed on without threat.
Never far off from the pace, responded only fairly under pressure, kept on same pace final 200M.
Held up behind midfield, driven 450M but never gong the pace to challenge.
Placed ahead of midfield, gave limited response early straight, awkwardly placed 200M, eased over final 150M.
Settled close up 2-wide but came up empty when placed under pressure, dropped away and eased inside 200M.
Overraced under restraint, shifted to 4-wide turning for home, found nothing in straight and steadily tired mid-straight.
Began only fairly but ridden up to sit on quarters of leader. Drifted slightly in straight but ran home strongly to win on line.
Taken forward from inside draw to sit in box seat behind leader. No run early in straight but got split 300m and kept on strongly.
Began with field and held spot 3-back, 1-off into final turn. Kept on steadily in straight to be closest at the finish.
Jumped to the front and set steady pace into straight. Was still ahead at 100m before being swamped close to line.
Ridden forward to sit 4th, one-off the fence. Closed to within 1-length of leader before turning one-paced final 200m.
No early speed and held behind midfield but wide into turn. Swung even wider 300m but kept on steadily to the line.
Restrained early to seek cover from wide draw. Improved position along rail turning for home . Kept on steadily in straight.
Jumped with field but kept 3-wide back stretch. Taken even wider around turn but kept on well to finish line.
Began OK but got head up and difficult to settle, dropping to last by 800m. Swung wide into straight and kept on steadily.
Bounded in air at start but soon made up ground to sit midfield around turn. Closed in steadily before run ended 100m.
Taken back from wide draw to find rail. Improved around turn. Kept on steadily in straight but no room close home.
Reshod before start. No early speed and in last pair but wide into turn. Taken very wide in straight but only one-paced.
Raced in midfield but wide to 850m when close to heels and lost position. In last pair entering straight then one-paced.
Jumped well and taken forward but kept wide without cover. Covered extra ground turn, and tired quickly from 300m.
Took an ideal spot 3ls back on rails, all favours in run and used little to bend, joined in at 400m, had too much in hand final 200m and scored a shade cozily.
Ended up in midfield on rails, 4-5ls back, improved wider at 400m, kept chasing but didn't have extra final 100m to get closer.
No early pace, settled behind midfield, 6ls or so back on rails, saved ground turning but forced to switch in straight, closed off soundly to just miss 2nd.
No early pace, settled at rear on rails, 8ls or more back, job to do turning and in traffic until 200m, motored home late when clear and unlucky not to be closer.
Placed just behind midfield, racing 2 wide 6ls back, same margin back turning, came wider and worked home ok to be nearest at finish.
Slotted into 1 out 1 back spot from a wide alley, every hope from there, joined in at 300m, peaked final furlong and unable to get closer.
Took a spot in midfield, 4-5ls back in running line, even trip to bend, made a bid 4 and 5 wide turning, no extra last 200m.
Restrained from a wide gate, raced at rear nearly 10ls from front, saved ground turning, made some ground late without looking likely.
Pressed on from a wider gate to sit outside leader, fair run throughout, took over briefly at 400m, no dash final 300m and dropped off.
No early pace back with last few 7ls or so away in running line, still well back turning, made no serious progress.
Landed a nice spot on leaders back, had a fair run to bend, didn't pick up turning in and weakened final 300m.
Restrained from outside alley, posted 3 wide at rear, had cover but struggling to improve turning, passed only beaten horses.
Unable to slot in and stuck racing 3 wide without cover 2ls back, forced to do it the hard way to bend, knocked up in straight.
Showed customary speed to take up running, set speed to suit, tackled on turning and gave in cheaply without usual fight.
Crossed easily to sit behind leader, enjoyed a nice trail to bend, produced a strong bid from 300m to gain lead and keep going to score with some in hand despite margin.
Came across to race outside leader, even trip to bend, drew away with eventual winner and in mix a long way before winner gained ascendency late, well clear of 3rd.
Landed an ideal position 3ls back on rails, soft run to turn couldn't dash with principals from 300m but stayed on soundly late.
Raced 3 wide in midfield, had cover 5-6ls back, improved wider approaching bend, kept on steadily to make frame.
Got well back from a wide gate, 10ls or so from top end racing 2 wide, came widest on bend, closed off well to be nearest on line.
Raced in midfield on rails, 5ls or so back, soft run to turn, just held ground in straight.
Assumed usual role in front, set even tempo to turn, collared soon after turning in, faded final 200m.
Unable to slot in from widest alley, racing 3 wide without cover 3 back, used too much to bend, unable to threaten in straight.
Settled behind midfield, 6ls or so back in running line, not asked in mid-section, just plugged away at same speed in straight.
No early speed, raced 3 wide behind midfield, 7ls or so back, made a wide run rounding bend, battled final 300m, making no real ground.
Bumped soon after start, raced in rear division 6-7ls back on rails, same margin down turning, didn't offer a close.
No early speed, settled at rear, 12ls or so back on rails, plenty to do turning but no extra effort in straight and was well beaten.
Landed prime position 1 out 1 back, enjoyed easy time to bend, offered little at business end and folded cheaply.
Took up a position in midfield,4ls back in running line, fair trip to bend, no dash in straight and beaten a fair way.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Well there, hit the front passing 300 M, won readily.
Broke well, always thereabouts, came under pressure over 300 M out, kept on same pace without quickening.
Began fairly, settled in rear of midfield, fought on steadily under pressure to reach 3rd late.
Soon dropped to rear, fought on steadily without threatening.
Began fairly, settled in forward of midfield on stands rails, came under pressure passing 400 M, kept on same pace without quickening.
Began fairly, settled in forward of midfield, kept on well to the line.
Settled in rear, ran on past well-beaten runners inside final 200 M.
Slightly slow out, settled in forward of midfield, came under pressure passing 300 M, folded up quickly inside final 50 M. (Bled.)
Jumped fairly, led to 400 M, weakened under pressure.
Began fairly, settled just worse than midfield, found no extra inside final 300 M.
Began awkwardly losing ground, soon dropped to last few, dropped out from 200 M.
Badly bumped at start, settled just worse than midfield, weakened out of contention inside final 300 M.
Never seen with a chance.
Settled in rear of midfield early, dropped out of contention halfway out. (Bled).
Showed speed early and dueled for front running duties during the early & middle stages. Surged clear near the 300m, and won easily.
Raced on the speed closer to the far side, no cover. Ranged up at the 400m, kept on well.
Camped midfield 3 off the stands rail. Worked right to the winning post.
Began well, led early along the stands rail. Was allowed settle midfield in the first 200m and enjoyed a nice run in transit. Shifted in after the 300m to improve and finished off satisfactorily.
Jumped awkwardly & proved difficult to settle racing about 5 off the grandstand rail, behind the speed. Was overhauled late.
Settled towards the middle of the course, no cover, midfield. Worked home fairly.
Raced about 5-6 from the grandstand side, midfield. Kept on at the same pace in the run to the post.
Traveled handy to the speed, no cover the far side. Commenced to tire passing the 250m.
Settled with the backmakers along the stands fence with cover. Whacked away at the same speed over the final furlong.
Began very awkwardly then was checked soon after, travelling last the stands side, had cover. Passed a few tiring horses in the run to the wire.
Raced on the speed the stands fence. Faded quickly passing the 450m.
Raced prominently 1 off the grandstand rail, vying for leading duties early. Was a beaten horse after the 400m.
Parked midfield, nearer to the center of the course, had cover. Yielded ground over the final furlong.
Travelled the far side worse than midfield after beginning awkwardly, had cover. Was under pressure after the 500m, but failed to respond and finished well back.
Taken back, trapped 3 wide throughout, gradually improved in the back straight, 3Ls behind the leader rounding the Home Turn, enjoyed the fast tempo, dashed on strongly and scored.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, advantaged by the fast tempo, ran on well to get 2nd.
Eased back to rear, settled 6Ls behind the leader 3 wide, suited by the fast pace, peeled widest, dashed on nicely to get 3rd.
Hard ridden forward to take the rail and lead at fast sectionals, weakened over the last furlong, just hung on for a distant 4th.
Began awkwardly, then pushed forward to settle 3Ls off the pace on the fence, ran on ok in the straight.
Taken back, settled 6.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, favored by the fast tempo, peeled widest, ran on only fairly.
Hard ridden forward to settle 1L behind the leader without cover until 800M, failed to make ground after straightening. (Questioned rider, see incident report)
Failed to muster despite hard ridden early, settled 6.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, passed tired horses in the straight.
Hard ridden to obtain box seat, hampered by the fast pace, weakened 300M.
Hard ridden to settle worse than midfield, 5Ls off the pace 2 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, however never ran on.
Camped handy 2 wide, harmed by the fast pace, faded badly 250M. (Hung in in the straight.
Began awkwardly, then pushed forward to park outside the leader 800M, hampered by the fast tempo, weakened badly over the last furlong after a tough trip.
Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite suited by the fast pace, never ran on after straightening.
Hard ridden along to settle midfield 3 wide, moved closer to the leader 800M, flattened badly over the last furlong. (Bled)
Smart break, sat 1 back on fence in 3rd, progress between horses 250m, driven to lead 100m, all out to seal win.
Fast start, driven to lead 1200m, tacked across to grab fence berth 800m, kicked on 400m, all out when headed 100m, held on for 2nd.
Rousted at break, 3 deep with cover midfield, shaken up 400m, responded with sound run to grab 3rd final strides.
Fast start to dispute early lead, trapped 3 wide no cover 4th, driven 400m, to 3rd 300m, run tapered, edged out of frame late.
Taken behind from widest berth, raced last pair 1 off, 8L last & switched widest home turn, closed soundly in run to wire.
Dropped in from wide gate, raced last pair on rail, switched wide & driven 400m, stayed on well to line.
Tardy break, settled 1 off with cover fore of midfield, driven home turn, ran on one pace.
Fast start, trapped 3 deep with cover fore of midfield, hard-ridden final turn, kept on soundly until weakened close home.
Driven at break, niggled fore of midfield on rail, hard-ridden into stretch, boxed on same speed.
Tardy Break, bustled early, raced 1 off with cover midfield, switched out & shaken up 400m, outpaced, plugged on evenly.
Missed break, raced rail near rear, ridden 400m, ran home one pace.
Sharp start, raced 1 off no cover 2nd, driven to challenge 400m, found wanting & emptied 300m, faded thereafter.
Slow start, raced midfield on rail, ridden 500m, found little for pressure.
Slow break, sat 1 off near rear, ridden 600m, found nothing in run home.
Missed break & driven at tail, sat rail last trio, ridden 500m, switched out & closed in stretch, darted inside for run 200m, led 100m, drew away.
Good start, trapped 3 deep with cover midfield, driven to narrow lead 300m, pressed in stretch run, all out when headed 100m.
Smart start, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, niggled 600m, advanced wide into final turn, pressed lead from 400m, battled to wire.
Taken back at break, sat rail near rear, niggled 800m, driven wide home turn, boxed on soundly to line.
Taken behind at break, last trio 1 off, ridden 650m, last into stretch, switched widest & stayed on for decent gains.
Good break, raced rail midfield, shuffled back final turn, switched out & stayed on one pace in stretch.
Sluggish break, raced midfield 1 off with cover, driven 430m, not clear run 400m & 300m, kept on one pace.
Fast break to dispute early lead on fence, settled back fore of midfield, shuffled back home turn, shifted off heels 300m, stayed on without threat.
Speed at break, raced 4th 3 wide no cover, driven to narrow 2nd 400m, all out & swamped 300m, weakened out.
Fast start, unable to slot, trapped wide midfield, advanced to lead 1100m, taken to rail, shaken up 400m, headed 300m, faded in run.
Unable to slot early, snagged back to last trio 3 deep with cover, widest on home turn, modest advance until faded tamely final 250m.
Slow start, settled 1 off with cover midfield, bustled to 5th 800m, driven & badly impeded 400m, eased.
Tardy break, bustled to lead on rail, over-raced & headed 1100m, remained handy until found nothing final turn, faded out.
Driven at break to lay up handy 1 off no cover, to 2nd 800m, hard-ridden final turn, fading when badly bumped & unbalanced 350m, eased.
Pushed forward, just off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the fast tempo, closed off strongly to score.
Hard ridden to maintain a midfield spot, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Hard ridden forward to cross and shared the lead at fast sectionals, hung on until 300M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Pushed forward to share the lead, trapped 3 wide and clocked fast sectionals, ran on well until 200M flattened.
Pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, hung in, and just held ground in straight.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 8Ls off the leaders, benefited by the fast pace, made late ground 200M.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leaders along the fence, favoured by the fast tempo, just held ground in straight.
Behind midfield, 6.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, ran on ok.
Behind midfield, 6.5Ls off the leaders along the fence, benefited by the fast pace, ran on fairly.
Pushed to hold the rail and share the lead at fast sectionals, soon out of fuel 400M.
Eased at start to take cover at rear, 8Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, however no progress.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the fast pace, trapped 3 wide, soon emptied 250M.
Ran along rail to 900 when switched out for room. Hard ridden 400m, picked up quickly from 200m to win in last few strides.
Taken forward from wide draw to lead clearly by 1000m, well clear entering straight, still there 100m, caught final strides.
Ridden up to take temporary lead before settling behind leader. Was 2nd into straight, bumped 200m but kept on well.
Awkward start but ridden up to share early pace before settling 2-back the rail. No room early in straight, shifted out 200m, bumped 100m, kept on.
Restrained early to get closer to rail, taken out 400m but passage closed and switched back in. Ran on strongly.
Crowded start but soon in midfield along rail. No room early in straight but kept on well to be closest at finish.
Fractious before start. Taken back from wide draw to join last trio but wide. Swung wider 400m but then one-paced.
Taken forward from the start but held wide and 3-deep into turn. Started to weaken from 400m.
Began awkwardly and soon at rear along rail. One-paced in straight but ran past tired horses.
Hard ridden to go forward and raced 3-wide without cover. Went wider into turn before drifting back. Ride queried.
Jumped OK and raced 2-back, one-off to the turn before slipping back through the field.
Tracked leader and always going strongly, quickened readily when asked, took over near 100M and won comfortably in the end.
Driven early to find the lead, took them along at good pace, saw out the final 300M well, headed by winner near 100M but finished well clear from the rest.
Held up in midfield along the fence, stayed on to claim 3rd near the line but no threat to first two.
Sent forward, close up behind leaders, kept on evenly for a non-threatening 4th.
Up with early pace, caught 3-wide turning for home, not going the pace to challenge leaders, faded nearing 100M.
Settled behind midfield along the 2-path, made limited progress turning in, no impression on leaders.
Held up 2-wide in midfield, kept on same pace final 300M, never threatened.
Dropped back to the rear from draw 12, 7Ls down at the 400M in an impossible position, made no progress under pressure, never involved.
Nudged along after the start, raced behind midfield and seemed to be struggling in middle stages, found little when the race got serious, never able to challenge.
Taken back from wide draw, 7Ls back in last pair making the turn, came widest into straight, not quickened.
Broke well, steadied to obtain cover , settled 3-wide behind midfield, gave limited response turning in, no extra final 200M.
Pushed along early, outpaced and fell back to midfield turning for home, soon under pressure, dropped away rapidly passing 300M.
Jumped well and raced on hind quarters of leader to 400m. Took over 200m and kept on well to the line.
Jumped with field, switched to outside fence in 3rd, 2Ls from leader, kept on steadily under pressure final 400m.
Ridden up to sit in 4th, one-off the fence. Kept on well under hard riding to be closest at the finish.
Jumped best and led along outside fence. Tried to kick clear 400m but soon under pressure and one-paced. Blood in trachea.
Tightened start, steadied 800m to drop back 8Ls. Picked up gradually and flew home final 200m.
Raced in midfield along outside fence to 400m when put under pressure. Checked 100m, but kept on.
Checked start, then bumped and unbalanced. Switched in approaching 300m and finished off well.
Jumped with field and raced between horses to 500m before slowly giving ground. One paced final 300m.
Raced behind leaders along outer fence to 400m when switched in for room but found little final 400m.
Jumped well and held position 3-back along outer fence to 400m when started to give ground.
Crowded start and raced tightly to 800m when shifted out to outer fence. Put under pressure 400m but one-paced.
Jumped well and taken forward down the centre of the track to be 3rd at 800m. Started to give ground from 400m.
Raced down the middle of the course outside horses to 600m before switching to outside fence. Flattened final 200m.
Ended up 3 wide in midfield 4Ls back with cover, had fair run to bend, let down nicely in straight to take lead final 200m and keep on to win a shade cozily.
Took advantage of inside alley and assumed spot behind leader, all favours in run, kept up effort nicely along inside for 2nd.
Took a trail behind midfield, 5Ls back racing two wide, tracked into race turning, closed off soundly to just miss 2nd.
Settled 3-4Ls away on rails just off pace, enjoyed an easy time throughout, switched into clear final 350m and produced usual honest finish to make frame.
Went forward to race outside the leader, right there 1L off leader on bend, lost spot turning and forced to switch at 350m, closed evenly but no extra final 150m.
Began well and took up a new role in front, controlled tempo to suit, kicked turning and held off challengers until inside 200m but didn't have much fight and tired soon after.
Pressed forward however trapped 3 wide without cover, worked on circle 2Ls off front, got within a length turning, workload took toll last 250 and folded.
Taken back from a wide alley, raced 3 wide at rear 7-8Ls back, improved turning in, and closed off ok making some ground without threatening.
Tardy into stride, settled behind midfield 5-6Ls back on rails, soft trip to turn, stayed on evenly without looking likely.
Posted 3 and 4 wide throughout, 5Ls or so away in midfield, worked too hard in run, dropped out in straight.
Taken back from an outside alley, ended up at rear 8Ls from front, plenty to do still last turning, passed a few tired ones in straight.
Landed ideal spot 1 out 1 back, difficult to settle in mid-section, struggling turning and lacked usual close.
Took a midfield position 4Ls or so back in running line, even run to turn, and didn't offer much in straight.
Slowly away, raced on rails 7Ls or so away in rear division, always well back and offered little in straight.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Settled outside leader, came under pressure upon straightening, gained upper hand in the shadows of the post.
Crowded at start losing ground, soon recovered to midfield on rails, saved ground turning for home, ran on to hold every chance.
Broke well from the one draw to take up running, held lead until headed inside 200 M, fought on under pressure.
Jumped moderately, soon improved to midfield settling in 5th to straight, ran on steadily to narrowly miss placings.
Began fairly, always thereabouts with rails run, gained slender advantage early in straight but unable to sustain effort inside final 100 M.
Broke well, soon taken back to settle 2-wide in rear of midfield, baulked for a run upon straightening until after 200 M, made up good late ground.
Soon taken back from a poor draw, trailed the field to straight, saved ground turning in, fought on steadily under pressure.
Settled 3-wide in midfield or just worse, near last into straight, ran on past beaten runners.
Well behind, saved a lot of ground turning in, ran home one-paced.
Began moderately from the widest gate, rolled forward to settle wide in forward of midfield, found nothing from similar position into straight.
Raced prominently and 3-wide without cover in 3rd or 4th to straight, folded up quickly.
Drawn wide, settled in last few, wide around home bend and widest into straight, soon weakened. (Blood in trachea.)
Stalked the leader along the fence after the 700m. Angled out into clear running near the 250m and closed off strongly.
Camped in third position, 2 deep no cover. Maintained a sound effort right to the finishing line.
Began awkwardly and was steadied soon after, settling 2nd from the rear along the paint. Peeled out in the straight & motored home.
Rated behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Kept its workload up right to the wire.
Led early then handed up and settled in a trailing position along the fence, 3 back with cover. Kept on evenly in the home straight.
Worked forward to eventually cross and lead along the fence near the 700m. Commenced to yield ground after the 200m.
Travelled third from the rear, 2 deep with cover. Came widest in the home straight, passed tiring runners over the concluding stages.
Settled midfield the fence, had cover. Kept to the inside in the home straight, whacked away at the same speed in the run to the line.
Settled in a handy position, 2 deep with cover. Shifted out rounding the home turn but did not respond to pressure and weakened over the final furlong.
Couldn't go the early speed of the race settling back in the field on the fence with cover. Failed to close off.
Not the best to begin and settled a distant last, 2-3 off the fence. Failed to pass another runner and finished well back.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, suited by the fast pace, peeled wide rounding the Home Turn, moved up strongly early straight, drawn clear 100M.
Taken back to settle 8Ls behind the leader, favored by the fast tempo, stayed inside, however blocked 2-1, dashed on strongly to get 2nd.
Camped handy 2 wide, 3Ls off the pace, despite harmed by the fast pace, kept on well to get 3rd.
Eased back, travelled 6Ls behind the leader 1 off, enjoyed the fast pace, ran on nicely to be closest at the finish.
Positive ridden to sit in 5th on the fence, despite hampered by the fast sectionals and blocked until 200M after straightening, finished off ok.
Tried to slot into a handy spot, however trapped deep, then taken back to settle 8Ls behind the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, ran on ok.
Began fairly then was bumped, rolled forward to park outside the leader at fast sectionals, out of fuel 200M.
Rolled forward to obtain the box seat, harmed by the fast sectionals, weakened 200M.
Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls off the pace 1 off, benefited by the fast sectionals, peeled wide, ran on fairly.
Jumped very awkwardly losing ground, settled 11Ls behind the leader, switched widest, made some ground in the straight.
Ridden forward to take the lead at fast sectionals, flattened over the last furlong.
Eased back, travelled 6Ls off the pace on the fence, despite benefited by the fast tempo, never ran on.
Decent break, settled rail behind midfield, switched 1-off final turn, smooth progress & shaken up 300m, quickened to lead 100m, in command.
Fair break, snagged back to rail at tail from wide gate, smooth progress on inner 400m, driven 300m, strong closer in stretch to go 2nd final strides.
Speed to lead at break, set tempo & kicked on final turn, all out & headed 100m, lost 2nd final strides.
Good break, raced rail midfield, niggled 500m, switched out 300m, stayed on well to just miss frame.
Decent start, raced 1 off fore of midfield, shaken up final turn, off heels 300m, closed out soundly without threatening.
Fair break, raced midfield 1 off with cover, over-raced & off heels 800m, not clear run 300m, switched out & ran on for modest gains.
Sharp start, raced 1 back on rail, 2nd & driven 300m, swamped 100m, no extra, tightened up late when beaten.
Awkward break, caught 3 wide near rear, widest & driven home turn, stayed on past beaten rivals.
Good break, sat handy & caught 3 wide no cover throughout, driven 400m, outpaced & plugged on to wire.
Good break, trapped 3 deep with cover midfield, driven 300m, boxed on without threat until tapered out late.
Broke with others, settled 1 off near rear, switched wide home turn, driven & found little, never a factor.
Fast break, raced 1 back 1 off, weakened under pressure 300m, struggled in run home.
Fair start, over-raced 3-wide early strides, dropped to rail near rear, 6L back & driven 400m, switched out home turn, strong run to lead 50m.
Snagged back at break, sat last trio 1 off, 7L down & widest final turn, sound closer to grab 2nd last strides.
Fast start, tucked midfield on rail, driven 300m, crowded in run, kept on for good late gains.
Fast start, sat 2nd 1-off no cover, upsides leader 300m, outright lead 180m, headed 50m, no extra.
Good break, raced handy 3 deep no cover, wide progress final turn, maintained even run home.
Disputed lead at break, settled handy 1 off with cover, niggled 500m, kept on to wire without threatening.
Good break, raced behind midfield on rail, switched out & tapped for toe into stretch, stayed on for late gains.
Broke with others, sat 1 off with cover behind midfield, 6L back driven wide home turn, stayed on for minor inroads.
Fast break to lead, hard-driven & challenged 300m, rallied in stretch, headed 180m, soon swamped.
Quick start to dispute early lead, soon settled 1 back on rail, shaken up final turn, kept on same speed.
Broke with others, soon outpaced & detached at tail, 10L back & driven 400m, boxed on & made inroads in stretch.
Quick to stride, snagged back to midfield 1 off with cover, off heels 1000m, switched wide final turn, outpaced in run home.
Eased to rear, 6.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 250M to score only by a narrow margin.
Hard ridden forward to cross, 2.5Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, closed off strongly 300M, just missed by a nose.
Hard ridden forward, box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, led 300M, hung on strongly until 150M overhauled, just beaten by a narrow margin in 3rd.
Pushed to keep up in midfield along the rails, 2.5Ls off the fast pace, lack room 300M, just held ground.
At rear, 5.5Ls off the leaders along the fence, benefited by the fast pace, blocked 4-2, made steady ground when clear.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 4Ls off the leaders on the fence, suited by the fast pace, lack room 300M, ran on ok.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, made ground 200M.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, just held ground in straight.
Took rail easily, shared the lead and clocked fast sectionals, hung on until 250M weakened.
Pushed forward, sat just off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the fast tempo, weakened 250M.
Eased back, trapped 3 wide throughout and lost significant amount of ground at bends, emptied 200M.
Eased to sit in midfield, however raced very keenly whilst being trapped 3 wide, moved forward to share the lead 2 wide at fast sectionals, faded badly 400M.
Restrained early to sit 3-back, 1-off into first turn, stayed there to straight, switched out and ran on strongly.
Ridden up to hold rail spot one-back, then two-back into back stretch, came off fence 400m, found inside run and kept on well.
Pushed forward from awkward draw to be 4th early before settling 2-back, 1-off into straight. Kept on steadily to the post.
Taken forward to sit outside early leader before dropping to 3rd into first turn, shaken up entering straight and kept on steadily.
Last to jump but swung in to rail and improved position into first turn, swung wide into straight and kept on steadily.
Taken forward to lead before dropping back to box seat 1100m. Retook lead entering straight but started to tire 200m.
Jumped with field and quickly taken to a rail position in midfield. Switched out entering straight to make run but only one-paced.
Taken back soon after start to sit one-off 8Ls from leader. In last pair entering straight and found nothing final 200m.
Taken back from wide draw and soon last along fence. Was last into straight, swung widest but found nothing.
Taken back early but unable to slot in and over-raced. Horse took charge 1200m, pulling to the front. Tired soon after entering straight.
Settled in 2nd 4Ls behind runaway leader, moved closer home turn, ran on well to lead near 100M, kept on to fend off the renewed challenge of the runner-up.
Sent forward, ran freely building up a sizeable lead in middle stages, restrained nearing home turn, kept on under pressure and was just caught after edging left in the crucial stages of the race.
In 4th place but a long way behind the runaway leader, travelled well into straight and kept finding under pressure, held on for 3rd.
Held up behind midfield, driven inside 400M, found a decent response but not getting to the first two.
Began very awkwardly and lost ground, soon taken across to the inside, 7Ls near the rear at 400M, progressed steadily in straight but never looked likely.
In mid-division, caught 3-wide before slotting in near 800M, held every chance in straight but found less than expected in the finish.
Reserved in last over 10Ls behind runaway leader, had plenty to do turning for home, closed off the race reasonably well.
Towards the rear 2-wide, well off the pace in early and middle stages, made some progress final 300M without threatening the leaders.
Slow to begin, ended up towards the rear of the field nearly 10Ls off the pace, taken wide for his run 350M, made limited progress.
Settled 2-wide in 5th, well off the pace first half but crept closer nearing home turn, found disappointingly little passing 300M, never able to challenge.
Moved up to race in 3rd, closed in on runaway leader nearing home turn, under pressure from 400M, soon dropped away.
Raced 3-wide at the back, left with no cover from 800M, soon beaten turning in and left behind.

Broke well in front early, ceded advantage to settle just outside leader around the bend, renewed effort to gain upper hand close to home.
Began fairly, ridden along to take up running over 800 M out, held small advantage into straight, unable to sustain effort and headed close to home.
Close up early, gradually settled in 2L 5th approaching home bend, became 3rd entering straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Niggled along wide in midfield or just worse, similar turning in, kept on same pace without quickening in straight.
Settled in last few, crept closer around the bend, ran past well-beaten horses closing stages.
Settled in midfield, kept on same pace.
Raced wide without cover throughout after beginning well from the widest gate, gradually settled at the back, ran past well-beaten horses in straight.
Travelled in midfield far side, lost position around the bend, kept on early in straight before fading under pressure close to home.
Jumped fairly, gradually dropped backward to rear of field by home bend, last into home straight, made no further impression.
Jumped moderately, raced wide without cover amongst leaders far side, similar around the bend, dropped away quickly in straight.
Jumped moderately, soon dropped to last few, never on terms.

Placing: PU
Comment: Ridden along on rails, picked up gradually to 2L 4th, folded up quickly upon straightening, soon pulled up. (Bled and heart irregularity)
Parked in 4th position, 2 deep with cover. Ridden along to maintain its position after the 500m, closed off nicely.
Camped midfield, 2 wide with cover. Peeled out early in the straight and finished off smartly.
Shared leading duties on the fence for most of the trip. Drew a margin near the furlong but was overhauled late.
Taken back from a wide gate and settled last 3 deep with cover. Came to the outside in the straight and ran on well.
Vied for leading duties, racing 1 off no cover. Kept up a fair gallop to the wire.
Raced behind midfield, 2 wide with cover. Closed off soundly.
Settled with the backmakers on the rails. Made reasonable ground along the inside before experiencing traffic problems over the concluding stages, and was not ridden out.
Crowded at the start, then settled midfield, 3 wide had some cover. Never a threat.
Settled well back in the field, hung out on the circle, travelling 3 deep with cover. Failed to respond to pressure in the final stretch.
Posted 3 deep on the speed without cover for most of the trip. Was tiring after the final furlong. (Pulled up with blood in the trachea).
Settled in 2nd last position, 2 deep with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Settled midfield the fence, had cover. Was a beaten horse early in the home straight.
Pushed forward, tracked well behind the leaders 2 wide, moved up strongly rounding the Home Turn, took charge 200M, fought on well to the line and scored.
Jumped only fairly losing ground, settled 6.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, peeled wide, dashed sharply 200M to claim 2nd, just missed by a short head.
Pushed forward to take the lead by 1L, stayed on nicely to get 3rd.
Pushed to sit 6th one off, travelled 4Ls behind the leader, closed to the line well to get 4th.
Pushed forward to sit 3rd, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, finished in one pace.
Taken back from a wide gate, travelled 8Ls off the pace on the fence, ran on ok.
Camped handy, 3.5Ls off the leader on the fence, stayed inside, kept on only one pace in the straight.
Taken back from a wide gate, settled 8Ls behind the leader 2 wide, swung widest, made limited ground in the straight.
Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls off the pace 1 off, peeled wide, made no progress after straightening.
Rolled forward to track behind the leader, soon weakened after straightening.
Eased back, settled 5.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, never a factor.
Ridden forward but failed to muster, settled 6.5Ls off the pace at rear, never ran on.
Good start, settled 3 deep with cover midfield, advanced into final turn, driven 400m, swept to lead last strides.
Broke well, caught 3 wide no cover midfield, progress to 5th 600m, shaken up 350m, sound run to grab 2nd close home.
Good start, raced 6th 1 off, rolled to 4th 1 off with cover 1100m, ridden 400m, ran on to lead 100m, headed last strides.
Broke with others, sat 1 off near rear, crowded 1100m, progress 3-deep on turn, driven wide 400m, solid closer centre track.
Sharp break to dispute early lead, led out of 1st turn & settled fence, kicked into stretch, all out & swamped 100m.
Awkward break, raced rail behind midfield, off heels 1100m & lost ground, off heels 800m, stayed on for sound inroads in stretch.
Snagged back to rail at tail, off heels after 1100m & switched 1 off last pair, wide & driven 400m, ran on without threatening.
Fast start to dispute early lead, sat 1 back on rail, under pressure 500m, boxing on when crowded & off heels 250m, kept on one pace.
Tardy break, bustled to lay up, rolled to 2nd 1 off no cover 1200m, shaken up 400m, plugged on until faded late.
Taken behind at break, sat fence near rear, off heels 1100m & dropped to last pair, off heels 800m, stayed on evenly in stretch.
Broke with others, raced midfield 1 off with cover, ridden 500m, struggled in stretch run.
Missed break, bustled to sit 1 off with cover behind midfield, driven home turn, never a factor.
Smart break to sit 4th on fence, over-raced, off heels 1100m & restrained to midfield, weakened in run to wire.
Fair start, bustled on fence to midfield, steadied off heels 1100m & gradually shuffled back, found nothing in run home.
Broke with others, snagged back to rail at tail, crept forward on paint from 900m, driven 350m & switched out for strong late surge, led 50m.
Tardy break, rolled to midfield, sat 3 wide with cover, ridden centre track 400m, quickened to 2nd 250m, not match winner.
Fast start to dispute lead, outright lead on fence 1000m, shaken up 350m, all out & headed 50m, just held 3rd.
Broke with others, handy 1 back on rail, switched 1 off & ridden 350m, lacked immediate pace, stayed on to narrowly miss 3rd.
Fair break, raced 3 wide near rear, off heels 900m, widest into stretch, switched off heels 400m, closed soundly.
Sharp break, sat 1 off behind midfield, niggled 500m, ran on evenly to wire.
Smart start, snagged back to last trio 1 off with cover, switched out & driven 400m, stayed on one pace.
Fair break, raced last trio 3 wide, to rail at tail 900m, boxed on evenly in stretch run.
Fair break, raced fore of midfield 3 wide no cover, shaken up to 3rd 400m, run tapered out.
Slow start, settled on rail midfield, driven 500m, found little, tame run home.
Slow start, driven to race handy 1st turn, settled 1 off with cover midfield, hard ridden 400m, struggled in stretch run.
Good start, driven wide to dispute lead 1st turn, slotted handy 2 wide with cover 800m, shifted out & driven 430m, weakened tamely.
Good break, disputed lead, settled close 2nd 1 off no cover, shaken up 400m, emptied 300m & eased.
Smart start, bustled early to race midfield, trapped 4 wide no cover throughout, niggled until driven 400m, soon weakened out.
Pushed to hold the rail and secured a prominent spot, benefited by the slow tempo, dashed strongly 300M to score, not fully tested.
Took rail easily and led by 1.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 200M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
Midfield along the fence, 3.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well in straight.
Settled in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, lack room 400, dashed well when clear.
Eased to sit 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, ran on until 200M flattened.
Eased to sit midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, no progress.
Very slow away, 5Ls off the leader along the fence, not suited by the slow pace, ran on fairly.
Pushed to keep up just behind the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow pace, out of fuel 250M.
At back, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, no dash.
Hard ridden forward, 2.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, raced keenly, weakened 250M, checked 200M.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader, trapped 4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, emptied 200M.
Very slow away, at rear, harmed by the slow pace, never a factor.
Eased to rear, never competitive and tailed out.
Jumped well and soon in box seat though kept away from outside fence. Squeezed between leaders 300m out and ran home strongly.
Ridden up from start and crossed in front of field to sit on quarters of leader. Shaken up passing 200m and kept kicking to the line.
Got fired up after start and pulled way forward but with cover. Shaken up 300m and kept on steadily to the line.
Jumped OK and raced with pack near outside fence. Shifted in 300m to find room then shifted out again. Kept on steadily.
Slow to jump, taken to outer fence but found little room and sifted back. Raced alone for some distance, doing best work at finish.
Knuckled over start, raced tightly close to heels 800m and lost position. Kept on to 100m when checked as run closed. One paced.
No early speed and raced at rear along outside fence to 800m when drifted towards centre of track. Ran past tired horses.
Hard ridden to lead soon after start, moving towards outer fence. Still in front 250m but shifted out when put under pressure and tired quickly.
Showed some early speed racing on its own down centre track to course proper when started to weaken.
Jumped OK and raced with pack close to outer fence to 300m when got head on side and hung out, drifting back.
Taken quickly to outside fence from middle draw and raced with pack to course proper when found nothing under pressure.
Jumped well and quickly taken to centre field in third position some 2Ls from leader. Found nothing when put under pressure 200m.
Positively ridden, crossed to fence before first turn, travelled smoothly behind leader, responded well under a forceful ride, led 150M out, kept on strongly to the line.
Began well, steadied to a midfield position making the first turn, moved sweetly into contention 450M, led early straight, not pace of winner final 150M but kept on well under pressure.
Restrained to a position behind midfield, raced keenly, switched wide 500M, closed off well early straight and looked a chance at 200M, readily held by first two final stages.
Soon guided to the fence, raced in midfield throughout, switched wide 550M, not the clearest of runs early straight, stayed on well for 4th.
Caught 3-wide behind midfield and had no cover in the first half of the race, moved closer to leaders inside 600M, vied for lead early straight before fading 150M out.
Towards the rear 6-7Ls off the pace, switched widest nearing 500M, stayed on without threat to leaders.
Began well enough from draw 1, reserved in a position ahead of midfield, responded only fairly turning in, never a threat to leaders.
Guided to a rail position after the start, settled 6Ls back near the rear, no clear run early straight, driven out 250M but found little under pressure.
Caught wide before crossing to the lead near 1100M, led steadily to 300M, dropped away rapidly.
Switched off to the rear about 9Ls behind leader, hampered by a beaten runner turning in and had to switch wide for a clear run, not quickened. (Jockey questioned re his riding in the straight.)
Held up 2nd last, 8Ls off the pace in middle stages, taken widest on straightening, found little.
Held up 2-wide in midfield, had to be pushed along 600M from home but not responding to pressure, ran well below par.
In midfield early, caught wide without cover from 1400M, strode forward to join leader passing 1100M, had little left turning in, weakened rapidly.
Close up behind leader, came under pressure making the final turn, badly outpaced from 500M, soon behind and eased.
Jumped well and had uncontested lead to straight, kicked clear 300m and kept finding all the way to the line.
Jumped OK and quickly moved to a position 4-back, one-off to turn. Swung wide into straight and ran on well though shifted in under pressure final 100m.
Ridden forward to grab good spot 3-back, one-off to turn. Threw out challenge 300m but unable to overhaul leader.
Taken back from wide draw to find fence then raced near rear to straight. Ran on well between horses final 300m.
Jumped well and held 2nd initially before easing back to 4th. Closed to 2nd entering straight before becoming one-paced.
Awkward start and raced at rear before moving up to get spot 4-back, one-off at turn. Ran on steadily to be closest at finish.
Taken back from wide drawn to find fence, Was last into turn. Swung wide 400m before turning one-paced.
No early speed and raced at rear going into the turn. Kept on one-paced in straight without looking dangerous.
Ridden up from centre draw to land on the quarters of early leader into the turn. Was 3rd into straight before weakening,
Ridden up from inside draw to grab box seat before the turn in 3rd. Was still there at 400m before turning one-paced.
Taken forward after start to sit 3-back, one-off. Unbalanced 900m but held position to 400m. Found nothing under whip from 300m.
Taken back from wide draw but unable to get in and kept wide. Dropped to last entering straight and did not respond to hard riding.
Awkwardly placed close heels after start but taken forward and raced without cover around turn. Weakened from 300m.
Unable make use of good inside draw and raced behind midfield to turn. Found nothing under hard riding and drifted back.
Began nicely and assumed prime position on leaders back, always right there just off a decent speed, set out after leader turning and took over inside 200m, found enough to hold off challenger.
Began well, assumed ideal spot 1 out 1 back, right there and made run turning and chased hard final 300m just coming up short.
Out just fairly, niggled to take a spot in front of midfield 3ls or so back on rails, soft trip to turn, began to wind up but struck trouble at 200m, closed hard late when clear for an unlucky 3rd.

Taken back from a wide gate, settled back with last few 7ls or so away in two wide line, still well back and ridden for luck turning, made many lengths in straight to make frame. (see racing incidents)
Began with rest, came across to race in midfield, enjoyed a good run with speed on 4ls off top end, moved into race turning, stuck on well just missing frame.
Away ok, checked when settling down and ended up 5ls back on rails, ok run to bend, made steady progress in straight to be nearest on line.
Raced just off midfield 5ls back in running line, even trip despite being difficult to settle in mid-section, switched out and closed race off steadily.
Took up running, kept sped genuine with presence of horses to outside, kicked 2ls clear turning, caught final 200m and couldn't hold them off thereafter.
Average beginning,6-7ls back in running line, took inside runs turning, made no serious progress in straight.
Restrained from a wide gate, settled 3 wide behind midfield 6ls or so back, had cover and aided by speed, came wider turning but got no closer final 250m.
Showed usual pace to settle outside leader, received attention from outside horse and did some work to bend, niggled turning and steadily weakened final 300m.
Slow to break, taken back from a wide gate, raced 6-7Ls back on rails, received a check at 1000m, still sell back turning and made no real progress in straight.
Pressed on when unable to slot in, raced 3 wide without cover up outside leaders, used too much in mid-section, under pressure turning and dropped right out.
Lacked speed of old and raced 3 wide in midfield 5-6ls back, worked throughout, struggling turning and weakened out.

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Never far off travelling mainly in 5th, ran on steadily in straight to hit the front over 150 M out, just held off runner-up's late challenge.
Settled just worse than midfield, ran on steadily in straight to just fail to get up on line.
Trailed the field most of way, wide into straight, ran on well down the centre of the track.
Began fairly, soon made its way to travel outside leader before becoming 3rd into back straight, remained similar turning for home, one-paced.
Began fairly, settled in last few, ran home nicely down the centre of the straight.
Settled in midfield on rails, kept on steadily under pressure without quickening in straight.
Settled well behind, saved ground turning in, baulked for a run early in straight, made late headway inside final 200 M.
Tracked leaders to straight, soon came under pressure to challenge on straightening, faded inside final 200 M.
Began well from the one draw, held narrow lead to 1000 M, remained prominent into straight, soon weakened under pressure.
Settled just worse than midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, baulked for a run before checked 100 M out, no further impression.

Close up early, gradually shifted backward to forward of midfield or just better far side racing wide without cover most of way, remained wide around the bend, soon faded in straight. (Jockey warned.)
Jumped fairly, travelling just better than midfield before making swift progress around the field approaching 1000 M bend, soon hit the front and led until finding no extra 200 M out.
Not the best to begin, settling worse than midfield on the rails, had cover. Shifted out when under pressure near the 200m, but had the race well in truly in its keeping soon after.
Travelled midfield, 2 deep with cover. Rounded the home bend the widest and finished off gamely.
Went back from a wide gate, settling last, 1 off with cover. Went for inside runs in the straight & closed off strongly.
Parked 3 back the fence, had cover. Switched out near the furlong to continue improving, briefly hit the front near the 100m, but was easily overhauled inside the final 50m.
Camped behind midfield 2 deep with cover. Went for runs through the field in the home straight and closed off well despite being hampered near furlong.
Taken back from the outside alley, settling 3rd from the rear, 2 deep with cover. Ran on soundly in the home straight.

Ridden aggressively early & dueled for the lead in the early stages, before assuming the outright lead after the 800m, racing on the paint. Was 2L in front before the home turn but faded the last 150m.
Rated second last on the fence with cover. Kept to the inside in the final stretch and finished off fairly.
Had every possible chance after stalking the leader along the paint. Yielded ground over the final furlong.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race settling 1 out 1 back. Came under pressure before entering the home straight and weakened in the run home.
Ridden along early but was caught 3 wide without cover for most of the trip whilst racing on the speed. Was hampered at the 200m but was already a spent force.
Showed good gate speed and vied for the lead in the early stages, travelling 1 off no cover. Settled in 2nd position passing the 800m, was a beaten horse turning for home & finished distanced.
Tracked well behind the leaders 2 wide, moved up nicely early straight and won comfortably in the line.
Positively ridden from a wide gate to settle 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide, dashed well in the straight to get 2nd.
Rolled forward to take the lead on the fence, checked 600M, then raced behind the leader, fought on gamely in the straight to hold 3rd.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls off the pace 2 wide, ran home well to be closest at finish.
Taken back to settle 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide, peeled wide, ran on ok.
Eased back, settled 8Ls behind the leader along the fence, dashed well final 150M.
Began sharply, crossed to the fence and led 600M, out of fuel 100M.
Taken back from a wide gate, 8Ls off the pace 2 wide, swung widest, closed off the race steadily.
Raced midfield, settled 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, stayed inside, ran on only fairly.
Ridden forward to obtain box seat, severely checked 600M, struggled to run home, weakened 150M.
Jumped awkwardly then crowded, settled 7Ls behind the leaded, never competitive.
Lacked early speed, raced at rear, never a factor.
Quick to stride, settled 4th on fence, switched out & ridden final turn, swept to lead 100m, drew clear.
Bustled at break, settled 7th 1 off with cover, 3-wide backstretch advance to 2nd no cover, led 200m, headed 100m, no extra.
Good start, nestled midfield on rail, stoked up 400m, switched out 300m, stayed on late to grab 3rd close home.
Good break, snagged back to race last pair 1 off with cover, driven widest final turn, solid closer, just missed frame.
Bumped start, taken to rail behind midfield, switched 1 off 700m, 7L back final turn, off heels 300m, strong closer, just missed frame.
Taken behind at break, raced last pair on rail, hard-ridden 400m, ran on for sound gains.
Fast break, outright lead 1st turn, clear in backstretch, badly unbalanced when shifted onto rival & headed 200m, one-paced after.
Vied for early lead, tracked 1 back on rail, driven 400m, pressing lead when sandwiched & badly impeded 200m, plugged on.
Dropped-in early strides, sat 1 off with cover near rear, switched 3 deep 700m, wide into stretch, one-paced to wire.
Fair break, raced wide no cover near rear, bustled forward 600m, driven 500m, tapered out & eased in stretch.
Bustled early to dispute lead, settled handy 1 off, ridden 600m, faded in run home.
Smart break, sat fore of midfield 1 off with cover, bustled & then driven 500m, outpaced & struggled in stretch.
Broke well, settled fore of midfield 1 off with cover, switched out for run 300m, badly impeded 250m, recovered to grab lead last strides.
Snagged back at break, covered 1 off behind midfield, driven widest home turn, quickened to lead 180m, headed last strides.
Taken behind to rail from widest gate, raced at tail, switched 1 off for progress 600m, driven final turn, closed to snatch 3rd late.
Missed break & rousted early, settled handy 1 back on fence, niggled 600m, switched out & shaken up 300m, stayed on evenly.
Broke well, settled 1 off with cover 4th, driven 3 wide 400m, kept on same speed to wire.
Snagged back to race 1 off near rear, switched wide & driven 500m, off heels 200m, stayed on soundly without threatening.
Fast break to lead, kicked on 300m, headed 180m, no extra & faded.
Taken back at break, raced 1 off with cover midfield, wide home turn, off heels unbalanced 250m, off heels 50m, not fully extended.
Tardy break, sat rail near rear, switched out & ridden 300m, boxed on moderately.
Smart start, trapped 3 wide no cover early, to 2nd 1 off 1000m, feeling pinch when shifted across rival 250m, weakened in run.
Good break, slotted midfield on rail, driven in stretch, plugged on tamely.
Good break, ridden early to lay up 4 wide 1st turn, snagged back to midfield 3 wide no cover, found nothing & faded in stretch.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M to score by a short head.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, made steady ground 300M, just beaten by a narrow margin in 2nd.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader, favoured by the fast pace, progressed well 300M, however flattened 100M.
At back, 6.5Ls off the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast tempo, made some ground 250M.
Eased to rear, 7.5Ls off the leader on the fence, favoured by the fast pace, held up 4-2, made ground steady when clear.
Pushed early, 3.5Ls off the fast pace along the fence, ran on until 200M flattened.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 1L at fast sectionals, soon weakened 250M.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the leader on the rails, not suited by the fast pace, out of fuel 200M.
Prominent, trapped 3 wide early, sat just off the leader, harmed by the fast tempo, emptied 200M.
Pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the fast tempo, dropped off 300M.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, however held up badly in straight, checked severely 200M, never tested.
Taken quickly to the front and set steady sections. Kicked clear 400m and kept on strongly to the line.
Ridden forward to hold rail before settling in box set. Got inside run 400m and kept on well but unable overhaul leader.
Bumped and unbalanced start but recovered to sit 2-back the fence. Swung wide into straight and kept on steadily.
Awkward start, then steadied. Stayed on fence at midfield, found little room top of straight, finished off well when clear.
Fired up early and held 3-wide without cover before slotting 2-back, one-off 800m. Kept on one-paced final 400m.
Jumped well but restricted for room 1000m before moving four-back, one-off entering final turn. One paced final 300m.
Taken back across runners from wide draw to sit second-last to straight. Ran on steadily between horses in straight.
Restrained at start to and raced at rear but one-off. Swung widest into home straight and boxed on one-paced.
Began awkwardly, bumped and unbalanced. Raced in midfield along fence to straight, kept on one paced.
Ridden forward from middle draw to sit one-back, one-off to straight. One-paced final 400m.
Ridden up from outside draw to sit on quarters on leader. Was still 2nd turning for home before weakening.
Taken back from wide draw to sit last. Lost contact with field turning for home and found nothing final 300m under whip.
Broke well, allowed to settle in behind pacesetter, made smooth headway to lead near 150M, soon clear from pursuers, won with something in hand.
Held up in mid-division along the fence, made steady gains passing 300M, got up for 2nd near line but never a serious threat to the winner.
Not far off from leader, produced with every chance in straight, couldn't close on the winner, faded late stages and lost 2nd near line.
Held up behind midfield, took time to get going on straightening, did best work final stages, just missed out on 3rd.
Settled behind midfield, closed off evenly but not a serious threat to leaders.
In 5th place 5Ls behind runaway leader, had every chance but finished off only fairly, no danger from 150M.
Towards the rear 10Ls off the pace, taken wide for his run passing 400M, stayed on without threatening.
Sped to the lead as expected, 3Ls in front turning in, no extra when headed near 150M.
4Ls back from runaway leader, gave limited response when asked, outpaced over final 200M.
Dropped back to the rear over 10Ls behind leader, failed to pick up when placed under pressure, eased mid-straight.
Lacked pace, raced near the rear and under pressure throughout, never in contention.
Dropped back to a rearward position, left racing 3-wide without cover down the back straight, switched widest home straight, found nothing.
