Gradually crossed inside from the widest gate, travelled prominently and wide without cover, came to challenge upon straightening, led over 200 M out and soon drew clear.
Jumped moderately, settled towards the rear on rails, saved ground turning in, ran on down inside of straight to reach 2nd 100 M out.
Began fairly, settled just better than midfield in 5th or 6th, ran on steadily under pressure in straight.
Jumped moderately, trailed the field to straight, wide turning in, ran on to narrowly miss a placing.
Began well, settled not far off in 5th, improved under pressure upon straightening, unable to sustain run inside final 80 M.
Jumped fairly, settled mainly in midfield, no clear run in straight and improving when checked 100 M out, never recovered.
Began well, soon taken back 3-wide to just worse than midfield, baulked behind runners early in straight, ran home one-paced.
Jumped well, settled wide without cover in midfield, ran home one-paced.
Began fairly, settled well behind, baulked behind runners early in straight, one-paced despite a clear run inside final 200 M.
Slowly away, quickly recovered to forward of midfield along rails, saved ground on rails turning for home, found nothing under pressure.
Broke well, made running narrowly until joined into straight, unable to sustain effort inside final 300 M.
Began moderately, soon picked up along rails under urge, settled one back in 3rd on rails, kept on before fading inside final 200 M.
Broke well, travelled outside leader most of way, disputed lead into straight, folded up quickly passing 300 M.
Began well from a poor draw, soon settled in last few, never a danger. (Bled)
Enjoyed a nice run in the race stalking the leaders. Held up early in the straight but manoeuvred out into clear running after the 400m and had the race in its keeping after the 100m.
Parked worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Shifted out widest in the run home and finished off strongly.
Vied for leading duties during the early & middle stages whilst travelling on the fence. Looked to be still going strong near the 150m but was overhauled after the 100m.
Steadied early from the outside barrier and was taken back to settle in last position along the fence with cover. Railed up in the straight and closed off well to make the frame.
Vied for leading duties during the early & middle stages, travelling 1 off no cover. Was still in the hunt after the furlong but started to fade over the final 100m.
Effectively raced 1 out 1 back. Had every possible chance but never really quickened and only just maintained its position over the final 400m.
Camped midfield the paint had cover. Stayed on at the same speed in the home stretch.
Travelled in a handy position, 2 deep with cover. Didn't find any extra at the business end and commenced to give some ground late.
Camped 3 back, 2 deep with cover. Kept up a reasonable gallop down the running.
Ridden along early but couldn't go the early speed of the race, settling 3rd from the rear on the rails, had cover. Kept to the inside in the final stretch and ran ok.
Settled about 3 wide with cover, midfield. Swung the home turn with one wider. Was dour in the home straight.

Taken back from a wide gate and travelled in 2nd last position, 1 off with cover. Went for runs through the field in the home straight and finished off fairly, became awkwardly placed on heels close to home.
Settled behind midfield, 2-3 deep with cover. Struggled in the home straight weakening noticeably over the final furlong.
Raced on the speed but was posted 3 deep without cover on the circle. Commenced to hang out badly after the 700m and was never likely thereafter finishing well back.
Camped handy, responded well when asked, took over 200M, drawn clear 50M and won impressively.
Settled midfield, moved close to the lead near course proper, dashed well when clear 350M, however never able to match with the winner.
Camped handy, under pressure 400M, ran on well to get 3rd.
Ridden forward to take the lead, raced greenly and shifted out on a number of occasions when put under pressure, kept on steadily to the line.
Rolled forward to share the lead, looked likely near 350M but stayed on one pace only.
Rolled forward to share the lead, under pressure near course proper, stayed on well until 150M.
Settled worse than midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader, ran on fairly.
Rolled forward to share the lead, found nothing when driven near course proper.
Rolled forward, however under pressure 800M, failed to response at any stage. (Questioned for performance, see incident report.)
Slow to begin, travelled 6Ls behind the leader, worked throughout, ran past tired runners.
Eased to rear, travelled 6Ls off the pace, unable to quicken at any stage.
Showed some early pace to share the lead until 500M, dropped away badly thereafter.
Raced Midfield, settled 3Ls off the pace, found nothing when put under pressure near course proper.
Slow to begin, then quickly shifted to the stand side along the rail, ridden along throughout the race, never competitive.
Taken back at break, sat 3 wide with cover last trio, widest & driven into stretch, strong run to lead 150m, clear for easy win.
Slow start, raced at tail on rail, driven 450m, briefly forced to wait on run at 250m, quickened to grab 2nd last strides.
Good break, raced rail midfield, switched out & shaken up 400m, grinding progress to take 3rd late.
Good start, snagged back to midfield 4 wide, unable to slot, advanced 1000m to 3 wide no cover 4th, driven 430m, boxed on soundly to wire.
Smart break, sat 1 back on fence, driven on inner 350m, led 250m, headed 150m & tapered out.
Quick to stride, settled close 2nd 1 off no cover, shaken up 400m to dispute lead, faded in closing stages.
Snagged back to slot 3 wide with cover behind midfield, driven 4 wide final turn, stayed on one pace.
Broke with others, raced rail behind midfield, driven home turn, stayed on for moderate late gains.
Speed at break to dispute lead, snagged back to 1 back 1 off with cover, crowded 400m, one-paced in run.
Bumped start, sat 1 off with cover midfield, ridden 450m, plugged on evenly.
Tardy start, sat 1 off behind midfield, ridden into stretch, impede 350m, never a factor.
Fast break to lead, to rail 1200m, angled 1 off for stretch run, driven 300m, headed 250m & faded tamely.
Tardy start, off heels 1300m, raced last trio 1 off, hard-ridden 400m, found nothing in run home.
Shifted & bumped start, raced 3 wide with cover midfield, niggled 800m, driven 4 wide 500m, fading when impeded & unbalanced 350m, eased.
Taken back at break, sat near rear 1 off with cover, switched out & nudged rival 400m, edged to centre track for strong run, led 100m, drew clear.
Speedy break, trapped 4 wide no cover midfield, shaken up 400m, sound run to 2nd 100m, not match winner.
Good break, sat midfield 1 off with cover, bumped 300m, strong run to go 3rd 75m.
Slow start, raced 1 off near tail, widest final turn, driven 400m & closed out with sustained centre track run for solid gains.
Rousted early & off heels 1100m, raced 4 wide with cover near rear, driven & bumped 400m, stayed on for late gains centre track.
Disputed early lead, settled 1 back 1 off, hard-ridden to 2nd 300m, lost position & out-paced in run to wire.
Smart break, outright lead 900m & taken to fence, kicked on 400m, headed 100m, no extra & swamped.
Missed break, sat at tail on rail, switched out in stretch, hard-ridden 300m, stayed on for minor inroads.
Broke with others, slotted back 3 deep with cover midfield, crowded home turn, bumped 300m, impeded & off heels 200m, kept on untested.
Fastest to stride, snagged back to handy 5th 1 off, driven 400m, run tapered.
Disputed early lead, settled 1 back on rail, ridden 400m, plugged on same pace.
Broke with others, raced midfield on rail, no clear run in stretch, off heels 100m, not extended.
Rousted from gate to press lead 3 deep no cover, settled 2nd 1 off no cover, driven final turn, weakened in run.
Outpaced & rousted early strides, raced awkwardly near tail on fence, switched out home turn, never a factor.
Shared the lead easily at advantageous slow sectionals 2 wide, closed the race off strongly to score.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 250M, just beaten in 2nd.
Box seat, enjoyed by the slow sectionals, just held ground in straight.
Midfield, 6Ls off the leaders 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 200M.
Slow away, midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, hung out badly and proved difficult to ride in straight, dashed well to the line.
Hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Settled in front of midfield, 4Ls off the leaders on the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 300M, run ended 100M.
Eased back, 9Ls off the leaders on the rails, raced keenly, dashed strongly 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed forward to take rail and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, soon weakened 250M.
Midfield, 5.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, no dash, flattened 200M.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leaders along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, no turn of foot in straight.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leaders 3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, no progress.
Slow away, harmed by the slow pace, never competitive at rear.
Eased to rear, harmed by the slow pace, never a factor.
Ridden forward but held 3-wide to 800m when left without cover, shaken up 500m, hit front 250m, held off late challenge.
Crowded start, dropped back but kept wide, switched out 500m, blocked for run 400m, taken in and ran on strongly.
Taken back from wide draw but kept wide to turn when got closer to rail. Switched out 400m and finished off nicely.
Crowded start and held wide behind midfield. Switched out 400m but no run till 300m. Kept on well to line.
Taken forward to sit 2-back, one-off to turn. Looked chance 400m but only one paced under hard riding final 300m.
Raced between horses to 800m, improved position around turn, under whip from 300m, one-paced.
Jumped well but held in midfield inside eventual winner. Little room top of straight, switched in 200m, one paced.
No early speed and soon last but wide. Moved closer to rail entering straight and kept on well final 400m.
Taken forward from wide draw to sit one-off behind leader. Kept on early in straight before tiring final 200m.
Taken back from wide draw and settled in last pair. Swung widest into home straight but found little under hard riding.
Taken forward from start but raced fiercely to turn. Kicked clear entering straight, caught 300m and tired quickly.
Hard ridden from gates but failed to muster and settled 3rd to 800m. Came off the bridle 700m and slipped back gradually.
Ridden up to hold rail position early. Came under pressure 600m but found nothing and dropped back gradually.
Taken forward to sit behind leader 800m. Shuffled back turn and finished tailed off. Unacceptable performance.
Broke sharply, held up in 5th travelling strongly, responded well and surged to the lead inside 200M, in total control final stages.
Close up behind pacesetter, moved to take over 300M, couldn't match the finishing speed of the winner passing 200M, rallied to hold 2nd.
Reserved behind midfield, caught 3-wide without cover, found his best stride final 200M, got up for 3rd near line, nearest finish.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, inconvenienced at 1200M, niggled along 500M out, clear run from 400M, found less than expected and couldn't close on leaders, lost 3rd near line.
Quickly dropped back, settled at the rear over 10Ls off the pace in middle stages, made subtle headway inside 300M, got up for 5th near the line.
Lost ground at the start, settled near last, ran on final 400M but no impression on leaders.
Held up in mid-division, had every chance, kept on steadily without troubling the first four.
Reserved near the rear, saved ground along the fence, briefly responded to riding early straight, run ended 100M out. (Blood in trachea.)
Held up midfield along the inside, brief effort from 400M, faded inside 150M.
Began awkwardly, ended up in last pair 10Ls off leader, stayed well back turning in, made steady progress from the rear without troubling the leaders.
Went forward chasing leader, came under pressure 500M out, not picked up and was soon overtaken.
Raced a shade keen in a 3-wide position towards the rear, not quickened when asked inside 400M, never threatened.
Soon led, set good pace throughout, caught near 300M, faded away.
Hustled up into a forward position tracking the quick pace, soon weakened on straightening, ran well below par.
Checked shortly after start, kept 3-wide to and around turn, responded well under whip down centre field for narrow win.
Not rushed early and kept 3-wide with cover to straight. Hard ridden from 400m, hit front 50m but run down close to line.
Ridden up from wide draw to sit behind leader. Got run top of straight, hit front 300m, kept on well when headed.
Held in midfield between horses, blocked for run entering straight, forced to switch out 300m. Kept on well to line.
No early speed and held behind midfield between horses to straight. Kept on steadily without looking dangerous.
Unbalanced start and dropped to last. Got inside run from 400m and kept on well despite having to check 200m.
No early speed and held 4-wide without cover early. Finished wide. Rider suspended for not riding out to the line.
Taken quickly to the front from wide draw and set fast sectionals to the straight. Collared 200m when running on empty.
Unable make use of inside draw and dropped to behind midfield along rail. Got inside run but one-paced final 200m.
No early speed and dropped to near last before 800m. Improved slightly around turn, before turning one-paced.
Hard ridden from inside draw but failed to muster, dropping to last entering straight. One-paced final 400m.
Jumped well from outside draw and taken up 2nd before taking sit around turn. Flattened soon after entering straight.
Taken forward from wide draw but held wide without cover. Lost position turn and tired soon after entering straight.
Ridden forward from wide draw to sit on quarters of leader. Dropped to 4th entering straight and found nothing final 300m.
Restrained to rear from widest gate, races at rear 8ls back on rails, well back to turn, weaved passage saving ground between horses in straight, closed over the top final 150m for a solid win.
No early pace, raced in rear division 6-7ls back, soft time on rails, angled out turning, closed well down middle finding winner too good final 100m.
Showed speed, took up running, set even tempo, kicked to 200m but didn't have extra to repel challenge of principals inside final furlong.
Took a prominent spot outside leader, fair run with even speed on, challenged turning, held on ok to make frame.
Settled at rear from a tricky gate, best part of 8ls back in running line, made run down middle making many lengths to be nearest on line.
Took a midfield position 3-4ls back in running line, had soft trip to turn, stayed on evenly in straight to be not far away at finish.
Unable to slot in and posted 3 wide without cover, worked hard 2-ls away in mid-section, loomed turning and did hit lead at 200m, work load took toll and folded late.
Enjoyed easy trip 3-4ls back on rails, not asked throughout, came two wide turning, just finished at same speed holding ground in stretch.
Caught wide from outset from a tricky alley, 4 horses wide without cover on circle 4-5ls away in mid-section, no real progress from 300m.
Raced 2-3 wide just off midfield 5ls or so away, reasonable trip to bend, in traffic turning and without a run to 200m, kept on ok when clear but race was over by that stage.
Ended up at rear racing 3 wide 8ls off top end, always well back and was last turning, set too much to do and only passed tired ones late.
Showed good speed to lead briefly before taking a trail, travelled strongly in 1 out 1 back spot, there to turn, lacked usual finish and was disappointing when dropping out in straight.
Slow out but mustered to hold a spot behind leader on rails, no excuses to turn, gave in easily and dropped away considerably late.
In rear division 7ls or so back in running line, always well back, offered nothing.

Began fairly, took up running rounding stables bend, joined 900 M out going up Rock and the leading duo kicked 3L clear on home bend, came under pressure to hold place on straightening, stuck on well.
Waited with, finished off race strongly down the centre of track, did best work late.
Settled in midfield, ran on in straight to be nearest at finish.

Pressed on from a poor gate to join leaders stables bend settling just off the speed 2-wide down far side, became 3rd approaching Rock and similar into straight, kept on one pace and swamped for a placing late.
Amongst leaders early, settled just better than midfield in 4th and then 5th around Rock, similar turning in, fought on steadily without quickening.
Settled in forward of midfield racing keenly at times far side, kept on steadily down straight despite hampered 100 M out.
Travelled in last few, remained similar into straight, made steady headway down inside of straight to be nearest at finish. (Lame next day)
Soon taken across from the middle draw, travelled just worse than midfield far side and awkwardly at times, made no impression in straight. (Blood in trachea and lame next day)
Trailed the field most of way, ran on past beaten horses in straight despite crowded for room 50 M out, never nearer.
Settled just worse than midfield on rails, saved ground turning for home, kept on same pace until checked 100 M out.
Travelling in rear of midfield before its saddle shifted rounding stables bend, improved rapidly around field to just outside leader 900 M out, soon weakened upon straightening.
Prominent to straight, found nothing under strong pressure, dropping out when crowded closing stages.
Eventually settled 3 back, 1 off with cover. Turned for home 6 wide and responded to hard riding to have the race sewn up near the 50m.
Maintained the fence while vying for the lead, settling during the early& middle stages in 2nd position. Assumed the lead near the home turn, fought on gamely in the run to the post.
Settled on the fence in fourth position tracking the speed, had cover. Finished off soundly.
Parked worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Shifted out into continue clear running after the 200m and worked home nicely.
Shuffled back near the 800m, travelling 1 off, midfield with cover. Swung the home turn widest, finished off steadily without ever threatening the principals.
Parked midfield the fence had cover. Stayed towards the inside in the final stretch, never quickened & was one paced.
Travelled with the backmakers on the rails. Kept to the inside in the home stretch, stayed on at the same speed down the running.
Settled worse than midfield, on the paint with cover. Railed up in the straight but kept on at the same pace in the run to the line.
Dulled for leading duties for the better part of the race, travelling keenly in the early & middle stages, 3/4L in advance of a runner to its inside. Was a spent force after the 150m.
Travelled 3 deep without cover before managing to shift in and race 1 out 1 back on the circle. Weakened over the final 100m. (reported to be lame in the R/F the following day)
Travelled second last, 2 deep with cover. Whacked away at the same speed in the straight, failing to close off.
Began only fairly then was crowded, settling in last position along the fence, had cover. Only plodded home in the final stretch.
Ridden forward to park outside the leader, kept on strongly to score, never in danger.
Taken back from a wide gate, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, peeled wide after straightening, stormed home over the last furlong to grab 2nd.
Camped handy 2 wide, couldn't find a clear run until 150M, ran on nicely to get 3rd.
Rolled forward to obtain the box seat, stayed on well but no further kick in the concluding stages, just missed 3rd.
Settled worse than midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, couldn't find a clear run until 200M, closed to the line well.
Lacked early pace, eased to midfield 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, swung widest, made minor ground 200M.
Raced midfield, 2.5Ls behind the leader along the rail, stayed inside, ran on only fairly.
Taken back from a wide draw, 7.5Ls behind the leader, detached from the field before straightening, swung widest, dashed on ok.
Began awkwardly, then eased to settle 6.5Ls off the pace on the fence, checked 600M, stayed inside, never ran on.
Hard ridden forward to take the lead on the rail, weakened over the last furlong.
Hard ridden from a wide gate however failed to cross, then sit 4th 3 wide, out of fuel 250M.
Hard ridden early to settle midfield, 3Ls off the pace 2 wide, never look chance, flattened badly 250M.
Tardy break, rousted early to sit rail midfield, switched out 400m & driven, crowded & bumped 200m, quickened to lead 100m.
Fair break, settled rail 4th, niggled 600m, driven in stretch, nudged by rival 200m, bumped opponent 100m,ran on to take 2nd final 50m, always held.
Smart start, camped midfield 1 off with cover, driven 400m, ran on readily for 3rd without threatening.
Lacked early pace, sat rail behind midfield, driven down inner for sound run to 4th.
Taken behind at break, raced last pair on fence, driven final turn, ran on well for solid gains.
Tardy start, worked 4 deep to lead 1000m, taken to rail, ridden & headed 300m, briefly led all out 200m, bumped & headed 100m, tapered thereafter.
Speed to lead 1st turn, headed 1000m, sat 2nd 1 back on rail, switched 1 off to press lead 500m, led 300m, emptied & headed 200m, no extra.
Good break, clipped heels & stumbled early stages, raced 1 off behind midfield, switched out final turn, stayed on moderately.
Fast break, driven to lead early strides, headed 1st turn, raced 3rd 1 off no cover, driven 400m, shifted into rival 200m, weakened to wire.
Broke with others, snagged back to slot 1 off near rear, switched 3 wide & niggled 500m, widest into stretch, kept on same pace.
Sharp break, sat midfield 3 deep no cover, driven home turn, weakened tamely.
Moderate break & bustled early, soon niggled at tail 1 off, wide home turn, found nothing 7 tailed off.
Fast break & driven to lead, headed 1200m, tracked 1 back on rail, shaken up to 2nd 500m, driven 400m, switched out, grinding run to lead 50m.
Smart start, rolled to lead 1200m, set steady tempo, kicked on 400m, all out & headed 50m.
Sharp start, sat 3rd 1 off no cover, advanced to 2nd 800m, driven 600m, boxed on gamely, held on for 3rd.
Good break, sat fore of midfield on rail, switched out & driven final turn, stayed on and just missed out on 3rd.
Restrained at break, sat last pair 1 off, advanced 3 wide 800m, progress wide on turn, ran on soundly centre track.
Fair break, settled 1 off with cover behind midfield, hard-ridden in rear home turn, rallied for solid gains to wire.
Smart start, off heels early, raced midfield on fence, shuffled back 800m, driven 300m, one-paced in run & off heels 100m.
Awkward break, over-raced initially, sat midfield 1 off, bustled 800m, off heels 600m, driven for modest late gains.
Snagged back at break to race behind midfield on rail, shuffled back & driven 600m, plugging on when off heels 50m & eased.
Tardy break, initially sat midfield 1 off, advanced to 4th backstretch, ridden 400m, weakened in run.
Taken behind from wide gate to race last pair on rail, switched 3 wide 600m, last & driven 300m, struggled in run.
Slow start, caught 3 wide no cover midfield, driven 500m, found nothing in stretch.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, dashed strongly 200M despite not suited by the slow pace, scored easily.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, closed off well 300M, checked 200M, ran 3rd, promoted to 2nd.
Hard ridden forward, sat outside the leader, enjoyed the slow sectionals, ran on well for 2nd, hung in 200M and caused interference, relegated to 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders on the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Behind midfield along the fence, 4.5Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Eased at start, took rail behind the field, 6.5Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Pushed to take rail and led by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 200M weakened.
Hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, flattened 200M.
Eased at start, 6.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, lack turn of foot in straight.
Pushed early, 5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, made no ground.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the slow pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, emptied 250M.
Slow away, took rail at rear, 8Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Crowded start, raced at rear 4-back the rails to straight. Switched out from behind horses and ran on strongly to win close home.
Ridden up from wide draw to sit outside leader first turn, dropped back 4th back stretch, shaken up 400m to lead 200m. Kept on when passed.
Taken forward to hold rail, eventually taking box seat behind leader. Got inside run entering straight and kept on well.
No early speed and raced in midfield along fence to straight. Forced to switch out 400m for run and kept on gamely.
Outpaced early and dropped to rear but away from rail. Taken wide entering straight and kept on steadily.
No early speed and held 3-wide before dropping back to last and cutting to rail. Finished off nicely along inside rail.
Taken back across horses from wide draw and last early before moving up along fence. Switched out 400m and kept on steadily.
Hard ridden from middle draw to take lead on settling. Was still ahead at 250m before tiring and slipping back.
Taken back from wide draw and last on settling before improving position. Kept on one-paced straight but checked final stages.
Ridden forward to hold position three-back, one-off along back stretch. Switched out 400m but found little under pressure.
Ridden up from wide draw but unable to cut in and mostly 3-wide without cover. Gave ground from 300m.
Jumped well to hold 4th early, then taken wide round first turn to sit 2nd back stretch. Gave ground from 400m. Lame left front.
Held up midfield racing along the 2-path, patiently waited with, quickened well when getting a run inside 250M, surged clear final 50M.
Reserved in mid-division, raced in restricted room passing 200M, came through to renew his challenge inside 100M, should have been closer.
Soon guided to a rail position in midfield, travelled well enough, had every chance, kept on steadily for 3rd.
Settled in behind leaders, challenged off the home turn, loomed 200M, kept giving under pressure, lost out for 3rd narrowly. (Lame.)
Hustled along after the start, led at good pace in the first half before slowing things down into the home turn, kept on early straight, faded once headed near 50M.
Tracked leader along fence, kept on same pace turning in, outpaced 150M.
Failed to muster speed, ended up towards the rear 7Ls off the pace, switched wider near 400M, made some progress early straight but run ended passing 200M.
Dropped back to near last 8Ls behind leader, preserved with but couldn't pick up sufficiently to mount a serious challenge.
Taken back from wide barrier, 10Ls back in the rear, still had plenty to do off the home turn, made limited progress.
Switched off to the rear, 2nd last and 9Ls off the pace midway, pushed along home turn but never going the pace to challenge.
Tracked leader along the 2-path, gave way nearing 400M, dropped out rapidly.
Never far off from the pace but caught 3-wide without cover throughout, came under pressure 500M out, weakened to last passing 200M. (Unacceptable Performance.)

Began awkwardly, soon recovered to join leaders hitting front 1100 M out, went over 1L clear shortly after straightening, just held on to the line.
Settled in forward of midfield on rails, saved ground turning for home, fought on steadily to just fail to get up on line.
Settled in midfield, baulked for a run early in straight, obtained clear run over 200 M out, finished off race nicely.
Began from a poor draw, soon settled just worse than midfield on rails, saved ground turning for home, baulked early in straight, finished off race well.
Bumped jumping out, soon recovered from midfield to 1L 3rd on rails around the bend, obtained a clear run shortly after straightening but ran home one-paced.
Not far off early, dropped back to midfield 1100 M out, ran on steadily under pressure.
Ridden along from a poor draw to share the pace, settled for 2nd outside leader around the bend, gradually faded inside final 200 M.
Soon taken across from a wide gate to race in rear, similar turning into straight, kept on same pace without quickening.
Niggled along not far off the lead, gradually shuffled backward to be forward of midfield around the bend when 3-wide, renewed effort into the straight but one-paced.
Prominent when ridden early, gradually dropped back to worse than midfield 1100 M out, widest into home straight, produced late impression.
Broke well in lead early, gradually taken back to race in 2L 5th around the bend, baulked for a run early in straight, made no further impression.
Never on terms.
Always struggling.
Raced wide throughout after beginning from a poor draw, jumped nicely, ridden along to chase behind leaders, hampered 300 M out, folded up quickly.

Enjoyed a nice run in the race tracking the on speed runners along the fence, had cover. Shifted out into clear running early in the straight and let down nicely to have the race in its keeping prior to the final 50m.
Vied for leading duties on the fence, no cover. Challenged for most of the trip, managed to kick clear after the 300m, only to be caught late.
Parked just ahead of midfield, 2 deep with cover. Finished off reasonably well, maintain a sound effort on debut.
Camped worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Peeled out near the 300m to continue improving, battled away to stay in the frame.
Settled with the backmakers, 2-3 deep with cover. Commenced to improve around runners after the 500m. Ran on gamely down the outside in the home stretch.
Rated midfield the fence had cover. Cornered 4 deep kept up an even gallop down the running.
Not the best to begin, managing to settle behind midfield 3 deep no cover. Held up early in the straight, worked to the line fairly. (see incident report).
Raced in the leading trio, 2 deep no cover. Stayed towards the inside turning for home but commenced to give ground over the final 150m.
Raced back in the field, along the paint with cover. Crowded for room near the furlong, kept on at the same speed thereafter.
Never likely after being posted 3 deep without cover on the speed. Faded in the run home.
Raced keenly in the early stages, travelling midfield, 3 wide with cover. Came wide in the straight, was a spent force after the furlong.
Slow to begin then was taken back to settle in last position close to the rails, had cover. Kept to the inside in the straight, passed a couple of tiring horses in the run home.
Began on terms then drifted back from a wide alley and settled second last, 3 deep with cover. Failed to close off in the home straight.
Crowded on jumping but recovered to settle 3 deep, one pair back. Never responded to riders pressure in the straight and struggled a long way out.
Settled midfield along the stands rail, switched in for room 700M, progressed nicely, dashed well when clear 250M and scored by a short head.
Raced worse than midfield in the centre of the track, dashed well when put under pressure near course proper, just beaten by a short head.
Hard ridden forward to share the lead the stands side, stayed on well to get 3rd.
Rolled forward early, soon dropped to midfield 700M along the outside fence, blocked from 4-1, ran on well to get 4th when clear, unlucky runner.
Raced midfield about 2Ls off the pace the stands side, steadied when crowded 400M, then switched to centre of the track, ran on nicely.
Ridden forward to share the lead along the stands rail, weakened 100M.
Eased back about 5Ls off the pace the stands side, switched to centre of the track 400M, then was held up from 3-1, made some ground when clear.
Showed some good early pace to share the lead the stands side, however hung in badly and proved very difficult to ride 200M, eased down over the concluding stages.
Rolled forward to share the lead the stands side, out of fuel 100M.
Began awkwardly, then travelled handy the stands side, found nothing when driven 400M.
Began awkwardly, then pushed to settle 2Ls behind leaders in the centre of the track, kept on one paced, weakened 100M.
Slow to begin, then travelled 6Ls off the pace in the centre of the track, never competitive.
Raced prominently the stands side, however found nothing when put under pressure, dropped off badly 200M, eased down 100M.
Lacked early speed, always at rear, never a factor.
Awkward break, slotted rail behind midfield, switched out 450m, shifted 5 wide 420m, led 300m, always on top in duel to wire.
Fair break, raced rail midfield, switched 1 off & driven 350m, quickened to 2nd 250m, duelled to line, always held.
Taken behind runners at break to rail near rear, driven into final turn, switched 6 wide for clear run 300m, stayed on for solid 3rd.
Snagged back at break, raced 1 from tail, switched out 430m, closed out soundly without threatening.
Taken behind runners at break, niggled for progress 1 off 600m, driven widest into stretch, ran on centre track for solid gains.
Quick to stride, sat 1 back on rail 3rd, to 4th 1100m, switched 1 off 700m, 3 wide & driven final turn, boxed on evenly.
Driven from wide gate to sit 2nd 1off no cover, to 3rd 1100m, progress to close leader 800m, led 400m, headed 300m & plugged on.
Decent break, settled 1 off near rear, switched wide & driven 500m, boxed on one pace centre track.
Good break, settled midfield 1 off with cover, niggled back stretch, switched out 500m, off heels 430m, close to heels 200m, found little in run.
Fair break, sat 1 off behind midfield, rousted 800m, switched wide home turn, driven & found little, emptied & eased last 200m.
Fast start to lead early, headed 1st turn, sat 1 off fore of midfield, hard-ridden final turn, shunted out 430m, soon weakened under pressure.
Fast break, soon led on fence, headed 1100m & sat 1 back on rail, switched out 450m, crowded final turn, found nothing & faded tamely.
Slow start, driven to sit 3rd 3 wide no cover, rushed to lead 1100m, soon clear, all out & headed 400m, weakened thereafter.
Decent start, settled behind midfield on rail, shuffled back 800m, 5L back toward rear & shaken up 400m, strong rail run to lead 60m.
Good start, trapped 3 wide no cover midfield, shaken up home turn, to narrow 2nd 200m, 3rd at 100m, driven to grab 2nd last stride.
Missed break & rousted early, raced at tail 1 off, switched wide & driven 6L back final turn, motored centre track to snatch 3rd close home.
Fast break to lead, restrained in front, to rail & headed 1000m, raced without cover, regained lead 300m, headed 60m, edged out of frame last strides.
Slow break, advanced to race midfield 3 wide with cover, off heels 1000m, driven wide final turn, sound inroads when squeezed & snatched up late.
Fair break, advanced to sit 1 off 1 back 3rd, driven 400m, kept on evenly to wire.
Smart start, disputed early lead, led 1 off no cover 1000m, driven 400m, failed to extend & headed 300m, boxed on when out of contention.
Fast start, snagged back to last trio 3 wide with cover, hard-ridden into stretch, plugged on evenly.
Smart start, sat 1 off fore of midfield, shaken up & outpaced 350m, stayed on moderately.
Awkward break, caught 4 wide no cover behind midfield, wide progress on turn, ridden 430m, one paced in run to wire.
Prominent at break, soon back in midfield on fence, niggled 1000m, steadied off heels 800m, ridden 500m, battled on at one pace.
Fair start, rolled to sit 1 back on fence, hard to settle & off heels 900m, ridden 400m, outpaced & plugged on tamely.
Fair break, off heels 1200m, raced last trio on rail, switched 1 off 700m, found little in run home.
Tardy break, raced 1 off behind midfield, ridden into stretch, found nothing, trailed in.
Eased to follow the leaders, 2.5Ls off the fast pace along the fence, closed off strongly to win.
Very slow away, 8Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, favoured by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, 4Ls off the leader, suited by the fast tempo, briefly held up 400M, made steady ground when clear for 3rd.
Pressed forward to hold the lead by 1L, clocked fast sectionals under pressure, hung on well until 200M flattened.
Hard ridden forward, 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the fast tempo, held ground in straight.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made some ground 200M.
Pushed forward to cross, 1L off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the fast sectionals, soon out of fuel 300M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the fast pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, held ground in straight.
Midfield, 6.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, suited by the fast sectionals, never improved.
Eased back, 9Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, favoured by the fast pace, ran on ok.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the fast tempo, trapped 3 wide, no progress.
Eased at start, 8Ls off the leader along the fence, benefited by the fast tempo, no progress.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 10Ls off the leader, favoured by the fast pace, ran on fairly.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader on the fence, suited by the fast tempo, emptied 200M.
Little slow to muster, ridden to hold box seat to turn, switched out 400m but then switched in for run. Ran on strongly when clear.
No early speed and held one-off to 800m. Unbalanced rounding turn, switched wide straight, ran on strongly.
Ridden up from good draw to settle two-back, one-off to straight. Got run between horses and kept on steadily to the line.
Ridden up from good start to take clear lead before turn. Kicked clear 400m, caught inside 200m, battled on.
Jumped well and hard ridden to hold forward position but wide without cover. Covered extra ground but kept on steadily.
No early speed and shuffled back early before travelling keenly 700m. Settled better around turn and kept on steadily final 400m.
No early speed and in last pair to turn. Switched out straight and kept on steadily final 400m without threatening.
Ridden forward from middle draw to sit one-back, one off turning for home. Still a chance 300m before tiring.
Snagged back to last soon after the start and tailed field to straight before making some late ground.
Jumped OK but proved difficult to settle from 1200m, racing in midfield to straight. Kept on one-paced.
No early speed and dropped to rear. Was last at 400m before running past tired horses final 300m.
Began awkwardly and then raced in restricted room, dropping to midfield along fence. Found little in straight.
Ridden forward from wide draw to take early lead before settling 2nd before turn. Gave ground from 300m.
Ridden up from awkward draw but held 3-wide for most of the way. Tired soon after entering straight.
Tracked leader, moved up strongly to lead 300M out, drew readily clear and won unchallenged.
Checked shortly after the start, settled well in the rear, ran on strongly final 300M without getting to the winner.
Began well, shuffled back to mid-pack, ran on well final 300M but no impression on the winner.
Always prominent, kept on evenly under pressure but never a serious threat.
Stalked the pace, lacked winner's acceleration going into 400M, finished off mildly.
Sped to the lead, lacked a further response when the winner drew alongside 300M, weakened final 100M.
In mid-division, driven 350M but not going the pace to challenge.
Always handy, kept on one paced final 300M and hung in under pressure.
3Ls behind pacesetter in early and middle stages, kept on same pace final 300M, never threatened.
Poised near the rear of a compact field, gave limited response inside 300M, no threat final 100M.
Always in the firing line, outpaced passing 200M.
Settled near the rear in a closely packed field, failed to pick up passing 400M, never a threat to leaders.
Began awkwardly, moved up to race close to pace, not quickened when asked, faded final 200M.
Along the stands' rail but failed to pick up under pressure. (Bled.)
Jumped well, 2nd early before racing keenly 900m. Settle one-back, one-off into turn, shaken up 400 and kept on well. Just won.
Taken back to last from wide draw. Improved slightly around turn. No run 300m. Switched out 150m, flew home to just fail.
Made use of inside draw to hold box seat behind leader into turn. Denied run 400m, switch in and kept on strongly.
Ridden forward from wide draw, crossed in 800m to sit on hind quarters of leader. Kept on steadily before tightened 100m.
Taken back across horses from wide draw, shuffled back to last entering turn. Ran on well to be closest at finish.
Unbalanced start, then held 3-wide without cover entering turn. Improved to 3rd entering straight before tiring under pressure.
No early speed and settled behind midfield along fence. Switch out entering straight and kept on under hard riding.
Jumped well but held 3-wide early and then 4-wide into straight. Shown whip 400m but found nothing under pressure.
Got off well and settled 3-back, one-off to the turn. Taken wide entering straight but one-paced under hard riding from 300m.
Jumped OK but kept wide early before taken wider 750m. Was widest into straight, becoming one-paced.
Jumped best and ridden forward to hold lead before turn. Led field into straight, caught 300m and tired.
Awkward start and checked soon after, dropping to rear. Improved around turn, but one-paced when checked 150m.
Hard ridden from inside draw but slow to muster. Was difficult to settle 1300m, shifted out entering turn, found little in straight.
Unbalanced soon after start and dropped to rear. In last pair turning for home before tiring passing the 200m.
Sat just off midfield 7ls or so back in running line, traveled well and tracked into race on circle, let down nicely at 300m doing too well for rivals late.
Took a covered spot 1 out 1 back 3ls off leader, had run of race to turn, set out after winner final 300m, eventual winner again had upper hand late but kept on well for 2nd.
Landed an ideal spot on leaders back, travelled nicely on rails to turn, stayed on well final 300m despite being difficult to ride out late.
Raced in 2 wide line 5-6ls back around midfield, same margin down to turn, in amongst horses to 200m, closed hard when clear last furlong to make frame late.
Showed usual speed to lead, set terms to suit, kicked on at top of straight, overhauled inside 100m just missing frame.
Missed start, mustered to sit just off midfield 6-7ls back, kept making ground on circle, kept on evenly in straight without threatening.
Lacked usual pace, raced behind midfield 8ls or more off top end, improved on rails on bend, closed fairly along inside to be closest at finish.
Restrained from a wide gate, raced more than 10ls back at rear, saved ground on rails on bend, made some progress along inside in straight to be nearest at finish.
Took up a prominent spot at leaders girth, raced 1L away to bend, couldn't stay on when they sprinted and steadily faded.
Restrained from a wide gate, best part of 12ls back, made ground approaching turn and made even progress without looking likely (blood in trachea).
Raced more forward than usual, posted 3 on circle, 2ls down turning but folded when workload took toll and dropped out.
Ended up racing 3 wide at rear, more than 10ls back, plenty to do well back turning, no impression in straight.
Taken back from wide gate, always well back, 12ls or so off front, gave too much start but still made no significant progress in straight.
Ended up in midfield 3 wide, had cover part of the time, ridden along approaching turn, steadily weakened out of it.

Began from a poor draw, soon settled in 2-wide in 4th within 3L of muddling pace, commenced move turning in, ran on well to gain upper hand over 100 M out.
Settled 2-wide in 6th in the middle of the pack in muddling pace, commenced move rounding home bend and went wide into straight, ran on well under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Set a sedate pace to straight, headed over 200 M out, ran home one-paced.
Always thereabouts in the slowly run race, snuck up on rails turning in to have every chance, unable to sustain effort inside final 100 M.
Well back, saved ground turning for home, ran on well.
Soon ridden from the widest draw to travel just outside the leader which set a sedate pace, came to challenge entering straight but failed to make any impression.
Travelled towards the rear of the slowly run field, ran on while intending to lay in in straight.
Settled in last few of the slowly run race, ran home well down the centre of the straight.
Never better than midfield of the slowly run race, fought on steadily under pressure but failed to match finishing pace of others.
Never seen with a chance while always travelling at the back.
Settled in 5th within 4L of sedate pace on rails, saved ground turning for home, kept on steadily before overhauled inside final 100 M.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race in 4th position on the rails with cover. Improved along the inside in the home straight and kept up a sound grinding effort to claim the prize.
Vied for leading duties on the paint, holding a narrow margin at times. Was caught at the 100m, still chased gamely all the way to the wire.
Taken back from a wide gate and settled in last position close to the fence with cover. Railed up in the straight and closed of well.
Left the barriers awkwardly, then managed to slot in to travel midfield the fence, had cover. Kept up a reasonable gallop in the straight to stay in the frame.
Jumped awkwardly settling 3 back, 1 off with cover. Stayed on one paced in the run home.
Began very well then parked 1 out 1 back. Maintained an even effort before commencing to tire over the last 100m.
Worked forward and shared leading duties during for most of the event. Faded over the final 100m.
Camped midfield, 2 deep with cover. Peeled out to improve after the 500m, racing 3 deep no cover. Swung widest and only battled away down the running.
Settled with the backmakers on the paint, had cover. Worked home steadily along the inside.
Settled at the rear of the field, 2 wide with cover. Failed to make any impression in the final stretch.
Travelled back in the field, 2 deep with cover. Failed to close off and finished well back.
Never likely after being posted 3 deep without cover for most of the trip, midfield. Struggled in the home straight.
Camped handy 2 wide, ran on well to score by a short head.
Taken back from a wide gate, settled 4.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, severely hampered 600M, dashed on strongly to get 2nd, just missed by a short head.
Raced midfield, travelled 3.5Ls off the pace, hampered 600M, peeled widest, ran on well to grab 3rd.
Eased back, travelled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, severely hampered 600M, stayed inside, could not see daylight until 100M but still finished off well.
Ridden forward, however couldn't find any spot to slot in, trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, still able to run on until 50M flattened.
Taken back from a wide gate, settled 6Ls behind the leader, badly unbalanced 600M, ran on fairly.
Tracked well behind the leader, looked threat after straightening, however weakened 100M.
Began awkwardly, soon hard ridden forward to hold the rail and led, out of fuel 150M.
Began awkwardly, travelled 7Ls behind the leader, swung widest, ran on only fairly.
Bumped start, then couldn't find any spot to slot in, hampered 600M and raced 3 wide throughout, never ran on.
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls off the pace on the fence, crowded 600M, unable to quicken after straightening, weakened 100M.
Ridden forward to park outside the leader, flattened badly 250M, tailed out.
Ridden early, sat 1 off behind midfield, off heels & lost ground 800m, switched out 450m, powered centre track to lead 100m, drew clear.
Fast break to lead early, headed 1st turn, settled 1 back 1 off, switched 3 wide 450m, driven 300m, led 250, headed 100m, kept on to wire.
Smart start, raced 1 back on rail, driven 300m, ran on soundly without threatening lead.
Fair start, ridden early strides, slotted midfield 1 off with cover, flat-footed final turn & driven wide, closed out for sound late gains.
Restrained at start to last pair on rail, off heels 800m, shaken up 300m, ridden for good inroads until no extra final 50m.
Missed break, raced near rear, rail progress in back stretch, shaken up 300m, ran on for solid inroads.
Tardy start, raced 1 off near rear, off heels 800m & slotted on fence, switched out & driven 300m, off heels 200m, ran on evenly.
Snagged back to last pair 1 off, at tail & driven 300m, stayed on for modest gains.
Good start, settled midfield 1 off with cover, forced wide & ridden final turn, unbalanced under pressure 250m, lost action & eased late.
Smart break, raced strongly on fence fore of midfield, switched 1 off 450m, crowded into stretch, off heels & stumbled 250m, not recover.
Fast break, took lead on rail 1st turn, driven for home final turn, limited response, headed 250m, weakened out.
Tardy break, ridden to dispute lead into 1st turn, 3 wide no cover until settled 2nd 1 off 1000m, ridden final turn, faltered & faded tamely from 250m.
Good break, tracked 1 back on fence, shaken up turning in, rail run to lead 220m, extended clear to line.
Outpaced early strides, recovered to midfield 3 wide with cover, niggled 500m, driven wide final turn, centre track run to 2nd 100m, well held.
Snagged back from widest draw, settled at tail on rail, 8L back switched widest into stretch, motored home, just missed 2nd.
Tardy start, camped midfield rail, driven into stretch, shifted out 200m, stayed on for sound gains.
Fast start, taken back to last pair 1 off, 3 wide progress on turn, driven 350m, closed out for sound gains centre track.
Speed at break to press lead, trapped 3 deep no cover & taken back to fore of midfield, advanced home turn, to 2nd 200m, tapered & swamped.
Missed break, raced rail near rear, 7L back & ridden 400m, switched out into stretch, plugged on evenly for moderate gains.
Good break, raced midfield 1 off with cover, hard-ridden into stretch, kept on one pace to line.
Fast break, dropped back to 2 wide near rear, to rail 500m, switched wide & driven home turn, crowded 200m, boxed on.
Fast start from wide gate, 5 deep until 700m settled 1 off no cover 2nd, driven to challenge leader 300m, soon emptied & faded.
Smart break, 4 deep & prominent 1st turn, led 900m, set tempo on fence, driven home turn, headed 220m & weakened out.
Fast start to lead early, headed 900m, settled back 1 off with cover, driven 300m, impeded & off heels 200m, eased thereafter.
Pushed to hold the rail and led by 1.5Ls at advantageous slow sectionals, never received real challenge.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, closed off strongly for 2nd.
Pushed early, 6.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace, ran a remarkable 3rd.
Settled in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed the slow sectionals, just held ground in straight.
Settled in midfield, bumped early, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash in straight.
Eased to rear, 8Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, checked 300M, re-gathered momentum and showed little dash late.
Slow away, 5Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, ran on ok in straight.
Hard ridden forward, 2.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, flattened 200M.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, no turn of foot in straight.
Eased back, 8Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Eased back, took rail, 6.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
Jumped with field, ridden forward, cut to rail by turn, shaken up 400m, squeezed through narrow gap 200m, ran on strongly.
Taken forward from wide draw and held 3-wide to and around turn. Taken to centre of track and ran on strongly.
Ridden forward from wide draw to take lead 700m. Temporarily passed 500m, regained lead 350m, kept on well.
Ridden up soon after start to sit 3rd, one-off. Took off from 800m to lead 500m. Was 2nd into straight and kept on steadily.
Slow to move and then shuffled back to behind midfield along fence. Switched out 500m and ran on well final 200m.
Jumped best and led to 700m before taking box seat. Was 3rd entering straight, switched out for run but one paced.
Jumped OK but not enough speed and shuffled back to behind midfield along rails. Kept on steadily in straight. Bled.
Taken back from start, last before turn, put under pressure 400m, shifted in 200m, caught behind heels and not ridden out.
Began only fairly and held 3-wide back stretch and turn. Taken wider entering straight but only one paced to line.
Jumped OK but proved difficult to ride 700m and then crowded 500m. Shifted out straight and kept on one paced.
Taken back across horses and in last pair, one-off to turn. Was last into straight and found nothing under pressure.
Jumped with field but no early speed and then difficult to ride around turn. Dropped to last 200m and weakened further.
Poised handily just behind leaders, pounced nearing 200M and always doing enough to keep the persistent 2nd at bay.
Slow to begin, settled near the rear and not helped by the slow pace, made his effort wide 500M out, dueled with winner final 200M but was always held.
With leaders early stages, sat back in 5th entering back straight, switched to clear 250M, closed off well.
Held up 2-wide in midfield, made his move near 400M, stayed on well down the outside.
Held up 2-wide in a position ahead of midfield, kept on steadily to the line but always held by the leaders.
Switched off to last 9Ls off the pace, patiently ridden, still last going into final 200M, stayed on well final stages.
Went forward, briefly led making the first turn, tracked leader from 850M, ran on one-paced turning in, no threat from 150M.
Settled 2-wide towards the rear, stayed on fairly final 300M, never a threat to leaders.
Towards the rear inside, made limited progress turning home, no impression on leaders.
Went forward, caught wide making the first turn, led along fence from 800M, run ended 200M and dropped away.
Raced in midfield along the fence, proved difficult to settle when the pace slackened from 1200M, failed to pick up passing 300M.
Strode forward after the start but caught wide until 800M, outpaced from 300M, found little under pressure.

Settled within striking distance, hit the front 300 M out, careered away for an easy victory.
Settled in rear of midfield, commenced run inside 300 M, responded well to reach 2nd 150 M out, sustained progress to the line but found winner too good.
Not far off and just better than midfield, made steady headway in closing stages without threatening.
Broke well, settled just off the pace in 5th or 4th, failed to sustain effort closing stages.
Taken back immediately to race in rear, commenced move passing 400 M improving to mid-division, sustained progress to the line. (Tactic questioned.)
Soon dropped behind midfield despite ridden along early, switched in for a run inside 150 M, made good late progress but hampered near line.
Led or disputed lead early, gradually yielded ground from halfway out.
Jumped fairly, soon dropped to the rear of field, came under pressure inside 400 M, ran past well-beaten horses.
Disputed lead early, hit the front briefly approaching course proper, soon weakened. (Blood in trachea.)
Close up briefly, soon dropped towards the rear.
Began fairly, not far off on stands rails, dropped away quickly over 300 M out. Well there to 300 M, folded up quickly.
Well there to 300 M, folded up quickly.
Ridden along in close-up position early, gave ground from 600 M out.
Jumped moderately, settled just worse than midfield, inconvenienced 300 M out, dropped out.
Tracked the leaders on the fence early, then shifted out to travel 1 out 1 back after the 900m. hit the front near the furlong and drew clear in the run to the line.
Blundered badly at the start and lost considerable ground, settling third from the rear. Made the home turn deep, closed off strongly.

Eventually worked its way forward to settle in second position near the 900m, 2 deep, no cover. Was in front at the 200m, but wilted over the final stages. (returned with substantial amount of blood in the trachea)
Travelled 3 back, 2 wide with cover. Made steady ground along the inside in the home straight, never threatened.
Camped midfield the fence had cover. Worked home evenly towards the inside.
Travelled worse than midfield on the rails with cover. Made steady progress in the final stretch.
Sent forward and led on the fence. Faded over the final furlong.
Settled midfield 3 wide no cover, managed to shift in and travel 1 off near the 900m. Whacked away at the same speed in the home straight.
Never looked likely after being left posted 3 deep without cover after the 900m. Battled away in the straight.
Settled last, 2-3 deep with cover. Came wide in the home straight, kept whacking away in the run home.
Travelled with the backmakers on the rails with cover. Failed to close off. (Found to be lame in its left front leg the following morning).
Raced in fourth last position, 2 deep with cover. Just plugged away in the home straight without making any ground.
Settled about 3 back the paint with cover. Struggled over the final 200m. (An endoscopic examination after the race confirmed the horse to be a roarer).
Had every possible chance after box seating. Was a beaten horse early in the straight.
Eased to settle worse than midfield, travelled 6Ls off the pace 3 wide had cover, moved closer rounding the Home Turn, quickened up impressively to score.
Settled worse than midfield, 7Ls off the pace on the fence, couldn't find a clear run until near 300M, closed off strongly for 2nd but too late.
Raced midfield, 5Ls off the pace 3 wide had cover, ran on steadily to get a distant 3rd.
Taken back from a wide gate, settled 9Ls behind the leader on the fence, peeled widest turning for home, ran on ok without any threats.
Raced midfield, travelled 5.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, one-paced only in the Straight.
Settled worse than midfield, 7Ls off the pace 2 wide, made some late ground.
Eased back, settled 8Ls behind the leader on the fence, little dash final 200M and ran past tired runners.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, found nothing when put under pressure.
Rolled forward to sit 2nd without cover, flattened 200M.
Ridden forward, however couldn't slot in, trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, out of fuel 300M.
Raced Midfield, settled 5Ls off the pace on the fence, kept on one pace until 150M weakened.
Rolled forward to obtain the box seat, however got its head on the side and hung in after straightening, never ran on, tailed out.
Began awkwardly, soon taken back from a wide barrier, settled 7.5Ls off the pace 3 wide with cover, failed to make any impression after straightening, tailed out.
Rolled forward to take the lead by 2.5Ls, eased the pace down rounding the home turn, however found nothing in the straight, tailed out.
Good start, caught 3 wide no cover, raced 4th until progress to press lead 400m, shaken up 200m, quickened to lead 175m, drew clear.
Fast break, sat 2nd 1 back 1 off, driven into stretch, battled to narrow lead 250m, headed 175m, boxed on to wire.
Fair break, settled 3 wide with cover behind midfield, driven final turn, stayed on determinedly to go 3rd 50m, closest at wire.
Fast break, sat 1 back on fence 3rd, switched out & ridden 400m, closed off evenly without threatening.
Missed break, recovered to sit rail behind midfield, tight for running room in stretch, driven 175m, closed off without threatening.
Good break, sat 3 wide with cover midfield, driven 450m, maintained one pace to line.
Smart break, bustled early to sit one off with cover midfield, over-raced & off heels 1000m, ridden 400m, ran on one pace.
Fair break, snagged back to race 1 off near rear, shaken up 400m, outpaced but stayed on for modest late gains.
Sharp start to lead on fence, hard-ridden 400m, headed 250m, weakened in run to wire.
Taken behind at break to race near rear on fence, switched out in stretch, limited progress in one-paced run.
Smart break, snagged back to race at tail, driven into stretch, not clear run until final 200m, never a factor.
Missed break, rousted rail to sit midfield, driven in stretch, outpaced & plugged on tamely.
Fastest at break, soon headed, niggled fore of midfield 1 off with cover, ridden 600m, hard-driven 400m, struggled in run & eased close home.
Dropped back at break to race 3 wide near tail, driven wide 430m, found little & faded tamely.
Decent start, raced midfield 1 off with cover, switched wide home turn, hard drive centre track to lead 100m, just held on.
Missed break, sat last pair on rail, behind horses when switched across rival 300m & unbalanced, stormed home for clear running, just failed.
Good start, taken back to race 2 wide near rear, impeded & off heels 300m, lost ground, motored home, grabbed 3rd on nod.
Fair break, raced handy 3 deep with cover, ridden 350m, closed off solidly to just miss frame.
Smart start, rousted early to hold position, slipstreamed lead 1 off with cover, stayed on evenly under strong drive.
Missed break, recovered to sit fore of midfield 1 off with cover, switched out & driven 400m, one-paced in run.
Smart break, raced rail handy on inside of leader, led 300m, headed & swamped 100m as run tapered.
Fair break, sat rail midfield, niggled 800m, stretch progress on fence, switched off heels 250m, kept on same speed.
Fair break, raced behind midfield 2 deep with cover, taken wide home turn & driven, plugged on same speed & never a factor.
Fast break widest, driven 4 wide no cover to lead 900m, 3 wide & headed 400m, pressed lead 300m but found nothing, struggled in run.
Fast start to lead, headed 900m, led again 400m, driven & headed 300m, folded tamely.
Snagged back at start to race last pair, soon at tail, very wide & driven final turn, found nothing, finished adrift.
Hard ridden to take the rail and shared the lead at good sectionals, made all with a bit of luck at the photo finish.
Hard ridden to maintain a prominent spot, 2Ls off the good pace 3 wide, closed the race off strongly, just missed by a nose.
Pressed forward, shared the lead 2 wide at good sectionals, ran on well to the line, just beaten by a neck in 3rd.
Slow away, niggled along at back, 5Ls off the good pace on the fence, progressed steadily 300M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the good pace 3 wide, made steady ground 300M.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, pace good, just held ground in final stages.
Slow away, 6Ls off the good pace 2 wide, lack room 400M, made some ground 200M.
Tailed out at rear, 8.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, dashed strongly 200M.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, held up 400M, ran on fairly when clear.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 4Ls off the good pace 2 wide, no progress in straight.
At back, 5Ls off the good pace 3 wide, never improved.
Trapped 3 wide in the lead throughout, clocked good sectionals, soon emptied 350M.
Jumped OK and pulled way to one-off, one back to and around turn. Held early in straight, shaken up 250m, ran on strongly.
No early speed and soon at rear but away from fence. Swung wide into straight, swopped on leaders, kept on.
Ridden forward from wide draw and given easy lead to turn. Caught 400m but battled on doggedly to the line.
Awkward start then checked. Taken across horses to fence and improved position. No run till 300m, kept on well.
Taken back from wide draw to fence and raced at rear to straight. Did not get run until 300. Kept on well.
Ridden up from inside draw to sit 3-back the fence to turn. Switched out 500 and closed in 200m, turning one-paced.
No early speed and kept one-off despite good draw. Switched out 400m to make run, close on heels 250m, kept on.
Taken forward from good inside draw and kept in box seat to 400m. Shifted out 350m but run closed 200m. One-paced.
Ridden up from wide draw to sit outside heels of leader to turn. Challenged for lead 400m before turning one-paced.
Jumped OK but no speed and held wide behind midfield to turn. Kept on one-paced in straight without threatening.
Awkward start, recovered ground but caught three-wide behind pace. Taken wider 400m but only one-paced.
Taken back from wide draw and in last pair to turn. Began losing contact with field 400m. Had mucus in trachea.
Ridden forward from good draw but didn't settle until before turn. Remained in midfield to straight before weakening.
Caught wide early, steadied and shifted behind horses, dropping to last. Became detached from field entering straight.
Dropped back to a 2-wide position in midfield, travelled smoothly, ran on well when clear 350M, fought off the persistent runner-up final 200M.
Held up 3-wide behind mid-division, responded well turning in, went head to head with eventual winner inside 200M, narrowly beaten.
Always prominent, driven to a narrow lead 300M, kept on under pressure, headed by first two near line.
Began only fairly, ridden along but failed to muster, settled near the rear along the fence, clear run from 300M, stayed on well.
Led early, taken back a bit from 1200M, kept on well and had every chance turning in, couldn't match finishing kick of first two over final 100M.
Patiently ridden, near the rear 6Ls off the pace, held up early straight, ran on well but was steadied again close home, could have finished closer.
Held up in midfield along the fence, made stealthy headway from 350M, much improved effort.
Emerged to lead near 1000M, set steady pace, headed 300M, kept on until no extra final stages.
Switched off to near last, 7Ls off the pace in middle stages, stayed on only fairly final 300M, never a threat to leaders.
Went forward from draw 13, crossed to rail near 1200M, tracked leader and had every chance in straight, outpaced by leaders final 150M.
Caught wide early stages, held back to midfield for cover, gave limited response when driven inside 400M, out of contention mid-straight.
Lost ground at the start, hard driven to a midfield position, difficult to settle, failed to quicken when placed under pressure, eased 200M out.
Positioned 3-wide ahead of midfield, left with no cover from 1100M, soon weakened turning in.
Outpaced in last, niggled along to stay with the field 800M, brought wide to straight, beaten near 300M.
Ridden up from wide draw to hold position one-back, one-off to straight. Ran home strongly, shifting in final stages.
Ridden forward to hold rail position two-back from leader. Switched out 500m then switched in to make in. Checked final stages.
Hard ridden to lead from wide draw but unable to slot in and kept one-off. Kept on well in straight even after being caught.
Taken up to grab spot two-back, one-off to straight. Shaken up 400m to challenge but couldn't go on and one-paced.
No early speed and allowed to settle along fence near rear. Found inside run in straight and kept on steadily.
No early speed and was detached from field at rear before moving forward 500. Switched out straight and ran on strongly.
Jumped OK but not pushed and taken back across horses to rail. Improved position before final turn and kept on steadily in straight.
Restrained early and dropped to behind midfield one-off from rail. Switched widest in straight but only one-paced.
Got head up shortly after start and hung in. Cut in to hold rail before turn, keeping out leader. Tired after entering straight.
Restrained early from widest draw but unable cut in and held three-wide without cover. Kept on steadily in straight.
Began well but held in midfield one-off fence to turn. Shaken up 400m but found little under pressure and tired late.
Failed to muster speed despite being hard ridden and dropped to near rear. Made little impression final 400m.
Sluggish at start, then hit rail 900m and became unbalanced, Lost ground quickly in straight. Irregular heart rhythm.
Landed a nice spot 2ls back racing 2 wide, enjoyed a nice trail into race, loomed at 300m and dashed well to maintain an advantage over rivals final 200m.
Tardy into stride, raced 5ls or so away on rails just off midfield, not assisted by tempo, gain clear passage at 300m and closed strongly but couldn't match winner inside final furlong.
Slow to begin, raced back 7ls away on rails, still plenty to do turning, weaved passage through and made many lengths late along rails for place.
Showed early speed to cross and lead, set a steady tempo to suit, headed soon after turning and fought on to 100m and lost place in shadows.
Taken back to race behind midfield 5-6ls away in running line, lack of pace not suitable, switched widest turning and closed off nicely making good ground (see racing incidents).
Pressed on from a tricky gate to sit outside leader, enjoyed and easy time with steady tempo, right there turning and was a place chance at 200m before fading late.
Taken back from a wide alley and raced 3 wide just off midfield, 5ls or so back, had cover before making 4 wide run rounding bend, closed off well in circumstances to be nearest at finish.
Ended up 3 wide in midfield with cover, fair run with steady tempo, niggled turning in and just produced a 1 paced finish in straight holding ground in run to line.
Landed spot in midfield, racing 2 wide 3-4ls back, overaced in mid-section, tracked eventual winner turning but lost spot and forced to come wider, just made even headway late (see racing incidents).
Restrained form a tricky gate, raced at rear nearly 8ls back, not aided by the speed, made some minor progress along rails in straight.
Took up a nice spot on leaders back, all favours with steady speed, lacked a dash at business end and dropped out of contention last 200m.
Posted 3 wide without cover when unable to slot in, 1-2Ls back doing share of work despite steady tempo, gradually gave ground from turning in when workload took toll.
Raced on Rails in midfield 3ls or so back, overaced in mid section, found little and dropped off tamely final 300m.
