Driven along early from the widest draw settling 2-wide in midfield, commenced run approaching 400 M, ran on steadily under pressure to just get up on line.
Began fairly, traveled in 4th mainly about 2L off the pace, commenced move approaching home turn, quickened under hard driving to hit front 200 M out only to be pipped at post.
Began fairly, settled just worse than midfield, came to challenge under pressure approaching home turn, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Settled towards the rear on rails, saved ground turning for home, sustained progress to the line to be nearest at finish.
Soon taken back to tail-end and across for rails run, waited with, commenced move over 400 M out and one of the widest into straight, ran on nicely.
Began awkwardly losing ground, settled well behind, saved ground on rails turning in, angled out to challenge upon straightening, made some late progress.
Took advantage of the one draw to be with leaders early racing keenly, soon quit speed battle to settle one back on the fence, found nothing in straight.
Began from a wide draw, settled in last few, kept on same pace in the run home.
Began fairly, settled in midfield on rails, found nothing.
Broke well to dispute lead early, crossed by leader 700 M out, renewed effort to join the lead briefly into straight, soon weakened.
Jumped best from the middle draw, niggled along to hold advantage 3-wide, obtained rails run 700 M out, headed under pressure passing 200 M, dropped out.
Began fairly, settled wide without cover just worse than midfield, yielded ground into straight.
Camped 1 out 1 back. Was under pressure to keep in touch after the 500m. Chased gamely all the way down the running to finish over the top of its rivals close to home.
Parked midfield the paint had cover. Copped a check when attempting to improve just after straightening. Re-gathered soon after and finished off nicely.
Sent forward and led along the fence. Skipped clear early in the straight but was swamped late.
Went back from the outside gate and parked 3rd from the rear, 2-3 deep with cover. Made a forward move after the 500m, swung widest turning for home and ran on well.
Settled midfield with some cover 3 deep. Peeled out with one wider near the furlong and kept on soundly.

Didn't have the cleanest of starts then did plenty of work during the early and middle stages to go forward, but was posted 3 deep no cover, behind the speed. Kept up a reasonable effort despite its workload.
Began very awkwardly, travelling behind midfield, the paint. Made some progress towards the inside in the final stretch without threatening.
Settled outside the leader in second position, no cover. Gave way over the final 100m.
Not he best to begin settling last, a couple of lengths from the body of the field, on the rails, had cover. Found the line satisfactorily.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race tracking the leader along the fence. Had every possible hope but faded over the concluding stages.
Travelled worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Failed to make any impression in the run home.
Settled with the backmakers, 3-4 deep had cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Failed to muster speed early despite hard ridden along, then taken back to settle 5Ls off the pace 2 wide, finished off the race well to score by a neck.
Began awkwardly, then taken back to the rear, settled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, dashed well for 2nd. (lost left front plate)
Hard ridden forward to take the lead, stayed on nicely until 50M, hung on for 3rd.
Eased to settle worse than midfield, 5Ls off the pace 3 wide with cover, closed to the line well to get 4th.
Camped handy, travelled 2Ls behind the leader 2 wide, had every possible chance after straightening, however weakened 100M.
Taken back from a wide gate and raced at rear, 6.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, worked home nicely in the straight.
Rolled forward to obtain the box seat, however one-paced only in the straight.
Raced midfield, 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, never ran on. (Hung out and proved difficult to ride in the straight, also had substantial amount of blood in the horse's trachea)
Ridden forward to park outside the leader, soon flattened after turning in.
Rolled forward, however could not find a spot to slot in, eased to midfield 3 wide with cover, dropped to near rear when the tempo quicken rounding the home turn, never ran on.
Hard ridden forward, however trapped 4 deep without cover throughout, under pressure 600M, soon dropped off badly, tailed out. (Questioned for riding, see incidents report)
Rolled forward to sit 4th, however trapped 3 wide had no cover throughout, under pressure 600M, lost ground quickly rounding the Home Turn, eased down thereafter.
Good break, camped 6th 1 off with cover, switched out & bustled 600m, swept centre track to lead 250m, drew clear for easy win.
Driven early strides, unable to lay up, soon last pair 1 off, switched 3 wide & advanced 700m, strong run centre track to 2nd 100m, not match winner.
Sharp break to press lead 3 wide no cover, soon slotted 1 back 1 off, driven 400m, shifted into rival & unbalanced 250m, battled on doggedly to wire.
Tardy break, taken behind to race rail near rear, driven home turn, closed off well to just miss frame.
Fair break, raced midfield 1 off with cover, outpaced & ridden 500m, stayed on evenly for late gains.
Snagged back at break to race at tail, shaken up for progress 500m, stayed on same speed centre track.
Smart break, sat 5th 1 off with cover, niggled 600m, not clear run & stumbled on heels 300m, recovered to close off for minor late inroads.
Early pace to settle 1 back on fence, shaken up & switched out home turn, plugged on dourly.
Fast break to lead, soon taken to rail, set solid tempo, driven for home final turn, all out & headed 250m, weakened out thereafter.
Taken behind at break to sit rail behind midfield, bustled 500m, driven home turn, one-paced run when steadied off heels 75m, never a factor.
Fast start to sit 1 off upsides leader, ridden 400m, weakened 300m & bumped when beaten 250m, faded out quickly.
Fair break, bustled early strides to race 1 off near rear, driven 600m, detached last home turn, tailed off tamely.
Sharp start, ridden early to settled 1 back on fence, switched out on turn, shaken up 300m & closed to lead 150m, drew clear.
Speed to lead, taken to fence early, kicked on 300m, headed 150m, all out & boxed on to hold 2nd.
Broke with others, raced midfield rail, shaken up 400m, closed to 3rd 150m, ran on well without threatening winner, held third on nod.
Tardy break, over-raced near rear, hard-ridden 10L back 400m, stormed late, hung out last strides, narrowly missed third.
Snagged back at break to tail, ridden 12L back final turn, motored late, just failed to make frame.
Fast start, caught 3 wide no cover chasing leader, wide on turn & flat-footed, boxed on evenly to wire.
Smart start, unable to slot, back to last pair 1 off, niggled 700m, 11L back wide into stretch, strong closer.
Smart start, lacked pace & dropped back to 1 off behind midfield, niggled 600m, outpaced & driven 400m, stayed on for moderate gains.
Broke with others, slotted midfield 1 off with cover, driven 300m, boxed on one pace.
Speed to race 3rd 1 back 1off, driven final turn, all out to hold place, headed 150m, swamped & faded.
Tardy break, bustled early to race midfield on rail, driven home turn, weakened in run.
Driven from wide gate to chase lead 4-wide no cover, under pressure 400m, struggled in run home.
Hard ridden forward, settled in box seat, pace good, closed off strongly to score.
Eased at start to cross at rear, 6Ls off the good pace 2 wide, dashed well 300M, just missed by a neck.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 4.5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 300M for 3rd.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, ran on well to the line.
Settled in midfield, 3Ls off the good pace 2 wide, made ground 300M, on heels 150M.
Pushed to take rail and led by 0.5L at good sectionals, hung on well until 150M flattened.
Midfield, 4Ls off the good pace along the fence, made steady ground 200M.
At rear, 6.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, ran on fairly in straight.
Eased back, 7Ls off the good pace, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, made ground 200M.
Eased back, 5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, no progress.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, out of fuel 250M.
Hard ridden forward to cross, sat outside the leader, pace good, reduced quickly 300M.
Taken forward from start to hold rail 2Ls from lead, switched out 250m for run, ran on strongly final 50m to win on line.
Ridden up between horse to hold position 1-back, 1-off to 300m, asked for effort 250m, hit front 50m but tied up final strides.
Jumped with field but held 3-back along fence. Hard ridden 350m and ran on strongly between horses to just miss 2nd.
Jumped smartly and soon in lead. Challenged turn but held ground and led to 50m before being swamped final stages.
Ridden forward from wide draw but kept 3-wide to home stretch. Given reminders 300m and kept on well.
Ridden up from wide draw to sit outside leader before turn. Kept on well till 50m before tiring final strides.
Taken back from wide draw to sit 3-back, 1-off before turn. Covered extra ground turn but kept on steadily in straight.
Began awkwardly and then checked, dropping to last. Made up some ground turn before running home strongly.
Settled towards the rear, found little to pressure inside 300M, never threatened.
Taken forward from start to sit 1-back, 2-off before turn when left without cover. Wide into straight and tired.
Awkward start and then awkwardly place 800m. Was 6th into straight before drifting back. Had blood in trachea.
A little slow to move and raced toward rear to turn. Shuffled back to last 400m and found nothing under hard riding.
Dropped back to a position behind midfield, travelled smoothly, quickened to challenge inside 300M, hit the front near 50M and cleared away.
Positively ridden from the start, poised one-out-one-back, niggled along 600M out, kept on responding for pressure but unable to hold off winner final 50M.
Began very awkwardly, settled near the rear 6Ls off the pace, no clear run early straight, ran on well when shifted out to clear nearing 200M.
Held up in mid-division, saved ground on the inside, kept on steadily turning in but unable to match the finishing speed of first two over final 100M.
Sent forward, showed good speed in an uncontested lead, kept on well until headed inside 100M.
Slow to begin, ended up on the outside of the rear pair, 7Ls behind passing 400M, stayed on mildly.
Held back after the start, settled on the inside of last pair, made steady progress final 300M but no impression on leaders.
Positioned 2-wide in the group chasing the leaders, kept on same pace turning in, no threat and weakened passing 150M.
Guided to a midfield spot, under pressure home turn and never going the pace to seriously challenge.
Tracked the speed on the inside rail, had his chance but run ended passing 200M.
Settled towards the tail of the field, pushed along nearing 400M but didn't respond to riding, eased when no chance final 200M. (Unacceptable Performance.)
Strode forward, caught 3-wde without cover for much of the way, gave ground passing 400M, eased. (Lame right hind).

Sluggish at start, trailed the field to straight, finished off race strongly to snatch victory close home.
Soon took up running, crossed for rails run coming out of back straight, joined around home bend, re-gained advantage inside 300 M but collared but fast-finishing winner close to home.
Began well, settled just off the pace, came to challenge turning in holding every chance 300 metres out but unable to sustain effort closing stages.
Soon taken back from the widest gate, remained well behind to straight when inconvenienced early on, finished off race in a very nice fashion.
Settled mainly in midfield, baulked for a run upon straightening, ran home one-paced.
Settled one-back on rails, baulked for a run upon straightening, ran home one-paced.
Settled just worse than midfield, obtained clear run over 300 metres out, kept on same pace without quickening.
Began fairly, travelled 3-wide just better than midfield, kept on before fading inside final 200 metres.
Began fairly, travelled not far off in 5th out wide joining the pace around the bend, soon weakened under pressure after straightening. (Tactic questioned) (Lame next day)
Broke well from a wide draw settling just outside the leader, similar turning in, weakened out of contention inside 300 metres.
Settled in midfield on rails, though inconvenienced rounding home bend saved a lot of ground turning in, found nothing under pressure in the run home.
Never seen with a chance.
Enjoyed the run of the race stalking the leaders, along the fence had cover. Hit the front near the 150m, and held off late challenge.
Slow to begin settling towards the rear, 2 wide with cover. Ran on well towards the inside.
Managed to take up a nice position near the 800m, travelling 1 out 1 back. Hit the front approaching the 200m, and kept on gamely.
Not the best away, settling back in the field, 2 wide with cover. Came widest in the straight and worked home nicely.
Made its run from last position, after settling on the paint. Briefly held up early in the straight, shifted in near the 300 and rattled home nicely.
Vied for leading duties then took the outright lead on the circle, settling 1 off no cover. Faded over the latter stages.
Copped a steady early then settled midfield the fence, with cover. Maintained and even gallop in the run to the wire.
Ridden along early and managed to slot in to travel 2 deep with on the circle, 3 back. Whacked away at the same speed over the final furlong.
Settled close to midfield. 3 deep with cover. Failed to find any extra gears when under placed pressure in the straight.
Camped second last, 1 off with cover. Hung in in the straight and failed to close off.
Ridden patiently, settling midfield, 2 deep with cover. Failed to make any headway in the home stretch.
Settled worse than midfield, racing 3-4 deep with cover. Failed to close and was never in the hunt.
Speared forward and shared leading duties until the 800m, steadied thereafter and raced in second position on the fence. Struggled in the home straight and gave ground over the last 100m.
Never likely after being left 3-4 wide on the circle, without cover whilst racing midfield. Weakened noticeably in the run home.
Hard ridden forward to take the lead on the fence at advantageous slow sectionals, kicked 2Ls away 250M and scored.
Rolled forward to park outside the leader, benefited by the slow pace, stayed on well to get 2nd.
Eased back from a wide gate, settled 5Ls behind the leader, despite harmed by the slow tempo, checked 400M and could not find a day light until 250M, dashed strongly to grab 3rd.
Hard ridden forward to sit 3rd, suited by the slow tempo, kept on one pace to the line.
Travelled 3 back on the fence, 3Ls behind the leader, suited by the slow sectionals, kept on steadily.
Rolled forward to occupy the box seat, benefited by the slow sectionals, however only one paced in the straight.
Slowly away, then taken back to the rear, settled 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite not suited by the slow pace, made minor ground in the straight.
Bumped start, then raced at rear, 6Ls off the pace, hampered by the slow tempo, ran on only fairly.
Eased start from a wide gate, travelled 6Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, harmed by the slow sectional, ran on only fairly.
Began well then checked 1200M, travelled 4Ls off the slow pace 3 wide with cover, never ran on.
Failed to muster speed despite hard ridden along, trapped 4 deep throughout, never a factor.
Camped handy, settled 2Ls behind the leader, suited by the slow pace, however failed to make impression after turning in, weakened 200M.
Raced midfield, 3Ls off the slow pace 3 wide with cover, flattened 250M.
Began awkwardly, travelled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, no dash.
Sharp break to lead, headed 1100m, sat 1 off on leader's flank, shaken up to 2nd 400m, driven to lead 250m, kept on gamely.
Fair start, raced handy on fence, shifted out across rival 350m, driven to 2nd 100m, closed on leader to wire.
Broke with others, raced behind midfield 3 wide with cover, driven wide final turn, strong closer to grab 3rd last strides.
Tardy break, driven early, niggled along fore of midfield 1 off with cover, driven & outpaced 450m, stayed on for pressure, just missed frame.
Awkward break, recovered to race handy 1 off with cover, driven 450m, badly impeded 350m, ran on for solid late progress.
Fast break, driven wide to lead 1100m, sent clear to rail 1200m, driven 400m, headed 250m, no extra & swamped late.
Fair start, caught wide with cover midfield, bumped 800m, hard ridden final turn, to 3rd all out 350m, tapered to wire.
Broke with others, raced midfield 1 off with cover, squeezed up 800m, ridden into stretch, boxed on evenly.
Missed break markedly, raced at tail, progress to home turn, driven widest for modest inroads in stretch.
Taken behind at break, raced 1 off toward rear, hard ridden 430m, boxed on one pace.
Tardy start, raced rail behind midfield, off heels 800m, driven in stretch, found little & weakened out.
Taken back from wide gate to 1 off near rear, driven 400m, struggled in run home.
Fast break, trapped 3 wide no cover & rolled to 2nd 800m, under pressure 400m, soon faded.
Slow start, raced rail last pair, to tail & driven 450m, found nothing & tailed off.
Smart start, slotted fence fore of midfield, shaken up & switched out 400m, driven to lead 180m, in command.
Fair break, raced midfield 3 wide with cover, rolled forward 1000m, driven home turn, closed solidly to 2nd centre track, always held.
Tardy start, bustled to settle 1 off with cover midfield, off heels 1000m, not clear run into stretch, off heels 350m, closed out to take 3rd 100m.
Fast break, taken back for cover 1 off behind midfield, checked off heels final turn, stayed on soundly under strong drive.
Restrained to race behind midfield 3 wide with cover, driven wide 400m, ran on evenly centre track.
Urged forward at break, sat 1 back 1 off no cover, shaken up to lead 350m, headed 180m & swamped.
Smart start, raced 1 back on rail, ridden in 3rd 450m, boxed on to wire at one pace.
Missed break, driven early to sit rail behind midfield, hard ridden 400m, shifted out in stretch, one paced to line.
Broke well, taken back from wide gate, raced at tail until progress 1 off 1000m, driven on outer 430m, plugged on evenly.
Sluggish start, raced near tail on rail, driven turning in, stayed on one pace.
Fast break, ridden to lead, kicked on & extended 800m, emptied & headed 350m, struggled thereafter.
Outpaced & bustled early strides, raced last trio 1 off until dropped to tail 1000m & struggled, never a factor, passed beaten rivals close home.
Good break, raced wide no cover under restraint, rolled on 3 wide 1000m to 4th, driven 450m, faded tamely in stretch.
Good break to race 1 off with cover fore of midfield, driven 600m, found nothing & weakened out.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 300M to score.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed well 300M for 2nd despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M, run ended 50M, just got 3rd.
Box seat, settled well, benefited by the slow tempo, led 400M, hung on strongly until 100M overhauled.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the leader on the fence, favoured by the slow sectionals, just held ground in straight.
Very slow away, settled in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, flattened 200M.
Eased to sit behind the leaders 2 wide, enjoyed the slow tempo, however never improved.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, no progress.
Very slow away, 8Ls off the leader on the rails, harmed by the slow pace, no turn of foot.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Pressed forward to lead by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals in 2 wide, soon out of fuel 350M.
Settled in front but trapped 3 wide throughout, benefited by the slow tempo, soon emptied 350M.
Taken forward from good draw to hold box seat to straight. Came off fence 400m, hit front 300m, kicked clear for easy win.
Taken back across runners and last initially. Improved position along fence, switched out 200m, ran on well.
Jumped OK and settled three-back the fence. Lost position around turn, switched out 400 and finished off nicely.
Didn't settle after starting from wide draw and dropped to rear. Well back entering straight but finished off strongly.
Ridden forward from wide draw to sit outside leader before dropping to 4th at 800m. Looked chance 400m but one-paced.
Jumped well but then raced fiercely before and around turn. Once-paced in home stretch.
No early pace and trapped wide towards rear. Improved position around turn and kept on steadily in straight.
Got head down in gate and missed start. Taken to fence and improved steadily to be 5th into straight. No extra final stages.
Taken straight to the front and set good pace. Challenged after entering straight but boxed on well until final 100m.
Ridden forward from wide draw to set outside leader entering turn. Bumped and unbalanced 500m, turning one-paced final 400m.
Settled in midfield but three-wide to and around turn. Under hard riding from 400m but found little.
Fractious and slow to jump. Hard ridden but failed to muster speed, dropping to rear. Had blood in trachea.
Jumped OK but trapped wide. Checked before turn, losing position. Found little under hard riding in straight.
No early speed, dropping to rear. Came off fence and then trapped 3-wide. Found nothing under pressure.
Settled in 6th 2.5Ls behind leader, quickened up smartly inside 300M, led near 50M, lengthened away.
Always in the firing line, driven to lead inside 300M, kept on well but not pace of the classy winner over final 100M.
Patiently held up 5Ls behind leader, driven halfway, stayed on well.
Tracked the pace along the stands' rail, all out passing 350M, always held, lost out for 3rd narrowly.
Led uncontested, set good pace throughout, headed 250M, weakened.
Began awkwardly, settled in midfield, shifted out to center of track near 300M, kept on but never a threat to leaders.
Fractious in stalls, badly outpaced in first half of the race, over 10Ls off the pace midway, finished strongly and made up a lot of ground over final 400M. (Jockey questioned.)
Held up near the rear, niggled along halfway and made no real progress when put to pressure.
Held up behind midfield, hung out 600M, not going the pace to challenge.
Never far off from leader but had little left going into 300M, eased when no chance passing 150M.
Close up behind leader, came under pressure midway, weakened passing 250M. (Unacceptable Performance.)
Outpaced from the start, not quickened when driven along halfway, never involved.
Settled in midfield, driven nearing 400M, kept on same pace until no extra final 200M.
In mid-division, came under serious pressure from 600M, weakened badly inside 300M.
Jumped well to hold box seat behind leaded. Boxed in 400m before getting run between horses to win drawing away.
Taken back from wide draw and near last entering straight. Switched wide and finished strongly but hung in closing.
Ridden forward to sit 4th, one-off the fence. Pulled out 400m and kept on well to the line.
No early speed and held at rear along fence. Crowded 850m, no run 400m, blocked again 200m. Ran on well when clear.
Began fairly but badly crowded 900m, losing position. Checked 400m when denied run, recovered but crowded near line.
Taken straight to the front and set leisurely pace to 200m. Boxed on well when challenged and ovetaken.
Ridden up to sit outside leader to straight. Drew level 400m but unable continue. Tried to savage winner 50m.
Taken back from wide draw and trailed field to straight. Taken widest 400m, doing best work final final stages.
Driven forward but unable to cross, caught 4-wide without cover for much of the way, weakened passing 300M.
Held behind midfield on rails to straight, but unable to get run until 300m. One-paced final. Bled from both nostrils.
Ridden forward from wide draw but trapped wide into turn. Bumped and unbalanced 400, checked 150m losing position.
No early speed and held towards rear but wide. Covered extra ground around turn and finished wide without threatening.
Began OK but badly crowded for space 900m, then checked 850m dropping back. Never likely after that.
Began well and held 2-back the fence to turn. Dropped back quickly after straightening. Found to have irregular heart rhythm.
Landed a nice spot in midfield 4-5ls back in running line, travelled well tracking solid pace, produced a strong finish down middle to hold a comfortable margin in run to line.
Slotted in from a wide gate juts off midfield, 7ls or so off top end, assisted by solid tempo, improved on bend, kept coming with a solid finish nut again found one better.
Raced 5-6ls back on rails, soft trip and solid speed worked in favour, crept closer turning, kept on soundly in straight but no match for first two.
No speed and ended up well back more than 10ls form lead, saved ground on fence on circle, closed nicely along inside to make frame.
Settled back with last few 8-9ls away on rails, fast pace suited, improved on bend, didn't let down as usual but kept coming gradually in straight to be nearest on line.
Tardy into stride, raced in rearward division 8ls back, aided by speed, came into race wider turning but was disappointing when no closer final 250m (blood in trachea).
Ideal run on rails 7ls or so back settling, assisted by speed, saved ground turning, just whacked away holding ground in straight.
Raced in midfield 5-6ls back in running line, travelled comfortably to turn, no response when asked and struggled in run home.
Took forward spot 1 out 1 back, did a bit or work on solid pace, niggled turning and didn't have a lot to offer soon after and steadily faded (jockey reported not comfortable in action).
Used a bit to cross and race outside leader, kept working on solid speed, hit lead briefly on turning, soon passed an d tired final 300m.
Showed speed to take prominent spot on leaders back, did share of work strong pace on, ride along turning but unable to lift an struggled in straight.
Drifted back from a tricky gate, shared rear 10ls back, always rearward throughout, passed only tired ones in straight.
Trapped 3 wide behind midfield, without cover nearly 10ls back, worked too hard with speed on, never a factor.
Showed usual speed to lead, set solid sectionals racing freely in front, compounded quickly soon after turning to be beaten a long way.
Showed good early pace to race outside leader, travelled well and loomed to challenge on turning, battled leader length of straight and prevailed by narrowest margin, well clear of 3rd.
Began well and crossed to lead soon after, set terms to suit in mid-section, challenged turning in, battled it out with eventual winner for length of straight.
Raced 3 wide just off midfield, had cover 4ls or so away, came wider turning and closed soundly with weight but just unable to peg back margin on two handy types.
Landed a nice position behind leader, all favours to bend, held up a touch turning in, in clear final 300m and kept on well but couldn't catch leaders and lost place late.
Restrained from widest gate, raced at rear 7-8ls back, made ground between horses rounding bend and kept progressing to 200m, just held ground thereafter.
Raced on rails in midfield, 4ls off lead, soft run middle stages but was difficult to settle, gained inside runs but just had one gear final 300m.
Settled just off midfield 5ls or so back on rails, came two9 wide on circle, tracked up behind them at 400m, no extra dash at business end and just kept on at same speed.
Landed a good trail in midfield 4ls back in two wide line, fair run in middle stages, came wider turning but was just one paced with closing effort.
Raced 3 wide towards rear 6ls or so back after awkward getaway, came widest turning, made some minor headway without looking likely.
Landed ideal position 1 out 1 back, no excuses to turn, still in 4th at 400m but outclassed when they dashed and faded out.
Unable to slot in and posted 3 wide without cover, pressed on to be 1-2ls down turning, gave in when hard run took toll and dropped out in straight.
Raced 3 and 4 wide towards rear 6-7ls back, had cover on bend, never factored in run home.

Soon taken back and across to rails after beginning from a wide gate, took closer order coming out of back straight, baulked for a run after straightening, finished off race well inside final 200 metres to just get up on line.
Travelled wide in midfield after beginning from a wide gate, took closer order but remained wide around the bend, fought on steadily to hit the front briefly over 100 metres out.
Settled in rear of midfield, did not find much room early in straight, finished off race nicely.
Jumped fairly, ridden along to obtain prominent position but remained 3-wide without cover around the bend, ran home one-paced under pressure. (Tactic questioned)
Close up early, shuffled back to 2L 4th around the bend, kept on steadily without quickening in straight.
Prominent early, gradually settled in 5th or 6th on rails just better than midfield, did not find much room early in straight, made steady headway in closing stages without threatening.
Jumped moderately, settled in last few, ran on under pressure to do best work late.
Began fairly, settled in midfield, ran home one-paced.
In similar position in rear of midfield throughout, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Began fairly, ridden along in 2nd on rails, took up running coming out of back straight, headed when tiring over 100 metres out.
Soon dropped to the rear from a wide gate, remained well behind to straight, ran home one-paced. (Tactic questioned)
Soon taken back to rear of field from the widest gate, remained well behind to the 400 metres, fought on steadily past beaten horses in the run home.
Jumped well to lead, held narrow running to the 800 metres, weakened out of contention over 200 metres out.
Never on terms.
Raced keenly in the early stages settling behind midfield, the fence. Quickened nicely to hit the front near the 100m, finished off willingly.
Raced in second position, outside the leader. Was still in front approaching the 100m but was overhauled soon after, kept on gamely.
Obtained the box seat & travelled well in transit. Was held up for clear running until the furlong. Finished off soundly once in the clear.
Settled in last position close to the running rail, with cover. Took inside runs in the straight and finished off nicely.

Proved difficult to settle early, and then was posted 3 deep without cover on the circle, travelling just behind the speed. Kept whacking away in the run home despite being inconvenienced near the 50m.
Parked midfield, 3 deep with cover. Kept on one paced in the home straight.

Raced keenly along the paint in the early stages, shifted out to travel 2 wide with cover after the 800m, whilst in a prominent position. Was finishing off fairly until crowded near the 50m. Not ridden thereafter. (see incident report)
Went back from a wide gate travelling towards the rear, 3 deep with cover. Made steady progress down the outside in final stretch.
Camped midfield, 2 deep with cover. Failed to find any extra in the run home, plodded to the line.
Sent forward and coasted along in the lead travelling on the fence. Still there at the furlong but faded over the final 50m.
Began only fairly & after being tightened for room at the start failed to go the early speed, settling towards the rear of the field, 1 off with cover. Failed to make any impression in the straight.
Missed the start badly and then improved to travel along the paint, settling with the backmakers, had cover. Plugged away to the line.
Ridden with some patience early, but was caught 4 deep without cover on the circle, midfield. Never likely.

Settled worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Shifted out to race 3-4 deep approaching the home turn, with cover. Lost momentum when disappointed for running near the 350m, never got going thereafter.
Taken back from a wide gate, settled 9Ls behind the leader, peeled widest, closed off solidly to take the victory by a neck.
Pushed forward to sit 3rd, travelled 2Ls off the pace, hung on strongly for 2nd but not match with the classy winner.
Ridden forward to share the lead 2 wide, battled on gamely in straight, stayed on well to get 3rd.
Began awkwardly, then raced worse than midfield, 6Ls off the pace, cannot find a clear run until 300M, finished well for 4th.
Camped handy, 4Ls behind the leader, ran on steadily in straight without threatening.
Began awkwardly, then settled 5.5Ls off the pace, improved steadily in straight.
Ridden forward to take the fence and lead, run-ended 200M.
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on only fairly. (Questioned trainer for riding tactics, see incident report)
Dropped back from a wide barrier, travelled 7Ls off the pace, struggled to find the line, ran on fairly.
Camped handy, settled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, kept on one pace to the line.
Settled worse than midfield, 6.5Ls off the fence, never a factor.
Raced midfield, 5Ls behind the leader, never improved, weakened badly 200M.
Pushed to sit 4th 2 wide, dropped back quickly after straightening. (Irregular heart rhythm)
Broke with others, raced 3 wide with cover midfield, off heels 600m, switched out & shaken up 400m, flowing run to lead last strides.
Sharp start to dispute lead, led outright 1000m & soon taken to fence, driven for home 400m, mugged last strides.
Speed at break, caught 3 wide no cover fore of midfield, 4 wide 700m, sound progress in stretch to grab 3rd at wire.
Good break sat fore of midfield 1 off with cover, off heels 700m, driven 400m, solid run to 2nd 200m, edged out of frame late.
Taken back at start to rail midfield, switched out for clear run & driven 300m, close to heels 100m, closed off well.
Good break to sit 1 off no cover 3rd, forced 3 wide 700m, to 2nd 400m, run tapered & battled on to wire.
Smart start, sat handy on rail, progress to close 1 back on rail into stretch, hard drive 350m, ran on one pace.
Taken behind from wide gate, sat at tail, 9L back turning in, still last at 200m, closed out for sound late gains, checked off heels last strides.
Fair break, sat 1 off behind midfield, driven 450m, stayed on evenly for modest inroads.
Tardy start, raced 1 off near rear, off heels 800m, driven wide 430m, switched in 300m, stayed on moderately under pressure.
Smart start, dropped in 3 wide behind midfield, bumped 900m, over-raced 700m & advanced 4 wide no cover, plugged home tamely.
Broke with others, trapped 4 deep no cover early from wide gate, bumped & over-raced wide 700m, restrained for cover 600m, found nothing in stretch.
taken back at break, settled rail near tail, ridden home turn, found nothing.
Fast break to dispute lead on fence, soon 2nd 1 back, switched 1 off 700m, struggled to hold place into stretch, faded tamely final 250m.
Good break from wide, travelled nicely 3 deep no cover midfield, smooth advance final turn, shaken up 350m, led 200m, held rival in tight duel.
Smart start, trapped wide until slotted 4th 1 off with cover 1200m, driven 400m to lead 300m, narrowly headed 200m, rallied but held to wire.
Shifted & bumped start, bustled early strides, raced midfield 1 off with cover, driven home turn, closed to 3rd at 100m, no threat to winner.
Good break but lacked speed early strides, raced rail midfield, over-raced close to heels 1000m, stayed on under vigorous stretch drive.
Fast start, settled rail fore of midfield, switched out & shaken up 400m, closed out evenly.
Taken back at start, sat last trio 1 off, switched 3 wide with cover 1100m, driven widest home turn, stayed on solidly for late gains.
Broke well, initially trapped 3 wide handy, slotted back 1 off fore of midfield, switched out & driven 400m, boxed on one pace.
Smart start to dispute lead, in front briefly 1600m, soon settled 1 off no cover 2nd, driven into stretch, one-paced in run home.
Bumped start, settled near rear 1 off with cover, steadied off heels 1200m, driven 500m, stayed on dourly for minor inroads.
Fast break to lead, headed 1600m, settled rail 1 back in 3rd, limited response for pressure, plugged on one pace in stretch.
Good break, pulled to lead 1500m, taken to rail & over-raced in front, folded under pressure 300m, struggled in run home.
Tardy start from wide draw, raced 3 deep with cover near rear, ridden wide final turn, found little & weakened in run.
Sluggish start, raced at tail, hard-ridden turning in, struggled in stretch run, never a factor.
Snagged back at break, raced rail near rear, niggled 700m, found nothing & faded out in stretch.
Pushed forward, settled nicely just behind the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, kicked 400M, dominated 200M.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, enjoyed the slow sectionals, lack room 4-2, closed off well for 2nd.
Pushed to hold the rail in midfield, 4Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 300M for 3rd.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, dashed strongly 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Hard ridden to take rail and shared the lead at slow sectionals, hung on until 200M emptied.
Pushed forward, 3Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Eased back and steadily too rail, 6Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow pace, little dash in straight.
Hard ridden forward to share the lead 2 wide at slow sectionals, ran on until 200M weakened.
Eased back, 8.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, little dash in straight.
Eased to rear and took rail, more than 10Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow tempo, made very late ground 200M.
At back, 6.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Pushed to hold a midfield spot, 5.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, under pressure throughout, never improved.
Never a factor at rear.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide throughout, dropped off rapidly 300M.
Allowed to find feet and switched off behind horses early. Was 3-wide with cover into turn, niggled 350m and ran on strongly.
Taken back from wide draw and tracked eventual winner to straight. Given reminders 350m and kept on well final stages.
Taken quickly to the front and set steady sections. Challenged at 350m but battled on gamely to the line.
Taken back from wide draw and settled three-back, the fence to straight. Little room 250m but kept on well when clear.
Jumped well from good draw and soon in box seat. Came off fence to challenge 350m, kept on well till tiring final 50m.
Jumped well and taken forward. Carried into the race by front runners. Looked chance 300m before turning one-paced.
Taken forward from start to sit outside leader before turn. Momentarily hit front 400m but found little under pressure.
Jumped OK but difficult to settle and caught wide without cover 900m. Threw out challenge 400m but run ended 200m.
Reared as gates opened and lost considerable ground. Trailed field after that.
Held up midfield, left without cover entering back straight, moved sweetly into contention 400M, accelerated to a decisive lead inside 200M, kept on well to the line.
Settled 7Ls back towards the rear, driven along 500M, ran on well, nearest finish.
Eased back to the rear pair. 9Ls off the pace in middle stages, stayed on well final 300M.
Held up behind mid-division, swung 3-wide for home, kept on but couldn't not match the finishing speed of the first three.
Tracked leader 2-wide, couldn't match the finishing speed of the winner passing 250M, stayed at same pace final 200M.
Held up behind midfield, saved ground on the inside but had to shift out for clear running in straight, stayed on mildly and no impression on leaders.
Not hurried, settled near last 7-8Ls off the pace, pushed along 500M, made limited progress and never a threat to leaders.
Tracked leader, came under pressure home turn, soon faded out of contention passing 350M.
Raced a shade keen in midfield, brief effort turning in, run ended mid-straight.
Allowed an uncontested lead, headed near 200M, no extra.
Settled ahead of midfield, soon outpaced turning into straight, eased 200M out.
Slotted into a 2-wide position ahead of midfield, had to be niggled along 600M, dropped away rapidly turning in.
Out the back, struggled turning for home, detached nearing 400M, tailed out (Unacceptable Performance.)
Jumped well but restrained, dropping four-back, one-off to straight. Found inside run 350m and ran on strongly though drifting final stages.
Blundered shortly after start when crowded. Held near rear to 400m before running home strongly between horses.
Began fairly but quickly made up ground to sit wide at midfield. Taken further out entering straight and finished full of running.
Proved difficult to settle early but then travelled well from 1000m. Lay in entering straight, recovered and finished off strongly.
Jumped best but not rushed and held two-back, one-off before turn. Switched out 400m and kept on well to the line.
Bumped, unbalanced start, then raced ungenerously 1000m, dropping to rear. Taken wide straight and finished off nicely.
Taken back across runners from wide draw but difficult to settle, then checked 1000m. Made ground rail entering straight and kept on steadily.
Bumped, unbalanced start but made up ground to be sole leader before turn. Caught 350m but boxed on till tiring final stages.
Bumped start, recovered to sit third behind leader but without cover. Still in contention 200m before tiring.
Taken quickly to front before giving way to leader, taking box seat. Looked chance 400m before turning one-paced.
Ridden up from middle draw but difficult to settle and mostly travelled wide without cover. Wide in straight, tiring final stages.
Jumped well, sitting two back the face but not suited by slow pace. Weakened under pressure from 400m.
Not suited by slow pace and raced at rear to the turn. Lost contact with other runners from 200m. Irregular heart rhythm.
Taken back from wide draw and raced at rear to turn, dropping to last and losing contact with other runners from 400m.
Raced 3ls or so back in midfield, switched 2 and 3 wide on circle, made ground from 400m and let down too well final furlong to hold rivals with some extra in hand.
Rolled to front with ease, set speed to suit to 400m, kicked strongly and defied rivals for a long way but no match for winner inside final furlong.
Taken back from a wide gate, raced 6-7ls back racing 2 wide, gave a big start and gained clear running final 300m, reeled off strong sectionals to take placing.
Took ideal trail behind the leader, nice trip to turn, produced and was second and a place chance at 200m, kept going with usual honesty and lost 3rd spot late.
Settled in back half of field when restrained from a wide gate, 6ls or so away in running line, made solid progress in straight to just miss frame.
Slotted into nice position 1 out 1 back, all favours to bend, kept on soundly in straight but lacked extra gear final 200m to get amongst place getters.
Held up behind midfield. Saved ground along the fence, kept on same pace final 400M, never threatened.
Went on in search of spot but caught 3 wide without cover, did share of work and was 2ls back to bend, workload took toll and couldn't lift, tired inside 200m.
Showed customary speed to race outside leader, enjoyed even run on speed, still 2nd turning and there to 200m but dropped off thereafter.
Ended up 3 wide around midfield, had cover 5ls back, switched out turning but didn't close as had done previously and made no extra ground inside 200m.
Taken to rails at rear, 6-7ls back, quiet time to turn, never threatened in straight passing only tired ones.
Unable to slot in and forced to race 4 wide without cover in midfield, improved from 3-4ls back on bend, spent force at 300m.
Positioned in midfield 4-5ls back, very difficult to settle and ran out drift ing3 and 4 wide on bend, found nothing when asked in straight.
Ended up racing 3 wide at rear from a tricky draw, 6-7ls back, srill last turning and came widest, no response in stretch. (Blood in trachea)

Settled in rear of midfield, responded well inside final 200 metres to score late.
Began fairly, soon picked up to share the pace travelling just off the speed around the bend, hit the front under pressure over 100 metres out only to be caught close to home.
Raced wide throughout, with leaders far side, became one length 3rd around the bend, fought on steadily in straight, did best work late.
Jumped fairly, took up running 800 metres out, held advantage to the 200 metres, faded closing stages.
Broke well to hold narrow running two off the rails, gradually settled in two length 4th coming off the Rock, kept on same pace in the run home.
Travelled in forward of midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, kept on same pace without quickening under pressure.
Towards the rear, fought on steadily under pressure.
Settled in rear of midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, kept on in straight.
Ridden along in midfield, ran home one-paced.
Soon dropped to last few, one-paced under pressure.
Remained wide after beginning well from the widest gate, gradually settled in midfield, yielded ground from approaching straight.
Slightly slow out, never on terms.
Switched off third from the rear on the rails, had cover. Made good ground early in the straight, flew home the last 100m.
Made its run from the rear after settling 2nd last from a wide gate, 1 off with cover. Swung the home turn widest & closed off strongly down the outside.
Posted 3 deep without cover, whilst travelling prominently. Was eased near the 1200m, eventually shifting in near the 900m to race 2 deep with cover, close to midfield. Finished off soundly.
Camped in third position, 1 off facing the breeze. Chased soundly in the home stretch, got overhauled late.

Caught 4 wide, no cover in the early stages when racing behind the speed, then improved after the 1300m, to eventually slot in & race on the fence behind the leader in 2nd position near the 1000m. Finished off gamely.
Settled midfield the paint, had cover. Crowded for room near the 800m, ridden along before the home turn, responding only fairly. Whacked away at the same speed over the last 300m.
Parked behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Stayed on evenly in the run to the wire.
Travelled from a wide gate, worse than midfield with cover. Kept to the inside in the straight, kept on steadily.
Form the outside barrier, settled in last position 2 off the fence, had cover. Passed tiring runners in the run to the line.
Had every possible chance after settling 3 back the fence. Was a beaten horse early in the home straight.
Worked forward and led along the fence. Raced keenly in the early stages, was under pressure approaching the home turn, faded near the furlong.
Traveled back in the field, 1 off with cover. Struggled in the home straight, failing to close off.
Sent forward to share the lead 2 wide, benefited by the very slow pace, fought on strongly to take the victory.
Camped handy, 2Ls off the pace 2 wide, suited by the very slow pace, peeled wide turning in, ran on well for 2nd.
Bumped start, then ridden forward to take the rail and lead, enjoyed the very slow sectionals, fought on well until last couple of strides, hung on for 3rd.
Failed to muster despite ridden along, settled about 4Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, despite harmed by the very slow pace, ran on ok.
Pushed forward to occupy the box seat, suited by the very slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Taken back from the wide gate, settled 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide, despite hampered by the very slow pace, made some ground in straight.
Eased back from the wide barrier, travelled 7Ls off the pace on the fence, not suited by the very slow pace, ran on only fairly.
Raced midfield, 3.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, not suited by the very slow pace, never ran on.
Camped handy, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, weakened quickly 200M.
Raced midfield, settled 3.5Ls behind the leader along the rail, no progress.
Raced at rear on the fence, never a factor.
Sharp start, bustled early & trapped 3 wide no cover, slotted 1 back on fence 1st turn, switched out & driven to lead 180m, in command.
Good break, sat midfield 1 off, switched wide 400m for progress, strong closer centre track.
Bumped at break & rousted, rolled on to sit 1 off with cover, driven 300m, to 2nd 100m, no match for runner-up's late drive.
Snagged back from wide gate, sat near rear 1 off, switched widest into stretch, strong run to just miss frame.
Tardy break & bumped early strides, raced behind midfield on fence, off heels over-raced 600m, switched centre track in stretch, solid closer.
Rousted early, tight on fence 800m, raced midfield, progress when hind quarters bumped 150m, ran on evenly.
Rousted start, led rail 800m, headed all out 180m, battled on as run tapered.
Broke fast, snagged back, unable to slot, wide no cover midfield until tucked 1 off near rear 500m, stayed on for minor inroads.
Fast break, niggled to race 4th on rail, switched out & driven final turn, modest progress when squeezed off heels 150m, no extra.
Speed to lead early, headed 700m, sat on leader's flank 1 off no cover, found little in stretch, hung in under pressure & faded.
Missed break, raced at tail, found nothing in run home.
Dropped in behind midfield from wide gate, off heels & veered markedly wide 1st turn, lost ground, last pair final turn, struggled & eased late.
Awkward start widest, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, progress 600m, shaken up 400m, driven to lead 150m, drew clear.
Smart start, camped 1 back on fence, ridden 350m, ran on soundly to wire, no match for winner.
Bumped start, sat midfield 1 off, switched 3 wide when over-raced & off heels 750m, bumped 600m, wide advance to lead 200m, headed 150m, tapered.
Crowded start, steadied off heels 1300m, sat 1 off near rear, switched 3 deep 800m, driven wide 500m, solid closer, just missed frame.
Rousted early to lead, set tempo on rail, driven home turn, came off fence under pressure, headed 200m, no extra in run home.
Prominent & over-raced early, snagged back to rail midfield, switched out home turn, some late headway until off heels 50m.
Slow start, raced at tail, 8L back & ridden for progress final turn, off heels 250m, recovered to make good late inroads.
Shifted start, raced rail midfield, driven 400m, kept on same speed.
Crowded start, vied for early lead wide, slotted 1 off handy, off heels 750m, bumped & unbalanced 600m, shifted across rival 250m, one pace after.
Speedy break, trapped 3 deep no cover fore of midfield, rolled to 2nd 1 off 800m, ridden 400m, folded tamely in stretch.
Hampered start, raced 1 off behind midfield, driven wide home turn, struggled in run to wire.
Fair break, settled near tail on rail, switched out 500m, severely checked & stumbled 250m, eased thereafter.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, dashed well 250M to score comfortably although only by a short head.
Settled in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader along the fence, favoured by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M, just beaten in 2nd.
At back as usual, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made early move 500M around the field in 4 wide, run ended 50M.
Settled in box seat, not suited by the fast sectionals, led 250M, hung on until 100M flattened.
Pressed forward, 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the fast tempo, still held ground in straight.
Pushed early but not muster, soon eased back, 5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, benefited by the fast pace, held up 5-3, made steady ground when clear.
Hard ridden forward, 1L off the leader 2 wide, used up too much fuel during the fast early sectionals, soon flattened 250M.
Pushed early, took midfield spot, 3.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, suited by the fast tempo, flattened 200M.
Pushed forward, trapped 3 wide throughout without cover behind the leaders, harmed by the fast pace, out of fuel 250M.
Awkward away, at rear, 2-3 wide, suited by the fast pace, ran on fairly.
Eased back, suited by the fast tempo, but never progressed.
Pushed forward to hold the rail and led by 1L, clocked fast sectionals, hung on until 250M emptied.
Jumped well, settled 1 out 1 back. Switched out 500m to make run, kept on well, holding off late challenge.
Restrained early to behind midfield but off fence. Taken 3-wide 500m, bumped 350m. finished strongly to just miss.
Not pushed and settled towards rear on fence. Switched out 500m to challenge and finished off nicely.
Jumped to front but unable to cut in and settled 2nd. Ridden to take lead again 700m, kept on well till tiring final 50m.
Taken back from wide draw, settled at rear but 3-wide back stretch. Wider into straight but finished off well.
Slow into stride, settled at rear away from fence. Swung wide into straight but only one-paced final 400m.
Made full use of inside draw to hold box seat to straight when didn't respond to hard riding.
Checked soon after start, dropping back to 11th on rails. Lost position around turn, ran past beaten horses final stages.
Ridden forward from wide draw but trapped without cover. Tried to force pace 600m, but gave ground from 400m.
Taken forward early, settling 2-back, 1-off with cover. Found little under hard riding in straight.
Made use of inside draw to push up inside early leader. Took lead 1300m. Came under pressure 700m and tired.
Held along fence in midfield to turn. Started to give ground from 400m. Bled from both nostrils.
Patiently ridden in a rearward position, found plenty when let down inside 300M, quickened well to cut down the leaders close to the line.
Chased leader one off the fence, quickened to a narrow lead near 200M, kept on well but couldn't match the finishing speed of the winner final 100M.
Tracked leader, got a dream run inside passing 400M, dueled with the eventual 2nd from 200M but both were readily left behind by the winner over final stages.
Fractious in stalls, slowly away, settled towards the rear, ran on well down inside.
Well covered in midfield, went after the leaders passing 250M and kept on without threatening.
Taken back from draw 12, settled 6-7Ls back in last pair, stayed on mildly. (Blood in trachea.)
Held up 3-wide towards the rear, stayed on fairly, never a threat to leaders.
Travelled 3-wide without cover in midfield and raced keenly, kept on same pace final 300M and had nothing extra to offer.
Positioned ahead of mid-division, 3Ls off leader, not quickened turning home, got tired and eased inside 100M.
Soon led, slowed things down from 800M, headed 250M, weakened out of contention.
Switched off to the rear, struggled to keep up passing 400M, never competitive.
Raced keenly behind leaders, shifted out to 3-wide from 700M, dropped out rapidly 200M.

Travelled just off the pace one off the stands rails, shifted in for a clear run over 200 metres out, quickened well to grab lead close to home.
Well there, hit the front over 150 metres out only to be headed by fast-finishing winner close to home.
Jumped awkwardly losing ground, settled just over two lengths off the speed, ran home well when asked inside final 250 metres.
Broke well to hold slender advantage, came under pressure over 200 metres out, soon headed.
Travelled mainly three lengths off the speed, kept on steadily under pressure inside final 200 metres and without quickening.
Jumped fairly, settled about two lengths off the speed, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Jumped best, in front briefly, soon dropped back to midfield down the centre of the track, ran home one-paced.
Settled within striking distance, dropped out passing 200 metres.
Soon dropped to tail-end, made short-lived effort coming onto course proper, no further impression.
Not far off in 6th, faded inside final 200 metres.
Disputed lead along stands rails, came under pressure over 300 metres out, soon weakened.
Prominent briefly, ran awkwardly and lost ground dropping towards the rear when he remained, hung in badly and reported not able to be fully tested.
Began well, well there for first 400 metres, gradually dropped away under pressure.
Prominently briefly, soon dropped well behind.
Began only fairly and then recovered to park in second position outside the leader. Fought on well in the home straight to claim the prize.
Led along the fence setting a leisurely tempo. Had a length margin on straightening and battled away gamely down the running.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race stalking the leader on the fence. Stayed on reasonably in the run home.
Ridden along early, settling midfield, 1 off with cover. Kept grinding away in the final stretch to make the frame.
Camped midfield 3 deep with cover. Finished off soundly over the final stages.
Made its run from a rearward position after settling 2 deep with cover. Turned for home with 1 wider, finished off one paced, never threatened.
Raced back in the field, on the paint with cover. Kept towards the inside in the straight, kept on only one paced after obtaining clear running passing the 350m.
Parked in fourth position, 1 off with cover. Peeled out near the 600m to improve and rounded the home bend on terms with the leaders. Peaked on its effort near the 250m.
Taken back from the outside gate, travelled 2-3 wide in last position, had cover. Finished off fairly without threatening.
Parked midfield the fence had cover. Straightened 3 wide, was one paced in the final stretch after shifting out off heels near the 300m.
Travelled ahead of midfield on the rails with cover. Rounded the home turn 2 deep, had every chance in the home straight, gave ground over the last 150m.
Settled second last, 1 off with cover. Swung the home turn widest, struggled thereafter, failing to run on.
Began best then raced keenly when steadied in the early stages, was unable to obtain cover and was posted 3 deep after the 1000m, ahead of midfield. Was carried wider after the 600m, never likely.
Settled worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Was a beaten horse early in the home straight.
Ridden forward to take the lead on the fence, enjoyed the slow sectionals, made all comfortably by 1.5Ls.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, tracked 1.5Ls behind the leaders, kept on well to the line, however not match with the classy winner.
Hampered on jumping, soon pushed to settle midfield about 2Ls off the pace 3 wide with cover, ran on well to grab 3rd.
Severely checked soon after start, travelled 3.5Ls behind the leaders along the rail, harmed by the slow pace, ran on well for 4th.
Eased to sit midfield, 2.5Ls behind the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, one paced home.
Eased to settle midfield, 3Ls behind the leaders on the fence, hampered by the slow tempo, kept on one pace to the line.
At rear, settled 6Ls behind the leaders 2 wide, despite not suited by the slow tempo, made some ground in straight.
Severely checked soon after start, then travelled 4.5Ls off the pace, never a threat.
Restrained to midfield from a wide gate, 4Ls off the pace 2 wide, never competitive.
Awkward start, settled 5Ls behind the leaders 3 wide with cover, not suited by the slow pace, never ran on.
Awkward start, then rolled to settle 2.5Ls behind the leaders, flattened 250M.
Severely checked soon after start, then dropped to rear, never a factor.
Rolled forward to park outside the leaders, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, flattened 300M.
Sent forward to share the lead, faded quickly after straightening, tailed out.
Tardy start, raced green last pair, niggled throughout, switched out final turn, relentless closer under strong drive to grab lead close home.
Tardy break, rousted early strides, raced midfield 3 wide with cover, wide closing run to 2nd 100m, pipped for lead last strides.
Smart start, prominent 3 wide no cover until led 1000m, to rail 900m, kicked on 400m, caught last strides.
Bustled at break from wide draw, raced 4 wide no cover, driven final turn, closed off solidly.
Good break, raced handy 3 wide no cover, ridden to chase 400m, kept on soundly without threatening.
Missed break slightly, settled rail near rear, kept on late for minor inroads.
Speed to reluctantly share lead initially, settled 1 back 1 off no cover, 2nd & driven in pursuit 400m, one-paced & swamped 150m.
Fair break to race midfield on fence, switched out in stretch, plugged on one pace.
Broke with others, bustled early, trapped wide no cover behind midfield, bumped final turn, plugged on evenly.
Rousted at break, of heels 1250m, raced behind midfield 1 off with cover, boxed on one pace in stretch.
Moderate break, settled fore of midfield 1 off with cover, switched out & driven 400m to press for 3rd, faded tamely final 300m.
Sluggish break, raced at tail, off heels 1200m, 6L last home turn, minor headway until progress checked 100m.
Smart start, snagged back to race 3 wide near rear, bumped rival 400m & unbalanced, found little in run home.
Shared early lead under restraint, got cover 1 back on rail 900m, over-raced & off heels 800m, faded weakly in stretch.
Fast break, settled 2nd, nudged for progress & rolled easily to lead 350m, extended for comfortable win.
Sharp start, edged towards stands' side & settled 3rd, ridden under pressure 450m, no match for winner & just edged duel for 2nd.
Smart break to race fore of midfield, shaken up 500m, narrowly edged out in duel for 2nd.
Dwelt slightly start, raced at tail, 8L back shaken up & switched out for run 400m, surged home late.
Awkward break, niggled to advance & race 5th, driven 500m, kept on evenly.
Zipped to lead & taken stands' side from outside gate, headed 350m, no extra, boxed on to wire.
Tardy start, raced midfield, driven 400m, one-paced in run to wire.
Awkward break, raced near rear, niggled along for modest progress, driven 400m, kept on one pace.
Lacked speed early, gradual progress on rail to midfield, hard-ridden 400m, boxed on same pace.
Fair start, raced last trio, driven 400m, plugged on moderately.
Smart break, niggled along in midfield, outpaced in tame run home.
Awkward break, keen early, raced last trio, ridden 400m, found nothing, never a factor.
Fair break, crowded early, settled midfield, bustled & outpaced 500m, struggled in run & faded tamely.
Slow away, hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed strongly 300M to score.
At back as usual, 6.5Ld off the leader 2-3 wide, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace, got 2nd.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, dominated 300M, hung on strongly until 150M overhauled, stayed on for 3rd.
Eased to rear to take rail, 9Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated very strong finishing efforts 200M.
Bounced well, but eased back for cover, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash in straight.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed well to the line despite harmed by the slow pace, blocked most straight and saddle shifted back significantly.
Settled in midfield, 4Ls off the leader on the rails, harmed by the slow pace, held up 4-2, little dash when clear.
Pushed to hold the rails in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground.
At back, 8Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed well 200M.
Midfield, trapped 3 wide throughout, 3.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow pace, no turn of foot.
Box seat, enjoyed the slow tempo, reduced quickly 300M.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5L off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, however soon out of fuel 350M.
Eased to rear, 8Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, no dash, lack room 100M.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 1.5Ls , clocked advantageous slow sectionals, but soon emptied 300M.
Made use of rails draw to grab box seat to stright Has to go around only one horse before surging to the front 200m for easy victory.
No pushed early holding a position 4-back, 1-off to straight. Got split between horses 400m and ran on well.
Bumped at start but recovered to sit 1-back, 1-off without cover. Kept on steadily in straight without threatening first two.
Jumped nicely and sat 3-back the rails to turn. Came off fence and kept on well behind horses to the finish line.
Got off nicely but not pushed and dropped to last pair but 1-off. Remained at rear before switching out 600m. Kept on steadily.
Jumped awkwardly but picked up quickly to sit 3-back, 1-off back stretch.Kept on steadily in straight without looking dangerous.
No early speed and soon last or near last. Taken widest entering straight but only one-paced final 400m.
Jumped OK but not pushed, sitting along fence behind midfield. Shuffled back turning for home, one-paced in straight.
Taken quickly to the front and set steady sections. Caught by winner 350m out and weakened gradually.
Held at rear along fence, then boxed in when tried to come off 600m. Raced in restricted room after, but unable take chances. Irregular heart rhythm.
Taken forward from wide draw to sit 4th before first turn, moving to 2nd along back stretch. Gave ground from 400m.
Began awkwardly, set steady pace, strongly challenged by rival passing 300M, headed near 100M but rallied back and prevailed in a head-to-head sprint to the line.

Chased leaders, challenged down the inside passing 300M, slightly unbalanced when brushed 200M, came through to lead 100M out but winner fought back and prevailed in a photo finish. (Objection overruled.)
Went forward to press leader, chased first 2 for much of the way in straight before fading away final 50M.
Poised in a 3-wide position not far off leaders, kept on steadily final 400M under pressure but not a serious threat to first two.
Held up midfield along the fence, kept on final 400M but making no headway on first two.
Up with early pace, tracked leaders 2-wide entering home turn, had every hope passing 400M but not going the pace to seriously challenge.
Dropped back to the rear, 6Ls back in a difficult position turning in, badly held up early straight and again near 150M, ran on well when shifted out to clear final stages.
Shaken up early, over-raced rounding the bend, held up to 300M but kept on at same pace when clear.
Taken back to a 3-wide position near the rear, shifted wide to challenge 350M, stayed on fairly.
Taken across the fence, 5Ls off the pace in last trio, made brief effort turning in, turned one pace final 200M.
Unable to slot in from draw 14, caught 4-wide in midfield and no cover throughout, not quickened passing 400M.
Restrained behind midfield, difficult to settle passing 800M, 4-wide turning for home, found little when pressed on.
Held up in mid-pack 3-wide, gave limited response passing 400M, never threatened. (Lame next day.)
Towards the rear and never really travelled, came under pressure home turn, weakened 300M, eased 100M when no chance.
Jumped well, raced 1-off in midfield to straight. Taken to middle of track and finished off strongly, going to the line with something in hand.
Taken forward from wide draw to lead field with steady sections. Tried to kick clear 400m, kept on when passed 100m.
Taken back across horses from wide draw to sit near last along fence. Switched out approaching straight and finished strongly.
Checked at start, then badly unbalanced 1100m. Taken to centre of track 400m and ran on well.
Jumped best. then punched the breeze outside leader around turn. Looked chance 400m before turning one-paced.
No early speed and soon at rear. Taken out around final turn and made up good ground in straight without threatening.
Failed to make use of good draw, then checked 1100m, sitting 4-back the fence to straight. One-paced final 400m.
Jumped OK before becoming badly unbalanced 1100m. Covered extra ground around turn before one-paced in straight.
Taken back across runners from wide draw to sit last but away from fence. Made up little ground final 400m.
Taken forward from good draw but proved difficult to settle 1000m. Improved position around turn but found little in straight.
No early speed and raced at rear to and around turn. Shaken up entering straight but found little under pressure.
Jumped well and raced with leaders before taking box seat 800m. Looked chance 400m before tiring.
Jumped OK then awkwardly placed 1100m before taken wide without cover from 900m. Gave ground from 400m.
Raced in midfield but 3-wide mostly to straight. Kept on steadily to 200m before tiring.
Assumed a nice spot in midfield, 4-5ls back in running line, suited by solid speed, let down strongly from 400m and raced to lead, held off rivals comfortably.
Took up coveted 1out 1 back spot, all favours in run, chimed in turning into straight but quickly headed by eventual winner, stuck to task to be well clear of 3rd.
Landed a spot on rails 4ls or so back around midfield, soft run in mid-section, came through gap after 400m, kept on steadily for 3rd.
Taken down to rails racing behind midfield, 7ls or so from top end, helped by solid speed on, some trouble getting clear early in straight but closed strongly when clear to just miss place.
Went back from a wide alley and was 10ls or so well off 2nd last, saved ground on bend, closed best of rest along inside to be nearest on line.
Sat just off midfield in running line, 6ls from lead, lost spot a bit approaching bend, angled out and made some headway without threatening.
Ended up racing 3 wide at rear form a tricky gate, 6-7ls back with cover to bend, switched wider in straight but only make fair progress.
Ended up next to last 8ls back in running line, aided by solid speed on, well back but kept on ok and passed a couple in straight.
Took a spot outside leader 1L back, did share of work with solid speed on, right there turning but had no dash to match principals, folded final 250M.
Pressed on but ended up 3 wide just behind pace, enjoyed cover 2-3 ls back. Looked a possible place chance turning but just battled away and dropped out final furlong.
Showed usual speed to take up running, set a solid speed in front, used too much in middle stages, gave in soon after straightening.
Rolled forward along the fence, tracked leaders, gave limited response turning in, no threat passing 200M.
Raced 3 wide with cover in midfield from a wide alley, 5-6ls back, struggling turning and weakened right out.
Pressed on from outside alley in search of front, posted 3 wide without cover on strong speed, weakening rounding bend and was beaten a long way.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
