Began well from the one draw, gradually settled one back in 3rd on rails becoming 4th though in similar position from leader around the bend, came to challenge on straightening, just got up.
Settled in midfield on rails, saved ground turning for home, ran on to hold every chance the length of straight.
Settled well behind, last into straight, ran on well to be nearest at finish.
Began fairly, dropping towards the rear when given a reminder early, remained in last few far side, widest turning in, made up good ground down the centre of track, did best work late.
Settled towards the rear, made swift progress from 800 metres out, hit the front coming onto home bend, unable to sustain effort and headed 100 metres out.
Began fairly, gradually moved up to the front and crossed for rails passing the 1400 metres, led until headed coming out of back straight, kept on before fading inside final 150 metres.
Began well, settled 2-wide in 2L 4th far side, became 6th just better than midfield coming out, one-paced under pressure.
Ridden to midfield position early, hampered coming out of far side, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Began fairly, gradually dropped to rear of midfield on rails, worse around the bend but saved ground turning in, found nothing in straight.
Broke well from the middle draw, gradually came across and settled just off the speed, soon faded in straight.
Jumped moderately, settled well back, made short-lived effort after Rock reaching midfield when wide around home bend, made no further impression.
Raced wide in rear of midfield, took closer order around the bend, soon weakened after straightening.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race, settling behind midfield the fence. Kept to the inside in the home stretch and ran on strongly after taking control at the furlong.
Raced worse than midfield 2 deep with cover. Peeled out after the 500m and came wide on the home turn. Closed off nicely.
Began only fairly, travelling third from the rear along the paint. Didn't have the easiest of passage rounding the home turn and in the straight. Finished off gamely.
Raced keenly in the early stages, settling 3 back the paint, had cover. Kept on satisfactorily.
Parked midfield, 2 deep with cover. Came under hard riding approaching the home turn but failed to respond, staying on one paced.
Settled back in the field, 2 deep with cover. Swung the home turn widest but just whacked away at the same speed in the run home.
Camped in second last position, 1 off with cover. Only plodded to the finishing line.
Caught 3 deep without cover during the early & middle stages, in about a midfield position. Worked forward to race outside the leader near the 1200m. Faded in the home straight.
Settled in last position after having begun from the outside barrier, racing close to the rail, had cover. Never recovered after being checked near the 400m.
Eventually settled 1 out 1 back near the 1200m. Weakened noticeable after the 300m.
Sent forward and lead at an even tempo along the paint. Railed up in the home straight but weakened quickly approaching the furlong.
Had every possible hope after box seating. Was under heavy pressure before the home turn and compounded in the straight. (To trial)
Jumped well, but eased to sit 5th 2 wide, closed off well to score by a short head.
Taken back from the wide gate, settled 5.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, couldn't find a clear run 3-2, dashed strongly for 2nd, just missed by a short head.
Raced midfield, settled 3.5Ls behind the leader, couldn't find a clear run 3-2, closed to the line strongly to get 3rd.
Eased to settle worse than midfield, 4.5Ls off the pace 2 wide, swung widest, despite hung in and proved difficult to ride final 100M, stormed home for 4th.
Raced midfield, travelled 3.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on well in straight.
Ridden to take the rail and lead by 1L, stayed on gamely until 150M overhauled.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, looked threat turning in, however checked 200M and held up for some distance, made minor ground thereafter.
Rolled forward but could not slot in, trapped 3 wide with cover throughout, no progress.
Sent forward to share the lead 2 wide, out of fuel 200M.
Restrained to rear from a wide gate, travelled 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on only fairly.
Failed to muster despite ridden along, settled worse than midfield about 4.5Ls behind the leaders on the fence, never ran on.
Ridden forward, however trapped 3 wide no cover throughout, dropped quickly after straightening.
Fastest at break, settled 1 back 1 off no cover, shaken up 400m, led 100m, all out at wire.
Settled 2-wide, always in touch, pressed winner from 200M, nearest finish.
Driven forward from wide barrier, led uncontested, kept on well to the line but not pace of first 2 final 100M.
Smart break, sat handy on rail, flat-footed & niggled 500m, stayed on soundly for pressure.
Taken behind at break, sat near rear 1 off with cover, switched out home turn, ran on centre track for solid gains.
Decent break, bustled early 1 off with cover, keen in midfield & off heels 900m, hard driven & outpaced into stretch, stayed on for minor gains.
Tardy break, caught 3 wide no cover midfield, over-raced back stretch, rolled to 4th 600m, driven 400m, one paced in run.
Dropped in at start, taken back to 3 wide with cover near rear, ridden forward 600m, boxed on tamely in stretch, off heels 200m.
Missed break, raced rail near rear, hampered 900m, stayed on evenly for modest gains.
Sharp start, raced 1 back on rail, driven 400m, one-paced & weakened closing stages.
Taken back to midfield at start, crowded & unbalanced 900m, lost ground 600m & ridden, struggled in run home.
Fair break, taken back & soon bustled at tail, driven wide into stretch, never a factor.
Fast break, eased back to midfield 1 off with cover, switched out home turn, quickened to lead 180m, on top at wire.
Slow start, off heels & bumped rival 1100m, settled 1 off with cover behind midfield, driven wide final turn, chased winner to go 2nd late.
Good break, rolled to race 3rd 1 off with cover, driven in 2nd 300m, ran on evenly, lost 2nd late.
Tardy start & bumped 1100m, niggled throughout 1 off near rear, switched wide & driven home turn, ran on for solid gains.
Missed break, raced at tail on rail, hard-ridden & switched out final turn, ran on for decent gains.
Smart start, bumped & unbalanced 1000m, raced rail midfield, close to heels 600m, switched out 350m, stayed on evenly.
Fast break to dispute lead, over-raced 2nd 1 off no cover, advanced to lead 500m, kicked on 300m, emptied & headed 180m, faded.
Awkward break, off heels 1000m, raced fence near rear, switched out & driven 300m, boxed on one pace.
Disputed lead at break, bumped rival 1000m, sat handy 4th on rail, switched out & driven home turn, one-paced to wire.
Taken behind at break, hung out 1st turn 3 wide no cover near rear, wide into stretch, found nothing & weakened out.
Awkward break, speed to lead 1100m, keen in front, headed 500m, found nothing in stretch & eased.
Pushed to take rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, kicked away 300M to win.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, benefited by the very slow sectionals, ran on for 2nd.
Lack early speed, 6Ls off the leader on the fence, dashed strongly 250M despite not suited by the very slow pace.
Trapped 3 wide early, pressed forward, sat just off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed the very slow sectionals, ran on ok.
Prominent, 2.5Ls off the very slow pace 2 wide, just held ground in final stages.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 3Ls off the leader on the rails, harmed by the very slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Pushed early, 3.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the very slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Midfield along the fence, 4.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the very slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the very slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Eased at start, 6Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the very slow pace, bumped 300M, little dash 200M.

Placing: FE
Comment: Midfield, trapped 3 wide, broken down 200M.
Taken forward from start to sit one-out, one-back. Made forward move from the 500m, hit front 100m and pulled clear.
Taken to the front on settling, upped the tempo from 600m, was still ahead at 200m, kept on well when passed.
Taken back after start to get to fence but checked before first turn Was four-back the rail finmal turn, took inside run and kept on well.
Taken forward from wide draw to sit outside leader punching the breeze. Kept on well early in straight before being awkwardly placed 200m.
Jumped well and got nice trailing position two-back, one-off. Improved position final turn and kept on steadily in straight.
Raced in restricted room shortly after start, dropping to rear but wide. Taken out 400m and doing best work final 200m.
Jumped awkwardly but recovered to sit 3-back, the rail. Raced on his own round turn, taken out 400m and kept on one-paced.
Jumped OK and held four-back, one-off into back stretch. Came under pressure to improve from 800m but found little.
Taken back across runners from wide draw to sit last initially, before improving slightly back stretch. Ran past tired horses final 200m.
Made use of inside draw to grab box seat behind leader. Put under pressure on straightening and found little.
Taken forward from start to sit two-back, the fence. Taken out 400m to make run but found nothing, tiring final stages.
Taken back across runners from wide draw, dropping to last entering back stretch, Weakened further final turn and tailed off.
Settled well in midfield with blinkers on first time, headway along the 3-path from 500M, ran on to lead inside 100M, driven out for a narrow victory.
Broke well, soon crossed to rails and restrained in midfield, ran on well turning in but was always held by winner final 100M.
Tracked leader, kept on well when driven 350M, briefly led mid-straight, all out but not pace of first 2 over final 100M.
Caught 3-wide early, strode to lead 1100M, set steady pace, headed by first 3 inside 150M, faded final stages.
Held up behind midfield, made some progress from 300M but never a threat to first 3.
Restrained to a 2-wide position near the rear, niggled along 500M out, stayed on without threatening.
Slow to begin, settled 2-wide in midfield, patiently waited with, steadied when shifting in near 200M, not pace to challenge.
Slow to begin, caught 3-wide first turn, strode closer to track leaders, found less than expected passing 300M, soon out of contention (Jockey reported his horse raced greenly.)
Raced 3-wide first 800M then dropped to last, came widest into straight, kept on same pace.
Began awkwardly, switched off to the rear 7Ls off the pace, saved ground on the inside but failed to make any real progress in straight.
With leaders early, dropped back to a 3-wide position near the rear, bustled along 500M out but not quickened.
Sent forward, tracked leader from 1200M, found little under pressure passing 400M, weakened out of contention mid-straight.

Broke well, settled one back mainly in third on rails, came to challenge inside the 300 metres, just got up final strides.
Broke well from the poor draw, settled wide in rear of midfield, remained wide around the bend, made up good ground in straight to miss narrowly.
Began fairly, 2-wide in second early, took up running rounding home bend, led until headed 50 metres out.
Settled on rails in midfield, saved ground turning in, fought on steadily from fourth into straight.
Began fairly, soon took up running after beginning from the widest draw, crossed to rails after first 200 metres, led until narrowly headed coming out of back straight, ran home at the one pace.
Began well, soon taken back to worse than midfield, wide into straight, fought on well to be nearest at finish.
Settled at the back, commenced run and wide turning in, made moderate progress to be nearest at finish.
Very slowly away, remained in rear early before pulling his way forward coming onto home bend, switched in for a run over 250 metres out, fought on steadily without threatening.
Slowly away, gradually improved to midfield racing keenly around the 1000 metres, slightly closer up turning for home, kept on one pace.
Settled at the back, pulling hard in rear of field when clipped heels badly out of back straight, ran home at the one pace. (Blood in trachea)
Soon dropped to the rear, caught in the backwash and lost ground coming out of back straight, wide around home bend, hung in and a difficult ride early in home straight, no further impression.
Settled in forward of midfield and wide without cover, similar turning for home, soon weakened.
Broke well, settled in 4th within three lengths of pace, dropped away quickly after straightening.
Slowly away, raced keenly in midfield when checked and lost position coming out of back straight, in last few turning in, found nil. (Lame)
Began very awkwardly racing with the backmakers 2 deep with cover. Finished off strongly.
Raced worse than midfield, 3 deep with cover. Ran on well towards the outside.
Led along the paint. Was still in front at the 50m, but was overhauled late.
Made its run from back in the field after racing 1 off with cover. Closed off well.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race tracking the leader along the fence. Kept on satisfactorily.
Never likely after travelling 3 deep no cover on the speed. Stayed on reasonably despite the run in transit.
Settled handy in the run, 3 deep with cover. Only plodded to the line.
Not the best to begin travelling at the tail of the field, on the rails with cover. Made good steady progress in the home straight.
Parked outside the leader, travelling 2nd. Faded after the furlong.
Settled worse than midfield the fence with cover. Kept on one paced in the final stretch.
Raced keenly in the early stages settling 1 out 1 back. Gave ground easily in the home straight. (Bled)
Took up a midfield position, 2 deep with cover. Finished off one paced.
Raced midfield 3 wide with cover. Failed to find any extra in the home straight, giving ground.
Settled midfield the fence had cover. Had every possible chance but gave ground in the straight.
Eased to midfield about 3Ls behind the leaders 3 wide without cover, gradually improved rounding the Home Bend, ran on steadily to score by a short head.
Sent forward to track behind the leaders 2 wide, switched out turning in, finished off well for 2nd.
Not rushed early, travelled 4Ls behind the leaders on the fence, could not find a day light until 200M, stormed home to grab 3rd.
Hard ridden to park outside the leader 2 wide, battled on strongly with the leader until 150M headed by first 3, hung on for 4th.
Rolled forward to share the lead along the fence, battled on gamely, stayed on well until 150M overhauled.
Hard ridden early to sit 5th about 2Ls off the pace 2 wide, held ground in straight.
Began fairly, settled 5Ls off the pace 2 wide, peeled wide, made some ground in straight.
Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leaders 3 wide, kept on one pace to the line.
Lacked of early despite hard ridden along, travelled 6Ls off the pace 3 wide, hung out rounding the Home Bend, struggled to finish off. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Eased back as usual, settled 5Ls behind the leaders on the fence, found nothing in straight. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Always at rear, never a factor.
Bumped start, then pushed to sit 4th along the fence, gradually improved into the box seat, however weakened quickly after straightening, tailed out.
Bumped start, rolled to lead 1200m, to rail 1000m, kicked on 400m, held on under pressure at line.
Bumped start, camped rail midfield, switched out 400m, closed to grab late 2nd under strong drive, just failed.
Broke well, niggled early strides, settled rail midfield, switched out 300m under hard drive, closed well & rallied final strides, failed narrowly.
Smart start, over-raced handy 1 off with cover, shifted off heels 850m, smooth advance to 2nd 250m, found little when asked, same pace to wire.
Fast start to dispute early lead, headed 1200m, switched 1 off 1000m to 2nd no cover, one-paced and edged out of frame late.
Broke well, taken back to 1 off near rear, switched wide in stretch, bumped 250m, ran on for solid inroads.
Taken back to rail, over-raced behind midfield, outpaced turning in, stayed on for good late gains.
Bumped & unbalanced at break, snagged to 1 off near rear, over-raced close to heels, crowded 400m, shifted out into rivals 300m, boxed on.
Began awkwardly & bumped, raced 1 off with cover fore of midfield, switched out home turn & driven, boxed on evenly.
Good start, briefly disputed lead, snagged back 1200m to 1 back on rail, niggled final turn, one-paced in tame run home.
Broke well, snagged back to sit 3 wide midfield, slotted 1 off 800m, unable to raise game in stretch, plugged home.
Fair break, taken back behind midfield 3 deep, driven wide home turn, bumped 300m, crowded & steadied 150m, found nothing.
Awkward start, raced at tail, ridden into stretch, struggled in run home.
Fair break, soon near tail 1 off, niggled 800m, driven 500m, wide into stretch & found nothing.
Tardy start, raced 1 off near rear, switched out for progress home turn, swept to lead after 300m, stretched clear for emphatic win.
Fast start, camped 1 back on rail, switched out & quickened between horses to 2nd 200m, kept on but no match for winner.
Taken behind from widest gate, sat rail behind midfield, switched out & driven 400m, closed soundly to grab 3rd last strides.
Good start, settled 1 off with cover handy, switched out & driven 400m, even progress to 3rd 150m, edged out of frame last strides.
Fair break, raced midfield, off heels 700m & switched 3 wide, bumped & crowded early part of stretch, ran on for late inroads.
Awkward & lost ground start, recovered to rail midfield, switched out & flat-footed 400m, stayed on for late gains.
Good start, eased back to midfield 1 off with cover, boxed on one pace in stretch.
Sharp break, raced 2nd 1 off no cover, all out for brief lead 300m, tapered & swamped.
Bustled at break, sat rail fore of midfield, over-raced 800m, checked badly in run 300m, lost ground, plugged on thereafter.
Fast break, snagged back to 3 wide no cover behind midfield, forced 4 wide 800m, driven centre track in stretch, plugged on one pace.
Blundered start, taken behind runners to tail, minor progress wide into stretch, kept on tamely.
Fair start, snagged back to race last pair on rail, last turning in, switched out & found little in run home.
Smart break, urged to clear lead 1200m, headed 350m & weakened tamely.
Slow start, off heels 1300m, raced 1 off behind midfield, over-raced & switched 3 wide 800m, rolled to 3rd final turn, emptied 300m.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 250M to win by a nose.
Behind midfield, 5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 300M, just missed by a nose.
Pushed to share lead 2 wide at advantageous slow sectionals, dominated 400M, hung on until 100M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Endeavour to keep up in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, little dash in straight.
Pressed forward, 1.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, just held ground in straight.
Lack early speed as usual, always at rear but on the fence, 7Ls off the leaders, dashed strongly 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed early but not muster, 5Ls off the leaders along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, ran on ok in straight.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Settled in box seat, enjoyed the slow tempo, ran on until 200M flattened.
At rear, 7.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, made ground around the field 3-4 wide, dashed well to the line.
Rolled forward, trapped 3 wide, bumped 1000M, 2Ls off the slow pace, emptied 250M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Pressed forward to take rail and shared the lead at slow sectionals, soon out of fuel 300M.
Taken forward from wide draw to sit 2nd at 800m but shuffled back around turn. Taken out 400m, shaken up 300m, finished strongly for impressive win.
Ridden forward to hold nice trail 2-back 1-off to straight. No run 400m, switched out 300m, ran on well with reminders.
Taken straight to the front and set steady pace. Tried to kick clear entering straight, collared 100m, battled on well.
Jumped well but made to work to hold position between horses. Was 2nd into straight and kept on steadily.
Awkward start and then tightened for room. Settled 2-back, the rail. Kept on well along fence final 400m.
Began fairly and allowed to drift towards rear holding rail. Raced greenly when put under pressure final 400m.
Made use of rails draw to hold position behind leader. Took closer order turn but one-paced under hard riding straight.
Taken back from wide draw and soon last but along rail. Taken out from 500m to make run and finished off nicely.
Taken forward from the start and held 3-4 wide initiailly. Was still wide turning for home and kept on one-paced.
Crowded start, recovered to sit 2-back, one-off before turn. Got shuffled back turn and gave ground after entering straight.
Taken back from wide draw and in last pair but one-off into turn. Widest entering straight and found nothing.
Jumped OK and taken forward 4-5 wide. Covered extra ground to sit outside leader around turn. Gave ground from 400m.
Restrained after the start, settled behind midfield 6Ls off the pace, shifted out to clear 350M and quickened up smartly to lead inside 200M, kept on well to win 5th in a row.
Began awkwardly, lacked early speed, settled on the rails 8Ls back near last, held up early straight, ran on strongly when clear inside 300M, closing in on the winner with every stride.
Held up in midfield, switched away from fence 600M, lacked winner's acceleration inside 300M but stayed on well.
Dropped back to near last, 7Ls off the pace turning in, found clear run towards outside of track, ran on steadily to claim 4th.
Taken across runners after the start, patiently held up in last, swung widest into straight, stayed on mildly for a non-threatening 5th.
Tucked in 3rd position along the fence, ideally placed to strike but ran on only fairly inside 400M.
Settled 3-wide behind midfield, further back than intended, brief effort to 200M, turned one pace thereafter.
In 4th place, difficult to settle early stages, had every chance, not pace of leaders passing 200M.
Placed ahead of midfield, saved ground on the inside, angled out to clear 300M, gave limited response, no threat from 150M.
Held up midfield, never going the pace to challenge.
Pressed to the front, had an uncontested lead at good pace, 2Ls in front passing 400M, kept on to mid-straight before weakening.
Unable to slot in from outside barrier, travelled behind midfield 4-wide without cover, kept on same pace turning in, never threatened.
Caught 3-wide without cover in midfield, had little left turning in, soon beaten.
Driven forward and chased leader 2-wide, under serious pressure 450M, found nil and soon out of contention.
Bumped, unbalanced start, raced wide before slotting in outside leader approaching turn. Hard ridden from 400m, gaining momentum to hit front 50m out.
Jumped well and quickly in front cutting in to rail before turn. Increased tempo from 700m, was still ahead 100m before run down close home.
Ridden forward initially before allowing runner to cut in 900m, losing position. No run till late in straight, finished strongly. Trainer unhappy with ride. See racing incidents.
Jumped nicely and ridden forward to grab box seat. Trailed leaders into strraight and kept on steadily to the line.
With leading pack initially before being shuffled back before turn. Bumped, unbalanced 600, taken out 400m and kept on steadily.
Hard ridden from start, cutting in 900m, then eased to sit 2-back, the rail. Improved around turn and kept steadily in straight.
Taken back soon after start and shuffled back to distant last. Caught up with field 400m and kept on steady to be closest at finish.
Crowded out start and then taken back across runners to behind midfield but off rail. Ran on steadily in straight.
Ridden forward but trapped wide, then got head up 700m and went off track round turn Widest at 400m, kept on one-paced.
Raced with leading pack before settling 3-back, one-off at 800m. Lost position turn and found nothing under pressure final 400m.
Jumped with field but no speed and drifted back but away from rail. Became detached from field 400m and plodded home.
Ridden forward to sit two-back, one-off to turn. Kept on steadily early in straight before turing frinal 200m.

Dropped back from a tricky draw but unable to find slot in running line, raced 3 wide with cover 5ls back, travelled well and moved into race strongly turning, put paid to rivals swiftly and ran away to win easily.
Ended up in rearward spot as usual, 6-7ls back on fence, helped by strong speed t top end, came home strongly down middle final 300m to take 2nd, no match for winner.
Positioned just behind midfield 5ls away on rails, aided by solid pace on, improved between horses turning, produced usual honest close to take a place.
Began well and assumed ideal position 1out 1 back, good trip in transit although speed was decent, made run with eventual winner but peaked at 200m.
Showed good speed to cross and lead, set a genuine tempo in front, 1l clear turning but soon tackled, kept on ok given work.
Out in line and held a spot just off pace on rails, 3-4ls back throughout, clear running presented at 400m but just had one speed and stayed on fairly to line.
Began with usual purpose but elected for a trail, travelled well on leaders back but did do share of work with decent sections, produced to challenge turning in but didn't go on final 300m.
Landed a spot in midfield, 4ls or so back in running line, travelled well to bend, unable to close off when produced and just held ground in straight.
Tucked into spot behind midfield 5ls back, raced 2 wide inside eventual winner turning, lacked a pickup at 400m and didn't close off at business end.
Raced behind midfield 6ls or so back, aided by decent speed, still had job to do turning, lacked usual close and just maintained 1 speed in straight.
Dropped back to rear as is customary, 8ls or more off top end, suited by tempo, lacked usual finish in straight and passed only tired horses late.
Wide early and pressed on to race outside leader, did share of work with strong sections early, niggled turning and dropped off tamely from 400m.
Settled at rear more than 8ls back, suited by fast pace, well back turning and never really produced a finish. (see racing incidents jockey reported restricted action)
Unable to slot in and forced to race 3 wide without cover in midfield, did plenty of work 5ls back and began weakening turning, dropped off badly and was disappointing despite wide run.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began fairly, gradually settled in 5th just better than midfield, saved ground on rails turning in, sustained progress to hit front passing the 200 metres.
Began fairly, settled in midfield on rails, angled out for a run entering straight, ran on down the centre of the track to be nearest at finish.
Jumped fairly, settled in 4th in better than midfield, kept on before finding no extra close to home.
Soon taken back to rear of field, commenced move entering straight, finished off race well to narrowly miss 3rd.
Jumped fairly, soon taken back to just worse than midfield, produced late impression closing stages.
Settled in last few on rails, commenced move around the bend, sustained progress from midfield into straight, nearest at finish.
Began fairly, settled in midfield, ran home one-paced.
Began nicely, held narrow lead on rails before ceding advantage rounding stables bend, remained prominent to straight, kept on until fading inside final 200 metres.
Worked his way gradually from a wide draw to take up running 1100 metres out, led the field until headed by winner 200 metres out, folded up quickly.
Began awkwardly but without losing ground, settled in 3rd 2-wide down far side improving to 2nd around home bend, dropped out under pressure after straightening.
Never on terms.
Raced wide without cover in midfield, dropped out from the 500 metres.
Camped 3 back the paint, had cover. Shifted out on straightening and finished off strongly to take control over the latter stages.
Ridden along early and crossed to lead on the rails near the 1000m. maintained a solid effort right to the winning post.
Parked in second position, 1 off no cover. Finished off gamely and held its ground over the final stages.
Enjoyed a nice run tracking the leader on the fence. Kept grinding away in the straight.
From a wide barrier, was allowed to settle with the backmakers, on the rails with cover. Peeled out early in the straight and ran on well.
Had every chance after settling 1 out 1 back. Maintained its position and finished off soundly.
Slow to begin settling behind midfield, the fence. Made steady progress in the run to the line.
Raced 3 wide early without cover, managed to settle 1 off with cover near the 700m, midfield. Stayed on reasonably despite being inclined to hang out on the home turn & early in the stretch.
Settled worse than midfield, 2 wide with cover. Kept on at the same speed in the home straight.
Settled 2nd last 1 off with cover. Failed to make any progress in the final stretch.
Went back from the outside barrier and settled in last position close to the running rail, with cover. Failed to close off.
Traveled back in the field, 1 off with cover. Made no impression in the run home.
Rolled forward to settle 1.5Ls behind the leader at fast sectionals, kicked clear 250M to win.
Eased to midfield about 7.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, closed off strongly to claim 2nd.
Raced midfield about 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed the fast tempo, switched to 3 wide to move closer to the leader 700M, kept on steadily to get 3rd. (Questioned for riding, see incident report)
Lacked early speed despite hard ridden along, travelled 9Ls behind the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, ran on steadily for 4th.
Eased start, settled 8Ls behind the leader on the fence, suited by the fast sectionals, ran on steadily in straight without threatening.
Prominent, settled 3Ls behind the leader along the fence, harmed by the fast pace, kept on one pace until 150M weakened.
Began well, however could not slot in, trapped 3 wide without cover until 1000M, 8Ls off the pace, under pressure 600M, never responded. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls off the pace on the fence, harmed by the fast pace, weakened 250M.
Eased start, dropped to 10Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite suited by the fast pace, never ran on.
Began awkwardly, soon dropped to rear about 12Ls behind the leades on the fence, never competitive.
Began awkwardly, soon ridden to take the rail and led at fast sectionals, faded sharply 250M, tailed out.
Camped handy, niggled along throughout, under pressure 800M, dropped quickly thereafter, tailed out.
Fast start, pressed lead 1off no cover, settled 3rd 1 off with cover 800m, outpaced final turn, grinding run to lead 150m, just held on.
Broke with others, bustled early & niggled in back stretch 1 off with cover near rear, wide into stretch & strong closer, just failed.
Snagged back from wide gate to race rail behind midfield, switched out final turn, good inroads to press winner at wire.
Sharp break, trapped front rank 3 wide no cover, to 2nd 1 off no cover 800m, boxed on gamely in stretch, edged out of frame late.
Outpaced early strides & rousted to race 1 back on fence, hard-ridden 400m, switched out 200m, off heels & back to rail 150m, closed well.
Bustled initially, raced midfield 1 off with cover, tapped for toe & driven 400m, boxed on gamely.
Rousted early, settled midfield 1 off with cover, driven wide final turn, stayed on soundly.
Fair break, held up at tail, ridden for progress 500m, running on late when checked off heels close home.
Taken behind at break, rolled to midfield on rail, switched out final turn, kept on same speed.
Fast break to lead, all out & headed 150m, weakened thereafter.
Fair start, raced 3 wide with cover midfield then wide no cover from 800m, minor progress home turn, hard-ridden 300m, tapered out in run to wire.
Broke with others, raced near rear 3 wide with cover, hard-ridden into stretch, found nothing.
Sharp start, raced 1 back on rail, driven 300m, angled 1 off & quickened up 200m to chase leader, led last strides.
Good break, sat close 3rd 3 wide no cover, slotted handy 1 off with cover 500m, solid stretch run to edge 2nd last strides, always held.
Smart break, led 900m, kicked on 300m, emptied 50m & headed last strides.
Good break, taken back to slot 1 off with cover behind midfield, switched widest & driven stretch, still 6L back 200m, flew home.
Good start, settled rail midfield, shifted out 300m, ran on soundly for solid inroads.
Good start, bustled to settle 3 wide no cover midfield, wide no cover 500m, kept on same speed.
Bustled early, raced midfield 1 off with cover, crowded final turn, shifted out & driven into stretch, one-paced in run home.
Fast break to dispute lead early strides, slotted handy 1 off with cover, niggled 5th 500m, outpaced home turn, boxed on same speed.
Raced last pair 1 off, bustled throughout, hard-ridden last home turn, boxed on for minor gains.
Missed break, bustled to settle rail behind midfield, ridden 450m, plugged on evenly.
Taken back at break to race rail last pair, found little for pressure.
Sharp start to dispute initial lead, raced with leader 1 off with cover 2nd, all out & struggling 200m, faded out.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 7Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 250M and scored without fully tested.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, moved forward in 4 wide from 600M, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M for 2nd.
Bumped at start, dropped to rear, 7Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, dashed strongly 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Behind midfield, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, held up 4-2, dashed well when clear.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on well until 100M flattened.
Settled in box seat, enjoyed the slow sectionals, dashed fairly, flattened 100M.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, made early move in 3 wide prior to home bend, just ran on ok.
Hard ridden early to take rail behind midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, just held ground.
Hard ridden to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, flattened 200M.
Pressed forward to cross, 1L off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, emptied 200M.
Bumped at start, hold the rail in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow pace, no dash, weakened 200M.
Hard ridden to obtain a midfield spot, 4Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, flattened 400M.
Ridden up from inside draw to hold position 3-back, one-off. Taken wide entering straight and finished off nicely.
Jumped to the front from wide draw, cut in to rail passing 1400m. Increased tempo from 600m, caught 100m, kept on.
Jumped well and used inside draw to hold rail position two-back from leader. Got inside run in straight and kept on steadily.
Raced with leading pack before easing 2-back, one-off to straight. Kept on steadily final 400m without threatening.
Positively ridden, tracked leader 2-wide to straight, kept on same pace final 300M.
Not pushed early and dropped back to rear along rail. Ran on steadily in straight to be closest at finish.
Taken back across runners from wide draw to grab rail at rear. Taken wide entering straight and made up some ground.
No early speed and just behind midfield but off fence to straight. Shaken up 400m but lay in under pressure.
Jumped well and soon in box. Became difficult to settle when crossed 1400m and then awkwardly placed. One-paced final 400m.
Checked and lost ground start, raced keenly around first turn, settling in midfield. Weakened soon after entering straight.
Checked start and dropped to last. Caught up to field entering straight but found nothing under hard riding.
Jumped OK but no early pace and held towards rear but off fence. Started to weaken entering straight becoming tailed off.
Sent forward, enjoyed an uncontested lead at slow pace, quickened up smartly passing 300M, showed a gritty attitude to hold off a late challenge from the runner-up.
In the slipstream of leader, kept up the chase passing 300M, late surge final 100M, held by a diminishing neck.
Never far off in 5th place, angled out 300M, stayed on well without getting to first two.
Tracked leader 2-wide, outpaced by first 2 passing 250M, lost 3rd near 50M.
Taken to near the rear from draw 10, made limited progress up the fence, no threat to leaders.
Held up behind midfield, raced a shade keen down the backstraight, swung widest home, made limited progress.
Caught 3-wide no cover in midfield, kept on same pace final 300M, never threatened.
In touch with leaders, driven 350M but found no extra, weakened 100M.
Began only fairly, ended up racing a shade keen in a 2-wide position behind midfield, under pressure 500M but found disappointingly little.
Began well, eased back to midfield, gave limited response turning for home, no impression.
Taken back to the rear, had plenty to do turning in, didn't find much under pressure.
Reared and lost 3Ls at the start, settled in rear7-8Ls off the pace, unable to pick up turning in, never a factor.

Jumped poorly, gradually improved from well behind to be midfield onto course proper, cruised to lead 100 metres out, won easily.
Travelled in better than midfield, finished off race well.
Always well there on stands rails, hit the front under pressure briefly passing the 300 metres, kept on.
Settled just off the speed, came up to join leaders coming onto course proper, unable to sustain effort and swamped inside final 100 metres.
Settled just worse than midfield, produced good late impression under pressure inside final 200 metres.
Began awkwardly, but soon up there with leaders, came under pressure approaching the 300 metres, faded gradually.
Began fairly, held slender advantage to the 300 metres, weakened under pressure.
Broke well, soon came to join leaders, faded gradually inside final 200 metres.
Never better than midfield racing down the centre of the track.
Began well, soon taken back to the tail-end on stands rails, took closer order coming onto course proper, unable to sustain effort inside final 200 metres.
Began fairly, settled in midfield, gradually dropped to the rear approaching course proper.
Never seen with a chance.
Behind midfield early, soon dropped to last few.
Never on terms.
Led on the fence after handing up passing the 800m, settling in 2nd position on the paint with cover. Was briefly headed near the 150m, but fought back strongly.

One of the first out, but caught deep early, was steadied after the 1100m and settled midfield the fence, had cover. Hit the lead near the 150m, but couldn't quite go on with it, chased well to the post.
Went back from the outside gate, settling last on the fence with cover. Finished off well despite being awkwardly placed on heels near the furlong.
Couldn't match the early speed of the race, was steadied and took up a midfield position, 1 off with cover. Ran on satisfactorily to make the frame.
Tracked the leaders eventually settling 3 back the fence, had cover. Ranged up at the 200m, but peaked on its run short of the line.
Ridden along aggressively from barrier rise until about the 700m, crossed to the fence at that point and led. Continued on gamely in the run home despite the tough run.
Travelled in 2nd last position, 2 deep with cover. Made steady progress in the straight towards the outside.
Was prominent early, and then was allowed to settle in 5th position near the 800m, 2 deep with cover. Faded late.
Raced on the speed eventually settling in 3rd position, 1 off no cover. Was a spent force after the furlong.
Crowded at the start, travelled towards the rear, 1 off with cover. Struggled over the final 300m.
Travelled worse than midfield 3 deep with cover. Made no impression in the final stretch.
Settled back in the field along the paint with cover. Was a beaten horse early in the home straight.
Prominent, quickened up smartly when clear 250M and scored comfortably.
Raced behind the leaders, responded well when asked 350M, kept on well to the line for 2nd.
Dropped to rear about 3Ls behind the leaders, could not find a day night until 200M, dashed well inside 100M to get 3rd.
Rolled forward to share the lead until 300M, however failed to make an impression as usual, kept on one pace to the line. (Roarer)
Eased start, travelled 3Ls behind the leaders, kept on steadily to the line.
Rolled forward to share the lead until 150M flattened.
Eased to the stands rail at rear, travelled 4Ls behind the leaders, urged along 500M, dashed well until 200M weakened.
Rolled forward as usual along the fence, weakened 300M. (Substantial amount of blood in the horse's trachea)
Rolled forward to share the lead, dropped quickly 300M, tailed out.
Good break, bustled early, raced rail midfield, switched 1 off 1000m, wider turning in, driven 400m, ran on to lead 75m.
Awkward start & bumped rival, raced fore of midfield on rail, driven turning in, strong stretch run to claim second in closing stages.
Bumped & blundered initially, rousted early to race rail midfield, switched out home turn, crowded 400m, shaken up 300m, closed to grab 3rd late.
Sharp start, raced close up wide no cover, slotted 1 back on fence 1200m, switched out & driven home turn, led 320m, headed 75m, off heels late.
Fair start, sat midfield 1 off with cover, off heels 1000m, switched wide no cover 600m, driven into stretch, solid gains centre track.
Smart start, slotted 1 off with cover fore of midfield, shifted off heels 1100m & rolled wide no cover to 2nd, led 380m, soon headed, kept on same speed.
Blundered start, recovered to race handy 1 off with cover, forced out home turn, boxed on one pace.
Tardy break, driven early to 3 wide no cover midfield, slotted back 1 off with cover 1100m, driven 450m, kept on moderately.
Bumped & bustled early to lead 1600m, headed 380m, plugged on evenly.
Taken back at break, keen early, sat near tail on rail, rolled on 1200m, off heels 700m, one-paced in stretch.
Snagged back to race near rear, over-raced wide, driven wide home turn, struggled in run to wire.
Crowded & checked start, taken behind runners, raced back of midfield on rail, switched 1 off 1400m, wider final turn, tame stretch run.
Fair break, slotted back last pair on rail, driven at tail final turn, produced nothing in stretch.
Taken behind at start from wide gate, raced at tail, switched wide & minor progress 500m, weakened tamely in stretch.
Good start, camped rail midfield, switched out 700m, smooth advance to lead 320m, closed off strongly.
Fair start, sat 1 off with cover midfield, ridden 800m, shuffled back 600m, switched out 450m, in pocket 400m, driven to 2nd 250m, always held.
Tardy break, mustered to race 3 wide fore of midfield, off heels 1000m, taken wide home turn, driven 400m, kept on to make frame.
Decent break, raced 3 wide behind midfield, driven wide final turn, stayed on soundly.
Snagged back to race at tail, driven on outer 450m, ran on centre track for solid gains.
Taken back at start to 1 off near rear, rail advance 600m, sound progress in stretch, run tapered.
Fast break to lead early, headed 1200m, sat 1 back on rail, switched out home turn, back to rail 350m, boxed on one pace.
Rousted at break, raced 1 off behind midfield, off heels & to rail 1100m, advanced 600m, battled on one pace.
Outpaced early, raced last pair on rail, shaken up 400m, boxed on for modest inroads.
Raced 3 wide near rear, ridden 400m, plugged on evenly.
Fast break, raced handy on rail, switched 1 off 1000m, driven to lead 400m, headed 300m, weakened out.
Fast start, rousted early to race handy 3 wide no cover, found nothing stretch & faded tamely.
Sharp start, raced close 2nd 1 off no cover, narrow lead 800m, headed 400m, found nothing & eased.
Speed from wide gate to lead 1200m, to rail 1100m, headed 800m, all out final turn, faded & soon tailed off.
Slow away, pushed forward, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, closed off strongly 300M to score consecutive goal.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 300M, ran 2nd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly for 3rd.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader along the fence, dashed well 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Settled in box seat, strongly benefited by the slow sectionals, just held ground in straight.
Lack early speed from good draw, 5Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash in final stages.
Settled outside the leader, enjoyed the slow sectionals, ran on until 200M flattened.
Eased to rear, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, just ran on ok.
Pushed to take rail and led by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, ran on until 250M weakened.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, no turn of foot.
Eased to rear, 7Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
Settled in front, benefited by the slow tempo, however trapped 3 wide no cover throughout, soon emptied 400M.
Eased back to cross, took rail, 7Ls off the leader, raced very keenly, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Eased to sit in midfield, trapped 3 wide, faded badly 500M.
Taken to front and set steady sections without being challenged. Kicked away 400m and though tiring final stages held on to win.
Jumped OK but no early speed and drifted back to last. Improved around bend, got inside run and finished strongly.
No early speed and held behind midfield, hampered 900m, switched wide entering straight, looked chance 200m, kept on well.
Ridden forward before slotting in, 3-back the rail. Shifted out entering straight and kept on well to the line.
Reared, lost ground start. Taken to rail and made up ground turning for home. Bumped and taken out 400m, kept on one-pace.
Won start before settling second, 2L from leader. Was still within range at the 200m before tiring final stages.
Jumped from widest gate and drifted toward rear before hampered 900m. Still at rear entering straight before making up good late ground.
Taken forward from wide draw to sit third at the 900m. Covered extra ground around turn but still within range, tiring final 200m.
Jumped well but hit rail and unbalanced 1500m. Improvws to fourth along rail before checked and lost ground 900m. Kept on one-paced.
Began fairly, ridden up to obtain forward position but held 3-wide. Bumped, badly unbalanced 800m, one-paced. Jockey, trainer attributed poor run to 800m bump.
Jumped fairly and held in midfield to 900m when taken out and thereafter raced without cover. Gave ground in straight.
Taken forward from inside draw but badly hampered 900m and lost position. Tailed off. Performance unacceptable.
Soon guided to the fence tracking leader in a slowly run race, quickened up smartly when a gap opened up 250M, led near 100M, kept on well to the line.
Chased leaders 2-wide, pressed along 450M, moved up to challenge mid-straight, fought on under pressure but was well held by winner over final 100M.
Held up in midfield, stayed on well to be nearest at the finish.
Settled in 5th about 3Ls off the slow pace, held up for clear run until nearing 200M, made steady headway when clear.
Reserved near last in a race slowly run, 7-8Ls to make up passing 400M, had to pull widest for a clear run, closed off strongly final 200M.
Crossed to race outside the lead but found less than expected passing 400M, no threat from mid-straight.
Soon crossed to the lead, led slowly to straight, all out passing 350M but able to shake off pursuers, swamped inside 150M.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, had every hope turning in, outpaced final 200M.
Towards the rear, taken wide nearing 400M, made limited progress turning in.
Trailed the field in last 10Ls off the pace, made some progress final 400M without threatening.
Held up behind mid-division, switched away from fence 500M out, gave limited response.
Reserved in midfield along the inside, probably not helped by the slow pace, not able to quicken when placed under pressure 400M.
Settled 2-wide behind mid-division, outpaced turning in, never a factor.
Unable to slot in and was 3-wide without cover throughout, found nil and dropped out rapidly passing 250M.
Jumped OK but not pushed and raced in midfield to straight proper. Put under pressure 600 and ran on strongly to get up in time.
Jumped straight to the front and set fast pace. Was still 2Ls clear at the 200m before tiring and being caught near the line.
Jumped well and moved swiftly from midfield to outside rail. Kept on well in the straight to be closest at the finish.
No early speed but hugged the outside rail from start to finish. Was doing best work over final 400m.
Jumped well to be second early, then third. Dropped back to sixth entering course proper but kept on steadily to the line.
Ridden up from inside draw to race close to the pace. Got to withing 4th entering course proper, turning one-paced.
Bumped start then awkwardly placed close to heels 800m. Raced down centre of the track and only one-paced final 400m.
Not comfortable with strong pace and raced on his own at rear. Niggled at 800m and finished off nicely, doing best work final 200m.
Jumped fairly but no early pace and drifted back while moving closer to outside fence. Never dangerous and one-paced final.
Tightened for room shortly after start, recovered and raced in midfield, Crowded again closing stages when not in contention.
Bumped start but ridden up to sit third, 2L from leader 400m. Soon came under pressure and drifted back. Pulled up lame.
No early speed and raced at rear until 400m when had head on side and became difficult to ride. One-paced.
Raced on his own down the centre of the track in midfield. Started to give ground entering course proper.
Raced towards the rear but close to fence. Put under pressure 400m but became unbalanced and lost ground. Collapsed after race.
Broke well, crossed from wide alley to race outside leader, helped by even sections early, right there and leveled up turning, dashed clear and kept a healthy margin in run to the line.
Taken down to rails from a tricky draw, raced behind midfield 6ls off top end, saved ground on rails turning in, clear final 300m and closed soundly but unable to make real impression on winner.
Took an ideal spot on leaders back, enjoyed a nice sit in mid-section, right there turning, kept up effort to hold 3rd.
Began smartly as usual, crossed to lead from a wide gate, steady first section but then set pace to suit, overhauled soon after turning but stuck on as often does to make frame.
Awkwardly away, hampered in early scrimmage, 7-8ls back on rails in mid-section, took inside run sin straight and closed best of rest to be nearest on line.
Landed an ideal position 1 out 1 back, travelled well throughout, 2ls down turning and looked a place chance at 300m, unable to sustain effort inside 200m but kept on evenly.
Landed a spot in midfield, 4-5ls back in running line, enjoyed a nice run in the middle stages, in traffic turning but only made fair progress when clear.
Tucked in just off midfield, 6ls back in 2 wide line, fair run to bend but back in traffic turning, offered no real run on over final 200m.
Unable to get closer than 3 wide around midfield, 5-6ls back with cover, produced 4 wide turning but didn't have extra gear to threaten and just whacked away.
Drifted back and was checked early, settled behind midfield 6-7ls away 3 wide with cover, made a run 4 and 5 wide turning, lacked usual close and peaked at 200m. (lame next day)
Ended up 8ls or more away at rear, racing 2 and 3 wide, still plenty to do turning, came wider but only managed to pass a few tired ones in straight.
Tardy into stride, mustered to settle in midfield on rails 5ls back, enjoyed a soft trip in mid-section, angled out at 400m but offered little fight and soon folded.
Allowed to drift back from a wide gate, raced intractably at tail and hung badly rounding bend, never travelling and was unable to play any real part. (see racing incidents)
Posted 3 wide without cover in midfield, worked hard 3-4ls back on bend, struggling before turning and dropped right out.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Settled in midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, hit the front 100 metres out, won readily.
Ridden along in first few, took up running coming out of back straight, led until headed 100 metres out.
Began fairly, settled just off the pace on rails, kept on same pace without quickening under pressure.
Broke well, held narrow lead early, travelled outside leader around the bend, ran home one-paced.
Jumped fairly, settled on rails in midfield, came closer around the bend, just held place under pressure final stages.
Jumped moderately, settled just worse than midfield, fought on steadily without threatening.
Slowly away, travelled in last few, kept on steadily in straight. (Lame)
Settled well behind, saved ground home turn, kept on steadily under pressure.
Began from a wide draw, ridden along out wide better than midfield, obtained cover in midfield before home bend, one-paced in straight.
Began from a poor draw, soon taken back to race in rear, made no impression.
Ridden along to hold place in just better than midfield far side, hung out badly turning in, never recovered.
Well there and without cover far side, inconvenienced and lost position approaching home bend, dropped out in straight. (Lame next day)

Went forward and led from the outside gate and strolled along at a genuine tempo on the fence. Increased its lead over the field midrace by a number of lengths and made every post a winner, scoring well.
Parked 3 back the fence with cover. Peeled out into the clear on straightening and chased hard.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race on the fence with cover, behind the speed. Shifted away from the rail to improve after the 700m, kept on soundly in the run home.
Ridden along early but couldn't go the early speed of the race, settling third 1 off the fence no cover. Began to improve after the 800m, was one paced in the straight, tired late.
Slow to begin, travelling behind midfield on the paint with cover. Finished off reasonably towards the inside.
Camped 3 back, 2 deep with cover. Shifted out after the 700m, 3 deep to go forward. Finished off one paced in the final stretch.
Taken back from a wide gate and travelled third at the rear, on the rails with cover. Came widest in the straight and made steady progress without threatening.
Raced midfield, 2 deep with cover. Was dour in the run to the line.
Taken back and settled in last position on the paint with cover. Failed to make any impression in the home stretch.
Enjoyed all the favours travelling in second position on the fence with some cover. Faded in the straight after having every possible chance.
Travelled worse than midfield 2 deep with cover. Made no impression in the run to the wire.
Settled with the backmakers, 1 off with cover. Struggled over the final 400m.
Bumped start, then pushed forward to settle 2Ls off the leader on the fence, stayed inside and closed off well to score.
Sent forward to obtain the box seat, peeled wide turning in, ran on well to get 2nd.
Hard ridden forward to take the rail and led, stayed on well until 50M, hung on for 3rd.
Eased back, settled 4Ls behind the leader along the fence, peeled wide after straightening, dashed on strongly.
Prominent without cover 2 wide, kept on one pace until 100M weakened.
Bumped start, then raced in midfield about 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Settled worse than midfield, 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, no progress.
Began awkwardly, then eased back from a wide gate, travelled 5.5Ls behind the leader on the rail, never ran on. (Lost left front plate)
Taken back to rear from the outside gate, settled 5Ls off the pace 2 wide, no dash.
Pushed forward to sit 4th, 2Ls off the pace 3 wide no cover, failed to quicken up, dropped off 100M.
Settled worse than midfield, 5Ls behind the leader 3 wide, never a factor.
Mostly 3rd 4 wide without cover, hung out rounding the Home Turn, dropped quickly thereafter.
Good break, bustled early, slotted 1 off with cover midfield, driven 600m, taken wide home turn, swept to lead 100m, held on under pressure.
Fast break, pressed lead initially, settled rail 2nd, shaken up to lead 200m, headed 100m, rallied but held.
Missed break, camped at tail, driven in rear 300m, closed well to grab 3rd late.
Smart start, trapped wide early, slotted 1 off with cover 4th, boxed on evenly under stretch drive.
Fast start to lead 3 deep no cover early, to 1 off on front end 800m, driven under pressure home turn, headed 200m, tapered to wire.
Tardy break, raced rail midfield, driven & switched out home turn, shifted & bumped 300m, stayed on soundly.
Taken back at start, camped 1 off near tail, driven wide into stretch, stayed on for late inroads.
Moderate break, sat rail near rear, over-raced backstretch, shaken up off heels 250m, progress until checked & off heels final 100m.
Good break, bustled on rail early, settled handy 5th on fence, hard-ridden & every chance 300m, weakened thereafter.
Tardy start, rousted early, settled 1 off behind midfield, hard-ridden turning in, crowded & unbalanced in weak stretch run.
Broke well, slotted 1 back 1 off, close up when wide home turn, faded tamely in run home.
Sharp break, led on fence 1100m, extended into home turn, forged clear for untroubled win.
Sharp break, settled midfield 1 off, niggled backstretch, switched out home turn, strong run to 2nd 75m, no match for winner.
Speed to lead initially, shadowed leader 1 off no cover, 3rd & niggled 600m, driven to 2nd 200m, all out & lost place 75m, boxed on.
Fair break, soon outpaced & raced 1 off behind midfield, flat-footed under drive turning in, ran on for late gains.
Decent break, raced rail fore of midfield, hard-ridden 400m, boxed on soundly to wire.
Good break, caught 3 wide handy, driven wide into home stretch, ran on same speed.
Missed break, raced rail last pair, driven 300m, impeded 150m, kept on for modest late gains.
Good start, snagged back to midfield 3 wide, driven wide home turn, ran on evenly.
Dropped to last pair early, 1 off & over-raced 900m, last turning in, ran on for minor inroads.
Tardy start, raced rail near rear, driven 400m, one-paced in run home.
Lacked early speed, rousted behind midfield, gradual backstretch advance 4 deep to 2nd 600m, swamped & faded 200m.
Decent break, wide no cover near rear & keen early, hard-ridden wide into stretch, never a factor.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, progressed steadily 200M to score by a short head.
Eased at start to take rail behind the field, 6Ls off the good pace, progressed steadily 250M, just beaten by narrow margin in 2nd.
Hard ridden to hold the rail and shared the lead at good sectionals, hung on well until 50M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Settled in box seat, perfect trip, however just held ground in final stages.
Behind midfield, 5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, held up 4-2, dashed well when clear.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, dashed well 200M.
Midfield, 4Ls off the good pace along the fence, just held ground in straight.
Pushed forward, 2L off the good pace 2 wide, no turn of foot, weakened 250M.
Very slow away, at rear, 8Ls off the good pace on the fence, ran on ok.
Pushed early, 5.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, no turn of foot.
Hard ridden early but trapped 3 wide, progressed forward to share lead 2 wide at good pace, out of fuel 300M.
Midfield, 3Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, soon emptied 300M.
Ridden forward to sit 2nd, 1-2Ls from leader. Was not asked for effort until final 200m when gradually overhauled leader close to the line.
Hard ridden from outside draw to take clear lead before first turn. Increased tempo 600m and battled on gamely losing in last few strides.
No early speed and held along rails with just two behind him. Switched to middle of track 350m and ran on strongly.
Ridden forward but did not persevere and held 3-back, one-off to straight. Kept on steadily in straight to be closest at finish.
Settled in midfield along rails. Was close on heels round first turn, recovered and kept on steadily until tight for room closing stages. Not ridden out.
Used inside draw to grab ideal position 1-back, 1-off to straight. Looked chance 200m before swamped final stages.
Fractious in gate, lost ground start, then got head up and difficult to settle first turn. Kept on steadily in straight.
Ridden forward to grab box seat behind leader. Kept on steadily in straight before being swamped final 200m.
Restrained early before settling 3-back the rail. Kept on one-paced in straight without threatening.
No early speed and drifted back before slotting in to rail. Taken to centre of track 350m but found nothing.
Taken back across runners after start but got head up and didn't settle round first turn. Remained at rear and found nothing final 350m.
Bumped at start and then taken back across runners, becoming last round first bend. Remained there for rest of trip.
Broke smartly, led reluctantly first 400M, had a smooth run behind leader from 1200M, swept to the lead 200M, lengthened away under confident handling, won impressively.
Assumed a 2-wide position behind midfield, ran on strongly when taken out 300M, nearest finish but winner was always in control.
Up with early pace then shuffled back to midfield along the inside, within striking distance turning in but couldn't match winner's acceleration, stayed on steadily to hold 3rd.
Began awkwardly, settled inside, fell back to a rearward position entering back straight, stayed on steadily up the fence over final 300M, narrowly missed 3rd.
Forwardly placed, stalked the pace 2-wide, well placed to strike turning home, not pace to challenge winner but kept on steadily to the line.
Back off the early pace, settled last 7Ls off the pace, driven nearing 400M, closed off well.
Caught wide first turn, vigorously driven to lead near 1200M, led uncontested to straight, headed 200M out, no extra final 100M.
Slow to muster speed, chased leaders from 1200M in a 3-wide spot without cover, not quickened inside 300M, no threat mid-straight. (Jockey questioned.)
Failed to muster speed, travelled 3-wide in midfield throughout, stayed on fairly when put to pressure final 250M. (Jockey voiced his concern of the horse's action.)
Slow to begin, held up near last , proved difficult to settle and switched to 3-wide from 800M, hung in under pressure turning home, never a threat.
Close up early, restrained to midfield passing 1200M, found little when pressed 300M, eased when no chance inside 100M.
Held up near last, outpaced nearing 600M, soon beaten.

Settled behind midfield, switched out for a run upon straightening, ran on under pressure to gain upper hand final stages.
Began from a wide gate, settled just worse than midfield, came wide for a run into straight, ran on to hit front momentarily over 100 metres out, just headed close to finish.
Broke well, settled wide without cover in midfield, commenced run turning in improving to only 2 lengths off the lead 200 metres out, fought on steadily without threatening.
Broke fairly, settled in midfield, did not find much room early in straight, finished off race nicely.
Began fairly, settled just better than midfield, did not find much room early in straight, kept on well.
Jumped moderately, settled two wide just off the speed in third, hit the front briefly inside 300 metres, headed over 100 metres out.
Settled mainly one back in third on rails, ran home one-paced.

Began from the widest gate settling in midfield early, made steady headway out wide around the bend improving to third some two lengths back early in straight, unable to sustain effort inside final 200 metres. (Tactic questioned)
Soon obtained rails run in midfield, baulked for a run upon straightening, kept on steadily without quickening.
Held up 3-wide at the back, driven 450M but made no real progress down outside of straight.
Soon took up running, led the field to 300 metres, dropped out under pressure. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Trailed the field early, took closer order on rails around the bend and turning in, faded inside final 300 metres. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Held up in the last pair, failed to pick up when asked, never a factor.
Never far off to straight, dropped away quickly. (Heart irregularity)
Settled in fourth position on the fence with cover. Hit the front near the 200m and finished off well to draw a margin.
Fractious in the stalls, began awkwardly settling with the backmakers on the fence with cover. Ran on strongly.
Traveled in 5th position, 2 deep with cover. Loomed up near the furlong but peaked on its run 50m from home.
Raced in 2nd last position, close to the rail with cover. Closed off well towards the inside to make the frame.
Camped behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Shifted out to find clear running in the straight, worked home soundly.
Parked midfield the fence had cover. Stayed on at the same speed down the running.
Coursed 3-4 wide without cover, midfield. Made steady progress in the home straight without threatening.
Settled in 3rd position, 1 off with cover. Commenced to give ground near the last 100m.
Taken back from the outside alley settling in last position on the rails with cover. Worked home steadily towards the inside in the run home.
Never likely after racing 3 wide, with some cover on the circle behind midfield. Kept on one paced in the final stretch.
Led along the fence early, then held the rails after the 900m, racing in 2nd position. Faded near the furlong.
Worked forward, didn't cross to the fence but took up leading duties 1 off, after the 900m. Was a spent force passing the 150m.
Settled midfield, 1 off with cover. Never fired in the home straight, giving ground over the final 100m.
Began awkwardly, lost ground and settled back in the field, 3 deep with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Eased to sit midfield about 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, stormed home to score by a neck.
Raced midfield, settled 5.5Ls behind the leader, peeled wide and finished off well to get 2nd.
Prominent, moved to park outside the leader 1200M, stayed on well to grab 3rd.
Midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader, dashed well until 100M flattened.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on ok inside 200M.
Ridden forward to sit 4th 2 wide with cover, under pressure 450M, however unable to quicken up, kept on one pace to the line.
Eased to settle worse to midfield about 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide, switched to widest and made some ground in straight.
Rolled forward to take the rail and led by half a length, emptied 200M.
Eased back as usual, travelled 7Ls off the pace, never ran on.
Always at rear, settled 8Ls behind the leader, never a factor.
Began slowly, then gradually moved to obtain the box seat, weakened 250M.
Fast break, camped 1 off with cover 4th, shaken up in 3rd 450m, driven to lead 200m, just held on.
Sluggish & bumped start, raced near tail, progress 1200m to stalk 3 wide with cover behind midfield, closing wide stretch run, just failed.
Impeded at break, mustered to race midfield on fence, switched out final turn, sound progress centre track to grab 3rd late.
Smart start, camped rail fore of midfield, tapped for toe & driven 450m, stayed on for late inroads, just missed frame.
Missed break, raced rail behind midfield, switched wide into stretch, strong closer centre track.
Good start, raced close to lead on fence, niggled & shuffled back 1000m, hard-driven in stretch & stayed on soundly without threatening.
Sharp break, raced 3 wide no cover midfield, every chance when shaken up 400m, boxed on evenly.
Sharp break wide, mustered to 1 off with cover handy, 1 off no cover 2nd 1400m, driven final turn, one-paced & swamped in run.
Smart break, nudged to lead 1st turn, set tempo 1 off no cover until to rail 1400m, extended into home turn, emptied & headed 200m.
Taken back at break, raced last pair on rail, plugged on for minor inroads.
Shifted out at break, bustled early to race 1 off with cover midfield, niggled 1000m, plugged on modestly for pressure.
Fair start, settled 3 wide last pair, hard driven 600m, outpaced 13L last turning in, stayed on for minor gains.
Good start, settled 1 off fore of midfield, under pressure turning in, found little & faded in stretch.
Bumped start, sat 1 off with cover behind midfield, driven under pressure 500m, found little, tame effort.
Broke with others, camped 1 off with cover behind midfield, progress 700m, switched out turning in, shaken up 400m, led 200m, driven to wire.
Held up to race at tail on rail, keen early, switched out for progress on turn, shifted wider 300m, strong closer, just held.
Speed to lead, shaken up in front 350m, all out & headed 200m, boxed on to wire.
Smart start, sat midfield 1 off with cover, shaken up 350m, ran on soundly.
Fast break, bustled to flank leader 1 off no cover, driven 400m, one paced in run home.
Settled last pair 1 off, niggled 600m, driven 400m, closed out centre track for decent late gains.
Broke well to race handy 1 off with cover, outpaced & crowded 350m, one-paced in run home.
Fair break, sat rail midfield, progress to 2nd & every chance 300m, tapered thereafter.
Tardy break, at tail initially, keen hold to roll through field to sit 3 wide no cover 3rd 800m, ridden 350m, found nothing & faded.
Broke well, dropped back to rail near rear, hard-ridden into straight, struggled in run to wire, eased late.
Fair start, over-raced early, trapped wide no cover midfield, driven widest into straight, bumped 400m, found nothing & weakened out.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 300M to score.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, dashed strongly 250M despite not suited by the slow pace, just beaten by a neck in 2nd.
Eased to rear, 7.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, held up most straight, dashed strongly for 3rd.
Led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals 2 wide, hung on strongly until 150M overhauled, just missed a place.
Pressed forward, 2.5Ls off the slow pace, along the fence throughout, made steady ground in straight.
Allowed to travel forward, 2.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Very slow away, 4Ls off the leader along the rails, harmed by the slow tempo, blocked most straight, never tested.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 6Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, lack room in straight but kept dashing well to the line.
Hard ridden forward, just off the leader on the fence, favoured by the slow sectionals, flattened 200M.
Behind midfield, 5Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, progressed steadily 300M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, raced very keenly, harmed by the slow tempo, no dash.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leader 3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, just held ground.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, soon emptied 300M.
Rolled forward, 1L off the leader 3 wide, suited by the slow tempo, dropped off 400M.
Jumped well, restrained to find cover, shifted out entering straight, shot away from field inside 200m for easy win.
Taken back after start and last until turn. Taken wide 400m and ran on well without threatening winner.
Taken forward from wide draw and trapped 3-wide without cover. Got cover turn, looked chance 300m, flattened.
Began awkwardly, raced in midfield one off the fence, bumped 400m, kept on one pace. Pulled up lame right front.
No early pace and held along rail towards rear to straight. Blocked for run 400m, taken wider, finished off nicely.
Made use of inside draw to hold box seat to straight. Put under intense pressure from 400m but only one-paced.
Restrained early to sit 2-back the fence until straight. Shaken up 400m but found little under pressure.
Taken forward to sit outside leader before the turn. Looked chance 400m before giving ground from 200m.
Rolled forward three-wide to take clear lead before the turn. Set good section before tiring from 300m.
Settled well in midfield early stages, pushed to 3-wide when pace slackened 1300M, moved strongly into contention near 400M, quickened to lead 150M, in control after.
Held up midfield along the fence early, moved closer to track leaders when pace slackened in middle stages, challenged strongly passing 300M, battled on to go 2nd near the line.
Guided into a 2-wide position just behind leaders, pushed to 3-wide 1300M when pace slackened, led 300M-150M, battled on when winner got past, lost 2nd near line.
Settled towards the rear on inner, moved closer nearing 800M, held up early straight, chased leaders from 300M, kept on to the line but was always held.
Slow to begin, held up off the pace in last pair, ridden out near 450M, switched widest and closed off well to be closest at finish.
Taken across to the rails soon after the start, settled inside of last pair 6Ls off the pace, had no clear passage turning in, guided to clear from 300M and stayed on.
Reserved in midfield along the 2-path, lacked an immediate response inside 400M, made some late headway but never reached leaders.
Not hurried in early stages, held up towards the rear, ran on fairly when driven 400M, hung in under pressure mid-straight, never a serious threat.
From draw 13 crossed to a 3-wide position towards the rear, found less than expected when driven out passing 400M, flattened final 100M.
Caught 3-wide without cover in midfield, pushed wider 1300M then strode forward to join leaders, checked 250M, no extra mid-straight and weakened.
Always In touch, hampered by the slackening pace down the back straight, outpaced passing 400M, never dangerous after.
Positively ridden early stages, tracked pace from 1500M, ranked alongside leader 1000M, failed to pick up when pressed inside 400M, weakened right out.
Sent forward, went 2Ls clear entering back straight then slowed down the pace, pressed by rivals from 1000M, had little left turning home, soon beaten and faded.
Ridden along early to sit 2-back, one-off to straight. Taken 4-wide at 400m but ran on strongly, holding off late challenge.
Bumped start, then raced greenly when seeking cover 800m. Shifted in and unbalanced turn, ran on strongly final 400m.
Missed start, taken back across runners to rail. Last into straight, forced to change course twice but ran on strongly.
Restrained early and held away from rail towards rear. Taken to centre of track entering straight and finished off nicely.
A little slow to move, taken back across runners to fence. Made good round final 400m while shifting ground.
Hard ridden to lead but kept away from fence by inside runner. Joined at 400m, still in front 200m before giving ground.
Taken forward from good draw to hold rail 2-back from leading pair. Blocked for run 400m, closed in 200m before flattened.
Taken forward from inside draw to hold box seat. Started run 400m which ended 200m later. One-paced.
Began awkwardly then bumped, dropping to rear. Improved around turn but only one-paced in straight.
No early speed, dropping to rear but away from fence. Taken out in straight but found little under pressure.
Jumped well and hugged rail inside leader. Joined leader 400m, still in contention 200m before fading final stages.
Hard ridden to take forward position but not enough speed and held wide. Gave ground from 300m.
Jumped well and taken forward but held three-wide without cover till 300m when weakened gradually.
Difficult to load. Jumped OK but no speed and soon in last pair to straight. Found nothing when put under pressure.
Settled back behind midfield, 7ls or so from top end, suited by even tempo, made run approaching bend, let down strongly down middle to close over the top snatching victory in final strides.
Took a nice trail on rails 2ls behind leaders, travelled well in mid-section, stalked them turning and challenged strongly to take over inside 200m, caught in final strides.
Began well, travelled strongly early an went on to lead, raced 2 wide shading inside horse going strongly to bend, held front until 200m when overhauled, kept on well thereafter.
Took a sit just off speed in 5th position racing 2 wide, ok trip to bend, right there turning, stayed on as usual without looking likely, made frame late.
Out in line, ridden up to take a prominent role, held rails but shaded by outside horse throughout, kept finding along inside and did well to be not fair away.
Took a trail racing 2 wide behind midfield, 6ls back, fair run in mid-section, tracked up 3 wide rounding bend, closed off between horses in straight with usual honest finish.
Positioned 3 wide with cover for journey, 5ls back in midfield, came wider turning, lacked a dash but kept on fairly holding ground in straight.
Moderate break, mustered to sit just off midfield, quiet time on rails throughout, made some headway until 200m but was one paced thereafter.
No early pace, raced in rear division 7-8ls back on rails, well back and took inside runs on bend, made no serious headway.
Settled in midfield racing 2 wide, even trip to bend, condition gave out and gradually gave ground.
Taken down to rear from a wide alley, raced 8ls or so back in running line, same margin back turning, passed only tired runners late.
Landed coveted 1 out 1 back spot, no excuse in run, struggling approaching bend and gave in quickly in straight.
Restrained to rear from a wide gate, more than 8ls back on rails, still last turning, never factored.
Posted 3 wide without cover, 2-3ls back, did share of work on bend, folded soon after straightening.
