Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Settled just worse than midfield, switched out for a run entering straight, ran on well to assert authority inside final 100 metres.
Began fairly, settled better than midfield in two-length 4th on rails, obtained a run on inside over 200 metres out, ran on to hold every chance only to be outsprinted close to home.
Ridden along from a wide gate travelling one length back in 3rd and 3-wide without cover far side, tracked leaders into straight, kept on steadily without threatening.
Soon taken back to rear of field, remained similar when given reminders turning in, made up good ground down the straight, nearest at finish.
Showed early speed but unable to cross to rails, remained outside narrow leader around home bend, came under pressure turning in hitting the front briefly over 200 metres out, soon swamped.
Jumped awkwardly losing ground, soon picked up to better than midfield position in 5th within three lengths of pace, kept on same pace without quickening in straight. (Lame next day)
Prominent briefly, gradually dropped back towards the rear of field, joint last into straight, ran on well past beaten horses down the centre of the track.
Slowly away, soon crossed for rails run behind, saved ground around the bend, snuck up to forward of midfield early in straight, hampered 200 metres out.
Began fairly from the one gate, ridden along to hold position gaining slender advantage around the bend, unable to sustain effort 200 metres out and soon weakened.
Soon dropped well behind from the widest gate, trailed the field into straight, no further impression.
Niggled along in forward of midfield early, dropped slightly backward around the bend, folded up shortly after straightening.

Benefitted from a tactical ride after drawing the widest gate, was able to settle 3 back, 1 off with cover. Peeled out to travel 3 wide midrace and began to improve its position. Cornered 5 wide and repelled late challenge.
Rated close to midfield, 3 deep with cover. Got a nice cart in to the race rounding the home turn. Ran on gamely.
Enjoyed all the favors after box seating. Kept grinding away in the run to the line.
Missed the start after putting its head down as the gates opened, settling behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Came wide in the straight and closed off willingly.
Worked forward from a wide alley to eventually settle in second position, 1 off no cover. Hit the lead near the 250m, grudgingly gave ground over the latter stages.
Crowded in the early stages, settling on the paint with cover. Kept towards the inside in the home stretch and finished off soundly.
Ridden along after the start and raced strongly to take up leading duties on the fence in the early stages. Couldn't sustain its run and tired over the final 150m.
Settled close to the rail with cover, 3 back. Peeled out approaching the home turn, stayed on at the same speed in the final stretch.
Camped back in the field, 2 wide with cover. Kept plugging away in the home straight.
Pushed along from barrier rise and effectively settled 1 out 1back. Weakened in the straight after having every possible chance. Reported to be lame the following day right hind leg.
Raced worse than midfield, 3 deep with cover. Made no impression in the final stretch.
Jumped well and after the 1200M, was left racing 3 wide and without cover and was allowed to stride into a more forward position, on the speed. Was gassed in the home straight.
Raced in last position, 2 deep with cover. Failed to close off.
Travelled in 2nd last position on the rails with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Began well, then eased to rear about 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide, switched widest turning in, stormed home to score by 1.5Ls.
Eased to sit worse than midfield, 5Ls behind the leader, finished off well for 2nd.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, shaken up 300M, kicked 1L away 200M, headed 100M, hung on for 3rd.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls off the pace 2 wide, kept on one pace to the line without threatening.
Began awkwardly, then settled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, stayed inside, made limited ground in straight.
Taken back from a wide gate, settled 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, peeled wide turning in, never ran on.
Camped handy, travelled three wide without cover throughout, weakened badly rounding the Home Turn, tailed out.
Ridden forward to park 1L outside the leader, out of fuel soon after straightening, tailed out.
Began only fairly, then ridden forward to take the rail and led by 1L, flattened badly 300M.
Fair break, raced last pair, rail progress into stretch, switched out for strong burst 300m, powered to lead last strides.
Good break, led 1000m & taken to rail, prolonged stretch duel & narrowly headed 200m, rallied to regain advantage 100m, mugged late.
Smart start, caught wide no cover midfield, soon rolled to dispute 2nd 3 wide, pressed lead 400m, led briefly 200m, run tapered late.
Moderate start, off heels & bustled near rear 900m, rail advance to sit midfield at 600m, switched out home turn, ran on for solid inroads.
Missed break, raced at tail 1 off with cover, outpaced 10L back final turn, switched widest & dour stretch run for grinding gains.
Good break, raced handy on rail, hard-ridden & outpaced 400m, plugged on evenly.
Taken back from widest gate, raced 3 deep with cover behind midfield, hard-ridden into stretch, battled on for modest gains.
Good break, sat 3 deep handy, 4 wide & outpaced 500m, kept on at same speed.
Taken behind at break, slotted 1 off behind midfield, snatched off heels 700m & lost ground, unable to raise game in stretch.
Tardy break, raced midfield 1 of with cover, switched out & driven 500m, struggled in run home.
Speed to lead early, headed 1000m, snagged to sit handy 1 off with cover, lost ground 600m, wide into stretch, found nothing & eased down.
Speed to sit 2nd 1 off no cover, pressured to hold position into stretch, found nothing & faded tamely.
Slow break, last pair early, rolled 3 wide with cover to race midfield 500m, wide into stretch, relentless closer, led last strides
Smart break, taken back but unable to slot, rolled 3 wide no cover to 4th at 700m, shaken up & vied for lead final 250m, mugged last strides.
Good start, trapped 3 wide no cover, slotted 1 back 1 off 800m, driven to lead 300m, joined & duelled final 250m, tapered & headed last strides.
Snagged back to settle at rear, switched wide & advanced final turn, stayed on strongly centre track, just missed frame.
Broke to advanced position, eased to fore of midfield on rail, off heels 800m & 600m, shuffled back, closed off for good gains in stretch.
Fair break, speed to lead 1100m, eased to 2nd on rail 800m, sharply off heels 700m, hard-ridden in stretch, boxed on evenly to wire.
Fast start, snagged back to midfield 1 off with cover, shaken up but one-paced in stretch drive.
Broke well, raced rail midfield, off heels 800m, checked off heels 550m & lost ground, outpaced 400m, rallied for minor gains.
Broke well, lacked early pace, raced 1 off behind midfield, plugged on evenly in stretch.
Sharp start, raced 1 off to outright lead 800m, to rail 700m, headed under pressure 300m, weakened thereafter.
Sluggish start, raced rail near rear, off heels 800m, switched 1 off 500m, last pair turning in, tame effort.
Pressed forward, led by 2L on the fence in main bunch, not suited by the fast tempo, closed off strongly, dominated 150M.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leader on the rails in main bunch, favoured by the fast tempo, made steady ground 300M for 2nd.
Pushed to hold the rail in front, 2L off the leader in main bunch, not suited by the fast tempo, ran on well for 3rd.
Took rail easily, led by 6Ls ahead of the main bunch at fast sectionals, hung on well until 150M overhauled, ran on for 4th.
Behind midfield, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide in main bunch, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M.
Pushed early, settled 6Ls off the leader 2 wide in main bunch, suited by the fast tempo, ran on fairly in straight.
At back along the fence, 8Ls off the leader in main bunch, favoured by the fast tempo, made minor ground 200M.
Eased back, 3 wide, 8Ls off the leader in main bunch, benefited by the fast pace, just ran on ok.
Pushed forward, 2-3 wide, 3Ls off the leader in main bunch, not suited by the fast tempo, emptied 300M.
Behind midfield, 6.5Ls off the leader in main bunch, benefited by the fast pace, never improved.
Eased back, favoured by the fast pace, never progressed.
Always at rear, benefited by the fast tempo, never competitive.
Eased at start, too rail, suited by the fast pace, no progress.
Never a factor, tailed out.
Ridden forward from wide draw and raced 3-4 deep without cover to straight. Led 200m and kicked 50m when challenged.
Ridden forward but shuffled back approaching first turn. Kept wide back stretch. Ran on strongly final 400m.
Checked, lost ground start, checked again 800m, badly held up for run 200n, shifted out 150m, finished strongly.
No early speed, shuffled back to last first turn. Stayed there to final stretch, ran on well from 400m, denied 3rd place final strides.
Ridden up but trapped wide and drifted back first turn. Raced 3-4 wide at rear. Improved final turn and finished off nicely.
Ridden forward but trapped 3-wide with cover. Improved position final turn, had clear run in straight but only one-paced.
Ridden up from wide draw but held 3-wide first turn. Pushed to take 2nd back stretch. Looked chance 400m but one-paced.
Ridden to hold rail but swamped before first turn and dropped to rear. Near last 400m, ran past beaten horses.
Taken forward but wide, cutting in to rail first turn and clear leader back stretch. Set steady pace to 300m before swamped.
Ridden forward but not enough speed and dropped 3-back, one-off back stretch. Shuffled back final turn, found little under pressure.
No early speed and despite good draw was held 3-back, the fence back stretch and final turn. Faded final 200m.
Check shortly after start and raced towards rear. Dragged further back final turn, ran on 400m-200m, flattened.
Ridden forward to sit 2nd before first turn. Shuffled back to 5th back stretch, started to give ground from 800m.
Crowded start but pushed to lead to first turn, dropping to 2nd and then 4th back stretch. Gave ground from 400m.
Showed good early speed, travelled strongly just behind leader, responded well to lead nearing 200M, forged clear and was never in any serious danger.
Caught wide down the back-straight, slotted in behind midfield before home turn, had to be niggled along 600M out, stayed on well to take 2nd near line.
Rolled forward, led at a good pace one off the fence, kept on under pressure turning home, headed by winner near 200M, weakened late and lost 2nd close home.
Pushed along to hold a 3-wide spot in midfield, lacked instant acceleration turning in, did best work late to go 4th close home.
Rushed forward after the start, tracked leaders in 3rd, kept on same pace final 300M, never seriously threatened.
Dropped back to near last 6-7Ls off the pace, brought wide to challenge passing 400M, made limited progress.
Began well but unable to match the pace of leaders, nudged along to stay in touch, kept on same pace turning in, never threatened.
Settled along rails 3Ls off the pace, not quickened passing 400M, faded final 100M.
Lost ground at the start, settled near the rear, made no real progress over final 300M.
Switched off to last 7-8Ls behind leader, driven 500M but failed to pick up.
Taken to a rearward position, swung 3-wide home turn, found little passing 300M and was never a threat on his AWT debut.
Raced in midfield, never travelled, came under pressure 600M out, soon beaten turning in.

Broke well amongst leaders, hit the front 150 metres out, won comfortably.
Amongst leaders, outsprinted by winner inside final 100 metres.
Broke well, settled within three lengths of pace in midfield on stands rail, switched in for a run passing 300 metres, produced good late impression inside final 100 metres. (Blood in trachea)
Well there to 200 metres, faded gradually.
Prominent, one of the joint leaders coming onto course proper, faded under pressure inside final 200 metres.
Jumped awkwardly, settled in midfield, kept on steadily under pressure down the centre of the track.
Never far off, kept on without quickening inside final 200 metres.
Squeezed early stages, soon recovered to better than midfield and within two lengths of pace, kept on steadily without quickening inside final 200 metres.
Began fairly, not far off, faded inside final 200 metres.
Began awkwardly and unbalanced, settled in last few, producing late impression when baulked for a run 100 metres out.
Tightened at start, soon tailed-off, ran on well past beaten horses inside final 200 metres.
Jostled early, soon dropped behind midfield, made no impression closing stages.
Soon dropped behind midfield, then always struggling.
Broke well, with leaders through first 400 metres, gradually weakened.
Settled behind the speed 3 deep with cover. Kept finding under pressure in the home straight to score narrowly.
Didn't muster early settling 3 back the fence with cover. Hit the line strongly after switching out into uninterrupted running after the 200m.
Enjoyed the run of the race box seating. Finished off evenly, no excuses.
Taken back from a wide gate and settled in last position on the fence, had cover. Took inside runs in the straight and closed off with plenty of purpose.
From the outside alley, managed to settle around midfield 3 deep with cover. Closed off soundly.
Showed good gate speed and was able to take up the running in the early stages on the fence. Vied for the lead after the 800m, gave way after the 100m.
Camped close to midfield, 2 deep with cover. Didn't have the easiest of runs in transit but had no genuine excuses for failing to close off.
Raced on the bridle in the early and middle stages, & proved difficult to settle. Reluctant to maintain its position on the home turn, dour in the home stretch.
Parked behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Stayed on one paced in the home stretch.
Beaten for speed early but managed to roll forward and settled prominently, but coursed 3 deep no cover. Was a spent force at the furlong.
Jumped on terms then was eased early, to settle on the fence worse than midfield. Whacked away at the same speed in the run home.
Raced keenly in the early stages progressing forward to settle as joint leader, 1 off no cover by the 800m. Faded over the last 250m.
Ridden along in the early stages but settled with the backmakers, 3 deep with cover on the circle. Made no impression in the final stretch.
Showed no early speed settling 3rd last, 1 off with cover. Finished tailed out in the straight. (To trial)
Prominent, travelled 2Ls off the pace 2 wide, ran on well to score by a short head.
Ridden forward to take the rail, eased to obtain the box seat near 800M, fought on well in straight to get 2nd.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, ran on well to grab 3rd.
Eased to settle worse than midfield about 5.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, dashed well in straight.
Camped handy, travelled 2.5Ls behind the leader along the fence, kept on one pace to the line.
Rolled forward, gradually improved to take the rail and led by 1L, weakened over the last furlong.
Raced midfield, settled 6Ls off the pace on the fence, ran on only fairly.
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader along the fence, ran on fairly.
Lacked of early pace, dropped to settle 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide, ran on only fairly.
Began slowly, then travelled 7Ls behind the leader on the fence, stayed inside and ran on fairly.
Eased to rear from a wide gate, settled 8Ls off the pace on the fence, never look likely.
Taken back from a wide gate, travelled 9Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, no progress.
Sent forward to park outside the leader, weakened 250M, tailed out.
Raced midfield, settled 6Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, never a factor, tailed out.
Missed break, mustered to rail fore of midfield, switched out home turn, crowded 350m, shaken up 200m, burst through to lead late.
Good break from wide gate, caught handy 3 deep no cover, switched wider home turn, determined drive to lead 100m, headed last strides.
Taken back from wide gate, raced 1 off with cover near rear, switched widest final turn, driven 400m, swept centre track to grab 3rd last stride.
Bustled at break, settled handy 1 off with cover, switched out home turn, driven 400m, kept on soundly, edged out of frame at wire.
Fair break wide, caught 4 deep, slotted 3 wide with cover 1100m, driven to press lead 200m, no extra & one-paced.
Smart start, at 1 back on rail, driven 1 off to challenge lead 300m, led 200m, headed 100m & tapered.
Outpaced early stages, recovered to race rail behind midfield, ridden 450m, one-paced & stayed on for moderate gains.
Broke well, sat midfield 1 off, switched out turning in, crowded 400m, boxed on evenly.
Fast break to dispute lead 1 off, led & to rail 1200m, driven 400m, headed 200m, no extra, weakened in run.
Sluggish break, raced rail near tail, hard-ridden 350m, boxed on evenly.
Fair break, caught 3 wide with cover behind midfield, bustled 700m, driven & one-paced in stretch.
Taken back at break, raced 1 off behind midfield, found little in laboured run home.
Tardy start, raced at tail, driven450m, plugged on, never a factor.
Disputed early lead on rail, restrained to 2nd, switched 1 off no cover 1200m & over-raced, pressed lead 400m, emptied 350m, faded tamely.
Tardy break, bustled early to race fore of midfield on rail, switched out & shaken up into stretch, swept to lead 120m, drew away.
Sharp start to lead, soon to fence, shaken up 350m, headed 120m, battled gamely, no match for winner.
Fair start, settled 2nd 1 off no cover, joined leader 200m, unable to impose, held in run to wire as winner swept by.
Fair break, raced 1 back on rail, in pocket in stretch, shaken up 300m, not clear run 200m, closed out late.
Good break out wide, taken back to sit 3 wide with cover near rear, driven wide 400m, closed out well centre track.
Slowest to break, bustled early to race 3 deep with cover behind midfield, shaken up 400m, ran on for solid gains.
Fair start, soon niggled 1 off behind midfield, driven & outpaced 450m, switched inside & stayed on for late inroads.
Sharp break, taken back to race at tail on rail, ridden & switched wide final turn, solid inroads without threatening.
Good break, raced handy 1 off with cover, hard-ridden turning in, boxed on one pace.
Awkward break, over-raced early 3 wide no cover midfield, ridden 400m, plugged on evenly.
Bustled early, raced rail near tail, driven 400m, bumped & squeezed 150m, minor progress to wire.
Taken back at break to race 1 off near tail, hard-ridden 350m, one-paced to wire.
Sluggish break, mustered to sit rail midfield, had-ridden turning in, struggled in run home, off heels 150m.
Decent start, sat 2 wide with cover midfield, driven 400m, outpaced in run, drifted under pressure & eased.
Eased to rear, 7Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 250M to score.
Pushed forward and occupied a prominent spot, benefited by the slow sectionals, closed off well for 2nd.
Hard ridden to sit in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the slow pace on the rails, held up 400M, dashed well when clear.
Eased to rear, 9Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 250M.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, blocked 400M, dashed well when clear.
Behind midfield, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow tempo.
Hard ridden early, 5Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, little dash in straight.
At rear, 7Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, lack room in straight, dashed well 200M.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the slow pace 2-3 wide, no dahs, soon flattened 300M.
Pushed forward, sat just off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, emptied 200M.
Pressed forward steadily, took rail, led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, ran on until 200M weakened.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, no progress.
Eased back, harmed by the slow pace, never a factor.
Hard ridden to take box seat, suited by the slow pace, however soon dropped off 400M.
Not pushed and settled 3-wide with cover at rear. Switched wider entering straight and ran on strongly under pressure.
Made use of inside draw to slide along 3-back the fence to straight. Shaken up and ran home strongly between horses.
Taken back from wide draw and dropped to rear along fence. Was last 400m when taken out and finished strongly.
No early speed but kept away from fence. Had no clear run turning form home, taken very wide and finished off nicely.
Snagged back from wide draw and last along back stretch and turn. Switched out 400m and finished off nicely.
Settled between horses in midfield, shifted out 400m to make run but stopped in tracks. Recovered and flew final 200m.
Began awkwardly but recovered and taken to the front cutting to fence before turn. Kicked away 400m, still clear 200m, swamped final stages.
Allowed to find own feet along rails behind midfield. Got shuffled back around turn, one-paced final 400m.
Jumped well and raced with leading pack first 100m before taking box seat. Gave ground gradually final 400m.
Made to work from wide draw to go forward and trapped 3-wide without cover for most of trip. Gave ground in straight.
Jumped best but allowed to settle in 4th one-off the fence to and around turn. Found little under pressure in straight.
Jumped well from wide draw then made to work to swoop around field to sit outside leader. Gave ground soon after entering straight.
Dropped back to a rearward position, travelled well to straight, found a sustained run out wide, got up just in time for a back to back victory.
Showed good early speed, tracked leaders 2-wide, quickened to lead passing 300M, continued on well and was just denied close home by the fast finishing winner.
Held up in midfield, switched wide 600M, held every chance, ran on well to take 3rd and well clear from the rest.
Settled behind midfield, had to pull wide for his challenge inside 400M, stayed on without troubling the top three.
Taken back to last from wide barrier, well off the pace early stages but moved closer rounding the bend, stayed on mildly.
Driven vigorously to the front, sat behind leader from 1000M, produced with every chance but had no extra to offer passing mid-straight.
Dropped in behind midfield, bid 4-wide over the turn, kept on same pace final 400M.
Held up in mid-division, brief effort early straight, faded passing 200M. (Blood in trachea.)
Began only fairly, assumed a midfield position along fence, checked 350M and never had much room thereafter, eased final 100M. (Jockey reported his horse hung in under pressure.)
Tracked leaders, not able to pick up when the pace quickened nearing 400M, soon behind.
Sped to the lead, headed passing 300M, dropped away rapidly.
Settled on the outside of last pair, taken widest passing 400M, made no progress, eased when no chance final 150M. (Lame left front.)
Taken forward from outside draw and trapped 4-wide. Rolled forwad to lead 1400m then slowed pace. Kicked away 400m and kept on well.
Ridden up but unable get close to leaders and settled 3-back the fence. Got clear run entering straight and finished off nicely.
Ridden forward from wide draw to sit outside leader. Shaken up 400m and kept on steadily without threatening winner.
Ridden forward but trapped 3-wide without cover. Not happy with pace and fought rider. Kept on one-paced in straight.
Snagged back soon after start and raced behind midfield to turn. Taken wide 400m and ran on steadily.
Not suited by slow pace and raced between horses in midfield. Had clear run entering straight but only one-paced final 400m.
Taken to the front soon after start, grabbed rail and then gave up lead to drop 2nd, then 4th. One-paced in straight.
Bumped start and then caught 3-wide in midfield to turn. Not suited by slow pace and found little under pressure in straight.
Taken back across runners from wide draw and was last back stretch and turn. Widest into straight but one-paced.
Missed the start and dropped to rear. Shuffled back to last entering straight before running past tired horses final 200m.
No early speed and race at rear along fence. Took inside run entering straight but found little when asked.
Not pushed early and trapped 3-wide after jumping from wide gate. Put under pressure 500m but found nothing.
Bumped start, ridden up to hold 3rd initially before easing one-back, one-off to turn. Started to give ground entering straight.
Posted 3 wide without cover 2-3ls back, steady speed made job easier, dashed strongly turning and eventually won battle over final 300m to take solid victory.
Pressed on from a wide gate to sit outside leader, enjoyed a nice run with steady sections, in duel with eventual winner length on straight and lost out final 50m.
Raced 3 wide with cover, 5ls back in mid field, steady tempo no ideally to suit, followed eventual winner through turning but couldn't match dash, stuck on well for a clear 3rd.
Allowed to settle in midfield 4ls or so back in running line, fair run to bend, closed off evenly to make frame without threatening first trio.
Settled in rear division 6ls or so away in running line, less than even tempo not ideal, made ground approaching turn, closed ok making steady progress in run to line.
Unable to slot in and posted 3 and 4 wide throughout, worked hard with co cover 4ls back on bend, managed to hold ground evenly in straight which was creditable given workload.
Took an ideal role on leaders back, aided by steady tempo and used little to bend, lacked an extra gear to factor in straight and dropped off final furlong.
Assumed ideal role, 1 out 1 back, no excuses in run, in 3rd place turning, one paced when asked for effort and just battled away.
Showed speed to work across and lead, set terms to suit in front, headed soon after turning in and just battled away at one speed in straight.
Taken back from an outside alley, shared rear 7ls or so back racing 2 wide, pace against in mid-section, made some minor headway late from well back.
Drifted back from an awkward draw, raced 7ls or so away sharing rear, pace not to suit early on, well back turning, only passed tired runner late.
Ended up just off midfield 5ls from top end, unsuited by tempo in middle stages, took inside runs turning, just stayed on at one pace in straight.
Took a trail 3ls back on rails, enjoyed a quiet time in mid-section, struggling turning and gradually dropped off in straight.
Raced 3 wide behind midfield, had cover 6-7l;s back, well back turning and never looked likely.

Began fairly, soon took up narrow running on rails holding similar advantage throughout, just lasted.
Slightly slowly away, soon moved up to better than midfield position in 4th or 5th within two lengths of pace, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began well, travelled outside leader and eventual winner throughout drawing level briefly upon straightening, kept on steadily under pressure.
Began moderately, gradually improved along rails to be one back in 3rd, looked to hold some chance upon straightening, kept on steadily without quickening.
Settled well behind after beginning from the widest draw, switched wide for a run entering straight, ran on well to be nearest at finish.
Towards the rear, saved ground on rails turning in, fought on steadily without threatening.
Soon taken well back after beginning from a wide draw, saved a lot of ground on rails turning for home, fought on steadily in straight. (Tactic questioned)
Settled just worse than midfield, switched in for a run upon straightening, kept on steadily.
Began moderately, gradually improved to midfield, found nothing in straight.
Amongst leaders early, gradually shifted back to midfield and wide without cover, remained similar into straight, found nothing.
Began well from a poor gate, with leaders briefly before taken back to worse than midfield while raced keenly out wide, remained in similar position into straight, soon faded.
Close up early, shuffled back to two-length 5th around 1000 metre bend, wide without cover most of way down far side, dropped out into straight.
Settled in about 6th position, 1 off with cover. Pushed along after the 600m, responded well in the straight to take control 50m from the wire.
Enjoyed the box seat. Chased well down the running under hard riding.
Ridden along early & parked midfield, 2 deep with cover. Ran on gamely.
Settled in 2nd position, 1 off no cover. Hit the front near the furlong but was overhauled inside the 50m.
Taken back from a wide gate and settled back in the field, on the rails, with cover. Shifted away from the fence after the 600m, kept grinding away in the final stretch.
Settled 2nd from the rear, 1 off with cover. Box on steadily in the run to the wire.
Settled handy, in about 5th position, 3 deep no cover. Swung wide in the home straight and was dour in the run home.
Worked forward and eventually crossed to the fence near the 800m and dictated terms thereafter. Faded over the final 100m.
Fractious in the gates, missed the start then settled midfield the fence. Was one paced in the home stretch.
Didn't have the best run in transit, settling 3rd from the rear 2-3 deep with cover. Was under pressure before the home turn and only plodded to the line.
Travelled 3 back the fence. Had every possible chance, but failed to close off.
Settled in last position along the fence had cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Raced midfield, travelled 6Ls behind the leaders on the fence, stayed inside and dashed on strongly to score by 3/4L.
Camped handy, travelled nicely behind the leaders on the fence, peeled wide turning in, ran on well to grab 2nd.
Pushed forward to park outside the leader, moved forward and led by 1L 700M, hung on strongly until 150M for 3rd.
Raced midfield, settled 7Ls behind the leaders on the fence, little dash in straight without threatening.
Hard ridden forward to take the rail and led, steadied 700M to settle behind the leaders, one paced until 150M weakened.
Pushed to settle midfield, travelled 6Ls behind the leaders 2 wide, peeled wide and kept on one pace to the line.
Taken back to settle 10Ls behind the leader 2 wide, under pressure 600M, swung widest, however unable to show any dash in straight.
Settled worse than midfield about 8Ls off the pace 2 wide, failed to make any impression in straight.
Began fairly then steadied, settled 11Ls behind the leader 2 wide, never ran on.
Lacked early speed, travelled 10Ls behind the leader on the fence, never a factor.
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along, trapped 3 wide without cover until 600M, dropped quickly after straightening, tailed out.
Prominent most of the way until the Home Turn, flattened badly after straightening, tailed out.
Fast start, camped 2 back on rail, switched out 400m, driven to lead 150m, in command at wire.
Rousted widest gate to lead 1000m, hard-ridden & headed 150m, boxed on to wire.
Fast start, snagged back & caught 3 wide no cover behind midfield, widest into stretch, ran on centre track to grab 3rd last stride.
Speed to lead early, headed 1000m, settled handy 1 back on rail, ridden home turn, battled evenly, edged out of frame late.
Sharp start, settled 1 off no cover 2nd, hard-ridden home turn, outpaced in run & tapered.
Fair break, settled rail midfield, driven into stretch, kept on soundly at even tempo.
Missed break, recoverd to race 1 off with cover behind midfield, stayed on for minor inroads.
Taken back to race near rear 1 off with cover, plugged on one pace in stretch.
Rousted early, raced midfield 1 off with cover, driven under pressure 500m, one paced in run home.
Decent break, rolled 3 wide no cover to slot handy 1 off with cover 800m, forced wide final turn, all out & crowded 200m, no extra & faded.
Fair start, over-raced 1000m, settled near rear 1 off with cover, wide into stretch, found nothing, tame effort.
Tardy break, raced at tail on fence, soon slightly detached, unable to rally, never a factor.
Tardy start, bustled early, raced rail behind midfield, progress on turn, switched out under hard drive, strong closer centre track to grab lead late.
Stumbled & missed break, rousted early to race rail near rear, driven 500m, strong rail run, unable to match winner.
Awkward break, rousted to recover, raced rail fore of midfield, hard-driven home turn, led 200m, headed 50m, no extra.
Fair break, niggled early stages to settle 1 off behind midfield, shuffled back 800m, ran on solidly in stretch.
Snagged back to race near rear 1 off with cover, switched 3 deep 800m, hard-ridden 400m, widest in stretch, ran on for sound inroads.
Fair start, tracked 1 off with cover behind midfield, switched 3 wide 600m, forced very wide final turn, one paced in run home.
Taken behind at break to race at tail, ridden 400m, switched wide in stretch, boxed on for gains without threatening.
Sharp start, slotted 1 off with cover midfield, switched out home turn, crowded in stretch run, found nothing when asked.
Disputed lead to 1st turn, raced close 2nd on rail, niggled to lead 500m, kicked on into stretch, emptied & faded out from 200m.
Speed to dispute early lead, settled 3rd 1 off with cover, found wanting turning in, struggled in run home.
Fast break to lead, headed 1st turn & settled handy 3 wide no cover, all out 300m, faded tamely.
Rolled wide to lead 1100m, settled in front 1 off, headed under pressure 500m, weakened rapidly.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, made steady ground 300M, dominated 100M.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, benefited by fast pace and the rail trip, progressed steadily 200M for 2nd.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, ran on well for 3rd.
Very slow away, took rail at rear, 7Ls off the leaders, favoured by the fast pace, progressed steadily 250M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, just held ground in straight.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, ran on ok.
Shared the lead easily along the fence, not suited by the fast sectionals, hung on until 200M weakened.
Pushed to hold the rail in midfield, 3Ls off the fast pace, checked 400M, lack room 200M, just ran on.
Eased to sit behind the leaders, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the fast tempo, flattened 250M.
Pushed forward to cross, 1.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the fast pace, soon out of fuel 300M.
Pushed early but not muster, 4.5Ls off the fast pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, faded 400M.
Pushed forward, trapped 3 wide early, shared lead at fast sectionals 2 wide, dropped off quickly 350M.
Jumped well but taken back across runners to fence. Improved around turn, ran on strongly between horses in straight for narrow win.
Hard ridden from outside draw to lead before sitting outside leader around turn. Kicked 300m but swamped near line.
Began awkwardly but ridden up to sit one-back one-off into turn. Picked up momentum final 200m to be closest at finish.
Taken forward from good draw to grab box seat behind leaders before turn. Looked chance 400m but couldn't pick up.
Ridden up to grab rail inside early leader before taking narrow lead around turn. Collared 300m but kept on steadily.
Taken forward but trapped between horses into and around turn. Taken out 400m but unable to close in.
Ridden along early to hold midfield position one-off the fence, Swung widest entering straight but only one paced.
Ridden to hold rail but not enough speed and caught behind midfield. Brushed rail 600m. Found little when asked.
Ridden along early but trapped three-wide without cover. Covered extra ground around turn, found nothing in straight.
Fractious in stall, began awkwardly, bumped and unbalanced, dropping to last. Never likely thereafter.
Taken forward from start and trapped three-wide but with cover. Lost ground around turn, one-paced in straight.
Pushed and shoved from the start but did not travel at any stage. Performance considered to be unacceptable.
Positively ridden out the gate, settled 4th within striking distance, loomed 300M and gave immediate response when driven, led mid-straight and surged clear. Impressive.
Held up towards the rear, settled 6-7Ls off the pace along fence, switched out and driven passing 500M, stayed on strongly to go 2nd close home, no threat to runaway winner.
Settled behind midfield, saved ground on the inside but got held up when the race got serious passing 450M, ran on steadily up the fence but made no impression on winner.
Rolled forward chasing the pace, ranked alongside leader nearing 400M, produced with every chance, plugged on final 300M but never looked like winning.
Crossed to the rails soon after the start, tracked leaders in 3rd, briefly threatened early straight, outpaced final 200M.
Soon led under minimal urgings, set steady pace, caught up by pursuers near 200M, faded away.
Held up behind midfield along the 2-path, bustled along 450M, kept on same pace final 300M, never a serious threat.
Taken across behind runners from wide draw, patiently ridden in the rear, made limited progress when put to pressure passing 350M.
Switched off to near the rear 6-7Ls off the pace, driven 400M out, taken widest into straight but had little to offer.
Assumed a 2-wide spot in midfield, shaken up nearing the entrance of straight but was readily outpaced passing 300M, never a threat.
Pushed along early stages to maintain a position in midfield, found nothing on straightening and was another disappointing effort.
Failed to muster speed, raced back in the field and raced 3-wide no cover, under pressure home turn, got tired turning in, eased when no chance final 200M. (Lame next day.)

Soon taken back to rear of field from the widest gate, waited with, badly baulked for a run in straight until obtaining a clear passage 200 metres out, showed a great turn of foot to snatch victory near the line.
Settled in midfield on rails, switched out for a run upon straightening, ran on to hit front passing 100 metres only to be caught in final few strides.
Broke well to hold prominent positions, settling within three lengths of pace in third or fourth on rails far side, saved ground turning for home, kept on steadily without threatening.
Broke well to hold narrow lead attempting to make all, unable to sustain effort and swamped inside final 100 metres.
Began awkwardly losing ground, settled behind midfield on rails, came to challenge down inside after straightening, could only keep on at the same pace without quickening.
Began well settling mainly in midfield, kept on same pace under pressure in straight.
Raced wide well behind after beginning from a wide gate, commenced move halfway out and sustained headway out wide rounding home bend joining leaders into straight, weakened inside final 200 metres.
Jumped moderately, travelled in midfield most of way racing keenly around the bend, faded under pressure in straight.
Raced wide in better than midfield around stables bend, made swift headway to join leaders early far side, yielding ground when badly hampered over 300 metres out, never recovered.
Began fairly from a poor gate, never far off in third to straight, dropped away quickly inside final 350 metres.
Never seen with a chance.
Sent forward to take the rail and led by 1.5Ls at very slow sectionals, despite hung out rounding the turn, still able to hang on for win by 1/2L.
Began awkwardly, then pushed to settle 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite not suited by the very slow tempo, dashed on strongly for 2nd.
Raced midfield, settled 4.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite not suit by the very slow pace, ran on well to get 3rd.
Prominent throughout, despite benefited by the very slow pace, only kept on one pace to the line.
Taken back to rear, travelled 8.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, swung widest, dashed nicely despite not suited by the very slow pace.
Camped handy, travelled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, suited by the very slow pace, however unable to prove any extra in straight.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls behind the leader 3 wide without cover, harmed by the very slow pace, kept on one pace to the line.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, harmed by the very slow sectionals, kept on one pace to the line.
Rolled forward to sit 1.5Ls behind the leader, benefited by the very slow tempo, however 200M weakened.
Eased to sit midfield, 6Ls off the pace 2 wide, not suited by the very slow pace, blocked 4-3, failed to make any impression thereafter.
Taken back from a wide gate, harmed by the very slow tempo, never looked likely.
Taken back to rear, travelled 9Ls behind the leader on the fence, never ran on.
Jumped well, however eased to sit worse than midfield, 7Ls off the pace 2 wide, never competitive.
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along, dropped back to rear about 8Ls behind the leader, never a factor.
Tracked nicely behind the leader, challenged 300M, hit the front 150M, scored comfortably by 3/4L to take the trophy.
Showed plenty of speed as usual, under pressure 300M, stayed on gamely until 150M overhauled, not able to challenge with the winner.
Began awkwardly, then travelled 2Ls behind the leader, ran on well for 3rd.
Travelled 2Ls behind the leader on the fence, under pressure 400M, however kept on one pace only. (Questioned for disappointing performance, see incident report.)
Raced 2Ls off the pace, under pressure near the course proper, weakened 150M, never looked likely.
Niggled along throughout, settled 2Ls behind the leader, flattened 300M.
Niggled along throughout, never competitive.
Speed to lead, crossed to rail from wide draw, restrained to 2nd 1200m, switched 1 off 700m, quickened to lead 350m, maintained advantage to wire.
Rousted from gate, led 1200m & taken to rail 1000m, driven & headed 350m, dug deep & battled back but always held.
Good break, settled 1 off with cover midfield, off heels 700m & shuffled back, crowded home turn, switched wide & closed well to make frame.
Restrained in midfield along the fence, kept on same pace to the line and unable to get closer to the first two.
Smart break, raced 3rd 1 off no cover, edged wider 700m, hard-ridden into stretch, boxed on evenly.
Sluggish break & impeded early, raced tail 1 off, minor wide progress from 800m, widest into stretch, shaken up 400m, steady advance to wire.
Tardy start, bustled early strides, taken to rail midfield, under pressure turning in, kept on one pace.
Fast break, caught 3 wide no cover behind midfield, advanced 700m, shaken up 400m to press for 3rd, all out mid stretch & faltered final 150m.
Driven at break, settled 4th 1 off with cover, shuffled back & forced 3 wide 700m, pressed 3rd under hard drive in stretch, tapered final 200m.
Taken back to race near rear 3 deep no cover, overraced early, driven wide into stretch, plugged on steadily, switched off heels 150m & no extra.
Tardy break, raced near rear 1 off with cover, keen early, driven turning for home, struggled in run to wire.
Broke with others, niggled early midfield 1 off with cover, gradually drifted back, driven 800m, found little in tame run home.
Tardy break & bumped, to rail near tail, snatched off heels 1400m, driven into stretch, never comfortable & found nothing.
Sharp break, raced marginal 2nd on fence, edged to lead 600m, kicked on 400m, held on under determined drive.
Lacked pace from gate, rolled to rail midfield, shifted out & shaken up 430m, strong run to 2nd 100m, always held by winner.
Sharp break, settled fore of midfield 1 off with cover, off heels 1000m & over-raced a touch, rousted 430m, switched out & closed off to grab 3rd late.
Speed to lead narrowly, headed 600m, shaken up 430m, hard-ridden in pursuit, tapered & edged out of frame late.
Snagged back to behind midfield 1 off, switched out & driven final turn, outpaced initially, stayed on strongly.
Slow break, rousted at tail & initial progress to sit 3 from rear 3 wide, driven widest into stretch, closed off for decent gains.
Quick to stride, snagged back to tail, wide into stretch, switched wider 300m, ran on for sound late inroads.
Smart start, sat 1 off 1 back, driven 3rd final turn, soon under pressure & no extra 200m, swamped thereafter.
Good break & driven early to hold rail fore of midfield, ridden 600m, outpaced turning in, plugged home tamely.
Smart break, taken back to race near tail, last turning for home, boxed on for modest gains.
Good start, trapped 3 wide with cover fore of midfield, found little & faded in stretch run.
Smart break, raced 3 deep no cover close up, ridden turning in, soon emptied & weakened out.
Tardy start, niggled early to sit rail behind midfield, ridden 450m, one-paced in run home.
Fair break, bustled early & off heels 1200m, raced midfield 1 off, ridden turning in, unable to raise game & weakened.
Hard ridden to occupy the box seat, benefited by the slow tempo and the rail trip, lack room 400M, closed off strongly to score.
Hard ridden forward, sat just off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed the slow sectionals, bumped 400M, ran on well for 2nd.
Pushed early, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace, ran a creditable 3rd.
Pushed to take rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 100M overhauled.
Midfield along the fence, 4Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 300M, however run ended 100M.
Hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, little dash in straight.
Eased to rear, 7Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Rolled forward, 2.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout, not suited by the slow pace, flattened 200M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader on the fence, crowded for room 700M, not suited by the slow tempo, no turn of foot.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, no progress.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout, not suited by the slow pace, no dash.
Very slow away, harmed by the slow pace, always at rear.
Jumped best, led for 300m without being pushed. Dropped to 3rd turn, popped question 400m, hit front 250m, kept on well.
Jumped well but allowed to drift back. Followed winner into straight, tightened 200m, switched in and ran on strongly.
Ridden to grab rail then worked way forward to be 4th at turn. Got clear run straight and kept on well.
Taken back from wide draw but kept away from fence. Swung widest into straight and kept on to be nearest at finish.
Awkward start but ridden up to sit 3-wide behind midfield. Covered extra ground around turn but kept on well in straight.
Taken back from wide draw to grab rail. Improved position turn, had clear run straight but only one-paced.
Made use of inside draw, kicked up inside leading pack to hold 3rd initially, then 2nd. Hit front 350m before flattened.
Ridden to find cover, dropped bit 1000m and then reluctant between horses. Closed nicely when switched out straight.
Ridden up from inside draw and with leading pack but wide turn. Looked chance 400m but found nothing when asked.
Ridden forward from wide draw, swooped around leaders to become clear leader turn. Led into straight before tiring.
Ridden forward but trapped 3-wide. Checked and lost position. Hard ridden from 600m but travelled only fairly.
Jumped OK but not pushed and kept behind midfield. Raced tight between horse around turn, flattened straight.
Taken forward but trapped wide and raced without cover around turn. Tired soon after entering straight.
Held up 2-wide ahead of midfield, went head-to head with the eventual 2nd from 350M, stayed on well and came out on top final 50M.
Guided to a rail spot ahead of midfield, shifted out for a clear run passing 400M, dueled with the eventual winner from 350M, out-battled near the line.
Positively ridden from wide barrier, crossed to the fence and led slowly, kept on well turning in, headed by first 2 near 100M, hung on for 3rd.
Ideally positioned behind leaders but raced a shade keen, waited with until 300M, kept on steadily for 4th.
Positioned 3-wide in the group chasing the pace, left with no cover from 1300M, pressed leaders entering home turn, responded briefly turning in, faded inside 200M.
Dropped back to a rearward position, over 6Ls off the pace passing 400M, stayed on well.
Fractious in stalls, slow to begin, ended up in last well of the pace, made good progress from off the pace. (Lame left front.)
Travelled well enough into contention but didn't find a great deal when put to pressure, outpaced final 200M.
Restrained in mid-division, into clear 350M, failed to pick up, no impression on leaders.
Raced keenly from 1400M, rolled forward to race outside leader, gave limited response, run ended 200M and faded away.
Settled in mid-pack 5-6Ls off the pace, found little under pressure, never threatened.
Restrained behind midfield along the 2-path, found just the same gear when asked for everything.
Taken across from wide barrier, settled near last 8Ls off the pace, made no real progress when taken widest turning home.
Not hurried in early stages, held up behind midfield along the fence, outpaced passing 400M and looked uneasy in the home straight.
Jumped well but eased to 3rd around turn. Took inside run straight, closed steadily before surging ahead final 50m.
Jumped well and worked way to lead before turn. Kicked 350m but swamped 50m when shifted out under pressure.
Taken back from wide draw but kept away from fence. Swung widest into straight but closed off strongly.
Taken forward from outside draw and trapped wide without cover. Switched out 400m and kept on well.
Taken back to last from wide draw and raced greenly along fence around turn. Ran on well between horses final 400m.
No early speed and raced at rear into and around turn. Switched out entering straight and ran on steadily.
Not pushed early and raced behind midfield to and around turn. Taken wider 400m and ran on steadily under hard riding.
Taken forward but checked before turn, then bumped and unbalance 900m. 4th into straight, kept on one-paced.
Jumped well, pushed to lead initially and then raced inside leader to straight. Led for a few strides 400m before tiring.
Held rail but no early speed and dropped to behind midfield. Shaken up 400m but only once paced.
Taken forward but kept away from fence. Became unbalanced before turn but recovered. Flattened final 200m.
No early speed and then raced ungenerously back stretch. Near last entering straight, found little under pressure.
Taken forward but trapped wide and held in midfield to turn. Started to weaken soon after entering straight.
Jumped well and in box seat before racing greenly from 900m, hung out badly and weakened. Run ruled unacceptable.
Emerged to lead passing 1300M, set slow pace in the 2nd quarter, responded well off the bend and moved 2Ls clear inside 300M, kept on momentum to the line.
Reserved in midfield along the 2-path, quickened well once into clear passing 350M, did best work late, nearest finish.
Showed good early speed, soon crossed to the fence chasing the eventual winner, had every chance turning in but was always held.
Knuckled over at the start, sat 2-wide and never far off from leaders, didn't have the clearest passage until 100M but not going the pace to challenge when clear.
Restrained in midfield along the inside, kept on evenly up the fence final 400M but never seriously threatened.
Slotted into a 3-wide position in midfield, driven nearing 400M and ran on steadily, made some late impression.
Dropped back to a rail position near the rear, 6Ls off the pace in middle stages, drifted out to center of track for clear run, made some progress without threatening.
Held up 3-wide in the group chasing the pace, travelled well enough to straight but could run on at the same pace final 400M.
Harmed by the slow early pace and raced very keenly in a 3-wide position near last, travelled better home turn, stayed on mildly over final 400M.
Raced keenly, unable to find cover, caught wide and moved much closer to the lead than intended, kept on to 100M, weakened.
From wide barrier made some use to cross to the 2-path tracking leader, came under pressure 500M and found less than expected turning in, faded 150M.
Lost ground at the start, shaken up to assume a rail position behind midfield, taken out to center of track passing 400M, one-paced and never threatened.
Dropped back towards the rear, held up patiently, gave limited response when pressed, never going the pace to challenge.
Hampered after the jump, taken to the rear and raced much further back than intended, under pressure 500M and found disappointingly little turning in, never involved.

Well there racing along stands rails, quickened to lead over 300 metres out, won confidently.
Soon came to join leaders, outsprinted by smart winner over 300 metres out, held on well for second.
Slowly away, travelled well behind until making good late progress inside final 300 metres, nearest at finish.
Settled just off the pace, found nothing under pressure inside final 300 metres.
Shared pace to 400 metres, faded steadily inside final 200 metres.
Niggled along and amongst leaders early, faded under pressure inside final 300 metres.
Soon dropped to tail-end, never on terms.
Well there for first 400 metres, dropped out. (Mucus)
Enjoyed a nice run in the race after box seating. Took control at the furlong out and got to the line nicely.
Coursed 3 wide no cover while racing on the speed. Hit the lead near the 300m, kept on well.
Settled midfield the fence, had cover. Didn't have the clearest of passages in the straight, finished off soundly.
Not the best to begin, then camped 1 out 1 back had cover. Maintained a good gallop down the running.
Taken back from a wide gate and raced back in the field, 3 wide with cover. Lost ground when checked after the 800m, came wide rounding the home turn, finished off soundly.
Parked at the rear of the field, 2 wide with cover. Went for runs through the field and worked home steadily.
Didn't have much luck in running, posted 4 deep without cover on the circle, midfield. Whacked away at the same speed in the final stretch.
Ridden along early and dictated terms in front on the rails. Faded over the final 100m.
Ridden behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Struck traffic early in the straight, finished off one paced in the run to the line.
Ridden patiently, travelling behind the speed, 3 deep with cover. Under pressure before the home turn, failed to respond and was dour thereafter.
Settled back in the field, on the paint with cover. Made no impression in the run home.
Settled in last position, 3 deep with cover. Failed to close off.
Raced outside the leader in second position, 1 off no cover. Was a beaten horse early in the straight.
Sent forward along the fence, responded well when asked for run 350M, battled on gamely and scored by a short head.
Eased at start, gradually moved close to the leader, under pressure near the course proper, ran on well despite keep hanging out final 400M, missed by a short head. (Lost left fore plate)
Taken back, travelled 3Ls behind leaders, under pressure 400M, dashed on strongly for 3rd despite could not be fully tested over the final stages.
Prominent, under pressure near the course proper, stayed on well for 4th despite could not be fully tested over the final stages.
Lacked early pace, then settled 3Ls at rear, dashed well 200M.
Showed early speed as usual to share the lead, under pressure near the course proper, kept on one pace and never able to challenge.
Camped handy, under pressure near the course proper, finished off one paced.
Raced midfield, travelled 2Ls behind leaders, under pressure near the course proper, ran on fairly.
Jumped awkwardly then bumped, settled 3Ls behind leaders along the fence, ran on nicely when asked for run 400M, checked 50M, eased thereafter.
Began awkwardly, then gradually moved to the front, challenged 350M, inconvenienced 200M, checked 100M, eased down thereafter. (Bled & Lame right hind leg)
Raced greenly at rear, never competitive.
Pushed forward to share the lead, niggled along throughout, flattened near the course proper.
Showed some early pace, dropped off quickly near the course proper, tailed out. (Lost left fore plate & Shin sore in both front legs)
Always at rear, never a factor, tailed out.
Taken back at break, travelled smoothly behind midfield 1 off with cover, switched out home turn, shaken up 350m, swept easily to lead 150m.
Slow start, raced at tail, niggled & switched out for progress 600m, widest into stretch, strong closer to snatch 2nd late.
Broke with others, raced midfield 3 deep with cover, switched out 350m & driven, stayed on solidly to grab 3rd last stride.
Speedy break, snagged to stalk 1 back on fence, closed to 2nd turning in, hard-ridden 250m, battled on same pace to wire, lost 3rd on line.
Fast start, snagged to behind midfield on rail, not clear run & switched centre track in stretch, ran on for solid late gains.
Tardy break & bustled early, sat handy 1 off with cover, every chance into stretch, boxed on one pace.
Bustled to dispute lead, led outright on fence 800m, kicked for home in stretch, headed 150m, tapered out to wire.
Sluggish break, rousted to race near tail, last into stretch, stayed on for moderate gains, crowded last strides.
Broke well, driven to narrow early lead, settled back close-up 3 deep no cover 800m, ridden 400m, plugged on tamely.
Fair break settled midfield on rail, ridden turning in, found little for pressure & faded weakly.
Smart start, trapped 4 wide no cover midfield, niggled 600m, soon hard-ridden & weakened in run home.
Fast start & bustled to dispute lead, settled 2nd 1 off no cover, under pressure turning in, found nothing & soon faded out.
Smart start, raced fore of midfield 1 off with cover, switched wide home turn, smooth progress & quickened to lead 280m, commanding win.
Slow start, driven early to rail near rear, hard-ridden 7L back home turn, switched out & relentless run to steal 2nd late.
Tardy early strides, settled rail midfield, switched out home turn, shaken up 400m, chased hard for sound gains.
Sharp start, pushed on to dispute lead, raced handy 1 off no cover, closed on leader into stretch, kept on evenly to wire, edged out of frame late.
Taken back from widest gate, raced in rear on rail, ridden into stretch, ran on for sound gains.
Sluggish start, hard-ridden to muster to rail behind midfield, switched out for stretch run, kept on steadily.
Rousted at break to sit rail fore of midfield, switched 1 off 600m, boxed on evenly to wire.
Tardy start, taken back to last pair 1 off with cover, last & driven 430m, kept on for modest inroads.
Smart break, rolled wide to lead 1200m, to rail 1100m, shaken up in front 350m, soon headed & tapered out.
Speed at break, snagged back & across to rail behind midfield, driven wide into stretch, one paced in run.
Decent break, snagged back to race midfield 1 off with cover, wide into stretch, outpaced & never a threat.
Tardy start, raced near rear 1 off with cover, driven widest into home straight, never a factor.
Fast start to dispute early lead, settled rail 1 back, every chance in 3rd final turn, faded in run.
Good break, bustled to lie up fore of midfield 1 off with cover, driven turning for home, found nothing & faded tamely.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M despite all negative racing situations and scored.
Pushed early, 3Ls off the leaders along the fence, not suited by the slow pace, dashed well 200M for 2nd.
Box seat, enjoyed the slow sectionals, held ground for 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield early but trapped wide, moved forward 1200M to share the lead 2 wide at slow sectionals, dominated 400M, hung on until 100M flattened.
Very slow away, 5.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Eased back, took rail behind midfield, 5Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, lack room 400M and 100M, dashed well to the line.
Eased at start, 6.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, lack room 400M, dashed well when clear.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leaders 2 wide, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed early, 4Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, blocked 4-2, little dash when clear.
In front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, totally emptied 400M.
Pushed early, 2.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, held up 4-2, no progress when clear.
Hard ridden to take rail, shared lead at advantageous slow sectionals, reduced quickly 300M.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, however soon weakened 300M.
Eased to rear, harmed by the slow pace, trapped 3-4 wide, never competitive.
Ridden up from wide draw and trapped 3-wide without cover before turn. Shaken up top of straight, gradually gaining momentum to pull ahead close to line.
Pushed ahead from widest draw to sit outside leader before turn. Put under pressure 500m, took lead shortly after entering straight, kept on well when collared.
Taken forward to sit midfield but away from fence despite good draw. Covered extra ground turn, kept on well in straight.
Taken forward from wide draw and trapped 4-wide without cover. Covered extra ground turn but kept on steadily in straight.
Jumped well, cut in quickly before turn but held away from fence. Put under pressure from 500m and kept on steadily.
Made full use of inside draw to grab box seat behind leader. Hugged rail around turn but only one-paced in straight.
Jumped OK but not pushed and settled 2-back the fence into the turn. Entered straight behind horses but unable close in.
No early pace and shuffled back to near last but kept away from fence. No clear passage until late in straight but only one-paced.
No speed and trapped 3-wide dropping to last before turn, away from fence, Swung wide into straight and ran past tired horses.
Began only fairly and then crowded for space. Hard ridden but failed to muster and slipped to rear. One-paced final 300m.
Jumped well and took lead shortly after start, cutting in to fence before turn. Collared 350m and tired quickly.
Fractious in gate before start but jumped OK. No speed and slipped to rear. Taken wide and put under pressure 300m but found nothing.
Quietly ridden, settled near the rear 5Ls off leader, held up early straight but showed a powerful acceleration when gap appeared 300M, led 100M and lengthened away.
Sent forward to settle outside leader, moved strongly into contetion passing 450M, briefly led mid-straight but unable to match the finishing speed of the winner over final 150M.
Held up in midfield 2-wide, a shade keen early stages,switched to clear nearing 300M, stayed on to go 3rd close home.
Restrained near the rear, switched to 4-wide from 700M, ran on steadily but never a serious threat to first two.
Never far off from the pace, kept up the chase early straight, outpaced by leaders final 200M.
Tracked leaders on the inside, kept on one paced turning in, faded and no threat to leaders from 150M.
Shared lead at a steady tempo, driven out passing 400M, headed mid-straight, weakend and swamped inside 100M.
Settled at the back in a compact field, taken wide 500M but couldn't muster the speed to challenge.
3-wide chasing leaders early in, left with no cover from 1100M, not quickened under pressure, beaten at 200M.
Held up towards the rear along the inside, kept on same pace final 400M, never involved.
Jumped awkwardly but went quickly to the front before easing into box seat behind leader. Shaken up entering straight, hit front 250m and kept on strongly.
Taken forward to sit one-back, one-off into and around turn. Switched out to challenge 350m but unable to narrow gap.
No early speed and shuffled back gradually, becoming last around the turn. Swung widest into straight and ran on strongly.
A little slow to move and soon last on the fence. Improved slightly around turn and ran on steadily final 400m to be closest at finish.
Outpaced early before settling two-back the fence going into the turn. Got clear rails run entering straight and kept on steadily.
Outpace early and settled just behind midfield but 3-wide. Still well back 400m but was doing best work final 200m.
No early pace and kept away from fence despite good draw, entering turn 3-wide. Hard ridden from 400m but only once paced.
Buffeted by a couple of horses at start, ridden vigorously but unable to muster and trapped wide without cover. One paced final 300m.
Taken forward from wide draw but trapped 3-wide, two-back before turn. Lay out around turn and only one-paced in straight.
No early pace but cut in to fence shortly after start. Kept close to fence after that but only one-paced in straight.
Hard ridden to go forward from wide draw, taking clear lead before the turn. Looked chance entering straight before being flattened.
Taken forward from wide draw to sit outside early leader, dropping to 3rd before turn. Tired soon after entering straight.
Took a position on rails in midfield 5ls or so back, angled 2 wide on circle, let down with purpose final 300m, top two drew well clear but always had race in keeping scoring a cozy win.
Settled back with last few nearly 10ls of pace, suited by solid tempo, still had plenty to do turning, came to middle and produced a big finish to overhaul all but the winner, well clear of 3rd.
Taken down to fence and made good progress to be 5ls back on settling, kept making ground on rails to bend, lacked dash to match pace pair but stuck on well for a place.
Snagged back to take spot behind midfield 6-7ls back on fence, saved ground throughout, came wider in straight and made some even headway to make frame.
Pressed forward to take up running, set solid sectionals in front, held a 2ls advantage turning, soon overhauled inside 300m and couldn't hold off rivals late to make frame.
Ended up at rear 12ls or so away on settling, aided by solid tempo, saved ground on rails, closed off evenly from well back to be nearest on line.
Positioned behind midfield, 8ls back in running line, aided by speed on, came 3 wide on circle, made minor headway in the straight without threatening.
Went forward to race outside leader early, elected for a 1 out 1 back trail, did a bit on solid speed, there to turn, no real response final 300m when run presented, one paced.
Away only fairly, raced in midfield, 7ls or so back in running line, helped by solid tempo, came wider turning but just carried on at same speed in straight.
Taken back from a wide gate, shared rear10ls or so back, helped by solid speed, still plenty to do turning, only managed to pass a few tired ones late.
Began well enough and ridden along to hold a spot on the leaders back, used a bit sol solid speed, niggled turning, folded at 300m and dropped right back.
Standard break, unable to slot in and forced to race 3 wide without cover, did work with solid speed on, spent force on straightening and dropped off.
Positioned just off pace 3-4ls back in running line, fair run with pace on, didn't respond at business end and dropped out disappointingly in straight.
Caught 3 wide early but pressed on to race outside leader, did share on work with speed on, under pressure turning and faded soon after to be beaten a fair way.
Took up a spot in running line, 6ls back in midfield, travelled well with solid speed to suit, cruised into race from turn, drew away final 200m for an easy victory.
Got across to race on rails just behind first three, had a nice trail on circle 3-4Ls back, gained split turning and finished off nicely but found winner too strong final furlong.
No early Sped and settled behind midfield, 6ls or so back on rails, easy time to bend aided by speed, weaved between horses in straight and closed strongly from well back to take place.
Assumed a nice spot 1 out 1 back tracking a decent speed, 3-4ls back to bend, made a run straightening but lacked extra gear to threaten final 200m.
Took a forward spot as usual on rails behind leader, did share on work on solid tempo, kept to task in straight holding ground evenly to just miss frame.
Rolled forward to take lead, ran along at decent sections opening up a 3L break, came back to them turning, and faded inside 200m given early workload.
Settled in behind midfield, 7ls back in running line, suited by solid fractions, came 3 wide tracking eventual winner turning, lucked customary finish and just struggled late.
Drifted back and received a check on settling, ended up 8-9ls back, raced 2 and 3 wide with fast pace suiting, well back turning and made some minor headway without threatening.
Taken back to rear more than 10ls away at tail. Tempo suited but set impossible task on bend, passed a few in run to line.
Slotted into rails position in midfield, 5ls or so back, all favours using little in run, didn't find at business end and didn't see out extra journey dropping out from 300m.
No speed early, situated back with last few, 10ls or more off lead, pace helped, kept to rails turning and only passed well beaten ones.
Pressed on from a wide gate to sit first outside the leader, did share on work carting field up on solid sections.
Settled back with last fe3w 12ls from top end, decent tempo helped, still well back turning, showed noting in run to line.
Unable to slot in and posted 3 wide without cover in midfield, 6ls or so back to bend, did too much work covering ground with solid sections and capitulated in straight.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
