Settled in midfield, soon came to challenge upon straightening obtaining a clear passage passing 200 metres, soon asserted authority.
Jumped awkwardly, quickly ridden to recover to midfield on rails, sustained headway down home straight without threatening.
Ridden along in first few, two lengths back in 4th around the bend, kept on same pace without quickening.
Settled just off the speed in 5th, went wide into straight, quickened to hold some chance over 100 metres out, unable to sustain effort close to home.
Pushed along to hold prominent spot on rails, hit the front upon straightening, soon swamped under pressure inside final 100 metres.
Settled just worse than midfield, saved ground turning in, kept on steadily without quickening.
Vied for lead from a wide draw, remained 3-wide in close-up 3rd around the bend, faded gradually under pressure in straight.
Settled in forward of midfield two off the fence, swung wide into straight, ran home one-paced.
Jumped moderately from the worst draw, niggled along in rear of field most of way, saved ground turning for home, ran home one-paced.
Jumped from a poor gate, gradually shuffled backward towards the rear, made no show.
Tightened at start, always struggling well behind.
Soon took up running after beginning from a wide draw, remained one off the fence for remainder of race, dropped away quickly upon straightening.
Ridden with plenty of purpose from barrier rise to cross to the fence and lead after the 900m. Kicked clear early in the straight and won easily.
Taken back at the start & travelled behind midfield the fence, had cover. Railed up in the straight and finished off well.
Jumped on terms then settled 3 back the fence with cover. Finished off evenly.
Posted 3 deep ahead of midfield early, strode forward midrace to settle outside the leader 1 off, no cover near the 600m. Kept on soundly in the straight.
Camped fourth from the rear, 2 wide with cover. Stayed towards the inside in the final stretch and closed off satisfactorily.
Parked 3 deep worse than midfield with cover. Managed to shift in and travel 1 off after the 600m. Came wide in the straight and closed off evenly.
Settled in fourth position, 1 off, eventually obtained cover passing the 700m. Stayed on at the same speed in the run to the line.
Led early on the fence before handing up and box seating after the 900m. Had every chance but faded over the final furlong.
Raced at the rear of the field on the paint with cover. Made reasonable ground in the home straight.
Settled at the tail of the field, 1 off with cover. Failed to make any impression at the business end of the race.
Positioned just behind midfield, 2 wide with cover. Ridden along after the 700m to maintain its position but was a beaten horse passing the 500m.
Travelled with the backmakers 3 deep, mostly with cover. Failed to close off.
Sent forward to settle 3Ls behind runaway leaders at 3rd on the fence, ran on nicely to score by 3/4L.
Lacked early pace to cross from wide gate, settled 6Ls behind leaders 2 wide, finished off strongly for 2nd.
Hard ridden to take the lead along the fence by 3Ls, stayed on well to get 3rd.
Lacked early speed, travelled 9Ls behind leaders on the fence, closed off strongly in straight.
Eased back, settled 7Ls off the pace 2 wide, peeled wide and dashed well in straight.
Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls behind leaders on the fence, one paced without threatening.
Ridden along throughout, travelled 6.5Ls along the fence, kept on one pace to the line without threatening.
Taken back from wide gate, travelled 9Ls behind the leader on the fence, swung widest and made some ground in straight.
Prominent, settled 4.5Ls behind leaders 2 wide, weakened soon after straightening.
Lacked pace despite hard ridden along, travelled 7Ls behind leaders 3 wide, never looked likely.
Hard ridden forward to park outside the leader, faded sharply over the last furlong.
Lost a substantial amount of ground and consequently trailed the field throughout.
Mustered from wide to lead 1st turn, steadied pace in back stretch, quickened when pressed 600m, kicked on 450m, dug deep in stretch to prevail.
Pace to lead initially, crossed to 2nd on fence 1st turn, overraced 1100m, settled 3rd 1 back, switched centre track in stretch, ran on for 2nd last stride.
Smart start, settled 2nd 1 off no cover, pressed lead 600m, dueled with leader in stretch, tapered late & lost 2nd last stride.
Good break, raced rail midfield, switched out& driven home turn, sound closer until snatched off heels close home.
Awkward break, raced rail near rear, bustled 600m, driven & switched out home turn, boxed on for decent gains.
Fair break settled 1 off behind midfield, niggled 600m, very wide into stretch, ran on for solid inroads.
Taken back at start, settled near tail 1 off with cover, switched out for progress 500m, widest into stretch, stayed on for solid gains.
Sharp start, snagged back to midfield 1 off, over-raced 1100m, ridden 450m & wide final turn, plugged on evenly to wire.
Broke well, chopped on rail 1st turn, off heels & shuffled to midfield 1100m, driven 500m, one-paced in run.
Fast start, off heels 1st turn, settled handy 1 off with cover, niggled 4th 600m, found nothing in stretch.
Driven at break, soon at tail, hard-ridden turning in, unable to raise game in tame run home.
Fair break, bumped early, trapped 3 wide no cover midfield, rolled to race handy in back stretch, driven wide home turn, emptied rapidly.
Fast break, stalked pace in 3rd 1 back on rail, switched out to challenge in stretch, led 150m, held on well.
Fast start, snagged back to camp midfield, ridden 500m, switched wide into stretch, closed steadily under strong drive to snatch 2nd last stride.
Restrained to race last trio 1 off, well back turning in when switched wide & shaken up, strong late closer to grab 3rd at line.
Smart start wide, rolled to lead 1000m, kicked on 300m, headed 150m, no extra & edged out of frame late.
Broke with others, outpaced early & raced near tail on rail, 10L back & driven into stretch, closed soundly to wire.
Good break, settled midfield 3 wide no cover, driven turning in & widest into stretch, boxed on soundly without threatening.
Fair break & driven, bustled along behind midfield on fence, stayed on evenly under firm drive.
Good break, restrained to slot 1 off behind midfield, switched out home turn, stayed on steadily for minor inroads.
Sharp start to lead early, headed 1000m, settled 4th 1 off with cover, ridden 600m, switched out in stretch, one-paced in run home.
Good start from widest gate, trapped 3 deep with cover behind midfield, ridden 500m, wide turning in, found little.
Slow start, raced at tail, hard-ridden turning for home, struggled in run to wire.
Rousted early to lay up 2nd 1 off no cover, ridden 450m, all out 300m, soon emptied & faded out.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5Ls off the good pace on the rails, raced keen, progressed steadily 250M to score just by a neck.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 8Ls off the good pace, dashed well 200M, just beaten by a narrow margin in 2nd.
Settled in front of midfield, 3Ls off the good pace along the fence, lack room 300M, made steady ground when clear.
Hard ridden early, 3Ls off the good pace 2 wide, progressed steadily 250M.
Hard ridden to take box seat, pace good, just held ground in straight.
Pushed forward, took rail steadily and led by 1.5Ls at good pace, hung on well until 100M flattened.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 7Ls off the good pace 2 wide, ran on only fairly.
Pushed early but failed to cross in front, eased to sit in midfield, 5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, no turn of foot in final stages.
Eased at start, 8Ls off the good pace 2 wide, ran on fairly.
Hard ridden early, trapped 3 wide throughout in midfield, 4Ls off the good pace, out of fuel 300M.
Very slow away, never better than midfield, emptied 300M.
Hard ridden from wide draw to go forward, 4-wide into first turn before taking clear lead 1200m. Joined by runner-up 300m but kicked again close home.
Jumped well and 2nd early before easing back to take box seat back stretch. Got inside run 350m, joined leader 300m but couldn't match final kick.
Checked and unbalanced start, checked again 1200m. Forced to shift out twice when close to heels. Three-wide at the 500m, hung in straight but kept on well.
Ridden forward but trapped wide before first turn. Zoomed around horses to sit outside leader 1000m. Looked chance entering straight but unable close gap.
Eased back soon after start then hampered 1200m dropping to last back stretch. Swung widest into straight and ran on steadily.
Eased back from wide draw and initially last but away from fence. Started to move forward turning for home and kept on steadily straight. Lame right front.
Made full use of inside draw to hold the fence but shuffled two-back when outside runners cut in before turn. Kept on steadily straight without looking a threat.
Outpaced early and raced in midfield along fence. Made steady ground final stretch before running into a dead end close home. Not ridden out.
A little slow to muster and then checked before first turn, dropping to rear. Taken wide entering straight and ran on steadily to be closest at finish.
Jumped well and raced with leaders before easing off 3-back, one-off back stretch and turn. Shifted in and bumped 200m turning one-paced.
Taken forward to sit 3rd initially. Steadied and unbalanced 1400m, tover-raced, came off the bridle 800m. Bumped 200m when one-paced.
Missed start then crowded for room. Raced fiercely into first turn and severely checked 1200m. Steadied 1000m dropping to near last. Made ground early straight before checked 200m and dropped back.
Got across nicely to race 3ls away on rails, soft run in mid-section, ridden for luck and improved along inside in straight, gained run final 150m to dash through and score with a bit in hand.
Showed customary speed to take up running, set terms to suit to bend, kicked well and held on until 100m when winner gained advantage.
Took an ideal spot 1 out 1 back, all favours in run, dashed well in straight and kept finding to just miss 2nd.
Raced 3 wide in midfield with cover, even run despite covering ground, switched wider and finished race off nicely down middle just missing a place.
Assumed ideal spot on leaders back, had good run to turn, in traffic on straight and kept on fairly without clearest running final 200m.
Pressed on from a wide gate to race outside the leader, easy time with fair sections, matched leader turning and in mix until 150m when unable to hold on.
Checked early and ended up 5ls or so away on rail, behind midfield throughout, saved ground turning and closed off well enough along rails to be nearest on line.
Back with last few 6ls or so away on rails, always well back to turn, made some progress from too far back weaving between runners in straight.
Settled just behind midfield, 5ls back in running line, came 3 wide turning in, made moderate progress in straight.
Posted 3 wide without cover, 3ls or so back, did share of work in mid-section, struggling turning and gradually folded final 300m.
Positioned behind midfield 5-6ls back in running line, fair run to turn but set big task turning, made moderate progress before inconvenienced, not likely.
Unable to slot in and forced back to rear from a tricky alley, 7ls back at rear, always at tail and made no real impression (see racing incidents).

Began fairly, settled just off the pace on rails, joint 3rd into straight, fought on steadily to just prevail in the bobbing of heads.
Never far off on rails, came to challenge under pressure upon straightening, fought on dourly to be just denied in a ding-dong battle.
Settled behind midfield, switched out for a run over 250 metres out, ran on steadily while shifting ground.
Broke well, ridden early but soon settled just better than midfield and without cover, switched out for a clear run 200 metres out, ran home one-paced.
Began moderately, disputed lead to straight, hit the front briefly when front-runner dropped out, overhauled inside final 100 metres.
Jumped awkwardly, settled in midfield on rails, kept on steadily without quickening.
Began well, gradually settled just worse than midfield off the rails, remained similar entering straight, fought on steadily without threatening. (Blood in trachea.)
Soon taken back from the widest draw, trailed the field to home bend, ran on past beaten horses.
Soon outpaced, ran on past well-beaten horses in straight.
Always struggling in last few.
Vied for lead early travelling prominently 3-wide down far side, remained similar turning in, soon dropped out.
Broke well from the one draw to hold narrow lead, made running to straight, dropped away quickly. (Bled)
Travelled back on the speed in 3rd position 1 off no cover. Drew clear after the 200m, and scored easily.
Parked midfield on the rails with cover. Had every chance in the final stretch, kept on evenly towards the inside.
Raced in 5th position 1 off the fence with cover, kept on same speed in the run home.
Taken back from a wide gate and settled with the back makers on the paint with cover. Ran on well to make the frame.
Camped midfield the fence with cover. Peeled out rounding the home turn, had some traffic problems until the 100m, never really obtained full running.
Travelled worse than midfield, 1 off with cover. Was dour in the run home.
Led along the fence, had outright lead after the 1200m. faded over the final 200m.
Raced close to midfield, 2 deep with cover. Made some ground rounding the home turn but ended its run well short of the line.
Travelled in about 2nd last position, 1 off with cover. Failed to make any appreciable ground in the final stretch.
Raced in last position on the fence with cover. Finished off steadily.
Worked forward and challenged for the lead briefly near the 1200m, parked in second position tracking the leader along the fence with cover. Gave in quickly after the 400m.
Failed to muster speed despite being ridden along and was posted 3 deep without cover for most of the trip behind midfield. Never likely.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, travelled 1.5Ls behind the leader, enjoyed the fast sectionals, ran on well to score by 1/2L.
Eased to settle worse than midfield about 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide, enjoyed the fast tempo, finished off strongly for 2nd. (Jockey reported the horse was making an abnormal respiratory noise)
Eased back from a wide gate, settled 8Ls behind the leader 2 wide at rear, favored by the fast sectionals, peeled widest and dashed well to get 3rd.
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along, settled 5.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast tempo, stayed inside and ran on well for 4th.
Hard ridden forward to park outside the leader at fast sectionals, kept on one pace to the line.
Taken back from the outside gate, settled 6.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast tempo, made some ground in straight.
Sent forward to take the fence and led by 3/4L at fast sectionals, out of fuel 100M.
Camped handy, settled 3Ls off the pace, under pressure rounding the Home Turn, never looked likely.
Pushed to obtain midfield position, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, under pressure 700M, unable to show any dash in straight.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, under pressure 600M, never a factor, tailed out.
Pushed forward from a wide gate, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, dropped quickly 600M, tailed out. (Questioned for disappointing performance, see incident report)
Speed to dispute lead initially, restrained to 2nd 1000m, tracked 1 back on rail, switched out on turn, shaken up to lead 250m, sprinted clear.
Smart break, dropped-in midfield 1 off , switched out 500m, shaken up turning in, to 2nd 100m, closed off well.
Slow break, bustled to midfield on rail, niggled 600m, driven final turn, boxed on gamely to take 3rd late.
Fast start to dispute lead, led outright 1000m, driven 300m, headed 250m, no extra & tapered.
Good break, settled midfield 1 off with cover, ridden 300m, plugged on evenly for pressure.
Tardy start, rolled on a touch to rail behind midfield, shaken up 300m, boxed on one pace.
Taken to rear, raced last pair on rail, driven & switched out 300m, lacked pace, stayed on for modest late inroads.
Good start, raced 1 off no cover fore of midfield, wide & driven home turn, struggled in run to wire.
Fair break, raced 1 off behind midfield, ridden final turn, switched wide in run, kept on same tempo.
Fast break, snagged back to rear, raced 3 wide no cover near tail, switched wide into stretch, plugged on past beaten rivals.
Fair break, trapped wide no cover midfield, rolled to 3rd on fence back stretch, driven home turn, found nothing & faded tamely.
Fair break, lacked pace, gradually dropped back until driven at tail 600m, drifted wide in stretch, never a factor.
Smart break, slotted midfield 1 off with cover, switched out & driven home turn, quickened to lead late for cosy win.
Sharp break, sat 1 off with cover fore of midfield, smooth progress wide final turn, to lead 300m, kicked on, all out & headed close home.
Broke well, settled midfield 3 wide with cover, niggled 800m & driven 500m, wide into stretch, closed off steadily to grab 3rd late.
Sluggish start, sat 1 off near rear, niggled 500m, switched out turning in, ran on for sound late gains, narrowly missed frame.
Good start, raced rail midfield, switched out 400m, hard-ridden & checked off heels 250m, boxed on for solid gains.
Awkward start, raced last pair, advanced 3 wide in back stretch, driven wide home turn, closed for late gains.
Missed break, taken behind to race in rear, last turning in, boxed on for minor gains.
Tardy break, trapped wide no cover midfield, rolled to sit handy 3 wide no cover 1000m, disputed lead 400m, found little, boxed on one pace.
Fair break, rolled to lead 1500m, challenged under pressure 400m, no extra, plugged home tamely.
Speed to lead, headed 1500m, settled close 2nd 1 off no cover, pressed for lead 400m & led briefly turning in, soon headed & faded.
Smart start, raced handy 1 back on rail, ridden turning in, found nothing, weakened out.
Tardy break, raced rail near rear, hard-ridden turning in, found nothing & faded out.
Slow away, pushed forward to share the lead 2 wide, clocked slow sectionals, ran on well to score.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed the slow pace, hampered 500M, dashed strongly 200M for 2nd despite all negative racing situations.
Hard ridden to occupy a more prominent spot, 3Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, blocked 4-2, dashed well when clear.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, made early move around the field 4 wide, dashed well 300M, run ended 100M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 250M, but run ended 100M.
Very slow away, 7Ls off the leaders along the fence, held up 4-2, dashed well when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
In front of midfield, 3Ls off the leaders on the rails, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 150M.
Behind midfield along the fence, 5Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow pace, blocked most straight, little dash when clear.
Hard ridden to take rail and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, ran on until 200M flattened.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the slow pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, flattened 250M.
Pushed to obtain box seat, enjoyed the slow tempo, out of fuel 200M.
Midfield, 3Ls off the leaders, raced 3-4 wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, flattened 300M, bumped 150M.
Pushed ahead from wide draw to take clear lead into back stretch. Set steady pace, quickened 300m out and held off challengers.
Taken forward to sit just behind early leader, then eased one-back, one-off back stretch. Switched out 350m and closed in steadily.
Jumped OK but got head up turning into back stretch, falling 2-back, the fence. No run early in straight, shifted out 300m, kept on steadily.
Ridden forward from wide draw and trapped 3-wide into back stretch, Rolled forward to sit outside leader before home turn. One-paced in straight.
Shifted out start and bumped another runner. Raced greenly into back stretch before settling one-off at midfield. Kept on steadily.
A little slow to muster but cut in to rail entering back stretch. Started to move forward turning for home and finished off nicely.
Began fairly before racing awkwardly on heels turning into back stretch. Switched out 350m to make run but drifted out under pressure.
Jumped best before snatching box seat behind leader. Travelled on and off bridle to 700m, switched out 400m but unable quicken. Weakened under pressure from 300m.
Bumped and unbalanced start, shifted in for cover behind midfield. Taken out entering straight but found little under hard riding.
Began awkwardly and then bumped. Bumped a second time first turn and then refused to settle. Checked on heels back stretch. One-paced straight. Lame left front.
Hampered start, beaten for early speed and trapped 3-wide first turn. Was last into home stretch, taken out 300m and drifted wider under pressure.
Taken back from wide draw and cut in to rail entering back stretch. Second-last into home straight and found nothing under hard riding.
Tracked leaders 2-wide, put to pressure 450M, took time to get going, did best work final 200M to score back to back victory.
Held up 2-wide behind midfield, stayed on well final 250M to go 2nd near line.
Led at steady tempo, kept on well turning home and was only worn down in the closing stages.
Settled midfield along the fence, driven nearing 400M, stayed on under pressure but not pace of first 2 over final 100M.
Quickly crossed to the fence, always prominent behind leaders, had every chance turning in, kept on same pace final 200M.
Restrained to s position behind midfield, switched away from fence nearing 400M, closed off mildly and was never a serious threat.
Held back to a race near the rear, travelled well down the back straight but found less than expected when put to pressure 400M out, no threat inside 200M.
Not hurried in early stages, settled midfield along the 2-path, not quickened when asked on straightening , weakened over 200M out.
Restrained in a 2-wide spot behind mid-division, nudged along passing 600M, unable to show his usual acceleration, never threatened.
Settled on the outside of rear trio, taken back to last for cover near 1000M, brought wide to challenge passing 400M but found disappointingly little.
Made some use early, pressed leader on the outside, came under pressure 400M, dropped out mid-straight.
Switched off to the rear, 8Ls off the pace in middle stages, swung widest into straight, soon beaten.
Ridden up with field but trapped 3-wide with cover into back stretch. Switched out entering straight and finished strongly to win on the line.
Crowded start but recovered to hold position 3-back the fence. No run early in straight, switched out twice to find passage, ran on well to just fail.
Taken back after start but unable to find cover and raced wide mostly. No clear running from 250m to 150m, taken wider and finished off well.
Began well and soon in box seat. Found run between leaders entering straight, kicked clear 300m, looked winner before swamped final strides.
Ridden up from wide draw and trapped 3-wiide into back stretch. Found cover before final turn. Kept on steadily in straight.
Jumped best before giving way to inside runner. Sat outside leader back stretch and turn, but unable quicken straight. One paced final stages.
Taken back from wide draw and cut to rail entering back stretch. Stayed on fence in straight to be closest at the finish.
No early place and slipped to behind midfield away from fence. Entered straight behind horses but ran on steadily when clear.
Taken back from wide draw but held 3-wide early before dropping to last and cutting in to rail. Stayed on fence and ran past tired horses.
Taken forward but unable to find cover and trapped 3-wide for most of the journey. Started to give ground 300m and checked 150m.
Taken forward from inside draw to sit one-back, one-off along back stretch and turn. Started to give ground soon after entering straight.
Made use of inside draw to hold fence and take lead at first turn. Led field into straight but weakened after being caught 300m out.
Tardy getaway, settled at rear 7ls or so away at tail, always at rear to bend and set big task, weaved between horses in straight producing huge finish last 200m to score with some in hand.
Took a nice spot on leaders back, had a nice trip with even speed on, right there turning, gained split inside 200m and hit front only to be denied inside 100m.
Settled a bit closer than usual in 1 out 1 back spot, had nice run throughout, came into it under riding turning and fought on creditably to take a placing.
Pressed forward to race outside the leader, had fair run at even sections, wasn't given any peace by outside horse throughout, hit lead turning, battled away soundly as usual to make frame.
Average break, tried to go forward but caught 3 wide with cover 4ls back in midfield, switched out turning in and made some headway to be nearest on line.

Pressed forward from an outside gate, worked hard and still unable to slot in and posted 3 wide without cover, still up there turning and battled well in straight just fading last 100m after a hard run.
Taken back from a wide gate, raced 3 wide towards rear, 5-6ls back, set a task when switched wider on bend and made minor progress without looking likely.
Dropped back from a tricky gate, raced back with last few 5-6ls back, plenty to do turning, came widest in straight but just made average headway and peaked at 150m.
Even break, raced 3-4ls back on rails, no excuses in run, in some traffic turning but was one paced when clear.
Settled behind midfield on rails, 5ls or so away, used little in run, pushed along on bend, stuck to inside but made only fair progress in straight.
Landed a spot in midfield, 4ls or so back in running line, reasonable trip in mid-section, didn't offer much from turning and lost touch final furlong.
Showed usual sped to take up running, set even tempo but was given attention by outside horses, still there turning but soon stopped when additional journey took toll.

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Settled in worse than midfield, commenced move over 400 metres out, ran on under pressure to assert authority inside 100 final metres.
Settled in prominent positions one off the rails, switched out for a run entering straight, ran on steadily but only to be outsprinted by winner closing stages.
Settled in midfield, held slight chance when produced for a run upon straightening, failed to quicken to threaten.
Jumped moderately, soon took up running setting a lively pace and establishing a good margin middle stages, remained clear of others turning in but overhauled inside final 100 metres. (Jockey warned)
Waited with, finished off race well.
Settled well behind from a wide draw, saved ground on rails turning for home, made steady headway in straight.
Settled behind midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, ran home one-paced.
Settled in prominent positions on rails, stayed close to the rails turning in, dropped out tamely in the run home.
Went forward from a poor draw settling wide behind midfield, swung very wide turning in, went home one-paced.
Went forward from a poor draw settling just off the speed far side, remained similar to straight, soon weakened.
Broke well, soon given reminders to pick up speed, raced wide in midfield around stables bend and far side, weakened rounding home bend.
Settled in prominent 3rd two off the rails and without cover, yielded ground from approaching home bend.
Enjoyed the run of the race after box seating. Darted through along the rails early in the straight and had the race in its keeping a furlong out.
Settled third last from a wide gate on the fence with cover. Never looked comfortable after racing tight inside runners near the 600 & 500m. Ran on strongly.
Handy early before settling midfield the fence, with cover. Kept to the inside in the home straight maintained a sound effort down the running.
Parked just ahead of midfield, 1 off with cover. Looked an each way hope early in the straight when placed under hard riding, finished off evenly.
Settled midfield, about 3 deep had some cover on the circle. Kept on steadily in the run home.
Speared forward and led along the fence after the 800m. faded over the final 150m.
Taken back at the start, settling worse than midfield 1 off the fence. Only plodded to the line.
Raced worse than midfield, 3 deep with cover. Came wide in the straight but failed to close off.
Raced 3 wide early on the speed, eventually took up 2nd position outside the leader, no cover. Was under pressure after the 400m, weakened over the latter stages.
Copped a bad check early, settling at the rear of the field, 3 deep with cover. Never recovered and finished well back.
Posted on the speed, 3 deep without cover for most of the journey. Conceded ground easily in the home straight.
Raced in last position, some lengths from the body of the field near the rail. Failed to respond at any stage to riders efforts and struggled for most of the trip.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, ran on well to score by 1-1/4Ls.
Raced midfield, settled 3.5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, dashed well for 2nd.
Pushed to sit midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader on the rail, stayed inside, closed to the line well to get 3rd.
Pushed forward to take the rail and led by 1.5Ls, kept on well until 100M flattened.
Hard ridden forward to settle 1.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, one paced home.
Eased from wide gate to settle 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, swung widest, finished off only fairly.
Raced midfield, settled 3.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, niggled along throughout, kept on one pace without threatening.
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along, then travelled 3 wide and without cover throughout, never looked likely.
Began slowly, then travelled 9Ls behind the leader on the fence, checked 600M, made some ground in straight despite raced greenly throughout.
Taken back from wide gate, settled 6.5Ls off the pace on the fence, never ran on.
Always at rear, never a factor.
Raced midfield, 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, dropped quickly 250M.
Held up from gate, camped 1 off with cover near rear, shaken up 500m, switched wide for stretch run, steamed to lead 50m for easy win.
Speed to lead 1600m, pressed 800m & kicked on soon after, extended into home turn, all out & headed 50m.
Smart break, trapped 3 wide no cover fore of midfield, rolled on from 1100m to press lead 800m, outpaced & driven 500m, boxed on soundly.
Snagged back at start, sat midfield 1 off, switched out 450m, solid centre track run to just miss frame.
Smart break, raced handy 1 off with cover, flat-footed & driven 400m, stayed on well to wire without threatening.
Good break, sat 1 back on fence, niggled 700m, driven in pursuit 450m, to 2nd turning for home, tapered final 100m.
Fast break to dispute early lead, soon settled 2nd 1 off no cover, lost place & niggled 600m, kept on one pace.
Bumped start, taken back to 1 off behind midfield, hard-ridden turning in, kept on evenly.
Bumped & impeded start, raced rail near rear, switched out & shaken up 300m, plugged on same speed.
Smart break, trapped wide early, soon slotted rail near tail, driven 700m, found little in run home.
Awkward break, bustled early to race rail midfield, under a drive 500m, found little & struggled in stretch.
Tardy start, struggled at tail throughout, hard-ridden & detached turning in, never a factor.
Fast break, bustled to lead, kicked on into stretch, kept on well to win.
Decent break, raced rail midfield, progress on turn, driven 300m, strong closer to 2nd 150m, closest at wire but held.
Sharp start, sat 1 back on rail, progress to 2nd final turn, unable to reel in leader, lost 2nd 150m, kept on to wire.
Awkward break, rousted early, raced rail behind midfield, battled on under pressure for decent gains.
Good break, sat midfield 1 off with cover, travelled well into stretch, shaken up 250m, boxed on without threatening.
Good start, slotted handy 1 off with cover, driven 450m, one paced in run home.
Broke with others, settled behind midfield 1 off with cover, switched out 400m, driven wide into stretch, kept on same tempo.
Broke well, driven initially, raced 2nd outside leader no cover, ridden under pressure 450m, faded in run home.
Taken back at break, raced 1 off last trio, plugged on tamely in stretch.
Broke with others, caught 3 wide no cover behind midfield, widest into stretch, found nothing & weakened out.
Dropped back from wide gate, sat 3 wide with cover last trio, driven into stretch, found nothing & well beaten.
Snagged back at start, raced rail last trio, driven at tail 600m & lost ground, struggled in run & never a factor.
Crossed in front easily, sat 1L off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed the slow sectionals, closed off well to win.
Pushed early, 5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M for 2nd.
Hard ridden to keep up in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 200M for 3rd.
Settled in midfield, 5Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, blocked 4-2, dashed well when clear.
Hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, benefited by the slow sectionals, flattened 200M.
Slow away, 6.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, little dash in straight.
Eased at start, too rail at back, 9Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow tempo, lack room most straight, dashed well to the line.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, however soon weakened 300M.
Eased at start and took rail, 10Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, lack usual dash.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, 10Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 9Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Restrained some 2 lengths behind the others and away from fence until final turn. Got clear inside run, surged forward final 50m for narrow win.
Ridden forward but held wide initially before easing one-off, one-back. Started forward move 500m out, took lead 200m, swamped near line.
No early speed but got to fence on settling, racing on own towards rear until joined back stretch. Peeled out widest in straight and ran on nicely.
Ridden forward early before easing 3-back, 1-off entering straight first time. Kept on steadily till final turn, peeled out 400m to make run but only one paced.
Trapped 4-wide first turn, then 3-wide from 1800m before rolling forward to sit outside leader 1200m. Second into home straight but found little final stages.
Jumped well but not pushed and settled behind midfield along fence. Swung 3-wide into home straight but found nothing under hard riding.
Jumped well and led around first turn before easing off to hold box seat from 1800m. Had clear inside run turning for home but only once paced.
Began fairly and tightened 2000m. Ridden up but trapped wide first turn. Continued to roll forward to take lead 1800m. Gave ground after turning for home.
Jumped best and led for a few strides before easing off. Travelled nicely middle stages but unable to keep up when field speeded up. Tired final 300m. Lost right front plate.
Held up patiently in midfield, cornering well into straight, stayed on best of all, led nearing 50M.
Set early pace, sat behind leader from 1100M, quickened well down the inside passing 300M, led mid-straight until the winner edged past nearing 50M.
Driven along leaving stalls, caught 3-wide without cover outside the leaders, kept on steadily final 300M, ran well under the circumstances.
Dropped back to the rear, 7-8Ls off the pace in middle stages, made good progress up the fence on straightening.
Tracked pace, ranked alongside leader 600M, kept on steadily, not pace of first 2 final 200M.
Dropped back to a rearward spot, 6Ls to make up passing 400M, ran on steadily from off the pace.
Settled towards the rear, brief effort turning home, flattened out inside 200M. (Lame next day.)
Guided to a 2-wide position towards the rear, swung widest for home, made limited progress final 300M.
Taken across from wide barrier, held up along the fence behind midfield, taken wide to challenge passing 400M, kept on same pace.
Chased leaders along the 2-path, travelled well enough to straight but denied clear run from 300M to 200M when the race got serious, closed off one-paced final stages.
Shaken up early, settled 3Ls back from leader, gave limited response turning in, faded final 200M.
Driven early, crossed to the lead 1100M , slowed things down in the 3rd quarter but had little left when the pace quickened inside 300M, weakened to last.

Began from a poor gate, gradually settled one off the rails in midfield, gained closer around the bend and hit the front over 200 metres out, won readily.
Began fairly, settled on rails in midfield, checked and lost position on top of home bend, produced good late impression under pressure inside final 100 metres.
Began well, settled in rear of midfield, switched out to challenge upon straightening, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began well, gradually taken back to settle just over one length off the speed 2-wide in 3rd, hit the front briefly turning in but swamped for a placing close to home.
Began fairly, settled on rails in 4th just over two lengths off the speed, switched out for a clear run on straightening, ran home one-paced.
Began moderately, driven along to take up running 1300 metres out, steadied pace around the bend, headed entering straight and weakened out of contention inside final 200 metres.
Began fairly, settled just worse than midfield, shuffled further back when hampered rounding home bend, saved ground turning in, made steady late headway.
Began fairly, settled towards the rear on rails, awkwardly placed behind runners when pace slackened on home bend, ran home one-paced.
Soon taken across in rear from the widest gate, remained well behind until taking closer order out wide when pace slackened on home bend, 2.5 lengths back in 5th turning in, soon weakened.
Close up on rails, folded up quickly on straightening.
Began awkwardly, soon settled well behind, soon detached in straight. (Heart irregularity)
Sent forward and led along the paint. Made every post a winner, repelled challenge for most of the home straight.
Hard ridden early, settled in 2nd position, 1 off no cover. Fought gamely in the final stretch, just missed out by a bob of the heads.
Camped 3 deep on the speed no cover. Kept on willingly in the run home.
Ridden patiently, eventually settling worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Worked home soundly.
Traveled behind midfield, 3 deep with cover. Finished off steadily.
Slow to begin, travelling at the rear of the field, close to the rail, had cover. Made reasonable late ground.
Had every possible chance, box seating. Was a beaten horse near the furlong.
Began awkwardly, settling with the backmakers, on the fence with cover. Kept to the inside in the home straight, failed to close off.
Travelled keenly midrace whilst positioned close to the fence, midfield. Never fired.
Parked close to midfield, 1 off with cover. Failed to lift when asked for an effort in the home stretch.
Went back from a wide gate and settled 3 deep with cover. Was dour in the straight.
Ridden along early, settling behind the speed, 2 wide with cover. Struggled down the running.
Detached from the field until 800M despite hard ridden along, still 8.5Ls behind the leader rounding the Home Turn, benefited by the fast tempo, dashed very strongly to score by a head.
Sent forward to park outside the leader, hung on well for a photo 2nd despite harmed by the fast sectionals, very good effort.
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, closed to the line well for 3rd.
Pushed forward to settle 2Ls behind the leader 2 wide, enjoyed the fast pace, had every possible chance in straight, however only kept on one pace.
Hard ridden forward to take the rail and led at fast sectionals, stayed on well until 100M weakened.
Eased back as usual, travelled 7.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, suited by the fast tempo, however ran on only fairly.
Camped handy however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, under pressure rounding the Home Turn, never looked likely.
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along, travelled 7.5Ls behind the leader 4-5 wide, never competitive.
Began awkwardly, then travelled 6Ls off the pace 3 wide, never a factor.
Hard ridden throughout, travelled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, flattened over the last furlong.
Raced midfield, settled 5.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, unable to quicken in straight, eased 250M, tailed out.
Pushed forward, however trapped 4-5 wide without cover throughout, dropped quickly in straight, eased 250M, tailed out.
Smart start, sat midfield on rail, switched out on turn, shaken up 350m, driven to lead 150m, in command at wire.
Tardy break, held up rail near tail, progress & switched out 400m, shaken up 300m, closed off to claim 2nd late.
Taken back from wide gate, raced at tail, ridden turning for home, switched out 400m, sound progress through field to grab 3rd last stride.
Sharp start, led 1200m, narrow advantage until clear lead into turn, kicked on 350m, all out & headed 150m, edged out of frame last stride.
Fair break bustled early to sit handy 1 off with cover, boxed on evenly in stretch.
Fast break to vie for lead, settled close 2nd 1 off no cover, one-paced in home stretch pursuit, tapered close home.
Good break, settled midfield 1 off with cover, forced wide into stretch & driven, laboured in run home.
Smart break, over-raced early 1 back on rail, driven turning in, one-paced & weakened closing stages.
Fair start, settled near rear 1 off, driven turning in, found little, plugged on same speed.
Sluggish start, bustled to race rail behind midfield, niggled on turn, plodded on tamely under pressure.
Smart start, taken back to 3 wide with cover behind midfield, lost ground on turn, last & widest into stretch, plugged on moderately.
Tardy break, raced behind midfield 1 off with cover, driven turning in, struggled in run home.
Broke with others, caught 3 wide no cover handy 3rd, shaken up turning in, one-paced when badly impeded 350m, not a factor thereafter.
Fast start & prominent early strides, caught 3 wide & drifted back to midfield, found nothing in stretch & faded out.
Dwelt start, made to work to sit on hind quarters of leader first turn. Drew level entering straight, hit front 300m, kept on well.
Jumped well, made for rail to sit 2-back the fence first turn. Peeled out 600m and made ground steadily but unable catch winner.
No early speed and soon at rear along fence. Switched out 600m but no clear passage and forced to switch out further before finishing off nicely.
Beaten for early speed and slipped behind midfield away from fence. Taken out midway through final turn and ran on steadily under whip.
Ridden forward from wide draw to take lead before first turn. Caught by winner turning for home but kept on steadily until flattened 100m.
Hard ridden from start but failed to muster and then taken back across runners. Lost position turning for home but made late ground in straight.
Jumped well and soon in box seat behind leader. Peeled off fence to make run 400m but only one paced.
Began well to take up position one-back, one-off. Was taken 4-wide entering straight and boxed on one paced.
Taken forward to sit two-back, one-off first turn and back stretch. Hampered and taken 3-wide 600m. One paced under whip in straight.
Slow to move and soon last along rail. Improved position first turn and back stretch. Under whip entering straight but found little.
Unable cut in early and held 3-4 wide first turn before slipping towards rear. Taken 3-wide momentarily 1200m. Urged 400m but found nothing.
Dwelt start, unable to muster and dropped back to last. Was 2 lengths behind others entering final turn. Ran passed tired horses.
Soon on rail but shied before first turn. Put under heavy pressure from 600m but did not muster. Ridden hands and heels final 400m.
Trapped 4-wide entering first turn and taken back across runners. Weakened entering home straight. Run ruled unacceptable.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leaders 3-4 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, made steady ground 400M, battled in 2nd most straight, fought back just prior to the line.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leaders 3 wide, favoured by the fast pace, progressed steadily 400M, once dominated 100M, however overhauled just prior to the line.
Hard ridden forward, 2.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the fast tempo, held up 4-2, ran on well for 3rd.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, flattened 200M.
Settled in front of midfield along the fence, 3.5Ls off the leaders, suited by the fast tempo, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden to cross in front, shared lead 2 wide at fast sectionals, soon out of fuel 300M.
Slow away, 8Ls off the leaders at rear, benefited by the fast pace, ran on fairly.
Hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the leaders 3 wide, harmed by the fast pace, emptied 250M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, no progress.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leaders 3 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made good ground 300M, deteriorated dramatically 150M.
Hard ridden but not muster, checked early, never better than midfield.
Never a factor at rear.
Midfield, checked 1200M, 4Ls off the leaders 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, faded 300M.
Hard ridden to take rail and shared lead, clocked fast sectionals, dropped off rapidly 400M.
Ridden up from start to take lead on settling, moving closer to outer rail. Kept on well under hands and heels riding to win tidily.
Missed the start and last on settling. Inched forward approaching track proper, started to dig in final 200m to be closest at finish.
Jumped best and went straight to outer rail. Raced with chasing pack to 400m when drifted in slightly under pressure. Kept on steadily.
Ridden up to race alongside chasing pack. Moved to clear second entering course proper, no extra final 200m.
Held up last in a compact field, ran on steadily down the stands' rail, not beaten far.
Raced behind leading pack to course proper. Shifted in 350m to find clear passage and finished off nicely.
Jumped OK but caught on wrong side of track and raced on own down middle of the course. Lay in most of the way.
Ridden along early, got head on side and lay out 800m. Tighted for room 400m, kept on one-paced.
Began awkwardly but recovered to join chasing pack until course proper. Gave ground from 200m.
Began well and held second spot early before dropping to fourth. Under pressure from 400m and emptied 200m.
Travelled strongly behind leading pair, quickened smartly passing 300M under hands and heels riding, went well clear, won unextended.
Settled behind midfield with cover, steadied when the race got serious passing 300M, shifted out to challenge 200M making good late progress.
Held up midfield not far off from leaders, ran on steadily final 300M to go 3rd near line but no threat to runaway winner.
Tracked leaders, close enough when the pace quickened, kept on steadily without ever threatening the winner.
Cut out the early running and held every chance, outpaced by winner passing 250M, swamped and beaten to 5th near finish.
Right up with pace but found disappointingly little when let down, weakened over final 100M. (Lame right front.)
Never far off from leaders, kept on same pace under pressure, not a threat from 200M.
Broke well, restrained to the rear but never too far off from the pace, made no real progress when put to pressure inside 400M.
Restrained behind midfield, niggled along halfway, not able to quicken up when the race got serious. No impression.
Settled midfield, came under pressure halfway, never able to challenge, faded over final 200M.
In touch with leaders along the Stands' rail, not quickened under pressure inside 400M, soon out of contention.
Unable to go with the early pace, settled near rear, shaken up mid-way, not quickened and never in contention.
Held up in midfield, badly outpaced passing 300M, eased when well beaten over final 200M.

Placing: PU
Comment: Towards the rear of the field, action deteriorated passing halfway, eased down by jockey. (Lame left front.)
Ridden along early to settle three-back, one-off. Taken out entering straight, made ground steadily before surging ahead final 50m.
Jumped OK but became unbalanced and shifted in 1200m. Improved position turning for home, dug in 200m to just miss.
Began awkwardly but recovered to sit 5th, racing on his own into final turn. Picked up bit, hit front 300m, kept on until swamped 50m.
Began best but held away from fence by inside runner and settled one-back, one-off. Found run between horses 350m and kept on to line.
Made use of inside draw to hold box seat before turn. Boxed in 400m, checked 350m, no run till 200m then blocked again. No tested.
Jumped OK, checked 1200m when close to heels. Switched out top of straight but found little under hard riding.
Trapped 4-wide back stretch before taken back across horses to fence. Last into straight and ran past tired horses.
Taken out soon after start and dropped to rear. Under pressure turning for home but put head on side and drifted out.
Made use of inside draw to hold fence half a length inside leader. Drew level turn but gave ground after entering straight.
No speed and allowed to drift back from wide draw to sit second-last off the fence. Taken out 400m but found nothing.
Jumped well and soon in lead. Was joined by another half way around final turn, and emptied in straight.

Slotted into a midfield spot, 3-4ls away in running line, got race to suit with pace on to early, tracked into race 3 wide turning and let down with a strong dash, kept on task for a narrow but deserved victory.

Took up a prime position on leaders back, had fair run with decent sectionals, right there and waited for inside run straightening, in a 3 way battle final 300m and was touched off by winner final 50m.
Restrained form a wide gate, ended up 7ls back at rear, aided by even tempo, still last on fence turning, closed of nicely along inside in straight making many lengths to get up for 3rd.

Away slightly better today, held a spot on rails in midfield, 4ls or so back, fair run to turn, in between horses until 300m when saw some daylight but failed to dash, just stayed on evenly to make frame.
Average break, settled behind midfield on rails 5ls off top end, soft run throughout saving ground on bend, angled into clear inside 300m and closed off ok without looking likely.
Began well, took up nice position 1 out 1 back, bit keen first bend, produced 3 wide at 400m and went to front, lost advantage inside 200m and didn't finish off despite being steadied at 100m.
Pushed along early but couldn't muster, settled 5ls back in running line, helped by tempo, back in traffic turning, made steady ground without threatening.
Came across to race 3 wide with cover from outside alley, 3-4ls back to turn, lacked turn of foot to factor and plugged on until 200m before dropping off.
Restrained from a tricky gate, raced 8ls back at rear, helped by speed on early, well back to bend, made minor progress in straight.
Unable to go early pace and raced 3 wide at rear, 6ls from lead, aided by speed but covered extra ground coming 5 wide bend, no extra final 300m.
Out fairly but pressed on and used a bit to race outside leader, forced to work again rounding bend with a challengers wider, gave in tamely at 300m and dropped right off (see racing incidents)
Trapped wide from outset from a wide draw, 3 wide without cover in midfield, 3-4ls back on bend, understandably dropped out when workload took effect.
Showed early sped to take lead, set solid tempo early, given attention by outside horse throughout, kept advantage until 350m but was soon passed and weakened right out.
Pressed on when caught wide to take closer order, no better than 3 wide without cover working early, 3ls back beginning to struggle turning, folded to be beaten a long way.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began fairly, shared pace off the fence before obtaining rails run coming out of back straight, gained clear advantage turning in on rails, hung on well to score.
Ridden along down amongst leaders far side after beginning from the widest draw, taken to one-out-one-back position around the bend, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Jumped fairly, settled just better than midfield, midfield coming out of back straight, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Began moderately, settled in last few, shifted off rails entering straight, finished off race well.
Began fairly, close up but remained one off the rails, obtained rails run just behind leader coming out of far side, kept on one pace under pressure without quickening.
Began from the widest gate, ridden along out wide without cover far side, disputed lead rounding home bend, gave ground steadily from home turn.
Slowly away, gradually improved along rails to be close up in 5th, steadied and lost position 600 metres out, saved ground on rails turning in, ran home one-paced.
Tightened at start losing ground, gradually recovered under pressure to travel towards the rear, similar turning in, ran past well-beaten horses.
Tightened at start, settled in last few, ran past well-beaten horses under pressure.
Soon taken back to rear of field from a poor draw, niggled along at tail-end until awkwardly placed around the bend, kept on at the one pace in straight.
Broke well, settled in midfield, met minor interference coming out of back straight, weakened under pressure in straight.
Settled in forward of midfield mainly 4-wide far side, wider turning for home, never recovered.
Made its run from 2nd last position, 1off with cover. Swung wide on the home turn & rattled home to clinch victory over the concluding stages.
Parked midfield, 2 wide with cover. Made the home turn close to 7 deep and ran on well.
Camped in last position, 2 deep with cover. Made a midrace move and looped the field to race outside the leaders, 3 wide without cover. Cornered deep and shifted out down the running, kept on gamely.
Had every conceivable chance after box seating. Railed up in the straight, hit the front briefly near the furlong but was mowed down over the final 100m.
Travelled in 4th position, 2 wide with cover. Kept plugging away in the straight, no excuses.
Settled worse than midfield, 1 off with cover. Improved midrace 3 deep with cover to travel not far from the leaders. Cornered with 1 wider, stayed on reasonably.
Traveled worse than midfield the fence. Kept to the inside in the home straight and battled away fairly.
Raced back in the field, on the paint with cover. Finished off dourly.
Settled close to midfield, on the rails with cover. Stayed towards the fence in the home straight, kept on one paced.
Did some work early to cross and race 1 off in 2nd position, no cover. Faded over the final 200m.
Settled towards the rear, 2 wide with cover. Struggled in the final stretch.
Sent forward and led along the paint at a moderate clip. Was a beaten horse early in the home straight.
Taken back from a wide gate, settled 6.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, stormed home impressively 200M to score by 1/2L.
Prominent, travelled 2.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, dashed well for 3rd. (Promoted to 2nd after the interference at 200M)
Sent forward to take the fence and led by 1L 800M, fought on well to get 2nd. (Relegated to 3rd after the incident at 200M)
Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on well to grab 4th.
Ridden forward to take the rail and led until 800M, then eased to take box seat, kept on one pace to the line.
Camped handy, settled 1L behind the leader 2 wide, kept on steadily despite got its head on the side and lay in early straight, not far off from the winner.
Eased back as usual, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, under pressure 400M, ran on only fairly.
Began awkwardly, then settled worse than midfield about 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, never ran on.
Ridden forward, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, dropped off after straightening. (Jockey was reminded to ride out to the finishing line)

Raced midfield about 3Ls behind the leader, trapped 3 wide with cover throughout, never looked likely. (Jockey reported the saddle shifted back in the middle stage, placing him at a disadvantage for the remainder of the race)
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along, settled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, never competitive.
Crowded start, then raced 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, under pressure 600M, dropped off thereafter, tailed out.
Sharp break, settled 2nd on fence, shaken up home turn, relentless drive to lead 100m, kept on under pressure.
Broke with others, initially 3 wide no cover midfield, bustled to 4th 1 off no cover, progress final turn, stretch drive to 2nd 100m, held at wire.
Missed break, taken to rail & raced near tail, 10L back when shaken up & switched out final turn, rattled home late, just missed 2nd.
Broke with others, rousted early, raced rail fore of midfield, switched out home turn, closed off soundly under strong drive.
Shot to lead from gate, 3 deep into 1st turn, clear & to rail 800m, kicked into stretch, drifted across track & headed 100m, no extra & faded.
Fast break, settled 3rd on fence, driven turning in, one-paced in run to wire.
Started well, snagged back from wide gate to 1 off behind midfield, switched 3 deep & driven 400m, widest into stretch, boxed on no threat.
Bustled from gate, bumped & unbalanced early, sat rail midfield, every chance turning in, plugged home tamely.
Slow break, bumped early strides & niggled at tail, switched out & bustled 600m, modest late inroads in final stretch.
Taken back from gate, impeded 1100m, sat rail near rear, hard-ridden into stretch, plodded on same speed.
Fair break, bumped rival 1100m, raced midfield 1 off with cover, shifted wide home turn, found little for pressure, faded in run.
Awkward break, taken back near rear 1 off with cover, driven 500m, found nothing & weakened in stretch.
Began well and grabbed box seat behind leader. Got clear inside run entering straight, led inside 200m, kept on well.
Ridden up from wide draw to sit four-back, one-off back stretch. Six-wide entering straight, lay in under pressure but kept on nicely.
Ridden forward from good draw to be 2nd at first turn before shuffled back to 4th. Switched out entering straight and kept on steadily.
Allowed to find feet and drifted towards rear but away from fence. Ran on between horses in straight, doing best work final 100m.
Ridden forward but trapped wide and made to work around first turn to sit behind leader. Hit the front 350m before no extra under pressure.
Began awkwardly and then hampered, dropping to near last. Took off at the 600m, widest into straight but kept on steadily.
Made use of good draw to hold rail, 3-back from leader. Closed in entering straight before turning one paced final 200m.
Jumped well and cut in before first turn to sit 3-back, one-off. Peeled out 600m to make challenge but only one paced.
Taken back across horses from wide draw but away from fence. Ran on steadily in straight before checked 200m. One-paced after.
No early pace and raced at rear. Shuffled back to last final turn but was making ground when tightened and shifted out 150m.
Taken forward from wide to take clear lead first turn. Increased tempo back stretch, collared 350m, emptied.
Allowed to find own pace and settled behind midfield until straight when found little under pressure and fell back.
Settled in midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, dashed well 250M to score.
Eased to sit in midfield early, however trapped wide, moved forward 1000M, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, closed off well, led 250M, overhauled 100M.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, dashed strongly 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
In front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader along the fence, not suited by the slow pace, checked 400M, blocked 3-1, dashed well when clear.
Pushed forward, box seat, benefited by the slow sectionals, just held ground in straight, bumped 100M.
Eased at start, took rail at back, 7Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well in straight, however held up and checked 150M.
Pushed early but failed to muster, trapped 3 wide throughout, 4Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, ran on well to the line despite all negative racing situations.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 1.5Ls at slow sectionals, hung on until 200M, weakened.
Hard ridden forward, 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, flattened 200M.
Eased at start, always at rear, 9Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Eased at start, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Jumped in front but eased into box seat first turn. Came off fence entering straight, found run between horses and finished off strongly.
Jumped well, took lead on settling, before slowing pace back stretch. Headed 800m, regained lead 300m, kept on well to line.
Ridden up to sit behind leaders but wide. Rolled forward 800m when pace slacked, led into straight, kept on well when headed.
Ridden forward but trapped wide and took first turn awkwardly. Tried to find cover 800m but 3-wide final turn. Kept on to line.
No early pace and dropped to last, cutting in to fence. Found inside turn turning for home and doing best work at the finish.
Jumped awkwardly, then steadied in midfield along rail. Kept on steadily without looking dangerous. Close on heels final stages.
Raced on and off the bridle, proving difficult to settle back stretch. Hard ridden from 600m to hold position but finished off nicely final 200m.
Jumped well from wide draw and ridden forward to sit being leader first turn. Shuffled back to 3rd 800m, one paced under hard riding final 300m.
Taken forward but wide early and started over-racing from 800m. Found run between horses 400m but only one paced.
Bumped and unbalanced shortly after start, dropping to rear but away from fence, Moved forward entering final turn but found little in straight.
Jumped OK but awkwardly placed back stretch when pace slackened. Got close to heels 500m, one paced final 400m.
Taken back from wide draw and in last pair off fence to straight when broke down and pulled up.
Never too far away in a slowly run race, driven out near 400M, finished well, in charge final 100M.
Driven forward from draw 1, led from 1200M, kept on well under pressure 350M, not pace of winner final 150M, held on for 2nd.
Settled near rear, saved ground on the inside but held up to 350M, closed off well to go 3rd 50M from home.
Tracked leader, loomed a threat turning in, all out, run ended 50M from home.
Taken back to last, switched to clear 250M, did best work late, nearest finish.
Settled towards rear, driven 350M, stayed on well down outside for a close 6th.
Held up midfield along the 2-path, pushed along into straight, kept on without ever threatening.
Restrained in midfield, never far off leaders, kept to inside turning in, stayed on same pace final 200M.
Raced prominently from the outset, brief effort turning home, outpaced mid-straight, eased when no chance final stages. (Lame next day.)
Taken across from wide barrier, held up behind midfield, not going the pace to challenge when driven out 300M.
Eased back to the rear before first turn, 6-7Ls behind leader in a slowly run race, brought widest to challenge passing 400M, found disappointingly little. (Lame left front.)
Held up 3-wide behind midfield, left with no cover from 1200M, came under heavy pressure 500M and didn't respond to riding, soon beaten. (Unacceptable Performance.)
