Settled just off the pace on rails, chased 3L behind leader around the bend when pace quickened, hit the front when leader died on its run over 250 metres out, just lasted.
Began fairly, settled mainly in forward of midfield on rails, ran on steadily down straight to be nearest at finish.
Travelled in 4th in even pace despite the fast second section, fought on steadily in straight without quickening.
Settled in midfield and without cover, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began fairly, ridden along early settling just worse than midfield to straight, ran on quite well under pressure down the centre of the track, did best work late.
Began fairly, settled just worse than midfield, ran on steadily in straight, never nearer.
Settled just off the pace early, became 3rd over 3L off the fast pace around the bend, kept on in straight before fading inside final 100 metres.
Settled in last few, saved ground on rails turning in, produced good late run down the inside of straight, nearest at finish.
Settled in last few to straight, produced good late impression.
Broke well, settled in forward of midfield, kept on same pace in the run home despite steadied 200 metres out. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Soon dropped to last few, kept on steadily in straight.
Missed the break, soon recovered to midfield on rails, checked and lost position over 800 metres out, recovered ground on rails turning in, kept on before finding no extra inside final 200 metres.
Never on terms. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Broke well, ridden to soon take up running setting a fast second section around the bend going 3L clear, folded up quickly inside final 250 metres. (Tactic questioned)
Travelled behind midfield, 3-4 deep with cover. Came wide rounding the home turn, out dueled rival in the home stretch, scored nicely.
Jumped on terms, and then drifted back to race at the tail of the field, 2-3 wide with cover. Fought gamely down the running.
Jumped awkwardly, raced keenly in the early stages, travelling behind midfield, the fence. Held up for running until the 200m, motored home.
Positioned just ahead of midfield, 3-4 deep with cover on the circle. Hit the lead midway down the final stretch, battled away only fairly, in the run to the line.
Settled worse than midfield, 2 wide with cover. Finished off steadily.
Camped back in the field along the fence, with cover. Struck traffic problems in the home straight, finished off soundly.
Parked midfield, 3 deep with cover. Plugged away in the final stretch, was checked near the 50m when tiring.
Settled in 2nd position, eventually box seating near the 600m. Failed to find any extra in the home stretch.
Raced in last position, 2 deep with cover. Was a long last early in the straight, worked home steadily passing tiring runners.
Worked its way forward, coursed 3 wide without cover until about the 600m, and then took up a position outside the leader. Was a spent force passing the 200m.
Slotted in from a wide gate & travelled just behind the speed, 2 deep had some cover on the circle. Gave ground over the final furlong.
Settled midfield, 2 wide with cover. Failed to close off and never fired.
Travelled midfield the fence, had cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Went forward and led close to the rail. Faded quickly after the 300m.
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, peeled wide turning in, dashed well to score by a neck.
Taken back from wide gate, settled 5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, dashed well for 2nd, just missed by a neck.
Pushed forward to sit 1L behind the leader 2 wide, hung on well to the line for 3rd.
Travelled midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, switched wide turning in, ran on well in straight.
Began well, then ridden forward to take the rail and share the lead, kept on gamely until 50M weakened.
Eased back, travelled 8Ls behind the leader 2 wide, made plenty of ground in straight.
Settled worse than midfield about 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on ok.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, ran on only fairly.
Eased start, settled 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide, swung widest and made some ground in straight.
Prominent, travelled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide, kept on one pace until 100M weakened.
Ridden forward to share the lead 2 wide, had every possible chance in straight, however weakened 250M.
Always at rear, settled 7Ls behind the leader on the fence, never ran on.
Always at rear, never a factor.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, under pressure rounding the Home Turn, weakened badly after straightening, tailed out.
Broke well, sat rail handy until eased back 1000m & switched 1 off, cruised to narrow lead 300m, let down 250m & forced to battle to wire.
Speed to lead at break, snagged back & settled 1 off 1 back, driven home turn, battling advance to dispute lead 250m, held in extended duel.
Fair break, sat rail midfield, advanced 800m to race 1 back, behind horses until driven in clear 300m, stayed on well to make frame.
Broke well, taken back to midfield 1 off with cover, off heels & switched 3 deep 900m, shaken up 430m, solid closer, just missed frame.
Smart break, slotted midfield 1 off with cover, driven turning in, stayed on for sound effort.
Crowded start, raced rail behind midfield, driven turning in, outpaced initially, ran on late for solid inroads.
Fair break, bustled to lead 1500m, raced rail & headed 1200m, regained lead 1000m, hard-ridden 300m, soon headed & boxed on one pace.
Rolled gradually from wide gate to lead 1200m, headed 1000m & sat close 2nd 1 off no cover, pressed lead 300m, soon beaten & tapered in run to wire.
Taken behind from wide gate, raced rail near rear, switched out turning in, plugged on same speed.
Lacked early pace, raced 3 deep in rear, last & bustled 500m, modest gains in stretch.
Tardy break, impeded 1100m & lost ground, raced 1 off with cover behind midfield, wide into stretch, kept on tamely.
Good break taken back to slot midfield on fence, unable to raise tempo in stretch.
Decent break, slotted 3 deep with cover behind midfield, ridden near rear 600m, wide into stretch, found nothing in run home.
Slow start, sat 1 off in rearguard, switched widest turning in, plodded home, never a factor.
Allowed to settle in midfield away from fence. Peeled out approaching straight and accelerated smartly 400-200m, idled when hit front and under whip to maintain winning margin.
Ridden up from good draw to hold 2nd back stretch before dropping back to 3rd before turn. Switched out off 400m to hit front momentarily, but battled gamely when passed.
Jumped well and punched the breeze in 3rd spot before given cover at 1000m when another rolled forward. Kept on steadily in straight to be closest at finish.
Began awkwardly and then held toward rear but away from the fence. Picked up the bit 800m, swung wide into straight and ran on steadily doing best work final 200m.
Jumped with field but no early speed and held 3-wide from 1200m. Made to work around home turn but battled on gamely to the finish.
Began well and quickly cut in to fence to hold box seat to 1000m before shuffled 2-back before turn. Stayed on rail home stretch but only one paced.
Hampered shortly after start dropping to last. Hung in entering straight and got head on side 200m. Ran past tired horses closing stages.
Jumped well but unable to cut in and took off 1200m, circling field to sit outside leader before turn. Started to give ground from 300m.
Taken forward from outside draw to lead shortly after start, cutting in to fence 1200m. Led field into straight before tiring.
Checked shortly after start, dropping to last, Cut in to rail and made ground before turn. Running on empty from 400m. Run unacceptable.
Eased to sit in midfield, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M, won with plenty in hand.
Settled in front, just off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, closed off strongly for 2nd, winner far too good.
Midfield, 6Ls off the leader along the fence, dashed well 300M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Took rail in midfield, 5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, blocked most straight, dashed well to the line despite not being able to be fully tested.
Hard ridden to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Eased back, 9Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Settled in front, enjoyed the slow sectionals, out of fuel 200M.
Eased back, 8Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, no progress.
Eased back, 10Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, faded quickly 300M.
Very slow away, at back, harmed by the slow pace, never nearer.
Very slow away, never competitive at rear.

Placing: UR
Comment: Prior to the start being effected got its head down and attempted to break out underneath the front gates, as a result rider becoming badly unbalanced in the saddle on jumping and was dislodged.
A little slow to muster but picked up from 1000m to sit 3rd with cover. Peeled out entering straight to challenge, hit front 250m, hard ridden to line.
Jumped well, led field back stretch before dropping to 2nd around turn. Retook lead 400m, caught 250m but battled on to line.
No early speed, hampered 1000m, dropping to last. Checked 600m when improving, switched wide entering straight, best work final 300m.
Began OK but not pushed and settled behind midfield away from fence. Crowded 850m, found run between horses and kept on steadily.
Soon on rails and in box seat from 800m. Stayed on fence but no run early in straight. Kept on one-paced when clear.
Ridden forward but unable cut in and held 3-wide back stretch and turn. Kept on steadily in straight without looking dangerous.
Missed start, taken back, came off bridle 600m. Under hard riding from 400m but did not respond until final stages. Blood in trachea.
Raced in midfield with cover. Looked chance turning for home, shifted out 350m brushing another runner. One-paced. Lame right fore.
Not pushed early and held 3-wide, covering extra ground turn. Hard ridden from 400m but only one-paced.
Jumped OK to hold fence. Overraced from 850m and threw head around and lay out turn. Found nothing in straight.
Cut in to rail shortly after start and then ridden up inside leader to hit front 800m. Kept on to 200m before flattened.
Broke well, always in touch, steadily advanced to a striking position midway on the home turn, quickened smartly when asked 300M, soon established a clear margin, won impressively.
Not far off behind leaders in first half, switched away from rails 700M, quickened well on straightening, couldn't resist the winner 200M, kept on steadily to hold 2nd.
Taken back from a wide barrier, reserved in last 8Ls off the pace, took inside route turning in, unable to obtain clear running until 300M, closed gamely and was rapidly getting to the 3rd.
Slow to begin, quickly recovered to a 3-wide spot in midfield, left with no cover halfway, moved closer 600M, ran on well to briefly go 3rd 100M out but no extra gain late.
Up with early pace, steadied to track the front runners under a strong hold, looked a strong chance early straight, briefly led 300M but could not sustain the bid, one-paced final 200M.
Reserved behind midfield, swung 4-wide for home, checked 400M and again near 250M when closing off the race strongly , unable to re-gain momentum after this incident.
Dropped back to near last, patiently held up to 500M, swung widest for home, closed belatedly over final 200M.
Close up behind early pace, travelled wide without cover before striding to lead 1100M, headed near 300M, faded out of contention.
Restrained in midfield 3-wide, pushed wider 1100M and left without cover, stayed on mildly and could never get near to leaders.
Unhurried after the start, settled near last off the inside, driven 400M but not going the pace of main rivals, ran past only beaten runners.
Well covered in a 2-wide position behind midfield, kept on one paced turning into straight, never threatened.
Moved up willingly into a forward position, prominent behind leader throughout, gave limited response when asked, swamped inside 300M, weakened away.
Rolled forward, led from 1600M to 1100M, tracked leader rounding the bend, failed to respond turning in and gradually gave way.
Awkwardly away, settled behind midfield, came under heavy pressure 600M out, not pace to go with principals, dropped out rapidly 200M.
Jumped well, sat outside early leader before being shuffled back to 3rd 800m Second into straight, led 350m and pulled clear for easy win.
Ridden forward but kept wide into turn. Bumped and unbalanced 500m, struck from behind 350m, but kept on well.
Ridden forward 3-4 wide initially before getting cover before turn. Fourth into straight and kept on steadily to the line.
Missed the start, then taken nearer fence. Improved position around turn, switched out straight and ran on strongly.
Taken back from wide draw, caught flat-footed when field speeded up 800m. Was closing well when bumped 100m. Awkward of heels final stages.
Ridden forward from outside draw and held wide without cover. Circled field to lead 800m, started to give ground gradually from 400m.
Bumped, unbalanced start but recovered to race just behind speed. Kept on steadily early straight before tiring final 200m.
Taken forward from wide draw to find cover before turn. Ran into hind quarters of another runner 300m, nearly savaged in straight.
Came out running and led field to 800m before being headed. Retook lead 400m but soon headed and tired.
Began awkwardly, travelled between horses worse of midfield, raced tight in straight and attempted to savage another horse several times.
Ridden aggressively to snatch rail position but outpaced and drifted back. Unbalanced when checked 900m. Found nothing in straight.
No early speed and soon at rear but wide. Switched out entering straight to make run but only one-paced.
Jumped OK and held in midfield along fence back stretch and turn. Gave ground soon after entering straight.
No speed and held wide while drifting back. Was last into straight, gradually falling further behind.
Landed a nice spot just off pace, had easy time 3-4ls back to bend, gained split between horses in straight and produced a solid close to outlast rivals.
Trapped 3 wide from a tricky gate, had no cover in mid-section 3ls or so back, steady pace helped but did share of work to bend, kept finding in straight and didn't go down by much in finish.
Showed good early pace to take lead, shaded by outside horse and eventually took trail on bend, came off leaders turning and joined in hitting front to 200m, touched out by principals final 100m.
Ended up 3 wide in midfield, 5ls back with cover, steady pace helped, switched wider and set out after leaders at 400m, kept on well to make frame.
Settled at rear, 7ls or so from top end, steady speed against, last on turning, produced a decent finish in straight making many lengths to be nearest on line.
Out with rest, held a spot on leaders back, easy time on pace to bend, gained an inside run turning and looked a place chance before peaking inside final furlong.
Took a spot in running line, 5ls or so back just off midfield, in between horses turning, just kept on at same pace in straight.
Lacked early pace, raced 6ls back on rails behind midfield, saved ground turning, held up to 300m, made steady progress when clear.
No early pace and ended up racing 3 wide at rear with cover, 6ls or more from lead, switched wider turning, closed off evenly without looking likely.
Landed a spot in midfield 4-5ls back on rails, enjoyed an easy time in mid-section, took inside runs turning but was one paced in straight and offered little final 300m.
Settled next to last on rails 7ls or so back, steady pace didn't help, always rearward and made no ground in straight.
Drifted back to race behind midfield, 6ls or so from leaders, pace against, made a short lived run at 4oom before folding tamely. (bled both nostrils)
Used a bit from a wide draw to cross and race outside leader, kept working shading inside horse on circle, took clear lead at 500m, lost advantage at 300m and weakened tamely.
Began well and assumed a spot 1 out 1 back, all favours to bend, made a 3 wide run turning but soon gave way and eased out. (see racing incidents re action)

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began awkwardly losing ground, settled just off the speed on stands rails, came to challenge under pressure inside final 350 metres, gained upper hand 50 metres out.
Broke well to lead holding narrow advantage until headed inside final 50 metres.
Began fairly settling within striking distance, came under pressure to challenge coming onto course proper, but could only keep on without quickening.
Began fairly, niggled along to be well there, given reminders passing 350 metres, yielded ground steadily while hanging in the run to the line.

Bumped jumping out, travelled about three lengths back towards the rear down the centre of the track, made short-lived moderate effort coming onto course proper, no impression inside final 200 metres.
Jumped fairly, made short-lived effort to reach 2nd when half a length back inside the leader coming onto course proper, unable to sustain effort closing stages.
Began awkwardly and raced awkwardly early stages dropping towards the rear, ran home one-paced down the centre of the track.
Bumped at start, soon dropped to the tail-end, went past well-beaten horses closing stages.
Hampered at start, settled about three lengths off the speed early, faded from over 200 metres out.
Well there to halfway, folded up quickly.
Parked in 2nd position, on the grandstand side, no cover. Lengthened nicely after the 300m, hit the lead near the 250m, and was never troubled thereafter.
Made the running on the stands side and kept up a game effort right to the winning post.
Hung in for the majority of the race when travelling 3 from the stands rail, no cover, handy to the leaders. Finished off fairly.
Began awkwardly, settling near the rear, 2 from the grandstand side rail. Finished off soundly after obtaining clear running near the furlong.
Raced prominently along the stands rail, had cover. Finished off soundly.
Positioned along the center of the track, close to midfield, no cover. Maintained a fair gallop right to the wire.
Raced close to the speed near the middle of the course, no cover. Kept plugging away over the concluding stages.
Camped midfield, toward the center of the track, had some cover. Stayed on at the same speed in the run to the wire.
Began awkwardly, settled on the speed, about 5 from the stands rail, no cover. Faded late.
Travelled with the backmakers 5-6 from the grandstand side fence, had cover. Was held up over the final 400m and not tested properly.
Settled midfield, about 6 off the stands rail, had cover. Was one paced in the run to the line.
Raced down the center of the track, close to the speed, no cover. Was under pressure after the 400m, failed to respond.
Settled toward the middle of the course, no cover, handy to the leaders. Was a spent force at the 400M.

Placing: UR
Comment: Began awkwardly and dislodged rider at the start.
Pushed to obtain box seat, travelled nicely throughout, under pressure 300M, dashed well to score by 1/2L.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, gradually improved turning in, ran on well to get 2nd, missed by 1/2L.
Taken back, travelled 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide, peeled wide turning in, stormed home for 3rd.
Taken back from wide gate, travelled 10Ls behind the leader on the fence, switched to widest rounding the Home Bend, dashed well for 4th.
Travelled midfield, settled 6Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, ran on ok.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls behind the leader 3-4 wide without cover, ran on nicely despite a tough trip throughout.
Prominent, under pressure rounding the Home Bend, held up early straight, one-paced home.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, switched to 3 wide rounding the Home Turn, kept on one pace to the line.
Eased at start, settled 6.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, ran on only fairly.
Hard ridden forward, however could not find the fence, travelled 1L outside the leader, out of fuel 200M.
Ridden forward to sit 4th, under pressure 400M, weakened 300M.
Always at rear, settled 7Ls behind the leader on the fence, never ran on.
Always at rear, never a factor.
Ridden forward to cross from a wide gate, found the fence and led by 1L after the first turn, flattened badly 250M.
Broke well to track pace 2L back, closed up on lead 300m, shaken up 200m & quickened easily to lead, in command at wire.
Raced front rank, shaken up 400m, limited response when passed by winner 200m, kept on evenly to secure 2nd.
Fast break to dispute lead, narrow advantage 600m, kicked 400m, unable to draw clear, headed 150m, no extra.
Broke with others, raced mid pack, shaken up 350m, ran on soundly without threatening.
Decent break, tracked pace, switched out 450m to challenge, limited response, kept on one pace under strong drive.
Sharp start, sat handy on rail, ridden 500m to close on leader, soon at limit & weakened in run home.
Crowded start, lacked early pace & bustled in rear, 7L back & driven 400m, closed off for solid gains.
Fair break, niggled in midfield, hard ridden 500m, boxed on one pace.
Tardy break, raced near rear, outpaced & lost ground 400m, plugged on for modest inroads.
Sharp break, raced handy 1 off fence, ridden 600m, unable to quicken & faded in closing stages.
Speed to dispute lead, under pressure in 3rd at halfway, weakened tamely from 400m.
Bumped start, bustled along midfield, hard-ridden 400m, found nothing & soon beaten.
Good break, raced far side mid-rank, under pressure 400m, found nothing & weakened right out.
Fractious at start, outpaced & bustled at tail until eased when already tailed off at 400m, found to be lame after race.
Began OK and soon handy, 3-back the fence. Stayed on fence round turn, got inside run 350m, gradually wearing down leader to win close home.
Ridden forward from wide draw, cutting in 3-back, 1-off before turn. Bumped when switched out to make run 400m, hit front 200m, caught close home.
Taken back across runners but held away from fence. Swung widest entering straight and ran on solidly to be closest at finish.
Eased back from wide draw to find cover but was shuffled back to last. Got head up 700m, took turn greenly, clear last 400m. Closed off strongly until baulked final stages.
Struck on nose with whip at start, tightened 1000m, dropping back along fence. Ran on strongly from 400m to be closest at finish.
Jumped well and 2nd initially before being shuffled back to 5th before turn. Bumped 400m but kept on well until flattened 50m.
Began only fairly, dropping to near rear along fence. Shifted out 800m, entered straight 4-wide, kept on steadily to line.
Made full use of inside draw to hold box seat. Came off fence 400m, steadied 300m, then close on heels. No extra final 100m.
Ridden forward from wide draw but unable to slot in. Covered extra ground turn, dropped back to midfield 400m, then one-paced.
Jumped smartly to lead field before headed 800m. Retook lead into straight but passed 300m. Plodded to the line.
Ridden forward to find cover but held wide into turn, covering extra ground. Taken wider entering straight but one-paced under hard riding.
Jumped well but allowed to settle midfield away from fence. Unbalanced when taken out 800m. Found passage between horses but no extra.
Ridden forward but held wide. Rolled forward from 1000m to take lead entering turn. Headed 400m and weakened gradually.
Ridden vigorously to obtain forward position, joint leader 1000m but wide, hampered and lost ground from 800m, finishing tailed off.
Stayed 3 wide in the lead, pace good, benefited by the strong off rail bias, drifted away 400M, ran on well to win.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the good pace, trapped 4 wide but indeed favoured by the strong off rail bias, closed off well for 2nd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace on the fence, harmed by the strong off rail bias, held up 4-2, progressed steadily for 3rd.
In front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, 6Ls off the good pace 2 wide, made steady ground 250M.
Bumped start, 5Ls off the good pace on the fence, harmed by the strong off rail bias, made ground 300M, run ended 150M.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, harmed by the strong off rail bias, held up 4-2, ran on fairly when clear.
Bumped start, 4Ls off the good pace 2 wide, no progress.
Bumped start and lost ground, 3Ls off the good pace 3 wide, suited by the strong off rail bias, flattened in straight.
Pushed to take rail and led by 0.5L at good pace, harmed by the strong off rail bias, emptied 300M.
Pushed forward, outside the lead, pace good, soon dropped off 400M.
Bumped start, never a factor at rear.
Began fairly and settled toward rear. Came away from fence back stretch, taken wider turn, entered straight full of running, hit from 300m, drifting out under pressure closing stages.
No early speed and held at rear but away from fence. Swung wide entering straight to make run but forced to switch in when winner drifted out. Closest at finish.
Jumped well and cut in to fence to take box seat back stretch. Got run between leaders entering straight, hit front 350m, but no extra from 100m.
Began awkwardly but recovered to sit 3-back, 1-off back stretch and turn. Three-wide entering straight but ran on well.
Outpaced early at sat at rear away from fence back stretch. Switched out entering straight and ran on steadily.
Ridden forward from wide draw but unable to cut in and held wide first turn and back stretch. Taken very wide into straight but only one-paced.
Taken back from wide draw to be last initially before improving slightly. Taken out entering straight but found little under hard riding.
Ridden vigorously to take lead first turn before dropping anchor. Speeded up back stretch, led to straight, gave ground from 200m.
Made use of inside draw to hold good position 2-back the fence. Improved position entering straight but emptied 200m.
Outpaced early and trailed field back stretch and final turn. Came off fence entering straight but only one-paced.
Began well and was 2-back, 1-off entering back stretch. Improved position final turn, looked chance 300m before turning one-paced.
Taken forward from wide draw to sit outside leader. Taken wider around final turn but gave ground soon after entering straight.
Ridden forward from wide draw but unable slot in and trapped wide without cover. Gave ground from 500m and finished tailed off. Unacceptable performance.
Hard ridden to go forward from outside draw but held 3-4 wide for most of the journey, dropping to last entering straight. Unacceptable performance.
Settled 3-wide in midfield, steadily gained position 600M, rallied on the outside in straight, kept finding more and closed well to get up near the line.
Close up 3-wide throughout, responded well when urged inside 300M, briefly led inside 100M but was denied near the line.
Forwardly placed just behind leaders, came under urging half way round the turn, kept on steadily in straight but not pace of first 2 over final 150M.
Held up midfield along the 2-path, lacked immediate acceleration, did best work late and stayed on to go 4th near line.
Began only fairly from draw 1, guided away from fence and settled near the rear, switched wide and moved closer inside 500M , closed with a mild response.
Disputed the pace off the inside, extended the lead 400M out, kept on well early straight, headed passing 150M, weakened final stages.
Never far from striking distance, pursued the leaders into final 150M then weakened.
Unhurried in early and middle stages, settled at the rear 5Ls off the pace, brought wide to challenge but lacked the needed response.
Guided to the fence in midfield but proved difficult to settle, found disappointingly little when driven near 400M, never a threat.
Reserved early, held up patiently at the rear but not able to quicken when put to pressure.
Contested the pace outside leader, weakened away 200M out.
Caught 4-wide without cover on jumping from 12, weakened turning home and eased mid-straight.
Slow to jump but recovered quickly to sit behind pace entering turn. Got run between horses 350m and made ground steadily to win close to line.
Jumped well and quickly up with the pace but wide. Covered extra ground turn, took lead entering straight and kept on well till overhauled 50m.
Jumped OK but not enough speed and settled behind midfield but 3-wide. Taken out entering straight and finished off nicely.
Ridden forward from wide draw and trapped wide with no cover entering turn. Taken out further entering straight and ran on well.
Slow to muster and clear last by 800m. Taken wide turning for home and ran on strongly.
Jumped OK but unable to hold forward position and slipped back to behind midfield between horses. Ran on steadily in straight.
Flat-footed at start and under whip to catch up to field entering turn. Unable to find run until 200m, shifted out 150m, finished off nicely.
Jumped best and led for a few strides making for rail. Steadied 800m and lost position turn. Kept on steadily in straight.
Beaten for early pace and soon at rear close to rail. Kept on steadily in straight without looking dangerous.
Ridden forward from wide draw to lead on settling. Joined by inside horse at 800m and started to give ground soon after entering straight.
Began OK but trapped wide and then raced awkwardly close to heels from 750. Faded in straight. Blood in trachea.
Ridden forward from wide draw and soon on rail inside leader. Joined leader turn but gave ground soon after entering straight.
Settled back with last few 8ls away on inside, aided by even tempo, still well back turning and tight for a run, reeled off a strong finish final 300m to close over top late for a strong win.
Drifted back to rear, raced 2ls back in running line, helped by pace, tracked into race 3 wide turning, came wider circle and dashed well to hit lead at 200m, lost out in closing stages.
No early pace, settled last 8ls or so from top end, aided by even tempo, still well back turning, made many lengths in straight to take 3rd.
Took a trail on leaders back, had fair run on even speed, angled out turning and looked a place chance before being overhauled inside final furlong.
Raced in midfield 4ls back on rails, easy time throughout, kept to inside turning, battled on at same speed in straight.
Unable to get in and posted 3 and 4 wide throughout in midfield, 4-5ls back, came wider turning, peaked at300m and dropped off thereafter after hard run.
Trapped 3 wide from outset, 2-3ls back working in mid-section, same margin down turning, dropped away final 200m when workload took toll.
Showed early pace to take up running, kept speed even with attention from horse on outside, kept on well to 200m but additional journey had effect and stopped final furlong.
Positioned 3 wide behind midfield, 5-6ls back, had cover and aided by speed, didn't have required finish to feature in straight and just passed tired horses.
Trapped wide from an outside gate, moved up outside leader two wide doing share of work in mid-section, still there turning but lacked turn of foot to stay in mix and faded final 300m.
Took a spot behind midfield, 5ls or so away, aided by pace but was difficult to settle, didn't get a real crack at them in straight but just battled when clear.
Assumed a role in midfield 3-4ls back, easy time in mid-section, niggled turning but gradually faded when extra journey factored.
Outside leader early but soon took trail, 1 out 1 back to bend, no pick up and gave in cheaply final 400m not seeing out extra journey.

Taken back from a wide gate, raced just off midfield 6ls back on rails, improved turning and gained ideal run through field, kept giving to get over the top of rivals narrowly in finish ending a frustrating run of placings.
Assumed ideal spot 1 out 1 back, used little in run, loomed 3 wide to challenge turning, hit front at 200m and just lost advantage in shadow of post.
Showed early pace, too nice trail on leaders back, all favours in run, came off rails turning and produced a good finish going down in a 3 way go.
Went forward to take customary role in front, controlled affairs in mid-section, held narrow advantage turning, kept to task in straight to make frame and be not far away on line.
Began well, took up spot outside leader, helped by average tempo early, right there turning, no turn of foot but stayed on evenly all the same to be on heels of place getters.
Taken back from outside gate, raced next to last more than 8ls back, last turning and came widest in straight, and produced a big finish making many lengths to be nearest on line.
Took a nice spot in midfield, 5ls or so back in between horses, difficult to settle in run, switched wider but peaked at 200m and just held ground thereafter.
Slotted in behind midfield from widest gate, 7ls or so away in running line, came 4 wide turning, made some minor headway.
Away fairly, raced just off pace 3ls back, no excuses to bend, just battled away along inside final 400m.
Ordinary break and soon at tail, nearly 10ls back at rear, well back turning, made some fair progress in straight
Positioned behind midfield racing 3 wide with cover, 7ls away, made a 5 wide run turning, made only minor ground in straight and was safely held.
Average break, raced well back on rails 8ls or more off speed, took inside runs turning, one paced in straight.
Showed more pace than usual, but trapped 3 wide without cover, in midfield and did have cover from midpoint 5ls back, niggled turning, lacked usual close and battled away in straight.
Out with rest, raced 3 wide in midfield, improved 4 wide on circle to be 2ls down turning, run soon ended and dropped away quickly to be well beaten.

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began well from the widest gate, raced wide without cover with leaders far side, took up running and crossed for rails rounding home bend, soon drew clear in straight and won unchallenged.
Slowly away, ridden to just worse than midfield on rails, switched out for a run upon straightening, fought on steadily without threatening.
Began fairly, in first few early stages, gradually shuffled back to rear of midfield, kept on steadily without quickening.
Jumped moderately, soon dropped to rear, went widest into straight, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish. (Tactic questioned)
Jumped fairly, soon taken well back, fought on steadily in straight without threatening.
Began fairly, settled in forward of midfield on rails, crept closer to dispute 2nd into straight, swamped for a placing inside final 100 metres.
Disputed lead far side, settled just behind leader around the bend, faded gradually.
Began fairly, soon dropped towards the rear, baulked for a run early in straight, otherwise made no impression.

Began well holding narrow advantage early, gradually taken back to settle two-length back in third coming out of back straight, soon weakened under pressure 400 metres out. (Mucus and questioned for disappointing performance)
Niggled along in forward of midfield far side, forced to steady and lose position coming out, wide in midfield without cover rounding home bend, dropped out tamely in straight.
Was handy in the run, travelling in 5th position, 1 off with cover. Finished off gamely, to have the race in its keeping 50m out.
Parked midfield the fence, had cover. Ran on well in the home straight, was impeded on a few occasions inside the 150m. Protested successfully.
Raced behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Finished off soundly. Relegated on protest.
Eventually settled 1 out 1 back. Was in front at the furlong, overhauled late.
Stalked the leader on the fence. Kept on at the same speed down the running.
Camped worse than midfield on the paint with cover. Finished off evenly.
Raced at the rear of the field, 2 deep with cover. Worked home steadily without threatening.
Began awkwardly, soon mustered to lead along the paint. Faded over the final 100m.
Caught 3 wide in the early stages, no cover, was allowed to stride forward midrace and settled outside the leader near the 1000m. Gave ground passing the 200m.
Settled 3rd last on the rails with cover. Kept to the inside in the straight, failed to make any significant impression.
Ridden along early, settling midfield, 2 wide with cover. Was a beaten horse after the 300m.
Went back from a wide gate and settled in last position, close to the running rail, with cover. Failed to close off.
Raced midfield, travelled 4.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast pace, under pressure rounding the Home Bend, dashed well to win by a short head.
Taken back, settled 8Ls behind the leader 2 wide, favored by the fast pace, peeled wide turning in, dashed well for 2nd, just beaten by a short head.
Eased to rear, settled 9Ls behind the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, peeled widest turning in, stormed home to get 3rd.
Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, suited by the fast pace, dashed well until 100M weakened.
Taken back as usual, settled 7Ls behind the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, ran on steadily without threatening.
Camped handy, travelled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide without cover throughout, harmed by the fast pace, kept on one pace to the line.

Pushed to obtain midfield, settled 6Ls off the pace 2 wide, suited by the fast pace, under pressure rounding the Home Bend, checked 300M, ran on only fairly. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Ridden forward to take the fence and led by 1.5Ls at fast pace, out of fuel over the last furlong.
Always at rear, travelled 9Ls behind the leader on the fence, never ran on.
Rolled forward to settle 1.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, harmed by the fast pace, flattened 300M.
Prominent, settled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, not suited by the fast pace, no progress, tailed out.
Smart start, eased to lead 1100m & settled rail, cruised into stretch, extended clear on bridle 300m, no contest.
Decent start, slotted back of midfield 1 off with cover, driven 450m & wide into stretch, closed off soundly to nick 2nd last strides.
Smart break, off heels 1000m, raced midfield wide with cover, wide into stretch, battled to 2nd 150m, all out & lost place close home.
Lacked early pace, settled near rear along the rail, switched wide passing 450M, closed off steadily for a never threatening 4th.
Good break, sat midfield 1 wide, switched out & driven final turn, bumped 400m & unbalanced, boxed on one pace.
Fast break trapped wide no cover handy, ridden 3rd turning in, one-paced & swamped at 150m, no extra.
Tardy start, raced 1 off near rear, bustled 700m, wide into stretch, plugged on evenly for pressure.
Taken back from widest gate, settled last pair 1 off with cover, driven into stretch, kept on late to pass beaten rivals.
Led from gate, headed 1100m, tracked 1 off handy, switched out & driven 400m, outpaced & plugged on.
Fair break, raced handy on rail, tight for room 900m, ridden turning in, one-paced for pressure, tapered out final 200m.
Early speed, rolled up to press leader 600m, 2nd & shaken up 400m, emptied 250m & faded out.
Fair start, taken back to rail behind midfield, driven under pressure 350m, found little & eased when beaten.
Sluggish start, raced last pair on fence, driven at tail turning in, found nothing, never a factor.
Decent break, rolled to sit 2nd 1 off no cover, shaken up 400m to close on lead, hard-ridden to gradually grind rival & lead close home.
Rolled to lead 1000m, soon to rail, driven when pressed 300m, boxed on determinedly, headed last strides.
Fair start, off heels 1000m, raced midfield on rail, switched out & driven 400m, kept on solidly to line.
Fast break to lead early, headed 1000m, sat 1 back on rail, ridden into stretch, kept on same pace to wire.
Broke with others, trapped wide no cover midfield, closed off well centre track without threatening.
Taken behind to race easily at tail, widest turning for home, shaken up 400m, strong closer for taking gains centre track until run tapered late.
Taken back at break, raced near rear 3 wide with cover, forced wide final turn, ran on for minor inroads.
Broke OK, raced wide no cover behind midfield, very wide into stretch, plugged on moderately.
Fair break, bustled early, tracked in midfield 1 off, over-raced 800m, found little for pressure turning in & faded.
Sluggish start, off heels & lost ground 1000m, camped rail behind midfield, switched out in stretch, plugged on same pace.
Broke with others, soon advanced to sit 4th 1 off with cover, hard-ridden turning in, outpaced & faded in run.
Tardy start & rousted initially, settled rail near rear, plodded home one pace.
Broke with others, taken back to behind midfield 3 wide with cover, struggled in run home.
Tardy start, advanced 1000m, sharply off heels 900m, raced behind midfield 1 off with cover, ridden 500m, found nothing.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, blocked 400M, dashed well to score but only by a narrow margin.
Awkward away, 9Ls off the leader on the rails, harmed by the slow pace, held up 4-2, demonstrated strong finishing efforts, just beaten by a nose in 2nd.
Midfield along the fence, 5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, blocked 4-2, dashed strongly when clear.
In front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, held up 400M, dashed well when clear.
At back but on the fence, 8Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, blocked most straight, dashed well to the line.
Eased to rear, 9Ls off the leader 2-4 wide, dashed well 400M despite not suited by the slow pace, run ended 100M.
Pushed to take rail and led by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 150M flattened.
Pressed forward, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Trapped 3 wide throughout in front of midfield, 3Ls off the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 400M, however run ended 100M.
Box seat, lack room 400M, not suited by the slow tempo, ran on fairly.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, made early move 600M, little dash in straight.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed fairly.
Pushed forward, sat outside the leader, enjoyed the slow sectionals, weakened 300M.
Jumped well, led on settling but kept away from fence by inside horse. Joined after entering straight, headed 200m but fought back to win narrowly.
Difficult to settle early stages but enjoyed good run 1-off, 1-back. Cruised alongside leader 350m, led 200m, but condition gave out final strides.
Beaten early pace and held 3-wide with cover into turn. Shaken up 600m, swung wide straight and ran on well until 100m when shifted in.
Taken back from wide draw but kept away from fence. Taken very wide entering straight, kept on steadily under hard riding.
Taken forward from widest gate and trapped 3-wide but with cover into turn. Switched out 350m and kept on steadily.
Outpaced andl held 3-wide behind midfield, covering extra ground turn. Hard ridden from 500m and made ground under whip from 200m.
Jumped best but not pushed and sat half length inside leader to straight. Hard ridden from 300m but found little. Hands and heels final stages.
No early speed and near rear by 800m. Lost position around turn, found inside run but only one-paced under hard riding.
Jumped OK but no early speed and drifted toward rear before turn. Taken wide 400m but only one-paced to line.
Fractious in gate but jumped well and soon on rail behind leading pack. Looked chance entering straight but only one paced.
Reared start and then taken back from wide draw. Last into turn, and detached from field 200m before running past tired horses.
Taken froward from outside draw and trapped 3-wide on hind quarters of leader without cover. Loomed alongside leaders turning for home before tiring quickly.
Began OK and settled in midfield close to fence. Kept on steadily early in straight before tiring and falling back.
Jumped well and ridden along to sit behind the early pace, put under pressure turning for home, found little and slipped back.
Raced up close tracking leaders, advanced to race outside leader passing 200M, took command by narrow margin inside 100M, held on.
Led at good pace, kept on well turning home, joined by eventual winner mid-straight, refused to give in when headed 100M, just denied in a close finish.
Taken across from widest draw and allowed to settled at the rear of the field, continued to stay inside turning home, ran on steadily to go 3rd 50M but couldn't reach the first 2.
Held up in midfield along the fence, soon into clear turning home, made a mild run but lacked a further response over final 100M.
Awkward at the start, reserved at the rear, brought wide passing 500M, stayed on fairly for a never threatening 5th.
Held up in midfield, came under pressure turning for home, not going the pace to challenge, faded nearing 100M.
Settled near the rear, kept on same pace turning home, never threatened.
Not far off from the pace but travelled 3-wide without cover throughout, hung out home turn and early straight, failed to pick up.
Pressed the pace 2-wide, maintained position to 500M and gave way, eased. (Lame / Blood in trachea.)
Ridden forward from outside draw to sit one-off behind leader at turn. Distant 3rd entering straight, dug in from 200m to gradually overhaul leader.
Jumped well and hard ridden to pull 3-lengths clear at 800m. Kicked ahead entering straight, still well clear 200m, run down final stages.
Outpaced and dropped to last, moving closer to fence. Improved around turn, took rails run in straight, finished strongly.
Flopped out start, raced keenly from 1000m, then close to heels dropping back. Taken wide 400m, ran on strongly, shifting out under pressure from 200m.
Checked start, dropping back and moving closer to rail. Improved position around turn, followed winner from 300m, making ground to the line.
Jumped with field and kept behind pace 2-back the fence. Distant 4th entering straight but kept on steadily to be closest at finish.
Ridden forward from wide draw but was close on heels 1000m and kept wide without cover. Was close on heels again 600, but finished off OK when clear.
Jumped well and patiently ridden along rail behind tearaway leader. Was 2nd into straight and still there at 200m before swamped final stages.
Crowded start but recovered and soon racing on his own behind midfield. Taken out 400m to make run but only one-paced.
Outpaced early and soon in last pair, dropping to last entering straight. Taken widest 400m and made up some late ground.
Began awkwardly and shifted out abruptly. but then made up ground along fence to be 6th entering straight. One-paced after that. Blood in trachea.
Unbalanced start, recovered and raced on his own behind midfield to straight. Found little under hard riding final 400m.
Began well and ridden forward from widest draw but then trapped wide and raced without cover. Started to give ground after entering straight.
Jumped OK but proved difficult to settle before turn and then checked. Gave ground soon after entering straight.
Took up a spot behind midfield, raced 6-7ls away in running line, aided by tempo, improved wider turning, let down well final 300m to overhaul leaders and hold off fast finishing rivals.

Dropped back to last from wide gate, raced at rear 10ls back on rails, helped by solid sections, gradually worked into race final 400m and did best work final furling making many lengths late to just miss.
Settled at rear more than 10ls from speed, solid pace helped chances, well back turning, switched widest in straight and reeled off a solid section to go down narrowly in 3 way go.
Positioned back with last few 8ls away from lead, racing two wide, suited by solid tempo, switched wider turning and made solid ground down middle just missing a place in a tight finish.
Settled behind midfield, 7-8ls back on rails, suited by tempo, in traffic turning, worked home nicely in straight to be nearest at finish just missing frame.
Landed a spot in midfield 5ls back racing two wide, overaced despite solid early speed, in amongst horses at 400m, looked a place chance but lacked usual dash when clear and peaked inside 200m.

Slotted into 1out 1 back spot, did a bit of work with solid pace on, loomed on turning and took over at 300m, didn't have reserves final furlong but stayed on best of leading division to be not far away.
Showed more speed than usual to press forward and race outside leader, applied pressure to leader in mid-section, there to 300m but workload took effect and dropped off final 200m.
Began well enough and pressed on to take position in leaders back, used a bit on decent speed, right there turning, in contention until 200m but just one paced thereafter.
Unable to slot in from a outside gate, raced 3 wide without cover 5ls back in midfield, did share of work to bend, folded final 300m.
Went forward and took up lead, used a bit early with decent sections, worried by outside horse throughout, headed at 300m and run ended soon after.
Sat just off pace 3-4ls back on rails, fair run in mid-section, close enough turning but didn't let down final 300m and faded late. (lame after race)
Positioned behind midfield on rails, 5ls off lead, enjoyed a quiet time in middle stages, took inside runs turning but had no real dash in straight.
Had nice trail just off pace 3-4ls back in running line, fair run to bend, made a mild bid but soon under pressure at 400m, faded out quickly.

Began well settling mainly one off the rails in 2nd outside the leader, quickened alongside eventual runner-up to hit the front passing 200 metres, was momentarily headed approaching the line but got lucky in the photo-finish.
Settled mainly one back on rails, came to challenge under pressure in straight gaining very narrow advantage final strides, and only to be denied by a bob of heads.
Began fairly, gradually dropped back behind midfield despite the nudging, commenced move 3-wide around home bend, ran on well under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Settled in midfield, soon came to challenge upon straightening, ran on to be nearest at finish.

Soon driven from the widest gate to take up running passing the post the first time, obtained rails run passing the 1000 metres mark setting a steady pace, headed passing final 100 metres and swamped for a place late.
Broke well, settled mainly in rear of midfield, switched out for a run 200 metres out, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Always in last few, produced good late impression past beaten horses in the run home.
Settled well back, made up good ground down the inside of straight to be nearest at finish.
Moderate start, settled in forward of midfield on rails, saved ground turning in but could find nothing in straight. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Slightly slow out, forced 3-wide in midfield around stables bend, gained slightly to 2.5L 5th one off the rails 800 metres out, kept on before fading out of it inside final 100 metres. (Lame)
Travelled 3-wide without cover in 2L 4th to straight, dropped out tamely.
Settled towards the rear on rails, found nothing in straight.
Slow to begin, settling close to midfield on the paint. Made good progress on the inside after the 600m and responded well to claim the prize close to the line.
Crowded early, settling towards the tail of the field on the fence with cover. Steadily improved after the 600m, chased gamely down the running.
Settled in 2nd position, 1 off no cover. Rolled forward and assumed the lead on the fence after the 600m. Shot clear early in the straight, was collard over the final 100m.
Travelled in last position close to the fence, had cover. Kept finding the line despite hanging in and proving difficult to ride in the run home.
Settled midfield 1 off the fence with cover. Kept plugging away in the home straight without threatening.
Led early then was headed after the 600m and box seated thereafter on the rails. Faded over the final 150m.
Went back from a wide gate and raced at the rear, 3 deep with cover. Was dour in the final stretch.
Travelled wide early, then camped midfield, 3 deep with cover. Never quickened in the straight, and whacked away at the same speed.
Settled worse than midfield, 3 deep with cover. Failed to close off.
Began awkwardly then failed to muster speed settling back in the field, 1 off with cover. Made no impression in the final stretch.
Coursed wide in the early stages, on the speed. Managed to slot in and race 1 off near the 600m, without cover, in 3rd position. Never a factor.
Settled handy in the run, 2 deep with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, benefited by the strong track bias that favoring front and rail runners, fought on well in straight to score by a short head.
Raced 2.5Ls off the pace on the fence, suited by the strong track bias that favoring front and rail runners, had every chance to win in straight, however missed by a short head.
Hard ridden forward to settle 1L behind the leader 2 wide without cover, benefited by the strong track bias that favoring front and rail runners, stayed on well for 3rd.
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls off the pace on the fence, suited by the strong track bias that favoring front and rail runners, ran on steadily to get 4th without threatening.
Eased back from wide gate, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, despite harmed by the strong track bias that favoring front and rail runners, swung wide and ran on ok.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls off the pace 3 wide without cover, just held ground in straight.
Settled in front of midfield, 2.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, made no impression in straight. (Questioned for disappointing performance, see incident report)
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, not suited by the strong track bias that favoring front and rail runners, just held ground in straight.
Settled worse than midfield about 5Ls off the pace 3 wide no cover, harmed by the strong track bias that favoring front and rail runners, never a factor.
Slowly began, settled 5.5Ls off the pace on the fence, harmed by the strong track bias that favoring front and rail runners, could not find a clear run in straight, never ran on.
Taken back from wide draw, settled 6.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, harmed by the strong track bias that favoring front and rail runners, never ran on.
Sent forward, however hung out and raced greenly throughout the race, never a factor, tailed out.
Speed to lead, restrained & headed 800m, tracked lead on rail, shifted 1 off turning in, grinding effort on inner to nick verdict at wire.
Fair break, rousted to lead 800m, soon crossed to rail, shaken up turning in, drifted off rail, determined effort but mugged final nod.
Fast break, bustled to dispute lead initially, posted 2nd 1 off no cover, shifted out & driven 300m, resolute in wearing down leader, just held.
Tardy break, raced rail behind midfield, switched out on turn, driven & gradually wound up to close off strongly, drifted centre track in run.
Smart start, drifted back to race rail midfield, driven 300m & closed off soundly under pressure without threatening lead.
Fair break, gradually taken back to race rail at tail, progress 400m, switched wide into stretch, ran on for decent gains.
Sharp start, drifted back to race wide with cover behind midfield, kept on for minor inroads.
Slow start, rolled on to race 1 off with cover midfield until switched wider on turn, hard-ridden 300m, plugged on one pace.
Missed break, progress to race 1 off near rear, hard-ridden home turn, struggled in run to wire.
Awkward break & bustled initially to race 1 off with cover fore of midfield, hard-ridden final turn, tepid stretch run.
Broke OK, soon niggled along 1 off near rear, last turning for home & wide into stretch, plugged on but never a factor.
Broke with others, raced 3 wide no cover 4th, rolled on a touch 600m, ridden final turn but found little, weakened tamely.
Rousted at break, tracked lead on rail, raced keenly, switched 1 off 300m to challenge between rivals, bumped but led 150m, drew clear.
Awkward break, bustled early, settled rail near rear, 5L back & driven home turn, switched out 250m, to 2nd 50m, closing at wire.
Smart start, raced handy 1 off with cover, driven 300m, closing steadily on lead when impeded 150m, kept on for 3rd.
Sharp start to sit 2nd 1 off no cover, driven final turn, challenged for lead when bumped 150m, still every chance but all out & faded in run.
Crowded start, slotted rail midfield, even progress for pressure in stretch, off heels 100m, never a threat.
Fast break, bustled to lead & settled on fence, kicked on home turn, headed 150m, no extra & tapered.
Bumped start, taken behind from widest gate to race rail at tail, 7L back home turn, boxed on under stretch drive for minor gains.
Crowded start, raced last pair 1 off, 6L down & hard-ridden turning in, plodded at same speed past beaten rivals.
Bumped start, bustled to sit 3 deep no cover close to speed, shaken up 400m, found little for pressure, outpaced & faded.
Fair break, settled 3 deep with cover midfield, hard-driven 400m, wide final turn, outpaced & tapered out.
Awkward break & bumped, raced 1 off behind midfield, minor progress back stretch, hard driven into home run, struggled & weakened.
Rousted early stages, caught 3 wide with cover near rear, under pressure 400m, found nothing & never a factor.
Took rail and shared lead easily, strongly benefited by the rain affected track which favours front runners, made all without threat.
Settled in box seat, strongly benefited by the rain affected track which favours front runners, ran on well for 2nd.
Pushed to keep up in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leaders, not suited by the rain affected track which favours front runners, hung out 300M, dashed well 150M for 3rd.
Hard ridden to share the lead 2 wide, benefited by the rain affected track which favours front runners, passed 250M, just stayed on.
Slow away, hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, 5Ls off the leaders, harmed by the rain affected track which favours front runners, little dash in straight.
Checked early, back to last, 7Ls off the leaders on the fence, not suited by the rain affected track which favours front runners, dashed well 200M.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-4 wide, not suited by the rain affected track which favours front runners, little dash 200M despite negative racing situations.
Hard ridden but not muster, 5Ls off the leaders, trapped 2-3 wide, harmed by the rain affected track which favours front runners, held ground.
At back, 5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the rain affected track which favours front runners, held ground.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, soon weakened 300M.
Bumped start, saddle shifted, couldn't fully tested early, further back in mid, 3Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the rain affected track which favours front runners, flattened 300M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the rain affected track which favours front runners, never a factor.
Taken back from wide draw and soon on rail at rear. Improved final turn, no run 400m-200m, got split and finished strongly.
Crowded start, taken forward but wide, took lead before 1300m and cut in to rail. Drifted out turning for home, kept on strongly, caught close to line.
Ridden up to hold rail before settling two-back around first turn. Kept on steadily back stretch, came off fence 400m, kept on well but drifted out under pressure.
Crowded and unbalanced shortly after start, then crowded again before first turn, dropping back. Taken wide entering straight and ran on strongly.
Ridden forward from good draw but trapped 3-wide first turn. Rolled forward back stretch to sit outside leader, 2nd into straight, one-pace final.
Began awkwardly but settled behind midfield away from fence. Taken wide turning for more and kept on steadily to the line.
Jumped well and raced in 3rd before dropping back to 4th first turn. Left wide without cover back stretch turning one-paced from 600m despite hard riding.
Jumped well and soon on rail, holding out pacesetters before slipping into box seat back stretch. Looked chance turning for home, kept on steadily before flattened 200m.
Began well, sitting behind leader after getting cover 1200m. Lost position final turn, under hard riding from 500m but little response.
Taken forward from wide draw but trapped wide. Rolled forward from 1200m to seek cover, wide along back stretch, gave ground from 500m.
Taken back from wide draw but away from fence. Started to lose contact with main bunch from turn, finishing well back.
Flopped out of gates and soon last. Raced 3-4 wide at tail of the field, took final turn greenly, never competitive.
Reserved behind midfield, travelled well into straight, drifted out to middle of track and squeezed through narrow opening 200M, surged forward to lead 50M from home.
Urged along early stages, sat closely behind leaders, ran on well when asked 300M but could not match winner's pace final 50M.
Tracked leader, loomed a threat 250M, briefly led nearing 100M but was outrun by first 2 close home.
Held up midfield, never far off from leaders, angled out to clear 400M, lacked instant acceleration but kept grinding and was slowing gaining on leaders late.
Rushed forward from 12, crossed to the rail 1200M, took them along slowly back straight, all out turning in, caught near 100M, no extra late.
Soon taken across from 11, patiently held up near last, driven along 450M, stayed on mildly and never got near to leaders.
Raced 3-wide early, eased back to midfield for cover 1200M, driven inside 400M but not quickened.
Restrained at the start, settled near the rear, 8Ls behind at 400M, made no real progress down outside.
Held up in a 2-wide spot behind midfield, shaken up nearing 400M but only offered limited response, never dangerous.
Never far off from the pace but travelled only fairly, shifted out to 3-wide 600M, found little under pressure, eased when no chance mid-straight.
Dropped back to last over 10Ls off the pace, came under serious pressure as early as 600M, tailed off turning into straight, eased. (Irregular Heart Rhythm.)

Placing: PU
Comment: Sent forward tracking leader, gave ground rapidly passing 600M, pulled up. (Irregular Heart Rhythm.)

Began well from a wide gate, took up running 900 metres out and soon crossed to rails, kicked clear under pressure passing 200 metres, eased up.
Never far off in 5th or 4th despite an awkward start, came to challenge upon straightening, ran on steadily without threatening.
Settled just worse than midfield, finished off race nicely.
Settled just worse than midfield, produced good late impression inside final 200 metres.
Ridden to lead, ceded advantage coming out of back straight, came off rails to challenge shortly after straightening, found nothing inside final 300 metres.
Slightly slow out, soon picked up to forward of midfield, similar into straight, shifted out for a run before shifting back in over 250 metres out, kept on well to finish.
Soon taken well back from a wide gate, remained last into straight, ran on past well-beaten horses.
Jumped moderately, soon picked up to close-up 3rd one off the rails, faded steadily inside final 300 metres.
Not far off until approaching straight, faded gradually.
Soon dropped to midfield on rails despite driven along, saved ground on rails turning in, found nothing in straight.
Began awkwardly, soon dropped to rear, found nothing under pressure in straight.
Settled in last few on rails, dropped out tamely in straight.
Began moderately, settled wide without cover in midfield, found nothing in straight.
Rated 3 back the rails, had cover. Held up early in the straight, saw daylight near the 300m, got going thereafter to clinch the prize.
Held a position worse than midfield on the paint with cover. Finished off well over the final 100m.
Had every chance after traveling 1 out 1 back. Maintained a sound gallop down the running.
Enjoyed the run of the race, box seating. Battled away fairly to make the frame.
Worked forward and settled outside the leader, no cover. Was in front at the furlong but gave ground approaching the 100m.
Parked midfield, 1 off with cover, had every possible chance but failed to close off.
Settled at the rear of the field, on the paint with cover. Passed tiring runners in the run to the line.
Travelled 3-4 wide on the circle with some cover. Peeled out deep on straightening, was dour in the home stretch.
Began awkwardly then didn't muster settling at the rear of the field, 1 off with cover. Plodded to the finishing line.
Camped midfield, 3 deep with cover. Shifted wide on straightening, did nothing when asked for an effort in the run home.
Sent forward and crossed to lead on the paint near the 800m. Was well beaten at the furlong.
Drifted back to settle behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Never fired.
Went back from a wide gate, racing 2-3 deep with cover. Failed to close off.
Never looked likely after being posted 3 deep on the circle, no cover, behind the speed. Struggled in the home stretch.
Settled worse than midfield about 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide, despite hampered by the slow pace, swung wide turning in, stormed home to score by a short head.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, despite not suited by the slow pace, 1000M hampered, 900M checked, dashed well to get 2nd, missed by a short head.
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, despite harmed by the slow pace, checked 1000M, dashed strongly when clear 200M for 3rd, just missed by a neck.
Eased start, travelled 6Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, despite not suited by the slow pace, close to the line well to get 4th, just missed by a neck.
Sent forward to park outside the leader, benefited by the slow pace, run-ended over the last few strides.
Rolled to obtain the box seat, suited by the slow pace, however only kept on one pace to the line.
Raced midfield, travelled 4.5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, ran on well until 100M weakened.
Hard ridden forward to settle 2Ls behind the leader2 wide, suited by the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Lacked early speed, settled worse than midfield about 7Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite hampered by the slow pace, ran on ok inside 100M.
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along, travelled 3Ls behind the leader 3 wide no cover, one-paced in straight and checked close to the line.
Began slowly, travelled 8Ls behind the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, stayed inside, ran on only fairly.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, 900M hampered, ran on fairly.
Rolled forward to share the lead, benefited by the slow pace, however weakened over the last furlong.
Always at rear, never a factor.
Taken back at break to race rail in rear, progress 800m, switched out & driven 400m, closed late centre track to nick win close home.
Broke well to sit 1 back on rail, shaken up 400m to lead on inner 350m, kicked clear, all out final 100m, nailed on wire.
Fair break, raced rail midfield, ridden into stretch, switched out 250m & briefly 2nd 100m, driven for dour third at wire.
Lacked pace at break, rolled to midfield 1 off with cover, switched out in stretch, boxed to brief 2nd 180m, little extra, tapered to wire.
Tardy start, bustled to sit just off rail behind midfield, switched out & driven 430m, stayed on evenly.
Broke well, sat handy 4th 1 off with cover, under pressure turning in, plugged on same speed.
Snagged back at break, raced last pair 1 off with cover, switched out 500m, wide into stretch, boxed on for modest gains.
Fair break, trapped 4 wide no cover near rear, very wide into stretch, struggled in run home.
Broke well, failed to hold place, drifted back to rear 3 deep, bustled at tail 600m, plugged on past beaten rivals.
Bustled at break, slotted 3 deep with cover & drifted back behind midfield, wider into stretch & outpaced, plodded on evenly.
Speed to lead, raced on fence, shifted 1 off into stretch, driven 400m, all out & headed 350m, faded thereafter.
Fast break widest gate, worked to sit 1 off no cover 2nd, all out to press lead 350m, no extra & weakened in run.
Broke OK, over-raced early behind midfield, found nothing in stretch, weakened tamely.
Broke with others, rousted early in behind pace but unable to lay up, back to midfield 3 deep no cover, niggled 600m, struggled & faded.
Snagged back at break, raced rail at tail, switched out 5L back on turn & shaken up 400m, surged centre track to lead last strides.
Sluggish start, recovered to sit fore of midfield 1 off with cover, switched out & driven 400m, strong closer to 2nd close home.
Tardy start, bustled to press lead 3 wide, settled 1 off no cover on leader's outer, driven to lead 350m, all out when headed close home.
Broke OK, raced 3 wide with cover fore of midfield, hard-ridden turning in, driven to 3rd 200m, tapered to wire.
Niggled early, raced last pair 1 off, switched out for progress 800m, driven wide home turn, closed off for sound gains.
Speed to lead, to rail 800m, narrow advantage & ridden turning in, headed 350m, battled on same pace.
Scrubbed early to sit midfield on fence, sound closer against rail in stretch until nowhere to go final 100m.
Fast start, rousted in attempt to lay up on rail, settled one back, driven into stretch, one-paced in run home.
Fair break, soon raced 1 off near rear, forced 3 wide 700m, driven 400m & outpaced, kept on moderately to line.
Dropped in to race rail near rear, switched 1 off 700m, kept on one pace in stretch.
Good start, trapped wide with cover midfield, checked 600m & 4 wide no cover, in rear & widest into stretch, soon weakened out.
Fast start, trapped wide no cover front rank, pressed lead final turn, emptied 350m & wilted.
Pushed to take rail and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on to score.
Settled in box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, ran on for 2nd.
In front of midfield, 3Ls off the leaders along the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash 250M for 3rd.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, raced keenly, not suited by the slow pace, dashed well 300M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed well 400M, but run ended 100M.
Very slow away, hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, 4Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Crossed easily in front, shared lead 2 wide at advantageous slow sectionals, emptied 250M.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, no turn of foot.
Eased to rear, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, blocked 4-2, little dash when clear.
Trapped 3-4 wide in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the slow pace, out of fuel 300M.
Midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, lack room 400M, weakened 250M.
Pressed forward, 1.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, soon emptied 350M.
Always at back, not suited by the slow tempo, never a factor.
Eased to rear, harmed by the slow pace, trapped 3-4 wide, tailed out.
Began well, ridden to hold out early leader before taking lead 800m. Kicked clear entering straight and pulled away for easy win under hands and heels riding.
Began fairly then hard to be ridden before turn to hold inside position. Held for run 400m to 250m, ran on strongly under whip when clear.
A little slow into stride but made up ground quickly to sit 3rd before dropping into box seat turn. Kept on steadily in straight under hard riding.
Began awkwardly then bumped by eventual winner dropping back. Shifted out 900m only to race in restricted room. Switched to centre of track 400m, doing best work final 200m.
Began best and led for 200m before dropping back to 3rd when passed by swooper. Fourth into straight and kept on one-paced to line.
Not rushed early but gradually improved to sit behind leading bunch into turn. Swung wide into stride and kept on one-paced.
Jumped OK but soon in restricted room and cut closer to fence. Still in restricted room turn and early in straight. One paced when clear.
Ridden forward from wide draw to sit 3rd early before dropping 2-back, one-off into turn. Taken 4-wide turning for home but found little under hard riding.
No early pace, moved closer to but away from fence to turn. Hard ridden from 400m running past tired horses.
Outpaced early, dropping to last pair along fence. Put under pressure entering straight, making some ground late.
Ridden forward from wide draw but trapped 3-wide without cover before turn. Under whip from 300m but failed to make ground and eased final strides.
Taken back from wide draw to find cover but still held 3-wide entering turn. Gradually lost position turn and plodded final 200m.
Began well but not enough speed and gradually shuffled back towards rear. No response when shown whip entering straight.
Had head turned when gates opened and slow into stride. Swooped around field to sit outside leader at turn. Still 2nd entering straight before running on empty and slipping back.
Placed along the inside rail, always in touch, held up for clear running early straight, came through a narrow gap near 200M, closed off well to wear down the leader last stride.
Settled 3Ls behind leader in 4th, swept to the lead 250M, continued on well only to be caught by winner final stride.
Lost ground at the start, recovered to race behind midfield, held up early straight, ran on to chase first two final 150M but was well held.
Restrained near the rear, shaken up 450M but lacked instant acceleration, got going late and narrowly lost out on 3rd place.
Switched off to the rear, 7Ls off leader in middle stages, held up early straight but finished off only fairly once a clear run presented mid-straight.
Tracked the pace, brief effort early straight, faded final 200M.
Soon taken across behind runners, settled on the outside of rear pair, not quickened under pressure, never involved.
Led steadily first half, went quicker in the 3rd quarter, headed 250M, weakened badly near 100M.
Jumped well and raced up on pace first turn, caught wide without cover 1000m, began run 600m, joint leader into straight, took lead 300m, kept on strongly to line.
Settled behind midfield away from fence first turn and back stretch. Began forward move 650m, wide into straight, picking up momentum from 200m, closest at finish.
Jumped best and led for several strides before being taken out and shuffled back 1000m. Turned 3-wide and kept on strongly in straight.
Outpaced and trapped wide first turn. Ridden patiently back stretch, moved up turning for home and ran on strongly to be closest at finish.
Jumped well, switched in first turn. Didn't settle 1000m, came off fence but raced in restricted room. Kept on well in straight to just miss the frame.
Began awkwardly, steadied and dropped towards rear. Came off fence turn to challenge but shifted in 400m, and then again 100m. Kept on steadily.
Slow into stride but recovered and made ground along fence to sit midfield back stretch. Found passage between horses 300m and closed in steadily.
Taken back from wide draw and last into first turn and back stretch. Went around one horse entering straight and kept on one paced.
Taken back from wide draw towards rear. Made ground under hard riding from 400m before turning one-paced 200m.
Taken forward from wide draw but trapped 3-wide. Rolled forward first turn to sit outside leader back stretch. Battled on entering straight before flattened 200m.
Taken forward from wide gate to lead into first turn, crossing to fence when passed 1000m. Stayed on fence to straight, kept on initially before emptying 200m.
Jumped well, rolled forward to sit 2nd into first turn, taking over lead back stretch. Set solid pace to 400m before tiring.
Crowded start, dropping to rear and moving closer to fence. Shuffled to last entering straight and never competitive.
Jumped fairly, travelled keenly into first turn, trapped wide with no cover from 1000m. Never likely. (Tactics questioned).
Took a midfield role, 3-4ls back in running line, no excuses to bend, gained a run at 300m point and let down strongly, gained advantage and won a shade cozily.
Enjoyed run of race on leaders back, steady sections to suit to turn, run presented inside 300m and finished off soundly to take placing.
Settled in midfield 3 wide with cover, only 3ls back in a bunched field on circled, set out after leaders at 300m and hit lead at 200m, peaked inside 100m but held on for 3rd.
Tardy getaway, taken back to rear on rails, 6ls back with steady sections, took inside runs turning and held up to 250m, closed soundly late when clear to make frame.
Forced into a tough journey 3 wide without cover, only 2ls back with standard sections, improved and in mix turning, kept on creditably in straight to be not far off them.
Showed usual pace to take up running, set even sectionals in front, headed soon after straightening, didn't look likely from that point but stayed on evenly all the same.
Had an ideal run in 1 out 1 back spot, steady pace suited to bend, in traffic turning but just one paced when clear running presented and just battle don at one speed.
Restrained to settle back with last few, 6-7ls from leaders, even pace not ideal, well back turning, passed a few in straight but never likely.
Taken back from a wide gate, raced 3 wide at rear 7ls back, set a task still last and coming wide bend, made some moderate headway late.
Unable to slot in, ended up 3 and 4 wide for duration without cover 4ls back, did work but was only 1l down turning, not much extra final 300m after hard run.
Raced 3-4ls back on rails, all favours in run, held up turning to 250m, didn't really get into race and only had a moderate response when clear (see racing incidents).
Pressed on to race outside leader, even run throughout, struggling soon after turning and gave in cheaply and dropped right off.
Ordinarily away but mustered and soon overaced hung out badly when over-racing on top turn, continued to race intractably in mid-section, came wider bend but didn't finish off (lame).
Caught 3 and 4 wide from a tricky gate, forced wider by unruly horse, 6ls back and kept improving even wider on bend, no finish in straight given workload.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
