Settled just worse than midfield, went wide into straight, quickened under pressure to assert authority close to home.
Began moderately, raced freely in first few, took up running from slow pace over halfway out, broke over 1L clear shortly after straightening, swamped by winner late but just hung on for 2nd.
Towards the rear, closed off well final 300M, nearest finish.
Settled around midfield, commenced move rounding home bend, finished off race nicely despite lay in under pressure early in straight.
Broke well, settled in 3rd or 4th on rails, became some 3L back coming out of far side when pace quickened, switched off rails for a run entering straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Ridden to join leader before stables bend, remained in similar position despite the leader change far side, ran home one-paced.
Jumped well, soon taken back to race in the middle of the pack on rails, saved ground turning in, raced tight between runners early in straight, found no extra closing stages.

Began only fairly from the middle draw, gradually took up running and led until headed approaching the Rock, in 3rd on rails behind leader when hampered over 500 metres out, weakened out of it inside final 200 metres.
Well behind, ran past well-beaten horses in the run home.
Began fairly, soon taken back to worse than midfield travelling 3-wide most of way, carried much wider turning in, did nothing in straight. (Lame next day)
Travelled wide without cover in forward of midfield, weakened out of contention into straight.
Jumped awkwardly losing ground, soon dropped to last few, made no impression in straight. (Lame)
Made its run from back in the field, 3-4 deep had some cover on the circle. Straighten up widest and finished off willingly to take control of the race 50m from home.
Gradually worked forward to cross and lead on the fence near the 700m. kept on gamely right to the winning post.
Camped behind midfield, 2 wide with cover. Finished off well.
Parked midfield, 1 off with cover. Maintained a reasonable gallop down the running to figure in the frame.
Dueled for the lead early before box seating midrace. Was still with a chance at the furlong but was swamped late.
Crowded for room at then was shuffled back near the 600m, settling with the backmakers, 3 deep had cover on the circle. Closed off soundly coming wide in the straight.
Couldn't go the early speed of the race and was steadied near the 1000m, and took up midfield position 3 deep with cover. Kept on at the same speed in the run to the line.
Ridden along early settling midfield on the rails with cover. Whacked away at the same speed in the final stretch.
Went back from the outside alley and settled in last position on the paint with cover. Passed tiring runners in the run home.
Eventually settled outside the leader, 1 off no cover. Faded over the final 150m.
Traveled 3 wide without cover in the leading division. Punctured in the home straight.
Never looked likely after coursings 4 wide without cover on the speed. Was beaten early in the home straight.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide, gradually improved rounding the Home Turn, dashed well and scored impressively by 2Ls. (substantial amount of blood in the horse's trachea)
Hard ridden forward to lead by 1L, hung on well for 2nd but without any threats to the winner.
Sent forward to take the lead, eased to take the box seat 800M, ran on steadily for 3rd without threatening.
Settled worse than midfield about 3.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, swung wide turning in, made some ground in straight.
At rear, travelled 4Ls off the pace on the fence, stayed inside, made some ground in straight.
Prominent, settled 1L behind the leader 2 wide with cover, kept on one pace in straight.
Settled in front of midfield, travelled 2Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, one-paced home.
Always at rear, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, passed some tired runners in straight.
Eased to rear, settled 5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, never ran on.
Eased at start, settled 4Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, made no impression in straight. (Questioned for riding, see incident report)
Pressed forward to park outside the leader, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, soon emptied after straightening, tailed out.
Rolled forward, settled 2.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, under pressure 650M, eased down 200M, tailed out. (Questioned for disappointing performance, see incident report)
Smart start, camped midfield 1 off with cover, switched out final turn, sweeping run centre track to lead 50m, in command at wire.
Dropped in at break, sat behind midfield 1 off, driven turning in, strong closing run to claim 2nd close home.
Skirted field to lead 4 wide 1000m, clear & crossed to rail 600m, kicked for home 250m, all out & headed 50m.
Speed to lead initially, soon headed, settled handy 1 off with cover, driven 500m, battled on evenly to wire.
Smart break, raced handy on fence, ridden turning for home & switched out, boxed on one pace until tapered late.
Fast break, rousted initially & settled 3 deep no cover midfield, forced wide home turn, kept on soundly for moderate inroads.
Fair break wide, unable to slot, over-raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, widest into stretch, kept on gamely for minor gains.
Fast break, led very briefly 3 wide 1100m, slotted 2nd 1 off in back stretch, driven 300m but unable to close, emptied 150m & swamped.
Slow start & soon at tail, settled last pair 1 off, found little for stretch drive & plugged home one pace.
Broke well & restrained, raced midfield on rail, driven into stretch, struggled home at one pace.
Outpaced early strides, raced last pair on fence, hard-ridden top of stretch, never a factor.
Held up 1 off with cover near rear, advanced 3 wide with cover 700m, wide into stretch, relentless progress to lead close home.
Ridden early to race handy, tracked pace 1 off, switched out & driven turning in, led under pressure 200m, headed last strides.
Broke well, settled 1 off behind midfield, progress 3 wide after halfway, wide into stretch, driven to press lead 200m, run tapered.
Fair break, camped rail near rear, niggled 600m, driven 300m, closed off well without posing a threat.
Good break, raced rail fore of midfield, shifted out into stretch & driven, kept on soundly to wire.
Snagged back to race at tail, switched wide for progress home turn, closed off well for solid gains.
Smart start, slotted rail midfield, switched 1 off in back stretch, shuffled back 800m, ran home soundly without threatening.
Broke with others, crowded & lost ground early, raced 1 off with cover midfield, one-paced in tepid stretch run.
Smart start, niggled early, posted 3 wide no cover until pressed lead 1 off 800m, led into stretch, headed 250m, weakened thereafter.
Crowded start, speed to race near fore & rolled to lead 1100m, headed turning for home & faded tamely.
Speed early to lead, crossed to rail 1200m & over-raced, headed 1100m, raced 1 back on fence, niggled 700m, struggled in run home.
Awkward break, advanced to settle 3 wide with cover fore of midfield, progress on turn, wide into stretch & emptied 300m, no extra.
Pushed forward to cross, settled 1.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, closed off strongly to score only by a short head.
Hard ridden to cross in front, shared the lead 2 wide at advantageous slow sectionals, ran on strongly to the line, just beaten by a narrow margin in 2nd.
Checked early, pushed to obtain the box seat, enjoyed the slow sectionals, ran on well for 3rd.
Hard ridden to take rail and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on well until 50M flattened.
Eased at start, too cover at rear, 7Ls off the leaders 2 wide, blocked most straight, dashed strongly despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, dashed well 200M.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in front, however checked badly, ended up 4Ls off the leaders along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Eased back, 4Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, trapped 3 wide, moved forward as the pace steadied from 800M, weakened 150M.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide throughout, not suited by the slow tempo, no turn of foot.
Bumped start, eased back, checked early, 5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Bumped start, eased back, checked early, 5Ls of the leaders on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Jumped fairly but quickly into stride to lead clearly before turn. Swung wide entering straight but kept on strongly to line holding off late challenge.
Began well but allowed to settle 2-back, one-off before turn. Lost position entering straight but picked up momentum and ran on strongly from 200m.
Punched forward from wide draw but unable to slot in and raced without cover. Covered extra ground turn but kept on well, shifting in final stages.
Hard ridden to hold rail after start, sat behind leader to turn. Got rails runs when leader swung wide but unable close gap. One-paced.
Jumped well then eased 2-back the fence on settling. Peeled out to make challenge 400m, kept on steadily to the line.
Caught wide soon after start, forced to cover extra ground turn, swung wide into straight, kept on one-paced.
Jumped well but close on heels into turn and then checked 500m. Kept on steadily in straight until blocked for run final stages.
Began fairly but moved up quickly to join leading bunch before turn. Rolled forward to sit outside leader 600m, looked chance 400m, but one-paced.
Ridden quietly dropping back to near last before turn. Switched wide entering straight, put under whip early but only one paced. Collapsed after race.
Outpaced and trapped 3-wide early behind midfield. Lost position turn, one-paced final 400m.
Crowded and lost ground start. Cut in to rail, improved around turn, one-paced straight, bumped and unbalanced close to line.
Fractious in gate, began awkwardly, losing ground. Tailed field thereafter, bumping second-last horse close to line.
Travelled strongly behind leaders, quickened well turning home, dueled with eventual 2nd from 200M and always holding on.
Held up behind midfield, came through strongly on the inner, joined leader form 200M, dueled all the way to the finish, just denied.
Settled near rear along the 2-path, took outside route passing 400M, stayed on well and got up for 3rd near line.
Held up in midfield, responded well early straight, went 3rd passing 150M, unable to trouble first two, lost 3rd near line.
Settled 2-wide in the chasing group, had every chance, stayed on mildly without getting to first two.
Held up in mid-division, placed under pressure 500M, stayed on mildly.
Settled near the rear, made limited progress turning home and was never a threat to leaders.
Tracked pace early stages, ranked alongside leader from 900M, stayed in contention until weakening 150M.
Taken back to last about 8Ls off leaders, found disappointingly little and made no real progress over final 300M.
Urged forward, shared lead on the inside and maintained a steady pace throughout, headed inside 300M, weakened final 150M.
Fractious in stalls, failed to muster speed at early stages, caught 3-wide without cover in midfield, gave ground 600M, finished distant last. (Unacceptable Performance.)

Broke well and amongst leaders early, obtained rails run approaching home bend before shifting back for cover around the bend, held up for a run in straight until the 300M, quickened well to take command inside final 100M.
Began well, settled in 6th or 5th within 3L of pace, came to challenge upon straightening holding every chance 200 metres out, soon outsprinted.
Travelled mainly within 3L of pace in 6th or 5th on rails, checked and lost position when pace steadied 800 metres out, saved ground turning in, ran on steadily to reach 3rd late.
Jumped moderately, in last few when crowded and dropped to second last 1000 metres out, trailed the field into straight, finished off race well down the centre of the track.
Began well from a wide draw, travelled just outside leader most of way hitting front momentarily 200 metres out, faded under pressure.
Jumped awkwardly losing ground, trailed the field to 600 metres, saved ground on rails turning in, inconvenienced twice at 300 and 200 metres out, ran home one-paced.

Broke well to contest lead from the widest gate, eventually crossed to rails in front coming out of back straight, led until tiring badly passing 250 metres. (Tactic questioned and revealed a roarer after race.)
Jumped fairly, gradually improved to a prominent position but wide without cover around the bend, with leaders briefly on straightening but folded up quickly under pressure. (Mucus)
Sluggish start, ridden to pick up along rails reaching rear of midfield briefly 1000 metres out, towards rear turning for home, no extra.
Jumped fairly, soon dropped towards the rear in 8th, unbalanced 1000 metres out and travelled 3-wide around the bend, did nothing in straight.
Eventually settled 5th position, 1 off with cover. Hit the front approaching the 200m and won well.
Parked midfield the fence. Kept to the inside in the final stretch and made good ground right to the line.
Camped close to midfield, 3 wide with cover. Closed off soundly.
Made its run from the rear of the field after settling on the fence with cover. Closed off well through runners to make the frame.
Settled in handy position just in front of midfield, 3 deep with cover. Made steady progress down the running.
Dictated terms on the fence. Had no excuses, fading over the concluding stages.
Raced keenly in the early stages whilst travelling in second position outside the leader. Was in front early in the straight but gave way over the final 100m.
Travelled midfield, 1 off with cover. Kept on at the same speed in the home stretch.
Had every possible chance after box seating. Gave ground near the furlong.
Travelled ahead of midfield, but posted 4 deep without cover for most of the trip. Never likely. Vet rep lame RF leg.
Jumped only fairly but soon gathered momentum and went forward. Was eased in the early stages and was then posted 3 deep without cover on the speed. Only plodded to the line. (see incident report)
Travelled at the tail of the field, 2 deep with cover. Struggled in the home stretch.
Rated back in the field, 2 deep with cover. Failed to close off.
Settled worse than midfield 3 deep with cover. Tailed out in the home straight. Vet Rep mucopus in the trachea and to be mildly lame in the right hind leg. To Trial.
Rolled forward to share the lead, under pressure 350M and finished off strong to score by a neck.
Camped handy, gradually improved near the course proper, dashed on well for 2nd but winner too strong.
Rolled forward to share the lead, under pressure near the course proper, hung on well to get 3rd but without any threats to the first two.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls behind the leader, ran on well to get 4th.
Sent forward and take the lead along the stand rail, under pressure near the course proper, weakened over the last furlong.
Eased back as usual, settled 8Ls off the pace, finished off ok inside 200M.
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along, settled 4.5Ls behind the leader along the stand rail, struggled to respond.
Raced worse than midfield, niggled along throughout, passed some tired runners without threatening.
Began slowly, settled 3Ls behind the leader near the grand side, ran on only fairly.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls off the pace, struggled near the course proper, never ran on.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls off the pace in the middle of the track, under pressure near the course proper, failed to respond. (substantial amount of blood in its trachea)
Always at rear, settled 7Ls off the pace, never ran on.
Began awkwardly, then ridden to obtain midfield position, weakened 400M, tailed out.
Always at rear, never a factor, tailed out.
Speed to lead on rail, headed out of 1st turn, tracked 1 back, switched out home turn, shaken up 400m, stayed on to lead 100m, held on.
Snagged back to rail behind midfield, ridden 600m, sound closer in stretch, switched out 250m, edged to 2nd 100m, always held.
Fair break, raced 4th 1 off with cover, niggled to close 600m, challenged lead 400m, edged in front 300m, all out & headed 100m.
Held up & camped in rear 1 off, 10L back & switched out for wide run 430m, rattled home centre track, just missed frame.
Smart break, eased back early & slotted midfield 1 off, driven 800m, outpaced on turn, stayed on for centre track gains, peaked on run close home.
Tardy start & bustled, rolled on to race rail midfield, shifted out home turn, stayed on dourly.
Taken behind to race 1 off near rear, 9L back final turn & switched wide into stretch, closed off soundly without threatening.
Smart start, rolled forward to settle 2nd 1 off no cover, pressed lead 600m, led into stretch, headed 300m, battled on until tapered final 100m.
Good break, slotted rail fore of midfield, switched out home turn & driven, one-paced in run home.
Taken back at break, raced rail near rear, driven home turn, outpaced in run, switched out 300m, plugged on for modest inroads.
Restrained to race at tail, niggled 1500m, 11L last when driven & switched out into stretch, plugged on for minor inroads.
Sharp start, sat 1 off with cover fore of midfield, shifted out home turn, stayed on dourly.
Awkward break, raced behind midfield 1 off with cover, driven 600m, found little & struggled in run home.
Broke well, led out of 1st turn, to rail 1600m, under pressure & ridden home turn, emptied & faded tamely.
Smart start, tracked leader, switched out to stands' rail shaken up to lead 300m, quickened clear, eased down close home.
Broke well, raced close 2nd, ridden 400m, drifted to centre track, kept on soundly.
Moderate break, raced back of midfield, driven 400m, ran home strongly to go 3rd 75m, closing but no match for winner.
Speed to lead, all out & headed 300m, battled on but no extra & weakened in run to wire.
Fair break, settled midfield, niggled along 700m, driven 400m, boxed on one pace.
Sluggish start, raced rail near rear, driven 500m, switched out 250m, ran on for minor gains.
Started OK, niggled along behind midfield, driven 400m, kept on one pace to wire.
Fair break, speed to sit handy 3rd, bustled 500m, emptied 300m & faded thereafter.
Fair break, bustled behind midfield, driven 400m, stayed on one pace.
Broke OK, soon racing in rear, ran on for pressure past beaten rivals.
Slow start, raced detached at tail, stayed on for pressure far-side, modest gains in run to wire.
Smart start, raced handy on fence, ridden under pressure 400m, faded tamely.
Tardy break, raced behind midfield centre track, found nothing for pressure, weakened out.

Placing: DNF
Comment: Smartly away, raced midfield, shaken up 600m, broke down 400m.
Eased to sit in midfield early but trapped very wide, moved forward 1000M to take the advantages of the slow tempo outside the leader, closed off strongly 300M to win.
Settled in front, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed by the slow sectionals, ran on well for 2nd.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 0.5Ls at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on well until 150M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield along the fence, 3.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 4Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, checked 800M, harmed by the slow pace, just held ground.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, flattened 300M.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader, trapped 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash in straight.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, 7Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, held up 4-2, ran on fairly when clear.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, no progress.
Very slow away, not suited by the slow pace, never better than midfield.
Very slow away, 6Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, checked 800M, harmed by the slow tempo, no progress.
Eased back, harmed by the slow pace, never a factor.
Pushed to obtain box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, however dropped off quickly 400M.
A little slow into stride, picked up quickly to sit 3rd behind leader at 800m. Came off fence 400, led 200m, held off late challenge.
Allowed to settle along rail behind midfield. Took inside run entering straight, tight for room 200m, flashed home when clear, just missed.
Jumped well but allowed to settle along fence in midfield to straight. Taken wide entering straight and kept on well to line. Lame right front.
No early speed and trailed field until straight when taken wide and finished strongly down centre of track.
Jumped well but made to work to keep lead by another runner. Led clearly around turn, still ahead 250m, tired final stages.
Began well and raced on his own in 4th place for most of the trip. Took inside run 400m but one-paced and unable close gap.
Taken back from start and settled at rear to turn. Made strong dash from 400m but run ended 200m, one-paced.
Hard ridden to get lead but unable to get clear and settle behind leader before turn. Kept on battling till 200m before tiring and slipping back.
Began fairly before settling behind pace but away from fence. Failed to respond under hard riding from 400m, tiring quickly from 200m.
Placed ahead of midfield, picked up well and sent to the front before 200M, soon lengthened away, won unchallenged.
Settle towards the rear, stated on well to go 2nd 100M out but no impression on the runaway winner.
Began awkwardly, settled 2-wide behind midfield, ran on for a non-threatening 3rd.
Held up 3-wide near last, pushed out 500M and made some progress early straight, turned one pace final 150M.
Reserved in the rear pack over 10Ls behind leaders in middle stages, saved ground on the inner, stayed on mildly before being steadied 150M.
Shared lead early stages, emerged to lead from 1000M, headed by winner 250M, weakened and swamped over final 100M.
Fractious in barriers, slowly away, ended up near the rear, held up until switching back to the inside near 300M, didn't find much under pressure.
Tracked leader, weakened 300M, soon out of contention.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, kept on same pace turning in, never threatened.
Slow to begin, held up in mid-division along the fence, not quickened and got tired passing 200M.
Taken back to the rear, plenty to do turning home, switched wide for his run but not never going the pace to challenge.
Held up towards the rear, caught 3-wide no cover throughout, not used until 450M, failed to pick up.
Raced keenly behind leaders, outpaced and fell back to midfield over the home turn, didn't respond to riding, soon faded out of contention.
Tracked leader, gave ground passing 500M, dropped to last mid-straight, eased.
Taken forward but unable slot in and held between horses 800m. Lost position around turn, switched out 400m, picked up quickly from 200m, shifted out abruptly final stages.
Ridden forward to hold fence in box seat behind leader. Come off fence 400m, took lead 200m, swamped final strides.
Crowded start and taken back to fence behind runners. Made forward move 600m, wide into straight, ran on strongly but hampered final stages.
Crowded after start and taken back, moving closer to fence. Switched out entering straight, ran on well but hung in under pressure 80m, forcing jockey to stop riding.
Jumped well to sit outside leader before being eased one-back, one-off into turn. Kept on steadily in straight but unable to close gap.
Taken forward from outside draw and trapped 3-wide back stretch and turn. Kept on steadily in straight before shifting about under pressure final stages.
Fractious in gate but jumped well and lead field a merry chase until 250m when tired and drifted back gradually.
Jumped fairly but then raced fiercely and refused to settle. Held for run early in straight, picking up momentum when clear.
Ridden forward from wide draw and trapped wide in midfield around turn. Taken wide into straight but kept on steadily.
Fractious in gate but jumped OK and held behind midfield around turn. Badly held up for run 400m, got clear 300m before blocked 150m. Kept on one-paced.
Outpaced early but held fence three-back from leader. Stayed on fence entering straight but only one-paced final 200m.
Began fairly but held on to fence. Reluctant to stretch out when racing in restricted room entering turn and slipped back to last. No response in straight.
Ridden forward from wide draw but didn't settle and took turn awkwardly. Help up for a run 400m when giving ground.
Began well, took nice spot behind leader, came 1 off rounding circle, put into race at 400m and soon went clear, margin reduced late on but still held off rival for a solid victory.
Taken back from outside gate, shared rear 7ls from top end, always well back to turn, produced a strong finish making many lengths in straight but just couldn't peg back winner last 50m.

Positioned in midfield but always wide from a tricky draw, 4 wide with cover 5ls away in middle stages, improved turning and made run with eventual 2nd but lacked dash to match principals final furlong.
Did share of work early to work across from a wide gate and race outside leader, right up there on circle, looked a place chance at 200m but couldn't sustain effort after working early.
Moderate beginning, raced behind midfield 6ls or more from lead, had an easy time to turn, switched wider turning and made some steady progress without looking likely. (respiratory noise reported)
Settled in a midfield role, 4-5ls back on rails, not asked in mid-section, not much room early in straight, made some minor progress but just stayed on at 1 speed last 200m.
Positioned around midfield early, racing 2 wide, was keen in middle stages and shifted 3 wide with cover, 3-4ls down turning, finished off just fairly in straight.
Went forward but never on track, raced 3 and 4 wide without cover on circle, kept improving position to join in turning, folded from 200m when early work told.
Took up a spot in midfield, 4ls or so off lead, fair run to bend, didn't finish off as had done recently just battling away in straight.
Drifted back to race 6ls off lead in running line, behind midfield throughout, came widest in straight and closed to 200m before run ended.
Pressed forward from a tricky gate but unable to slot in, raced 3 wide with cover 2ls back, struggling turning and faded out of contention in straight.
Shared rear 7ls or so away, still had field to beat on bend, never in contention and only passed tired runners in run to line.
Fair getaway, raced 3ls back behind pace trio, close enough turning but was held up and carried back by tiring leader and never really go a crack.
Showed good early speed to push on and take lead, kept advantage to top of straight but soon under pressure, compounded quickly to be beaten a long way.

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Jumped fairly, took up running after first 200 metres crossing to rails coming out of far side, held clear advantage turning for straight, hung on well.
Began well from a wide draw, gradually crossed to rails in 2nd inside leader, shifted out for a run entering straight, kept on same pace without quickening.
Broke well, ridden along early before settling in 2L 4th, become 3rd rounding home bend, carried wider turning in, shifted in under pressure in straight, kept on well without quickening.
Jumped moderately to settle in last few, saved ground on inside turning for home, fought on nicely home.
Settled in midfield, kept on steadily behind runners in the run home.
Jumped moderately, settled well behind, finished off race nicely down the centre of the track.
Settled wide without cover in forward of midfield, kept on well in the run home.
Settled two back on rails in 3rd or 4th, ran home one-paced.
Soon taken back from a wide gate to settle well behind, saved ground on rails turning in, made no impression on inside in the run home.
Sluggish at start, hard ridden to midfield along rails, similar turning in, one-paced under pressure. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Taken back towards the rear from the widest gate racing wide without cover throughout, one-paced home.
Settled towards the rear, one-paced in straight.
Effectively raced 1 out 1 back. Responded well to pressure in the straight to have the race in its keeping 50m from home.
Sent forward and led on the paint. Maintained a good gallop right to the wire.
Kept up a game performance after being posted on the speed, 3 wide and no cover. Finished off soundly despite wanting to lay in over the final 100m.
Rated third from the rear, close to the rails with cover. Ran on well to make the frame.
Ridden aggressively from a wide alley in the early stages, settling outside the leader in 2nd position. Faded over the final stages.
Travelled close to midfield, 2 deep with cover. Didn't pick up as expected after the 500m but managed to make steady ground, once balance in the run home.
Settled in last position close to the rail with cover. Really motored home along the inside but was severely checked when disappointed for running close to the line.
Had every possible hope after box seating. Kept on evenly in the home straight.
Settled worse than midfield, 3 wide with cover. Boxed on in the final stretch at the same speed.
Taken back from a wide gate and settled in a rearward position 2-3 wide with cover. Came wide in the straight but failed to close off.
Fractious in the gates and began poorly, losing ground. Recovered to settle midfield the fence. Battled away at the same pace in the home straight.
Parked ahead of midfield 3 wide with cover. Did nothing in the home straight and finished well back.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on well to score by 1L.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, stayed inside and ran on well to get 2nd but without any threats to the winner.
Eased back, settled 4Ls off the pace 2 wide, dashed well for 3rd when clear 250M.
Taken back, travelled 4.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on steadily to get 4th.
Rolled forward to take the fence and led by a neck, hung on well until 150M overhauled.
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along, then travelled wide and without cover until 800M to stride forward to park outside the leader, out of fuel 200M.
At rear, travelled 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on only fairly.
Ridden forward to park outside the leader, eased 800M for cover, kept on only one pace until 150M weakened.
Taken back from a wide gate, settled 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide, swung widest however never ran on.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls off the pace 2 wide, flattened soon after straightening.
Hard ridden forward but fail to muster and cross from the wide gate, trapped 3 wide throughout, flattened soon after straightening.
Always last few, never a factor.
Taken back to race at tail on fence, switched out & shaken up 300m, strong run to burst through 100m, shifted across rival 50m, led last strides.
Speed to lead early, soon snagged to 1 back on fence, shaken up 300m, led 150m, edged out close home.
Rousted from gate, midfield 1 off with cover, off heels 900m, 3 wide & ridden 600m, widest home turn, closing when bumped late.
Sluggish start, rousted early, raced rail near rear, driven final turn, closed off soundly, just missed frame.
Fast start, led out of 1st turn & taken to rail, shaken up 500m, shifted out into stretch, all out & headed 150m, barged close home.
Broke well, raced rail midfield, running on soundly when badly impeded & progress checked close home.
Smart start, raced midfield 1 off with cover, switched 3 wide no cover 500m, driven 400m & wide into stretch, boxed on & impeded 50m.
Bumped start, over-raced early stages, settled behind midfield, switched out final turn, not clear run, kept on evenly.
Rousted from wide gate to dispute early lead, settled 2nd on leader's flank, driven turning in, battled one pace until no extra 150m & faded out.
Restrained to race 1 off with cover behind midfield, ridden 500m, wide into stretch, struggled in run home.
Awkward break, settled near rear 1 off with cover, switched 3 wide & driven 650m, wide into stretch, plugged on tamely.
Fast break to race handy 4th 1 off with cover, ridden 500m, switched wide into stretch, weakened tamely in run.
Smart start, raced close 2nd on rail, to lead 400m, kicked on into stretch, gamely to wire, held on.
Fair break, settled rail behind midfield, switched 1 off 600m, pulled out & driven into stretch, strong closer centre track, just failed.
Taken behind at break, raced rail last pair, ridden 600m & progress on turn, switched out 300m, stayed on strong final 200m to snatch 3rd close home.
Broke well, slotted handy 1 off with cover, driven to 3rd in stretch, ran home soundly, edged out of frame late.
Tardy break, settled rail near rear, bustled for progress 600m, switched out 400m, wide in run, stayed on for sound gains.
Sharp start, trapped 4 wide no cover, dropped in for cover 3 wide 600m, widest on turn, kept on one pace.
Good break, raced rail fore of midfield, off heels & lost some ground 600m, outpaced into stretch & kept on evenly.
Ridden to lead 900m, raced 1 off, headed 400m, hard-ridden into straight, plugged on tamely.
Broke well, driven to hold place handy 3 wide no cover, driven turning in, every chance but tapered to wire.
Fast break, soon outpaced & dropped behind midfield wide with cover, wide into stretch & found little.
Taken back at start, sat 1 off near rear, ridden 600m, unable to raise tempo, tepid stretch run.
Raced at tail, hard-ridden 400m, struggled in run, never a factor.
Bumped start, pushed early but not muster, 5.5Ls off the leader on the rails, favoured by the fast tempo, closed off strongly 300M to score.
Slow away, 7Ls off the leader along the fence, benefited by the fast pace and the rail-trip, progressed steadily 250M for 2nd.
Hard ridden to sit in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight for 3rd.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 1L, clocked fast sectionals, hung on well until 150M flattened.
Awkward away, 7Ls off the leader 3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, made some ground 100M.
Eased at start to take cover at rear, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made some ground 200M.
Eased to take box seat, not suited by the fast sectionals, out of fuel 200M.
Bumped start, hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast tempo, but no progress.
Eased at start to take cover at back, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, however checked severely 250M, not tested.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, favoured by the fast pace, however flattened in straight.
Hard ridden forward, 1L off the leader 2-3 wide, not suited by the fast tempo, hung out badly round the turns, weakened 200M.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the fast pace, trapped 4 wide without cover throughout, emptied 300M.
With leading bunch to turn, eased into leader's slipstream back stretch and turn. Got inside run when leader peeled out and kept on strongly to line.
Jumped well, burrowed through along rail to take lead first turn, slowed pace back stretch. Lost lead when swung wide straight but kept on well.
Taken back from wide draw but went forward 3-wide back stretch when pace slackened. Swung widest into straight and kept on well.
Jumped well, led to first turn, unable to cross to fence and raced outside leader from 1200m to 400m. Kept on one-paced home straight.
Got head up when racing in restricted room first turn, then raced tightly between horses final turn. Was finishing nicely when tightened 100m.
One of the first to jump, raced with leading pack before easing one-back, one-off back stretch. Improved early straight before turning one-paced.
Hard ridden to go forward from widest draw and trapped three-wide without cover. Started to give ground from 400m.
Hard ridden but unable keep up and raced between horses behind midfield. Under pressure from 600m but limited response.
Taken forward from wide draw, unable cut in and held 3-wide with cover. Wide into straight and found nothing when asked 400m.
Had front feet in air when gates opened, losing considerable ground. Trailed field to home straight and ran past tired horses.
Jumped with field and cut in to fence before first turn. Stayed on rails final turn but found nothing under whip early straight.
Taken back from wide draw and cut to fence. Improved position back stretch but soon under pressure, giving ground from 400m.
Dropped back to the rear, travelled strongly, made good headway along the inside passing 300M, led near 50M.
Settled midfield along the inside, made his effort alongside winner passing 300M, kept on well to go 2nd inside 50M but always held by winner.
Held a rail position just behind leaders, loomed a major threat 200M out, briefly led but couldn't fend off first 2 over final stages.
Reserved at the rear, pulled widest passing 300M, ran on well to go 4th near line.
Well covered in mid-division, difficult to settle in early stages, into clear 300M, stayed on but unable to challenge seriously.
Driven forward, crossed to the lead passing 1200M then led evenly, headed 150M, weakened to 6th.
Positioned 2-wide in the group chasing the pace, kept on same pace turning home, no threat from 200M.
Not far off but caught 3-wide without cover throughout, failed to respond when driven out 500M, weakened away turning home.
Rushed forward from wide gate and settled outside leader, came under pressure nearing 400M, soon dropped off.
Held up 3-wide behind midfield, outpaced passing 400M, soon behind. (Blood in trachea.)
Unable to cross from wide gate, caught wide first turn and dropped back to last, detached from the field passing 600M, eased.

Broke well, settled mainly just better than midfield in 5th or 6th, responded well under pressure inside final 300 metres, won convincingly.
Settled in rear of midfield on rails far side, came off the fence 600 metres out, baulked for a run until the 300 metres, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Raced wide in prominent 4th after beginning from the widest gate, held its own pace to gain slender advantage 1200 metres out, led until headed 200 metres out, kept on for a place.
Slowly away, travelled in last few and wide as a result of sedate pace early far side, finished off race well down the centre of the track.
Settled in forward of midfield on rails, fought on steadily without threatening.
Soon moved forward to track the pace, became 3rd some 2L back over 1200 metres out, tightened 400 metres out, kept on same pace without quickening.
Settled in last few, steadied for a run passing 400 metres, finishing off well until tight behind runners inside final 50 metres.
Broke well from the one gate, settled just off the pace in 3rd or 4th on rails, came off the rails for a run approaching home turn, did nothing in straight.
Soon taken back behind midfield, raced awkwardly and dropped further behind far side, widest runner turning in, ran on down the centre of the track.
Ridden to lead, steadied pace in front turning into back straight, narrowly headed 1200 metres out, faded gradually inside final 300 metres.
Began well, settled in midfield, came under pressure around home bend, found nothing.
Raced wide without cover in midfield or just worse throughout, made no impression in straight.
Settled well behind, baulked early in straight, one-paced.
Midfield early, dropped steadily to last few down far side.
Settled fourth from the rear, 2 wide with cover. Recovered well from a check near the 800m to lengthen nicely in the straight and have the race in its keeping 100m from home.
Camped midfield, 3 deep with cover. Made steady progress down the running.
Began only fairly, but managed to settle 1 out 1 back. Peeled out after the 600m, hit the front near the furlong, and kept on evenly in the run to the line.
Parked behind midfield, 2-3 deep with cover. Copped some inconvenience near the 800m, recovered ok to fill the frame.
Settled 2nd last, 2-3 wide with cover, received some interference after the 800m. Closed off soundly.
Had every chance after box seating. Rolled out after the 500m, failed to make any impression in the run home.
Sent forward and led at even fractions on the paint. Was a tired horse after the 200m, and gave way thereafter.
Settled outside the leader, 1 off no cover. Began to tire passing the 200m.
Settled last in the run, shifted in & took up a position closer to the rail near the 800m, with cover. Just plugged away in the run home towards the inside.
Tracked the leaders, 3 deep with cover. Shifted wider on the home turn, commenced to fade approaching the 200m.
Settled back in the field, 2-3 deep with cover. Came widest in the home straight, failed to close off.
Began awkwardly, ridden along early but was posted 3 deep without cover for most of the trip, whilst travelling on the speed. Never likely.
Travelled on the rails, midfield had cover. Struggled in the home straight.

Placing: PU
Comment: Settled midfield, 1 off with cover. Broke down near the 800m and was retired from the race.
Travelled in front of midfield about 3.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, suited by the slow sectionals, dashed on strongly to score by 1/2L.
Hard ridden to settle 2Ls behind the leader on the fence, benefited by the slow pace, ran on well to get 2nd.
Rolled forward to take the fence and shared the lead at slow sectionals, hung on well until 50M for 3rd.
Jumped slowly, then pushed to midfield about 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, despite not suited by the slow tempo, dashed on well to get 4th.
Settled in front of midfield about 3.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, progressed steadily in straight.
Settled worse than midfield about 6.5Ls off the pace 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, ran on only fairly.
Rolled forward to share the lead 2 wide at slow sectionals, kept on one pace in straight.
Taken back as usual, travelled 8Ls behind the leader 2 wide, hampered by the slow sectionals, swung widest and passed some tired runners.
Settled worse than midfield about 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, never looked likely.
Always at rear, never ran on.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls off the pace 3 wide with cover, never in a competitive position.
Rolled forward to share the lead, however trapped 3 wide without cover until 700M, dropped off soon after straightening.
Always at rear, never a factor.
Raced midfield, trapped wide and without cover throughout, dropped off rounding the Home Turn, tailed off.
Sluggish break, held up in rear on rail, switched out & driven 400m for strong stretch run, progress through field to lead 75m, in command at wire.
Taken back to camp rail behind midfield, switched out & driven turning in, closed off soundly to snare 2nd late.
Broke OK, settled midfield 1 off with cover, driven 500m, wide home turn, ran on strongly to nick 3rd late.
Sharp start, slotted 4th 1 off with cover, switched out & driven 400m, all out when briefly vying for lead 100m, swamped in run.
Bustled at break, trapped wide early until slotted 1 off behind midfield, driven & switched out home turn, stayed on well for solid gains.
Missed break, raced at tail on rail, progress into stretch, shifted out under determined drive, battled on for sound inroads without threatening.
Fast break, tracked 1 back on rail, switched 1 off 400m & driven to lead 280m, emptied & swamped 150m.
Fair break, sat fore of midfield 1 off with cover, driven centre track in stretch, boxing on dourly when bumped & unbalanced 200m, no extra.
Tardy break, raced 1 off towards rear, off heels & 3 wide on turn, only two behind at 400m, ran on for minor gains.
Speed to dispute lead, edged outright lead 900m, hard-ridden 350m, headed 280m & faded thereafter.
Tardy start, settled near rear 1 off with cover, shifted 4 wide 700m, hard-ridden 430m & struggled in run home.
Ridden to dispute early lead, raced 2nd on leader's flank, under pressure turning in, weakened tamely from 300m.
Reared start, raced rail fore of midfield, hard ridden into stretch, plugged on until emptied & faded from 200m.
Decent break, caught 3 wide no cover midfield, ridden & outpaced turning in, soon tailed off.
Broke OK, settled midfield 1 off with cover, held up in run top of stretch, clear & quickened 300m, bumped rival 50m, closed off to edge verdict at wire.
Held up & caught 3 wide no cover rear, rolled to midfield 800m, driven to challenge 430m, led 300m, bumped 50m, mugged last strides.
Good break, raced 4th on fence, switched out 600m, shaken up 400m, one-paced but ran on soundly for 3rd.
Broke OK, settled back 1 off behind midfield, shuffled back on turn, hard-ridden turning in, stayed on dourly centre track.
Smart start, 1 back on fence until 1 off no cover 2nd 1000m, pressed lead 600m, led turning in, headed 300m, run tapered out.
Missed start, raced rear 1 off with cover, off heels 1400m & over-raced, shifted 3 wide 800m, widest into stretch, plugged on one pace.
Moderate start, raced at tail on rail, driven 400m, plodded on for modest inroads.
Fast start to lead early, snagged to sit 3rd 1 off no cover, forced 3 wide no cover 1000m, under pressure turning in, faded out.
Tardy start, soon rolled to lead, headed turning for home, faded tamely early in run.
Bumped start, raced midfield on rail, shifted out under drive 400m, found nothing & weakened.
Pushed forward, settled well just behind the leaders, enjoyed the slow sectionals, ran on strongly to score.
Hard ridden forward to share the lead 2 wide at slow sectionals, dominated 400M, hung on well until 100M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 4Ls off the leaders 2 wide, dashed well 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed early to keep up in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 300M.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash 300M.
Awkward away, eased to rear, 8Ls off the leaders 2 wide, dashed strongly 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Hard ridden to take rail and shared the lead at slow sectionals, soon flattened 250M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Hard ridden to occupy the box seat, ran on until 200M flattened.
Midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, flattened in straight.
Hard ridden forward, shared lead 3 wide at slow sectionals, soon weakened 400M.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leaders on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, emptied 300M.
Never muster along the fence.
Never a factor at rear.
Began well but settled 4L behind leader and away from fence. Took closer order 600m, switched in 350m to get clear running, kicked clear 200m, easing off before line.
Taken back soon after start and ridden stone cold 2L behind second-last horse. Caught up to field entering straight and finished strongly between horses doing best at finish.
Jumped best but not pushed and settled 2-back, one-off till straight. Shaken up 350m, led for a few strides turning one-paced final 100m.
Began well and led field until first turn when eased into box seat behind new leader. Looked chance 300m before turning one-paced from 200m.
Allowed to roll forward from wide draw but did not take lead until first turn. Increased tempo 800m but collared 300m. One paced final 200m.
No early speed and allowed to drift back to second last. Switched out 400m and made ground initially before running on empty 200m.
Outpaced early but held at midfield away from fence. Shaken up top of straight but limited response under hard riding.
Jumped well and rolled forward when unable to cut in passing winning post the first time. Raced outside leader to turn, giving ground from 400m.
Ridden up to hold rail position 3L from leader. Was still there entering straight before tiring.
Not pushed and allowed to settle along fence worse than midfield. Started to give ground entering final turn, finishing well back.
Broke smartly, restrained to midfield, travelled strongly to straight, quickened to lead inside 300M, went clear mid-straight but was made to work again final 50M when pressed by 2nd, held on just.
Dropped back to near the rear, 7Ls off the pace making the home turn, pulled widest to challenge, closed off strongly over final 250M, just denied.
Held up 2-wide behind midfield, unable to match the finishing speed of winner inside 300M, stayed on for non-threatening 3rd.
Restrained 3-wide in midfield, driven out 450M, stayed on mildly for non-threatening 4th.
Reserved near the rear, saved ground along the inside, held up at 350M, ran on without threat when clear nearing 200M.
Patiently ridden, travelled 3-wide behind midfield, had no clear run 300M-200M, made limited progress thereafter.
Raced 3Ls off the pace, difficult to settle when being steadied for cover, gave limited response final 350M, never reached leaders.
Hustled from the start, moved up to press leader 2-wide, kept on one paced turning home, no impression on leaders final 200M.
Began fairly, urged along and maintained a forward position behind leaders, still in a contending spot passing 300M but gave way mid-straight. (Muco.)
Rushed forward, settled just off the pace, kept on same speed turning in, faded passing 200M.
Placed ahead of midfield, saved ground on the inside, battled into final 200M then weakened.
Soon led on jumping from draw 1, took them along steadily but found little when pressed by rivals inside 350M, out of contention mid-straight.
Raced well back in the field, came under pressure 500M out, never reached contention.
Slow to begin, held up behind midfield, difficult to settle middle stages, failed to respond when driven near 400M.
Taken back from outside draw but held 3-wide at rear. Peeled out widest into straight, picked up momentum gradually to be flying at finish.
Ridden to take up forward position but held 3-wide in fifth spot into turn. Shaken up 400m and ran on strongly to just miss.
Caught 4-wide without cover into first turn, lost position turning for home, then picked up speed making ground to the line.
Ridden forward to grab box seat behind leader. Switched out 400m to make run but then forced to switch back in. Ran on well to be closest at finish.
Taken forward from outside draw and held three wide into first turn. Picked up gradually entering straight but swamped close home.
Quickly into stride, taking clear lead before turn. Increased tempo turning for home and still in front with 100m to go when swamped.
Outpaced early and dropped to rear along fence. Came off fence entering straight and finished off strongly between horses.
Fractious in gate and lost ground at start. Improved between horses round turn, fanned out 400m and kept on steadily to the line.
Taken forward from wide draw to sit on hind quarters of leader. Looked a danger entering straight but unable to close gap.
Jumped well but bumped and unbalance entering turn, dropping to rear. Made ground in straight without looking dangerous.
Ridden forward between horses but held in midfield to straight. Kept on steadily final 400m without looking a threat.
No early speed and kept in midfield along fence. Under pressure from 600m to hold position, changed legs several times, and lay in under pressure 200m. Run unacceptable.
Began well and with leading pack to turn before dropping 3-back but away from fence. Under pressure from 400m and weakened quickly.
Unable to slot in and raced 4 wide with cover, 5-6ls back, switched wider turning, let down with a big finish to overhaul rivals inside final 100m and score a strong win given workload.
Taken back from a wide gate, slotted in behind midfield racing 2 and 3 wide, aided by reasonable speed, made run through pack and looked the winner at 200m before being swallowed up late.
Settled next to last 7ls back racing 2 wide, aided by tempo, still well back turning, produced solid final 400m making many lengths and closing hard late to just miss 2nd.
Standard break drifted back and lost spot approaching first bend, 6ls or so away in middle stages, made run through field final 400m making many le3ngths to just miss a place.
Pressed on and raced 3 wide just off lead, had some cover 2-3ls back on circle, set out after leader and kept coming in straight, headed 200m but kept on creditably without looking to threaten.
Restrained from a wide gate and taken down to rails, enjoyed a quiet trip 5ls back on fence, saved ground turning, held up at 300m, closed nicely when clear.
Away with rest, raced just off pace 3ls away in 1 out 1 back slot, no real excuses to turn, clear from 300m but just stayed on at one speed, held ground nevertheless.
Restrained from an outside alley, raced 3 wide at rear 7ls or so away with cover, set a task still last turning, made good progress down middle of the course to be closest at finish.
Showed customary speed to take lead, set good tempo throughout, kicked 3ls clear at 400m, came back to them quickly inside 200m and faded out of contention inside 100m when workload took effect.
Positioned midfield 2-3 wide with cover, 4ls or so back to bend, made a brief effort turning but peaked at 200m when condition gave out and didn't feature thereafter.
Trapped wide from outset when pressing on in search of positive position, kept working throughout 3 wide without cover, soon struggling turning and folded final 300m.
Showed good early speed, took spot behind leader but did share of work with some mid race pressure, niggled turning, didn't respond and faded right out in straight.
Ended up in midfield, trapped 4 wide without cover, always working 4-5ls back in run. Gradually weakened out in straight when workload too effect.
Took a spot on rails in midfield, 4ls or so off lead, fair run to turn, didn't pick up from 300m and was beaten a fair way.

Broke well, gradually settled just worse than midfield shifting two off the rails, gained closer order when pace slackened down far side, finished off race well down the centre of the straight despite hanging in under pressure.

Broke well from the one draw, amongst leaders before settling one back on rails, became two back when KINGSTON ELITE shot to the front while pace slackened, remained same on rails turning in, fought on steadily.
Broke well, soon dropped to last few, remained well behind and travelled 3-wide around the bend, made up good ground down the centre of the straight to be nearest at finish.
Travelled wide in last few, made rapid progress in 3rd quarter down far side to gain over 2L lead around the bend, flattered and swamped inside final 50 metres.

Began well, amongst leaders early before gaining cover in 2L 4th far side, shuffled backward when pace steadied coming out of far side, saved ground turning in, ran on in straight without threatening.
Soon taken across for rails run in last few, remained similar to straight, saved ground turning in, fought on steadily without threatening.
Broke well, gradually settled in midfield on rails, remained similar into straight, ran home one-paced.

Jumped moderately, worked hard out wide to contest lead eventually crossing to rails before 1000-metre bend, led setting a slow section far side and headed approaching home bend, folded up quickly from 2nd into straight.
Began well, soon taken well back, tailed-off from 1300 metres, swang widest into home straight, ran on past beaten runners.

Broke well, soon taken back to midfield, raced keenly when wide without cover far side, took closer order to reach 2L 4th at Rock but remained wide around the bend, weakened under pressure in straight.
Began well from a wide-ish gate, soon snatched back to travel just worse than midfield racing freely at times, made no impression in straight.
Began moderately from a wide gate, niggled along and raced wide in first few around first bend, remained in joint 2nd without cover far side, gave ground steadily from 500 metres out.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race, box seating after the 600m. railed up in the home straight finished off full of running.
Camped midfield the fence. Peeled out early in the straight and finished off soundly.
Ridden along early and did some work to eventually cross and travel close to the fence near the 600m in the lead. Gave ground over the concluding stages.
Made good ground in the home straight after settling back in the field, 2 wide with cover. Closed off along the inside.
Parked midfield, 1 off with cover. Finished the race off fairly.
Did some work to eventually cross and race outside the leader, no cover near the 600m. Was running on empty near the 100m.
Eventually settled behind the speed, 3 wide had some cover on the circle. Lost touch with the leaders after the 500m, stayed on at the same speed in the home stretch.
Settled worse than midfield, 2deep with cover. Kept on at the same speed in the run to the line.
Was steadied when tightened shortly after the jump, settling fourth from the rear along the fence. Kept to the inside in the home straight, failed to run on.
Began only fairly then was tightened for room soon after jumping. Settled in 2nd last position on the fence with cover. Made no impression in the run home.
Travelled keenly midrace and was hampered when avoiding heels near the 600m, racing 1 out 1 back. Faded in the home straight.
Slow to begin then tailed the field and became somewhat detached. Struggled in the final stretch.
Made all and hung on well to win by a short head.
Settled worse than midfield about 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide, swung wide turning in, finished off strongly however shifted in and proved difficult to ride inside 200, just missed by a short head.
Camped handy, settled 3.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, progressed steadily for 3rd.
Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls off the pace on the fence, 600M checked, ran on well however was unable to be tested when held up inside 60M, unlucky runner. (Lost left front plate)
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, could not find a day light until 200M, made some ground thereafter.
Eased at start, travelled 7Ls behind the leader on the fence, made some ground in straight.
Hard ridden forward to obtain the box seat, hung on until 250M weakened.
Always at rear, settled 8Ls behind the leader 2 wide, never ran on.
Settled in front of midfield about 3Ls off the pace 2 wide, looked likely turning in, however made no impression after straightening. (Questioned for disappointing performance, see incident report)
Lacked early speed then taken back to the rear, trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, never in contention.
Ridden forward to settle 1L outside the leader, however faded sharply 200M.
At the start stumbled then was crowded, struggled throughout the trip, never a factor. (Questioned rider, see incident report)
Broke OK, good early pace, settled midfield on rail, switched out 300m & driven, quickened between horses to lead 100m, all out to win.
Fair break, raced rail behind midfield, hard-ridden 300m, & switched 1 off, bumped rival 100m, chased strongly to grab 2nd late.
Prominent early, snagged to sit fore of midfield 1 off with cover, driven wide turning in, ran on to press lead 150m, always held.
Sharp start, settled rail in 4th, progress turn & driven into stretch, battled to briefly vie for lead 150m, no extra & tapered thereafter.
Fair break, niggled early, raced midfield 1 off with cover, driven 3 wide 500m, boxed on soundly for decent stretch gains.
Speed to lead on fence, headed 1000m & settled 1 back 800m, switched out & driven 300m, faded in run.
Taken behind at start, raced at tail on rail, switched out final turn, ran on for moderate gains.
Awkward break & hard-driven early, settled rail near rear, switched 1 off & ridden 600m, stayed on evenly.
Fast break, sat close 2nd 1 off, led 1000m, to rail 800m & extended, 2L clear final turn, swamped 150m, fading when bumped 100m.
Slow start & rousted, trapped wide & rolled to 3rd 1 off with cover 1200m, driven 500m, not clear run in stretch but one-paced.
Taken behind & rousted early, raced behind midfield 1 off with cover, driven wide no cover on turn, plugged on one pace.
Lacked pace at break, raced near tail 1 off with cover, driven turning in, found nothing & faded tamely.
Speed to lead, restrained in front & headed 1st turn, trailed leader on rail, shaken up 300m, edged to lead 50m, held on.
Fair break, trapped 3 wide no cover until slotted 1 off with cover 1000m, niggled 600m, pulled out for stretch run, grinding progress, just failed.
Tardy start & rousted early, sat rail behind midfield, switched out into stretch, swept home strongly, just failed.
Rousted to lead first turn, crossed to rail, kicked on under strong drive into stretch, headed 50m, no extra & swamped.
Fast start, raced 2nd 1 off with cover, driven 400m, unable to overhaul leader, battled determinedly at same speed.
Smart break, camped rail fore of midfield, driven 300m, shifted out & staying on when crowded 200m, lacked pace to challenge principals.
Missed break, raced rail near rear, driven 300m, boxed on for minor inroads.
Good break, ridden early, settled midfield 1 off with cover, ridden 600m, switched out & driven home turn, plugged on one pace.
Good start, dropped in to race 1 off near rear, hard-ridden into stretch, kept on moderately centre track.
Awkward start, held up at tail, driven into stretch, found little for pressure.
Restrained at break, raced 3 wide no cover behind midfield, minor advance back stretch, driven 400m, weakened in run home.
Missed break, raced 1 off near tail, fired up 1100m & switched 3 wide into back stretch, wide in home straight, found nothing.
Hard ridden forward, 3Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, ran on strongly to the line and won by a narrow margin.
Eased back, 8Ls off the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, lack room 4-2, closed off strongly when clear, just beaten by a narrow margin in 2nd.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 4Ls off the fast pace along the rails, progressed steadily 250M for 3rd.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the fast sectionals, led 300M, closed off strongly, overhauled 100M but still ran on.
At back as usual, 8Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, made steady ground 200m.
Eased to rear, 10Ls off the leader on the fence, favoured by the fast pace, made minor ground 200M.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 7Ls off the leader along the fence, suited by the fast tempo, checked 300M, ran on ok.
Pressed forward, box seat, harmed by the fast pace, flattened 250M.
Settled in midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, ran on fairly.
Eased to rear, 10Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast pace, lack room 400M, never improved when clear.
Behind midfield, 7Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, but never progressed.
Hard ridden to hold the rail, led by 1.5Ls and clocked fast sectionals, soon out of fuel 300M.
Taken forward soon after start but made to work in lead before cutting to fence 800m. Kicked clear 400m and kept on well to line.
Jumped best and led along rail before slipping into box seat behind leader. Stayed on fence in straight and kept on well.
Ridden forward to hold spot one-back, one-off along back stretch. Lost position when turning for home but kept on steadily final 400m.
Began only fairly and ridden along to hold forward position but wide. Unable to cut in and rolled forward from 700m to sit outside leader. One-paced in straight.
Crowded start but recovered to sit behind leading bunch. Took final turn awkwardly but kept on steadily in straight.
Began only fairly, slipping 4-back along fence. Raced tightly 1000m, peeled out turning for home but only one-paced final 400m.
Taken back from wide draw and last along fence to final turn. Stayed on nicely in straight doing best work near finish.
Made good use of inside draw to hold fence, 3-back from leader. Remained on fence turning for home and kept on steadily.
Ridden forward and quickly on fence. Made up ground back stretch, swung wide into straight, then one-paced.
Trapped 6-wide without cover swinging into back stretch. Got some cover turning for home but limited response in straight.
Caught 5-wide after jumping with field and unable to cut in back stretch. Took final turn wide and spent force in straight.
Outpaced early and caught near rear, gradually slipping back to last around final turn. Tailed off in straight.
Always close up in a slowly run race, driven along 400M, closed off well, led 100 out and lengthened away .
Tracked leader in a slowly run race, joined leader making the home turn, soared into the lead inside 400M, kept on well but not pace of winner final 100M.
Settled just off leader along the rails, travelled well throughout, had his chance but not going the pace of first two passing 300M, stayed on for distant 3rd.
Began awkwardly, held up along the fence in midfield and not helped by the slow pace, took inside route turning home, kept on steadily without threat.
Settled midfield, inconvenienced by the slow pace in middle stages, had his chance passing 300M but failed to make significant headway.
Rushed to the lead, slowed things down passing 1200M, lost lead inside 400M, lacked a further response, weakened 200M out.
Not helped by the slow pace and raced keenly in midfield in the opening 600M, no cover from 900M then strode closer to leaders, kept on same pace turning home, never threatened.
Failed to muster speed in the initial stages, ended up near the rear 5Ls off the pace, made limited progress when driven 300M.
Dropped back to near the rear, not helped by the slow pace, ended up in a difficult position turning in and couldn't offer the necessary response.
Behind midfield early, strode closer to pace when pushed wide entering back straight, not picked up passing 300M.
Taken across behind runners early, reserved in last 7Ls behind leader in a slowly run race, came up empty when asked, never involved.
Dropped back for cover, turned 3-wide entering back straight, nudged along nearing 400M but failed to respond.
