Jumped fairly from a wide gate, settled 3-wide in a prominent position, shaken up shortly after straightening, fought on gamely between runners to just prevail in the bobbing of heads.
Well behind, commenced move rounding home bend gaining midfield position into straight, sustained progress to hit the front momentarily close to home only to be denied in a photo-finish.
Broke nicely, settled in midfield one off the rails, shifted out for a clear run turning in, ran on to hold every chance inside final 200 metres.
Broke fairly from a wide gate, pushed along to soon take up running, kicked some 2L clear early in straight but unable to sustain effort and swamped inside final 50 metres.

Jumped awkwardly, recovered steadily along rails to forward of midfield, switched out and gained closer to reach 2L 5th into straight but was badly held up and checked 200 metres out, fought on well to the line.
Jumped fairly from the widest gate, crossed steadily to travel 3-wide with leaders approaching the bend, remained similar turning into straight but weakened under pressure inside final 200 metres.
Niggled along just better than midfield, shuffled back to midfield coming out of back straight, carried wide turning for home, kept on steadily without quickening.
Jumped moderately, settled just worse than midfield on rails, saved ground turning in but could find no room on inside early in straight, kept on well home.
Began fairly, gradually came across from a wide draw to race 2-wide just off the pace, remained similar to straight but weakened noticeably inside final 250 metres. (Lame next day)
Settled 4-wide in midfield, gave ground steadily around the bend, made no impression in straight.
Soon taken back from a wide draw to race in last few, made no impression in straight.
Settled one back on rails, faded under pressure in the run home.
Soon dropped to last, never a danger.
Jumped fairly, soon dropped to last few, never on terms.
Settled around midfield the fence, had cover. Claimed the lead near the 100m and worked home well.
Enjoyed the box seat. Shot clear at the furlong and looked likely, but was mowed down inside the final 100m, fought on gamely right to the post.
Jumped best then was allowed to settle 3 back, 1 off with cover. Kept on evenly down the running.
Parked behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Ran on soundly.
Sent forward and led at slow fractions along the paint. Faded after the furlong after having every hope.
Camped behind midfield, 3 deep with cover. Maintained a fair gallop in the home straight.
Settled in last position, 1 off with cover. Came wide in the final stretch, plodded to the line.
Travelled in 2nd last position, 1 off with cover. Passed tiring horses in the run to the wire.
Settled back in the field, along the paint, had cover. Kept to the inside in the home straight but failed to close off.
Never likely after being posted 3 deep without cover, whilst travelling handy in the run. Never responded to rider's pressure in the run home.
Rolled forward in a slowly run race to settle in second position 1 of no cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Taken back from a wide barrier, travelled 7.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, switched wide turning in, stormed home 300M to score by a neck despite not suited by the slow pace.
Raced midfield, 4Ls off the slow pace on the fence, dashed on well for 2nd, just missed by a neck.
Pushed to obtain midfield, 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, ran on nicely to get 3rd despite hampered by the slow pace.
Rolled forward to settle 1L off outside the leader, benefited by the slow sectionals, stayed on well until 50M overhauled.
Camped handy, settled 2.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, suited by the slow pace, however just held ground in straight.
At rear, travelled 10Ls behind the leader on the fence, made some ground in straight despite hampered by the slow pace.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, suited by the slow pace, however unable to make any impression in straight.
Jumped slowly, then settled 6Ls off the slow pace on the fence, never ran on.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader off the slow tempo, trapped 3 wide without cover until 800M, unable to show any dash in straight.
Sent forward to take the fence and led by 1L, benefited by the slow pace, however weakened 300M.
Settled worse than midfield about 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide, never looked competitive at any stage. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
At rear, never a factor.
Tardy break, soon niggled near rear, progress mid pack, switched far side & driven 350m, closed off well to grab 2nd close home.
Sharp start, disputed lead, unable to match winner from 500m & boxed on evenly, edged out of 2nd late.
Good break, settled handy, niggled 500m, driven 350m, kept on soundly without threatening.
Decent start, raced midfield far side, hard-ridden & took closer order 400m, out-kicked & ran home one pace.
Broke OK, raced behind midfield, ridden 500m, closed off evenly for minor gains.
Sluggish break, raced behind midfield on rail, ridden for pressure 450m, stayed on moderately to wire.
Broke well, settled midfield 1 off stands' side fence, driven 400m, plugged on same speed.
Fast start, raced far side fore of midfield, ridden 400m, outpaced & run tapered final 150m.
Fair break, speed to sit close to pace, hard-ridden 400m, faded tamely in run.
Bumped start, recovered to track leaders, driven under pressure 400m, found nothing & weakened out.
Tardy start, bustled early behind midfield, progress to midfield & driven 400m, checked off heels 200m, not clear run & eased.
Tardy start & bumped, raced towards rear, hard-ridden 450m, found nothing & well beaten.
Bumped start, niggled along far-side at tail, unable to pick up, never a factor.

Placing: DISQ
Comment: Fast break, disputed lead, clear lead 500m, shaken up 450m, forged clear under firm drive to win authoritatively.
Fast break to press lead, soon edged to rail close up, shaken up in 2nd 400m, quickened to lead 300m, closed off strongly.
Tardy start, raced rail midfield, bumped final turn, shifted out & clipped rival 350m, ran on under drive to snatch 2nd 50m out, always held.
Broke well, raced handy on fence, switched out 400m & again 300m, ran home soundly to make frame.
Taken back from wide gate to sit near rear 1 off with cover, wide final turn, chased home strongly centre track for good gains.
Sharp start, trapped 3 deep no cover front rank early, slotted 1 back 1 off 800m, driven & switched out 400m, battled on at one pace.
Speed to lead narrowly 1 off no cover, rolled clear on turn, hard-ridden & all out when headed 300m, faded to wire.
Broke OK, snagged back to midfield 1 off with cover, shifted out turning in, ran home evenly.
Fair break, sat 3 wide with cover midfield, ridden final turn, plugged on one pace.
Taken back at break, raced rail near rear, niggled 600m, stayed on same speed.
Fast break, snagged back to race 1 off behind midfield, switched out & driven into stretch, plugged home same pace.
Snagged back to camp 1 off in rear, switched 3 wide on turn, forced wider into stretch & lost ground, tepid run to wire.
Speed to press lead 4 wide early, settled back 3 wide with cover fore of midfield, driven into stretch, faded tamely.
Taken behind to race rail at tail, driven turning in, found nothing.

Placing: DISQ
Comment: Fair break, raced fore of midfield 1 off with cover, under pressure & ridden 500m, one-paced when clipped heels 350m, eased thereafter.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, ran on strongly 400M, just beaten by a head in 2nd.
Hard ridden forward, sat just off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, dominated from 400M until last few strides overhauled, just beaten in 3rd.
Slow away, 7Ls off the leader on the fence, dashed well 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, favoured by the slow tempo, lack room 400M, just held ground when clear.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
At back, 7Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, no progress.
Awkward away, hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, 4Ls off the slow pace, out of fuel 300M.
Pushed forward, 3Ls off the slow tempo, 3 wide no cover throughout, emptied 300M.
Behind midfield, never competitive.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 1.5Ls at slow sectionals, soon dropped off 400M.

Placing: DISQ
Comment: Eased to rear, 8.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M to score.
Hit gates running, easily cut in to rail to set good pace, kicked well clear entering straight, went to line unchallenged.
Began well, quickly cut to rail but raced keenly 900m. Improved position turn, peeled 3-wide entering straight, kept on well.
Ridden forward to sit second but away from fence. Lay out turn, put under pressure entering straight and kept on steadily.
Taken out soon after start before cutting in but 3-wide before turn. Taken very wide into straight, ran on steadily.
Ridden to take forward position and held 3-wide with cover. Put under pressure from 400m, making up late ground.
Cut in quickly from wide draw to hold fence towards rear. Lost position turn before making up ground in home stretch.
Ridden forward from good draw but still trapped 3-wide without cover. Hard ridden final 400m but only one-paced.
Taken in from wide draw to race in midfield away from fence. Put under pressure turning from home but limited response.
Restrained after start and taken to fence before turn. Last entering straight, running past tired horses final 200m.
Outpaced early but hugged fence in midfield to straight. Found little when put under pressure.
Taken back across runners from widest draw but kept away from fence in last pair. Taken wide straight but only one paced.
Jumped well and soon in box seat 1L from leader. Started to give ground entering straight and slipped back gradually.
Jockey unbalanced when reared at start and lost considerable ground. Caught up to field turning for home but spent force final 400m.
Ridden forward but trapped 4-wide without cover. Bumped and unbalanced 600m, gradually losing ground from 400m. Unacceptable performance.
Up with early pace, eased back to midfield for cover passing 1400M, chased leaders from 350M, kept giving under maximum pressure, got up last stride.
Tracked leaders, made steady headway once into clear passing 350M, led inside 100M and was only collated late on.
Held up 2-wide in midfield, nudged along 500M out, ran on between horses, hung in final 150M but managed to get up for 3rd just before the line.
Sped to the lead, slowed things down in the 2nd quarter before quickening again near 600M, lost lead 300M but refused to give in, rallied to hold 4th.
Settled one-out-one-back, moved up to join leader 450M, established narrow lead passing 300M, headed inside 100M and weakened.
Sat 3-wide behind midfield, ran on steadily down the outside over final 300M but not getting close to first two.
Slow out, ended up near the rear 6Ls off the pace, stayed on mildly when driven, hung under pressure and was declined a clear run over final stages.
Patiently ridden in a 2-wide position near the rear, guided to outside for clear passage nearing 300M, made limited progress.
Obtained cover behind leaders but over-raced for some distance down the back straight, continued to race keenly over the turn, had little to offer passing 400M.
Taken across behind runners, not hurried in the rear, had no clear passing turning in, shifted to outside of field to make his challenge, held up again at 250M, went past beaten runners only.
Dropped back to near the rear, taken widest into straight but made no real progress.
Poised 3-wide just off the pace, had no cover throughout, outpaced inside 400M.
Settled in mid-division along the fence, didn't have the clearest of runs turning in but was never going the pace to challenge.
Jumped well but settled 3-back the fence. Lost position turn, found gap between horses 300m, kept on well to win pulling clear.
Began with field but held 3-back, one-off to straight. Taken wide to find clear passage, kept on well shifting in final 300m.
Outpaced early and soon at rear to turn. Taken wide entering straight, looked chance 200m, flattened late.
Taken back across runners from wide draw and tailed field into straight. Made up good ground final 400m.
Missed the start, ridden up 3-wide to make ground, swung wide 400m, kept on well till flattened final 100m.
Outpaced early, raced keenly along fence to turn when close to heel. Stayed on fence in straight but only one-paced.
Jumped well to sit outside leader to 1000m when passed by outside horse and slipped to third. Closed in 400m but one-paced final 200m.
Ridden to hold forward position but trapped 3-wide without cover. Swooped around field to be 2nd into straight before tiring final 200m.
Began well, racing in midfield away from fence to 800m. Lost position around turn, one-paced in straight.
Began best and led field for 200m before being passed and left in box seat. Closed in 400m before turning one-paced.
Taken forward from wide draw and raced in midfield but wide to turn. Started to give ground soon after entering straight.
Ridden forward from wide draw bur unable find cover, over-raced and pulled way to big lead. Tired soon after entering straight.
Landed a midfield role 4ls or so back racing 2 wide, all favours in run and suited by tempo, chimed in at right time turning in and went clear at 300m, held rivals safely over concluding stages.

Tardy into stride, positioned behind midfield 5-6ls back in running line, suited by a decent tempo, made run through field turning in, set out strongly after winner but couldn't wear down margin, kept on for a game 2nd.
Settled back with last few, raced 3 wide 7ls back, tracked up 4 and 5 wide rounding bend, produced a strong finish down middle to make good headway and take 3rd.
Dropped back to near last on rails from a wide alley, 6-7ls back, suited by a decent tempo, saved ground on rails turning, closed well along inside but peaked on run final 100m.
Trapped wide from an awkward gate, always working 4 wide without cover 4-5ls back, kept coming and was 6th turning, held ground well in straight given workload (see racing incidents).
Showed usual speed to work across and take lead, set decent clip in front, kept rolling turning in but couldn't dash with eventual winner at 300m, tired and dropped off inside final furlong.
Showed early speed, worked a bit before taking trail on leaders back, fair run thereafter, right there turning but lacked extra gear to feature and just kept on fairly final furlong.
Took a spot on rails behind pace, 3-4ls back in midfield, enjoyed a soft run to turn, between runners turning but didn't quicken, stayed on holding ground in run to line.
Taken back from widest gate to share rear, 7s back racing 2 wide, still had field to beat turning, in traffic at 200m and made some minor headway when clear but never looked likely.
Took ideal spot 1 out 1 back, used a little with decent sections early, fair run in mid-section, looked a place chance turning but just had one speed final 300m and weakened out late.
Away fairly, raced 3 wide behind midfield with cover 5-6ls back, covered share of ground to bend, no clear run early straight but couldn't get closer when clear, kept on fairly all the same.
No early pace, raced 5ls or more away on rails behind midfield, didn't use much in run, checked when in traffic at 350m however just battled away when clear.
Unable to slot in and posted 3 wide without cover in midfield, did share of work with decent speed on, began to fade from 400m and gradually dropped out when workload took effect.
Pressed forward from a wide gate to race outside leader, kept speed even throughout, niggled n turning, faded out cheaply in straight.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Settled mainly in 4th just about two lengths off the pace, commenced move approaching home bend, hit the front under pressure 200 metres out, just held on to the line.
Jumped fairly, settled in midfield, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Niggled along amongst leaders after beginning from the middle draw, obtained rails run coming out of home straight, led until narrowly headed turning for home, fought on under pressure to hold place.
Gradually shuffled back to travel well behind on rails, snuck up on inside turning in, baulked briefly 200 metres out, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Settled in last few, ran on well in straight to be nearest at finish.
Broke well, niggled along before settling in midfield on rails, remained same into straight, kept on well under pressure.
Slightly slow out, prominent on rails early, gradually settled just worse than midfield, steadied approaching home turn, made moderate progress in the run home.
Broke fairly from the widest gate, worked his way forward gradually to travel just off the speed outside leader, came to gain slender advantage entering straight, tired badly inside final 200 metres.
Soon taken well back, widest runner into straight, ran on past beaten runners down the centre of the track.
Niggled at early, settled one back in 3rd on rails, similar turning for home, weakened gradually.
Jumped moderately, raced wide with cover towards the rear, remained wide around the bend and into straight, soon weakened.
Broke well, raced wide without cover in forward of midfield, soon faded after straightening.
Enjoyed the run of the race after box seating. Shifted off the rail early in the straight and ran on nicely.
Travelled just ahead of midfield, 1 off with cover. Closed off well.
Parked worse than midfield 2 deep with cover. Peeled out after being inconvenienced early in the straight, finished off soundly.
Sent forward and crossed to lead on the paint in the early stages. Maintained a reasonable gallop down the running.
Effectively raced 1 out 1 back after obtaining cover near the 700m. Had every possible hope, kept on evenly in the home stretch.
Camped midfield the fence with cover. Railed up in the home straight, kept on at the same speed in the run to the line.
Taken back from a wide gate and settled towards the rear, 3 deep with cover. Finished off steadily between runners.
Travelled in last position, 1 off with cover. Plodded to the line after passing tiring runners.
Ridden along early but couldn't go the early speed of the race and settled worse than midfield, 3 deep with cover. Failed to make any appreciable ground in the final stretch.
Settled 2nd last on the paint with cover after beginning awkwardly. Kept towards the inside in the home straight, failed to close off.
Jumped well then was steadied, in the early stages, travelling around midfield, but posted 3 wide without cover. Never likely.
Worked forward around the field to settle outside the leader, 1 off no cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Camped handy, travelled 2.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, despite harmed by the fast tempo, ran on well to score by a short head. (Lame right hind)
Raced midfield, travelled 5.5Ls behind the leader, suited by the fast pace, dashed well to get 2nd, just missed by a short head.
Taken back from a wide barrier, settled 9Ls behind the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast sectionals, stormed home for 3rd.
Eased start, checked 1500M, settled 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide, benefited by the quick tempo, ran on well to get 4th.
Bumped start, then pushed to midfield, travelled 5Ls behind the leader, suited by the fast pace, ran on ok.
Bumped start, then pushed forward to settle 1L behind the leader 2 wide without cover, despite hampered by the fast sectionals, stayed on well until 100M weakened.
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast sectionals, ran on steadily.
Eased back, crowded 1500M, settled 7Ls behind the leader, benefited by the quick tempo, made some ground in straight.
Taken back as usual, travelled 11Ls behind the leader on the fence, blocked early straight, despite benefited by the quick tempo, ran on fairly.
Hard ridden forward to obtain the box seat, hampered by the fast pace, weakened soon after straightening.
Ridden forward to take rail and led by 1L at fast sectionals, flattened 200M. (Lame right hind)
Camped handy, settled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, harmed by the fast pace, weakened soon after straightening, tailed out.
Smart start, handy 3 wide no cover early, rolled to camp 2nd outside leader 1200m, driven turning in to vie for lead 200m, led late after grinding duel.
Good break, tracked lead in 3rd 1 back on rail, hard-ridden turning in to take narrow lead 200m, all out in duel to wire, headed close home.
Broke well, slotted fore of midfield 1 off with cover, outpaced & bustled 600m, hard-ridden & switched out 300m, strong closer to nab 3rd late.
Decent break, snagged back to rail in rear, driven 500m, switched out on turn, crowded top of run but closed off soundly.
Stumbled start then overraced early strides, settled rail midfield, driven 300m, ran home soundly without threatening.
Sharp start to dispute early lead 1 off, restrained to sit 1 off 1 back 4th, outpaced & niggled 500m, switched out 300m, boxed on evenly.
Speed to lead on fence, increased tempo out of back stretch, hard-ridden under pressure 300m, headed 200m, weakened out.
Missed break, raced rail near rear, progress out of back stretch, switched out home straight, boxed on one pace.
Fair break, trapped 3 wide no cover midfield, ridden 500m, wide into stretch, plugged on at same speed.
Started Ok, overraced 1 off towards rear, outpaced & driven 500m, widest on home turn, found little in tepid stretch run.
Taken behind to tail from widest gate, raced 3 wide with cover, slight progress 800m, soon outpaced & to tail 600m, plugged on at same speed.
Fast break on rail to race handy, rolled to lead 550m, in command & shaken up 350m, drew clear to win cosily.
Speed to roll to lead 800m, raced 1 off & headed 550m, ridden in pursuit 400m, unable to close, kept on soundly.
Snagged back at break, bustled behind midfield 1 off until progress on turn, switched out & driven into stretch, stayed on to make frame.
Slow start, raced tail 1 off with cover, progress into stretch & switched out 400m under drive, drifted centre track, closed off well.
Disputed early lead, eased to 1 back 1 off 800m, driven 400m & closed to 3rd in stretch, one-paced & hung from whip late, edged out of frame.
Sluggish break, bustled on rail, advanced into contention on turn, switched out 400m, unable to quicken, plugged on.
Taken behind from widest gate, raced 3 deep near rear until 4 deep 500m, shuffled to tail, widest into stretch, ran on for minor inroads.
Tardy break, driven across to slot rail 650m, sharp progress to track leader in 3rd, hard-ridden 350m, faded in run.
Broke well to race front rank initially, trapped four wide no cover & drifted back, found nothing for pressure in stretch.
Sluggish start, raced tail on rail, momentum into stretch, soon faltered & plodded home.
Bustled to press front rank initially, soon outpaced & dropped back through field, wide turning in, weakened tamely.
Fast break to dispute lead on outside, snagged back to 3 wide with cover near rear, hard-ridden 350m, struggled in run to wire.
Hard ridden to cross in front, sat just outside the leader, pace good, ran on strongly to win.
Settled nicely behind the leaders 2 wide, pace good, closed the race off strongly for 2nd.
Trapped 3 wide throughout in midfield, 3Ls off the good pace, held ground in straight for 3rd.
Hard ridden to hold the rail and led by 0.5L at good pace, ran no until 200M flattened.
Eased back, 4Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, ran on well to the line.
Awkward away, eased back, 4Ls off the good pace on the fence, progressed steadily 250M.
Eased to rear for rail and cover, 5Ls off the good pace, lack room 400M, made steady ground 200M.
Hard ridden to occupy a more prominent spot from soft draw, ended up in box seat, pace good, out of fuel 200M.
Eased back, 4Ls off the good pace 2 wide, no progress.
Midfield, 3Ls off the good pace 2 wide, soon weakened 400M.
Jumped very well, eased to sit just off the leaders, raced 3 wide no cover throughout, emptied 250M.

Placing: DISQ
Comment: Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the good pace along the fence, no progress.
Crowded out at start, allowed to find feet settling 3-back, the fence. Blocked for run 400m, shifted out abruptly 250m bumping another, finished strongly.
Taken forward from good draw to hold box seat behind leader. Peeled out 3-wide entering straight, led 250m, swamped final stages.
Ridden up 3-wide before sitting outside leader first turn and back stretch. Grabbed lead entering straight, kept on steadily.
Taken forward from wide draw but trapped 3-4 wide before first turn. Covered extra ground final turn, bumped 250m, kept on one paced.
Settled at rear soon after start, not happy with slow pace and moved closer first turn and back stretch. Swung wide entering straight, kept on without threatening.
Slow into stride then ridden to take forward position but held 3-wide without cover from 1400m. Made ground early straight, tiring final strides.
Jumped straight to the front from inside draw, then slowed pace to a crawl from 1200m. Picked up tempo final turn, but one paced final 400m.
Began well, racing alongside early leader to first turn before slipping 1-back, 1-off back stretch. Started to give ground on entering straight.
Hard ridden early to hold position in midfield along back stretch. Switched out 400m to make run but only one-paced.
Not rushed and settled towards rear. Not suited by slow pace and went forward but wide turning for home. One-paced final 400m.
Held in midfield early, not suited slow tempo and came off and on bridle back stretch. Flat footed turn when tempo increased, one-paced in straight. Blood in trachea.
Hard ridden from wide draw but failed to muster and slipped to rear by first turn. Dropped to last turning for home and plodded final 400m.
Chased leaders along the inside, progressed steadily inside 250M, took lead 70M under vigorous handling, continued on well.
Showed early speed, secured a forward placing just off the pace but raced 3-wide without cover, kept up his chase final 300M, not pace of winner final stages.
Quickly into stride, dictated the pace from the front, kept on well turning home, headed inside 100M.
Began only fairly from draw 12, guided to a 3-wide position behind midfield, ran on steadily when driven out 350M.
Dropped back and held up towards the rear, travelled well enough, stayed on mildly over final 300M but never a serious threat to leaders.
Travelled 3-wide in mid-division, made limited progress passing 300M.
Placed 2-wide in the group chasing the pace, no clear run early straight, into clear 250M, made minor headway.
Badly checked at 1000M, recovered to race in midfield, ran on one-paced final 300M, never a serious threat.
Up with early pace, checked near 1000M and fell back to midfield, not picked up when placed under pressure, never in contention. (Lame.)
Began awkwardly, checked near 1000M and ended up towards the rear, took inside route passing 300M but offered little.
Urged to gain a forward position, settled outside leader in a steadily run race, came under pressure 400M, soon weakened.
Dwelt, held up at the back, remained in a difficult position turning for home and lacked response throughout.

Settled on rails in rear of midfield, responded well inside final 200 metres to have the upper hand on line.
Began fairly, ridden along to pick up prominent one-back 4th position on rails, switched out for a run upon straightening hitting front 200 metres out, only to be collared final strides.
Broke well from a poor gate, settled in midfield, ran on quite well to be nearest at finish.
Settled in forward of midfield, took closer order around the bend, kept on steadily without threatening while hanging in straight.
Began fairly, quickly moved up to join leaders approaching home bend, gained slender lead while hanging in early in home straight, folded up quickly inside final 200 metres.
Soon taken back to last few after beginning from a wide gate, switched in for a run upon straightening, baulked briefly 200 metres out, fought on steadily.
Settled better than midfield, one-paced in straight.
Soon taken back from the widest gate, produced good late impression in the run home.
Raced wide without cover in better than midfield, kept on steadily in straight.
Soon taken back behind midfield from a wide gate, kept on steadily under pressure down the centre of straight.
Not far off to straight, faded under pressure.
Soon led on rails, narrowly headed after straightening, folded up quickly inside final 200 metres.
Raced wide in rear of midfield, found nothing in straight.
Soon restrained back to last few from a wide gate, made no show in straight.
Settled in 6th position, close to the running rail with cover. Chased gamely in the straight and claimed the race near the 50m.
Was left racing 3 wide without cover after the 700m, ahead of midfield. Made a forward move prior to the home turn, showed plenty of courage in the home straight, was collard in the last 50m.
Raced behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Shifted out widest in the home straight, finished off with purpose.
Took up leading duties along the paint. Maintained a reasonable gallop down the running, faded late.
Camped midfield, 3 wide with cover. Commenced to improve after the 700m, but only kept on at the same speed in the final stretch.
Had every possible chance after box seating. Began to tire passing the furlong.
Parked 2 deep, midfield with cover. Only plodded to the line.
Settled worse than midfield on the fence with cover. Failed to close off, had every chance.
Effectively settled 1 out 1 back after obtaining cover passing the 800m. Faded in the home straight.
Settled midfield the fence, with cover. Never appeared to travel comfortably throughout the race and finished well back. (Vet reported lame post race right fore)
Not the best away then was taken back and settled 2nd last close to the rail with cover. Failed to close off.
Traveled 3 wide early, managed to shift in on the circle and race 1 off no cover outside the leader. Struggled in the home straight & finished tailed out. (To trial).
Travelled in last position, close to the rail, with cover. Failed to pass another runner and finished tailed out. (To trial)
Pushed forward to obtain the box seat, benefited by the slow pace, ran on well to score by a neck.
Taken back, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, despite not suited by the slow pace, dashed strongly for 2nd, just missed by a neck.
Eased back as usual, settled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite harmed by the slow pace and could not find a day light until 200M, ran on well to get 3rd.

Taken back as usual, 8Ls off the slow pace, however failed to stick with the field in the early stages despite ridden along until after straightening, stormed home 250M for 4th. (Questioned rider, see incident report)
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide, suited by the slow pace, however only kept on one pace to home.
Raced midfield, travelled 3.5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, under pressure 600M, suited by the slow pace, ran on well until 200M weakened.
Eased back, settled 5.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide at slow tempo, made some ground in straight.
Rolled forward to take the fence and led by 1.5Ls at slow sectionals, out of fuel 300M.
Ridden forward to settle 1.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide without cover, weakened badly soon after straightening.
Camped handy, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, flattened badly rounding the Home Turn, tailed out. (Bled)
Fast break to dispute lead initially, settled 1 back on rail 3rd, switched out on turn, ridden into stretch, led 250m, kept on soundly.
Slow start, settled rail near rear, progress on turn, 6L back & switched out for stretch run, closed off strongly to 2nd 100m, not reach winner.
Sharp break, disputed lead & to rail 800m, narrow lead into stretch & shaken up, all out & headed 250m, boxed on to wire.
Tardy start, settled midfield on fence, switched out on turn, driven 400m, stayed on soundly without threatening.
Snagged back from widest gate to race at tail, driven along 700m, 10L last turning in, stayed on for sound stretch gains.
Fair break, raced rail fore of midfield, ridden 600m, hard-driven 400m, battled when beaten but outpaced & weakened out.
Slow start, sat 1 off with cover behind midfield, checked & shuffled to near rear 750m, stayed on dourly for minor inroads.
Taken back to race 1 off with cover near tail, switched out 600m & bustled, wide into stretch, kept on for moderate inroads.
Good break, unable to lay up early, caught 4 wide no cover behind midfield, wide into stretch, plodded on same speed.
Broke well, snagged back to 1 off with cover midfield, shifted wide into stretch, found little in tepid run to wire.
Good break, bustled prominent early, slipped back to 4th 1 off with cover, switched out 400m & hard-ridden, weakened tamely.
Good break, bustled to race fore of midfield 3 wide no cover, found nothing in stretch, soon beaten.
Broke OK, rousted early & off heels 1000m, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, driven 400m, found nothing.
Fast start to dispute lead wide, crossed to race 1 off in van 800m, driven 400m, found nothing & faded rapidly.
Slow start, raced rail midfield, switched 1 off & off heels 600m, switched out 400m, shifted off heels 300m to clear run 200m, surged to lead 100m.
Snagged back to 1 off at tail, switched wide on turn, shaken up 430m, closed strongly to snag 2nd late.
Broke OK, sat midfield 1 off with cover, shifted 3 wide 600m, driven to challenge 400m, in front 200m, tapered & headed 100m.
Bustled to lead on rail, joined 800m & narrowly headed soon after, pressed to regain lead 350m, headed 200m & no extra.
Tardy break, raced 3 wide with cover midfield, crowded turning in, driven 430m, stayed on evenly.
Fast break, tracked lead 1 of with cover, crowded 400m, clear running & driven 350m, to 3rd 200m, emptied & faded thereafter.
Taken back to race 3 deep with cover near rear, very wide & driven into stretch, kept on for moderate gains.
Taken behind at break to rail at tail, switched out into straight, ran on through horses for minor inroads.
Tardy start, bustled to sit handy 1 back on rail, driven 400m, one-paced to wire.
Missed break & rousted to settle rail near rear, ridden into stretch, boxed on one pace.
Speed to press lead early strides, taken back to race handy 3 wide no cover, pressed lead 430m, faded out from 300m.
Broke well, pushed forward 1 off to join leader 800m, led narrowly 700m, emptied & headed 350m, weakened out.
Good break, trapped 4 wide no cover midfield, struggled in run & eased when beaten.
Missed break, ridden to race 1 off with cover behind midfield, off heels 850m, switched out on turn, off heels 450m, found nothing.
Pressed forward to take rail and led by 1L at fast sectionals, hung on well to win.
Behind midfield, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Pushed along to keep up in midfield, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast pace, ran on well for 3rd.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, made some ground 300M.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, 3Ls behind the fast pace, ran on until 200M flattened.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 200M.
Hard ridden forward, box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, held up 4-2, ran on fairly when clear.
Eased back, 9Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, suited by the fast pace, made minor ground 200M.
Eased back, 10Ls off the leader along the fence, benefited by the fast tempo, made steady ground 300M.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the fast pace, out of fuel 250M.
Eased back, 10Ls off the leader on the fence, no progress.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, emptied 200M.
Eased to rear, never competitive.
Hard ridden forward, 3Ls off the fast pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, faded 500M.
Began well, settling one-back, one-off at turn. Peeled 3-wide entering straight, motored to front 200m, pulled clear for easy win.
Jumped OK but difficult to settle from 900m, shifted out and raced 3-wide without cover to straight. Looked chance 200m but unable match winner.
Taken back from wide draw, improved along rail before over racing 700m and checked. Last into straight, powering home final 200m.
Taken back from wide draw and last at 800m. Made ground around turn, kept on steadily in straight, doing best work final 200m.
Jumped best and quickly cut to rail at head of field. Led into straight, collared 300m, but kept on once-paced.
Jumped fairly and made straight to rail 4L from leader. Peeled out turn, very wide into straight but only one-paced.
Ridden forward soon after start to sit outside leader before turn. Kept on steadily early in straight before flattened 100m.
Ridden to take forward position 3-wide before turn. Covered extra ground turning for home becoming one-paced in straight.
Jumped well to sit in box seat behind leader. Took the turn greenly, shifted out and bumped another. One-paced in straight.
Rolled forward to sit 3-back from leader. Came off fence turning for home, hampered with no clear run 150m-50m. Not fully tested.
Ridden forward from wide draw, unable cut in and held wide, gradually slipping back. Wide into straight turning one-paced.
Outpaced early and settled towards rear. Lost position turning for home, plodding home final 200m.
No early speed, slipping back and cutting in to fence. Lost position turning for home, one-paced final 400m.
Jumped fairly before racing ungenerously, slipping back through field. Tailed off in straight. Unacceptable performance.
Went into the lead easily and dictated the tempo of the race , kicked clear passing 400M, pressed by pursuers final 100M but held gamely under urging.
Settled behind leaders off the rail, advanced to 2nd 400M, ran on steadily to chase winner, always held over final 100M.
Began awkwardly, travelled keenly behind leaders, produced with every chance in straight but lacked a further response inside 150M.
Held up 2-wide in mid-division, given a clear passage turning in but took time to gather, did best work final 200M, just missed 3rd.
Patiently held up behind midfield, closed off mildly and was never a serious threat to leaders.
From wide draw soon taken across behind runners, improved to midfield once guided to the fence, kept on steadily final 400M but not getting near to leaders.
Raced keenly when restrained in a rearward position, held up for a while near 350M, stayed on without threat.
Reserved early, settled near last, taken widest turning home, made limited progress.
Never better than midfield, caught wide no cover from 800M, kept on same pace and no extra final 200M.
Settled behind midfield, not quickened when urged early straight, eased when no chance final stages.
Tracked the pace but had nothing to offer turning home, dropped away 350M.
Rolled forward to race outside leader, weakened rapidly 400M out.
Dropped back to the rear, outpaced passing 800M, never involved.
Taken forward from wide draw to sit one-back, one-off into back stretch. Taken 3-wide without cover 800m, rolled forward to lead 300m, kept on well, holding off late challenge.
Jumped fairly, holding rail 3-back from leader. Not happy with pace but held in by outside horses. Peeled out entering straight before shifting back in, running home strongly.
Jumped well but caught wide without cover 1300m. Rolled forward to lead when pace slackened. Collared 300m but kept on steadily.
Outpaced early, slipping back towards rear between horses. Last turning for home before running on well down centre track. Checked near finish.
Taken back behind runners before switching wide and making ground back stretch. Wide into straight and kept on steadily.
Jumped well, settling 3-back, one-off into first turn. Not suited slow pace and shuffled back before final turn. One paced in home straight.
Outpaced early, slipping to rear. Made up some ground back stretch but shuffled to last final turn. Made up good ground wide final 200m.
Ridden to take forward position, settling 3-back, one-off back stretch. Mode forward move turning for home but one-paced final 200m.
Slow into stride, proved difficult to settle 1000m, shifted out 800m, held up for run 400m-300m, one-paced final. Lame right front.
Began fairly but then proved difficult to settle. Checked off heels and hampered before final turn dropping back. Finished off fairly.
Ridden forward from inside draw to sit 2-back, the fence along back stretch. Closed in turning for home, bumped 250m when tiring.
Taken forward soon after start but trapped wide without cover from 1300m. Covered extra ground final turn, and tired quickly in straight.
Outpaced early and raced at rear along fence. Made up some ground early in straight before checked 250m and fell back.
Led on settling before dropping anchor and passed by another 1300m. Stayed in box seat to final turn but gave ground soon after entering straight.
Began with them, had ideal run on leaders back, fair run with standard speed, gained a dream run along inside and dashed through to lead at 200m, held on well to deny late challengers.
Settled just off midfield 5-6ls back in running line, fair run with even sections, tracked through nicely on turning in, produced a strong finish final 300m to just miss.
Raced in midfield 3 wide with cover, 5ls off lead, switched out approaching turn making ground wide, closed soundly in straight going down in a 3 way go.
Took a position on rails in midfield, 3ls or so back, easy time to turn, in some traffic until 200m when gained split, finished ok to make frame.
Allowed to drop back to rear, raced 7ls back in running line, still well back turning, gained runs between horses and closed off well making many lengths to just miss frame.
Went forward to take up the running, set standard sectional to suit, in dual on circle and well into straight, lost advantage at 200m and just tired last bit missing frame.
No early pace, shared rear, 7ls or so back, saved ground turning, made good headway along inside in straight to be on heels of place getters at finish.
Positioned behind midfield on rails, 4-5ls off lead, travelled strongly to turn, made ground between horses in straight closing steadily to be not far away in finish.

Pressed forward to slot in closer but was posted 3 wide without cover in midfield, 3-4ls back, worked hard in run, still there at 200m but had no extra, stuck on respectably thereafter given workload.
Drifted back from a tricky gate, raced at rear 6-7ls away 3 wide with cover, improved turning and came widest in straight, closed off evenly without threatening but peaked at 200m.
Took up a nice spot 1 out 1 back racing just off pace pair, all favours to bend, kept in it until 200m but peaked on run, checked at 100m when tiring.
Landed a nice spot in midfield 3ls or so back racing two wide, no excuses in run, asked for effort turning back lacked customary finish, didn't really get into it thereafter. (see racing incidents)
Sent forward to race outside leader, shared lead and travelled strongly with even sections, soon struggling turning and gave way quickly to be beaten.
Trapped 4 wide without cover from an outside alley, 5ls or so from lead, always working in run, dropped out soon after turning and was beaten a long way.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began fairly settling in 5th or 6th just better than midfield, baulked and switched out for a run 300 metres out, quickened well to gain upper hand close to home.
Never far off, soon came to challenge upon straightening hitting front about 150 metres out, only to be caught close to home.
Began fairly, soon ridden to lead, crossed for rails run before home bend, led until finding no extra inside final 150 metres.
Settled just worse than midfield, wandered about early in straight, produced very good late impression.
Prominent, folded up quickly inside final 200 metres.
Jumped well, raced prominently and wide without cover early, soon dropped out from one-length second into straight. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Travelled in 6th or 5th in better than midfield, failed to quicken to challenge after straightening.
Always well behind, ran on past well beaten horses in straight.
Slowly away, remained well behind until straight, ran on past well beaten horses.
Ridden along behind midfield racing greenly, struggling in straight.
Soon dropped to last few, made short-lived effort around the bend, dropped out after straightening.
Enjoyed the run of the race, 1 out 1 back. Peeled out turning for home and lengthened nicely to score a decisive win.
Made use of early to work forward, 2-3 wide with some cover on the circle, travelling 3 back. Maintained a good gallop down the running. (Bled)
Parked midfield the fence had cover. Peeled out before the home turn, held up early in the straight, closed off soundly.
Raced with the backmakers, shifting in to race 2 deep with cover on the first turn. Swung the home turn with 1 wider and ran on well.
Settled midfield, 3 deep with cover. Stayed on at the same speed for most of the final stretch.
Made its run from the tail of the field, 1 off with cover. Finished off reasonably out wide.
Raced in second last position, on the rails with cover. Made steady progress in the home stretch.
Not the best to begin but recovered to race on the back of the speed, along the fence with cover. Was tiring over the final 100m.
Travelled 1 off behind midfield with cover. Kept on at the same pace in the run home.
Camped worse than midfield, the fence with cover. Struggled in the final stretch. (Vet rep "roarer" as previously reported")
Ridden along from barrier rise and eventually crossed to travel as joint leader on the first turn. 1 off no cover. Was a beaten horse early in the home straight.
Made some use of in the early stages to hold the fence, bowled along vying for leading duties. Faded in the home straight.
Ridden forward to take the fence and led by 1/2L, hung on well for a victory by a neck.
Camped handy, settled in 4th position, 3Ls off the pace on the fence, dashed on strongly however could not pass the winner over the final stages, missed by a neck.
Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls off the pace 2 wide, ran on strongly for 3rd but without any threats to the first two.
Eased to sit midfield about 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on nicely to get 4th but without any threats to the first two.
Camped handy, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, kept on one pace to the line without threatening,
Hard ridden forward to cross to settle in 3rd position, 2 deep with cover, had every possible chance in straight, however weakened over the concluding stages.
Niggle along early to travel 7Ls behind the leader on the fence, unable to show any dash in straight.
Positive ridden early, however could not slot in to a good spot, then eased to settle 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide, unable to make any impression in straight.
Settled worse than midfield about 8Ls behind the leader 2 wide, never ran on.
Began awkwardly, then ridden forward to park outside the leader, weakened badly 250M.
Always at rear, never competitive.
Always at rear, never a factor.
Smart start, tracked pace 1 back on rail, switched out 400m & driven to lead 250m, drew clear, tapered late & clung on.
Sharp start, slotted handy 1 off with cover, switched out home turn & driven, strong run to press winner at wire, just failed.
Tardy start, gradual rail progress to midfield, driven 400m & closed off well to take 3rd.
Fast start, rousted to marginal lead 1 off 1000m, headed 800m, ridden to lead again 400m, headed 250m & plugged home one pace.
Outpaced early & soon bustled at tail, advanced wide no cover to midfield on turn, boxed gamely on under drive without threatening.
Sluggish start, raced 1 off with cover near rear, switched wide into stretch, plugged on moderately to wire.
Broke OK, raced 3 wide with cover midfield, slotted 1 off into 1st turn, driven 400m, kept on one pace.
Speed to lead on rail, headed 1000m & pressed lead, led again 800m, headed 400m & no extra, faded out.
Raced near rear wide with cover, widest into stretch, unable to raise game & never a factor.
Broke OK on rail, soon niggled & drifted back to tail, detached turning in, plodded home past beaten rival.
Broke OK, driven to press lead 3 wide no cover, ridden under pressure on turn, struggled into stretch, faded tamely.
Fast start, raced close 2nd on rail, switched out 350m, responded to drive & quickened to lead 100m, in control at line.
Slow start & rousted on rail to race behind midfield, switched out & driven 400m, relentless grind to snag 2nd close home.
Broke OK, caught 3 wide & drifted back near tail, driven 600m, last into stretch, hard-ridden wide for strong finish, took 3rd last stride.
Speed to lead, set tempo 1 off, kicked off home turn, all out & headed 100m, edged out of frame late.
Sluggish start, bustled & advanced to fore of midfield on rail, driven into stretch, stuck in pocket 200m, switched out & kept on one pace.
Good break, snagged back to midfield 3 wide with cover, ridden 500m, outpaced into stretch, stayed on for gains final 200m.
Taken back at break, soon at tail, driven 600m, switched out on turn, wide into stretch & boxed on for minor gains.
Slow start & taken behind from wide gate, slotted 1 off near rear, ridden 400m, kept on evenly.
Decent break, caught 3 wide no cover behind front rank, driven to 3rd turning in, emptied 200m & faded.
Sharp start, tucked handy behind lead 1 off with cover, ridden 600m, all out 300m & struggled in run home.
Tardy break, settled midfield 1 off with cover, every chance when hard-ridden 400m, outpaced in tepid stretch run.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 4Ls off the leaders along the fence, benefited by the fast tempo and the rail trip, made steady ground 300M to score.
Very slow away, 6Ls off the leader on the rails, favoured by the fast pace, blocked 400M, progressed steadily when clear for 2nd.
Hard ridden forward, 2.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, not suited by the fast sectionals, ran on strongly to the line for 3rd.
At back as usual, 8Ls off the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, made steady ground 400M.
Hard ridden to hold the fence and shared the lead at fast sectionals, hung on well until 200M overhauled and flattened.
Eased to rear, 8Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M.
Pushed to occupy a more prominent spot, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, just held ground.
Pushed early but not muster, 8Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made some late ground 200M.
Pushed early, trapped 4-5 wide in midfield throughout, flattened 250M.
Began awkwardly, unable to go forward and raced in midfield, kept on same pace turning home, never threatened.
Slow away, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, held up 4-2, ran on fairly when clear.
Eased to sit midfield early, raced keenly, allowed to move forward to share the lead 3 wide, used up all fuel during fast sectionals, emptied 300M.
Pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, not suited by the fast tempo, faded 400M.
Hard ridden forward to share the lead 2 wide, harmed by the fast sectionals, soon dropped off 600M, checked 500M.
Taken forward to sit behind leader to straight. Blocked for run 400m, checked and switched out 350m, picked up momentum to win drawing away.
Taken to the front on settling and set steady pace. Kicked clear entering straight, still ahead 200m, run down final 60m.
Steadied after start and taken to rear. Brushed rail turning at 900m, swung out 500m then switched back in. Ran on well closing.
Taken forward but trapped 3-4 wide without cover. Allowed to drift back to get cover but taken wide again 600m. Kept on steadily in straight.
Ridden forward and able to cut in to rail before turn, 3-back from leader. No run 400m, swung out 350m, kept on steadily.
Jumped well and taken forward to sit outside leader. Still in contention 400m before turning one paced from 200m.
Ridden forward but trapped wide in midfield, steadied and lost position. Swung widest into straight but one-paced.
Jumped with field and raced in midfield away from fence. Took off from 600m, looked chance 200m, flattened.
Slow to jump and then crowded out before cutting in to rail towards rear. Started run from 600m but found little in straight.
Caught wide soon after start, steadied and allowed to drift back but still wide. In last pair turning for home. One-paced.
Began well, pulled way forward to race with leading bunch but lay out turning for home. Spent force from 200m.
Steadied and taken back from wide draw. In last pair by turn, lost touch with field entering straight, tailed off.
Sped to the lead, crossed to stands' rail and took them along at steady pace, kept on strongly under pressure and always holding off the persistent 2nd.
In mid-division, pushed along 500M, made steady headway to go 2nd 100M out but well held by the winner.
Slow to begin but not hurried, reserved towards the rear, stayed on well to claim 3rd without getting near to first two.
Tracked leader, brief threat to winner passing 400M, one paced final 200M.
Knuckled over at the start, settled towards the rear, stayed on only fairly final 400M, ran past beaten runners for a remote 5th.
Travelled in mid-division, hung in when placed under pressure 400M, never going the pace to challenge.
Behind midfield, driven along passing halfway, kept on same pace, never threatened.
Urged to take a prominent spot just off the pace, lacked a further response passing 400M, weakened away.
Showed good early speed, tracked leader prominently but found little when the race got serious passing halfway.
Blew the start and lost considerable amount of ground, detached at the back and never involved. (See Racing Incident regarding barrier incident.)
Niggled along to maintain his position in midfield, dropped right away when came under pressure 400M.
Jumped well to hold rail inside leader but shifted out 800m when crossed. Started forward move entering straight and ran home well for cozy win.
Ridden forward to hold fence in 4th place at 800m before closing in top of straight. Switched out 350m to find run and kept on well.
Taken back from wide draw but stayed away from fence toward rear. Swung wide entering straight and ran on nicely.
Taken forward to sit one-back, one-off but taken wide 800m after which raced greenly, switching in and out several times. Kept on steadily in straight.
Jumped best to lead but held away from fence before cutting in at 800m. Collared 300m but kept on steadily.
Allowed to find feet and gradually moved to rail behind midfield. Switched out turning for home but only one paced final.
Taken back from wide draw and last into turn. Swung widest entering straight and boxed on steadily.
Ridden to take forward position and 3-wide into turn. Taken wider 650m, one-paced under hard riding final 400m.
Not pushed early and gradually cut in to rail 4-back from leader. Stayed on rail entering straight but only one-paced.
Slowly away, settled at the rear, never going the pace to challenge.
Ridden to take forward position, checked 700m and then again 600m. Started to lose ground entering straight becoming tailed off.
Began well, was electing or a trail but overaced and allowed to slide to lead, always travelling at terms to suit, booted clear soon after turning, went on to score by a big margin with ease.
Showed usual speed to lead, took a trail when favorite took over, had fair run in mid-section, right there turning, unable to dash with eventual winner and battled away for a distant 2nd.
Checked at start and settled further back than intended, shared rear 9ls or so off top end, still a clear last turning, made many lengths in straight for a fast finishing 3rd.
Slotted into a midfield role on rails 5ls back, soft run throughout, clear from 300m but could only manage to hold ground in run to line.
Took a trail just off the pace, 3ls or so behind leader, had even run to turn, made a bid and looked a place chance turning, run ended inside 200m and just missed frame.
No early pace, raced 6ls or more away on rails, kept to fence on turning, made some minor headway but never looked like threatening.
Slotted into midfield 4-5ls away in running line, no excuses in run, came wider turning, run ended at 300m and just battled thereafter.
Average break, unable to slot in and posted 3 wide without cover in midfield, 5ls or so off lead, did work to turn, lacked required acceleration in stretch.
No early speed, raced behind midfield 3 wide 7ls or more from lead, struggling turning, only passed tired runner in run o line.
Took a spot behind midfield in running line, 6ls off lead, pushed along turning, didn't get into it and struggled in run to line.
Enjoyed ideal run racing 1 out 1 back, didn't find much when asked on turning, folded cheaply in straight and dropped right off.
Difficult to settled soon after start and pulled way forward to race outside leader, travelled a bit too well in an unsuitable spot and gave ground quickly from 400m point as a result.
Slow to begin, settled at rear, 8ls or more from lead, kept to inside to save ground turning, very little progress in straight possibly not seeing out extended journey.
Drifted back from widest alley, raced 3 wide at rear 9ls back, came wider in straight but made no real headway.
Began well, led briefly before taking a trail on leaders back, all favours thereafter, gained split at 200m and dashed through, held rivals late with some in hand.
Away with them, raced in 5th on rails 3ls back, every chance to bend, stuck on well in straight prevailing in a 3 way finish for 2nd.
Pressed forward as usual to sit outside leader, had a fair run throughout, leveled up soon after turning and in mix for most of straight, narrowly touched off for 2nd.
Moderate break, raced behind midfield 5-6ls back, angled out turning but didn't get a clear crack until 300m, closed hard final furlong to make frame.
Took ideal spot 1 out 1 back, enjoyed nice run throughout, produced soon after turning and briefly led to 200m, tired last bit and missed frame.
Taken back from a wide alley, raced at rear5 on rails nearly 10ls back, closed off well between horses in straight making plenty of ground to be nearest at finish.
Restrained from widest alley raced at rear 10ls back, 3 wide with cover in middle stages, too much to do turning but closed off well in straight making many lengths to be on heels of place getters.
Went forward but raced a little keenly and ended up leading, set even tempo throughout, kept to 250m when headed, no extra final furlong.
Raced behind midfield 7-8ls back on rails, quiet time throughout, same margin back turning, closed off fairly without looking a chance.
Positioned in 2 wide line 7-8ls back, reasonable trip throughout, urged to pick up turning, no extra gear in straight and just plugged to line.
Taken back from a tricky gate, raced further back than usual 3 wide at rear 8ls away, had cover in mid-section, never really got into it from there and battled away in straight.
Awkwardly away, shared rear nearly 10ls back on rails, difficult to settle in mid-section, still at rear with plenty to do turning, made no impression.
Raced just in front of midfield, 4ls back in running line, fair run but struggling turning, folded cheaply in straight.

Ridden along after jump to match pace with leader, gained narrow lead upon straightening, held on gamely to just prevail.
Jumped moderately, soon moved up along rails to gain slender lead in sedate pace, marginally headed on straightening, fought a vain attempt under pressure to reclaim lead.
Jumped nicely, soon held back to obtain one-back position on rails, briefly baulked upon straightening, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Settled 2-wide in rear of midfield of small field, ran on steadily in straight to be nearest at finish.
Jumped fairly, gradually came across to travel one-back one off the rails, held position until faded inside final 200 metres.
Jumped moderately, soon taken back to trail the small field, came under pressure to challenge upon straightening and did best work late, never nearer.
In similar position of one from last throughout, widest runner turning in, closed on leaders steadily down the centre of the straight, never nearer. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Jumped moderately, soon picked up on rails to travel mainly 3L back in 6th or 5th while racing awkwardly, baulked behind runners on straightening, found no extra inside final 200 metres.
Settled fourth along the outside rail, had cover. Chased with plenty of purpose under vigourous riding to snatch victory close to the 50m.
Raced on the speed closer to the stands rail, no cover.. Offered plenty of resistance, finishing off well.
Showed good gate speed to lead the race settling well away from the outside rail. Finished off gamely.
Travelled in front of midfield, 3 from the stands fence. Hung in for most of the race maintained a fair gallop to the wire.
Parked midfield well off the stands rail, had cover. Closed off reasonably.
Camped ahead off midfield, near the middle section of the track, no cover. Never fired.
Raced close to the leaders 3-4 from the grandstand side, no cover. Was a beaten horse passing the 300m.
Raced nearer to the center of the track, midfield with cover. Commenced to tire over the final furlong.
Parked close to the speed, approximately 4 from the stands rail, had cover. Faded over the final 300m.
Raced on the grandstand side well back in the event. Made no appreciable ground in the run to the finishing line.
Raced at the rear of the field, about 5 off the stands rail had cover. Only plodded to the post.
Not the best to begin and settled worse than midfield, closer to the middle of the course with cover. Made no impression over the final 400m.
Raced with the backmakers towards the stands rail with cover. Failed to find any extra at the business end and finished well back.
Travelled at the tail of the field with cover towards the center of the course. Struggled in the run to the line.
Ridden forward to take the lead and made all by 3Ls impressively. (Questioned trainer for improving performance, see incident report)
Taken back as usual, travelled 8.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide. Peeled wide turning in, dashed strongly for 2nd.
Pushed to settle in front of midfield, raced 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, ran on steadily to get 3rd.
Eased back as usual, settled 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide, gradually improved rounding the Home Turn, dashed well to grab 4th.
Rolled forward to obtain the box seat, travelled well until 350M, however only kept on one pace to the line. (substantial amount of blood in the horse's trachea)
Slow to muster early, travelled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, one-paced home.
Raced midfield, settled 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on only fairly.
Settled in front of midfield, 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, kept on one pace in straight.
Taken back to worse than midfield about 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide, sung wide turning in, made some ground in straight.
Raced midfield, settled 5.5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, made no impression in straight.
Always at rear, never ran on.
Rolled forward but could not find any cover to slot in, raced outside the leader most trips, weakened 300M. (Questioned for running and riding, see incident report)
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader 3 wide without cover throughout, dropped off 250M.
Began fairly, then failed to muster despite hard ridden along, never a factor.
Good break to lead, crossed to rail & headed 1100m, stalked pace in 3rd, switched out on turn, swept to lead 300m, commanding win.
Broke well, raced handy 1 off with cover, switched out & driven 400m, grinding run to 2nd 200m, well held by winner.
Broke well, raced rail fore of midfield, rolled to 4th 700m, not clear run in stretch, shaken up for daylight 200m, solid closer, just missed 2nd.
Speed at break, drifted back to camp 1 off with cover fore of midfield, driven & switched out home turn, closed off evenly.
Broke well, rolled to lead 1 off 1100m, to rail 800m, pressed into stretch, shaken up & headed 300m, boxed on one pace.
Tardy start, settled rail midfield, ridden 430m, stayed on at same speed.
Lacked pace & crowded early, raced midfield 1 off with cover, ridden wide into stretch, one-paced in run home.
Taken back at start, settled at tail on rail, slight advance 600m, shaken up 400m, sound progress until off heels 200m, minor inroads thereafter.
Taken back at start to race near rear 3 wide no cover, driven wide final turn, plugged on moderately.
Speed to dispute lead initial strides, snagged to behind midfield 1 off with cover, driven & shifted out into stretch, laboured in run.
Rousted from gate, shuffled back & off heels 900m, to tail 600m, ridden 450m, shifted out & hard-ridden to pass beaten rivals late.
Snagged back & crossed to race rail behind midfield, switched out & driven 400m, struggled in stretch run & faded.
Broke with others, caught wide & rolled on to sit close 2nd outside leader, ridden 400m, found nothing & faded tamely.

Placing: UR
Comment: Turned left out of gate and dropped rider.
Taken back, camped at tail 3 wide with cover, ridden 600m & advanced 4 deep, sustained surge centre track to lead 200m, drew clear.
Fast start to lead, crossed to rail 1400m, extended 600m, hard-ridden in stretch to maintain advantage, all out & headed 200m.
Good start, settled fore of midfield 1 off with cover, niggled & shuffled back 800m, switched out & ridden 430m, stayed on well, just missed 2nd.
Broke OK, raced 3 deep fore of midfield, without cover from 800m, wide & driven final turn, ran on evenly to wire.
Decent start, sat midfield 3 wide with cover, driven wide into stretch, stayed on for dour gains.
Tardy break out wide, trapped 3 deep no cover midfield, ridden to slot outside leader 800m, ridden in 2nd 400m, one-paced & swamped 50m.
Slow break, raced rear 1 off with cover, last turning in & driven, closed off through horses for minor inroads.
Broke OK, covered 1 off behind midfield, shuffled back 700m, switched out & run blocked 350m, ridden 200m, snatched off heels 150m, not tested.
Good break wide, crossed to track leader 1 off no cover, got cover 900m, niggled 700m, hard at it 400m, plugged on same speed until tapered late.
Snagged back to rail in rear rank, bumped & lost ground 850m, driven turning in, found little & plugged on one pace.
Fair break to sit fore of midfield on rail, ridden on turn & switched out in stretch, outpaced & weakened in run.
Rousted at break, raced rail behind midfield, ridden 600m, struggled in run home.
Tardy start & bustled early, raced 3 wide with cover near rear, wide final turn & driven, found little & folded tamely.
Sharp start to sit 1 back on rail, switched out & driven 400m, found nothing & faded out.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Hard ridden to occupy the box seat, benefited by the slow sectionals, led 400M, hung on until 50M overhauled, just beaten by a head in 2nd.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the slow pace, trapped 3 wide, ran on strongly for 3rd.
Midfield, checked early, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, blocked 400M, dashed well when clear.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield on the rails, 4Ls off the slow pace, made early move 500M, ran on ok in straight.
Behind midfield, 5Ls off the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Pushed early but failed to muster and cross, eased to midfield, 4Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on fairly.
Pushed to forward to lead by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung out round the home turn, out of fuel 300M.
At back, hung out severely round the home bend and even worst in the straight, never had chance.
Pushed forward, 1L off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, however soon emptied 400M.
Pressed forward, 3Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, soon reduced 400M.
Bumped start, never a factor at rear.
Taken back from wide draw to sit at rear away from fence. Moved up turn, swung wide 400m, hit front 200m, held off late challenge.
No early speed and settled 4-back the fence. Held in turning for home, got clear 300m, finished strongly while laying in. Just failed.
Taken forward to settle behind leader before turn. Held in top of straight, looked chance 200m when clear, no extra close home.
Jumped fairly and held 3-wide before first turn. Taken very wide entering straight, looked chance before run ended 100m.
Taken forward from wide draw and covered extra ground around turn. Closed in steadily before becoming one-paced final 200m.
Jumped straight to the front and clear leader until straight. Collared 200m after which kept on one-paced.
Jumped OK and held rail 3L from leader. Shifted out entering turn, tightened 500m, blocked for run 400m. Kept on one-paced when clear.
Outpaced early and raced between horses at rear. Improved position around turn but one-paced final 200m.
Crowded out soon after start and dropped to last pair along rail. Hung out entering straight and found little under hard riding.
Taken back from wide draw and long last before turn. Caught up with main field 400m, taken wide but found little.
Began well to settle two-back, one-off before turn. Put under pressure entering straight but only one-paced.
Worked from wide draw to sit outside leader. Came off bridle 500m and did not respond to urging in straight. Eased final 200m. Unacceptable performance.
Ridden to take forward position from wide draw but raced keenly and 3-wide without cover, Third into straight before running on empty.
Travelled well in midfield, picked up the pace passing 400M, closed strongly under urge to get up 50M from home.
Showed good early speed and chased leaders handily, unleashed a good turn of foot to lead 250M, kept on well and was only collared late on.
4Ls off the leaders in mid-division, travelled smoothly to straight, angled out for clear run 350M, ran on steadily but always held by first two.
Held up near the rear 7-8Ls off the pace, saved ground along the fence, stayed on mildly over final 350M and never a serious threat to leaders.
Slow to begin, soon guided to the fence and improved to race behind midfield, plugged on under pressure final 400M, no impression on leaders.
Tracked leaders along the rail, remained a prominent factor before fading final 100M.
Held up behind midfield, angled out to clear inside 450M, stayed on only fairly.
Taken back from draw 14, patiently ridden in last well off the pace in middle stages, swung widest home, made limited progress.
Driven forward from draw 13, crossed to track leader along the 2-path, lacked a further response passing 300M, weakened gradually.
Held up mid-division along the 2-path, given every hope in straight but never going the pace to challenge, no extra inside 100M.
Unable to slot in from outside draw, restrained to near last while racing keenly, underwent a 3-wide journey over the turn, came up empty when asked.
Reserved near the rear, kept on one paced final 400M and failed to reach a contending position.
Led uncontested, set steady pace, unable to shake off pursuers turning home, swamped mid-straight.
Guided to a position behind midfield, 3-wide without cover round the home turn, had nothing to offer passing 400M.
Hard ridden from wide draw and surges to the front 1300m, then dropped anchor. Shaken up 300m and skipped away for easy win.
Began well and led field into first turn along rail. Dropped to 2nd 1300m, popped off fence 1200m to sit outside leader. Kept on steadily in straight.
Began well before settling 3-back the fence. Blocked for run entering straight and jockey forced to stop riding 250m. Got clear late to snatch 3rd placing.
Jumped with field and settled 3-back, one-off back stretch. Peeled out entering straight but only one-paced and just pipped for place money.
Began OK and gradually cut in to fence 4-back from leader. Came off rail turning for home and ran on steadily.
Began awkwardly and then crowded out, dropping to rear. Held 3-wide 800m, swung very wide into straight, kept on one paced.
Taken back from wide draw but trapped 3-wide into first turn. Remained in last pair before making late ground in straight.
Hard-ridden from the start but failed to muster along rail. Shaken up final turn but only limited response.
Ridden out from start but trapped wide and did not travel. Came off bridle 600m, under pressure from final turn but limited response.
Ridden to obtain forward position settling one-off behind early leaders. Looked chance turning for home before turning one-paced.
Hard ridden from wide draw but caught wide 1400m and taken back to last. Peeled out turning for home and ran past tired horses.
Taken forward to sit 2-back the fence before taking box seat when runner-up left fence 1200m. Out of gas entering straight and slipped back gradually.
Crowded out at start and dropped towards rear, 10L from leader. Shifted out in straight under whip toward outer fence.
Fractious in gate, removed and replaced. Slow into stride, dropped to last 400m becoming tailed off. Unacceptable performance.
Slotted into a midfield spot, 4ls or so off lead, enjoyed a nice trip, put into race at 400m and ambled up to leaders, took control and kept on strongly to score another easy win.
Hampered early and settled behind midfield on rails, 7ls or so back, began to improve rounding bend angling wider at 400m, into clear final 300m and dashed home strongly for an eye catching debut.
Taken back from a wide gate, shared rear 8ls or more from top end, saved ground on rails turning, closed strongly along inside making many lengths to take 3rd.
Showed speed to take up running, set even sections to suit, raised tempo turning and kept in mix until 200m but lacked extra and lost place final 100m.
Took a nice spot behind pace trio, 2ls back in running line, eased 3 wide rounding bend, challenged at 400m and looked a place chance but found no extra final furling and just kept on.
Took a spot a little closer than usual 5ls or so back in midfield, ridden along turning, made steady headway in straight to be nearest on line.
Began well enough, sat just in front of midfield on rails, 3ls back to bend, saved ground along inside but just stayed on at 1 speed at business end.
Tucked in just behind midfield 5-6ls back, fair trip in middle stages, gradually improved and in some traffic until 200m, finished off evenly when clear without looking a threat.
Raced behind midfield 3 wide with cover 7ls back, came 4 wide to improve rounding bend, kept on fairly but unable to make much ground off back of decent closing section.
Away in line, caught 3 wide without cover in midfield 5ls back, always working in run, crept closer turning, effort peaked at 200m and dropped off (lame).
Awkwardly away, settled towards rear further back than intended, overaced 7-8ls back, plenty to do turning, came wide and made some ground to 200m when run ended.
Showed usual speed to race outside leader, sat just off leader with even sections, struggled from 400m and gave ground quickly fading out of contention.
Restrained from a tricky gate, raced at tail 10ls back, same margin back turning and struggling to keep touch, never got into it.
Began well, took a spot behind leader, fair run to turn, folded soon after turning and dropped right out (bled 2nd time)
