Began fairly, raced wide with leaders early stages, taken back for cover 2W in 3L 5th rounding stables bend, remained similar far side, commenced move around the bend, fought on steadily in straight to gain upper hand close to home.
Broke well, settled in midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Settled in midfield, fought on steadily under pressure in straight, did best work late.
Jumped moderately from a wide draw, raced wide with leaders before taking up running with rails run around stables bend, led until swamped inside final 50 metres.
Slightly slow out, settled in rear of midfield on rails, commenced move entering straight, ran on well down the centre of the track to be nearest at finish.
Began fairly, travelled mostly 2-wide in 3rd to straight, one-paced.
Towards the rear most of way, kept on steadily without quickening.
On rails amongst leaders early, obtained cover one-back rounding stables bend, remained similar hugging the rails turning for home, found nil under pressure inside final 200 metres.
Soon taken back to race in rear, wide into straight, one-paced under pressure.
Ridden along in prominent positions, settled in 4th on rails some 2L back far wide, switched off rails into a tight gap around the Rock and remained similar entering straight, soon weakened.
Began fairly, soon dropped to last few, saved ground turning for home, found nothing.
Trailed the field throughout. (Lame next day)
Camped handy, raced outside the leader 600M, ran on well to score by 1/2L. (was slightly affected by felling horses 600M.)
Ridden forward to park outside the leader, led 600M, hung on well to get 2nd, missed by 1/2L.
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader along the fence, made steadily ground in straight without threatening. (was badly affected by felling horses 600M.)
Ridden forward, however trapped 3 wide with cover throughout, kept on one pace to the line. (was badly affected by felling horses 600M.)
At rear, travelled 8Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on fairly. (was badly affected by felling horses 600M.)
Became fractious then lost considerable amount of ground, travelled 9Ls on the fence, never ran on. (was badly affected by felling horses 600M.)
Lacked early speed, settled 7Ls behind the leader on the fence, never a factor. (was affected by felling horses 600M.)

Placing: UR
Comment: Raced worse than midfield about 5.5Ls off the pace 2 wide, dislodged 600M.

Placing: FE
Comment: Raced midfield, travelled 3.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, dislodged 600M.

Placing: UR
Comment: Sent forward to obtain the box seat, dislodged 600M.

Placing: UR
Comment: Began fairly, then failed to muster despite hard ridden along, dislodged 600M.

Placing: FE
Comment: Sent forward and led by 1/2L, broken down 600M.
Ridden forward to sit 1L behind the leader 2 wide without cover, dashed on well to score by a neck. (Hung in badly over the last 100M)
Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on strongly for 2nd, however not able to match the winner.
Ridden forward to take the fence and led by 1L, hung on well until 100M for 3rd.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, made some steady ground in straight.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, had every possible chance in straight, checked 100M, kept on one pace to the line.
Taken back from a wide gate, settled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, switched to the outside 200M, ran on fairly.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls off the pace 2 wide, under pressure rounding the Home Turn, made no impression after straightening.
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls off the pace 2 wide, never looked likely.
Failed to muster speed, raced near the rear, not quickened inside 350M, never involved.
Taken back from a wide gate, travelled 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, never ran on.
Always at rear, never a factor.
Good break, camped 1 back handy on rail, driven on inner 300m, battled to lead 100m & edged away to wire.
Speed to lead on fence, shaken up into straight & shifted out, battled on determinedly, no extra 100m & headed.
Snagged back to sit midfield 1 off with cover, shuffled further back 1000m, driven into stretch, stayed on late to make frame.
Missed break, raced at tail on rail, progress on turn, shaken up & switched out 300m, stayed on, just missed frame.
Rousted initially, settled rail behind midfield, niggled back stretch, hard driven 350m, stayed on for moderate gains.
Fast start, rousted early to 2nd, settled close 3rd 1 off with cover, driven into stretch, outpaced, held position at same speed until swamped 50m.
Tardy break, slotted 1 off with cover near rear, driven 450m, very wide final turn, boxed on evenly.
Broke OK, raced rail midfield, switched out & ridden home turn, laboured under hard drive.
Broke well, prominent 4 wide 1st turn, slotted midfield 1 off with cover 1000m, ridden 600m, wide into stretch, plugged on one pace.
Taken behind at break, camped 1 off at tail, switched out 400m, widest into stretch, kept on at same tempo.
Good break, settled 3 wide with cover fore of midfield, hard ridden turning in, found nothing & eased final 200m.
Broke well, 3 wide 1st turn, rolled to 2nd 1000m to sit 3 wide no cover, ridden 600m, emptied turning in & faded weakly.
Fast break to lead, to rail 1200m, kicked on into stretch, kept on well to make all & hold on.
Started well, raced just behind pace on rail, closed up on turn, switched out & driven into stretch, grinding closer, just failed.
Broke OK, settled midfield 1 off with cover, advanced 600m, driven wide into stretch, stayed on gradually to make frame.
Fair break, covered 1 off behind midfield, switched out home turn & driven, kept on soundly without threatening.
Good break, raced 1 back on rail, shaken up & shifted out turning in, outpaced & tapered in run home.
Fair break, settled 1 off with cover near rear, advanced 800m, driven on 600m, wide progress into stretch, run tapered.
Tardy break, taken to tail, niggled & switched 1 off with cover 800m, progress & driven 600m, wide into stretch, ran on evenly.
Crowded start, taken to rail behind midfield, shuffled back 600m, switched out 350m, boxed on without threatening.
Fair break, settled rail near rear, ridden 450m, outpaced & plodded on tamely.
Rousted early to track lead 1 off no cover, ridden 500m, all out 300m, faded thereafter.
Bustled at break, raced 1 off with cover in rear, to tail 800m, driven 500m, switched out into stretch, found nothing in run home.
Broke OK, niggled rail midfield, ridden 800m, struggling & dropped back 600m, eased in stretch.
Settled in midfield, 3Ls off the good pace 2 wide, ran on strongly to the line and scored.
At back, 5.5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 250M for 2nd.
Hard ridden to hold the lead along the fence, pace good, hung on well until 50M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Fractious in stalls and very slowly away, settled near last, driven along 600M out, swung widest for home, closed off well to be nearest at the finish.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the good pace, just held ground.
Hard ridden forward, sat outside the leader, pace good, ran on until 100M flattened.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, flattened 200M.
Very slow away, 5Ls off the good pace along the fence, made steady ground 200M.
Hard ridden early but failed to cross in front, sat 2.5Ls off the goop pace, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, flattened 200M.
Behind midfield, 5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, no progress.
Midfield, 4Ls off the good pace on the fence, checked 300M, soon weakened.
Never competitive at rear.
Ridden forward from wide draw and trapped 3-wide first turn. Settled 4-back, one-off 900m, swung wide entering straight, powered home for easy win.
Reared in starting gates but jumped with field, cutting to fence 2-back from leader. Shifted out 350m before cutting back in for run. Kept on well.
With early leaders to first turn before settling one-back, one-off. Ran on nicely to look a chance 200m before turning one-paced.
Outpaced early, shifted out 900m, then proved difficult to settle. Still well back entering straight but finished off nicely.
Quickly on rail but not enough pace and held in midfield. Made ground from 400m, checked 200m when disappointed for run. One-paced after.
Reared in gate before start but jumped OK. Ridden but failed to muster, dropping to last entering straight. Made good late ground.
Got off well and settled in midfield away from fence. Took final turn awkwardly, closed in 350m, checked and unbalanced when crowded 250m, one-paced.
Taken back across runners from wide draw and last until final turn. Swung wide entering straight and kept on steadily down centre of track.
Won the start and led field to first turn before slipping into box seat 900m. Looked chance early in straight alongside leader. Flattened final 100m.
Ridden up from wide draw and held 3-wide around first turn. Allowed to roll forward back stretch, took lead 900m. One pace when caught 200m.
Hard ridden from widest draw taking first turn 4-wide. Gradually rolled forward to sit outside leader turning for home. Crowded 200m when giving ground.
Slow into stride, quickly cut to rail but 6L from leader. Hit running rail and unbalanced turn. Spent force from 300m. Unacceptable performance.
Caught 3-wide in midfield, strode forward from 1100M when left with no cover, kept responding to pressure and was always holding off the persistent runner-up.
Soon led, set slow pace first half, pressed by rival from 800M, dueled with eventual winner turning in, kept on well to finish, just held.
Taken back across runners, settled towards the rear 5Ls off the pace early and middle stages, brought wide passing 400M, stayed on well, nearest finish.
Tracked leaders along the fence, took inside route on straightening, held by first two when given every chance mid-straight, restricted room final 100M and not able to be tested.
Caught 3-wide no cover opening 400M, raced prominently behind leaders in 3rd halfway, scrubbed along home turn, kept on same pace final 300M.
Held up in mid-division, saved ground along the fence but gave limited response when the race got serious inside 400M.
Settled behind midfield along the 2-path, lost cover when pushed to 3-wide 800M out, stayed on mildly under pressure before running into interference 100M.
Close up behind leaders in the first half, settled in 5th place turning for home, brief effort early straight, turned one-pace final 200M.
Guided to a rail position behind midfield, took time to pick up, made limited headway from 200M, no clear run late stages.
Dropped back from wide barrier, raced out the back, came up empty when asked, never involved.
Taken keen hold in midfield, outpaced 400M and did not respond to riding, no impression.
Switched off to last 6-7Ls off the pace, ridden and no headway 500M out, soon weakened.

Tracked leader in a strongly run race, moved up to lead 400M, quickened well clear under gentle urging, easily.
Towards the rear 5Ls off the pace, ran on well down center of track, got up for 2nd near line, no chance with runaway winner.
Began awkwardly, raced close up behind leaders, kept on same pace final 400M and never a threat to the runaway winner, lost 2nd near line.
In 4th place 2Ls behind the pace, held every chance passing halfway, kept on one-paced.
Led at good pace, unable to fend off winner at 400M, kept on same pace, faded final 50M.
Held up midfield, made limited headway final 200M.
Outpaced early stages, in last 6Ls off the pace passing halfway, some progress final 300M without threatening.
In mid-division, bustled along 600M out, plodded on same pace, never threatened.
Held up mid-division, came under serious pressure halfway, never a threat, eased final 100M.
Slowly away, lacked early pace, no impression from midway, eased when well beaten 250M.
Raced keenly, never far off the pace, not quicken when driven 400M, weakened mid-straight.
Hampered at the start, guided to a rearward position towards the stands' side, no response to riding passing 500M, eased when no chance.
Chased leaders, struggled from halfway, weakened to last with 150M to go.
Led along the paint. Made every post a winner, kept up a solid gallop to the wire.
Settled in 2nd position, 1 off with cover. Chased gamely despite wanting to race greenly in the home stretch.
Raced in fourth position, 1 off with cover. Made reasonable progress the over the last furlong.
Settled 3rd on the fence with cover. Maintained a fair gallop until about the 100m, was dour thereafter.
Camped midfield, 3 deep with cover. Finished off steadily in the run to the finishing line.
Raced towards the rear on the paint with cover. Kept grinding away in the run home.
Travelled midfield, 2 deep with cover. Whacked away at the same speed in the home straight. (substantial amount of blood in the trachea post race)
Raced worse than midfield, 2 wide with cover. Stayed on evenly down the running.
Slow to begin travelling last on the rails with cover. Passed tiring runners in the home stretch.
Travelled with the backmakers, 2-3 deep with cover. Kept on at the same speed in the run to the line.
Began very awkwardly racing at the rear, 2 deep with cover. Failed to make any appreciable ground in the home straight.
Settled midfield the fence, had cover. Was running on empty approaching the furlong.
Parked back in the field, 3 deep with cover. Struggled in the home stretch.
Posted 3 deep without cover on the circle whilst racing off the pace. Never likely.
Ridden forward to obtain the box seat, benefited by the slow sectionals, dashed well to score by 2Ls.
Rolled forward to settle 1L behind the leader, trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, suited by the slow pace, hung on well for 2nd.
Sent forward to park outside the leader, benefited by the slow pace, stay on nicely for 3rd.
Taken back as usual, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, despite harmed by the slow sectionals, ran on well to get 4th.
Eased back from a wide gate, settled 5.5Ls behind the leader, switched wide turning in, despite not suited by the slow pace, dashed well 150M.
Settled in front of midfield about 3Ls off the slow pace 3 wide with cover, made some steady ground in straight.
Settled in front of midfield about 3Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, one paced home.
At rear, settled 5.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, ran on ok however could not find a day night final 100M.
Raced midfield, settled 3.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, never looked chance.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, hampered by the slow pace, ran on only fairly.
Rolled forward, trapped 3-4 wide without cover throughout, kept on one pace until 200M weakened.
Taken back as usual, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, gradually improved rounding the Home Turn, ran on only fairly. (Lost left front plate)
Worked to the lead, pressed by rivals from 600M, headed 250M, weakened rapidly final stages. (Lost left front plate)
Failed to muster speed, never looked likely, tailed out. (Lame right front leg)
Awkward start, settled midfield 3 deep with cover, progress on turn, cruised to lead 300m & shaken up, surged clear for easy win.
Sharp start, taken back for cover 3 wide near rear, niggled & progress 700m, hard-ridden 400m, solid advance to take 2nd late.
Broke well, slotted 1 off with cover fore of midfield, keen early, switched out on turn & driven, stayed on to make frame.
Fast break, trapped 3 wide handy, no cover from 1000m, rolled to 3rd 600m, driven 2nd into stretch, all out 300m, one paced in run.
Fast start & driven to 2nd 1 off no cover, led 1200m, slotted rail 1000m, shaken up 350m, one-paced & headed 300m, run tapered.
Broke OK, raced midfield 1 off with cover, niggled & shuffled back 700m, hard-ridden into stretch, stayed on for minor gains.
Missed break, taken behind to 1 off near rear, switched out into straight, ridden 350m, stayed on for moderate inroads.
Awkward start & lost ground, quick advance to race rail near rear, to tail 600m, switched out & driven 400m, plugged on past beaten rivals.
Tardy break, recovered to lead 1400m, restrained 1000m to track 1 back on fence, niggled 650m, switched out & driven 400m, tame response.
Taken back from wide gate, soon at tail, wide progress 700m, widest & hard-ridden final turn, plodded home same speed.
Broke well, raced rail midfield, switched out 600m, off heels 400m, driven 350m, found little in tepid run.
Broke well, taken back & caught 4 wide no cover near rear, rolled on a touch 700m, driven wide into stretch, faded tamely & eased when beaten.
Fair break, soon outpaced & raced rail behind midfield, driven home turn, struggled in run & weakened out.
Good start, caught wide & rolled on 1000m to slot 2nd 1 off no cover, ridden 400m but found nothing & immediately faded.
Sluggish start, improved to rail behind midfield, on heels final turn & shifted 1 off, driven to rail 300m, led on inner 180m, ran home strongly.
Fair break, raced midfield 1 off with cover, switched out 600m, driven wide final turn, quickened to 2nd 200m, always held in run home.
Decent break but soon bustled, niggled along 3 deep with cover behind midfield, wide into stretch, stayed on gradually to take 3rd close home.
Broke well, sat 1 back on rail, shifted 1 off into stretch, off heels & bumped 300m, kept on one pace.
Missed break, raced 1 off then 3 wide with cover near rear, driven wide turning in, stayed on dourly.
Speed to lead, soon crossed to rail, shaken up 400m, drifted out across rivals in stretch, headed 200m, run tapered.
Taken behind to race at tail 1 off with cover, keen early, switched wide & driven into final turn, stayed on for minor inroads.
Broke well, drifted to back of midfield 1 off with cover, in pocket turning in, sandwiched & bumped 200m, close to heels late, not fully tested.
Broke OK, sat rail midfield, shaken up 400m, not clear running 300m, switched inside & driven 200m, one paced in run home.
Smart start, raced handy 1 off with cover, driven 500m, battling one pace when bumped 290m, not a factor thereafter.
Fast start, rolled to close 2nd 1 off no cover, ridden under pressure turning in, plugging on when heavily bumped 300m & weakened.
Tardy start & raced last pair on fence, hard-ridden for little response in weak stretch run.
Good break, caught 3 wide no cover handy, ridden to 2nd 400m, one-paced when bumped & unbalanced 300m, faded out.
Tardy start, sat 3 wide with cover & then four wide no cover near rear, forced widest into stretch, found nothing & tailed off.
Pushed forward, 1L off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, closed off well to score.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed well 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, ran on well for 3rd.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 300M, run ended 100M.
Eased to rear, 8Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 300M.
At back, 6Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, raced keenly, harmed by the slow tempo, ran on ok in straight.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
Very slow away, 5Ls off the leader along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, no progress.
Eased to rear, 8Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, never competitive.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, weakened 300M.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, favoured by the slow tempo, reduced quickly 400M.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, out of fuel 300M.
Eased early to sit in midfield, trapped wide, moved forward to sit outside the lead, suited by the slow tempo, emptied 300M.
Took rail and led easily 0.5L at slow sectionals, faded quickly 400M.
Jumped well, motored to the front on settling, kicked clear entering course proper, went to the line unchallenged.
Checked after start, taken to outside fence, held for run 500m, shifted out 400m, no run 300m, bumped 250m, ran on strongly when clear 150m.
Taken to outside fence on settling, joined main pack 800m out, found passage between horses and kept on well.
Ridden forward from awkward draw to sit inside early leader. Looked chance 400m but one-paced after passing 200m.
Began well before settling behind early leader to 800m when close on heels. Closed to 3rd at 200m before turning one-paced.
Ridden from start to get forward but raced on own down centre of track. Got close 400m before running out of gas.
Jumped well and held outside rail in 3rd to course proper when started to give ground. Bumped 100m when shifted out.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, suited by the fast pace, however never improved.
No early speed and raced on own down centre field. Dropped to last pair entering course proper before running past tired horses.
Outpaced and towards rear but close to outer fence. Improved position 400m but found little under hard riding final stages.
Jumped well and raced outside leader in 2nd place to course proper when started to give ground steadily.
Had feet in the air when gates opened and lost considerable ground. Trailed field thereafter before passing tired horses close home.
Hard ridden from start but never travelled well and started to give ground from half way. Substantial blood in trachea.
Jumped well and with leading pack till course proper when tired and dropped back gradually.
Sent forward, led steadily, inclined to lay in for the majority of the trip, fought off strong late challenge of the 2nd under hands and heels riding.
Along the stands' rail within 2Ls of leader, steady headway passing 300M, all out alongside winner 150M, just held.
Never far off, nudged along mid-way but not pace to challenge first two, held on for 3rd.
Tracked leaders, driven 400M, kept on without threatening first two.
Up with pace, struggled to hold his position halfway, weakened badly 200M.
Not far away but always under some pressure to hold his position, outpaced passing 400M, never involved.
Not pushed early and settled one-off behind midfield to straight. Taken to centre track 400m and ran on strongly to hit the front close home.
Jumped well but allowed to settle one-off behind leading pack. Over-raced when crossed before turn, taken to front 200m, shifted out abruptly 100m, swamped near line.
Jumped well, not pushed and settled 3-back one-off to straight. Taken wide 400m, ran on steadily before taken out 100m. Blood in trachea.
Began OK but held 3-wide to and around turn. Taken to centre of track 400m and ran on steadily, just missing a place.
Taken back across horses from wide draw to hold fence at rear. Shifted to centre of track entering straight and kept on steadily.
Ridden to get forward position but held three-wide at turn, covering extra ground. Kept on in straight without looking dangerous.
Taken forward from wide draw to sit outside leader before turn. Took lead entering straight, caught 200m, one-paced thereafter.
Slow to jump and taken to fence at rear. Very wide entering straight and ran on steadily, laying in under pressure.
Outpaced early but held on to fence 4L from leader. Taken out entering straight but found little under hard riding.
Jumped well but caught wide and allowed to drift back to find cover. Second-last into straight, ran past beaten horses.
Ridden forward from wide draw to take lead, cutting to fence before turn. Overhauled entering straight but kept on one-paced.
Began fairly but no early pace and soon at rear along fence. Hard-ridden on entering straight but limited response.
Jumped with field and taken forward to grab box seat before turn. Started to give ground soon after entering straight.
Began well but raced tightly before striking heels 1000m and blundering. Lost position around turn, became tailed off in straight. (Extravagant right front action).

Slotted across into a position just off midfield 5-6ls back, travelled well in mid-section, improved turning and let down with a strong sprint, had them covered at 200m and went on for another easy win.

Showed usual pace to take a prominent spot, dropped into 1 out 1 back trailing spot but used a bit early, challenged soon after turning and tried to go with eventual winner, no match final furlong but kept on well.
Taken back from an outside gate, shared rear more than 10ls back, still well back sweeping wide turning, closed hard from an impossible position to just miss 2nd.
Got across from a tricky alley to race on rails in midfield, enjoyed an easy run 5-6ls back, improved turning and kept progressing in straight to be on heels of place getters.
Took a midfield spot 5ls or so back in 2 wide line, had ideal run in mid-section, crept closer turning and finished off well in straight just missing frame.
No early speed as usual and settled ta tail, more than 10ls back on rails, helped by even pace on, well back turning, produced usual honest close making good ground to be nearest on line.

Fair break, rushed up to take a leading position, did share of work to hold rail, shaded by outside horse though, regained lead turning and looked a place chance to 200m before early workload took toll and weakened.
Tardy into stride, raced 10ls back in running line, helped by tempo, still had a bit to do turning, lacked usual dash but closed off evenly in straight without threating.
No early pace, raced in rear division more than 10ls back early, aided by tempo, kept to rails to save ground turning and only made minor progress.
Slotted into nice spot behind pace trio, 3ls back in running line, fair run despite even tempo, in mix until 200m before weakening out late.
Showed enough early pace to hold a spot on leaders back, although used a bit to do so, still there 2ls down turning, found no extra final 300m and dropped off.
Drifted back from a tricky gate to raced behind midfield 8ls back in running line, came wider turning, didn't have dash to factor and just battle din straight.
Settled behind midfield8-9ls back on rails. Suited by sped on, ok run in mid-section, made some progress turning and early in straight, found little final 300m.

Began well, went forward in search of front, unable to cross clearly and did share of work shading inside horse throughout, lost advantage turning and soon gave in when workload took toll, dropped right off late.

Showed speed and took close order, tracked clear leader 3ls away on rails, carted field up turning and hit lead at 400m, travelled well and kept up gallop to score with some in hand despite winning margin reducing late.

Taken in behind midfield 7ls back in running line, suited by speed, improved turning, let down with a nice finish but gave too much start to eventual winner, kept trying and was wearing down right to line.

Trapped wide early and with no cover forthcoming pressed forward to race in midfield, did share of work to bend, crept into 3rd spot at 400nm and did well to stick on despite being gapped by principals.
Tardy into stride, raced behind midfield 8ls back on rails, suited by tempo, saved ground on rails turning and kept to fence in straight making good ground to make frame.
Unable to slot in closer than 3 wide and covered ground 6ls back in midfield, had cover in mid-section, improved at 400m, but run ended at 200m and just held ground late.
Took a nice position in midfield 5ls away in running line, had ideal trip to turn, pushed a long but lacked an extra gear and just stayed on at same sped holding ground in run to line.
Dropped back to rear from an awkward alley, nearly 10ls off front, aided by early pace, still well back turning, closed off ok making some ground without threatening.
Pressed forward from a wide gate in search of front, raced 3ls clear setting a decent speed, came back to them at 400m, gradually faded final 300m when early work took toll.
Crossed to take a nice trail, 3rd on rails, 2ls back turning and had every chance but lacked a pick-up, steadily faded final 300m.
Drifted back races with last few, 8ls or so away, helped by tempo, plenty to do coming wide turning, made no real progress in straight just passing tired ones.
Out in line, unable to hold a spot early and raced behind midfield 6ls or so back on rails, easy trip thereafter, made no real headway in straight.
Began well enough, took a spot 1 out 1 back tracking a devcnet5 pace, still there in 4th turning but condition gave out soon after and dropped off quickly.
Even break, settled in midfield on rails 5ls or so off lead, fair run to turn, in a bit of traffic turning but lacked usual close and only battled in straight.
No early pace, settled at rear, 10ls or so away, not travelling and struggled to keep up turning, made no impression in straight (see racing incidents).

Sent forward, led steadily under restraint, kicked clear passing 300M, kept on well to hold off late challenge of 2nd.
Reserved near the rear, 5Ls behind the leader and eventual winner turning home, finished off strongly final 300M to get within a neck of the winner.
Held up patiently towards the rear, ran on well final 350M, nearest finish.
Held up behind midfield, stayed on to claim 4th but never looked like getting to the front pair.
Began awkwardly, shaken up and recovered to race in midfield along the fence, took inside route turning home but was steadied 250M, stayed on when shifted ground.
Chased the pace along the inside, advanced to 2nd passing 300M, one paced mid-straight and faded late stages.
Bustled along early stages, sat outside leader, lacked further response passing 300M and was swamped in the final 100M.
Settled 3-wide in mid-division, not quickened under pressure, never a serious threat to leaders.
Raced keenly behind leaders, kept on same pace, faded final 150M.
Hard driven to a prominent position just off the leaders, raced 3-wide without cover, no extra and weakened passing 200M.
Failed to muster, detached from the field, picked up the pace passing 400M, made good progress until severely checked inside 100M.
Niggled along to hold a 2-wide position in midfield, never really travelled, soon weakened turning in.
Camped handy, settled 2Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, peeled wide turning in, dashed well to score by 1/2L.
Hard ridden forward to lead on the fence by 1L, Hung on well until 50M weakened.
Hard ridden forward to settle 1L off outside the leader, stayed on well to get 3rd.
Pushed to settle midfield, 3.5Ls off the pace 2 wide, closed to the line well for 4th.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, had every possible chance after straightening, however only kept on one pace until 50M weakened.
Lacked early pace, travelled 4.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, kept on one pace to the line.
Settled worse than midfield about 5Ls off the pace 2 wide, never ran on.
At rear, checked 600M, never a factor.
Crowded start, then raced 7Ls behind the leader on the fence, never looked likely.
Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, kept on one pace until 100M flattened.
Always at rear, never a factor.
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, dashed on strongly 200M to score by 1L.
Raced midfield, travelled 6.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast pace, finished off strongly to get 2nd.
Hard ridden forward to take the lead by 1.5Ls at fast pace, challenged 300M, hung on well until 50M weakened for 3rd.
Rolled to obtain the box seat, under pressure 600M, hampered by the fast pace, kept on one pace to the line.
Ridden forward to settle 1.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide without cover, despite harmed by the fast pace, stayed on well until 50M weakened.
Eased to settle midfield, 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, closed to the line strongly until 50M blocked.
Taken back from a wide barrier, settled 7Ls behind the leader 3 wide without cover, ran on ok.
Settled worse than midfield about 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, never ran on.
Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, kept on one pace until 150M weakened.
Always at rear, never looked competitive.
Always at rear, never a factor.
Hard ridden forward, however trapped 3 wide without cover until 900M, under pressure 600M, soon flattened after straightening.
Smart start, slotted back 1 off with cover midfield, driven wide into stretch & quickened to lead 200m, drew clear for cosy win.
Good start, caught 3 wide no cover, snagged to behind midfield 1 off with cover, switched wide 300m, closed off soundly to nab 2nd at wire.
Tardy break, rolled to rail midfield, driven 400m, switched out & briefly crowded 250m, clear 200m & kept on to make frame without threatening.
Taken back, raced rail at tail, progress 600m, 8L back 400m, gradual gains & switched outside 100m, closing at wire, just missed frame.
Fair break, settled 1 off with cover near rear, hard-ridden 500m, switched wide into stretch, boxed on for solid gains.
Taken back early, rolled forward to sit rail behind midfield 800m, driven 300m, ran on evenly.
Fast start, slotted handy 1 off with cover, driven wide into stretch, pressed lead 250m, outpaced & tapered in run home.
Speed to lead, restrained & headed 1100m, sat 2nd 1 off no cover 800m, ridden 400m, all out to press lead 250m, no extra & weakened.
Sharp start to race 2nd 1 off no cover, slotted 1 back on rail 800m, driven into stretch, soon swamped & faded in run.
Fast from gate, snagged back to rail fore of midfield rail, driven 300m, soon checked & denied clear rail run, not fully tested.
Fast break, led on rail 1100m, shaken up into stretch, shifted out under pressure & headed 250m, faded tamely.
Broke OK, bustled early, raced rail near rear, niggled throughout, to tail under pressure 600m, beaten turning in & plodded home.
Bustled early strides to settle handy 1 off with cover, ridden 500m, switched out into stretch, strong run to lead 150m, in command at wire.
Rousted from gate, settled rail behind midfield, switched out & driven 450m, wide into stretch, strong closer to nick 2nd at wire.
Ridden forward initially, slotted midfield 1 off with cover, ridden 500m, switched out on turn, closed off to 2nd 100m, edged out to 3rd last stride.
Broke OK, niggled early to race behind midfield 1 off with cover, hard-driven 500m, wide into stretch, ran home soundly.
Fair start, raced rail midfield, shaken up 450m, closed off well on inner without threatening.
Broke OK, raced near rear 1 off with cover, niggled 800m, driven 500m, widest final turn, boxed on for minor inroads.
Good break, settled fore of midfield on rail, driven 500m, switched out entering straight, one-paced in run home.
Disputed lead early strides, settled handy 1 off no cover, driven final turn, led 300m, all out & headed 150m, faded.
Led early, soon headed, raced 1 back on rail, ridden 500m, switched out 300m, found nothing & faded out.
Taken behind to race at tail, switched out & ridden for moderate progress 500m, widest home turn, plugged on tamely.
Tardy start, driven around field to lead on rail, kicked on off steady sections 500m, all out & headed 300m, faded weakly.
Crowded early, raced rail near tail, hard-ridden 1200m, briefly back on bridle until driven 500m, struggled & tailed off.
Hard ridden forward to share the lead at good pace 2 wide, closed off strongly to win.
Hard ridden to hold the rail and shared the lead at good pace, overhauled 250M, ran on for 2nd.
Hard ridden to share the lead at good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the good pace 2 wide, held up 4-2, made steady ground when clear.
Eased back, 5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, progressed steadily 250M.
Eased to sit in midfield along the fence, 3Ls off the good pace, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, pace good, flattened 200M.
Hard ridden to keep up at back, 6Ls off the good pace along the fence, ran on fairly.
Very slow away, 6.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, ran on ok.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, soon out of fuel 300M.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, emptied 300M.
Began well, rolled to front on settling, uncontested lead back stretch, kicked clear 400m, kept on well, just holding off late challenge.
Quickly into stride, settling one-back, one-off into first turn and back stretch. Ran on strongly in straight to just fail.
Jumped well, bumped 1100m before settling 2-back the fence. Pulled out 500m but shifted in 350m to get clear run. Finished off nicely.
Jumped best but not pushed and content to take box seat behind leader. Kept on steadily in straight but unable close gap.
Jumped OK but got head up when awkwardly placed 1100m. Raced ungenerously 600m when close to heels. Turned 4-wide and kept on steadily.
Ridden forward but unable cut in and steadied when taken wider at 900m after which raced without cover. One paced final 400m.
Taken back from wide draw to sit with back runners away from fence. Made some ground in straight under hard riding.
Began awkwardly then steadied 1100m. Cut in to fence back stretch, improved position final turn, one-paced final 400m.
Taken back from wide draw and long last back stretch. Caught field entering straight, ran past tired horses final 100m.
Crowded out at start, cut in to rail 5L from leader. Stayed on rail entering straight but found little when asked.
Jumped OK but then raced ungenerously, shifting out abruptly several times. Was a spent force entering straight.
Shifted in start, recovered and settled behind midfield. Lost position turning for home, found nothing final 400m.
Checked soon after the jump, travelled behind midfield early then strode closer to midfield halfway, loomed up behind leaders 200M, quickened to lead 50M out, lengthened away.
Restrained in midfield along the 2-path, picked up the pace 600M and moved into a contending position, ran on to lead briefly mid-straight but could not keep pace with winner final 100M.
Positioned ahead of midfield in early stages, got shuffled back passing halfway, brought wide to challenge 350M, stayed on but not getting to first two.
Took keen hold, held up near the rear, moved closer nearing home turn, stayed on but never a danger to first two.
Took early lead, held back passing 1200M to race 3Ls off the pace, closed off mildly down the inside final 300M, never seriously threatened.
Not far away early, raced a shade keen down the back straight and moved to 2nd chasing leader before home turn, kept on same pace in straight.
Sent forward, strode to the lead entering back straight, headed 150M, no extra final stages.
Hampered at the start, dropped back to rear 10Ls off the pace, niggled along 550M, brought wide in straight and made limited progress.
Towards the rear along the fence, shuffled back to last passing halfway, reserved to 350M but found little under pressure.
Held up in midfield in the first half, shuffled further back nearing home turn, made little progress final 400M, never threatened. (Lame next day.)
Vigorously driven from wide barrier, led to near 900M, tracked leaders and remained in contention until weakening 200M.
Settled behind midfield in the first half, fell back to the rear approaching home turn, did not respond to riding when pressed along 400M.

Patiently held up, guided to a 2-wide position behind midfield, driven inside 500M, advanced to 3rd 300M, stayed on best to get up near 50M, lengthened away.
Settled 2-wde in midfield, strode closer to pace passing 600M, made steady headway to join the lead 100M out, headed by winner 50M.
Showed good early speed, shared lead early stages, quickened things up home turn, kept on well when driven 300M, caught by first two 100M out, well clear from rest.
Settled towards the rear, shifted out from fence 500M, stayed on fairly to go 4th near the line but well behind first three.
In 4th place never far off the leaders, never able to challenge first three, kept on same pace to finish a remote 5th.
Dropped back from wide barrier, settled near last 6Ls off the pace, brought wide passing 500M, made limited progress.
Tracked leader 2-wide, soon no impression under pressure in straight, no extra 200M.
Driven forward and shared lead early stages, remained prominent over the turn, had no extra to offer passing 300M.
Travelled in midfield along the rails, struggled to hold position 450M, soon weakened.
Taken across behind runners, in last place throughout, didn't respond to riding, soon detached from the field.

Not the best to begin then couldn't go the early speed of the race settling towards the rear with cover. Shifted to the outside fence near the furlong and motored home to clinch the prize close to the line.
Parked behind midfield with cover the stands rail after beginning awkwardly. Looked to have the race in its keeping until nailed late.
Settled midfield closer to the far side had cover. Kept up a good gallop right to the line.
Travelled slightly worse than midfield, towards the middle of the course, no cover. Closed off reasonably, late.
Raced well off the stands rail with cover, close to midfield. Shifted in over the final 200m to continue into clear running, ran on fairly.
Led along the stands rail. Hung in for most of the trip, was gassed over the final 100m.
Not the best away travelling close to midfield about 2 from the grandstand rail. Kept on at the same speed in the run to the post.
Parked just off the speed about 5 from the outside fence, no cover. Was running on empty over the final 150m.
Raced in second position no cover towards the outer fence. Faded over the final 150m.
Camped ahead off midfield, 5 from the stands rail with cover. Never fired.
Wasn't far off the speed racing towards the far side no cover. Found nothing under pressure.
Had no excuses after tracking the leaders, close to the grandstand side. Gave ground over the final furlong.
Raced nearer to the center of the track, no cover, behind midfield. Was a beaten horse after the 300m.
Never got into the race after settling in last position, the near side paint. Struggled throughout.
Settled worse than midfield about 5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, benefited by the fast tempo, dashed on strongly to score by a neck.
Raced midfield, settled 3.5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, suited by the fast pace, ran on well until 50M passed by the winner.
Settled 2-wide in the group chasing leaders, quickened to the lead inside 300M but not pace of first two final stages.
Pushed to settle 3.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, suited by the fast sectionals, made some steady ground to get 4th.
Taken back as usual, settled 6.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made some ground in straight.
At rear, settled 7Ls behind the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast tempo, swung wide turning in, made some ground in straight.
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, despite benefited by the fast pace, ran on only fairly.
Lacked early pace, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, despite benefited by the fast pace, ran on only fairly.
Camped handy, settled 2Ls behind the leader on the fence, not suited by the fast tempo, never ran on.
Began awkwardly, then settled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, never ran on.
Sent forward to take the fence and led at fast sectionals, flattened 300M.
Began awkwardly, then gradually improved to race outside the leading pair, 3 wide without cover, soon weakened after straightening.
Hard ridden forward to share the lead at fast sectionals, weakened badly 300M.
Jumped well, then eased to settle 5Ls behind the leader, trapped 4 wide without cover throughout, never looked likely. (Questioned for riding, see incident report)
Sharp start, caught 3 wide no cover handy, shaken up to press lead 400m, led 250m, drew clear gradually in run home.
Speed to lead on rail, headed 800m, regained narrow lead 600m, driven for home 400m, headed 250m, soon to 3rd & dug in to reclaim 2nd late.
Fair break, pushed on 3 wide to lead 800m 1 off, headed 600m, driven home turn & battled dourly in 2nd until weakened late.
Broke well, raced handy 5th 1 off with cover, wide home turn, driven 350m, battled home soundly.
Bustled from gate, settled 1 back on rail, not clear run turning in, outpaced in 4th 250m, boxed on evenly.
Tardy start & in rear initially, rolled along rail to behind midfield, driven for steady stretch gains, switched out 200m, stayed on.
Bustled initially, ridden 1 off with cover behind midfield, overraced 900m, hard-ridden into stretch, plugged home one pace.
Good break, settled midfield 1 off with cover, ridden 700m, wide into stretch, laboured & weakened in run.
Good start from wide gate, taken back to rear three wide with cover, hard-ridden 500m, widest into stretch, struggled & never a factor.
Broke OK, raced rear 1 off with cover, driven final turn, wide in stretch, found little in tepid run home.
Sluggish break, soon detached at tail & tailed off.
Broke well, settled 3 wide with cover behind midfield, wide progress on turn, driven into stretch, strong closer to lead close home.
Fast start wide, raced 2nd until led 1100m & crossed to rail, shaken up turning in, kicked clear, tapered & headed close home.
Broke well, bustled early to sit handy 3 wide no cover, advanced to outside leader 800m, ridden 400m, battled on & just missed 2nd.
Fast start, tracked pace 1 off with cover, switched out & driven 400m, closed off soundly without threatening.
Speed to lead from wide gate, crossed to rail 1200m, soon headed & shuffled to 1 back, driven 430m, boxed on one pace.
Broke OK, niggled early to race midfield 1 off with cover, ridden turning in, plugged on one pace.
Sharp start, settled back to midfield 3 wide with cover, progress on turn, driven 400m, outpaced & tapered from 300m.
Missed break markedly, raced tail on rail, switched out & ridden 400m, boxed on for modest inroads.
Missed break, raced rail near tail, switched out 600m, shaken up 350m, plugged on same speed.
Broke OK, soon dropped to rear 1 off with cover, driven wide into stretch, kept on past beaten rivals.
Broke well, raced rail midfield, shaken up & switched out 400m, found little & struggled in run home.
Missed break, raced behind midfield 1 off with cover, switched wide 600m, minor stretch progress until emptied 200m & eased when beaten.
Fair break, raced rail behind midfield, switched out 400m, driven & weakened out tamely.
Broke well, caught 4 wide no cover, rolled on to press lead 3 wide no cover 800m, empted turning in & dropped away tamely.
Pushed forward to cross, settled 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, kicked away 200M to score easily.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, enjoyed the slow tempo, ran on well to the line for 2nd.
Bumped start, 6Ls off the leader on the rails, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 300M for 3rd.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed well 300M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, just held ground.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader along the fence, checked 900M, not suited by the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Eased back, 8Ls of the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Eased back to take rail, 7Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, held up 4-2, ran on ok when clear.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 1.5Ls at advantageous slow sectionals, soon out of fuel 350M.
Hard ridden early but never muster, 3.5Ls off the slow pace 3 wide, emptied 400M.
Midfield early, trapped 3 wide, moved forward 800M, dropped off 400M.
Hard ridden forward, 3.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, faded quickly 400M.
Eased back, never a factor, tailed out.
Never competitive, tailed out.
Jumped well and taken forward but wide before cutting in 800m and taking lead around turn. Kicked clear 400m and ran away from field.
Jumped best and led initially before dropping to second when crossed 800m. Chased leader thereafter without being able to close the gap.
No early speed but made use of good draw to settle 3-back the fence. Peeled out turning for home and kept on steadily in straight.
Allowed to find feet but held wide at rear with cover. Covered extra ground turn, taken wide entering straight, ran on well.
Outpaced early, dropping to to last. Travelled wide without cover around turn, widest in straight, ran on steadily to be closest at finish. Lost right front plate.
Ridden to get forward position, settling one-back, one-off around turn. Got run between horses entering straight but only one-paced.
Ridden forward and held very wide without cover into turn. Entered straight 4-wide but found little under hard riding.
No much speed and settled 3-back, one-off. Lost position around turn, and found little in straight despite hard riding.
Outpaced and then taken away from fence to sit 4-wide before turn. Raced awkwardly 600m, wide into straight, found nothing when asked.
Taken back from wide draw, raced awkwardly on heels 900m before crossing to fence at turn. One-paced final 400m.
Ridden to take forward position, crossed to fence 1000m, then held box seat into turn. Weakened soon after entering straight.
Raced in restricted room after start but moved forward and wide. Gave ground around turn, spent force soon after entering straight. Unacceptable performance.
Settled midpack, hampered at the 700M but quickly recovered, brought wide 400M, ran on well to wear down the leader inside 100M.
Bustled along early stages to hold a position close to leaders, quickened up nicely to lead 200M out, kept on well but unable to hold off winner over final stages.
Held up mid-division, had a smooth run along the rails, quickened up to challenge 300M, briefly threatened mid-straight but lacked a further response late stages.
Began awkwardly, ended up near the rear 6Ls off the pace, improved position passing 450M, stayed on fairly final 200M for a non-threatening 4th.
Unhurried, settled well back at the tail of the field, swung 3-wide for home, ran on without threatening.
Vigorously ridden after the start, tracked leaders 2-wide, outpaced by leaders early straight, soon out of contention.
Rushed forward from draw 12, shared lead on the outside from 800M, held narrow lead turning home, headed near 250M, weakened.
lacked speed, settled towards the rear, struggled to hold position rounding home turn, made no impression on leaders.
Held up near the rear, not quickened turning into straight, eased when no chance.
Driven to lead, always under pressure to hold his position, headed 300M and no extra.
Tracked leaders, severely checked at 700M, lost momentum, never recovered and eased.
Niggled along to hold a position behind leaders, severely hampered at 700M, pushed very wide, out of contention and eased.
Ridden forward but crossed by 2 horses 1600m and checked, racing keenly to turn. Found gap between horses 350m, took lead 150m, held off late challenge.
A little slow to move, crowded out 1600m but held rail 3L from leader. No room entering straight, followed winner through gap 350m, ran on strongly when clear.
Ridden forward from wide draw to sit outside leader back stretch and turn. Took lead 350m, collared 150m, kept on gamely.
Allowed to find feet but trapped 3-wide at rear of the field. Peeled out 500m out, swung 6-wide into straight, kept on gamely.
No early speed and held at rear but away from fence. Lost position around turn but finished off nicely in straight.
Taken back from wide draw and last on settling. Trailed field into straight but was doing best work final 200m.
Shifted out start but recovered and surged to the front before crossing to the rail. Caught 350m but kept on gamely.
Ridden from gate but held wide in midfield back stretch. Hung in badly turn, taken very wide in straight, but only one paced.
Outpaced early and held at rear away from fence. Made forward move entering straight but held up for run 350m-150m and not fully tested.
Jumped OK and raced with leading bunch but wide to turn. Closed in turning for home but run ended 200m out.
Made full use of good draw to sit behind leader. Looked chance entering straight but flattened final 200m. Lame right front.
Began well before settling two-back, one-off to turn. Peeled out entering straight, closed in 200m, struck from behind 100m and unbalanced. Had cuts left hind.
Crowded and bumped start but recovered to race 3-wide on hind-quarters of leader. Took closer order turning for home, gave ground from 200m.
Failed to muster despite vigorous riding and held toward rear along fence. Lost position final turn, dropped to last 200m out.
Went forward to race outside leader, fair run with even sections, took over turning in and had them chasing at 300m, did enough to hold off fast finishing rival.
Began well, took a trail 3ls back on rails, difficult to settle early, improved approaching turn, got clear final 300m and chased hard just unable to wear don margin late.
Slotted into ideal spot 1 out 1 back, all favours in mid-section, set out after eventual winner in straight and moved into 2nd briefly, no match for first two final 200m.
Landed a midfield spot 4ls back in 2 wide line, fair run in mid-section, improved rounding bend, looked to factor at 300m but couldn't lift final furlong, kept on but just missed place.
Positioned behind midfield on rails, 6ls or so from top end, quiet trip and made some ground turning, closed best off rest to be nearest on line.
Average break, pressed forward and used a bit to cross to lead, set even sections thereafter, lost advantage at 300m but didn't weaken entirely and kept on for a better effort.
Drifted back to race behind midfield, 6ls back racing 2 wide, switched out turning, made some ground to 200m but peaked on run and had no extra thereafter.
Raced 3 wide behind midfield, 6ls or so back with cover, ok trip but lost position approaching bend, switched wider but only made minor progress without threatening.
Showed speed, elected for a trail when pressured, reasonable run throughout on leaders back, right there turning but condition gave out and dropped away.
Shared rear 8ls back racing 2 wide, difficult to settle early, made ground between horses turning, passed a few to 200m when run ended.
Taken back from a wide alley, raced 3 wide at rear 7ls or so back, set a task when forced wider turning, made progress to 200m but no extra thereafter.

Unable to slot in and forced to race 3 wide behind midfield, 5ls back, checked in middle stages and lost ground, shuffled right back turning, unable to get into it from that point and just battled in straight.
Lost ground at start, settled at rear 8ls back on rails, saved ground on fence turning but produced little and gradually lost touch in straight.
Posted 3 wide without cover from a tricky gate, 3-4ls back in mid-section, began to lose ground approaching turn, dropped out badly in straight when hard run took toll.
Showed early speed, pressed on from a wide gate to lead, rolled along at a decent speed, kicked clear at 300m and kept going strongly to defy rivals for a strong win.

Slowly away, raced back with last few 6ls or so away on rails, aided by solid tempo, made ground between horses early in straight and lengthened nicely final 300m making good ground to take a clear 2nd.
Landed a nice spot 1 out 1 back, sat just off a solid tempo, improved at 400m and set out after eventual winner, briefly made 2nd but couldn't wear down margin final 200m.
Dropped back from a wide gate to race behind midfield in running line,6ls or so from lead, solid pace helped, improved wider turning, kept closing soundly in straight to make frame.
Out with rest, raced just off speed 3ls back on rails, enjoyed an easy time in middle stages, set out after leader turning but made no impression last furlong, kept on evenly though.
Showed early speed, took a nice trail on leaders back, used a bit on solid tempo, right there turning but lacked extra gear last 300m, lost spot final furlong.
No early speed, settled last on rails 7ls or so back, still well back turning with plenty to do, made ground between horses and passed a few in run to line without ever looking likely.
Positioned just off midfield on rails, 5ls from lead, aided by solid sections, kept to rails in straight but unable to capitalize on runs when they appeared and just struggled in run to line.
Ordinary break, shared rear 7-8ls back, still well back turning and came wider, made some minor ground but lacked customary finish and struggled to make any headway final 200m.
Took a midfield spot 4-5ls back in running line. No excuses in run and was suited by tempo, made a brief bid turning, in but no extra from 200m and gave ground thereafter.
Showed early speed but couldn't get closer than 3 wide in midfield, did have cover 4-5ls back, fading before turn and dropped further out of contention in straight.
Raced further back than usual, 3 wide behind midfield 6ls or so from speed, tempo suited but forced wide on bend, struggled to find final 400m and never got into it.
Pressed on from a wide gate to race outside leader, used a bit with solid early sections, under pressure at 400m, lost ground rapidly in straight when hard run took toll.
Caught 3 wide without cover from outset, 2-3ls off solid speed, began to struggle rounding bend, dropped out to be beaten a long way.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began well racing prominently outside leader, shaken up approaching final stretch, hit the front over 200 metres out, just prevailed.
Ridden to soon take up running, led until narrowly headed 200 metres, hung on for second.
Always thereabouts, settling one back on rails, switched out for a run upon straightening, ran home one-paced.
Settled just worse than midfield, saved ground on inside turning in, ran on steadily in straight to be nearest at finish.
Began fairly, settling in 5th just over two lengths off the pace, kept on steadily under pressure in straight to be nearest at finish.
Soon taken back from the widest gate, tailed-off before joining other backmarkers coming out of back straight, sustained headway down final stretch to be nearest at finish.
Tightened and shuffled back to second last shortly after start, remained well behind to straight but saved a lot of ground turning in, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began awkwardly losing ground, soon recovered to rear of midfield on rails, snuck up on inside turning in, but yielded ground inside final 200 metres.
Raced keenly and 3-wide with cover in midfield, remained similar into straight, one-paced.
Began fairly, raced wide in midfield before tightened and dropped backward to last few, remained similar and the widest runner turning in, no further impression.
Raced very wide without cover in midfield until home turn, dropped away under pressure.
Began fairly from a wide gate, travelled wide without cover in 2L 4th down far side and around the bend, dropped out into straight.
Parked in second position, 2 deep no cover. Finished off gamely, repelling late challenges.
Crowded at the start, settling midfield, 1 off with cover. Showed plenty of courage in the final stretch, peaked on its run near the 50m.
Caught wide in the early stages, before slotting in to travel 1 out 1 back near the 1000m. Stayed on well.
Couldn't match the early speed of the race settling behind midfield, 2 wide with cover. Came wide in the straight and ran on well to make the frame.
Raced with the backmakers, but was caught 3 wide without cover for most of the trip. Finished off soundly down the outside, without threatening.
Worked forward and eventually crossed to lead on the rails near the 1200m. Faded over the final furlong.
Went back from a wide gate and settled at the rear of the field, 2 deep with cover. Kept on at the same speed in the straight.
Camped midfield on the rails with cover. Plugged away at the same speed in the run home.
Travelled worse than midfield, on the paint had cover. Did nothing in the home stretch. Failed to close off.
Settled at the rear of the field on the paint with cover. Reported to be lame after the race.
Had every conceivable chance after box seating. Was the first horse beaten, struggled in the final stretch.
Settled worse than midfield about 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, under pressure 500M, could not find a day night until 200M, finished off strongly to score by a neck.
Settled in front of midfield about 2Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, under pressure 600M, peeled wide turning in, dashed well for 2nd.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on well to get 3rd.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, settled 2Ls behind the leader, under pressure 800M when the pace quicken up, kept on well to the line.
Hard ridden forward to take the fence and shared the lead, under pressure 800M when the pace quicken up, kept on one pace to the line.
Held up 3-wide in mid-division, waited with until 400M, ran on fairly, never got near leaders.
Hard ridden forward to park outside the leader, quicken up to take the fence and led 800M, out of fuel 150M.
At rear, travelled 7Ls behind the leader on the fence, never a factor. (was badly affected by the felling horse 1100M)
Eased back, settled 3.5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, made an early move to park outside the leader 800M, flattened soon after straightening.
Taken back from a wide gate, settled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, never ran on. (was badly affected by the felling horse 1100M)
Gradually moved to a forward position, caught 3-wide without cover, outpaced from 600M and dropped out of contention.

Placing: UR
Comment: Eased back as usual, dislodged rider 1100M. (Lame left front)
Sharp start, tracked leader 1 back on rail, driven 450m, switched out 300m, led 150m, closed off well for safe win.
Speed at break, tracked pace 1 back 1 off, switched wide & driven final turn, kept on to 2nd 50m, just held place at wire.
Tardy break, bustled to midfield 1 off with cover, switched out under drive 300m, closed off strongly, narrowly missed 2nd.
Fast start wide, rolled to 2nd on leader's outer, pressed lead 800m, rallied to take lead turning in, all out & headed 150m.
Tardy break & bustled 1 off with cover near rear, ridden 500m, wide into stretch, impeded 275m, closed off well without threatening.
Sluggish start, raced 3 wide no cover near rear, widest final turn, impeded & forced wider 250m, ran on for solid gains.
Sharp break, niggled & raced midfield on rail, shifted out & driven into stretch, kept on evenly.
Slow start & at tail initially, some progress on rail 750m, ridden 500m, stayed on late for minor inroads.
Fast break, soon led, crossed to rail 1000m, pressured 800m, extended lead 600m, driven & headed final turn, emptied 200m & faded.
Fast start, caught wide no cover, soon slotted back 1 off with cover behind midfield, shifted out in stretch, plugged on one pace.
Sluggish start, rolled on rail to behind midfield, hard-ridden turning in, switched out 250m, plugged on tamely.
Broke well, soon outpaced & dropped to tail 750m, driven turning in, found nothing & never a factor.
Broke OK, raced rail fore of midfield, progress on turn, switched out into stretch & driven to share lead 150m, gradually drew clear in run to wire.
Broke OK, camped rail midfield, switched out & driven 400m, joined lead 150m, held in run to wire.
Bumped start, raced rail near rear, barged 1100m, switched out & driven turning in, stayed on well to snatch 3rd at wire.
Led at break, restrained & trapped 3 wide no cover midfield, rousted 500m, wide into stretch, stayed on same pace.
Bumped start, speed to lead & crossed to rail 1200m, over-raced backstretch, under pressure turning in & headed 300m, boxed on gamely in defeat.
Fast start to sit fore of midfield 1 off with cover, shuffled back 800m, switched out & hard-ridden into stretch, closed off soundly.
Crowded start, sat 1 back on rail, switched 2nd 1 off no cover 800m, ridden & hung out on turn, led 300m, unwilling & headed 150m, tapered.
Taken behind to tail, off heels 1100m, progress & switched 1 off 800m, ran on under strong drive for minor stretch gain.
Broke well, hard-ridden to slot 1 off with cover midfield, shuffled back off heels 800m, switched 3 wide & progress on turn, boxed on evenly.
Broke OK, raced rear 1 off, clipped heels 1100m, 3 wide & off heels at tail 800m, found little in weak run home.
Snagged back at start, over-raced 3 wide behind midfield, crossed & clipped rival 1100m & dropped back 3 wide, last turning in, found nothing.
Bustled to race handy 1 off no cover, shuffled back 800m, outpaced & fading out when bumped home turn, no extra.
Pushed early, box seat, just off the fast pace, held up 4-2, ran on strongly when clear and won by a short head.
Rolled forward, 1.5Ls off the fast pace, trapped 3 wide, closed off strongly 250M, just beaten by a narrow margin in 2nd.
Hard ridden to share the lead 2 wide at fast sectionals, dominated 200M until last few strides, just beaten in 3rd.
Dropped to rear, 8Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, finished strongly 200M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast pace, made some ground 200M.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the fast tempo 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden to hold the rail and shared the lead at fast sectionals, hung on until 200M overhauled and flattened.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 200M.
Hard ridden forward to share the lead, trapped 3 wide, clocked fast sectionals, emptied 150M.
Awkward away, 7Ls off the leaders along the fence, benefited by the fast tempo, ran on ok.
Eased back, 3.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, favoured by the fast pace, no progress.
Hard ridden early, trapped 3 wide in midfield, 3Ls off the fast pace, ran on fairly.
Jumped best, led initially, passed by another, retook lead 1000m but passed again 800m, dipping to 3rd final turn. Got split between horses 300m, ran on well, just held.
Began well, racing in 2nd first turn before being shuffled back to fourth back stretch. Wide entering straight, picked up momentum 300m, just failed.
Hard ridden from wide draw to swoop to the lead entering back stretch before settling 2nd then 3rd. Moved up entering straight, looked chance 200m, no extra close home.
Ridden forward from wide draw, kicked ahead to lead before final turn. Still ahead 200m, swamped final stages.
Bumped early, taken out and steadied 1000m, lost position final turn, ran on steadily final 300m.
Crowded out start but recovered to settle in midfield along fence. Stayed inside turning for home. Kept on one paced. Lame left front.
Began only fairly and soon at rear along fence. Improved position turning for home but run ended 200m out.
Began OK from widest draw and held 3-wide first turn and back stretch. Peeled out to make run 400m but found little.
Began fairly but then proved difficult to settle entering final turn dropping to last. Turned very wide into straight and ran past beaten horses.
Began well but lkept wide first turn and raced in restricted room 1000m. Wide into straight and found little under hard riding.
Began well but raced 3-wide without cover first turn and back stretch. Moved forward turning for home but found nothing final 300m.
Outpaced early and soon towards rear away from the fence. Began losing ground final turn and clear last from 200m.
Eased on jumping from wide barrier, settled well back at the tail 10Ls off the pace, bid wide 600M, ran on steadily and got up just in time.
Held up 2-wide in mid-division, travelled well throughout, stayed on final 300M, came close to win but was only just denied at the post.
In touch behind leaders, raced along the 2-path but left with no cover from midway, headway 300M out, briefly led 100M, caught late.
Unable to slot in, strode forward to take lead 1000M, kept on evenly turning in, caught by pursuers near 100M.
Positively ridden, led early stages, restrained to race behind leaders entering back straight, kept on without threatening final 300M.
Patiently ridden in a 2-wide position behind midfield, shaken up 450M, stayed on fairly.
Always prominent, chased leader in 2nd, hung badly near 800M, came under pressure 400M out, kept on same pace and lacked a further response passing 200M.
Held up in midfield along the rails, outpaced and shuffled further back over home turn, made limited progress final 300M, never threatened.
Soon taken across behind runners, raced near the rear throughout, gave only limited response when driven. (Lame right fore.)
Guided to the inside soon after the start, reserved towards the rear, kept on same pace final 300M and no impression on leaders.
Restrained to race near the rear, shaken up nearing home turn, not picked up, soon no extra and weakened.
Up with early pace, restrained back to midfield entering back straight, driven 550M, soon outpaced and dropepd off to last.
