Broke well, soon took up running, obtained rails run coming out of back straight, went over 2L clear inside final 200 metres, held on well to the line.
Jumped fairly, settled in forward of midfield on rails, switched off rails entering straight but baulked behind runners until over 300 metres out, finished off race well.
Began fairly, ridden positively to eventually obtain rails run two-back in 5th when steadied 1000 metres out, remained similar into straight, fought on well but lost 2nd late.
Began fairly, gradually dropped back to rear of field, remained similar to straight, finished off race strongly to snatch 4th on line.

Began well from the widest gate, failed to get to the front for rails run despite ridden along, eventually gained 2nd outside leader around the bend, kept on under pressure in straight but swamped inside final 200 metres.
Slow out, ridden along to join rear of field, sustained headway on rails to reach midfield home bend, baulked for a run on straightening, produced good late impression.
Began well, settled in better than midfield in 6th just over 3L off the speed, kept on steadily without quickening.
Remained in similar position in midfield throughout, finished off nicely.
Not far off in 2L 4th most of way to 400 metres, one-paced under pressure.
Soon taken back to rear from a wide gate, remained well behind to straight but saved ground turning in, produced good late impression despite inconvenienced passing 100 metre mark.

Jumped moderately, soon picked up to 2nd on rails, steadied when crossed by leader coming out of back straight, held up in box seat 400 metres out, dropped away quickly inside final 200 metres. (Bled)
Began moderately travelling behind midfield, raced very awkwardly behind runners around the bend, made no impression in straight.
Jumped in the air and nearly unseated rider at start, tailed-off to straight, never in the hunt.
Travelled wide behind midfield far side, dropping to rear of field around the bend, dropped out in straight. (Swollen ligament)
Parked midfield the paint. Peeled out approaching the home turn, ran soundly to clinch victory close to the post.
Worked forward and led clearly after the 700m along the fence. Battled away well in the straight and fought gamely.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race stalking the leader after handing up on the circle. Peaked on its effort close to the wire.
Raced 3 wide with cover, behind midfield. Swung wide on the home turn, was overhauled close to the line.
Settled midfield, 2 wide with cover. Finished off well late.
Parked worse than midfield on the paint with cover. Ran on without threatening.
Camped in 4th position, on the fence with cover. Paddled over the last 100m.
Went back from an outside alley and raced with the backmakers, on the rails with cover. Finished off ok.
Taken back from a wide gate and settled at the rear of the field, 1 off with cover. Ran on evenly out wide.
Raced back in the field, 2 deep with cover. Just whacked away at the speed in the straight.
Settled in 3rd position, 2 wide no cover. Faded after the furlong.
Posted 3 wide no cover, midfield. Failed to find any extra in the run home.
Raced very keenly in the early stages when being restrained to find cover, travelling at the rear of the field, 3 wide with cover. Was never in the hunt.
Tavelled midfield, 2 deep with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Tracked 1.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, finished off strongly when clear 350M, scored impressively by 2-1/4L.
Settled worse than midfield about 5.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, could not find a day light until 300M, dashed well for 2nd.
Pushed forward to take the fence and led by 1/2L, hung on well but without any threats to the first two runners.
Taken back to rear from a wide barrier, travelled 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide, could not find a day light until 300M, closed off strongly to get 4th.
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, ran on ok until 50M weakened.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls off the pace 2 wide, ran on only fairly.
Camped handy, travelled 2Ls off the pace 2 wide, stayed on one pace to the line.
Very slow to begin, then settled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite badly held up until 250M, ran on only fairly.
Always last few, travelled 7Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, never ran on.
Camped handy, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, weakened 250M.
Began awkwardly, then raced 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, never looked likely.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, kept on one pace until 200M flattened.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, never ran on.
Ridden forward to park outside the leader, dropped off soon after straightening.
Good break, taken back to slot midfield 1 off with cover, switched 3 wide with cover 700m, wide into stretch, driving run to lead 125m, held on.
Held up & stumbled early, detached at tail, joined field 800m & switched 1 off, wider final turn, crowded in run 300m, flew home late.
Fast start, tracked pace 1 off with cover, switched out into stretch, driven to lead 300m, headed 100m, tapered & lost 2nd at wire.
Broke OK, settled rail midfield, shuffled back on turn, driven 430m, switched out 300m, ran on for strong late gains.
Speed to lead, soon headed, tracked 1 back on rail, over-raced 1000m, boxed on evenly in stretch.
Tardy start, raced 1 off with cover behind midfield, switched wide 600m, driven into stretch, stayed on centre track for sound inroads.
Awkward start, bustled early to 3 wide with cover behind midfield, forced wider 600m, shaken up 350m, stayed on for dour gains.
Smart beak, raced close 2nd 1 off no cover, revved up 400m, limited response & one-paced under pressure, faded final 200m.
Fast break & driven to lead 1200m, soon crossed to rail, hard-driven turning in, all out & headed 300m, weakened in run home.
Steady start, taken back to rail near rear, hard-ridden & switched out into stretch, plugging on when checked off heels 100m, minor headway thereafter.
Decent break, settled midfield 1 off with cover, switched out final turn, driven 350m, found little & plodded tamely in stretch.
Fair break, raced rail midfield, over-raced 800m, switched out & driven turning in, off heels 350m, run checked 150m, eased when beaten.
Slow break, raced near tail 3 wide with cover, last & wide home turn, outpaced & soon detached, plodded past beaten rival.
Good break, caught 3 deep no cover midfield, wide run on turn, ridden 430m, found nothing & faded timidly.
Early speed to lead on rail, restrained to sit on pace, close 2nd & travelled smoothly final turn, shaken up to lead 300m, bolted home.
Sluggish start, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, smart headway into stretch, shaken up 400m, closed off centre track to 2nd 100m, well held.
Fair break, tracked lead trio 1 off with cover, 4th & driven turning in, to 3rd 400m, ran on evenly without threatening.
Slow break, niggled rail near rear, hard-ridden home turn, gradual progress through field until rattled home last 50m, just missed frame.
Fast start, settled back 1 off with cover midfield, switched out & shaken up 400m, closed off well without threatening.
Smart break to dispute lead 1 off no cover, edged to lead 500m, shaken up 400m, all out & headed 300m, battled in pursuit until swamped 100m.
Broke OK, raced midfield 1 off with cover, switched 3 deep 700m, driven wide into stretch, kept on soundly, checked in run 50m.
Tardy break, raced rail midfield, driven 400m, one-paced & no extra final 100m.
Sharp start to race rail fore of midfield, not clear run 350m, found little & plugged on one pace.
Missed break, raced tail, hard-ridden into straight & switched out, sound progress when checked off heels 250m, wilted in run.
Good break, raced 3 wide fore of midfield, progress to home turn, driven 400m but outpaced & faded in run.
Fair break, snagged back & raced wide no cover behind midfield, widest into home straight & found nothing.
Taken behind from widest gate, raced 1 off near tail, over-raced 700m, switched wide into stretch, struggled in tame run home.
Good start, rolled wide to lead 1000m, restrained for narrow lead 3 wide no cover, headed 500m, emptied turning in & faded tamely.
Settled nicely 1 out 1 back, 1.5Ls off the good pace, closed off strongly to score.
Hard ridden early to keep up with the speed, 3Ls off the good pace on the fence, progressed steadily 400M for 2nd.
Eased back, 6Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, blocked 4-2, dashed well when clear and got 3rd.
Eased back, 6Ls off the good pace along the fence, held up 400M, made steady ground when clear.
Eased at start, 7Ls off the good pace 2-4 wide, progressed steadily 300M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the good pace, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, made some ground 300M.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, no turn of foot.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 3Ls off the good pace 2 wide, weakened 200M.
Hard ridden early to hold the rail in midfield, 4Ls off the good pace, checked 300M, no progress.
Pushed to obtain box seat, pace good, emptied 400M.
Pushed to share the lead at good pace 2 wide, reduced quickly 400M.
Trapped 3-4 wide in midfield, faded 400M, tailed out.
Pushed to take rail and shared the lead at good pace, dropped off quickly 400M.
Taken forward from wide draw to sit on hind quarters of leader to turn. Kicked ahead entering straight and cleared away for comfortable win.
Trapped 3-wide on settling without cover. Rolled forward but wide around turn to be third into straight. Kept on steadily without threatening winner.
Bumped start, checked 1000m, raced keenly and steadied 700m when close on heels. Wide into straight but ran on well. Lost left hind plate.
Ridden to get forward position but held 3-wide without cover around turn. Kept on steadily in straight without looking dangerous.
With leading pack early but away from fence. Covered extra ground final turn and kept on one-paced in straight.
Crowded start and settled at rear but wide. Rolled forward around turn, taken wider in straight but only one-paced.
Bumped start, recovered to snatch box seat behind leader. Stayed on fence turning for home but one-paced in straight.
Allowed to find feet and settled two back the fence 800m. Lost place around turn, boxed on gamely in straight. Lame left hind.
Shaken up at start and rolled forward to lead on settling. Collared entering straight and found little under hard riding thereafter.
Jumped OK but not much speed, settling behind midfield away from fence. Started to give ground on entering straight.
Not rushed from wide draw and taken across to fence behind runners, Dropped further back around turn and found nothing in straight.
Ridden to take forward position but difficult to settle from 1100m and then awkward when close to heels. Tired quickly final 200m.
Last on settling and dropped further back around turn. No response when shaken up entering straight.
Jumped OK but then proved difficult to settle and checked before turn. Faded quickly in straight. See racing incidents.
Driven to the lead, pressed by rival nearing home turn, lengthened away passing 350M, kept on well on the deteriorating ground to score a 3rd successive win.
Taken back from wide barrier, slotted to a 3-wide spot towards the rear near 1000M, bid wide 500M, stayed on well to go 2nd 50M out.
Not hurried early stages, dropped back towards the rear 6Ls behind leader, driven and taken wide 500M, ran on to go 3rd near line and fared best of those to race off the pace.
Rushed forward, pressed the leader and eventual winner from 900M, stayed at same pace under pressure, weakened to 4th final 50M.
Began awkwardly, ended up at the rear 7Ls behind leaders, taken wide 450M, stayed on without threatening.
Held up along the fence in midfield, kept on same pace final 400M and never got near to leaders.
Bustled along early stages, crossed to the rail 1000M and always had leaders in sight, ridden nearing home straight but lacked a further response 300M, faded towards finish.
Restrained near the rear, saved ground on the inside but never picked up the pace on straightening, no impression.
Positively ridden early stages, never far off leaders, 3-wide without cover over the turn, had little to offer inside 350M, soon out of contention.
Up with early pace, tracked leaders handily in 3rd from 900M, unable to sustain run inside 300M, weakened and eased.
Unable to slot in from wide draw, caught 4-wide no cover turning for home, weakened on straightening.
Held up 3-wide in midfield, never reached contention, eased when no chance mid-straight.
Settled midfield, struggled to hold position 500M, soon dropped away turning in.
Travelled 3-wide out the back, badly outpaced 600M, detached and no response to riding.
Shifted out, bumped start, settled 6L from leader along fence back stretch. Peeled out 800m, taken further out 600m, ran out against whip 200m but kept on well.
Crowded out start, got head up 1400m, shifted in 1000m, on heels 700m, taken out 600m. Made challenge entering straight, but brushed by winner closing stages. Lost right front plate.
Taken back from wide draw to find cover but dropped to last before turn. Taken wide entering straight, got split between horses and finished off nicely.
Slow into stride, settling at rear and gradually moving closer to fence. Held for run early in straight but ran on nicely when clear.
Ridden up initially before settling midfield one-off the fence. Moved forward entering straight but run ended 200m.
Not pushed from wide draw and settled at rear away from fence. Shuffled back turning for home before passing beaten horses halfway up straight.
Taken forward and raced alongside early leader before coming off the bridle 900m and dropping back to third. Closed in turning for home before tiring from 200m.
Jumped well but not pushed and settled 4-back the fence at 900m. Took closer order entering straight before tiring final 200m. Lame left front leg.
Beaten for early speed held 5th place into turn 3L from leader. Found little when asked for effort entering straight.
Kicked up inside early leader to 900m before slipping back to box seat around turn. Closed in entering straight but spent force at 200m.
Trapped three-wide without cover back stretch before zipping around horses to lead into turn. Under whip from 400m and tired.
Led on settling but passed 900m when tried to slow pace. Looked chance entering straight but tired quickly and flattened final 100m.
Landed ideal spot 1 out 1 back, ideal run in m id section, loomed up on turning and took over, found plenty under pressure to hold rivals safely on line.
Taken back from a wide gate, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield 6ls or so from lead, improved to be in a striking position at 400m, kept giving but found winner a bit too good final 100m.
Dropped back to rear, raced 8ls back on rails, set a task when still next to last at 400m, weaved between horses and did best work late to make many lengths and take a place.
Raced behind midfield 6-7ls back in running line, even run to turn, made progress before finding some traffic in straight, stayed on well late to make frame.
Tardy into stride, Raced behind midfield 6ls back on rails, well back and kept to inside on turning, closed off well doing best work late to be nearest on line.
Slotted in nicely to a midfield role, 4-5ls back, no excuses in run, improved turning, stuck on ok in probably not the best going, flat 200m.
Well enough to begin, too trail on leaders back on rails, right there 1L down turning, looked a place chance but no extra gear in straight and just battled away final 200m.
Trapped 4 wide without cover in midfield, 5-6ls back, improved rounding bend, run ended at 200m when hard trip took toll.
Pressed forward from a wide alley to race outside the leader, fair run in middle stages, still there in 3rd turning, battled away to 200m before dropping away.
Showed early speed to take up running, set terms to suit in front, came under pressure soon after turning and gave ground fading out of contention from 300m.
Unable to slot in and drifted back to rear 7ls away, 4 wide throughout with cover on bend, plenty to do widest turning, made no impression in straight
Taken back from a wide gate, raced 8wls back 2 wide, still same margin down turning, never a factor.
Away with rest, raced 4ls back on rails in midfield, easy time to turn, didn't dash and gave ground tamely in straight.
Ended up in midfield racing 3 wide without cover, did share of work 4-5ls back, gave in soon after straightening.

Drifted back racing 3 wide with cover, 7ls or so away behind midfield, began to improve from 500m and came wide turning, showed good acceleration to sweep past rivals final 300m drawing away for another easy victory.
Unable to slot in and raced 3 wide without cover 3-4ls back, gradually improved coming wider turning, hit front at 200m but couldn't withstand finish of winner, kept on well all the same.
Taken back from a wide gate, 8ls or more back on rails. Helped by reasonable speed, made ground through field in straight doing best work late to snatch a place.
Landed nice spot 4ls back in 5th position, racing 2 wide, all favours to bend, switched wider turning and kept on soundly to make frame.
Began well, took a prominent spot on leaders back, used a but early, first to challenge turning, looked a place chance at 200m but run ended, kept on evenly once headed.
Showed good early speed to cross and lead from outside gate, set a ok clip in front, lost advantage after 300m but kept on well in worst going to 150m before dropping away.
Raced in rear division, 8ls back in running line, pace suited, still a bit to do turning, worked home well without looking likely to be nearest on line.
Settled behind midfield on rails 6ls off top end, aided by pace, kept to inside in straight and just held ground which was reasonable given the going.
Taken back from a tricky alley, raced at rear 9ls or so from lead, speed suited, swung widest turning and closed to 200m before run ended (see racing incidents).
Settled 3 wide with cover in midfield 506ls back, fair run to turn, couldn't find extra gear required and faded final furlong when condition gave out.
Taken back from a wide gate, raced 3 wide at rear 9ls or so back, tempo helped, still last turning, never likely but not disgraced when resuming from a long break.
Went forward to race 3ls of lead first without cover, did a bit of work on speed, right in mix turning, steadily faded out of contention.
Raced in midfield 4ls back on fence, 5th turning, dropped out tamely final 300m and was disappointing despite being on less preferable ground.
Raced in behind midfield 5-6ls back in running line, struggling on turning, folded cheaply and was beaten a long way.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Soon took up running, ceded advantage 800 metres out, tracked leader into straight before re-gaining lead under pressure inside 200 metres.
Settled in rear of midfield, finished off well under pressure.
Slow out, remained well behind, finished off race strongly.
Began fairly from the widest gate, took up running 800 metres out, led until headed inside 200 metres.
Jumped fairly, settled in forward of midfield, kept on steadily in the run home.
Settled behind midfield, saved ground on inside turning in, fought on steadily without threatening.
Always thereabouts, ran kept on steadily in the run home.
Settled towards the rear, ran on past beaten horses.
Never better than midfield.
Always well behind, made no impression in straight.
Raced wide without cover in midfield, made short-lived effort far side before hampered and lost position approaching home bend, very wide turning for home, no further impression.
Jumped moderately, settled around midfield on rails, folded up quickly inside final 300 metres.
Parked midfield, 1 off the fence with cover. Peeled out turning for home & wound up nicely in the straight to clinch the race in the shadows of the post.
Raced in 4th position, 2 wide with cover. Hit the front near the 200m and looked the likely winner before being mowed down in the run to the line.
Led early on the fence before box seating midrace. Had every possible chance, came up flat over the concluding stages.
Parked worse than midfield on the rails with cover. Worked home soundly in the straight to make the frame.
Held the fence in about 5th position with cover. Maintained the same speed down the running.
Raced in last position for the major part of the race on the rails with cover. Swung wide on the home turn, finished off ok late.
Travelled back in the field, close to the rail with cover. Shifted out to improve passing the 800m, racing 3-4 deep with cover. Passed tiring runners in the final stretch.
Camped midfield the paint, had cover. Plugged away one paced in the run home.
Raced a little keenly in the early stages, travelling on the speed, 1 off no cover. Faded after the furlong.
Raced with the backmakers, 3 deep with cover. Struggled in the home stretch.

Travelled prominently early but was unable to find cover when caught wide. Was allowed to stride forward near 1200m & took up the lead, racing on the fence after the 800m. Was a gassed in the home straight.
For the majority of the race was posted 3- wide no cover, ahead of midfield. Never likely.
Raced midfield, settled 3ls behind the leader 2 wide, switched wide turning in, despite harmed by the very slow pace, closed off strongly to win by a narrow margin.
Camped handy, travelled 2Ls behind the leader on the fence, suited by the very slow pace, dashed well for 2nd, just missed by a neck.
Rolled forward to park outside the leader, benefited by the very slow pace, stayed on well until 50M weakened for 3rd.
Camped handy, settled 2Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, benefited by the very slow pace, ran on well to get 4th.
Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, harmed by the very slow pace, stayed inside, ran on only fairly.
Ridden forward to take the lead along the rail, despite suited by the very slow pace, overhauled 100M.
Taken back from a wide gate, settled 4.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, harmed by the very slow pace, ran on only fairly. (Hung in in straight, difficult to ride and lost left fore plate)
Settled worse than midfield about 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, hampered by the very slow pace, never ran on.
Taken back, travelled 6Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, never ran on. (Racing manners are unacceptable during the race)
Always at rear, trapped very wide without cover, never a factor.
Camped handy, settled 1L off the slow pace, 3 wide without cover, flattened badly 200M. (Lost left fore plate and also lame left fore)
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls off the very slow pace 3 wide with cover, never ran on.
Speed to lead, dictated even tempo, extended clear into stretch, shaken up 300m & drifted out, all out final 50m, held on.
Keen at break, dropped-in rail midfield, switched out & driven into stretch, quickened in pursuit, closed to wire.
Bustled at start to race handy 4th 1 off with cover, driven 450m, shifted out on turn, outpaced top of stretch, stayed on to 3rd.
Broke OK, raced 1 off with cover behind midfield, slotted rail 1000m, shifted out under drive turning in, stayed on soundly.
Smart start, sat handy 1 back on rail, ridden in 3rd 600m, boxed on evenly in stretch until tapered late & edged out of frame.
Broke well to race midfield 1 off with cover, ridden 500m, wide home turn, battled on at one pace.
Bustled from gate, caught 3 wide no cover behind midfield, 1 off with cover 1000m, ridden 500m, stayed on dourly for minor inroads.
Tardy start, raced rail near rear, shifted out in stretch, hard-ridden for one-paced run home.
Taken behind from widest gate, raced near tail 1 off, driven 450m, stayed on late for modest gains.
Broke well, rolled wide to slot 2nd 1200m 1off no cover, ridden 500m, outpaced & faded in run.
Snagged back, sat 1 off with cover near rear, briefly 3 wide no cover back stretch, widest final turn, never a factor.
Missed break, niggled at tail, ridden 800m, detached turning in & tailed off in run home.
Speed to lead on rail, headed 800m & settled 1 back, switched out 500m, quickened to lead 300m, ran home strongly.
Broke OK, raced handy 5th on rail, switched out & progress on turn, shaken up 300m, to 2nd 150m, closed off well without threatening.
Fast break, tracked lead 1 off no cover, 2nd & forced wide under pressure home turn, kept on soundly but lost place in run.
Good break, slotted 4th 1 off with cover, switched out home turn, ran home evenly under strong drive.
Slow start, raced rail near rear, shaken up & shifted out turning in, ran on for modest gains.
Snagged back, raced 3 wide no cover midfield, progress on turn, wide into stretch, kept on evenly until faded close home.
Sluggish break, raced 3 wide with cover near rear, forced wide home turn, plugged on for minor inroads.
Taken behind to race 1 off with cover near tail, widest into stretch, kept on for dour progress.
Tardy break, sat midfield 1 off with cover, outpaced & lost ground 500m, plodded on moderately.
Moderate start, raced rail midfield, driven 300m, found little & weakened out in run to wire.
Missed break, detached & bustled in rear, adrift turning in, plodded on past beaten rival.
Sharp start, driven wide to lead 800m, soon crossed to rail, emptied & headed 300m, faded rapidly.
Hard ridden forward to cross, sat just off the leader 2 wide, pace good, dominated from 300M.
Settled nicely in box seat, closed off well for 2nd.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout no cover, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the good pace 2 wide, lack turn of foot in straight.
Midfield, 4Ls off the good pace, checked 900M, soon under pressure, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 0.5L at good pace, out of fuel 200M.
At back, 5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, made some ground 200M.
Failed to muster, 4Ls off the good pace 2 wide in midfield, flattened 200M.
Trapped 3 wide throughout at back, 5Ls off the good pace, no turn of foot.
Never muster, 6.5Ls off the good pace on the fence, no progress.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide, emptied 200M.
Eased to rear, never a factor.
Suited by fast pace and settled behind midfield away from fence. Peeled out turning for home, ran on strongly under hard riding to just get there.
Began awkwardly, shifted out and bumped. Came off the bit back stretch, turned wide, ran on strongly to just miss.
Fractious in gate but jumped OK. Travelled wide till finding cover back stretch. Taken out 500m, still well back 200m, flew home to miss narrowly.
Began well and held the fence inside leader back stretch and final turn. Took lead entering straight, looked winner 100m, swamped final strides.
Slow into stride but recovered to sit midfield. Ran on steadily early in straight before being swamped by late sweepers.
Outpaced early, drifting to rear back stretch. Switched out turning for home and finished well, drifting out under pressure.
Began well but unable to go the early pace and settled 5th, 5L from leader. Closed in final turn, got close to heels final stages and eased.
Ridden to take forward position but unable keep up with leaders and settled 4th. Turned wide into straight, kept steadily.
Unable to go the early pace and soon in last pair away from fence. Dropped to last entering straight and ran past tired horses.
Fractious in gate and then bombed the start, dropping to last along fence. Made forward move entering straight before turning one-paced.
Hard ridden to take lead and then set fast pace along back stretch. Caught 300m out and tired quickly.
Hard ridden to hold forward position outside leader. Still 3rd entering straight before flattened final 200m.
Tracked leaders in a slowly run race, responded well turning home and established narrow lead 150M out, rallied on to maintain that advantage to the line.
Had a ground saving trip along the inside, in 5th place always within striking distance, ran on well up the fence to join leaders near 100M, just held.
Settled near the rear in the first half, made an early move passing 800M to join leader, kept on well under maximum pressure, just held by first 2 final 100M.
Close up in 4th for the first 800M, came to have every chance turning in, kept on but always held by first three.
Urged forward from draw 1, led slowly first 800M, pressed by rival 600M, outpaced nearing 200M, checked 75M, lost ground and faded to 5th.
Held up mid-division along the fence, shifted out 450M, didn't pick up sufficiently and was never a serious danger.
Held up 2-wide in mid-division, brought wide nearing 400M, found less than expected, no impression on leaders.
Prominently ridden, tracked leader 2-wide to home turn, struggled to hold his position 450M, soon out of contention.
Taken back from wide barrier and raced towards the rear 8Ls off the pace, bid wide from 600M and didn't pick up well enough, never threatened.
Had cover behind midfield but proved difficult to settle, shifted out 800M and strode closer to leaders, had little left turning home, ran well below par.
Settled behind midfield early stages, shuffled back to near the rear making the home turn, kept on same pace and could never get involved.
Reserved at the rear, had 6Ls to make up turning for home, brought widest into straight but didn't respond to riding.
Began well and led before easing back to 3rd first turn and 5th back stretch. In pocket 400m before field spread out, ran home strongly for easy win.
Jumped well but steadied shortly after start, then got shuffled back towards rear on fence. Followed winner's path entering straight, finished off well.
Taken out shortly after start before settling in midfield away from fence. Turned wide into straight and kept on well to be nearest at finish.
Began well racing inside early leader before eased into box seat at first turn. Lost position back stretch and final turn but kept on steadily in straight.
Taken forward from widest draw and trapped 3-wide first turn before rolling forward to lead at 1000m. Caught 350m, one-paced.
Began well but not pushed and settled towards rear away from the fence. Swung very wide into straight and kept on steadily.
Taken forward from wide draw to sit outside leader. Got head up and hung in final turn, looked a chance 350m before turning one-paced.
Began awkwardly and then taken back across horses to rail. Dropped to ast turning for home, widest in straight, kept on steadily.
Jumped with field but trapped wide and left without cover from 1000m. Rolled forward to be 3rd final turn but gave ground final 200m.
Began fairly then hard ridden to lead at first turn, raced keenly before settling 3rd with cover from 900m. Tired quickly from 200m.
Outpaced early and at rear first turn. Improved position gradually back stretch and final turn but spent force by 200m.
Taken back soon after start and long last on settling. Caught up with field entering straight but found nothing when asked.

Hard ridden early settling in forward of midfield in 6th, fought on gamely to assert authority over 50 metres out.
Broke well, travelled keenly and without cover far side settling in 5th about 3L off the pace on the bend, fought on well under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Settled in midfield, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Ridden along, disputed lead around the bend, hit the front briefly 300 metres out, soon swamped.
Settled in rear of midfield, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Settled in midfield, ran on steadily until running out of room over 50 metres out.
Jumped moderately, niggled along in last few, did not find much room most of straight, fought on well to the line.

Cropped a bad check and dropped to last early, made steady headway very wide around the bend and into the straight, sustained progress under hard driving down the centre of the track, jockey lost whip 200M out.
Jumped fairly, settled on rails in last few, saved ground turning in, found no extra in straight.
Driven to lead, joined around the bend and eventually headed early in straight, weakened under pressure inside final 300 metres.
Never better than midfield, made no show in straight.
Jumped moderately from a poor gate, soon made rapid progress to join the leaders 3-wide without cover around the bend, one-back in 3rd turning in, folded up quickly inside final 300 metres.
Never on terms.
Settled within striking distance on rails, faded gradually after straightening.
Raced in second position, outside the leader, stands rail and without cover. Assumed the lead near the furlong and kept finding in the run to the post.
Had every chance after settling in fourth position on the outside rail with cover. Closed off nicely.
Camped about 3 off the stands rail tracking the speed, no cover. Worked to the line soundly.
Settled on the grandstand side in the lead. Never really looked comfortable at was a beaten horse at the 200m. Vet reported blood in trachea post race.
Settled 1 off the near side rail, with cover, just behind midfield. Came up flat over the final furlong.
Parked midfield, well off the stands rail, gave ground over the latter stages. Never in the hunt.
Couldn't go the early speed of the race settling at the rear, on the grandstand side, had cover. Plugged away over the last furlong.
Travelled not far off the speed 3-4 from the near side fence. Never fired.
Began awkwardly then settled with the backmakers towards the stands rail, had cover. Failed to quicken over the final 300m and finished well back.
Was fractious in the gates, began poorly and was near the rear of field closer to the middle of the track. Under pressure near the 400m, and was never likely.
Settled worse than midfield, 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, dashed on strongly 250M to take the trophy by 3/4L.
Settled in front of midfield, 2Ls off the pace 2 wide, ran on well to get 2nd.
Eased start, settled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, dashed well for 3rd but without threatening to the first two.
Pushed forward to take the fence and share the lead, stayed on nicely until 150M weakened.
Sent forward to park outside the leader, stayed on until 250M weakened. (Questioned for running)
Pushed to obtain the box seat, travelled nicely until 300M, however only kept on one pace to the line.
Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, never ran on.
Taken back from the wide barrier however trapped wide and without cover throughout, never a factor.
Tardy start & bustled, settled 1 off with cover behind midfield, driven wide home turn, grinding run to lead 150m, drew clear.
Fair break out wide, taken back for cover 3 deep near rear, wide home turn, driven centre track to 2nd 100m, not reach winner.
Snagged back from widest gate, sat 2 wide near rear, wider into stretch, stayed on well centre track to grab 3rd late.
Tardy start, bustled to sit handy 1 off no cover, soon covered & to rail 900m, switched out 400m, battled to lead 200m, headed 150m & tapered.
Slow start, taken behind to rail behind midfield, switched out for run final turn, shifted left in stretch run, stayed on for minor gains.
Bumped & squeezed start, initially 4 deep, soon settled 3 wide with cover midfield, driven into stretch, boxed on evenly.
Sharp break, slotted midfield 3 wide with cover, shaken up 400m, plugged on dourly, tapered close home.
Good break, settled mid rank 1 off with cover, ridden & outpaced turning in, stayed on moderately.
Smart start, caught 3 wide no cover, raced 4th & found cover 1 off at 800m, switched out & driven 400m, one-paced until faded final 200m.
Speed to lead on fence, kicked on into stretch, all out & headed 200m, faded thereafter.
Broke well, caught wide midfield, rolled to 2nd 1 off no cover 900m, hard-ridden into stretch, all out when swamped 250m.
Smart start, raced handy rail initially, shuffled to fore of midfield 700m, under pressure turning in, weakened out in run home.
Speed to show prominently out wide early, snagged back to last pair, settled 1 off with cover, switched wide turning in, plodded on weakly.
Lacked pace at break, soon last pair on rail, hard-ridden into stretch, found nothing & eased when beaten.
Fast to stride, snagged to slot handy 1 off with cover, switched out & shaken up 400m, hard-driven to lead 125m, drew clear.
ardy start, sat 1 off behind midfield, 3 wide for progress 700m, solid stretch run to challenge, no match for winner, secured 2nd close home.
Good break, stalked leader 1 off no cover, driven to lead 350m, all out & headed 125m, boxed on.
Crowded start & lost ground, recovered to rail near rear, shifted to centre track 400m, closed off well without threatening.
Fair break, settled back 1 off with cover near rear, switched wide & driven home turn, ran on for minor gains.
Fast break wide, taken back to slot midfield 1 off with cover, niggled 800m, kept on dourly in stretch.
Fair break to sit rail midfield, driven & switched out into stretch, plugged on one pace.
Sluggish break, raced last pair 1 off, pushed wide & bumped home turn, boxed on for moderate inroads.
Sharp start, tracked 1 back on rail, driven in pursuit 400m, found little & faded out.
Started OK, raced rail behind midfield, hard-ridden 400m, plugging on moderately when not clear run after 200m.
Soon led, crossed to rail 900m, pressed on home turn, all out & headed 350m, weakened tamely.
Slow start, taken behind to rail at tail, shifted out home turn & bumped rival, found little in stretch, never a factor.
Jinked left at start, caught 3 wide no cover fore of midfield, under pressure & ridden turning in, emptied 350m & faded out.
Pushed to hold the rail in front of midfield, 2Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow pace, dashed well 300M to score by a narrow margin.
Pushed to lead by 1L, stayed 2 wide, clocked advantageous slow sectionals, hung on strongly until last few strides just beaten by a nose.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, made early move 700M to take advantages of the slow pace, ran on well for 3rd.
Box seat, enjoyed the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Pushed early but soon eased back to cross for cover, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed well 250M.
At rear, 7Ls off the leader 1-2 wide, hung in most straight, dashed strongly to the line despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed forward to cross, 1L off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, flattened 200M.
Trapped 4 wide throughout at back, 4.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed fairly.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leader, trapped 4-5 wide throughout, not suited by the slow tempo, ran on ok.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, hung out badly in straight, just held ground.
Never better than midfield.
Hard ridden throughout but never competitive at rear.
Jumped to the front to lead confortably, joined by runner up 200m out when jockey dropped rein, kicked back to win.
Began well, weaved through horses towards outside fence, joined leader 200m out, unable to keep up final stages.
Outpaced and pushed back towards rear, moved closer to outer fence halfway and gradually made ground doing best work at finish.
Began well but unable to get closer to outer fence. Picked up momentum down centre track and finished off nicely.
Fractious in gate and slow into stride. Moved to outside rail but forced to stopped riding 300m when crossed. No clear running until final stages, finished well.
Slow to muster and kept in centre track, picking up gradually. Under the whip from halfway but only one-paced final stages. Confirmed roarer by vet.
Began well and found cover behind leader to course proper. One-paced under hard riding final 400m.
Began well but outpaced early and forced back to last. Trailed field until final 400m when made up ground between horses.
Began only fairly, shaken up to stay with pack half way, under pressure from 400m and faded gradually.
Began well, racing just behind leading pack along outer fence. Ran out of condition from 400m, dropping back.
Jumped well and sat inside leader to half way. Condition gave out noticeable from 400m and faded.
Went forward from wide barrier, restrained to track leader making the home turn, accelerated to lead near 200M, kicked clear for a comfortable victory.
Saved ground on the inside and always had the leaders in sight, kept on steadily to go 2nd near 50M but not a serious threat to winner.
Not the fastest away but moved up to take lead under gentle urging, all out inside 300M but unable to repel winner 200M out, kept plugging away to line, lost 2nd close home.
Unable to get closer to rails, caught in mid-division 3 wide without cover throughout, kept on steadily but never able to challenge winner.
Dropped back, waited with in the rear, made steady headway 350M out, short of room near line but probably made no difference to the placing.
Fractious in the barriers, reared and lost ground, recovered to race behind midfield, ran on well first half of straight, weakened and shifted in final 150M. (To stalls test.)
Gradually taken back for cover, settled on the outside of rear pair, looked beaten when outpaced early straight but picked up well final 250M for a strong late finish.
Not hurried early stages, severely checked near 900M, 3rd last turning home, stayed on fairly final 300M.
Up with early pace, restrained to midfield position halfway, kept on same pace under pressure, hampered near line.
Sped to early lead, sat behind leaders passing 850M, kept on same pace turning home, no extra and weakened badly final 100M.
Settled in a 3-wide position behind midfield, covered more ground than others making the turn, not quickened passing 400M, beaten mid-straight.
Began very awkwardly and lost ground, rushed along to get back to the field, outpaced turning home, soon out of contention.
Taken back from wide draw but held one-off towards rear to turn, awkward on heels 600m, bumped, taken out 350m and finished off nicely.
Ridden forward but caught wide initially before finding cover into turn. Taken four-wide into straight and ran on well.
Began with field but held in pack away from fence. Held up for run early in straight, got clear 300m and finished off well.
Taken back after start to sit one-off towards rear to turn. Bumped turn, wide into straight, ran on steadily under hard riding.
Ridden along behind leading bunch but held wide without cover turn. Closed in top of straight but one-paced final stages.
Ridden forward inside early leader along fence before dropping back to 3rd when crossed. Shifted out 800m, kept on one-paced in straight.
Slow into stride, taken to rail at rear, turned wide, ran on well before baulked 50m, not tested final stages.
Beaten for early pace, dropping 4-back along fence into turn. Switched out entering straight, made up some late ground.
Ridden forward from wide draw to sit outside leader before turn. Second into straight before weakening steadily.
Jumped with field, held rail 3-back from leader. Switched out turn but shifted in 400m to obtain clear running. One-paced.
Taken back from wide draw to trail field but away from fence. Taken wide into straight but found little under hard riding.
Jumped to front before taking box seat when crossed. Slightly inconvenienced turning for home but found nothing when run opened.
Ridden to go forward from widest draw, hitting the front 1100m and crossing to fence. Collared 350m and faded quickly.

Took advantage of the good draw to take a sit on leaders back, had all favors with steady tempo in middle stages, eased around them turning and let down strongly, kept finding to hold rivals comfortably in latter stages.
Even break, raced 3-4ls back on rails in midfield, had a soft trip to bend, gained split turning and quickly into mix, kept up effort for length on straight but safely held final 100m.
Broke well, came across from a wide gate to sit outside leader, steady tempo suited in middle stages, out dashed by first two final 300m but stayed on well for 3rd.
Allowed time to settle from a wide draw, raced 6-7ls back two wide, pace against in mid-section, switched wider and in traffic to 300m, closed well late to make frame.
Pushed on after an average break, landed a 1 out 1 back spot, had ideal trip with steady speed, right there turning, didn't have extra gear to feature but held ground evenly.
Took a spot just off midfield, 6ls off speed in running line, steady tempo not really to suit, back amongst horses turning, worked home evenly in straight to be closest at finish.
Drifted back from a tricky alley, raced 6ls or so back 3 wide just off midfield, enjoyed a good trail in despite tempo against, work to line well final 300m.
Crowded early, settled 6ls or so away on rails just off midfield, pace against in mid-section, saved ground on bend, stayed on same speed in straight passing a few.
Taken back from a wide alley, raced towards rear 3 and 4 wide 7-8ls back, came 4 wide on circle, came on fairly given workload making some minor ground without threatening.
Showed plenty of early sped to drive through and lead, steadied tempo on circle, stacked field up turning, headed passing 400m and gradually dropped away.
Lacked early speed, faded back to midfield, 5ls back, raced 3 wide without cover on bend, gradually crept forward, no extra at 300m when workload took toll.
Slow to begin, settled at rear 8ls back on rails, unsuited by slow tempo, still well back turning, no serious threat.
Landed a midfield position, 4-5ls back in running line, enjoyed a fair run to turn, there to 300m before giving in tamely and dropping off.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Broke well from a low draw, settled in 2nd on rails, gained upper hand inside final 100 metres.

Jumped well from a poor draw, led the field but well off the rails, shifted in but still one off around the bend, fought on but headed inside final 100 metres. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Began well, settled on rails just better than midfield, saved a lot of ground turning in, ran home one-paced.
Jumped moderately, soon dropped to last few, gained closer on rails turning in, fought on steadily without quickening.
Settled 3-wide in midfield after beginning from the widest gate, in rear of midfield when carried wider turning in, kept on steadily past beaten horses.
Jumped moderately, niggled along before settling just better than midfield, one-paced in straight.
Jumped moderately, settled just worse than midfield, saved ground on inside turning in, ran home one-paced.
Jumped quickly but soon steadied back, struck heels and lost ground passing 800 metres dropping to rear, became last around the bend, ran past well-beaten ones in the run home.
Very slowly away, trailed the field to home bend, saved ground on rails turning in, ran home one-paced.
Ridden along and 3-wide in first few, soon faded in straight.
Midfield briefly, soon moved up to 3rd passing 800 metres, weakened under pressure.
Midfield early dropping to last past the Rock.
Led early before handing up near the 1100m and settling in 2nd position. Got a nice cart into the race repelled late challenge to win narrowly.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race in 4th position on the rails with cover. Chased gamely right down the running.
Camped midfield on the paint with cover. Finished off well.
Rolled forward to eventually take up front running duties after the 1100m on the paint. Stayed on reasonably well.
Made its run third from the rear, on the paint with cover. Ran on soundly along the inside in the straight.
Effectively raced in 3rd position 1 off with some cover after the 1200m. Stayed on only evenly.
Settled in last position, close to the fence with cover. Saved ground on the home turn and made steady progress in the straight towards the inside.
Raced midfield, 1 off with cover. Failed to make any impression in the stretch.
Travelled with the backmakers, 3 deep with cover. Plugged away in the straight.
Travelled towards the rear, 2 deep with cover. Failed to close off.
Never a factor after being caught 3 deep without cover for most of the trip just ahead of midfield. Was empty a long way from home.
Settled close to midfield, 3 deep with cover. Struggled in the home stretch.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, accelerated strongly 200M to score by 3/4L.
Settle worse than midfield about 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, stayed inside and finsihed well to get 2nd.
Hard ridden forward to settle 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on steadily but without any threats to the first two.
Sent forward to lead 2 wide, fought on well until 150M weakened.
At rear as usual, travelled 5.5Ls off the pace on the fence, made some ground in straight.
Ridden forward to share the lead, however trapped 4 wide no cover throughout, kept on one pace to the line.
At rear, travelled 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast pace, however ran on only fairly.
Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, never ran on.
Always at rear, never a factor.
Raced midfield, however travelled 3 wide and without cover, weakened 200M.
Sent forward, settled 1L behind the leader 2 wide with cover, flatted soon after straightening.
Fast start, rousted to secure lead on rail, settled into comfortable rhythm, 1L clear turning in, kicked on 300m, always in command.
Good start, slotted 1 off with cover midfield, niggled 450m, not clear run 300m, switched centre track 200m, strong closer, took 2nd close home.
Slow start, raced 1 off with cover near rear, switched out 400m & driven widest into stretch, ran on well for 3rd.
Broke well, settled 3 back on rail, shaken up turning in, shifted into rival 280m, quickened to 2nd 200m, tapered late.
Broke OK, raced 1 off with cover midfield, switched wide & driven 400m, bumped 280m, ran evenly on for sound gains.
Tardy start, bustled early, raced rail behind midfield, switched out home turn & progress, not clear run 300m, boxed on one pace.
Missed break & detached 6L, gradually closed to join tail 800m, driven & progress home turn, stayed on for solid gains.
Broke well, taken behind to rail near rear, niggled 500m, switched out for centre track run, battled on for minor inroads.
Fast break, bustled to dispute lead 3 wide, soon settled 1 off with cover 3rd, switched 3 wide 400m, all out when bumped 300m, faded thereafter.
Quick to stride, contested early lead 4 wide, faced the breeze on leader's flank, ridden home turn, emptied 200m & weakened out.
Sharp start to dispute lead initially, slotted 1 back on rail 1st turn, niggled 600m, driven to hold spot 400m, found nothing in stretch.
Lacked pace & rousted at break to race 1 off with cover in rear, driven 500m, last into stretch, made no impression.
Fair break, rousted early, rolled wide to sit 2nd no cover 700m, shaken up 400m, joined leader 150m, edged to lead late & held on.
Good start, raced 1 off with cover midfield, niggled 650m, switched out on turn & driven, wound up 200m, strong late closer, just failed.
Speedy break but edged left across rival, led 1000m, soon clear on fence, all out when joined 150m, dug deep but headed 50m & no extra.
Bumped start, raced 1 off with cover behind midfield, switched wide & driven 400m, ran on for sound gains without threatening.
Bumped at start, raced 1 off with cover near rear, ridden 600m, 7L back turning in, stayed on well for solid inroads.
Tardy start, raced near rear 3 wide with cover, progress on turn, switched to chase centre track, stayed on for decent gains.
Bumped at break, pace to recover & run rail 5th, ridden 500m, one-paced to wire.
Smart start, caught 3 wide no cover behind midfield, struggled on turn, plugged on one pace.
Fast break to dispute lead, raced 1 off with cover 4th, every chance turning in, unable to raise game, folded tamely.
Sharp start & disputed lead, soon settled 1 back on rail, ridden under pressure home turn, found little & weakened in stretch.
Stumbled & bumped start, lost ground, rolled to sit rail behind midfield, ridden into stretch, tepid run home.
Bumped at break, soon at tail, snatched off heels 1000m & detached, never a factor.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 200M to score.
Settled just behind the leader 2 wide, suited by the slow tempo, closed off strongly and led 200M, hung on until 50M overhauled, ran 2nd.
Pushed early but failed to cross in front, 2.5Ls off the leader and trapped 3 wide, made early move 600M as the pace slowed, ran on well for 3rd.
Eased to take box seat, blocked most straight, not suited by the slow tempo, ran on ok.
Pushed forward, parked outside the leader, benefited by the slow tempo, ran on well until 200M flattened.
Pushed to hold the rail in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the slow pace, raced keenly, lack turn of foot.
Hard ridden but failed to muster, always at rear, 9Ls off the leader on the fence, dashed well 150M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Midfield, 3Ls off the slow pace 2-3 wide, hung out badly 600M resulting in its rider almost dislodged, ran on ok in straight.
Hard ridden to keep up with the field, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 100M.
Pushed early but not muster, 5Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, dashed fairly.
Pushed to take the rail and led by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, however soon emptied 250M.
Eased back, badly hampered and was taken very wide at home bends, saddle shifted badly, eased out of race.
Allowed to settle in midfield one away from the fence. Went a little wide entering the straight before strong finish under the whip, drawing clear.
Went straight to the front on jumping, slowed the pace slightly along back stretch, kicked clear entering straight before condition gave out final stages.
Taken back across horses after start but used 1000m to hold position. Steadied 800m to get run, aggressively ridden final 100m to snatch 3rd on the line.
Jumped well and sat outside leader first turn before dropping two-back, the rail back stretch. Took inside run final stretch and kept on well, losing 3rd in final stride.
Beaten for early speed but able to snatch rail position along back stretch. Turned wide into straight and kept on steadily without threatening.
Ridden forward to vie for early lead and made to work when taken out by inside horse, dropping to 4th. Unbalanced 500m, kept on one-paced final 400m.
Hard ridden to go forward but wide first turn. Held together back stretch before moving up to sit outside leader final turn. Looked chance 400m before tiring.
Slightly slow to jump but recovered quickly to sit in midfield, three back along the fence. Improved slightly top of straight before turning one-paced.
Outpaced early and settled between horses towards the rear. Improved slightly before final turn but only one-paced final 400m.
Dropped back from wide draw but kept away from fence. Covered extra ground before final turn and found nothing in straight, becoming detached.
Stood flat-footed when the gates opened and never a threat after that. Finished tailed off.
Soon guided to the fence, settled nicely behind midfield, had to switch ground when held up for clear run near 300M, squeezed through late on under confident riding, got up near the line.

Dropped back from wide barrier, travelled nicely towards the rear in a strongly run race, pulled out inside 350M and quickened well into contention, came close to win but couldn't match pace of winner late stages.
Tracked leader first 600M before speeding to the lead, set strong pace to straight, kept on well to the line only to be collared by first two near the finish.
Broke well from draw 1, held up 3Ls behind leader in a strongly run race, came with a threatening run inside 300M but was checked nearing 50M and out of contention.
Not hurried after the start, taken back to last 7Ls off the good pace, made some progress turning home but never a serious threat to leaders.
Held up 2-wide in mid-division, driven along 300M but could only keep on at the same pace.
Tracked leaders in a strongly run race, had his chance before weakening passing 200M.
Restrained to a rearward position after the start, driven 400M but made limited progress only.
Sped to the front setting good pace, led until halfway, all out 400M, no extra and eased 200M from home.
Caught 3-wide without cover in midfield, strode closer to pace nearing back straight, struggled to keep up 500M out, soon weakened out of contention.
Taken back, settled near rear along the 3-path, brought widest 400M but found nothing in reserve, ran well below par.
Settled 3-wide in midfield, outpaced 600M, weakened tamely, tailed out. (Unacceptable Performance.)

Jumped moderately, soon recovered to rear of midfield on rails, commenced run turning in, responded well to take charge inside final 200 metres.
Contested early lead after beginning from a wide gate, crossed to front coming out of back straight, led until finding no extra inside final 150 metres.
Raced wide without cover in rear of midfield, made up good ground down the centre of straight, nearest at finish.
Travelled mainly 2-wide in 3rd, became 2nd over 600 metres out, kept on before fading inside final 150 metres. (Tactic questioned.)
Raced wide in rear of midfield, went wider into straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Began fairly from a wide gate, soon taken back towards the rear, produced good late impression at the finish.
Jumped awkwardly, settled one back on rails, steadied behind leader for a stride over 600 metres out, kept on before fading under pressure inside final 150 metres.
Began well, soon dropped back to forward of midfield, kept on same pace in the run home.
Never far off on rails to straight, baulked for a run after straightening, kept on steadily inside final 200 metres.
Jumped moderately, in similar position behind midfield most of way, kept on steadily in the run home.
Soon dropped to the rear, saved ground on rails turning in, ran past well-beaten horses down inside of straight.
Niggled along in forward of midfield, took closer order when 3-wide around the bend to share 3rd into the straight, weakened inside final 300 metres.
Very slowly away losing considerable ground, always struggling in last few.
Knuckled over at the start and slow to muster, travelled behind midfield around the bend, saved ground on rails turning in, soon faded under pressure.
Rated 1 out 1 back. Peeled out rounding the home turn and after hitting the front near the 250m, was never headed and drew away in the run to the wire.
Stalked the leader on the pain, had cover. Got a saloon passage along the fence in the straight and stayed on gamely.
Not the best away settling midfield the fence with cover. Made good progress down the running.
Slow to begin, settling behind midfield, the fence had cover. Railed up in the straight and closed off steadily.
Raced wide early, rolled forward to eventually travel outside the leader in 2nd position after the 1000m, 1 off no cover. Gave way over the last 100m.
Ridden along early and took up a position 3 deep with cover worse than midfield. Kept battling away right to the line.
Parked midfield, 3 wide with cover. Kept on one paced in the run to the post.
Raced midfield, 2 deep with cover. Stayed on at the same speed in the final stretch.
Settled with the backmakers, 2 wide with cover. Came wide in the straight but only plodded to the line.
Parked 2nd last on the fence with cover. Showed no dash in the home straight and never looked likely.
Travelled 2 deep with cover behind midfield. Failed to run on and gave ground in the run to the line.
Raced in last position, 2-3 wide with cover. Came under pressure near the 800m, struggled thereafter, finishing well back.
Speared forward and led along the paint. Was a beaten horse turning for home. (Bled)
Become posted 3 deep without cover after the 1200m whilst travelling behind the speed. Tailed out. (Vet reported heart irregularity after race).
Ridden forward to take the fence and led by 1L at very slow sectionals, fought on strongly to score by 1/2L.
Sent forward to settle 1L behind the leader on the fence, benefited by the very slow tempo, ran on well to get 2nd.
Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, despite harmed by the very slow pace and hampered 400M, dashed well for 3rd.
Taken back from wide barrier, settled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, despite harmed by the very slow tempo, closed off well.
Began awkwardly, then travelled 5Ls off the very slow pace, could not find a day night until 200M, worked home ok.
Raced handy 2 wide without cover, benefited by the very slow pace, however only kept on one pace to the line without any threats.
Camped midfield, settled 3Ls off the pace 2 wide with cover, harmed by the very slow pace, ran on only fairly.
At rear, travelled 6Ls off the very slow pace on the fence, switched wide turning in, never ran on.
At rear, settled 6.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, never seen any chance.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, kept on one pace until 50M weakened.
Began slowly, then settled 2Ls behind the leader 4 wide without cover throughout, flattened 150M. (Questioned for running, see incidents report)
Camped handy, travelled 2Ls off the very slow sectionals 3 wide without cover throughout, flattened badly 250M. (Questioned for running, see incidents report)
Always at rear, never a factor.
Camped handy on the fence, soon weakened badly after straightening.
Good break, nudged along 3 wide with cover fore of midfield, switched wide for grinding stretch drive, led 100m & held on.
Outpaced early & bustled, sat 1 off near rear, driven & wide progress into stretch, strong closer to press winner at wire.
Fast break to dispute lead, tracked leader 1 off no cover, driven to lead 300m, headed & no extra 100m, lost 2nd close home.
Fast start, slotted rail behind midfield, shuffled rearward & carried wide no cover 800m, hung out 600m, ran on for solid stretch gains.
Lacked early pace, bustled rail behind midfield, progress & switched out from 800m, plugged on one pace.
Sharp start, wide & ridden to outright lead 900m, crossed to rail 800m, shaken up turning in, all out & headed 300m, faded to wire.
Tardy start, rolled on outer to race handy 3 wide no cover, hard-ridden 3rd into stretch, emptied 200m & weakened out.
Smart break to dispute early lead, shifted in 800m & settled 1 back on rail, ridden into final turn, tapered in run home.
Missed break, raced last pair on rail, progress 600m, switched out & driven 400m, struggled in stretch.
Lacked pace & niggled last pair 1 off, driven at tail 400m, ran on into stretch, soon flattened & never a factor.
Broke well, to sit handy on rail, squeezed up & shuffled back 800m, under pressure 400m, weakened tamely.
Fair break, raced 1 off with cover fore of midfield, crowded & lost ground 800m, struggling turning in, soon last & eased.
Speedy start, disputed early lead, stalked 1 back on rail 3rd, switched out to challenge 400m, battled to lead 100m, in command at wire.
Sharp start, soon led & to rail, narrowly headed 1000m, shaken up & led 400m, game effort but all out & headed 100m, no extra.
Decent break, raced 1 off with cover, switched out & ridden 400m, battled on soundly for 3rd.
Bumped start, 3 wide with cover midfield, rousted 400m, determined closer centre track, just held in bid for 3rd.
Fair break, settled 1 off behind midfield, solid closer centre track for late inroads.
Awkward start, taken back to behind midfield 3 wide with cover, driven wide final turn, sound gains without threatening.
Smart start, rolled to narrow lead 1 off 1000m, under pressure & headed 400m, one-paced then tapered to wire.
Missed break, raced rail last pair, off heels & to tail 1100m, 9L last home turn, driven for minor stretch gains.
Tardy break, raced rail behind midfield, off heels & lost ground 1100m, off bridle 500m, stayed on evenly.
Broke well, camped rail midfield, switched out under pressure 400m, plugged on same speed.
Broke OK, travelled 3 wide no cover fore of midfield, driven wide home turn, struggled in run & faded out.
Tardy start, soon at tail, improved to sit last pair 1 off, widest into stretch, plugged on one pace.
Good break, raced 2nd no cover until 1 off 1 back 4th at 1000m, off bridle 450m, found nothing & wilted.
Hard ridden forward, 1L off the leader 3 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, ran on strongly to score only by a narrow margin.
Very slow away, eased back to take rail behind the field, 7Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 250M, just missed by a short head.
Pushed forward, sat outside the leader, enjoyed the slow sectionals, closed off well, ran 3rd.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on strongly until 50M, just beaten for 3rd.
2.5Ls off the slow pace, trapped 3 wide, ran on ok.
Pushed forward to take box seat, pace slow, held up most straight, not tested, just ran on.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, blocked most straight, briefly tested, just held ground.
Hard ridden early but checked, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, little dash 300M.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow tempo, blocked 4-2, ran on fairly when clear.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 8.5Ls off the leader, dashed well 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Bumped start, checked early, 5.5Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, lack turn of foot.
Behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, raced greenly, not suited by the slow tempo, no turn of foot.
Eased back, 8Ls off the leader 2-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
At back, 7Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
Jumped OK but not pushed and held rail 4 lengths from leader. Still 3 lengths back entering straight, moved out 300m and made ground steadily to hit front close home.
Soon in front but eased back to second 2 lengths from leader. Threw out challenge 400m, hit front 200m, run down close to line.
No early speed and held behind midfield away from fence 5 lengths from lead. Turned wide, made ground steadily to be closest at finish.
Taken back from wide draw to sit at rear away from fence. Kept wide turning for home, ran on steadily centre track to finish just behind place-getters.
Slow into stride but made up ground along inside to get within 4 lengths of leader entering straight. Kept on steadily without looking dangerous.
Taken back from wide draw and trailed field back stretch and turn. Still last 200m out before running past tired horses.
Taken forward but not enough speed and settled third. Put under pressure top of straight but ran out of condition from 200m.
Jumped well and hard ridden to take clear lead from 1200m, Well clear entering straight but shortened stride soon after and fell back gradually.
Began well to sit behind leaders back stretch and turn. Still within range entering straight before tiring and slipping back gradually.
No early speed and held just behind midfield along rail. Kept on steadily early in straight before tiring final 200m.
Slightly slow out patiently ridden in a rear spot, moved strongly into contention passing 500M, quickened impressively to take lead 150M and always had enough to hold off the persistent 2nd.
Dropped back to the rear from wide barrier, fanned very wide from 500M, ran on well turning in but could not match winner's acceleration, rallied final 150M, always held.
Held up 3-wide in midfield, short of room early straight, chased first 2 from 200M, finished well.
Sent forward, led uncontested at a steady pace, kept on well enough om straightening but not pace of first 3 over final 150M. (Lame next day.)
Vigorously ridden but failed to muster, 3-wide and left without cover from 700M, briefly went 2nd 300M but run ended mid-straight.
Tracked leader and kept on same pace turning for home. (Jockey reported saddle shifted near 800M and was disadvantaged for the remainder of the race.)
Taken back to the rear from wide draw, moved away from fence 600M, lacked instant acceleration, stayed on fairly final 200M.
Began awkwardly, guided to a 2-wide position behind midfield, not quickened when urged.
Close up but caught 3-wide without cover throughout, fought on briefly turning in, faded mid-straight.
Never far off from leaders but unable to quicken when the race got serious 400M, soon out of contention.
Began awkwardly, urged along to hold a position behind midfield, badly outpaced from 400M, soon behind.
Travelled strongly behind leader, came under pressure 450M, eased over final 300M. (Jockey concerned over the horse's action. To OBT and OVE.)
Jumped well and held rail behind early leader. Took closer order turn, found gap 250m, picked up momentum to hit front 100m, kept on well.
Began well and taken forward to sit three-wide 1.5 lengths from leader. Kept wide final turn but battled on steadily for hard-earned second.
Taken forward soon after start to sit 2 lengths from leader but away from fence. Got head up 350m and reluctant to shift out for run. Lay in final stages but kept on to snatch 3rd on line.
Motored quickly to the front and travelled strongly with horse on its outside. Kicked clear 400m and looked winner 200m before coming under pressure and weakening.
Taken forward from wide draw but not enough speed and held in midfield but wide. Closed in final turn and kept on steadily in straight without looking dangerous.
Began awkwardly but made ground steadily along back stretch to get within 4 lengths of leader turning for home. One-paced final 400m.
Crowded out at start and taken back across runners to rail. Closed in around turn, taken wide into straight turning one-paced final 200m.
Crowded out start and taken back across runners making up ground but wide into final turn. Kept on early in straight turning one-paced final 200m.
Jumped with field but not pushed to hold rail about 4 lengths from leader. Closed in top of straight but ran out of stamina final 200m.
Taken back from wide draw and lost touch with field back stretch. Still well back entering straight, finding nothing.
Taken to the front to sit outside leader back stretch and turn. Began to tire after entering straight and weakened badly. Lame left fore.
Dropped back to race behind midfield in running line, 5-6ls back, came 3 wide on circle, made strong bid final 300m and quickly rounded them up, went on to score easily.
Showed early speed to lead, set reasonable speed in front, challenged turn, kept on but out dashed final 200m when eventual winner shot clear, held on soundly.
Slotted into running line, around midfield 5ls back, gradually improved turning, closed evenly final 300m but no match for winner.
Held a prominent spot 1 out 1 back, ideal run throughout, right there turning, in clear from 300m but just held position in run to line.
Failed to muster early, raced in midfield 4-5ls back on rails, no excuses to turn, stayed on reasonably at same pace in straight.
Away well, crossed to race outside leader, fair run with even sections, up challenging turning, run ended final 200m and dropped away.
Away evenly, pressed on, unable to slot in and raced 3 wide although had cover, 3ls or so back, close enough turning but had no extra final 300m just staying on at same speed.

Drifted back from a wide gate, raced next to last, under pressure early to hold spot 12ls off speed, gradually tacked on, came widest in straight making many lengths to be nearest on line (see racing incidents)
No early speed, faded back, to race towards rear 8ls off speed, gradually improved to tack on to main body, made solid progress along rails to be closest at finish.
No early pace, raced behind midfield on rails6ls back, not asked in mid-section, improved to 400m, in some traffic at 200m but not really going well enough to figure and didn't get closer.
Went forward from a tricky gate, faced the breeze 3 wide without cover, did share on work in mid-section, up there challenging turning, and folded final 300m.
Took a nice spot behind the leader, had fair trip on back of speed, under pressure soon after turning, condition gave out rapidly and was disapointing.
Restrained to tail from wide gate, unable to stay in touch and became detached, always struggling and was beaten a long way.

Placing: UR
Comment: Reared and lost rider at start.
