Jumped fairly settling just better than midfield, similar turning in, quickened up well to take charge passing 200 metres.
Jumped moderately, soon dropped back to rear of midfield on rails, fought on steadily in straight to be nearest at finish.
Moderate start, took up running approaching 1200 metres, held narrow lead to straight, swamped under pressure inside final 200 metres.
Began fairly, travelled wide without cover better than midfield, took closer order 3-wide far side, disputed lead into straight, soon faded under pressure.
Broke well, settled just better than midfield on rails, inconvenienced 1000 metres out, kept on same pace from midfield into straight.
Broke well, soon dropped to last few, widest into straight, ran past well-beaten runners. (Lame)
Broke well to lead, taken back around stables bend to settle behind the leader on rails, badly unbalanced passing 1000 metres, hampered again over 400 metres out, weakened badly in straight.
Slightly slow out, soon taken across to rails, given reminders up the Rock, switched off rails for a run turning in, soon weakened. (Tactic questioned)
Began fairly, given early reminders to hold place, chased leader down far side, gave ground steadily from around home bend.
Soon dropped to rear of field after beginning from the widest gate, made no impression throughout.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race box seating. Kept to the inside in the straight and had the race in its keeping 50m out.
Parked 3 back, 1 off with cover. Swung deep on the home turn and rattled home nicely.
Took up the running on the fence. Stayed on gamely in the run to the wire.
Camped behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Came widest in the home straight and made good late ground to finish in the frame.
Travelled 1 out 1 back, was inclined to race very keenly at times in the middle stages. Kept whacking away in the run to the line.
Began awkwardly then was ridden back in the field, settling on the fence near the 600m with cover. Made reasonable late ground without ever threatening.
Worked forward eventually settling outside the leader, 1 off without cover. Was running on empty over the final 150m.
Rated 3 back the fence. Had every possible chance, was only one paced in the straight.
Travelled with the backmakers, 1 off with cover. Failed to close off.
Settled back in the field on the paint with cover. Struggled in the home stretch.
Settled in last position on the rails. Failed to pass another runner.
Settled worse than midfield, about 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite not suited by the very slow tempo, dashed on strongly inside final 100M to score by a neck.
Hard ridden to take the fence and led by 3/4L at very slow sectionals, hung on strongly until final few strides, just beaten by a neck.
Sent forward to park outside the leader, 600M switched to 3 wide, suited by the very slow pace, kept on well to get 3rd. (Questioned for riding, see incident report)
Camped handy 2 wide with cover, despite benefited by the very slow pace, stayed on steadily without any threats to take the victory.
Eased back, settled 4Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, despite harmed by the very slow pace, ran on strongly.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, benefited by the very slow pace, stayed well until final 100M unable to obtain a clear running.
Taken back from the wide gate, settled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite hampered by the very slow pace and lay in badly in straight, ran on ok.
Began only fairly, raced midfield about 3Ls off the very slow tempo 3 wide with cover, kept on one pace to the line.
Always last few, made no impression throughout.
Always at rear, never a factor.
Lacked early pace, travelled 4.5Ls off the pace 2 wide, under pressure rounding the Home Turn, weakened badly after straightening.
Good break, tracked 1 back 1 off in 4th, switched out home turn & shaken up, quickened to share lead 150m, soon led outright & drew clear.
Speed to lead initially, soon camped 2nd outside leader, hard-ridden to challenge 300m, briefly shared lead 150m, kept on same pace.
Fast break on rail, ridden to lead 1st turn, extended 1L clear back stretch, all out & headed 150m, tapered but held on for 3rd.
Sluggish start, raced rail near rear, 8L back & ridden 400m, stayed on strongly in stretch, just missed 3rd.
Slow break, bustled to rail midfield, ridden 600m, shifted out into stretch, kept on soundly.
Fair break, keen early stages, travelled midfield 1 off with cover, driven & fanned wide into stretch, boxed on one pace.
Broke OK, slotted 1 off behind midfield, ridden along 600m, under pressure turning in, boxed on for minor inroads.
Broke OK, raced rail behind midfield, driven 300m but outpaced & plugged home same speed.
Stumbled start & at tail, progress to 1 off near rear at 1000m, ridden 3 wide 600m, kept on one pace in wide stretch run.
Slow start, raced rail near rear, off heels & to tail 1000m, switched out & ridden 600m, found little in tepid stretch run.
Rousted from gate, trapped 3 wide no cover midfield, driven 500m, wide final turn, soon weakened out.
Broke well, settled 1 back on rail, hard-ridden final turn, shifted out under pressure & faded tamely.
Broke OK, raced handy 1 off with cover, driven home turn, switched out 300m, strong closer centre track to lead last strides.
Fast break, driven to grab rail & led 700m, kicked on into stretch, determined effort, all out final 50m & pipped at post.
Speed wide to press early lead, trapped 3 wide no cover 3rd, forced wider home turn, solid stretch run but never a threat.
Tardy start, recovered to midfield 1 off with cover, wide home turn, closed well centre track, just missed frame.
Early pace to lead, headed 700m & sat 2nd 1 off no cover, shaken up turning in, unable to close on lead & tapered to wire.
Slow start, raced rail near rear until progress from 600m, driven into stretch, kept on evenly.
Smart start, raced rail midfield, scrubbed to slipstream lead 500m, stuck tight to rail & every chance turning in, tapered in stretch.
Broke well, soon outpaced, raced behind midfield 3 wide with cover, found little for pressure in tepid stretch run.
Taken behind at start, clipped heels 800m & lost ground, raced at tail, plugged on moderately in stretch.
Good break wide, snagged back to slot 1 off with cover behind midfield, scrubbed along 500m, struggled in run home.
Broke well, trapped 3 wide midfield, widest into stretch, found nothing & faded tamely.
Eased to sit in midfield and soon took rail, 3.5Ls off the slow pace, dashed well and kicked away 200M to score.
Pushed early to attempt to cross in midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly despite all negative racing situations, ran 2nd.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, benefited by the slow sectionals, just ran on for 3rd.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, checked in back straight, held up 5-3, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well when clear.
Eased at start to take rail behind the field, 7Ls off the leader, dashed well 300M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed to hold the rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 200M flattened.
Slow away, hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, just held ground.
Eased to rear, 8Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok in straight.
Hard ridden to take forward spot 2 wide, however was shuffled backward from 1000M, harmed by the slow pace, never improved.
Pushed early but not muster, trapped 3 wide throughout, 4Ls off the slow pace, made early move, weakened 300M.
Hard ridden forward, trapped 3-4 wide early, sat just off the leader 2 wide, suited by the slow tempo, emptied 300M.
Hard ridden forward, 2.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, soon dropped off 600M.
Began awkwardly, steadied soon after start, scrubbed up inside horses to sit 2-back along fence. Peeled out 400m and ran home strongly to just get there.
Jumped well, sat behind leader along fence. Moved out slightly entering straight and ran on strongly but pipped on line.
Not pushed early and settled behind midfield close to fence. Sneaked up inside horses turning for home and kept on well to the line.
Hard ridden from wide draw to take lead and cross over to rail at 1000m. Steadied pace back stretch, kicked clear 400m, kept on well before swamped final stages.
Began well and travelled comfortably one-back one-off. Looked chance 200m but one-paced final. Substantial blood in trachea.
Jumped fairly and proved difficult to settle from 900m. Steadied 600m when close to heels. Taken wide into straight, kept on steadily.
Beaten for early pace and settled at rear. Still well back turning for home, taken to centre of track and finished off nicely.
Taken back across horses from wide draw and trailed field back stretch and turn. Took inside run 400m making good late ground.
Began well but restrained behind horses to find cover. Proved difficult to settle when pace slackened. Taken wide straight but one-paced.
Began awkwardly and drifted to rear along fence. Kept on rail back stretch and turn, one-paced final 400m. Blood in trachea.
Began OK and then driven forward but wide to put pressure on leader. Started to give ground shortly after entering straight.
Jumped well but unable to slot in and kept wide when pace slackened. Turned wide into straight and tired quickly.
Positively ridden, crossed to the rail from draw 10 with ease, travelled smoothly throughout, took inside route final 300M, made steady headway, got to the front 50M and prevailed in a close finish.
Restrained, settled well in last pair, bid wide 400M, finished fastest down outside and was just touched off on the line.
Caught wide from wide barrier, strode closer to leaders passing 1200M, responded well to hold narrow lead mid-straight, caught by first two close home.
Caught 3-wide in midfield, left with no cover from 1000M, strode forward to lead, headed 250M but battled on gamely to hold 4th.
Soon crossed to a 2-wide spot, never far off from leaders, ran on final 300M but always held by leaders.
Not hurried, dropped back to the rear 6Ls off the pace, 3-wide for much of the way, finished off mildly and never a serious threat.
Dropped back, travelled 3-wide near the rear in first half, moved closer to pace from 600M when left with no cover, had his chance but lacked further response inside 200M.
Held up 2-wide behind midfield, kept on same pace in straight and unable to make any headway.
Began well from draw 1, not far off early stages but got shuffled back to a rear spot after first turn, had plenty to do 300M, switched wide and stayed on fairly.
Slow to begin, restrained to a rearward position and proved difficult to settle under early slow pace, switched wide 300M, closed off fairly.
Made some use early from wide barrier, led 1200M-700M, lacked further response turning in, faltered nearing 200M and faded.
Prominent early, shuffled back to midfield halfway, checked 500M lost position, came up empty when urged.

Soon took up running on rails setting an even pace, kicked over 4L clear inside final 100 metres, tiring at the finish but the post came on time.
Settled well back, made significant progress down the centre of the straight from last turning in, given too much to do despite the strong late kick.
Began fairly, settled in midfield on rails, hampered coming out of back straight, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Travelled mainly 3-wide in midfield, fought on steadily without threatening.
Settled in last few, made modest progress in straight under pressure.
Broke well, settled mainly in 4th on rails, badly hampered twice on rails and lost position passing 400 metres, recovered some ground turning in, ran home one-paced.
Settled in last few, baulked for a run 200 metres out, ran home one-paced down the centre of the track.
Jumped fairly from a wide draw, with leaders 3-wide early stages, settled just off the pace without cover down far side, gradually weakened into straight, hung in under pressure.
Travelled wide without cover better than midfield, gained 2L 2nd rounding home bend, folded up quickly upon straightening.
Broke well from the middle draw, gradually taken back to settle better than midfield in 5th far side, hampered and lost position around the bend, never recovered. (Lame next day.)
Ridden along early to the front then was crossed approaching the first turn settling 1 out 1 back. Worked home gamely to clinch the race in the shadows of the post.
Held the rails in 2nd position. Was in front turning for home but was nailed close to the line.
Could not match the early speed of the race and drifted back to settle worse than midfield on the rails with cover. Finished off willingly.
Raced midfield the fence, had cover. . Maintained a sound gallop right to the wire.
Parked 3 back, 2 deep with cover. Made steady progress down the running.
Camped behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Finished off evenly.
Settled a clear last close to the rail, had cover. Worked home well.
Did plenty of work in the early stages to lead, but was unable to cross to the fence and raced 1 off. Was a spent force near the 150m.
Travelled with the backmakers. 1 off with cover. Plodded to the line down the outside.
Managed to slot in and take up the box seat, approaching the 600m. Was a beaten horse before the furlong.
Crowded at the start then settled back in the field, 3 deep with cover. Failed to make any appreciable ground in the straight.
Coursed 3 deep without cover midfield. Never a factor.
Sent forward to settle 0.5Ls outside the leader, travelled strongly and kicked clear soon after straightening, scored impressively by 2.5Ls.
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, dashed on well but without any threats to the winner for 2nd.
Camped handy, travelled 2Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, ran on steadily to get 3rd.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, under pressure rounding the Home Turn, kept on steadily without quickening.
Pushed to settle in 5th position, travelled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, had every possible chance in straight, however only kept on one pace to the line.
Began awkwardly, then settled 9.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, made some ground in straight.
Settled worse than midfield about 7Ls off the pace 2 wide, swung wide turning in, ran on only fairly.
Raced midfield, niggled along rounding the Home Turn, kept on one pace to the line.
At rear, settled 10Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on only fairly.
Lacked early pace, travelled 6.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, never competitive.
Always at rear, never a factor.
Sent forward to take the fence and led by 1L, flattened badly soon after straightening, tailed out.
Broke well, stalked 1 back on rail until driven to lead 200m, strong run to wire.
Awkward break, raced rail midfield, trapped in pocket home turn, not clear run & off heels 200m, closed late for 2nd.
Fair start, sat midfield until switched 3 wide 900m & rolled to lead 700m, headed 500m, driven into stretch & boxed on for 3rd.
Disputed early lead until led narrowly 1000m, headed 700m but regained 500m, shifted out on turn, headed 200m & tapered to wire.
Led at break, snagged to sit handy 1 off with cover, trapped in pocket home turn & not clear run in stretch, not fully tested.
Fair break, speed to race handy but caught 3 wide no cover, wide into stretch & kept on one pace.
Taken behind from widest gate to rail behind midfield, hampered 1000m, hard-ridden in stretch for minor inroads.
Broke well, sat fore of midfield 1 off with cover, switched 3 wide with cover 700m, one-paced & tapered in stretch run.
Tardy break & driven early, raced last pair on outer, driven 500m, shifted out 300m & plugged on evenly.
Slow start, camped behind midfield & forced 3 wide 1000m, driven widest home turn, one-paced in run.
Broke well & driven to dispute lead on outer, settled 2nd 1 off no cover 1000m, shuffled back 700m, under pressure on turn & faded in stretch.
Missed break, raced at tail on rail, ridden on turn, found nothing & soon beaten.
Tardy start, held up in rear, wide progress from 600m, widest into stretch, surging centre track run to lead 100m, drew clear.
Restrained at start, keen early 1 off with cover behind midfield, switched wide & crowded turning in, driven to lead 200m, headed & no extra 100m.
Broke OK, raced rail behind midfield, progress on turn, driven 300m & switched off fence, challenged lead 200m, tapered to wire.
Broke sharply, raced rail midfield, shaken up 300m, boxed on one pace.
Fast break, crossed to dispute lead on rail, settled 1 back, ridden turning in, every chance when switched out 300m, outpaced & faded in run.
Broke well, caught 3 wide with cover behind midfield, wide into stretch, boxed on same speed.
Good break, snagged back to rail near rear, driven at tail 600m, plugged on tamely.
Smart break, raced midfield 1 off with cover, ridden wide 500m, found little turning in, tepid stretch run.
Speed to cross & dispute lead 1st turn, led outright 1000m & soon to rail, all out 300m, headed 250m & dropped away.
Fair break, over-raced early, handy 1 off with cover, shifted out 400m, crowded & badly checked turning in, no extra & faded.
Broke well, caught 3 wide no cover close up, worked hard to go 2nd on outer 600m, driven 400m, emptied & weakened out rapidly.
Pushed forward, sat 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, closed off strongly 250M to score by narrow margin.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 300M, just beaten by a short head in 2nd.
Hard ridden forward, 1L off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed the slow sectionals, led 200M, hung on until 50M, ran on for 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed well 300M, run ended 100M.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, race keenly, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, ran on until 200M flattened.
Eased back and took rail, 5.5Ls off the leader, checked 600M, harmed by the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden to hold the box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, however out of fuel 200M.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader along the fence, checked 600M, not suited by the slow tempo, ran on fairly in straight, on heels 30M.
Eased at start to take rail towards rear, 8Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, hung in badly in straight, no dash.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, flattened in straight.
Hard ridden but not muster, trapped 3 wide throughout, 3Ls off the slow pace, reduced quickly 300M.
Jumped well, ridden along early before settling in box seat behind leaders. Got inside run entering straight and battled strongly to win close home.
Jumped only fairly but quickly ridden up to hold rail inside leader. Got to front at turn, battled bravely in straight to hold off challenges until peaking final stages.
No early speed and allowed to settle 3-back, one-off back stretch and turn. Peeled out 400m and ran on strongly under whip.
Bumped and taken back across runners. Became detached from main bunch at turn, peeled out before forced to switch in 350m. Not tested final 100m when close on heels.
Began well and raced behind early pace away from fence. Switched out 400m to make run, kept on steadily before peaking final stages.
Taken to the rail on settling about 4L from leader. Switch out approaching straight and kept on steadily without looking dangerous.
Jumped best and hard ridden to lead but held out and eased to sit on hind-quarters of leader 700m. Gave ground soon after straightening and finished well back. (See racing incidents)
Query about action before start. Became detached soon after start despite being ridden vigorously and finished tailed off. Performance considered unacceptable. (See racing incidents)
Obtained the lead easily approaching first turn, led unchallenged setting even pace, kept responding final 300M, had rivals well held and was never in danger.
Reserved in midfield, had a smooth run throughout, ran on steadily to go 2nd inside 100M but was well held by the winner.
Tracked leader in a steadily run race, kept on final 300M but unable to pose a serious threat to the front-running winner, lost 2nd inside 100M.
Switched off to near the rear, shaken up 500M,made progress when pulled out wide in straight, finished best of the chasing group to claim 4th but made no impression on the first two.
Held up 2-wide behind midfield, put to pressure nearing 500M, plugged on without threatening the leaders.
Never far off from the pace, angled out inside 300M to challenge but lacked the acceleration, kept on same pace final 150M.
Dropped back from 11, patiently held up towards the rear, driven out 300M but gave only limited response.
Positively ridden out the gate, tracked leader in a 2-wide position, all out inside 300M but soon outpaced and faded.
Driven early but not going fast enough to cross, caught 3-wide without cover throughout, no extra final 150M and gave way.
Taken back from wide barrier, settled in last 7Ls off the pace, struggled to keep up 600M, never in contention.

Shared pace early, took up running after first 200 metres, obtained rails run coming out of back straight, held narrow lead turning for home, just held off challenges under pressure.
Began fairly, gradually settled 3-wide in midfield, remained same around the bend, ran on well in straight to be nearest at finish.
Jumped moderately settling in last few, snuck up on rails entering straight, continued progress after straightening but held up in traffic until 150 metres out.
Hard ridden to contest lead from a wide draw, held back to obtain cover one-out-one-back coming out of back straight, kept on steadily without quickening in the run home.

Jumped well from the widest gate, raced wide without cover with leaders far wide and 2-wide outside leader around the bend, kept on well under pressure in straight until finding no extra passing 100 metres.
Broke well, soon taken back to last few, remained similar to straight, ran on well down the centre of the track.
Jumped well, settled in 5th mainly 3L off the speed, commenced move approaching straight, kept on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Jumped moderately, ridden in midfield early stages, raced keenly briefly around home bend, kept on same pace in the run home.
Sluggish at start travelling well behind, saved a lot of ground turning in, made up good ground down inside of straight to be nearest at finish.
Jumped moderately, settled just worse than midfield, kept on steadily without quickening.
Began moderately from the one draw, soon picked up pace to join leaders, taken back to 2L 3rd on rails around the bend, faded inside final 300 metres.
Almost dislodged rider at start, soon recovered to better than midfield in 6th on rails, baulked for a run early in straight, hung in 200 metres out, faded closing stages.
Slowly away, always struggling at the back.
Never better than midfield, dropped out tamely in straight.
Parked in 5th position and required to endure a tough run in transit, 3 deep no cover. Closed off well to get up close to the post.
Raced 3 back on the rails with cover. Responded well to vigorous riding and was in front at the furlong, but was nailed close to the line.
Settled ahead of midfield, 2 wide with cover. Maintained a good gallop right to the wire.
Tracked close to midfield, 1 off with cover. Ranged up in the straight but peaked on its run inside the 50m.
Stalked, the leader on the fence in the early stages. Hung out near the 800m, shifted out then raced 1 out 1 back. Looked likely to figure in the finish but was overhauled late.
Slow to begin settling at the tail of the field on the paint with cover. Made reasonable late ground.
Settled outside the leader. Was carried wider after the 800m, shifted back in to race 2nd position 2 deep no cover, approaching the 650m. faded over the latter stages.
Travelled worse than midfield, on the rails with cover. R Finished off evenly.
Parked midfield the fence with cover. Worked home fairly, held up close to the line.
Travelled at the tail of the field, 2 deep with cover. Made steady ground in the final stretch.
Positioned 3 deep with cover midfield. Was inclined to hang out on the circle, plodded to the line.
Sent forward and led along the paint. Was a beaten horse at the furlong and tired easily thereafter.
Raced at the rear, 3 deep with cover. Failed to close off.
Raced worse than midfield 1 off with cover. Gave nothing in the straight and tailed out.
Smart began, soon came across to the stands rail, under pressure 300M, battled on strongly to win by a short head.
Camped handy, looked travelled comfortably until 200M, fought on well but could not prove extra, beaten by a short head.
Rolled forward to take the lead, under pressure 300M, fought on well but not match with the first two, beaten by a short head.
Last few early, gradually improved to midfield from 800M, under pressure near the course proper, worked home nicely.
Hard ridden along early, raced 2.5Ls behind the leader, kept on one pace until 100M finished off nicely.
Raced midfield, travelled 2Ls off the pace, under pressure near the course proper, ran on ok.
Gradually improved to share the lead, kept on well until 200M weakened.
Showed good early pace to share the lead until 200M weakened.
At rear, settled 5Ls behind the leader, made some ground over the final stages.
Camped handy early, checked 700M, never looked likely thereafter.
At rear throughout, struggled to run to the line.
Always at rear, never looked competitive.
Raced midfield, under pressure near the course proper, never a factor.
Camped midfield, 2Ls off the leader, travelled well until 300M flattened.
Early speed to sit close 2nd, driven 400m, led narrowly 200m, lugged into rival slightly under pressure, just held on.
Broke well, raced close 3rd, ridden to press lead 300m, narrowly held in tight duel to wire.
Sluggish break & crowded, recovered & settled mid-pack stands' side, ridden & switched toward centre track 300m, ran on soundly for 3rd.
Good break, raced handy 4th, driven 400m, one-paced in closing stages.
Fair start, nudged along in midfield, hard-ridden 500m, kept on same speed.
Fast break, driven to early lead, crossed to stands' rail, shaken up 300m, headed 200m, tapered thereafter.
Slow start, soon recovered but over-raced 800m & shuffled to back of pack, driven 450m, battled on evenly centre track.
Smart start, settled back & soon at rear of pack, under pressure 500m & hard-driven 400m, stayed on dourly for minor inroads.
Broke OK, niggled early, settled rail behind midfield, driven 400m & switched off fence, boxed on moderately.
Broke well, raced handy on fence, ridden 400m, found little & plugged home tamely.
Broke well, covered back in pack, hard-ridden 400m, eased off heels 300m, found little & eased when beaten.
Decent break, raced midfield centre track until outpaced & dropped away from 600m, well beaten.
Awkward break, detached at tail, signs of greenness, kept on same speed, never a factor.
Broke OK, raced widest at rear of main group, soon under pressure, driven 500m & tailed out.
Good break, raced 4 back in 4th, taken 4 wide home turn, smooth advance to lead 150m, close duel but in command final strides.
Fast break, settled 3 back in 3rd, 3 wide turning in, shaken up to press lead 300m, led 200m, soon headed but battled on gamely.
Sluggish start, settled rail midfield, shifted out turning in, not clear run in stretch, quickened late to make frame.
Speed to lead, set solid tempo on fence, 1L clear & driven 400m, headed 200m, boxed on determinedly but tapered.
Tardy start, rolled to fore of midfield on inner, shifted out 600m, every chance when driven 300m, ran home evenly.
Sharp start, sat 2nd in leader's slipstream, switched 1 off turning in, hard-ridden 300m, kept on one pace.
Fair start, taken back to slot last pair 1 off , 8L back 400m, switched centre track & stayed on for moderate gains.
Snagged back from wide gate to rail last pair, plugged on evenly under stretch drive for some inroads.
Taken back from wide gate, sat near rear 1 off with cover, driven turning in, kept on for minor inroads.
Slow start, sat mid pack 1 off with cover, hard-ridden 400m, plugged on one pace.
Missed break, rousted to settle rail behind midfield, steadied 600m, driven into stretch, one-paced to wire.
Broke OK, bustled early to race midfield no cover on outer, niggled 600m, found nothing in home straight & faded.
Taken behind from widest gate, last pair until minor advance 3 wide 900m, under pressure & wider home turn, never a factor.
Fair break, steadied but unable to slot, sat midfield wide no cover, weakened tamely from top of stretch.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, progressed steadily 300M to score.
Pressed forward, sat outside the leader, not suited by the fast sectionals, closed off strongly for 2nd.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader along the rails, favoured by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 300M for 3rd.
Hard ridden forward, 3Ls off the fast pace, trapped 3 wide, ran on strongly to the line.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast pace and the rail trip, made steady ground 200M.
At back, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 200M.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, checked 900M, made ground 250M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, benefited by the fast pace, just held ground in straight.
Pressed forward, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, lost momentum 900M, ran on ok in straight.
Midfield early, however trapped very wide, moved forward 1400M, still trapped 3 wide outside the lead, harmed by the fast pace, out of fuel 250M.
Took rail and lead, under pressure throughout, clocked fast sectionals, hung on until 250M emptied.
At rear, 7Ls off the leader 3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, ran on fairly.
Took back, 6Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, suited by the fast pace, but no progress.
Began only fairly but allowed to slide forward to sit inside leader on settling. Not pressured until 300m when popped the question and pulled ahead for clear win.
Taken forward shortly after start to sit behind leading pair. Revved up final 200m and finished off nicely.
No early speed but not far behind leading group 400m. Gained momentum gradually and doing best work at the finish.
Best out and set good pace to 400m when put under pressure. Kept on well before tiring final strides, just missing out on a place.
Jumped nicely but did not stride out and under pressure from 600m. Unbalanced 400m, laboured to the line. Substantial blood in trachea (see Racing Incidents)
Hampered shortly after start before settling between horses in midfield. Unbalanced when in restricted room 600m. Kept on one-paced.
Began awkwardly and then unbalanced when crowded after start. Stayed on grandstand rail and kept on steadily without looking dangerous.
Beaten for early speed and unable to switch out, racing on its own down centre track. Put under pressure from 500m but found little.
No early speed and last on settling. Trailed field thereafter without making any ground.
Began awkwardly but soon recovered, travelled well in midfield 4-5Ls off the pace, made smooth headway when taking out 450M, shot clear inside 200M, kept on strongly despite drifting in final stages.
Not far off early stages, steadied near 500M and lost position, got back to it passing 300M, closed off well to claim 2nd near line but no impression on winner.
Within striking distance always, had every chance when presented with clear run 400M, couldn't match winner's pace, kept on steadily to hold 2nd until headed final strides.

Taken across behind runners, behind midfield and proved difficult to settle middle stages, badly held up major part of straight, ran on when clear final 100M and steadily getting to the 3rd. (Protest on 3rd overruled.)
Not hurried early stages, reserved near the rear, had difficulty obtaining clear run early straight, stayed on final 200M without threatening.
Switched off to last, waited with till passing 350M, closed well from off the pace.
Settled towards the rear, 3-wide for much of the way, brought widest turning home, made steady progress. Encouraging effort.
Positively ridden from wide barrier, tracked leader 2-wide, kept on same pace when placed under pressure turning home, out of contention 150M.
Held up near the rear in a 2-wide spot, hung badly early straight and was slow to pick up when balanced, awkwardly placed final stages and not able to be ridden out. (Jockey questioned.)
Sent forward, led uncontested at a steady tempo to straight, kept on same pace when driven out, headed inside 250M, no extra final stages.
Settled well on the heels of the leader, badly held up along the fence in straight, not properly tested.
Niggled along to keep up with the early pace, caught 3-wide no cover to straight, found little under pressure, out of contention mid-straight.
Positioned ahead of midfield along the 3-path, bid wide 600M, outpaced 300M, steadied mid-straight and eased.
Travelled 3-wide in midfield, difficult to settle passing 800M, not quickened turning in, never factored.
Taken to the front on settling and set slow sectionals. Kicked clear entering straight, kept on well while drifting out under whip final 200m.
Taken forward and in box seat behind leader on settling. No clear run entering straight, followed leader till getting clear 200m. Kept on steadily.
Leaning on stall when gates opened and slow. Held wide at rear before turn, switched out 400m, finished off nicely, shifting in final 200m.
Jumped well, settling behind leading pack but away from fence, Moved out 400m to make challenge and kept on steadily.
Began well but kept wide. Raced in restricted room 1200m, badly unbalanced 900m when bumped and left wide with no cover. Kept on steadily.
Jumped OK and shifted in to get closer to rail. Lost position and drifted to rear when pace slacked. Taken wide entering straight and closed off nicely.
Not suited by pace and held wide back stretch. Forced to shift out 900m. Made ground early straight before being awkwardly placed closing stages. Not ridden out.
Ridden forward from wide draw, shifting in gradually to sit on hind quarters of leader entering turn. Started to give ground soon after entering straight.
No early speed and held wide back stretch when pace of race slackened. Turned wide and only one-paced final 200m.
No early speed and last on settling. Improved position along rail entering turn but found little under hard riding in straight.
Unable to make use of good draw and not suited by slow pace, drifting back to behind midfield. Under pressure from 400m and awkwardly placed final 150m.
Jumped well and taken forward but lost right front plate on settling. Shifted out abruptly and left wide without cover 900m. Kept on early in straight before tiring from 200m.
Not suited by slow pace and settled along rail in midfield. No clear running in straight until final stages and not tested.
Taken forward from wide draw but unable to cut in and restrained before severely checked 900m. Tired quickly in straight.
Took a trail behind speed 3ls back on fence. Enjoyed an easy trip throughout, made run between horses at 300m, dashed well and soon established a break to win comfortably.
Angled into running line 5ls off speed, enjoyed a fait trip in mid-section, brought wider turning with a strong run, closed soundly picking up all but winner.
Went forward and raced outside leader, tempo was ok throughout, up challenging rounding bend and niggled along, kept finding in straight to stay in contention and take a place.
Dropped in to race behind midfield 5ls back, came 2 wide on circle, still in traffic to 300m, worked home nicely when clear to just miss 3rd.
Restrained from a tricky gate, raced 6ls back in running line behind midfield, angled wider turning, closed off well making up ground to be nearest on line and just miss frame.
Began well, used a little to get to front, kept tempo even throughout, defied them to 250m before headed, stayed on fairly thereafter.
Restrained to rear from outside alley, well back more than 8ls from top end, switched widest turning, closed off well from impossible spot.
Crowded early and settled behind midfield, 6ls off lead, didn't settle in mid-section, back in traffic turning, just produced a 1 paced close holding ground in straight.
Fair beginning, mustered to hold a midfield spot 4ls back in running line, improved approaching bend, clear running presented soon after turning, peaked at 250m and folded when run ended.
Out well, used a bit early then restrained to hold leaders back, fair run thereafter, niggled on turning, fitness gave out and gradually dropped off.
No early pace and ended up sharing rear 7-8ls back, still well back turning, only passed tired ones in straight making no real progress (blood in trachea)
Drifted back from a wide gate, raced 3 and 4 wide at tail 7-8ls back, set too much to do in mid-section, made no impression in straight.
Fairly away, caught 3 wide from an outside gate, had cover 3ls off speed, kept working to bend, soon under pressure and weakened out.
Pressed on from a wide gate but couldn't cross, raced 3 wide without cover 1l off lead, used to much in mid-section, faded out when hard run took toll to be beaten a long way.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jumped fairly, soon gained narrow lead, obtained rails run in front 1500 metres out, hung on well under pressure from tame challenges.
Broke well from the widest gate, soon taken back to one-out-one-back position far side, gained 2nd coming out of back straight, unable to peg back winner the length of home straight.
With leaders on rails early, gradually settled in forward of midfield from 1400 metres out, switched off rails for a run entering straight, kept on steadily under pressure.
Began moderately, settled towards the rear, came closer to midfield 3-wide around the bend, sustained progress down home straight without threatening.
Jumped moderately, soon taken back to rear to race on rails, trailed the field into home straight, ran on past well-beaten horses in the run home.
Jumped moderately, soon picked up to rear of midfield, gradually shuffled back towards the rear approaching home bend, ran home one-paced.
Jumped awkwardly losing ground, soon recovered to settle just worse than midfield on rails, no response under pressure in straight. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Slowly away, always well back, wide around home bend, came under pressure into straight, found nothing.

Broke well, soon taken back to midfield, race 3-wide without cover coming onto course proper over 1400 metres out, gained closer rounding home bend, soon weakened after straightening. (Tactic questioned.)
Jumped well, amongst leaders early, obtained rails run in 2nd over 1400 metres out, remained one-back in 3rd around home bend, folded up quickly upon straightening.
Made its run from last position, 1 off with cover. Shifted out widest in the straight and closed off strongly.
Began well then was taken back to settle fourth from the rear, 3 wide with cover. Swung wide on the home turn and finished off willingly.
Raced in about a midfield position, 3 wide with cover. Rallied late and finished off gamely.
Travelled on the paint, midfield with cover. Closed of well despite being inconvenienced near the furlong.
Camped ahead of midfield, 2 deep with cover. Peaked on its run passing the 150m.
Raced towards the rear, on the rails with cover. Kept on alright in the final stretch.
Settled after the 800m 3 back the fence, with cover. Kept towards the inside in the straight, tired over the final 50m.
Covered ground 3 deep without cover, eventually settling outside the leader near the 500m. Commenced to tire over the final 100m.
Parked worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Whacked away at the same speed in the home straight.
Settled at the tail of the field 1 off the fence with cover. Only plodded to the line.
Worked forward and eventually crossed to lead on the fence after the 900m. Faded over the final furlong. (returned with mucopus)
Raced up on the speed, settling 1 out 1 back on the circle. Struggled in the home straight.
Ridden back in the field, 4 deep, got some cover on the circle. Coursed wide and beaten horse a long way from home.
Handed up near the 800m and box seated thereafter. Capitulated in the straight and tailed out. (To trial).
Travelled about 1-3/4L off the leader 2 wide with cover, over raced 700M, then switched to 3 wide without cover, however ran on impressively soon after straightening and scored by 3/4L.
Camped midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, ran on well but without threatening to the winner.
Settled worse than midfield about 3.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, dashed on strongly but without any threats to the first two.
Taken back to rear, settled 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, dashed well to get 4th.
Lacked early pace, travelled 2.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, blocked early straight, ran on only fairly thereafter.
Camped midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader 4 wide with cover, never ran on.
Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls off the pace 4 wide without cover, ran on only fairly until 150M weakened.
Rolled forward to settle 1L off the pace 2 wide with cover, stayed on one pace until 150M weakened.
Rolled forward to obtain the box seat, kept on one pace until 250M weakened.
At rear, settled 4.5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, showed nothing after straightening.
Settled worse than midfield about 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, held up early straight, never ran on thereafter.
Pushed forward to take the fence and led by 3/4L, weakened badly 300M. (Questioned for disappointing performance, see incident report)
Hard ridden forward to park outside the leader, flattened badly soon after straightening.
Taken back from a wide gate, travelled 6Ls behind the leader 4 wide with cover throughout, never looked likely.
Good start, raced 3 wide with cover fore of midfield, shaken up 400m, checked off heels 350m, rallied & rattled to lead close home.
Awkward start, bustled to settle rail fore of midfield, chased on inner in home stretch, switched out 200m, strong closer to grab 2nd at line.
Fast start to lead 1 off, headed 1000m, sat on leader's flank, driven turning in, battled to lead 250m, all out close home, headed last strides.
Broke with others, caught 4 wide no cover midfield, ridden 500m, chased winner centre track, just missed frame.
Broke well, raced 1 off with cover midfield, on bridle but not clear running in stretch, shaken up 200m, closed off late without threatening.
Snagged back from wide, sat 2 wide at tail, 8L back at turn & switched widest into stretch, closed well for sound inroads.
Taken back at break, raced 3 deep near rear, ridden 500m, wide into stretch, ran on for minor gains.
Broke well, snagged back to 3 wide with cover midfield, crowded 700m, driven turning in, badly impeded 320m, one-paced thereafter.
Sharp start, driven wide to lead 1000m, to rail 900m, kicked in front 400m, headed 250m, faded thereafter.
Fair break, rolled on rail to sit 1 back 3rd , steadied off heels 800m, driven home turn, shifted out in run, found nothing & faded.
Slow start, sat 1 off with cover near rear, ridden 400m, plodded home one pace.
Broke OK, raced 3 wide no cover 4th, every chance turning in, high head carriage & shifted out under pressure, weakened tamely.
Broke well, raced 1 off with cover fore of midfield, shaken up 400m, sandwiched & snatched up 250m, eased thereafter.
Sluggish early, raced rail near rear, driven home turn, found nothing & never a factor.
Sharp start from wide, rolled to lead & crossed to rail 1000m, cruised into stretch, shaken up 400m & extended clear, comfortable.
Taken back to slot 3 wide with cover near rear, switched wider 500m, driven 400m, stayed on to edge 2nd at wire, well held.
Taken to rear 1 off with cover from wide gate, switched out into final turn, sustained centre track run to snag 3rd on line.
Fast start to dispute lead, settled handy 1 off with cover, crowded 400m, driven in pursuit, stayed on evenly.
Slow start, to rail & rolled to midfield, driven & switched out 400m, stayed on evenly.
Tardy start, mustered on rail to sit handy, driven 400m, kept on one pace.
Broke OK, pace to dispute early lead, stalked leader 1 off no cover, ridden into home turn, kept on in pursuit until tapered late.
Broke OK, raced midfield 1 off with cover, off heels & shuffled back 900m, 5L back turning in, plugged on for minor inroads.
Snagged from widest gate to race at tail, switched wide for progress 800m, very wide on turn, ran on one pace.
Tardy break, mustered & raced fore of midfield 1 off with cover, steadied & shuffled back 900m, switched 3 wide 600m, plodded on tamely.
Broke well, snagged back to 3 wide with cover behind midfield, forced wider 600m, crowded home turn, one paced in run home.
Snagged back to race rail in rear, ridden 400m, plodded on tamely.
Fair start, trapped 4 wide no cover, advanced on turn, 3rd into home stretch, driven 400m, faded in run.
Broke OK, raced midfield 3 wide no cover, rolled to sit handy 800m, crowded 400m, snatched off heels 320m, no extra.
Rolled forward, traveled strongly just behind the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, closed off strongly, dominated 150M, not fully tested.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, held up 400M-200M, dashed well when clear for 2nd.
Hard ridden forward, settled out the lead, enjoyed the slow sectionals, ran on well for 3rd.
Slow away, at rear, 6Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 250M.
Pushed to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Eased at start, always at rear, 8Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, hung in whilst being ridden out, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Behind midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader, trapped 4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, hung in badly in straight, checked 300M, little dash.
Pushed to hold the rail midfield, 3Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow pace, flattened 200M.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 0.5L at slow sectionals, hung on until 250M, out of fuel.
Behind midfield, 4Ls off the leader 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, ran on ok.
Eased back and took rail, 6.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow tempo, ran on ok in straight.
Hard ridden to take a midfield spot, 3Ls off the leader 3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, reduced 350M.
Behind midfield, 4.5Ls of the leader 2 wide, raced greenly, not suited by the slow tempo, emptied 400M.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 4Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, dropped off 400M.
Jumped well, taken forward from wide draw to sit outside leader before dropping to 3rd around turn. Kicked clear 350m and ran on well.
No early speed and kept three-wide at the rear. Taken out further entering straight and finished off strongly.
Raced tightly early before dropping behind midfield away from fence, Improved position around turn, swung very wide 400m, kept on steadily.
Jumped well but refused to settle racing keenly around turn. Switched out entering straight and boxed on. Found to have bled.
Beaten for early speed before finding rail and making ground to be close turning for home. Kept on steadily.
Jumped fairly, hard ridden to get forward, took lead at 400m but soon passed. Jockey fined for not riding out to finish (See racing incidents).
Taken back from wide draw and last of main bunch before turn. Taken very wide entering straight and finished off nicely.
Ridden up with the pace before raced tightly 1300m and then left wide without cover from 900m. One-paced final 400m.
No early speed and drifted back from wide draw to sit at rear away from fence. Made some ground early in straight before tiring.
Jumped well and held rail two-back from leader. Came off fence turning for home but found little final 400m.
Began awkwardly and taken back across runners to find rail. Made ground early straight before running on empty.
Jumped shadow but mustered quicky to take easy lead. Challenged around turn, passed entering straight and faded.
Jumped fairly and refused to stretch out despite vigorous riding. Soon lost contact and tailed off. Rider reported abnormal breathing. Unacceptable performance. (See racing incidents).
Began well, soon in front sharing the lead under a keen hold, burst away when ridden 350M, shifted out considerably final 200M when well clear of rivals. Very impressive.
Taken across behind runners, patiently ridden in a rearward spot 4-5Ls off the pace, badly held up until 300M, ran on to go 2nd 50M from line but no impression on the runaway winner.
Broke well from draw 1, settled behind midfield along the fence, ran on steadily for 3rd but never a threat to the winner.
Up close tracking leaders, pulled out to challenge final 300M, kept on steadily to finish but unable to keep a straight line when his inside rival kept drifting out.
Vigorously ridden to a forward position, shared lead on outside, kept on but had no answer to winner's sudden burst of acceleration, drifted out and hung on to 2nd until 50M, no extra towards finish.
Began well but soon outpaced by leaders, shuffled back to a rearward position making the turn, bid wide 500M, stayed on for non-threatening 6th.
Raced a shade keen in midfield, angled out 450M, slow to pick up, stayed on well final 200M.
Dropped back to the rear from wide barrier, 7Ls off the pace in middle stages, brought widest 400M, made limited progress.
Began awkwardly, soon driven to a position behind leaders, ran on one-paced inside 400M, weakened 100M.
Held up 2-wide in midfield, ran on fairly and never a serious threat to leaders.
Niggled along to hold a position behind midfield, caught wide throughout, not quickened to challenge inside 400M, never threatened.
Fractious and reared in stalls, chased leaders in a 3-wide position, kept on same pace until no extra inside 200M. (To OBT.)
Eased back, at the rear 7Ls off the pace in middle stages, had nothing to offer turning home, never a factor.
Sent forward, inclined to hang out and unable to cross, 3-wide no cover turning home, outpaced inside 450M, gave ground rapidly.
Bumped start and settled at rear away from fence, Still last 400m, shifted in off heels, no run till 200m when found split and finished strongly.
Blundered start and badly hampered before turn, slipping to behind midfield. Made ground gradually in straight, hit from 100m, run down closing.
Taken back from wide draw and settled at rear away from fence. Got close to heels 500m, no run till 300m, finished off strongly.
Used early to get forward position and over-raced when pace slacked, throwing head up and racing greenly. Shifted in abruptly 200m but boxed on gamely.
Quickly into stride and led field before dropping into box seat before turn. Retook lead 400m, still clear 200m before weakening final stages.
Got way nicely and settled along fence two-back from leader. Left rail rounding turn to find run but only one-paced final 400m.
Taken back from wide draw but able to find spot in midfield one-off fence, Switched out 400m to make run but found little.
Taken back from wide draw but unable get close to fence and held 3-wide at turn. Switched out further 400 but made little headway.
Bumped at start, not pushed and settled at rear along fence. Hugged rail around turn but only one-paced in straight.
Taken forward from wide draw but unable to slot in and kept wide without cover. With lead on entering straight before tiring.
Jumped fairly then ran into traffic jams along back stretch before checked turn. Taken out entering straight but found little.
Jumped well but badly hampered before turn and unbalanced. Hugged rail around turn but only one-paced in straight.
Jumped well and ridden up with leading pack before shifting in 1300m when difficult to settle. Still close 400m before tiring.
Jumped fairly but mustered speed to lead before turn. First into straight before tiring quickly and becoming tailed off.

Pressed forward from middle alley, caught 3 wide facing breeze and used a bit in mid-section, travelled nicely turning, kept to task in straight and gradually paired back leader, won with some in hand.

Showed enough speed to hold front, set even tempo in front with some attention from outside horses, held a 1/2l on turning and kicked strongly well into straight, lost out final 100m but still a solid effort.
Unable to slot in from a wide alley, raced 4 wide in midfield with cover, 3ls back, came 5 wide on bend when pace slackened, kept closing soundly despite workload to take 3rd.
Drifted back from a wide alley, raced 3 wide 4ls or so away behind main pack, had cover to bend, switched widest in straight and closed nicely to make frame.
Landed ideal spot 1 out 1 back, had all favours tracking speed, right there turning and run opened, didn't reel off section like last time and just kept on fairly.
Pressed forward as usual to race outside leader, pressured a touch by outside horses with even tempo, right there turning and was a place chance to 200m before dropping off late.
Assumed a midfield position racing two wide, fair run before losing spot a touch approaching turn, made some headway between horses in straight to be nearest on line.
Away well enough, tracked pace 3 wide with cover, didn't settle in mid-section, ridden along turning and didn't find a lot in run home and gradually weakened.
Allowed to drop back soon after jump, raced behind midfield 5ls back racing 2 wide, same margin back turning, kept on fairly holding ground in straight.
Average break and soon back near last, raced 6ls back racing 3 wide with cover, still well back to bend, passed a few weakening ones in straight.
Restrained from widest alley, raced at rear 7ls or so back 2 and 3 wide, still last turning, set too much to do and could only pass a few tired ones.
Fair getaway, pressed on but caught 4 wide without cover in midfield, improved when pace slackened, 2ls back turning, hard run took effect and dropped off in straight.
Out in line, dropped down to rails racing 4ls or so back in midfield, niggled approaching turn, never able to get into it and just battled in straight.
Away in line, ridden to hold leaders back, even trip thereafter, pushed along from 600m, dropped out soon after turning when condition gave out.

Began well holding narrow advantage early, crossed for rails run in front 1000 metres out, joined by SERENDIPITY 700 metres out, hung on well inside final 200 metres despite drifting out.
Jumped fairly, settled one back on rails, commenced move upon straightening but unable to peg back winner throughout straight.
Jumped moderately, soon recovered to rear of midfield on rails, took closer order entering straight, kept on steadily without quickening.
Broke well from the middle gate, settled just off the pace one-out-one-back, ran home one-paced. (Blood in trachea)
Jumped fairly, ridden early, carried backward rounding 1000 metre bend, towards the rear before making a move approaching home straight, produced only moderate impression.
Niggled along well back, took closer order on rails rounding home bend, kept on one pace from midfield into straight.
Midfield early, raced keenly when lost position about 1000 metres out, switched wide into straight, ran home one-paced.
Broke well, niggled along in first few, came forward to dispute lead over 700 metres out, bumped upon straightening and soon weakened.
Jumped moderately, inconvenienced 1000 metres out, mainly in midfield to straight, found nothing.
Soon taken back from a wide gate, raced wide well behind, switched for rails run entering home straight, ran home one-paced.
Jumped well from the widest gate, gradually taken back to race wide in midfield, went backward around the bend and widest into the straight, never recovered. (Tactic questioned)
Began fairly, never better than midfield, went wide into straight, never recovered.
Stalked the leader, box seating. Finally got the upper hand close to the wire to claim the prize.
Led along the rails. Looked the likely winner but was nailed in the last few strides.
Camped midfield the fence, had cover. Finished off gamely.
Parked midfield, 2 deep with cover. Maintained a sound gallop down the running to fill the frame.
Was squeezed soon after the start, settling worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Made steady progress without threatening.
Couldn't go the early speed of the race and settled midfield. Posted 4 deep without cover on the circle and was a beaten horse early in the home straight.
Slow to begin travelling with the backmakers, on the paint with cover. Kept plugging away in the stretch.
Travelled worse than midfield, 3 wide with cover. Was running on empty at the furlong.
Settled at the tail of the field, 1 off with cover. Failed to close off.
Coursed 3 deep without cover racing close to the speed. Struggled in the home stretch.
Sent forward from the outside alley and eventually settle in outside the leader, 2nd spot no cover. Was gassed early in the straight.
Raced midfield, travelled 4.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, despite hampered by the slow pace, swung wide turning in, closed off strongly to score by 2-1/4Ls.
Take back to rear from the outside barrier, travelled 7Ls behind the leader 1-2 wide with cover, harmed by the slow tempo, however dashed on strongly to get 2nd.
Rolled forward to settle 1.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, benefited by the slow sectionals, kept on well to get 3rd but without any threats to the first two.
Hard ridden early to travel 4.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, kept on one pace to the line.
Eased back, travelled 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite hampered by the slow tempo, made some ground in straight.
Rolled forward to take the fence and led by 1.5Ls 1200M, enjoyed the slow sectionals, however weakened 150M.
Ridden forward to settle 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, benefited by the slow pace, however only kept on one pace until final 100M weakened.
Settled worse than midfield 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, not suited by the slow sectionals, never ran on.
At rear throughout, never a factor.
Rolled forward to settle 3Ls off the leader 2 wide without cover throughout, suited by the slow tempo, however flattened soon after straightening.
Speed at break, driven to tail leader 1 off with cover, to rail 700m, switched out to challenge 300m & duelled to lead 50m.
Fast start, crossed to rail & led, kicked on 300m, soon pressed, battled gamely, headed 50m & no extra.
Broke OK, bustled initially, camped midfield 1 off with cover, ridden 500m & widest into stretch, strong closer to 3rd late.
Slow start, raced 1 off with cover near rear, switched out & driven turning in, ran on strongly to snare 4th on line.
Awkward start, settled rail near rear, driven home turn, made sound gains in run to wire without threatening.
Fast break, sat midfield 1 off with cover, niggled backstretch, driven 600m, switched wide tuning in, plugged on evenly.
Tardy start, raced midfield on fence, switched out & driven home turn, ran on dourly.
Sluggish start, rolled on to race handy 3 wide with cover, niggled 800m to 1off, driven turning in, found little in tepid stretch run.
Broke OK, soon at tail niggled backstretch & ridden under pressure 500m, plodded on for modest inroads.
Speed to lead but quickly headed, bustled handy on rail, ridden under pressure 600m, faded in run home.
Fair start, rousted early, rolled to race 2nd 3 deep no cover, unable to quicken, weakened markedly final 200m.
Fair break, raced 3 wide with cover near rear, under pressure & to tail 600m, found nothing, never a factor.
Fast start, raced handy 2nd on rail, switched out 300m, grinding run to lead 125m, drew clear at wire.
Sharp break, keen & pulled to lead 1000m, sat 1 off until to rail 400m, kicked 250m, limited response, headed 125m, no extra.
Quick start, snagged back to race last pair, switched out & crowded turning in, held up in run until wide progress 200m, to 3rd last strides.
Sluggish start, raced rail near rear, driven home turn, stayed on to 3rd150m, edged out of frame last strides.
Held up at break to sit 1 off with cover near rear, crowded when progressing in stretch, checked close home.
Fair break, driven early to 3 wide with cover behind midfield, switched wide 400m, sound headway but hung in & rolled onto rival late.
Broke well, raced 4th 1 off with cover, driven 4 wide into stretch, one-paced & tapered late.
Fast start, trapped 4 wide, slotted 3 wide for cover 800m, wide home turn, outpaced & struggled in stretch run.
Speed to lead 3 deep, headed 1000m, sat 3rd 1 off no cover, driven 300m, soon emptied & weakened tamely.
Slow break, driven to sit midfield 1 off with cover, driven 300m, boxing on one pace when impeded 150m, no extra thereafter.
Tardy start, off heels early, raced last pair on rail, found little for pressure in tepid run to wire.
Slow start & rousted, raced rail midfield, ridden turning in, faded tamely.
Pushed forward to cross, settled easily in box seat, benefited by the slow sectionals, ran on well to score.
Hard ridden forward, hampered at first corner, 3.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, closed off strongly for 2nd.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 250M for 3rd.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 1.5Ls at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 150M flattened.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash in straight.
Eased at start to take rail behind the field, 8Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 150M whilst hanging in.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground.
Bumped start, checked early, eased back, 8Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 200M.
Bumped start, hard ridden forward to cross, 1.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, ran on until 150M emptied.
Eased at start, always at rear, 9Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, ran on fairly.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Taken back gradually across runners but stayed away from fence. Second-last turn, peeled out widest 400m, ran on strongly under hands and heels final 200m.
Began awkwardly but recovered and kicked up inside leader to take box seat back stretch. Came off fence 350m, hit front 250m, run down closing stages.
Bumped start, slipped back to behind midfield but away from fence. Caught 3-wide when pace slackened, turned wide, kept on well in straight.
Began fairly, taken to fence behind midfield. Found little room entering straight, checked 300m and shifted in to find clear passage, kept on steadily when clear.
Began well but held in midfield away from fence. Caught 3-wide back stretch when pace slacked and rolled forward to test leader. Kept on one-paced in straight.
Began well, kicked up inside leaders to first turn before selling 2-back, the rail. No clear run entering straight, shifted in 200m, kept on steadily when clear.
Used early to get to the front from wide draw. Slowed pace back stretch, put under pressure at turn, kicked entering straight, flattened final 100m.
Taken forward but started to over-race when pace slacked. Responded briefly to rider's urging 500m but only one-paced final 300m.
Guided to a 2-wide position not far off the race, raced without cover until 600M, had not much to offer turning in, soon out of contention.
Jumped in air at start and then bumped before taken across runners at the rear of the field. Found little in straight.
Jumped OK but difficult to settle early stages and steadied 850m. Little room entering straight, steadied 200m, faded.
Soon guided to the fence, travelled smoothly towards the rear, out to clear 350M, responded strongly to lead inside 150M, kept on well to bag his first win in nearly 3 years.
Never far off the pace in a steadily run race, travelled powerfully turning for home and loomed a major threat, briefly led mid-straight but unable to match the pace of winner final 150M.
Settled 2-wide in mid-division, lacked the finishing speed of first 2 but stayed on for a creditable 3rd.
Taken across behind runners, on the outside of last pair over 7Ls off the pace, bid widest 400M, stayed on encouragingly without threatening the winner.
In midfield never far off from leaders, travelled well enough to straight, kept on steadily but never going the pace to challenge.
Taken across behind runners, 8Ls off the pace on the inside of the rear pair, switched out 300M for clear run, stayed on only fairly for a never threatening 6th.
Made some use early to obtain the lead, set steady pace in front, headed mid-straight, faltered near 100M.
Took early lead along the fence, tracked leader from 1000M, first to come under pressure, gave limited response.
Forwardly placed, ranged up on the outside of leader 400M, led briefly turning in, headed 150M and weakened.
Tucked along the rail after the start, settled behind midfield, remained on inside turning home, ran on only fairly before crowded for room final 150M, not properly tested thereafter.
Held up 2-wide towards the rear, pushed to a 3-wide and no cover from 800M, came up empty turning in.
