Slightly slow out, gradually picked up along rails to the middle of small field, remained in similar position just over 2L off the speed on the bend, commenced run on straightening and hit the front over 250M out, won readily.
Sluggish at start, trailed the field early stages, raced awkwardly on heels coming out of back straight, similar position turning in, made significant progress down inside of straight.
Broke well and with leaders briefly, soon dropped back to last few racing 3-wide and without cover at times, commenced move on straightening, ran on to be nearest at finish.

Jumped fairly and with leaders early stages, taken back to 2-wide about 1L off the pace approaching home bend, renewed effort and gained narrow advantage turning in, unable to sustain effort and swamped inside final 200 metres.
Made running out wide after beginning from a poor draw, obtained rails run coming out of far side, led until headed 500 metres out, kept on steadily to the finish.
Settled some 1L off the pace on rails, baulked for a run early in straight, ran home one-paced.
Jumped fairly, settled towards the rear of the small field, shuffled back to last around the bend, kept on steadily.

Began fairly from a low draw, settled just over 1L off the pace and one off the rails, carried backward to 3L back in 5th 1000M out, made headway 3W round home bend, folded up quickly after straightening.
Parked midfield towards the middle of the course had cover. Motored home after obtaining clear running approaching the 300m.
Raced prominently, 3 off the stands rail, no cover. Finished off well, chased gamely right to the post.
Showed good early dash to cross from an inside draw and settled the grandstand rail. Led by a couple of lengths and stayed on well.
Camped ahead of midfield, the stands rail. Responded to early pressure and worked home well.
Slow to begin then ridden vigorously to rejoin the field. Drifted in towards the middle of the track and finished off soundly.
Made its run from the rear of the field. Shifted in off the outside rail near the 400m and weaved a passage home, found the line reasonably.
Raced midfield with cover on the near side. Failed to find any extra at the business end when asked for an effort.
Settle 5 off the stands rail, behind the speed, without cover. Commenced too tire over about the last 250m.
Couldn't go the early speed of the race & travelled along the center of the course, close to midfield, no cover. Commenced to tire after the 300m.
Raced behind the speed, closer to the stands rail, no cover. Was a beaten horse a long way from home.
Jumped awkwardly, settled ahead of midfield, closer to the far side. Failed to respond to pressure.
Raced on the far side, midfield and without cover. Was never in the hunt.
Settled on the speed without cover closer to the center of the course. Was a beaten horse after the 400m.
Rolled forward to take the fence and led by 1/2Ls, enjoyed the slow sectionals, made all and scored easily by 2-1/4Ls.
Raced worse than midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide with cover, despite harmed by the slow pace, swung wide turning in, finished off well for 2nd but not match with the winner.
Settled worse than midfield about 6Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, hampered by the slow pace, closed off strongly to get 3rd.
Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, despite harmed by the slow sectionals, ran on well to get 4th.
Pushed forward to obtain the box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, stayed on well after straightening.
Camped handy, settled 2Ls off the leader 2 wide with cover, suited by the slow pace, however blocked from 400-150M, ran on well thereafter.
Rolled forward to park outside the leader, despite enjoyed the slow tempo, kept on one pace until 150M weakened.
Settled worse than midfield, 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite harmed by the slow tempo, made some ground inside 100M.
At last, settled 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, not suited by the slow pace, never ran on.
Settled in front of midfield about 2.5Ls off the slow pace 3 wide with cover, kept on one pace until 100M weakened.
Camped midfield, travelled 4Ls off the slow pace 3 wide with cover throughout, never looked likely.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, hampered by the slow tempo, never found a daylight in straight.
At rear, settled 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow sectionals, never ran on. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Camped handy, however travelled wide and without cover throughout, soon gave ground after straightening.
Speed to lead, headed 1000m, sat 1 back on rail, shaken up & shifted out 400m, closed to lead 180m, drew clear.
Good start, parked 3rd 1 off no cover, ridden 400m, boxed on in pursuit to 2nd 100m, always held.
Broke well, raced rail midfield, switched out & ridden home turn, ran on for late headway to take 3rd.
Fast break, driven to lead 1000m & crossed to rail, 2L clear turning in, shaken up 300m, all out when headed 180m, plugged on.
Sharp start, raced 4th on rail, driven home turn, kept on one pace.
Fair break, bustled early to sit midfield 1 off with cover, wide into stretch, stayed on evenly.
Broke OK, sat behind midfield 1 off with cover, ridden & switched out 430m, plugged on one pace.
Broke well, snagged back to 3 wide with cover near rear, niggled for minor progress 600m, plodded on tamely in stretch.
Lacked pace early, raced near rear on rail, ridden turning in, stayed on for modest inroads.
Fair break, parked rail behind midfield, switched out & driven 430m, found little in tepid stretch run.
Taken back from wide, soon detached at tail, hard ridden 700m, kept on past beaten rivals in stretch.
Slow start, camped 1 off with cover near rear, switched out home turn & driven, one paced & never a factor.
Sound start, settled 5th 1 off with cover, shaken up 430m, unable to quicken & faded tamely.
Smart start wide, caught 3 deep no cover midfield, driven turning in, soon struggling & weakened out.
Snagged back at break, raced rail behind midfield, buried until shaken up 250m, burst to lead 50m, comfortable at wire.
Sharp break, settled rail 1 back, switched out 350m & driven, led 150m, headed 50m, no extra.
Good break, sat handy 1 off with cover, shaken up 350m, closed off soundly for 3rd.
Soon led, to rail 1100m & over-raced a touch, smooth traveler turning in, kicked on 300m, headed 100m & tapered thereafter.
Taken back from wide gate, raced 1 off behind midfield, switched out 400m, outpaced when asked, stayed on for late headway.
Taken back early, raced 3 wide with cover near rear, wide into stretch & driven, closed soundly centre track for minor gains.
Good break, raced midfield 1 off with cover, ridden 400m, stayed on evenly.
Good break, snagged back to 3 wide behind midfield, driven 400m, boxed on one pace.
Snagged to race 1 off in rear, switched wide at tail under drive 400m, ran on for modest inroads.
Fast start, restrained to midfield, unable to slot, rolled 3 wide no cover to sit handy 850m, driven 400m, emptied 200m & drifted, faded out.
broke well, bustled to race midfield on rail, driven 400m, tapered in run home.
Broke with others, raced 3 wide with cover midfield, ridden 500m, struggled in run, beaten when off heels 100m & eased.
Taken back at break to race rear on rail, ridden at tail 400m, never a factor.
Smart start, crossed to sit 2nd 1 off no cover, shaken up 400m, folded 300m & weakened out.
Took rail and led by 1L easily at advantageous slow sectionals, only being challenged lately 100M, scored by a neck.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 3Ls of the leader along the fence, not suited by the slow pace, blocked 400M, dashed strongly 300M for 2nd.
Slow away, hard ridden to obtain the box seat, suited by the slow tempo, lack room 200M, ran on well for 3rd.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed well 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed forward, 1L off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, ran on until 100M flattened.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader on the rails, harmed by the slow pace, lack room 400M-200M, dashed well when clear.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, dashed well 250M, hampered badly 100M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 100m.
Slow away, 4Ls off the leader on the rails, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Rolled forward, 2.5Ls off the slow pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, out of fuel 250M.
Very slow away, 9Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash 100M.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, dashed fairly.
Hard ridden to sit 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, soon emptied 400M.
Eased back, 9Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Bumped start, raced tightly to 1100m when difficult to settle. Kept 3-wide turn, motored to the front 200m, ran out of steam 50m but held on.
Jumped OK but reluctant to maintain position between horses and unbalanced. Kept wide turn, widest into straight, ran on strongly to just miss.
Jumped well, settling 2-back the fence. Shuffled back at turn, hung in early in straight before picking up momentum, finishing strongly.
Jumped well but unable to cut in and used to go forward, taking lead before turn. Caught 200m out but kept on well to the line.
Not pushed early and allowed to settle toward rear away from the fence. No clear run early in straight but finished well when clear.
Taken in quickly after start and soon at rear. Got shuffled back approaching turn, found inside run and kept on steadily.
No early speed and soon last but away from fence. Last at turn, taken wide entering straight and finished off nicely.
Ridden forward from inside draw, settling in midfield but wide. Made ground early straight but one-paced 200m. Rider cautioned (See Racing Incidents).
Hard ridden from wide draw to sit just behind the pace but wide. Improved turn, 2nd into straight, found little.
Quickly into stride to lead early before dropping back before turn. Fifth into straight, kept on steadily to 200m, faded.
Ridden up but wide from outside draw. Got head up entering turn and hung out. Very wide into straight and found nothing.
Jumped well, lead on settling before taking box seat inside leader. Gave ground soon after entering straight.
Bumped start but recovered and taken forward to sit 2-back before turn. Three-wide entering straight but found nothing and faded.
Held up in midfield, pushed to a 3-wide position 900M, soon into clear on straightening, ran on determinedly to wear down the leader last stride.
Began fairly, always had leaders in sight, came 2-wide through the turn, closed off soundly, led 50M from home only to be caught by winner last stride.
Driven forward from wide barrier, chased leader 2-wide turning home, continued on well to lead nearing 200M, got tired inside 100M and not able to hold off first 2 final 50M.
Reigned back, reserved near the rear 6Ls off the pace, saved ground on inner, took time to pick up in straight, did best work late for an eye-catching 4th.
Driven forward, checked 900M but soon recovered, badly held up behind leader early straight, switched to clear 200M, ran on but not much headway on first few.
Taken across behind runners, settled on the outside of last pair, 7Ls to make up 400M, bid wide and fared best of those who came from off the pace.
Vigorously driven out the gate but was soon taken back to avoid being caught wide, pushed to the 3-path near 900M, stayed on final 300M but never a serious threat to first few.
Raced in mid-pack, travelled 2-wide throughout, closed off evenly but no impression on principals.
Quickly into stride, severely checked 900M losing position and momentum, shuffled back to midfield, kept on steadily final 400M but never reached contention (Lame left front.)
Bustled along after the start, 3-wide and not far off from leaders but left with no cover from 900M, not quickened turning in, remained same pace and was swamped inside 100M.
Slow to begin, 8Ls off the pace in rear and not hurried, keen middle stages, made no significant progress on straightening.
Had a tough trip in a position behind midfield, steadied near 900M and caught 4-wide without cover turning home, stayed on fairly, eased when no chance final stages.
From widest barrier made some use early to find the lead, crossed to rail 850M, caught near 200M, weakened badly over final 150M.
Raced in mid-division along the rail, severely checked 900M and pushed to 2-wide over the turn, came up empty passing 400M, tailed out. (Unacceptable Performance / To OBT & OVE.)
Allowed to find feet, sitting behind midfield 3-wide with cover. Taken wide 350m, picked up speed, shifted in abruptly 200m when in front, kept on strongly.
Jumped fairly but made good use of inside draw to kick up inside leaders, taking box seat. No run early straight, got split 350m, unbalanced 150m, kept on well.
A little slow from the start but taken quickly to rail sitting 4-back from leader. No clear run early straight, finished off nicely from 250m when clear.
Ridden forward while moving closer to rail, getting one-off position in midfield. Changed course twice in straight to find splits, doing best at finish.
Taken back from wide draw but away from rail Raced keenly entering turn, put under pressure 300m and kept on steadily.
Ridden forward but not much speed and trapped 3-wide but with cover. Made forward move around turn, looked chance 200m, flattened late.
Made use of draw to hold rail, 3-back from leader. Peeled out at turn to make run, taken very wide 350m but only one paced.
Taken forward from wide draw and trapped 3-wide without cover. Lost position entering turn, came again 300m, one-paced closing.
Allowed to stride forward from inside draw, taking lead 1400m. First into straight, passed 200m but battled on before flattened last 100m.
No early speed and taken to rail at rear. Last into straight, made up some ground before checked 150m. Not ridden out.
Jumped to the front but allowed to settle outside leader 1400m. Joint leader into straight, kept on well to 200m before tiring.
Taken back across runners from wide draw to sit at rear away from fence. Clear last entering straight and never likely.
Ridden forward to sit behind leaders but rider reported did not stretch out comfortably when put under pressure. Shifted twice in straight, faded. (See Racing Incidents).
Dropped in nicely 3-4ls back in running line behind pace, stalked them to bend, produced a strong finish down middle taking lead inside 200m and scoring with some in hand.

Out in line, caught 3 wide so pressed on and raced outside leader, even run mid stages after using a bit early, challenged and hit front at 250m but couldn't withstand challenge of eventual winner final furlong.

Taken back from widest alley, raced 8ls back at rear racing 2 and 3 wide, got moving rounding bend and unleashed a powerful sprint in straight making up many lengths from an impossible spot to take place.
Standard jump but mustered to race on leaders back, had nice trail thereafter, loomed a place chance in straight and kept on well but unable to stay in mix final 100m.
Began well, occupied 1 out 1 back spot, had decent run to turn, angled wider to challenge but unable to match dash of first few and just stuck on at same speed holding ground.
Showed speed to take up front running which hasn't been usual role, set reasonable speed in front, defied them to 250m but couldn't keep on, held ground respectfully thereafter.
Took a spot on rails 3ls or so off pace, was a bit difficult to settle but not required to work to bend, in behind horses turning but just stayed on same pace when clear (lame next day)
Dropped back from a tricky alley, raced 6ls back in running line, still had a bit to do turning, closed evenly without ever looking a threat.
Unable to slot in from a wide gate and dropped back to race 3 wide behind midfield 6ls back, had cover in mid-section, came wider but made no real progress in straight.
Angled into a midfield role, raced 5ls back in pack, tracked eventual winner turning, lacked a close final 300m and just battled away thereafter (lame next day)
No early pace dropped back to race with last few 7-8ls back on rails, always well back and kept to fence just passing tired runners in straight.
Out with rest, caught 3 wide without cover in midfield 4-5ls back, did share of work on bend, couldn't respond turning and gradually faded.
Dropped down to rear from a tricky gate, raced 8ls back at tail, always at back to bend, set too much to do but failed to make much ground at all (jockey reported didn't stretch out)
Fractious before start, average getaway, raced behind midfield 5-6ls back on rails, keen in mid-section, made some ground turning but didn't finish it off in straight.

Broke well, tracked leader, cruised to the front 400 metres out, won with ease.
Moderate start, settled towards the rear, circled field on the bend, sustained progress in straight to snatch 2nd close to home.
Began well, settled wide in midfield early, took closer order 800 metres out improving to 1L back in 3rd 3-wide home bend, one-paced in straight.
Settled in last few, made significant progress in straight.
Jumped fairly from the widest gate, raced wide and mainly in midfield, commenced move rounding home bend, kept on before finding no extra closing stages.
Blundered badly at start, settled just worse than midfield on rails, came off rails around the bend for a run into straight, one-paced. (Roarer)
Slow out of a poor gate settling well behind, kept on past well-beaten horses in the straight.
Jumped well, settled not far off on rails, failed to quicken when asked in straight.
Jumped well, settled in midfield, found nothing in straight.
Jumped fairly, settled just better than midfield most of way, faded under pressure into straight. (Blood in trachea)
Missed the start badly, always struggling at the back.
Jumped fairly, settled in midfield on rails, came under pressure to hold place from approaching home bend, yielded ground into straight.
Broke well from a wide gate and quickly driven to lead, obtained rails run on top of stables bend, led until headed into straight, folded up quickly.
Failed to muster travelling well behind, clipped heels and nearly dislodged rider 400 metres out, never recovered.
Parked midfield, 3 deep without cover. Responded well to plenty of pressure and grabbed the win close to the line.
Sent forward and led at an even tempo on the fence. Fought on gamely in the run home.
Eventually settled in second position outside the leader, no cover. Looked the likely winner at the 100m, but was collard late. No excuses.
Travelled towards the rear, 3 deep with cover. Kept grinding away in the final stretch, made good ground.
Settled in about a midfield position, 2 wide with cover. Maintained a good gallop down the running.
Camped midfield the fence. Stayed towards the inside in the straight and made some late ground without threatening.
Crowded in early stages, but managed track the leader on the fence. Kept on at the same speed in the run to the wire.
Slotted in to race in fourth spot, 2 deep with cover. Enjoyed a nice run in the race but couldn't go on with it.
Was steadied when tightened soon after the jump, travelling back in the field, 1 off with cover. Never chased throughout and struggled in the home stretch.
Began very awkwardly and lost ground, racing at the rear of the field, on the paint with cover. Failed to close off.
Settled in last position 2-3 off the rail, had cover. Failed to pass another runner and finished well back.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, swung wide turning in, finished off strongly to score by 1/2L.
Camped handy, settled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, suited by the fast pace, ran on well to get 2nd.
Crowded start, settled 5.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, swung wide turning in, dashed well for 3rd.
Began slowly, failed to muster despite hard ridden along, travelled 6.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, closed off well to get 4th.
Hard ridden along to share the lead 2 wide without cover, despite hampered by the fast pace, stayed on well until 150M weakened.
Hard ridden along to settle 3Ls off the fast pace 2 wide with cover, ran on only fairly.
Hard ridden to take the fence and led by 3/4L on the fence, hampered by the fast pace, flattened badly 200M.
At rear throughout, never looked likely.
Hard ridden forward to share the lead 3 wide without cover, harmed by the fast pace, weakened badly soon after straightening.
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along throughout, never a factor, tailed out. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along throughout, never on terms, tailed out.
Rolled forward to obtain the box seat, under pressure rounding the Home Turn, flattened badly soon after straightening, tailed out.
Smart start, settled 4th 1 off with cover, switched out home turn, ridden 350m, battled to lead 200m, boxed on determinedly to wire.
Decent break & driven to 1st turn, sat 3 wide with cover midfield, advanced 700m & maintained progress into stretch, went 2nd 200m, always held.
Slow break, taken to tail, backstretch progress, 7L down and widest home turn, raking run centre track to take 3rd late.
Broke OK, settled back behind midfield 3 wide with cover, switched wide & driven home turn, closed off soundly.
Lacked early pace, parked 1 off behind midfield, driven 300m, stayed on well without threatening.
Broke well, camped rail midfield, driven & switched out home turn, ran on evenly.
Tardy start & rousted, settled rail behind midfield, ridden 350m, switched off fence 200m, kept on one pace.
Good break & hard pushed to lead, headed 1200m, settled rail 1 back, trapped in pocket in stretch, switched out 200m, ran on one pace.
Sharp start, very wide 1st turn, rolled to sit 2nd 1 off no cover, driven turning in, emptied 200m & faded.
Speed early, very wide 1st turn, rolled to lead 1200m, to rail 1000m, ridden 350m, headed 200m & weakened thereafter.
Slow start & bustled, raced rail near rear, ridden 800m, switched out 400m, found little & weakened in tepid run home.
Sluggish start & rousted, raced in rear, to tail 1100m & soon detached, plodded on same pace to pass beaten rivals.
Disputed lead to 1st turn, taken back to 1 off fore of midfield, ridden 500m, found nothing & struggled in run home.
Stumbled start, caught 4 wide no cover midfield, ridden for progress 600m, soon emptied & faded in stretch.
Fast break, led 1 off 900m, soon to rail, kicked clear into stretch & extended for easy win.
Speed to lead & crossed to rail, headed 900m, tracked lead in 3rd, driven 500m, high head carriage & ran on to 2nd 230m, no match for winner.
Slow start, rousted to settle midfield 3 wide with cover, driven 600m, ran on well to claim 3rd without threatening.
Sluggish early & rousted, raced 1 off with cover behind midfield, progress on turn, shaken up 400m, crowded 250m, kept on.
Reared at break & last out, rolled 1 off to 2nd last at 1000m, ridden turning in, ran on centre track for minor gains.
Broke well, bustled to sit handy 3 wide no cover, under pressure home turn, plodded on tamely.
Awkward break, taken back to 3 wide with cover near rear, driven wide home turn, plugged on evenly.
Started OK, raced rail near rear, niggled 700m, struggled in run home.
Smart start & driven to race handy, rolled 2nd 1 off no cover 800m, ridden turning in, emptied 250m & faded thereafter.
Broke OK, raced midfield 1 off with cover, ridden turning in, struggled in run to wire.
Sharp start, settled rail midfield, ridden 600m, found nothing & weakened tamely.
Slow break, to tail 1000m, found nothing for pressure & never a factor.
Pushed forward, settled 3Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, closed off strongly, dominated 250M.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, dashed well 300M for 2nd.
Pushed but not muster on the slower part of track early, 5Ls off the leader 3-4 wide, progressed steadily in straight for 3rd.
At back, 8Ls off the leader 3-4 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made steady ground 200M.
Pushed but not muster on the slower part of track early, 5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, suited by the fast pace but no progress.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 2Ls at fast sectionals, harmed by the off rail bias, ran on well until 200M emptied.
Midfield, 4Ls off the fast pace 3 wide, out of fuel 250M.
Hard ridden forward, 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the fast pace and the off rail bias, weakened 300M.
Missed start badly, never joined competition.
Hard ridden to occupy the box seat, harmed by the fast tempo and the off rail bias, faded 400M.
Very slow away, never a factor.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield along the fence, harmed by the off rail bias, dropped off quickly 500M.
Jumped with field and ridden forward but wide. Joined leaders at turn, took lead on entering straight. Kicked clear 200m and kept on strongly.
Ridden forward to sit outside leader at turn when pace slacked. Quickened nicely in straight but unable match winner.
Steadied shortly after start, recovered and rolled forward. Lay in 500m when improving, kept on steadily in straight.
Taken back from wide draw and last on settling. Well back entering straight, switched out and ran home strongly.
Ridden forward from wide draw and trapped wide into home bend. Kept on one-paced in straight without threatening.
No early speed, raced tightly into turn, hampered 500m, held up in traffic, but kept on steadily when clear in straight.
Jumped best and soon in lead. Joined by two others when dropped anchor around turn, gave ground soon after entering straight. (See Racing Incidents).
Ridden vigorously to hold position but trapped 4-5 wide going into the home bend. Wide and one-paced in straight.
Taken forward from inside draw but still held 3-wide into turn. Checked 500m, losing position. One-paced final 400m.
Tardy at start but recovered quickly inside leader. Steadied 700m, rider lost balance 500m, gave ground soon after entering straight.
Began well but no early speed, dropping to midfield. Bumped and unbalanced 700m, hampered 500m. Found nothing in straight.
Missed the start, then ridden up to hold rail in midfield. Bumped and unbalanced 700m, hampered 500m, gave ground quickly in straight. (See Racing Incidents).
Attended the pace, crossed to the lead nearing 600M, going well turning into straight, hard pressed 250M, gave everything and just held on.
Slow to begin, travelled well in a rearward position, driven to chase winner 300M, ran on strongly final 200M and closed in on the leader with every stride, just held.
Away well, gained a position just behind leader and eventual winner, loomed a threat 350M, kept on well under urge but unable to make headway on winner, no extra final stages.
Driven forward setting early pace, gave up the lead nearing home turn, kept on same pace when driven, held on for a non-threatening 4th.
Restrained in mid-division along the 2-path, kept on same pace turning in, never a serious threat to leaders.
Crossed to a 3-wide position behind midfield, had to be nudged along 600M from home, made little progress final 300M, never troubled leaders.
Dropped back to near the rear, made limited progress final 300M, never reached contention.
Slowly away but soon recovered, saved ground on the inside and never far off from leaders, short of room early straight but not going the pace to challenge once a clear run presented.
Began only fairly, went closer to pace under urge, 3-wide no cover turning home, kept on one pace, weakened towards finish.
Caught 3-wide towards the rear from draw 12, never travelled and came under serious pressure from 600M, no impression.
Settled behind midfield along the inside, not picked up turning home, soon beaten.
Dwelt, niggled along throughout but never going the pace, 8Ls off leaders passing 400M, never involved.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Jumped fairly, soon picked up a prominent spot in 2nd off the rails, just outside the leader turning in, hit the front 200 metres out, won readily.
Driven along from a wide gate to hit the front out wide after first 200 metres, obtained rails run leaving the Rock, led until headed by winner 200 metres out, kept on.
Jumped fairly, settled behind midfield, similar turning in, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Well there in 3rd on rails, inconvenienced when crossed by the leader coming out of far side, kept on same pace from a similar position into home straight.
Jumped fairly, soon dropped well behind, remained similar into straight, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Broke well in front, soon taken back to travel 2L back in 4th far side, 3-wide around the bend and into the straight, kept on one pace. (Lame next day)
Jumped well from a poor gate, soon taken back to race wide with cover behind midfield, commenced move around the bend but could make no impression in straight.
Began fairly, settled in midfield on rails, steadied coming out of far side and making home turn, kept on one pace.
Niggled along in mid-division far side, inconvenienced coming onto home bend, just over 2L back in 5th turning in, ran home one-paced.
Soon dropped to last few, swung wide into straight, kept on same pace without quickening.
Slowly away, ridden to soon join rear of field on rails, saved a lot of ground turning in, made no impression in straight.
Ridden along from the widest gate, soon dropped behind midfield while travelling wide without cover, dropped to tail-end into straight, never a danger.
Enjoyed the run of the race on the back of the speed, along the fence. Cruised to the front near the furlong and maintained a good gallop down the running.
Settled 3 back the paint with cover. Peeled out into clear running prior to the home turn and kept grinding away.
Settled just behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Ran on soundly.
Worked forward and settled 1 out 1 back. Had every chance, kept whacking away.
Raced with the backmakers on the paint with cover. Made reasonable ground in the stretch.
Lead at a leisurely pace on the fence. Kicked clear early in the straight but gave way after the 100m.
Camped midfield, 2 wide with cover. Was dour in the home straight.
Travelled at the rear of the field, 2 deep with cover. Plugged away in the home stretch.
Parked outside the leader, no cover. Had every possible hope, was a beaten horse early in the straight.
Settled in last position from a wide gate, on the rails with cover. Never ran on.
Raced behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Failed to close off.
Travelled worse than midfield on the paint with cover. Struggled in the run home.
Eased start, settled 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, finished off strongly to score by a neck.
Hard ridden forward to take the fence and led by 1L, kicked 2Ls clear soon after straightening, beaten by a neck over the last few strides.
Raced midfield, travelled 3.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, ran on well to get 3rd but without any threats to the first two.
Rolled forward to park outside the leader, found cover 800M, kept on one pace to the line for 4th.
Eased back, settled 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, swung wide turning in, ran on ok.
Settled in front of midfield about 3Ls off the leader on the fence, checked 250M, ran on only fairly.
Raced in front of midfield, however trapped 3 wide with cover until 500M, 4 wide turning in, stayed on one pace until 100M weakened.
Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, never looked likely.
Settled in front of midfield about 3Ls off the leader 2 wide with cover, however hung in early straight, weakened thereafter.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, under pressure rounding the Home Turn, never ran on.
Taken back to rear from wide gate, never looked chance. (Bled 2nd time)
Camped handy, however trapped 3 wide without cover until 700M, then allowed to stride forward to share the lead, flattened badly soon after straightening.
Broke well, sat fore of midfield 1 off with cover, progress to stalk lead 400m, shaken up & switched out 300m, strong run, led close home.
Disputed early lead four wide, shuffled back 600m to handy 3 deep, sent on to press leaders final turn, led 150m, headed close home.
Fair start, taken back to 1 off with cover near rear, progress into stretch, driven for solid late gains to grab 3rd late.
Broke OK, raced rail behind midfield, switched out for progress 500m, driven centre track & ran home soundly.
Fast break, disputed lead 3-wide, settled 2nd 1 off 600m, driven home turn, one-paced & tapered in run.
Speed to dispute lead, led outright 800m, to rail 600m, driven turning in, all out & headed 150m, no extra.
Fair break, settled midfield on rail, switched out 500m, driven home turn, stayed on evenly.
Slow start, raced last pair 1 off, at tail turning in, ran on through field for decent late headway.
Tardy start & rousted early on rail, raced last pair & niggled throughout, driven for progress 500m, boxed on one pace.
Broke well, caught wide handy, taken off heels & lost ground 600m, very wide into stretch, plugged on same speed.
Sharp break, raced prominently on rail, settled 1 back 600m, hard-ridden 430m, found nothing & faded tamely.
Speed from wide gate, disputed lead 5 wide, lost ground from 500m, hard-ridden near tail 300m, weakened out.
Snagged back at break to rail behind midfield, switched out & ridden 300m, burst through to challenge 150m & driven to lead last strides.
Sharp break, slipstreamed lead on rail 2L back, closed gap 400m, charged to lead down fence 200m, headed last strides.
Fast start, stalked lead 1 off with cover, shuffled back 400m, shaken up 300m, boxed on to claim 3rd without threatening.
Quick to stride, taken back to midfield 1 off with cover, scrubbed & shifted out home turn, closed well to just miss frame.
Broke OK, restrained to race 2 wide behind midfield, widest into stretch & shaken up, solid closer without threatening.
Missed start, detached at tail, closed to 7L last turning in & driven, switched out & ran on for sound inroads.
Awkward start & rousted early, raced 1 off with cover behind midfield, ridden turning in, plugged on evenly.
Fast break to press lead 1 off, edged to narrow lead 800m, headed again 500m, ridden 300m, swamped 150m & faded.
Speed to lead on rail, narrowly headed 800m, led again 500m, shaken up 300m, headed & swamped 200m, no extra.
Taken back at start to rail near tail, niggled 500m, driven into stretch, one-paced in tepid run home.
Speed to cross from wide & sit handy 3 wide no cover, driven under pressure final turn, weakened in run.
Awkward break, caught wide no cover midfield, very wide & driven into stretch, found no extra in run home.
Settled midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M to score.
Eased at start, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 250M, just beaten by a neck in 2nd.
Pressed forward, took rail and led by 1.5Ls, clocked fast sectionals, hung on strongly until 50M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader on the rails, benefited by the fast tempo, made some ground 250M.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader along the fence, favoured by the fast pace and the rail run, blocked 4-2, made steady ground when clear.
Settled in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the fast pace on the fence, never nearer, just held ground in straight.
Bumped start, 6Ls off the leader along the rails, suited by the fast pace, made some ground in straight.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, ran on ok.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the fast sectionals, ran on until 150M emptied.
Pushed forward, sat 3.5Ls off the fast pace 2-3 wide, ran on until 200M flattened.
Always at rear, 7Ls off the leader, suited by the fast pace but trapped 3 wide throughout, no progress.
Hard ridden forward to cross, took box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, out of fuel 200M.
Began awkwardly and hampered soon after, Checked 1000m when pace slackened but held on to rail 3-back from leader. Took inside path in straight, gradually running down leader to win close home.
Jumped straight to the front but not pushed and passed by another. Retook lead 1000m, kicked clear entering straight, kept on well but unable hold off winner.
Ridden forward and wide into back stretch but with cover. Lost cover entering final turn, bumped and unbalance before straight, kept on well final stages.
Allowed to drift back from wide draw to find rail but last into back stretch. Taken out around turn, wide into straight and rattled home strongly.
Slow into stride and dropped to rear but away from rail. Taken wide in straight to find clear running and kept on well until struck on nose 100m out.
Quickly on the rail behind midfield and allowed to stride at own pace. Hugged rail into straight, kept on well until 200m when forced to steady. One-paced.
Taken forward from outside draw and held wide around first turn and back stretch. Rolled forward to sit outside leader 700m, looked chance 200m, flattened final stages.
Began well but checked 1000m when pace slackened, after which travelled keenly. Close to heels 600m but kept on steadily until 100m when bumped and unbalanced. Not fully tested.
Ridden forward from wide draw to lead at 1000m and then dropped anchor, causing inconvenience to several runners. Stayed in box seat to stretch when gave ground gradually.
Quickly into stride but over-raced and then hampered 1000m. Under pressure from 500m to hold position, one-paced in straight. Lame left hind (See Racing Incidents).
Hard ridden from start but failed to muster and trapped wide first turn and back stretch. Under whip from 400m but with little response.
Taken back from wide draw to sit at rear away from the fence. Dropped to last around final bend and found little in straight.
Took lead under positive riding, led steadily, kept on well turning home, found extra when strongly pressed by runner-up final 150M, held on.
Tracked leader in a steadily run race, loomed a threat passing 300M, put in a strong challenge over final 150M but winner found the necessary to hold on.
Rousted along early stages, moved up and sat behind leader along the inside, driven inside 300M, kept on moderately towards finish, not catching the first two.
Given a patient ride, settled near last along the fence, kept on steadily down the inside over final 300M.
Held up midfield along the 2-path, soon got out on straightening, kept on reasonably well towards the line.
Guided to a rail spot in mid-division, had every chance from 300M, ran on one paced final 200M.
Caught 4-wide in midfield, stayed on down outside making minor progress.
Dropped back to near the rear, not quickened under pressure 300M out, steadied 150M, kept at same pace.
Always prominent, 3-wide no cover chasing the pace, not able to quicken turning in and weakened 200M.
Taken across behind runners, last turning in, made no progress on leaders.
Held up behind midfield 3-wide, outpaced from 400M, soundly beaten.
Shaken up early, unable to slot in and caught 4-wide no cover making the turn, dropped away inside 300M.
Began well and in leading trio before slipping into box seat behind leader. Forced to switch our 350m to find running and kept on strongly to the line.
Ridden forward to hold position one-back, one-off first turn and back stretch. Threw out challenged entering straight and kept on well.
Soon on rail from good draw but behind midfield back stretch. Stayed on rail entering straight and finished off strongly.
Motored to the front and set steady pace. Tried to kick clear 400m but lay in under press and not ridden out final stages when passed.
Allowed to settle in midfield away from fence and not put under pressure until entering straight. Kept on steadily without threatening.
Ridden forward but unable to find cover and settled outside leader back stretch and turn. Looked chance 200m but only one-paced.
Jumped nicely and could have gone forward but allowed to sit on rail 2-back from leader. Hugged rail into straight and kept on one-paced.
No early speed, drifting back toward rear along rail. Still well back entering straight but made ground between horses final stages.
Kicked back gate at start but soon into stride sitting behind leading pack away from fence. Made ground early in straight before turning one-paced.
Slow into stride and held wide first turn and back stretch. Swung wider entering straight but found little under pressure.
Taken back from wide draw and soon at rear along fence. Taken out entering straight but found little under hard riding.
Taken back from outside draw and dropped to last along back stretch. Swung wide entering straight but found nothing.
Dropped back from a wide gate, raced behind midfield 5ls or so back, appreciated early speed, gained a nice trail in on circle, let down strongly to lead at 200m and hold off challengers.
No early speed and settled back towards rear 6-7ls back, aided by early speed, still well back with plenty to do coming wider turning, dashed sharply in straight making many lengths to just miss out.
Took a nice position 3-4ls back on rails in midfield, enjoyed a quiet trip to turn, closed off well between horses final 300m to take place.
Went forward and held spot 1 out 1 back, even run in mid-section after pace settled, in there with a place chance turning, battled on solidly in straight to make frame.
Showed speed and rolled forward as usual to take up running, worked a bit in first section, didn't get much peace from midpoint but kept rolling to bend, headed inside 200m but stayed on evenly.
Average beginning and taken back to rear, settled 7-8ls back, made a move 3 wide without cover from midpoint, in the mix turning but run ended final 200m and did a good job to stay on all the same.
Began well, had enough pace to hold leaders back, worked a bit early, fair run thereafter, right there turning, gained inside runs but could not capitalize and was flat final 200m.
Not much early pace raced behind midfield 6ls back in running line, still well back to turn, came wider and made some minor ground in straight without threatening.
Slotted into a midfield role 3-4ls back in running line, had ideal run in mid-section, in traffic and held up to 100m, just fair when clear but race was over.
No early pace, shared rear 7ls or more from top end, early pace suited, ridden along from 400m to improve, made a little late ground in straight but never likely (see racing incidents).
Pressed forward from a wide alley and used a bit to get outside leader, not given much peace when horses improved around at midpoint, struggling turning and dripped out when work took toll.
Away with them, checked when trying to hold spot early, raced behind midfield 5ls of so back, early pace helped, niggled along turning, found little in run to line.

Soon taken back to rear for rails run, commenced move approaching the 400 metres, saved a lot of ground on rails turning in, sustained effort to take charge over 100 metres out.
Jostled and lost position early, soon recovered to forward of midfield, commenced move turning in, quickened to hit the front momentarily 100 metres out, outsprinted close to home. (Mucus)

Broke well to hold narrow lead, ceded advantage on rails on top of the Rock, tracked leader into straight, renewed effort to hold every chance 200 metres out, unable to sustain effort in the run to the line.

Jumped fairly and jostled between runners, settled just worse than midfield, commenced move turning in and widest runner turning in, ran on to be nearest at finish despite hanging and a difficult ride in straight.
Slightly slow out, settled well behind, finished off race well inside final 200 metres.
Ridden early, settled mainly just off the pace on rails, shared 4th position into straight, kept on steadily without quickening.
Jumped fairly, settled in midfield, soon came under pressure on straightening, badly baulked for a run passing the 200 metres, no further impression.

Began fairly from the widest gate, soon came to contest lead out wide hitting the front on the top of the Rock, obtained rails run approaching home bend, headed over 150 metres out and soon overhauled.
Jumped fairly, soon settled in forward of midfield on rails, badly held up for a run early in straight, made no impression thereafter.
Ridden along in first few, remained prominent around home bend, dropped out tamely passing 200 metres.
Prominent to straight, one-paced when tightened 200 metres out.
Soon dropped behind midfield on rails, dropped out tamely from approaching home turn.
Led early on the fence before handing up and travelling in 2nd spot outside the leader, no cover near the 700m. Fought off challenge to score narrowly.
Caught wide without cover early, midfield was allowed to stride forward after the 1300m and took up the lead on the rail near the 700m. Stayed on gamely.
Had every chance after box seating. Couldn't sustain its early dash in the straight and was collard late.
Tightened in the early stages, travelling towards the rear on the paint, had cover. Ran on gamely towards the inside.
Settled just behind midfield on the paint with cover. Switched out for running near the furlong, was a bit one paced in the run to the wire.
Made its run from the rear 2 deep with cover. Stayed on well down the outside.
Parked just behind the speed, 1 off no cover. Kept grinding away in the home stretch.
Settled back in the field, 2 deep with cover. Kept on reasonably.
Raced midfield, 1 off with cover. Couldn't find any extra in the home stretch.
Tracked worse than midfield, 3 deep with cover. Swung deep on the home turn and plugged away.
Overaced for a fair portion of the trip whilst travelling worse than midfield, 2 wide with cover. Couldn't finish off.
Settled 3 deep with cover just off midfield after being crowded at the start. Lost cover on the circle and was never likely.
Raced midfield, travelled 2-3/4Ls off the leader 2 wide with cover, suited by the slow tempo, dashed well to take the victory.
Hard ridden forward to take the fence and led by 1-1/4Ls, enjoyed the soft lead up front, stayed on strongly until 50M for 2nd.
Rolled forward to obtain the box seat, benefited by the slow sectionals, kept on well for 3rd.
Settled worse than midfield about 4Ls off the slow pace 2 wide with cover, despite not suited by the soft sectionals, made some ground in straight.
Taken back from the wide gate, settled 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, not suited by the slow pace, ran on only fairly.
Rolled forward to settle 1-1/4Ls outside the leader, despite benefited by the soft sectionals, weakened over the last furlong.
Failed to muster speed despite hard ridden along, travelled 3.5Ls off the slow pace on the fence, never looked likely.
Taken back as usual, settled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, disadvantaged by the slow tempo, never ran on.
Broke with others, sat midfield 1 off with cover, switched out 450m, shaken up 300m, swooped centre track to lead 150m, drew clear.
Broke well, rousted early, rolled to lead & crossed to rail 900m, driven turning in, headed 150m, battled on to hold 2nd.
Fair break, caught 3 wide no cover fore of midfield, progress into home turn, 3rd & driven 300m, ran on evenly.
Sharp start, snagged back to race fore of midfield 1 off with cover, ridden 400m, switched out 300m, kept on soundly.
Taken back at break, sat near rear 1 off with cover, ridden wide 450m, closed off for sound gains.
Broke OK, rolled on to sit 1 off no cover 2nd at 800m, hard-ridden 300m, boxed on but outpaced in run home.
Ridden to early lead, to rail & restrained 1000m, headed & over-raced behind leader, awkward on the turn, one-paced in run to wire.
Smart start, settled 1 back on fence, off heels 950m & shuffled to midfield, driven 300m, one-paced in run home.
Settled back to race last pair 1 off, switched wide & driven turning in, stayed on for minor inroads.
Slow break, recovered to race rail near rear, over-raced & off heels back stretch, switched out home turn & plodded on tamely.
Bustled at break, tightened on rail & shuffled back 1000m, ridden 600m, faded tamely in stretch.
Sluggish early, soon at tail on rail, bustled 600m, found nothing & struggled in run home.
Smart start, stalked 1 back on rail, shifted 1 off 1000m & rolled to 2nd at 600m, cruised to lead turning in, driven 300m & battled home.
Bustled at break, disputed lead 1 off, edged to front 1100m & snared rail 700m, driven & headed into stretch, dug deep but held.
Slow start & taken behind to rail, settled midfield, hard-ridden 400m, shifted out 300m, determined progress to snag 3rd at wire.
Smart break, bustled to slot handy 1 off with cover, forced 3 wide1000m & lost ground, niggled to 3rd 500m, boxed on but lost 3rd at wire.
Good break, crowded early, raced rail midfield, switched out & ridden 450m, battled on same speed & just missed frame.
Broke with others, snagged to near rear 1 off, switched wide & driven 450m, closed off centre track for sound gains.
Broke OK, raced midfield wide no cover, ridden for progress 600m, boxed on one pace in stretch.
Slow start, sat last pair on rail, minor progress 1000m, hard-ridden turning in, ran on for sound inroads.
Broke with others but lacked pace, raced midfield 1 off, shuffled back 1000m, ridden 500m, stayed on for moderate inroads.
Broke OK, taken behind & raced at tail, to rail 900m, ridden 400m, ran home past beaten rivals.
Fair break, raced midfield 1 off with cover, driven 500m, wide into stretch, found little in tame run home.
Driven to dispute early lead 1 off, relented 1100m & settled 1 back on fence, driven 400m, bumped turning in, faded thereafter.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace, just scored by narrow margin.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, made early moved 3-4 wide, dashed strongly for 2nd.
Pressed for a more prominent spot, 2.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, dashed well 250M for 3rd.
Pushed forward and took box seat, enjoyed the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Had ridden forward, 1L off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, just held ground in straight.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, held up 4-2, dashed strongly when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
In front of midfield along the fence, 3Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow pace, lack room in straight, ran on ok.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Pressed forward to take rail, led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, however soon weakened 200M.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader on the rails, harmed by the slow pace, totally blocked in straight, checked 150M, never tested.
Behind midfield, 5Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, blocked most straight, not tested.
Began well but allowed to settle one-off, 3L from leader. Moved up around turn, gave chase from 350m, hit front 100m and kept on.
Ridden forward from widest draw to lead, cutting in towards rail first turn. Set steady pace, kicked clear 350m, battled on when collared 100m out.
Ridden forward from inside draw, slipping into box seat by first turn. Hugged rail thereafter, shifted out 350m but kept on steadily.
Jumped well but no speed, settling behind midfield close to fence, Checked at turn, held up for run entering straight, kept on steadily to just miss a place.
Jumped with field and ridden forward despite being bumped and unbalanced. Shaken up to sit outside leader at turn but only once-paced in straight.
Made heavy contact start and then steadied 1000m. Awkwardly placed around turn but only one-paced when clear.
Began OK but kept wide before easing off and cutting towards rail. Switched wide entering straight but only one-paced.
Taken forward but kept 3-wide back stretch, sometimes without cover. Rolled forward final turn but only once-paced final 300m.
Blundered start then unbalanced when struck another runner. Difficult to settle back stretch, shifted out turn, one-paced straight.
Began well making use of inside draw to settle 2-back along fence. Difficult to settle back stretch, found little in straight.
Taken back but held wide and pushed even wider 1000m. Was difficult to settle entering final turn. Found nothing final 400m.
Taken back from wide draw to find rail but in last place. Hard ridden entering final turn but didn't muster and faded.
Soon guided to the rails after the start, travelled smoothly 3Ls off the leader, peeled out 400M, quickened well to lead near 100M, kept on towards the finish.
Driven forward, led steadily and unchallenged, rallied when pressed by pursuers inside 300M, headed nearing 100M but held on well for 2nd.
Held up behind leaders under heavy restraint, raced fiercely in middle stages, found less than expected when driven out 300M, not pace of winner final 150M.
Began well from inside draw, tracked leaders along the fence, kept on steadily final 300M.
Caught wide early stages, dropped back and tucked into a 2-wide spot behind midfield, closed off well to be nearest at finish.
Dropped back from wide barrier, settled near last 8Ls off the pace, moved closer entering home turn, stayed on final 300 but never a serious threat.
Held up in mid-division, waited with until 300M, ran on one-paced.
Positioned one-out-one-back, pressed leader turning home, kept on well until no further response inside 100M.
Switched off to last from wide barrier, had 8Ls to make up passing 400M, swung widest home, made limited progress only.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, didn't respond to urge passing 400M, weakened 250M.
Towards the rear and given a patient ride, 3-wide turning for home, bid wide 350M, failed to pick up and never reached contention.
Urged along after the start, never really travelled, came under serious pressure 500M, soon behind.

Ridden to soon take up running from a wide gate, led most of way off the rails, hung on well under pressure. (Questioned for improved performance)
Broke well, shared pace far side, inside leader on rails around home bend, kept on same pace without quickening.
Never far off, kept on steadily until finding no extra close to home.
Soon taken back from a wide gate, waited with, ran on well between runners inside final 300 metres, did best work late.
Jumped moderately, settled in last few off the rails, switched out for a run upon straightening down the centre of the track, nearest at finish.
Jumped fairly from a wide gate, soon taken back to last few, remained similar into straight, produced good late impression closing stages.
Slowly away, soon recovered to better than midfield on rails, one-paced in straight.
Settled in midfield, produced for a run upon straightening, kept on well.
Well back, saved ground turning in, ran on past well-beaten runners in straight.
Settled just better than midfield, ran home one-paced.
Jumped fairly, settled wide without cover in midfield, ran home one-paced.
Slowly away, switched for rails and ridden along, settled in midfield, ran home one-paced.
Sluggish at start, settled behind midfield, slightly worse around home bend, ran home one-paced.
Raced prominently and wide without cover, soon weakened after straightening.
Made every post a winner, leading along the fence. Held of late challenge to record its first win.
Enjoyed the box seat. Chased gamely all the way down the running, just couldn't rein in the margin, finished off well.
Raced 3 back the paint, had cover. Never saw clear running until the 100m, got home well thereafter.
Camped behind midfield, 3 wide with cover. Peeled out wide entering the home straight and ran soundly to finish in the frame.
Ridden positively in the early stages, landing in second position, outside the leader, no cover. Didn't quicken at the 200m, and finished off one paced.
Jumped well then was steadied to find cover in the early stages. Had no luck and was posted 3 deep without cover on the circle. Stayed on reasonably despite the wide run.
Went back from a wide gate then went to the fence in the early stages to race with the backmakers. Finished off evenly.
Parked behind midfield, on the fence with cover. Just battled away in the home straight.
Missed the start then was taken back and settled in last position 1 off the fence with cover. Came wide in the straight and just plodded home.
Raced close to midfield, 3 wide with cover on the circle. Commenced to tire in the run to the line.
Travelled ahead of midfield, 2 wide with cover. Gave ground over the concluding stages.
Couldn't match the early speed of the race and settled towards the rear, 3 deep with cover. Made no impression in the run home.
Raced back in the field, 2 wide with cover. Failed to make any ground in the run to the line.
Raced worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Jumped awkwardly, then settled 3Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, dashed well to take the victory.
Rolled forward to obtain the box seat, ran on well to get 2nd, just beaten by a short head.
Began awkwardly, travelled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, switched wide turning in, finished off well for 3rd, beaten by a neck.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, blocked most straight, ran on steadily when clear 100M.
At rear, travelled 7.5ls behind the leader 2 wide , peeled wide turning in, finished off well.
Settled worse the midfield about 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, switched wide turning in, ran on steadily.
Camped handy however never had chance to slot in, made early move 800M to share the lead 4 wide without cover, kept on until 200M weakened. (Questioned rider, see incident report.)
Pushed forward to take the fence and led by 1L, stayed on until 200M weakened.
At rear, travelled 7Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, unable to make ground in straight.
Eased back, settled 5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, under pressure rounding the Home Turn, never ran on.
At rear, settled 6.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, never a factor.
Rolled forward to settle in a prominent spot, however tapped 3 wide without cover throughout, weakened 200M.
Ridden along to settle midfield, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide with cover, dropped off 500M.
Rolled forward to park outside the leader, soon flattened after straightening, tailed out.
Broke well to sit handy fore of midfield 1 off with cover, switched out 400m & shaken up, led 200m & drew clear.
Sharp break to briefly dispute lead on rail, settled in leader's slipstream, solid stretch run on fence to 2nd 150m, always held.
Taken back from wide, over-raced early 1 off with cover behind midfield, switched wide & driven final turn, closed well to claim 3rd.
Speed to dispute early lead, sat 2nd 1 off no cover, driven to lead 400m, headed 200m & weakened thereafter.
Tardy start, rousted to race rail midfield, driven turning in, switched out 300m, kept on soundly.
Fair start, sat midfield 1 off with cover, switched out & ridden 400m, hung into rival for some way, kept on evenly.
Broke OK, snagged back to slot 1 off with cover behind midfield, switched out & ridden 400m, plugged on one pace.
Taken back at start, sat midfield on rail, switched out on turn & driven 400m, boxed on for minor gains.
Fair break out wide, pushed early & caught 3 wide with cover midfield, niggled 600m, driven into stretch, bumped & leaned on, found little.
Slow start & bustled, raced rail near tail, switched out & ridden into stretch, plodded on same speed.
Broke well out wide & rolled to lead 1400m, soon to rail, shifted off fence under pressure turning in, headed 400m & tapered to wire.
Good start, caught wide & taken back to eventually slot 1 off with cover near rear, impeded & widest final turn, struggled in run.
Taken behind from wide gate, sat tail 1 off, switched out & driven turning in, found nothing, never a factor.
Good break, raced 3 wide no cover 3rd, driven turning in, found nil & weakened tamely.
Broke well, camped midfield 1 off with cover, switched out & shaken up turning in, quickened easily to lead 350m, drew clear for impressive win.
Disputed lead until soon settled rail 1 back in 3rd, ridden to press lead 350m, all out & boxed on but no match for winner.
Started well, taken back to slot midfield 1 off with cover, switched wide into stretch & driven, ran on soundly for clear 3rd.
Fast break, sat rail midfield, ridden & shifted out 400m, stayed on grittily for late gains.
Tardy break, raced back of midfield 3 wide no cover, ridden wide home turn, stayed on without threatening.
Fast break to lead, headed 1300m & sat handy 1 off with cover, switched out turning in, shaken up 380m, tapered in run home.
Dropped to tail at start, raced on rail, switched out on turn, 9L back into stretch, made decent late headway.
Awkward start, bustled early, raced 1 off with cover near rear, switched out on turn & hard-ridden 430m, boxed on one pace.
Taken back, sat 3 wide with cover near rear, niggled 600m, wide into stretch & plugged on for modest headway.
Outpaced early, raced rail near rear, ridden turning in, stayed on one pace.
Awkward break & lost ground, bustled on rail to settle midfield, switched 1 off 600m, driven turning in, weakened out.
Sharp start, raced handy on fence, off heels 1100m, sat 5th, driven & switched off rail home turn, off heels 350m, weakened tamely.
Good break from widest gate & bustled, rolled to 2nd 1 off no cover, slim lead under pressure 400m, all out & headed 350m, faded out.
Smart start & ridden to lead 1100m, to rail 1000m, set solid tempo until emptied & headed 400m, weakened tamely.
Pushed to hold the rail in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, held up 400M, dashed strongly when clear and scored.
Eased to rear, 8Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, blocked 400M, dashed strongly for 2nd.
Slow away, pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the slow pace, trapped 3 wide no cover, made early move 600M, led 300M, overhauled 100M, ran no fro 3rd.
Pushed to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 300M.
Pushed to hold box seat, held up 4-2, just held ground when clear.
Eased at start, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, checked 600M, dashed strongly 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, made early move 600M, run ended 200M.
Eased at start, 5.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Hard ridden forward to take rail and led by 1L at slow sectionals, out of fuel 250M.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, emptied in straight.
Sat 1L off the leader 2 wide, suited by the slow tempo, however no turn of foot, checked 200M.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader 3 wide, checked badly 800M, not suited by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Pressed forward, 2.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide no cover throughout, harmed by the slow tempo, weakened 250M.
Pushed early, midfield, 5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, flattened in straight.
Ridden forward to find cover settling 3-back, 1-off before turn. Peeled out 400m to make run drifting in under hard riding. Collared leader 100m and kept on well.
Used early to go forward and sit outsider leader. Shaken up 400m, led 350m, collared 100m, battled on.
Not pushed settling 4-back, 1-off before turn. Very wide entering straight and ran on strongly to be closest at finish.
Raced keenly early dropping to behind midfield away from fence. Taken widest into straight and finished off nicely.
Hard ridden to lead on settling. Hung out turn but still first into straight. Caught 350m and kept on one-paced.
Ridden vigorously to hold rail, taking box seat behind leader at turn. Closed in slightly top of straight before turning one-paced.
Taken back from wide draw and soon on rails 4-back from leader. Peeled out turn to make run but found little under hard riding.
Taken back from wide draw and settled last along rail. Taken very wide entering straight and doing best work final 200m.
Jumped well but kept away from fence by inside horse, settling 1-back, 1-off. Checked 250m when giving ground.
One of the first out but not pushed and settled 3-back the fence. Looked chance 350m before run closed. One-paced.
Ridden forward from wide draw but unable find cover and held 3-wide without cover. Bumped and unbalanced 300m when giving ground.
Lost left front plate soon after start, taken back to rear but away from fence. Found nothing under hard riding in straight.
Broke well and soon guided to the fence, had a smooth run in the slipstream of leader, quickened well to lead when pulled out inside 400M, kept on strongly towards the line.
Urged along after the start, led uncontested at a steady pace, rallied when the winner ranged alongside 300M, unable to draw level with winner but held on well for 2nd.
Held up in mid-division, saved ground along the fence, held up early straight, ridden 300M to improve, went 3rd inside 150M but not reaching first two.
Dropped back to the rear, behind horses early straight and had no clear run until 250M, stayed on well and got up for 4th just in time.
Settled 2-wide in mid-pack, into clear 350M, made good initial progress under light-weight but run peaked 150M from home.
Not hurried, settled towards the rear, 5Ls off the pace in the first half, held up early straight, angled out to clear 250M and closed off well.
Ridden more prominent than usual, tracked leader one out one back, lacked acceleration when put under pressure, kept on one-paced to the line. (Jockey questioned.)
Began awkwardly, in touch behind leaders, not quickened under pressure, weakened 100M.
Dropped back to the rear, didn't have the clearest of runs in straight, checked near 200M and again 150M, would have been closer.
Never far off along the 3-path, had no cover from 1100M, outpaced passing 400M, soon out of contention.
Settled 3-wide in mid-division, kept on same pace turning home, lacked further response passing 200M.
Held up 3-wide towards the rear, taken widest passing 450M, not quickened, eased when no chance final 150M.
Allowed to find feet racing between horses in midfield. Entered straight behind wall of horses, powered through split 250m, hit front 100m, just held.
Bumped, unbalanced start, dropping behind midfield, 3-wide but with cover. Taken wide 400m, finished strongly to just fail.
Jumped well, settling in midfield 3-wide with cover. Four-wide into straight and kept on steadily to be closest at finish.
Jumped well, rolling forward to sit outside leader when pace slackened. Took lead 250m, kept on well until swamped final strides.
Slow into stride, steadied 1100m when close to heels. Turned into straight very wide and ran home strongly.
Taken forward from good draw to sit 2-back the fence. No run until 300m then checked when opening closed 200m. Kept on.
Rolled forward to sit outside early leader before being shuffled back to fifth when pace slacked. Looked chance entering straight before swamped final 100m.
Ridden forward from wide draw and took over lead 1400m when pace slacked. Still ahead 300m before tiring final stages.
Taken back from wide draw, steadied 1100m dropping to clear last. Well back entering straight but made good ground final 200m.
No early speed and shuffled to rear despite good draw. Unable to find run 400m, shifted in 200m, kept on one-paced.
Taken forward from wide draw but trapped 3-wide without cover outsider leaders. Still in contention 200m before flattened.
Outpaced early but held to rail behind midfield. Remained on fence turning for home but only one-pace final 400m.
Jumped straight to the front from wide draw, crossed in easily and dropped anchor. Shuffled back to 3rd before turn, gave ground soon after entering straight.
Shifted out start then over-raced before striking heels and blundering. No response when put under pressure 400m, eased final 200m. (See racing incidents).
Held up near the rear, came with a well-timed challenge inside 400M, ran on strongly to get up near line.
Dropped back to the rear from wide barrier, patiently waited with until 400M, finished fastest down outside, just failed.
Settled 3-wide in midfield with cover, came with a strong looking run when driven passing 400M, came close to win and only shaded by first 2 final stages.
Began only fairly, soon driven to lead, led comfortably, pushed out and opened up a 2L advantage mid-straight, kept on well and was only caught final few strides.
Towards the rear, saved ground on the fence throughout, lacked instant acceleration early straight, closed off strongly final 200M but unable to be ridden out close home.
Niggled along to hold a handy position behind leaders, raced tight near 300M, had every chance after but not going the pace to seriously challenge.
Up with early pace, unable to tuck in for cover and never closer than 3-wide the whole way, kept on evenly final 300M.
Began awkwardly, gradually improved position along the fence, in midfield turning for home, ran on to go 2nd briefly near 200M, faded towards the finish.
Up with early pace, always prominent behind leaders, had his chance, shifted in under pressure 300M, one paced final 200M.
Held up behind midfield, 3-wide turning for home, shifted out to challenge inside 400M, stayed on fairly, never threatened.
Positioned ahead of midfield, travelled well throughout but was behind a line of one-paced horses in straight, had no clear run to the line, not properly tested.
Held up in midfield, gave limited response turning in, never got into contention.
Reserved at the rear, urged along 450M but failed to respond, never involved. (Jockey and Trainer questioned.)
Sent forward to race outside the lead, found nothing when pressed and weakened badly from 300M.
