Jumped nicely, shared pace far side, taken back to one-out-one-back position rounding home bend, soon renewed effort after straightening, took command passing the 200 metres.
Slightly slow out, settled well behind, commenced move rounding home bend but baulked for a run early in straight, finished off race nicely.
Settled well behind, ran on under pressure down the centre of the straight to be nearest at finish. (Tactic questioned) (Blood in trachea).
Slightly slow out, settled just worse than midfield, kept on steadily without quickening.
Jumped fairly, settled in midfield, ran on before finding no extra inside final 200 metres.
Jumped fairly, settled behind midfield, switched out for a run entering straight, found nothing under pressure.
Jumped fairly, settled in forward of midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, kept on before fading inside final 200 metres.
Jumped well from a wide draw, with leaders briefly dropping backward steadily, became last into straight, only went past well-beaten horses. (Bled)
Jumped fairly, settled just off the pace and 3-wide most of way, faded steadily in straight.
Jumped fairly from the widest gate, shared the pace out wide to 300 metres, folded up quickly.
Jumped nicely from the one draw, soon taken back to midfield, improving in home straight when badly baulked for a run inside final 200 metres.
Jumped moderately, soon picked up on rails to share the pace, folded up quickly passing the 200 metres.
Went straight to the front along the grandstand side & led easily. Cruised to the line and won effortlessly.
Had every chance after getting a nice trial into the race tracking the leaders, stands rail. No excuses.
Was prominently placed on the grandstand side, 1 off the paint with cover. Maintained a reasonably gallop to the wire.
Raced up with the leaders, about 3 from the stand side, no cover. Came up flat over the final stages.
Travelled nearer the far side, towards the rear of the field, had cover at stages. Made some late headway.
Parked in 3rd position, stands rail with cover. Faded over the final 200m.
Raced worse than midfield, closer to the grandstand side and had cover. Kept on at the same speed in the run to the post.
Settled early 3-4 from the stands rail, behind the pace, had cover. Gave ground over the last furlong.
Parked along the center of the track, no cover and midfield. Failed to respond to pressure and never looked likely.
Raced towards the grandstand side back in the field with cover. Failed to close off.
Couldn't match the early speed of the race and travelled a long last, closer to the stands rail. Drifted in over the final 450m, passed tiring horses.
Went back from an unfavorable gate settling midfield near the far side. Struggled over the final furlong.
Began awkwardly then was hampered after the start setting midfield closer to the far side. Hung in for most of the race and finished well back. (To trial).
Settled along the middle of the track, on the speed, no cover. Was a beaten horse passing the 400m, and tailed out. (To trial).
Ridden forward to take the fence and led by 1-1/2Ls at fast sectionals, made all and scored by 1-3/4Ls comfortably.
Ridden forward to settle 1-1/2Ls outside the leader at fast sectionals, hung on well to get 2nd but without threatening to the winner.
Taken back, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 3-4 wide with cover, benefited by the fast pace, finished strongly for 3rd.
Eased start, settled 7Ls behind the leader 4 wide with cover, suited by the fast pace, ran on well.
Niggled along throughout, settled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, kept on the same pace in straight.
Hard ridden forward, however trapped wide without cover throughout, never looked competitive.
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along, travelled 8-1/2Ls behind the leader 2-3 wide with cover, benefited by the fast pace, made some ground in straight. (Questioned rider, see incident report)
Rolled forward, travelled 4-1/2Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, weakened soon after straitening.
Always at rear, never a factor.
Raced midfield however trapped wide without cover throughout, never a factor.
Always at rear, niggled along throughout, tailed out.
Ridden forward, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 3 wide without cover, flattened badly soon after straightening, tailed off. (Bled)
Broke well, settled 3 wide with cover midfield, driven widest into stretch, surging run to lead close home.
Quickest to stride, soon headed & sat 1 back on rail, 2 back the rail 800m & shifted out for 3-wide progress on turn, led 350m, headed last strides.
Fast break, soon led & to rail 1st turn, headed 1000m, nudged along 700m, driven into stretch, shifted out & kept on for 3rd.
Broke well, taken behind, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, driven home turn, closed off well & just missed frame.
Broke OK, raced rail behind midfield, ridden 500m & shifted out in stretch, stayed on soundly.
Fair break, caught wide no cover midfield, rolled to lead 1000m, to rail 800m, shaken up 400m, headed 350m & no extra.
Taken to tail at break, parked 3 wide in rear backstretch, wide on home turn, ran on for minor inroads.
Dwelt & bustled to race midfield 1 off with cover, driven along 800m & shifted wide into stretch, plugged on one pace.
Good break, settled rail midfield, niggled 800m, shifted out on turn & driven, one-paced & wilting when hampered 100m & eased.
Broke OK, ridden to press lead 1 off at 1400m, handy 3rd 1000m, ridden under pressure 600m, found nothing.
Slow start & bustled early, raced rail last trio, at tail & ridden 600m, struggled in run home.
Rousted at break to race handy 1 off with cover, over-raced 1200m, forced 3 wide no cover 800m, prominent turning in, faded in run.
Missed break, raced near tail 1 off with cover, niggled backstretch, hard-ridden turning in, found nothing & never a factor.
Sharp start to lead on rail, 2L clear when shaken up 300m, extended until tapered close home, held on at wire.
Good break, rousted early from wide gate to race fore of midfield 1 off with cover, shifted out & driven 400m, surged home for closing 2nd.
Tardy start, bustled forward on rail to 1 back 3rd at 600m, shaken up to 2nd 300m, kept on evenly, lost 2nd 50m.
Fast start from widest gate, caught 3 wide no cover 3rd, lost ground 600m, 6th & wide on home turn, ran on without threatening.
Fair start, pace to sit 2nd outside leader, ridden 400m, lost 2nd 300m, one-paced in run & faded closing stages.
Broke well, settled handy 1 off with cover, driven under pressure 450m, boxed on same speed.
Broke OK, taken back & soon bustled in rear, progress 600m, 8L back into stretch, ran on for minor gains centre track.
Smart start, raced midfield 2 wide with cover, ridden 700m, hard-driven turning in, plugged on in tepid stretch run.
Crowded start, raced near rear 1 off with cover, driven into stretch, plodded on one pace centre track.
Broke well, taken back to race 1 off with cover behind midfield, ridden 400m, found little & never a factor.
Missed break & several lengths adrift, 6L detached at tail turning for home, ran on past beaten rival.
Slow start, rousted to race rail behind midfield, off heels & lost ground 700m, well back turning in, struggled & eased.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader 3 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, made steady ground 300M to score.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leader 3 wide, favoured by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Hard ridden forward, 3Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, held ground for 3rd.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 4Ls off the fast pace on the fence, raced on slower part of the track throughout, ran on ok.
Eased at start, settled nicely at back, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made some ground 200M.
Pushed to keep up in box seat, raced on slower part of the track throughout, harmed by the fast pace, flattened 200M.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1.5Ls at fast sectionals, raced on slower part of the track, out of fuel 200M.
Crossed easily and sat just off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the fast tempo, soon emptied 350M.
Very slow away, 8Ls off the leader on the rails, suited by the fast pace, no progress.
Hard ridden but never muster, struggled in midfield, dropped off steadily 400M.
Raced on slower part of the track throughout, never better than midfield.
Never a factor.
Jumped straight to the front to lead comfortably to course proper, kicked clear 400m, shaken up 300m, bolted in for easy win.
Allowed to settle in midfield early, shifted in to centre course 700m, shaken up 400m, kept on steadily under hard riding.
Jumped well but not enough speed settling along outside rail 5L from leader. Ran on steadily from 400m under hard riding.
Jumped well and stalked early leaders to course proper. Shaken up from 400m but only one-paced to the line.
Began well but no early pace and shuffled to rear along outside rail. Under pressure from 400m and made ground steadily.
Quickly into stride to sit outside leader close to outer rail. Raced ungenerously with head on side and difficult to rise final 200m, flattened.
Buffeted between horses soon after start, recovered and shifted towards outer rail. Made progress to 200m, then flattened.
Slow into stride, dropping back along outer fence. Clear last into course proper but made up good ground final stages.
Hard ridden from the start to sit inside leader. Under pressure soon after entering course proper, giving ground from 350m.
A little slow into stride and held in centre track towards rear. Shaken up entering course proper but only one-paced.
Began awkwardly but soon into stride, shifting to outer rail 6L from leader. Limited response when asked 400m, flattened late.
Hard ridden from inside draw to hold position and thereafter raced on own down centre track. Gave ground from 400m.
Crowded out at start and soon last, moving to outer fence. Found nothing under hard riding final 400m.
Badly hampered soon after start, made up some ground initially, found little when asked 400m and under whip from 200m.
Always travelled strongly behind leaders, took lead nearing 300M and quickened clear, well in control mid-straight, eased towards finish.
Travelled in 5th not far off from the pace, ran on to go 2nd near 200M, kept on but not going the pace to challenge winner.
Caught wide early stages, slotted into a 2-wide position behind midfield approaching back-straight, given reminders halfway, stayed on for moderate 3rd.
Reserved at the rear, waited with until 400M, stayed on from off the pace but not reached leaders.
Tracked leaders on inside, shifted out 500M to improve, kept on same pace final 300M, never seriously threatened.
Took keen hold towards the rear, travelled better passing halfway, stayed on fairly inside 300M, never got near to leaders.
Slow to muster, pressed leader from 1200M, briefly led 400M out but couldn't match finishing pace of first few, weakened 200M.
In mid-division, unable to get closer than 3-wide throughout, kept on same pace inside 300M, no impression.
Settled 3-wide at the back, swung widest home, gave very limited response.
Settled behind midfield, saved ground along the fence but found little when asked, eased when no chance.
Held up towards the rear, travelled only fairly, failed to pick up when placed under pressure, never involved.
Settled midfield along the fence, came under pressure home turn, soon out of contention.
Held up 3-wide in mid-division, left with no cover entering back straight, soon beaten on straightening, eased.
Sent forward, led to near 400M, gave ground rapidly turning into straight. (Unacceptable Performance.)

Made all, setting good pace, unchallenged.
Prominent early, settling better than midfield, finished off race nicely to snatch 2nd on line.
Jumped fairly, chased leaders under urge in middle stages, given reminders over 200 metres out, kept on well without quickening.
Jumped awkwardly from the one gate, settled in rear of midfield racing down the centre of the track, fought on nicely under pressure.
Jumped fairly, settled in 5th within striking distance, ran home one-paced. (Jockey said horse raced greenly.)
Jumped awkwardly, settled in last few, produced good late impression along stands rails.
Showed pace to race alongside leader eventual winner, unable to sustain effort from over 200 metres out.
Settled in midfield, ran home one-paced, ducked in sharply at the finish.
Badly jostled at start, raced greenly well behind, took closer order coming onto course proper, ran home one-paced, badly hampered on the line.
Prominent to halfway, faded gradually.
Lacked pace and soon dropped behind midfield, found nothing.
Slightly slow out, soon dropped to last few, never on terms.
Jumped fairly, settled in midfield on stands rails, gradually rolled backward from halfway mark, made no further impression.
Played up before start, began poorly, always struggling in last few, detached from field passing the 300 metres.
Settled midfield, on the rails with cover. Shifted out before the home turn, was held up early in the straight, got going late under hard riding.
Was posted deep on the speed in the early stages before drifting back and settling 2-3 wide with cover, midfield. Peeled out turning for home and finished off purpose.
Parked in front of midfield, 2 deep with cover. Hit the lead near the 250m, grudgingly gave way over the final stages.
Made its run from behind midfield, had cover, 1 off. Closed off willing down the outside.
Camped ahead of midfield, 3 wide with cover. Kept on evenly in the run to the line.
Couldn't go early, settling well back in the field, on the fence with cover. Ran into traffic problems in the straight, finished off reasonably over the last 100m.
Stalked the leader on the fence. Was badly held up until passing the furlong, finished off soundly after switching out into the clear.
Settled 1 out 1 back. Held up early in the straight, never did much once into clear running.
Did plenty of work to go forward to travel prominently, 3 deep without cover on the circle. Faded over the concluding stages.
Travelled in last position on the rails with cover. Never ran on and was one paced over the final stages.
Ridden with plenty of purpose early in the race to assume 2nd position outside the leader. Was a beaten horse after the 200m, and tired easily thereafter.
Vigorously ridden in the early stages to take up the lead along the fence after the 900m. Was gassed in the straight.
Positioned 4th from the rear 1 off with cover. Struggled in the home stretch and showed no response in the straight.
Raced at the tail of the field, 2 deep with cover. Failed to close off and finished well back.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, gradually improved early straight, accelerated strongly to score by 1.5Ls.
Settled in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the good pace on the fence, ran on well to get 2nd but without any threats to the winner.
Raced midfield, settled 4.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, could not find a clear run until 300M, dashed on well to get 3rd.
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on well until 100M and kept on the same pace to the line.
Settled worse than midfield about 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, peeled wide turning in, made some ground after straightening.
Settled worse than midfield about 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, made some ground after straightening.
Camped handy, settled 1.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide with cover, made no acceleration in straight.
Hard ridden forward to take the fence and share the lead at good pace, hung on until 150M flattened.
Failed to muster early, travelled 8Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, swung wide turning in, ran on only fairly.
Always at rear, never a factor.
Raced keenly in early stages, then travelled 4Ls off the good pace 3 wide with cover, never ran on.
Raced in front of midfield about 2.5Ls off the good pace 3 wide with cover, weakened 350M.
Rolled forward to park outside the leader at good pace, flattened 300M. (Bled)
Camped handy, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, soon weakened badly after straightening.
Fast break to lead, snagged rail 1200m, shaken up & extended 350m, ran on well to wire.
Taken back to sit just off rail behind midfield, string traveller turning in, not clear run in stretch, quickened 250m, strong closer to wire.
Smart start, raced 1 back on rail, driven 400m, stayed on evenly to edge 3rd final stride.
Sharp start & rousted early to close 2nd 3 wide no cover, to 1 off 700m, ridden home turn, battled in pursuit, tapered & lost 3rd on line.
Lacked early pace, raced rail midfield, driven turning in, stayed on for steady progress.
Taken behind to rail at tail, switched very wide turning for home & driven, stayed on centre track for sound inroads.
Tardy start, rolled forward to race 5th 1 off with cover, 3 wide for progress 600m, driven to brief 3rd 400m, weakened in run home.
Broke OK, covered up behind midfield, not clear run in home stretch, shaken up 150m, one pace to wire.
Fair break, pushed on to sit 3rd 1 off, driven under pressure turning in, out-paced into stretch & faded in run.
Broke OK, settled midfield 1 off with cover, driven into home turn, plugged on one pace.
Broke OK, trapped 3 deep with cover midfield, hard ridden centre track 400m, outpaced & found little, eased when no extra.
Broke well out wide, caught 4 deep no cover midfield, progress 700m, driven home turn, emptied 300m & faded.
Taken back at start, raced last air 1 off, ridden 600m, forced widest home turn, struggled in run.
Tardy start, raced wide with cover behind midfield, progress 600m, emptied 350m & tailed off.
Sharp break, camped rail midfield, shifted out 500m, shaken up 400m, quickened to join lead 150m, edged duel to wire.
Fast break to lead, crossed to rail 1400m & settled 1 back, not clear run in stretch until quickened to lead 150m, tight duel, headed last stride.
Snagged back to last at break, soon 2L adrift & driven, closed up & niggled 600m, hard-ridden at tail 400m, stormed late to grab 3rd at line.
Good start, sat rail behind midfield, switched out home turn, off heels 350m & not clear run, switched to rail & driven 200m, ran on soundly.
Broke OK, sat behind midfield 1 off with cover, smooth progress into stretch, not clear run until driven 300m, chased soundly to wire.
Sharp start, rolled wide to lead after 1400m, to rail 1300m, shaken up into stretch, all out & headed 150m, faded to wire.
Slow start, ridden early & raced 3wide near rear, widest & driven turning in, stayed on for minor headway.
Slow start, raced 1 off near rear, shifted out & ridden final turn, plugged on evenly.
Broke well, sat midfield 1 off with cover, ridden 600m & shifted out home turn, plugged on one pace.
Fair break, pushed on to sit handy 1 off with cover, switched out 700m, 3 wide 3rd into stretch, outpaced & plodded on tamely.
Awkward break, raced rail near rear, ridden 600m, plugged on same speed.
Quick to stride widest gate, rolled to dispute lead 3 wide 1200m, settled 2nd 1 off, driven 400m, one-paced & emptied 200m, faded thereafter.
Slow break, bustled early, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, driven 500m & wide home turn, struggled in run to wire.
Tardy start, rolled on & caught 3 wide no cover midfield, wide on turn & driven, found nothing, faded out.
Jumped well, easily kept up in midfield, 2.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, dashed strongly 400M despite not suited by the slow pace, scored with some in hand.
Eased to sit outside the leader, enjoyed the slow tempo, led 300M, hung on until 150M overhauled.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, ran on well for 3rd.
Pushed to take the rail and led by 0.5Ls at slow sectionals, raced on slower part of track throughout, flattened 200M.
Behind midfield, 4Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash in straight.
2Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, lack room most straight, just held ground.
Slow away, hard ridden to keep up with the field, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on fairly.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, raced on slower part of track throughout, emptied 300M.
Slow away, midfield, 3Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow pace and raced on slower part of track throughout, faded 300M.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, no progress.
Eased back, harmed by the slow pace, never a factor.
Never competitive, tailed out.
Wounded right hind cannon before start. Jumped well, stalked early leaders to course proper, got split approaching 200m, powered clear for easy win.
Beaten for early speed and shuffled towards rear. Caught behind horses 500m, switched to centre track, finished strongly.
Allowed to settle behind leading pack to course proper. Switched in for clear running 400m and ran on steadily.
Quickly into stride on the outside of early leader. Ridden to take lead 400m, collared 200m, kept on one paced.
Jumped fairly and then awkward on heels, dropping to behind midfield, Picked up speed from 300m, doing best work at finish.
Began well, racing along grandstand rail half length from leader. Looked chance 400m and still close 200m before flattened.
Began OK, moving close to outer rail before racing fiercely from 700m. Settled better 400m, shifted out 300m, kept on one paced.
Threw head up and shifted out at start. Raced in midfield down centre track, closed in 400m before condition gave out.
No early speed, dropping to rear but moving towards grandstand rail. Made up ground from 400m to 200m before tiring.
Bumped and unbalanced at start, dropping to last along centre track. Failed to respond under hard riding from 400m.
Jumped well but unable to stay with leaders, dropping to midfield. Found nothing from 400m and bumped 150m when weakening.
Began well and quickly up with leaders. Put under pressure from 400m but found little and gradually slipped back.
Crowded and unbalanced start, dropping to near last. Stayed at rear and no response when asked final 400m.

Jumped awkwardly but soon into stride travelling strongly in the lead. Came off bridle 500m and started making breathing noises from 400m, weakening badly. Has substantial mucus in trachea. (See racing incidents).
Settled towards the rear, travelled nicely behind race favourite, quickened up well to take lead 150M, kept on towards the finish.
Travelled strongly in mid-division, angled out into clear 450M, quickened to lead nearing 200M but not pace of winner over final 150M.
Switched off to last and given a waiting ride, reluctant to shift into clear running early straight, made good headway when clear inside 200M, hung late and proved difficult to ride.
Obtained lead along fence under positive riding, unable to quicken with first two passing 300M but kept on steadily for moderate 4th.
Slow to begin, urged along the rail, 4Ls off the pace halfway, stayed on mildly for a non-threatening 5th.
Sent forward but unable to find the rail, led 2-wide to home straight, couldn't find extra under pressure, kept on same pace to line.
Tracked leaders, held every chance turning in, kept on steadily until weakened inside 150M.
Held up midfield along the fence, ran on one paced final 400M and never seriously threatened.
Reserved in a 3-wide spot towards the rear, not quickened under pressure, never in contention.
Settled 3-wide midfield, found little when asked, eased final 200M.
Always prominent, caught 3-wide no cover over the home turn, weakened passing 400M.
Allowed to settle 3-back the fence to turn, came off fence entering straight but had to switch in to find running. Hit front 100m and kept on well.
Jumped well and soon in lead along rail. Kicked when challenged 400m, and kept finding despite being passed 100m out.
Raced between horses back stretch before being pocketed around turn. No run until switching wide 250m. Finished strongly.
Beaten for early speed, dropping to rear along fence. Came off fence but no run until final stages. Not fully tested.
Bumped, shifted in start, but then mustered speed to sit one-back, one-off. Battled keenly to 200m before swamped closing stages.
Broke start and reloaded. Ridden patiently early to find cover but raced keenly from 1100m. Forced wide without cover turn, one-paced in straight.
Began fairly but quickly mustered speed to sit outside leader before turn. Challenged strongly 400m to 200m before flattened.
Taken forward but raced tightly back stretch and caught 3-wide into turn. Made ground early straight turning one paced from 200m.
Restrained soon after start and clear last when taken closer to fence. Well back entering straight but made good late ground.
Jumped fairly, refused to stretch out and became detached from field. Turned wide 400m and ran on steadily.
Jumped OK and ridden to hold fence 4-back from leader. Closed in slightly top of straight before becoming one-paced.
Beaten for early pace and soon at rear but wide. Taken further out entering straight but only one-paced under hard riding.
Jumped well and soon in box seat behind leader. Started to give ground soon after entering straight, drifting back gradually.
Bumped start but ridden forward though kept wide. Taken wider entering straight but found little under hard riding.
Out in line, raced 3ls back on rails, enjoyed easy trip to bend, gained inside run final 300m to drive through along rails and take narrow victory.

Went forward to race outside leader, did share of work with strong early pace, improved to be on terms turning and took over soon after, defied them for most on straight just losing out narrowly late.
Landed a midfield spot, 3-4ls back racing in two wide lie, ok trip to turn and outside eventual winner turning in, improved from 300m and stayed on well but was no match for first two.
Dropped back to a spot on rails, 5ls or so away in midfield, had solid pace to suit and used little to bend, came off fence rounding bend and made progress through pack final 300m to make frame.

Dropped back soon after start to race 6-7ls back on rails, suited by tempo, set a bit of a task however followed eventual winner along rails in home stretch and made decent progress to just miss frame.
Landed a prominent spot on leaders back, forced to use a little with solid early sections, right there turning and looked a place chance however peaked final 200m and just missed frame.
Took up a nice position on leaders back, did a bit on sped early, close enough turning and eased 3 wide to challenge, produced a 1 paced effort in straight but wasn't far away on line.
Took a spot behind midfield raced 2 wide, fair run with speed to suit, tracked into race 3 wide turning in, didn't let down with a sprint and struggled to get much closer final furlong.
Showed good speed to take up running, used a bit in early stages with solid sections, kept advantage to bend, headed soon after turning and dropped out gradually after early work.
Dropped back to race 6-7ls back behind midfield, aided by a solid tempo, still well back turning, switched wider and closed off evenly but couldn't get much closer last 200m.
Drifted back to last from a tricky gate, ended up the part of 10ls back, struggled to go early speed, still last turning, passed a few tired runners late but never likely.
No early pace and settled towards rear, best part of 8ls back and was suited by speed, didn't pick up final 400m when required and just battled in straight. (lame)
Unable to slot in and raced 3 wide without cover just in front of midfield, did it tough with speed on, there to turn but gradually faded when couldn't sustain effort.
Took a position in midfield, raced 3 wide with cover, 5ls back to turn, came wider in straight and chased solidly, picked up leaders final 100m for a deserved win.
Rolled forward to take up running, set tempo to suit throughout, had them chasing from 400m, stuck to task but couldn't hold out late challenge.

Slotted into ideal spot 1 out 1 back, was a little difficult to settle but had run of the race to turn, set out after leader and was on terms by 200m, just unable to raise extra effort inside final 50m.
Assumed a midfield role 5ls away in running line, fair run in mid-section, made ground through pack turning, kept chasing to finish soundly on heels of place getters.
Unable to slot in and posted 3 wide without cover, did share of work but speed wasn't overly taxing, amongst challengers for most of straight but just tired a touch late.

Dropped back from a wide alley to race 3 wide behind midfield with cover, raced 6-7ls back, had cover to turn, produced usual strong finish from tail but unable to pair back margin, closed well enough to be nearest at finish.
Lacked usual pace and settled back with last few, 8ls for leaders, improved at 400m, made solid progress between runners in straight making many lengths to be nearest on line.
Tardy to begin, raced in rear division 6-7ls back in running line, still well back to bend, made some ground without looking likely.
Took a midfield spot on rails 4ls or so away, had a quiet trip throughout, came two wide turning, didn't finish off as it had done in the past.
Dropped back to tails from a tricky gate, raced 9-10ls back in running line, set too great a task, passed a few tired ones late making only minor headway.
Positioned just off midfield, 6ls back in running line, fair trip with steady speed, no real dash in straight and just struggled final 300m.
Landed a closer spot on rails behind leader, had even trip with fair sections, began to struggle before bend, dropped right out in straight.
Fractious in gates, Showed usual pace to race at leaders girth, there to bend but quickly gave ground when it became apparent that extra trip wasn't too his liking, dropped right out.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Settled mainly in midfield, came to challenge upon straightening, fought on steadily to just get up on line. (Questioned for improved performance)
Very slow out, trailed the field most of way, commenced move approaching home turn, ran on well to be nearest at finish.
Broke well, travelled prominently, hit the front under pressure inside the 200 metres but unable to sustain effort and pipped at post.
Hard ridden to cross, shared the lead on the fence at advantageous slow sectionals, did not make early move with the other leader from 600M, stayed on strongly in straight, just missed place.
Jumped fairly, settled in midfield or just worse, behind midfield entering straight but badly baulked for a run most of way, produced very good late impression.
Jumped awkwardly losing ground, settled behind midfield, became last coming out of back straight the second time, baulked for a run early in straight, finished off race under pressure nicely.
Jumped moderately, remained well back before taking closer order rounding home bend, kept on steadily without quickening in the run home.
Well there early stages, forced to steady to midfield on rails down home straight the first time, just off midfield around final bend, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Led early stages, remained just behind leaders most of way to straight, found nothing.

Sluggish at start, wide in midfield early, improved down home straight the first time, disputed lead coming out, led 800 metres out going over 2L clear around the bend, folded up quickly over 200 metres out.
Never better than midfield hugging the rails throughout, found nothing.
Travelled on the speed, 3 deep without cover, before crossing after the 500m and racing 1 off in 2nd position. Dug deep in the straight and went to the line strongly.
Did plenty of work to eventually cross and lead along the paint after the 600m. Fought gamely all the way to the wire under hard riding.
Parked 3 back the paint, had cover. Finished off soundly.
Pushed along early and raced prominently. Got cover on the circle and settled 1 out 1 back. Maintained a good gallop down the running.
Made its run from last position on the fence with cover. Railed up in the straight and closed off well.
Got shuffled back early, setting 2 deep with cover, midfield. Held its ground in the home straight.
Parked 4th from the rear, 2 wide with cover. Switched in after the 300m, battled away in the run to the post.
Had no excuses after box seating. Was a beaten horse early in the straight.
Camped back in the field, 1 off with cover. Came wide in the home straight and closed off one paced, never threatened.
Settled midfield after receiving interference passing the 800m, travelling worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Made no impression in the home stretch.
Raced with the backmakers, on the rails with cover. Failed to close off.
Settled midfield 3 wide, had cover for most of the circle, struggled in the straight.
Sent forward to take the lead by 3/4Ls on the fence at fast sectionals, battled on strongly final 200M and scored by a nose.
Pushed forward to take the box seat, suited by the fast tempo, battled on gamely with the winner inside 200M, just beaten by a narrow margin.
Camped handy, settled 2Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, suited by the fast pace, ran on well to get 3rd despite proved very difficult to ride in straight.
Pushed forward to settled outside the leader at fast pace, hung out slightly rounding the Home Turn, stayed on one pace in straight.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, suited by the fast pace, made some ground in straight without threatening.
Eased back, settled 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, suited by the fast pace, made some ground in straight without any threats.
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along, travelled 8Ls off the fast pace at rear, passed some tired horses.
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along, travelled 4Ls off the fast pace 3 wide with cover, never looked competitive.
Raced worse than midfield about 5Ls off the fast pace on the fence, never ran on.
Rolled forward to park outside the leader at fast sectionals, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, dropped off rounding the Home Turn.
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along, raced midfield but trapped 4 wide without cover throughout, flattened rounding the Home Turn, tailed out.
Failed to cross from a wide barrier, settled 6.5Ls off the fast pace 2 wide with cover, eased down over the concluding stages. (Questioned rider, see incident report)
Fair break, caught 3 wide 1st turn, 1 off with cover 1100m, niggled 700m, wide into stretch & bumped 300m, led 100m, caught on line.
Broke well, to rail behind midfield, switched out to challenge 300m & bumped, determined drive to share spoils at wire.
Broke sharply, settled rail midfield, over-raced 1200m, progress into final turn, closing & switched out 100m, ran on for clear 3rd.
Taken behind from wide gate, camped at tail, ridden for progress 500m, switched out into stretch, closed off for sound gains.
Speed at start, rolled to lead 1 off 1200m, to rail 1000m, shaken up 300m, all out 100m & swamped in run.
Sharp break & handy, settled handy 4th on fence 1000m, switched 1 off 800m, wide into stretch, plugged on one pace.
Sluggish start, sat rail near rear, ridden turning in, switched out 250m & stayed on evenly.
Slow break, bustled to 1 off with cover midfield, niggled backstretch, driven 500m, one-paced in run home.
Broke OK, settled 1 off near rear, outpaced & to rail 400m, plugged on tamely past beaten rivals.
Fast break to lead, soon to rail, headed 1200m & relented to track 1 back at 1000m, ridden 500m, boxed on until emptied 200m.
Quick to stride, raced close up 3rd 1off with cover, faced the breeze from 1000m, driven 500m, every chance turning in, found nothing & wilted.
Good start, snagged back to race 5th 1 off with cover, outpaced 400m, crowded & bumped 300m, faded thereafter.
Tardy at break & bustled early to sit rail midfield, switched out 300m, driven & quickened to decisive lead 150m, drew clear.
Rousted early to settle handy 1 off with cover, ridden 500m, ran on soundly under strong drive without threatening winner.
Good break, prominent 1st turn, sat 2nd 1 off, ridden 400m, joined leader 200m, edged ahead 130m, soon headed & battled to hold 3rd.
Speed to lead initially, soon settled 1 back on rail, switched out 250m, stayed on without threatening.
Fast break to lead on rail 1st turn, over-raced backstretch, driven turning in, joined 200m, duelled briefly until headed 150m & emptied, fought on when beaten.
Awkward break, raced midfield 1 off with cover, driven 500m, switched out turning in, stayed on one pace.
Taken back at break to sit rail behind midfield, driven home turn, switched out 300m, kept on for modest headway.
Broke OK, settled 1 off with cover behind midfield, switched out & driven 300m, one-paced in run home.
Snagged to rail near rear, ridden 400m, boxed on moderately.
Taken behind at break to race detached at tail, driven 400m, kept on past beaten rivals.
Fast start, caught 3 wide no cover handy, ridden 450m, emptied out turning in & faded out.
Broke well & handy initially, taken back 1100m & over-raced 3 wide with cover midfield, wide & driven 400m, found nil & faded tamely.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, made all.
In front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 300M for 2nd.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, held ground for 3rd.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, worked around the field 600M in 4 wide, dashed strongly 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader on the rails, harmed by the slow pace, blocked 400m to 200m, just ran on when clear.
Pushed forward, box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, flattened 200M.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, lack room most straight, little dash.
Attempted to find midfield spot early, however trapped wide, then eased to rear for cover, 8Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash in straight.
Pushed forward to cross, settled 1L off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, weakened 250M.
Midfield, checked early, 3Ls off the leader along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, no progress.
Eased at start, took rail behind the field, 6Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow pace, no dash.
Began well and soon in front but kept away from fence by inside runner. Dropped to 2nd entering straight, retook lead 200m and kept finding to the line.
Began awkwardly but mustered quickly between horses to sit one-off, one-back by turn. Close to heels 300m before getting split and battled on well.
Hard ridden from start to get fence and hold off leader. Hit the straight first, caught 200m but kept battling to the line.
Began best but couldn't match early speed and settled 3rd but wide without cover. Kept on well in straight under hard riding.
Began well, grabbing rail on settling but unable hold position and eased into box seat entering turn. Swung wide into straight and kept on one-paced.
Ridden up from wide draw and held 3-wide back stretch and turn. Taken wide into straight and kept on one-paced.
Jumped fairly, raced between horses and lost position around turn. Some progress in straight. Stewards' inquiry into running (See racing incidents).
Bumped at start and hard ridden to hold position in midfield. Lost position around turn, one-paced final 400m.
Began only fairly and last on settling. Cut in to rail before turn, improved position around turn but found little in straight.
Slow into stride and then checked. Improved around turn, limited response 300m, hands and heels final 200m.
Beaten for early speed dropping to last before turn. Became detached from field entering straight and finished tailed off.
Tracked leader in a strongly run race, ran on well under light weight, shot clear inside 150M and won it with ease.
Held up patiently near the rear, raced 3-wide throughout, driven 350M, finished fastest down outside and got up for 2nd near the line.
Taken back to the rear from 11, responded well to pressure inside 400M, kept on towards the finish and just failed for 2nd.
Niggled along to hold a position in midfield, kept on steadily for a moderate 4th.
Began well, tracked leaders along fence, driven along nearing 400M, kept on evenly to line.
Towards the rear, stayed on fairly down outside of straight, no impression on leaders.
Stood flat-footed as the gate opened and lost many lengths, got back to the tail of the field at 600M, made limited progress final 300M.
Positively ridden after the start, soon in front and allowed an uncontested lead, kept on well early straight, headed 150M, weakened badly final stages.
In touch early stages, outpaced 500M and gave limited response under pressure, faded 150M.
Caught wide without cover on jumping from 12, never far off from pace, ran on same pace and lacked further response passing 200M.
Lacked early pace, niggled along to hold a position behind midfield, not picked up on straightening, never threatened.
Raced 3-wide behind midfield, came under serious pressure home turn, eased turning home.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Broke well, soon taken back to race in rear, similar turning in, switched out for a run over 250 metres out, ran on well to assert authority near line.
Travelled wide towards the rear, ran on well down the centre of the straight, did best work late.

Broke well, niggled along in front far side, steadied and lost position on rails when crossed by leader coming out, tracked leader into straight, switched out to hold some chance passing the 200 metres, unable to sustain effort.
Settled in last few after beginning from a wide gate, ran on well in straight to be nearest at finish. (Blood in trachea)
Jumped fairly, niggled along and never far off in 4th or 5th, kept on one pace in the run home.
Ridden along to hold prominent spot, remained in first few entering straight, hit the front over 300 metres out, unable to sustain effort and overhauled closing stages.
Jumped fairly, close up early, shuffled back to forward of midfield coming out of back straight, kept on well in the run home.
Well behind, kept on steadily down the centre of the straight past well-beaten horses.
Jumped moderately, pressed on but caught 3 wide without cover behind midfield, one-paced under pressure in straight.
Soon settled in rear, kept on one pace without making any serious impression in straight.
Slightly slow out, settled in midfield, made no impression in straight.
Jumped fairly from the one draw, prominent early before gradually dropping back to rear of midfield coming onto home bend, saved ground turning in, kept on before fading inside final 200 metres.
Began well from the widest gate, took up running at the 1000 metre mark, obtained rails run coming out of back straight, led until finding no extra inside final 300 metres.
Began moderately, improved gradually down far side to join leaders 3-wide around the bend, folded up quickly after straightening.
Travelled midfield, 3 wide with cover. Peeled out rounding the home turn and finished off with plenty of purpose.
Had the run of the race stalking the leaders, 2 wide with cover. Was in front approaching the furlong but was claimed inside the 100m.
Made its run from 4th last position, 3 deep with cover. Found the line strongly.
Travelled between the 2 leaders. Maintained a good gallop right to the finish.
Camped midfield, 2 wide with cover. Stayed on evenly down the running.
Raced behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Didn't have the clearest of passages early in the straight, kept up a reasonable gallop to the post.
Raced with the backmakers, 1 off with cover. Made late ground down the outside without threatening.
Parked worse than midfield the fence, had cover. Plugged away in the run to the wire.
Tracked the leader on the fence. Was under pressure before the turn, peeled out on straightening, but failed to go on with it.
Settled at the tail of the field, 3 deep with cover. Worked home ok, passed tiring runners in the run to the line.
Parked midfield, on the paint with cover. Made no impression in the home straight.
Pressured for most of the trip by runners to its outside, whilst in a leading position on the fence. Faded after the 300m.
Struggled throughout the race whilst travelling at the rear of the field, 3-4 deep with some cover on the circle. Failed to close off.
Coursed 3 wide without cover whilst racing in the leading division. Did plenty of work and was a beaten horse early in the straight.
Eased to midfield, travelled 2Ls off the leader 2 wide with cover, accelerated strongly to win by 1-3/4Ls.
Showed good early pace to settle 1/2Ls off outside the leader, stayed on strongly for 2nd however never match with the winner.
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along, then settled 2Ls behind the leader on the fence, couldn't find a clear run until 300M, ran on well to grab 3rd.
Began smartly, then eased to settle 1Ls off the pace 3 wide without cover, stayed on but without any serious threats. (Questioned rider, see incident report)
Settled worse than midfield about 3Ls off the leader on the fence, ran on gradually despite held up in the early straight.
Taken back, travelled 4.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, finished off well despite difficult to find a clear run after straightening.
Camped handy, settled 1.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, stayed on one pace, made no acceleration in straight.
Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, never ran on.
Settled worse than midfield about 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, never ran on.
At rear throughout, passed some tiring horses in straight.
Raced midfield, however travelled wide without cover throughout, kept on one pace until 200M weakened.
Rolled forward to lead by 1/2Ls on the fence, flattened 300M.
Began smartly, then obtained the box seat, however under pressure 600M, flattened badly soon after straightening. (Questioned for disappointing performance, see incident report)
Began slowly, raced at rear throughout, tailed out.
Jumped OK, moved forward but 3-wide outside leader into turn. Took lead shortly after entering straight and pulled clear.
Jumped well and behind leading pack when badly checked 900m dropping back. Got run between horse in straight and ran on well.
Taken forward but aid before shifting away 900m, then bumped an unbalanced 850m. Three-wide into straight but kept on well under hard riding.
Slow into stride but moved quickly to rail at the rear. Came off fence turning for home and finished well between horse under the whip.
Taken forward but wide to lead before turn. Collared shortly after entering straight but kept on steadily under hard riding.
Began awkwardly but cut to rail, settling 3-back from leader. Closed in top of the straight before run ended. One-paced final.
Ridden forward from wide draw to seek cover. Didn't settle from 700m, swung wide into straight, one-paced final stages.
Had feet off ground when gates open and missed start badly. Tagged on to field 500m and made ground in straight while hanging in badly. (See racing incidents)
Slow into stride, made up ground before steadied and dropped back 900m. Taken very wide in straight but only one-paced.
Jumped best and led field to 900m before sitting inside leader around turn. Gave ground soon after entering straight.
Hard ridden from outside draw but didn't muster and dropped to rear. Found little in straight when asked. Had blood in trachea.
Broke well and raced up behind leaders but wide into turn. Still close 400m before flattened and dropping back. Not ridden out final.
Taken forward from good draw before bumped and unbalanced 900m and then checked 850m, losing position. Never a factor after that.
Jumped well but allowed to run at own speed settling one-off towards rear. Peeled out gradually around turn, had clear run in straight and kept on strongly.
Taken back from wide draw but unable find cover and travelled 4-wide mostly. Taken wide entering straight and battled strongly to the line.
Rolled forward from inside draw, settling two-back, one-off before turn. Shaken up entering straight and ran on well between horses.
Beaten for early speed and soon at rear but wide. Taken further out entering straight and ran on steadily to be closest at finish.
Ridden forward and trapped wide without cover. Crowded for room around turn, shaken up 400m, ran on steadily to just miss the frame.
Began OK and soon in midfield but wide. Got shuffled back around the turn, taken very wide in straight, kept on steadily.
No early speed and soon at rear but wide. Made some progress around turn, steadied 200m but made up late ground.
Taken forward from wide draw to sit one-back, one-off before turn. Shaken up to lead 350m, kept grinding to 200m, flattened.
Quickly into stride but unable match speed of early leader and settled distant 2nd by turn. Closed in top of straight but one-paced final 300m.
No early pace and soon at rear along rail. Shifted out entering straight but found little under hard riding.
Not hurried and settled behind midfield along rail to turn. Had clear run entering straight but only one-paced.
Jumped well and showed early pace before settling 2-back the fence at 900m. Stayed on rail entering straight but gave ground gradually.
Ridden out from widest draw to cross over and lead by wide margin back stretch. Slowed tempo turn, collared 350m, faded.

Placing: UR
Comment: Came out riderless after giving trouble in gates. (See racing incidents).
Eased to sit just behind the leaders 3 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, closed off strongly 400M to score.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M for 2nd.
Pushed forward a more prominent spot, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, blocked 400M, dashed well when clear and got 3rd.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 5Ls off the leader 3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 300M.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, lack room most straight, little dash.
Slow away but soon obtained a midfield spot, 3Ls off the leader on the rails, harmed by the slow tempo, held up 400-200M, little dash when clear.
Pushed to take rail and led by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, flattened 250M.
Rolled forward steadily, sat outside the leader, enjoyed the slow sectionals, flattened 200M.
Eased to rear for cover, 9Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Very slow away, took rail behind midfield, 4Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash 100M.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, held up 400-200M, checked 200M, ran on fairly.
At rear, 6Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 100M.
Box seat, suited by the slow tempo, soon emptied 300M.
Hard ridden to go forward from widest draw to lead 1000m. Slowed pace turn, momentarily headed 400m, retook lead 350m and pulled clear for easy win.
Ridden up from good draw to hold rail but over-raced entering turn when close to heels. Blocked for run 400m but ran on well when clear.
Taken forward from wide draw but forced to steady before turn and caught 3-wide. Wide into straight but kept on well under hard riding.
Ridden patiently in midfield along rail. Caught flat-footed top of straight but made ground steadily to be closest at finish.
Jumped well but allowed to settle, racing in midfield between horses. Kept on steadily in straight without looking dangerous.
Beaten for early pace and settled towards rear away from fence. Shaken up top of straight but one-paced final 300m.
Began awkwardly and steadied shortly after, dropping to rear. Stayed on fence around turn but found little when put under pressure in straight.
Taken forward before finding cover between horses before turn. Rolled forward entering straight, kept on well to 200m, flattened.
Jumped best, led initially before being passed 1000m, slotting into box seat. Looked chance 400m, still there 200m, faded. Bled from both nostrils.
Bumped start, recovered and rolled forward but caught wide. Closed in top of straight but could find little under hard riding final 200m.
Ridden forward from wide draw to sit one-back, one-off before turn. Moved up gradually to lead 400m before giving ground final 200m.
Taken back from wide draw and dropped to last but away from fence. Last into straight, taken very wide but found nothing under hard riding.
Bumped and unbalanced start then taken back across horses. Got head up and shifted out entering straight but limited response when asked.
Fractious in gate, began fairly, hampered 1000m and raced greenly after that. Put under pressure from 600m but little response. Unacceptable performance.
Broke well but soon held back to a 3-wide position in midfield, steadily gained momentum inside 450M, led nearing 150M, kept on well towards the line.
From draw 14 quickly guided to a 2-wide position behind midfield, raced keenly middle stages, ran on well when clear inside 300M, nearest finish.
Crossed to the inside soon after the start, settled well in midfield, unable to obtain clear run until 300M, closed off nicely for 3rd.
Reserved near the rear, tracked the path of eventual winner passing 450M, ran on steadily for 4th.
Never far off from the pace, travelled 3-wide and left without cover from 950M, made good initial progress turning home, held 2nd 150M, turned one pace late stages and beaten to 5th.
Driven forward, led uncontested at a good tempo, lost lead inside 200M, weakened over final stages.
Travelled in a midfield position along the 2-path, 3-wide into straight, stayed on evenly to the finish but not pace of first few over final 200M.
Failed to muster despite vigorously ridden, at rear 9-10Ls off the pace, still had plenty to do 400M, closed off well from last.
Settled towards the rear, shaken up passing 500M, took time to gather turning home, did best work final 200M.
Up with early pace, tracked leaders from 1200M, kept on same pace to the line, never seriously threatened.
Settled along fence 3Ls off the pace, ran on only fairly, eased towards the line when beaten.
Chased leader, given every chance turning home, faded mid-straight then eased.
Unhurried, settled near last 7-8Ls behind leader, not picked up inside 400M and was soon left behind.
Settled inside chasing the pace, found nothing inside 400M, dropped out rapidly mid-straight.
Slow but allowed to stroll forward at own speed. Left 3-wide without cover when leaders crossed over, moved up 500m, kicked clear 350m, kept on well.
Allowed to stride forward, settling midfield 3-wide with cover. Moved forward entering straight, threw out challenge 350m, unable match winner.
Away nicely settling midfield in one-off position. Lost position turn, entered straight behind wall of horses but kept on well to the line.
Out quickly but not pushed and settled on rail 2-back from leader. Boxed in and dropped back approaching straight. Ran on well when clear.
Taken forward to sit behind leaders before being shuffled back when outside runners crossed in. Stayed on rail entering straight and kept on one-paced.
Jumped OK but gradually manoeuvred away from rail to sit 3-wide before turn. Made forward move turning for home but only one-paced final 200m.
Began well and led for a few strides before being eased into box seat behind leaders. Blocked for run entering straight, switched to rail 200m, finished off nicely.
Slow into stride dropping to rear away from fence. Taken wide but no run until final 100m. Not properly tested.
Taken forward from wide draw and caught 5-wide before rolling in to sit outside leader before turn. Started to give ground soon after entering straight.
Bumped at start, no pace and drifted toward rear. Taken very wide entering straight but found little under hard riding. Found to be lame both front legs.
Outpaced but clung on to rail. Lost position turning for home, came off rail 400m, kept on to 200m before fading.
Outpaced, taken back across runners to sit one-off towards rear. Widest entering straight but only one-paced under hard riding.
Allowed to stride forward, taking lead 1000m when wide, then crossed to rail entering turn. Collared 350m and gave ground gradually.
Outpaced, taken back across horses becoming detached before turn. Found nothing in straight becoming tailed off.

Ended up 3 wide with cover at rear from widest gate, 7ls or so back, suited by track pattern, imp[roved on circle and came widest bend, let down with a strong sprint last 300m to draw away for a strong win.
Out in line, raced 3-4ls back on rails, quiet time to turn, weaved between horses and closed soundly to take placing in what was less preferable part of track.
Began evenly, assumed a midfield position 3-4ls back in running line, in prime position turning, couldn't dash with winner but stayed on soundly for a place.
Drifted back to race in rear division, 7ls or so from top end, pace and track pattern helped, in traffic turning and really only got clear final 200m, closed soundly to make frame.
Began well allowed to take a sit on leaders back, did a bit with decent sectionals to midpoint, produced soon after turning and made run with eventual winner at 300m, peaked final furlong.
Jumped with them, couldn't slot in and raced 3 wide in midfield with cover 4-5ls back, track pattern helped and came 4 wide turning, stayed on 200m but no extra thereafter.
Out in line, raced just off midfield, 5ls or so away in two wide line, came 3 wide rounding bend, made some minor progress without looking likely in straight.
Tardy to begin, raced 5-6ls back on rails, crept closer turning, made a brief bid early straight but no extra progress final 200m in least preferred section of track.
Showed early speed to take up running, set a decent speed in front, challenged on turning, there to 200m but dropped off late. (In least preferred going)
Restrained from a wide gate, shared rear 8ls or more from top end racing 2 wide, well back to turn, switched wider and passed a few tired runners in straight.
No early pace and dropped back from a wide gate, raced at rear 8ls or more away on rails, plenty to do turning, struggled home along rails in straight but was in least preferred section of track.
Showed some early speed, took a prominent spot 1 out 1 back, did a bit early, came 3 wide turning but couldn't go on final 300m and dropped out.
Pressed forward early, used a little with early pace, there to turn, compounded soon after turning in and dropped right out.
Unable to slot in and posted 3 wide without cover, 2ls off pace, track pattern helped, began to struggle before bend, weakened right out in straight.

Broke well from a poor draw, settled one back in 3rd on rails tracking leaders to the 300 metres, hit the front inside 100 metres, won readily.
Jumped fairly, settled in forward of midfield, hampered and lost some ground over 500 metres out, crept closer turning in on rails, ran on under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Began well, attempted to make all holding a narrow lead most of way, headed under pressure inside final 200 metres.
Jumped fairly from the widest gate, settled in 4th in better than midfield, inconvenienced over 500 metres out, kept on same pace.
Driven to contest lead, restrained to settle for close 2nd outside leader approaching the Rock, fought on under pressure but unable to quicken to threaten.
Began poorly, tightened and lost ground shortly after jump, travelled behind midfield to straight, ran home one-paced.
Jumped moderately, settled just worse than midfield on rails, badly hampered and lost a couple of lengths coming out of back straight, kept on same pace from towards the rear into straight.
Jumped fairly, soon taken back to the rear, remained same into straight, kept on steadily past beaten horses. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Slowly away, remained well behind, inconvenienced coming out of far side, saved ground turning in, kept on same pace.
Behind midfield early after beginning from a poor gate, made short-lived swift progress out wide coming out of back straight, made no impression in run home.
Jumped fairly, ridden along in midfield, checked and lost position coming out of back straight, produced some late impression close to home.
Settled in midfield racing wide, faded closing stages.
Rolled forward to camp outside the leader. Responded well under hand riding had the race in its keeping a long way out.
Landed 1 out 1 back. Rattled home nicely late.
Began awkwardly then managed to slot in and take a midfield position 1off with cover. Chased gamely all the up running.
Rated 3 back the fence, had cover. Kept grinding away in the run home.
Dictated terms in front on the rails. Was swamped inside the final 50m.
Had every chance after box seating. One paced over the final furlong.
Camped worse than midfield, on the paint with cover. Kept to the inside in the straight but ended its run well before the line.
Settled in last position, on the rails with cover. Made no impressio0n in the home straight.
Raced at the rear 2 wide with cover. Failed to close off.
Raced keenly for most of the trip, travelling worse than midfield, 1 off with cover. Struggled in the run home.
Eased start, settled 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, dashed strongly 200M to score by 3Ls with plenty in hand.
Camped handy, travelled 2Ls off the pace 2 wide with cover, ran on well to get 2nd but without any serious threats to the winner.
Taken back, settled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, switched to 3 wide 800M, dashed strongly when clear 200M to get 3rd.
Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls off the pace 2 wide with cover, peeled wide turning in, ran on only fairly. (Substantial amount of blood in the horse's trachea)
Eased back, settled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, stayed inside, made ground steadily. (Trainer advised to ride more conservatively)
Rolled forward to occupy the box seat, made no acceleration after straightening.
Began slowly, settled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, blocked 2-1, never ran on.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls off the pace 3 wide with cover, never looked likely.
Pushed forward to take the fence and led by 3/4Ls, stayed on until 200M flattened.
Ridden forward to park outside the leader, soon weakened after straightening. (Substantial amount of blood in the horse's trachea)
Ridden forward, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, dropped off soon after straightening.
Began awkwardly, bumped, unbalanced and shifted out further. Recovered, rolled forward sitting one-back, one-off into final turn. Hung in straight but ran on strongly, hit front 50m and held.
Ridden forward from wide draw and able to find cover 3-back, one-off back stretch. Peeled wide entering straight and ran home strongly.
Allowed to stride out at own pace and held behind midfield. Well back entering straight before running home strongly down centre track. Ride queried.
Taken forward from wide draw but able to cross to rail back stretch. Switched out entering straight before switching in to find clear running. Finished off well.
Shaken up on leaving gates and soon in box seat. Third into straight, closed in steadily to 200m, then one-paced.
Outpaced early and then over-raced, settling last of main bunch. Taken widest entering straight and was doing best work final 200m.
Rolled forward from inside draw, hugging rail inside early leader before taking over back stretch. Kicked clear 400m, still ahead 200m, one-paced final 100m.
Bumped and taken out at start, ridden to hold position first turn, forced 3-wide without cover from 800m. Found little in straight.
Crossed in soon after start to hold rail two-back from leader. No run top of straight, rolled forward when clear before run ended 100m.
Ridden forward from the start to lead initially before sitting outside leader entering back stretch. Gave ground shortly after entering straight.
Clipped heels and blundered after start, dropping to rear along fence. Shaken up top of straight but no response.
Slow into stride and soon under pressure, falling far behind other runners. Finished tailed off.
Began well, taken forward then eased behind leading trio before turn. Peeled 3-wide turning for home, closed in steadily, hit front 50m, pulled clear.
Began well and with leading trio before being eased before turn. Crept up gradually to join leader 150m, kept finding to line.
Jumped to the front, eased, joined by another and then passed before turn. Retook lead 400m, still ahead 200m, swamped final strides.
Taken forward but wide from outside draw before finding cover 800m. Switched in entering straight and kept on steadily.
Slow into stride, recovered, then lost position around turn, Wide into straight and ran on steadily.
Began awkwardly, shifted in and steadied 1150m, dropping towards rear. Well back entering straight but ran on well final 300m.
Slow into stride and last but wide on settling. Covered extra ground turn while improving position. One-paced straight. Had blood in trachea.
Jumped fairly, soon on rail but failed to muster when ridden. Lost position around turn. One-paced in straight.
Jumped OK but steadied a few strides later, dropping behind midfield. Raced between horses around turn, found little in straight.
Taken forward from wide draw and held 3-deep back stretch before crossing to fence. Gave ground soon after entering straight.
Outpaced and soon at rear between horses. Clear last into turn, plodded final 400m.
Ridden forward from wide draw to sit outside leader before edging ahead at turn. Gave ground quickly after straightening for home.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, favoured by the slow tempo, closed off strongly 250M to win by a narrow margin.
Pushed to take rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on well until last few strides, just beaten by a short head.
Bumped start, pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, moved forward 900M to take advantages from the slow pace and sat outside the lead, ran on for 3rd.
Rolled forward, 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Midfield, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, little dash 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Midfield along the fence, 3Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow pace, just held ground.
Eased back, 4.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, ran on ok in straight.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, dashed well 300M, shifted out abruptly 100M.
Eased back to take rail behind the field, 4.5Ls off the leader, checked early, harmed by the slow pace, dashed fairly.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the slow tempo, no progress in straight.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, made early move 800M, soon emptied 300M.
Traveled well behind midfield until 650M, lost its action behind, became extremely unbalanced and lost ground abruptly, was eased out of race thereafter.
Shot out of gates to land a length clear but not pressured and took sit 800m. Threw out challenge 350m, led 250m, kept on strongly.
Taken forward from inside draw to sit one-back, one-off to and around turn. Blocked for run 350m, switched in 250m, ran on well.
Quickly into stride but unable to slot in and held 3-wide without cover. Covered extra ground but kept battling to the line.
Began well but outpaced and shuffled to near rear before crossing in. Saw daylight top of straight and kept on steadily.
Pushed forward but had to be used to cross to fence from wide draw. Overhauled soon after entering straight but kept on one-paced.
Began awkwardly, then hampered a few strides later. Raced wide with cover to straight. No run initially but one-paced when clear.
Outpaced early, crossed over but stayed away from fence. Took the turn awkwardly and found little when asked.
Began awkwardly, taken forward and trapped 4-wide without cover. Covered extra ground turn, one-paced in straight.
Restrained early, crossed in but kept away from fence. Became detached from field 800m, stayed on rail, doing best work final 200m.
Taken forward from good draw, moving to box seat before turn. Closed in 350m, still in touch 200m before fading.
Began well, settling in midfield along rail. Made ground early in straight before checked 200m and dropped back.
Positively ridden from draw 12, soon crossed to fence and led uncontested, found plenty when asked in straight and easily kept rivals at bay.
Settled 2Ls off leader in 4th, travelled well into straight, ran on steadily towards the finish but unable to get nearer to winner over final 100M.
Positioned in 5th about 3Ls off leaders, progressed to 3rd 150M, not pace to challenge winner.
Settled 2-wide in midfield first half, not helped by steady tempo mid stages and shifted out to 3-wide passing 700M, moved closer to pace home turn, ran on one-paced to line.
Dropped back to near the rear, waited with until 350M, closed off well down inside but lacked room over final 100M.
Taken back to a rearward position, well off the pace in early stages, moved closer home turn, angled out 250M, stayed on for moderate 6th.
Held up towards the rear, placed under pressure passing 500M but could make limited progress under vigorous riding.
Settled 2-wide in mid-division, ran on fairly final 350M, never threatened leaders.
Began well from draw 1, tracked leaders in 3rd, had every chance turning home, no extra and swamped final 150M.
Soon guided to the fence, assumed a midfield position 5-6Ls back, not quickened when put to pressure, kept on same pace throughout final 400M.
Given a waiting ride at the rear, well off the pace in first half, shaken up nearing 400M but not picked up the pace. No impression.
Positioned one-out-one-back, didn't respond to riding passing 400M, dropped away to last.
