Jumped moderately, soon picked up a prominent spot on rails sharing the pace, restrained to one-back position coming out of far side, baulked behind runners in straight before quickening to hit front over 100 metres out.
Broke well and ridden positively from the widest gate, disputed lead most of way before hitting the front over 350 metres out, only to be outsprinted by winner close to home.
Jumped fairly, settled on rails in midfield, raced a bit keenly when pace slackened on the bend, crept closer up on inside turning in, ran on to hold every chance inside final 150 metres.
Began moderately, settled behind midfield, baulked for a run early in straight, ran on quite well under pressure from 250 metres out, did best work late.
Jumped moderately from a poor gate, settled wide in midfield, shifted wider turning in, kept on steadily without quickening.
Jumped fairly from a poor gate, soon taken back to race at the back of the main field, went widest into straight, made some late impression under pressure down the centre of the track.
Jumped fairly, settled better than midfield, shifted out for a run over 500 metres out, kept on one pace without quickening in straight. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Jumped fairly, gradually dropped to last few, saved ground turning for home, ran home one-paced.
Jumped moderately, settled in last few, ran home one-paced.
Jumped fairly, soon came to join leaders holding slender advantage from 1100 metres out, led on rails until headed under pressure inside 300 metres, faded. (Blood in trachea)
Jumped moderately, niggled along to hold prominent spot out wide, remained wide and without cover around home bend, soon weakened in straight.
Shared pace early stages despite awkward actions after jump, settled one-out-one-back in 4th to straight, folded up quickly.
Jumped fairly, soon taken back to rear of midfield, shifted wide into straight, dropped out under pressure.
Reluctant to stride out and soon tailed-off.
Made every post a winner after leading at a leisurely clip. Kicked clear early in the straight and won easily.
Slow to begin, but managed to work forward under aggressive riding to track the leader. Stayed on soundly.
Raced 3 back, 1 off with cover. Made good late headway.
Parked 4th from the rear, 2 wide with cover. Made good ground in the stretch, peaked on its effort approaching the 50m.
Positioned worse than midfield, 3 deep with cover. Kept on evenly in the straight ended its run near the 100m.
Camped midfield, 2 deep with cover. Was dour in the run to the line.
Raced midfield the fence, had cover. Disappointed for running near the 250m, got home evenly thereafter.
Went back from a wide draw and was in last position at the 600m, 1 off with cover. Swung widest on the home turn, ran on fairly.
Posted 3 deep without cover, ahead of midfield. Never likely and was swamped over the last 100m.
Traveled worse than midfield the fence with cover. Never made much ground in the run home.
Parked 3 deep with cover, midfield. Just plugged away in the home stretch.
Settled at the rear, 3 deep with cover. Came wide rounding the home turn, failed to close off.
Not the best away, but soon re-gathered to race 3 back the fence. Was a beaten horse early in the home straight.
Had no excuses after settling in 2nd position, 1 off, no cover. Was under pressure turning for home and commenced to tire early in the stretch.
Ridden forward to take the fence and led by 1/2L, benefited by the slow pace, made all easily to score by 1-3/4Ls.
Rider nearly dislodged soon after the start, then raced handy and settled 2Ls off the slow pace with cover, ran on well to get 2nd.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, benefited by the slow pace, stayed on to get 3rd without any serious threat.
Raced in front of midfield about 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, hampered by the slow pace, peeled wide turning in, gradually ran on after 100M.
Raced in front of midfield about 3Ls off the slow pace 3 wide without cover, ran on fairly.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide with cover, raced very greenly throughout and badly checked 700M, ran on fairly.
Raced midfield, settled 6Ls off the slow pace 3 wide with cover, interfered 700M, never ran on.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, never ran on.
Raced very greenly throughout, settled 6-1/2Ls behind the leader, never looked competitive.
Hard ridden to settle 1/2L outside the leader, despite benefited by the slow pace, flattened badly 300M.
Last few always, badly blundered 800M, never a factor.
Always at rear, slightly hampered 600M, never looked chance, tailed out.
Always at rear, 800M hampered, never a factor, tailed out.
Very slow to begin, then raced at rear throughout, badly hampered and taken very wide 700M, tailed out.
Jumped well, led for a few strides before taking box seat. No run early in straight, got opening on rail 200m, gradually overhauled leader to win close home.
Allowed to stride forward to lead on settling. Kicked clear entering straight, still going strongly 200m, caught 100m but kept on well while shifting ground.
Began well and raced alongside leader before being eased one-back, one-off. Got clear run entering straight and kept on well to be closest at finish.
Allowed to find feet shifting to rail 3-back from leader. Caught flat-footed top of straight, picked up momentum from 300m while shifting out. Doing best at finish.
Quickly into stride, sitting outside leader into turn. Challenged from 300m but unable close gap and checked final stages.
Taken forward and travelled comfortably in midfield away from fence. Taken out 400m and kept on steadily while drifting out.
Ridden along gradually cutting closer to fence behind midfield. Turned wide and made ground gradually under hard riding.
Began awkwardly and crowded soon after start dropping to rear. Taken wide into straight, picked up momentum and doing best work final 100m.
Outpaced, slipping to behind midfield along fence. Put under pressure entering straight but only one-paced to line.
No early speed and cut in toward rail. Raced awkwardly around turn, stayed on rail entering straight, making up ground late.
Allowed to stride forward from wide draw, settling two-back, one-off into turn. Hard ridden from 400m but only one-paced.
Allowed to drift back from wide draw away from fence. Taken wide 400m but found nothing when put under pressure.
Outpaced and soon last of main bunch. Shaken up entering straight but no response.
Flat-footed when gates opened, veered out sharply towards outer fence, then trailed field thereafter.
Allowed to stride at own pace, settling midfield. Taken out turning for home bumping another horse, finished strongly down centre track to win close home.
Ridden patiently along fence towards rear. Entered straight behind horses, got split 300m, hit front 100m, run down.
Ridden forward to hold box seat around turn. Shifted out 500m to get clear running, hit front 200m, no extra final 100m.
Settled at rear from wide draw, improved position around turn, bumped entering straight but kept on steadily to line.
Taken forward from outside draw and held three-wide into and around turn. Kept on steadily till flattened final 100m.
Began well, sitting one-back, one-off into turn. Awkwardly placed 500m, no clear run before badly checked 300m. Kept on one-paced.
Crowded soon after start and taken back across runners to sit at rear. Taken wide 400m and ran on steadily, shifting out final 50m.
Lost ground start and shortly after jockey hit by clod. At rear to straight before running on well final 200m while shifting ground.
Not hurried and allowed to drift to fence before turn. Ran on steadily down centre track to 200m, becoming one-paced.
Hard ridden on leaving gates to go forward and sit outside leader before turn. Took lead entering straight, caught 200m, faded.
Began well to lead on settling. Challenged around turn but kept battling to 200m before tiring.
Ridden forward from wide draw and trapped three-wide without cover around turn. Kept on well early in straight before tiring from 200m.
Began awkwardly and soon at rear. Improved position slightly 800m before dropping back. Found nothing in straight.
Slow but ridden up to sit midfield around turn. Gave ground soon after entering straight. Run ruled unacceptable.
Settled in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, lack room 400M, dashed strongly despite not suited by the slow pace and scored.
Behind midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, held up 400M, dashed strongly when clear for 2nd.
Pushed early, 3Ls off the slow pace 3 wide, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Eased at rear, 7Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, made ground around the field 4-5 wide, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the racing situations.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on well until 150M flattened.
Box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, lack turn of foot, just ran on ok.
Hard ridden to keep up in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader along the rails, blocked 400-200M, just held ground when clear.
Eased at start, 7Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Settled outside the leader, enjoyed the slow sectionals, reduced 250M.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, flattened 200M.
Slow away, 5Ls off the leader along the fence, not suited by the slow pace, lack room 400-200M, no progress when clear.
Failed to muster, trapped 3-4 wide throughout behind midfield, 6Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow tempo, no progress.
Eased to rear, 8Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, however soon dropped off 400M.
Jumped well but eased into box seat first turn before two-back the fence back stretch. Began run 400m, led 250m when rider dropped whip, kept on strongly under vigorous hands and heels riding.
Taken back, dropping to last back stretch but away from fence. Peeled widest entering straight and finished strongly to just miss.
Began well and raced outside leader before eased into one-off, one-back position back stretch. Threw out challenge 400m, looked chance 200m, before one-paced shifting out under pressure.
Allowed drift back but away from fence. Peeled wide turning for home and ran on steadily. Found to be lame right fore with swelling right fetlock.
Slow but cut quickly to fence by first turn. Allowed own pace back stretch, switched wide into straight, ran on steadily before taken out 100m.
Last early but cut to fence and rolled forward first turn. Ridden quietly behind midfield, stayed on fence entering straight, ran on steadily.
Jumped well and led around first turn before settling in box seat back stretch. Rolled forward again entering straight but one-paced final 200m.
Jumped with field, raced between horses first turn before settling 3-back, one-off back stretch. Under heavy pressure entering straight but only one-paced.
Began well, trapped wide first turn, rolled forward to lead back stretch. Under pressure turning for home and slipped back gradually.
Had blood in mouth before start but ruled fit. Remained one-off behind midfield back stretch, under pressure from turn, found nothing.
Taken forward but 3-wide first turn without cover. Moved up to sit outside leader back stretch but under pressure soon after entering straight. Tailed off.
Began well from draw 1, switched to 2-wide passing 1300M, never far off the pace, made steady headway inside 400M but had to dig deep final stages to overhaul the resilient 2nd.
Emerged to lead passing 1300M, travelled well at a steady pace, driven inside 350M, was strongly challenged by eventual winner final 150M, continued on willingly to line, went down narrowly.
In 6th place, held up in mid-division 4Ls off the pace, tracked the path of eventual winner, stayed on well to go 3rd 50M from home.
Settled towards the rear 5Ls behind leader, briefly held up early home straight, closed off the race nicely final 300M, got up for 4th near line.

Set early pace, tracked leader along the fence from 1200M, kept up the chase on leader turning home but not getting any closer under a 5lb penalty, lacked further response final 100M and weakened to 5th.
Well reserved at the rear 8Ls behind the pace, taken wide 450M, ran on well down outside of track without threatening first few.
Held up in mid-division, driven inside 400M but not going the pace to seriously challenge in straight, crowded for room 150M but out of contention already.
Held up near the rear, ran on fairly early straight , one-paced final 200M, not reached leaders.
Caught 3-wide in midfield early stages, moved closer to pace passing 1100M, outpaced 300M, weakened away.
Ridden forward before slotting closer to rail 1000m. Came off fence 250m, took split between horses to hit front 100m, held on well.
Allowed to stride at own pace away from fence in midfield. Taken 5-wide entering straight and rattled home strongly.
Jumped OK but difficult to settle and hung out turn. Picked up bit 250m and ran on well while hanging out 150m.
Taken forward from wide draw to sit fourth but wide into turn. Put under pressure from 400m and kept on steadily.
Outpaced, gradually moving closer to rail. Stayed on fence entering straight, kept on steadily behind horses before steadied close home.
Quickly in front and clear leader entering turn. Kicked further ahead 400m, still clear 200m, turning one-paced when caught 100m. Had blood in trachea.
Began awkwardly but urged forward to sit behind pacemaker at turn. Under pressure from 400m, giving ground gradually.
Over-raced when taken back across horse from wide draw. Well back entering straight but made ground final 100m.
Ridden forward from wide draw and trapped wide at turn. Taken further out entering straight but only one-paced final 200m.
Began fairly, gradually edging closer to rail from wide draw. Stayed on fence entering straight and kept on one-paced.
Hard ridden to hold rail behind leader at turn. Gave ground soon after entering straight. Rider reported saddle slipped.
Outpaced and wide towards rear before turn. Under pressure from 400m but found nothing, becoming detached final 200m.
Average beginning, ridden up to hold a spot behind midfield 5ls or more away on rails, easy time to bend and tracked up nicely, weaved between horses closing hard late to get up with some in hand.
Went forward from a wide alley, trapped 3 wide without cover, up challenging most of way and did work to bend, took over at 400m, defied rivals until 100m, decent effort given workload.
Even break, settled in midfield 1 out 4ls back, same margin back to turn, came through field nicely final 300m to take 3rd.
Fair beginning, took a spot 3-4ls back on rails in midfield, easy run to turn, in traffic at 300m and took narrow gaps along rails to come through and challenge, just missed a place.
Settled behind midfield 5-6ls back in running line, well back to bend, switched out and closed soundly making good ground to be nearest on line.
Out in line, unable to take up prominent role as usual, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield 4ls back, switched wider too challenge turning in, made steady progress to be not far from place getters.
Landed in an ideal spot 1out 1 back just behind pace, ok run to bend, looked a place chance at 400m but didn't go on final 200m and dropped off.
Wide from outset from a tricky draw, raced just off midfield 5ls or so back, 4 wide on circle, came to middle turning but didn't close off with much purpose battling to line.
Took a prominent spot on leaders back, ideal run to turn, ridden along at 400m in a little traffic but didn't close off as normal and unable to factor at all final 300m.
Began with line, caught 4 wide from a tricky gate, did plenty of work without cover, workload began to take tool soon after straightening, dropped out in straight.
Dropped back to rear, best part of 6ls or so back, at rear throughout, made no real headway in straight and just battled away.
Showed early pace to race, raced outside leader, up challenging throughout, soon came under pressure turning, folded tamely.
Ended up 3 wide at rear after a slow jump, had cover 5ls or more back, under pressure rounding bend, showed nothing in straight.
Had enough early speed to hold the lead, fair run in front but did have pressure from outside horse, headed turning, tiring when bumped at 300m, dropped right away.
Broke well, held up in 4th on rail, gave chase in straight, hit front 100m and kept on well holding off fast finishing rivals.
Jumped well, positioned 2 wide with cover in front of midfield, improved entering straight and finished off strongly for 2nd in a tight finish.
Broke well from wide draw, drifted back at to rear 7-8ls away, aided by tempo, made good ground turning, clear final 200m and motored home late for an impressive debut.
Broke well, went forward to take the lead 900m, set a fast tempo in the mid-section drawing 4ls clear, well clear turning in, headed 100m but still battled on well for 4th (see racing incidents)
Jumped well, positioned 4 back along the rail, easy time to bend, shifted out in straight and closed race off nicely to be nearest on line just missing frame.
Bumped start, pushed to take a position 2 wide with cover in midfield, tracked up to turn, produced for effort final 300m, made steady progress without threatening first few.
Broke well, sat 2 wide without cover on 3rd, did share of work on solid speed, there to 300m but dropped off thereafter.
Made contact at the start, travelled wide behind midfield with cover for the majority of the race, shifted out turning, made some minor progress but couldn't get nearer final furlong.
Began awkwardly, positioned 2 wide with cover behind midfield, fair run to turn, made only minor progress in straight.
Average break, drifted back from the widest draw, sat last along the rail, made some ground but only passed tired runners and never looked competitive.
Jumped fairly, but kept wide and without cover for the majority of the race, did plenty of work and was struggling entering straight, dropped off after hard run.
Broke OK from wide draw, positioned 2 wide with cover at rear, swung widest turning in, found nothing in straight.
Began well, took the rail behind leader, hard ridden entering final turn but didn't find much and faded thereafter.
Began awkwardly, travelled along the fence behind midfield, no response when asked in straight.

Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began fairly from the one draw, settled in better than midfield, steadied and lost some ground approaching the Rock, snuck up on rails turning in, rattled home to take charge inside final 200 metres.
Began moderately but ridden for pace, soon held back to settle behind the leader on rails, remained similar into straight, kept on before finding no extra closing stages.
Pressed on from the widest gate to soon take up running and cross to rails, held lead until finding no extra over 100 metres out.
Slightly slow away, soon taken across to rails and picked up to rear of midfield, steadied going up the Rock, saved ground turning in, made modest headway without threatening.
Soon taken back to race in rear, ran on well in straight, did best work late.
Jumped fairly and sluggish at start, gradually picked up to a prominent position outside leader, kept on before finding no extra under pressure inside final 100 metres.
Jumped fairly, settled in forward of midfield, kept on steadily in straight.
Jumped fairly, travelled mainly in midfield or just worse, ran home one-paced.
Began fairly, prominent to straight, made no impression, faded. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Soon taken back from a wide gate to race well behind, always struggling.
Jumped fairly, prominent before steadied when racing keenly dropping behind midfield shortly after turning into back straight, widest runner on straightening, found nothing.

Placing: PU
Comment: Jumped fairly, gradually dropped to last few, pulled up home bend.
Ridden positively and dueled for the lead in the early and middle stages on the paint. Assumed the outright lead after the 700m, and was never headed, posting a solid win.
Jumped well then drifted back, but was posted 3 deep with cover, racing worse than midfield on the circle. Saved ground on the home turn but was bumped heavily soon after, finished off strongly.
Tracked the leaner on the fence. Maintained a sound gallop down the running.
Camped midfield the fence had cover. Railed up early in the straight but ran into traffic soon after and never really got clear running.
Speared forward and raced outside the leader. Couldn't find any extra turning for home and was one paced in the run to the line.
Raced in the leading division but was posted 3 wide without cover. Was running on empty inside the final 100m.
Settled back in the field, coursed on the running rail with cover. Ridden along to keep in touch for most of trip, worked home evenly towards the inside.
Settled 2nd last, close to the paint with cover. Just plodded home.
Managed to settle close to midfield, 2 wide with cover. Went for inside runs turning for home, was checked near the 250m and was never in the hunt thereafter.
Parked behind the speed, three deep with cover. Commenced to give ground near the 500m, and was a beaten horse soon after.
Began awkwardly settling in last position, 2 wide with cover. Failed to run on.
Had no excuses after settling 1 out 1 back. Struggled in the home stretch.
Camped handy, travelled 2Ls off the pace 2 wide with cover, finished off nicely to score by 3/4L.
Began smartly, then eased to settle 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, dashed well for 2nd.
Ridden to settle 4Ls off the leader 3 wide without cover, improved gradually rounding the Home Turn, ran on well to get 3rd.
Settled worse than midfield about 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, closed off the race well.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, made no extra acceleration after straightening, weakened 100M.
Ridden forward to take the fence and led by 1/2L, stayed on until 150M weakened.
Began fairly, travelled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, made some ground in straight.
Sent forward to park outside the leader, kept on one pace until 200M weakened.
At rear, travelled 6Ls off the pace 2 wide with cover, peeled wide turning in, finished off strongly.
Always at rear, travelled 6Ls off the pace on the fence, dashed nicely.
Raced midfield, settled 3.5Ls off the pace 2 wide with cover, ran on only fairly.
Settled worse than midfield about 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, made some very late ground over the final stages.
Began fairly, ridden along to grab rail 5L behind leader into first turn. Moved to one-off position back stretch, peeled widest into straight, ran on strongly under hands and heels riding.
Bumped shortly after start, settling behind midfield away from rail. Raced between horse to straight, ran on steadily final 300m.
Began well, driven to hold one-back, one-off spot first turn, settling a length behind leader back stretch. Shaken up 300m, led 200m, kept on gamely when passed.
Taken back from wide draw and in last pair first turn. Steadied 850m, dropped to last entering straight, strong late run under whip.
Ridden to go forward, racing between horses first turn and back stretch. Had clear run in straight and kept on steadily.
Hard ridden from wide draw to take lead by first turn. Set steady pace back stretch, tried to kick clear 300m but caught 200m, one-paced.
Allowed to stride forward but trapped three-wide without cover in midfield. Had clear run entering straight but only one-paced.
Allowed to find feet while holding rail 4L from leader. Entered straight behind horses, shifted in 300m to find run but ran out of room closing stages.
Shaken up to go forward but raced ungenerously approaching 1000m. Steadied 450m, hard ridden to 200m, faded.
Taken back from wide draw but crowded first turn. Improved back stretch but crowded again 450m. No clear run final 200m and not tested.
Taken back from wide draw but kept away from rail, dropped to last approaching 800m, taken wide into straight, found nothing.
Ridden forward to hold box seat first turn. Travelled nicely back stretch and early in straight before tiring and dropping back.
Taken back from wide draw and last into back stretch. Took off 1000m when pace slackened to lead 700m. Kicked again 400m, kept on gamely, just held.
Rolled forward inside leader to turn, then outsider leader back stretch. Caught flat footed 400m when field speeded up, swung very wide into straight, ran on strongly.
Slow from gate but quickly on rail 3-back from leader. Raced keenly when pace slackened, shifted out 1000m, checked 500m. Ran on strongly final 300m.
Taken out soon after start but recovered to sit 3-back, one-off. Got run between horses in straight and finished off nicely.
Shaken up after start to hold rail 3-back from leader. Brushed rail 400m, ran on steadily in straight before eased final stages when close to heels.
Jumped best but not rushed, settling in box seat early before being shuffled 2-back final turn. Peeled out entering straight but only one-paced final 200m.
Unbalanced, lost ground start, then checked before first turn. Checked again 1200m and 500m when field bunched. Made up ground final 100m.
Taken back from wide draw, checked 1200m, dropping to last 1000m. Stayed on rail final turn and ran past beaten horses in straight.
Began awkwardly, but picked up to settle behind midfield away from rail. Turned wide into straight but only one-paced.
Began OK, settling midfield away from fence. Bumped 1000m. taken wide 300m, made up ground early in straight before flattened 100m.
Ridden forward three wide to lead passing winning post first time, cutting to 1000m. Joined by another 700m, 2nd into straight, tired.
Restrained early from wide draw, dropping to rear but away from fence. Dropped to last entering straight, found nothing.
Pushed to hold rail and led by 1L, clocked fast sectionals, hung on well to launch consecutive victory.
Eased at start, took rail in midfield, 6Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast pace, made steady ground 300M for 2nd.
Eased for box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Eased at start, 8Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, suited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 200M.
Hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the fast tempo, held ground in straight.
Settled in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader along the rails, favoured by the fast pace, ran on ok.
Eased at start, checked early, 9Ls off the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, made some ground 250M.
Hard ridden forward, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, flattened 250M.
Behind midfield, 7Ls off the leader, suited by the fast pace but trapped 3 wide throughout, ran on ok.
Midfield, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, however no progress.
Hard ridden forward, 1L off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the fast pace, emptied 300M.
Never a factor.
Allowed to stride at own pace, settling 3-back, 1-off back stretch. Swung wide entering straight and ran home strongly under vigorous riding.
Rolled forward, sliding in to good position 1-off, 1-back first turn. Peeled 4-wide entering straight, matched early strides with winner before shifting in 150m.
Ridden along at own pace while gradually edging closer to fence settling 6L from leader. Had clear run in straight and ran on strongly under the whip.
Taken back from wide draw to snatch rail position at rear. Came off fence turning for home, widest in straight and ran on nicely.
Urged forward from inside draw to grab box seat by first turn. Held together back stretch, got split 250m, raced in restricted room final 150m.
Began well, rolled forward to sit outsider leader first turn. Urged forward entering straight, led for a few strides, kept on to 100m before flattened.
Crowded out start, cut quickly to rail and improved to sit 3-back the fence into back stretch. Came off fence 400m to make run but only one-paced.
Allowed to find feet, settling behind midfield first turn. Came out back stretch but switched back behind horses. Turned wide and found little under hard riding.
Outpaced and soon at rear along fence. Taken out entering straight but limited response to hard riding.
Not rushed, settling four-back the fence at first turn and back stretch. Made up some ground early in straight before tiring.
Shaken up to go forward from wide draw, taking lead and cutting to rail first turn. Set steady pace, caught soon after entering straight and tired.
A little slow to move, taken across behind horses and clear last by first turn. Never competitive.
Reserved in midfield along the fence, travelled smoothly to straight, went through a gap on the inside, led near 100M for a back to back victory.
Taken across behind runners, 8Ls off the pace in last middle stages, made steady progress inside 400M, surged late to go 2nd near line.
Broke alertly and soon assumed a forward position, allowed an easy lead throughout, all out mid-straight but unable to hold off first 2 over final 100M.
Guided to a handy position just behind leader, travelled strongly throughout and looked a threat entering straight, kept on one paced under pressure, weakened 100M from home.
Given a patient ride, settled near rear 6Ls behind leader, switched wide 400M, finished off well and would have been closer if not hanging in.
Held up behind midfield, raced a shade keen middle stages, switched away from fence 450M, held up nearing 250M, stayed on well when clear.
Rushed along to take a position close to pace, not quickened to challenge leaders turning in, kept on one paced.
Restrained after the start, settled into midpack 2-wide, taken out 400M, ran on one paced, no extra final 100M.
Unable to slot in, caught 3-wide no cover in the group chasing leaders, found disappointing little when placed under pressure inside 400M, weakened 150M. (Muco.)
Sent forward, positioned one out one back, was asked to pick up the pace 350M but had little left to offer. (Reported by Vet to have stiff restricted action after racing.)
Dropped back to near last from wide barrier, driven along passing 400M but didn't respond to riding, eased when no chance over final 150M.
Settled behind midfield along the 2-path, came under pressure turning for home, soon beaten and eased. (Irregular Heart Rhythm.)

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Always well there, held slender advantage on stands rails inside final 400 metres, hung on well under pressure, only caught in the bobbing heads to share the spoils.
Midfield early, improved to close-up position over 600 metres out, looked confident through final 200 metres, rallied final stages to salvage a dead-heat.
Never far off, produced good late impression closing stages.
Disputed lead, weakened out of contention inside final 250 metres.
In similar position on stands rails throughout. (See Racing Incidents)
Jumped moderately but soon took up running, weakened under pressure out of contention inside final 250 metres.
Jumped awkwardly bumping others, travelled mainly in midfield down the centre of the track, kept on well in the run home.
Jumped fairly from a low draw, settled one back down the centre of the track, faded inside final 250 metres. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Never better than midfield, one-paced.
Bumped at the start, soon dropped to last few, made no impression.
Never far off to the 400 metres, weakened under pressure.
Soon dropped to last few.
Began very awkwardly losing considerable ground, always struggling at the back.
Soon dropped to last few after beginning from the one draw, dropped away quickly from halfway out.
Raced in third position 1 off with cover. Kept up a good gallop to land the prize.
Did plenty of work to go forward and eventually crossed to lead along the fence near the 800m. Stayed on well.
Settled ahead of midfield, 2 wide with cover. Chased gamely all the way to the post.
Made its run from towards the rear, 1 off with cover. Finished off soundly.
Went forward and handed up approaching the 800m and tracked the leader thereafter. Got tired over the final 100m.
Travelled 3 back the fence with cover. Weakened over the concluding stages.
Raced towards the rear on the fence with cover. Was one paced in the home straight.
Didn't muster in the early stages settling worse than midfield on the rails. Was one paced in the straight.
Settled midfield close to the fence with cover. Was dour in the straight.
Camped 2 deep with cover midfield. Failed to close off.
Raced at the rear 3 wide with cover. Never really relaxed and was a beaten horse early in the straight.
Began awkwardly then worked forward to race off the pace 3 deep without cover. Never likely.
Raced midfield, travelled 3.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, difficult to find a day night until 200M, dashed well to score by 1L.
Ridden forward to take the fence and settled 1.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on soundly to get 2nd but not match with the classy winner.
Showed good early pace to travel 2Ls off the pace in a nice position, ran on nicely until final 50M to get 3rd.
Ridden forward to settle 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, kept on well to the line.
Settled worse than midfield 5Ls off the pace on the fence, dashed well 250M.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls off the pace 2 wide with cover, ran on only fairly.
Settled worse than midfield about 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, kept on the same pace to the line.
Lacked early pace, settled 3Ls off the pace 3 wide without cover throughout, made no acceleration to run home.
Taken back, travelled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, never ran on.
Hard ridden forward to take the fence and led by 1-1/2Ls, flattened badly 200M.
Always at rear, never a factor.
At last throughout, never looked competitive, tailed out.
Jumped well, restrained, settling 3-back, 1-off at turn. Flat footed 400m when leading trio kicked, picked up momentum from 200m, scrambling home final 50m.
Began best but not pushed, settling 1-back, 1-off before turn. Shaken up 400m, picked up momentum gradually, hit front 100m, run down.
Restrained early while shifting closer to rail. Peeled out turning for home, no clear run until 200m, finished strongly under hard riding.
Began fairly, positioned 2 wide with cover on 4th, start ridden turning in, took the lead 400m, flattened 150m.
Pushed forward from start, taking lead on settling. Travelled strongly around turn, caught 350m but kept on well to the line.
Rolled forward steadily before cutting to rail 1000m. Entered straight behind horses, kept on steadily till checked 50m. Rider queried (See Racing Incidents).
Taken across behind horses, finding rail 1200m. Stayed on rail entering straight, ran on steadily before blocked final stages.
Restrained soon after start and taken in from wide draw but difficult to settle. Taken wide entering straight and ran on steadily.
Ridden forward but trapped 3-wide without cover. Covered extra ground turn, boxed on in straight without looking a threat.
Restrained early but unable to slot in and trapped 3-wide with cover near rear. Turned very wide but one-paced in straight.
Strode forward between horses back stretch, settling midfield. Made some ground early in straight before flattened 200m.
Began well but not pushed and allowed to take box seat before first turn. Gave ground soon after entering straight. Lame right fore.
Began badly, cut in to rail, checked 1000m, improved position around turn, spent force final 400m.
Began well, rolled forward to grab rail position 2-back from leader. Gave ground soon after entering straight, finishing tailed off.
Restrained at rear before shifting 3-wide entering turn. Taken wider in straight, ran on strongly to hit front 150m, holding off late challenge.
Began well, raced inside early leader to turn before settling 2-back, 1-off. Caught flat-footed 400m, picked up momentum 200m, doing best final 100m.
Rolled forward from wide draw to lead before easing into one-off position at turn. Surged forward entering straight, hit front 200m, flattened late.
No early speed, settling at rear away from fence. No run early in straight, shifted out 300m to get clear, ran on well.
Crowded start, picked up quickly to settle in box seat at turn. Got split 300m, looked chance before flattened 50m.
Taken forward crossing to rail 2-back from leader. Kept on early in straight before running out of ground 100m. Not properly tested.
Began well, raced outside early leader but held wide without cover. Kept on one-paced under hard riding in straight.
Crowded out start, recovered to sit midfield away from fence. Turned very wide, struck on nose 350m, one-paced.
Allowed to stride forward gradually picking up speed to lead from 1200m. Kicked clear 400m, caught 200m, one-paced.
Began awkwardly, shifted out abruptly, then rolled forward before close on heels 1100m. Hard ridden to hold position from 600m. (See Racing Incidents).
Taken out shortly after start, moved forward while shifting to rail. Switched course to get run 400m, ran out of room final stages.
Outpaced, settling at rear along fence. Came off fence entering straight but eased final stages when run closed.
No early speed and clear last back stretch and turn. Never competitive.
Taken across behind runners from wide draw but kept away from fence. Found nothing when shaken up entering straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed strongly 250M to score.
Pushed early but not muster, 7Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 250M to secure 2nd.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, closed off strongly 300M for 3rd.
In front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, held up 400M, dashed well when clear, just missed a place.
Hard ridden forward to take rail and led by 1.5Ls, clocked advantageous slow sectionals, hung on well until 150M flattened.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, 8Ls off the leader, blocked 4-2, dashed well when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed to hold the box seat, favoured by the slow tempo, lack room 400M, just ran on when clear.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader on the rails, harmed by the slow pace, held up 4-2, ran on ok.
At back but on the fence, 6Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, lack room 400M, little dash 200M.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leader 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 400M, run ended quickly 200M.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the slow pace, trapped 3 wide, out of fuel 300M.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, reduced 400M, buffered for room 350M and checked.
Eased to rear, 8Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Rolled forward, 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed the slow tempo, however soon emptied 300M.
Restrained, taken to rail, waited. Off bridle for a few strides 700m, no clear run until 250m, motored home to win in last stride.
Jumped well, enjoyed soft lead back stretch and turn. Kicked clear 400m, still strong 100m, just caught.
Restrained early but trapped 3-wide. Rolled forward 1100m when pace slackened but held out by inside horse. Threw out challenge entering straight but unable close gap.
Began awkwardly, restrained to find cover, settling toward rear. Peeled wide entering straight and ran on steadily. Rider queried (See Racing Incidents).
Allowed to stride forward at own pace but difficult to settle approaching turn. No run early in straight, kept on steadily when clear.
Jumped only fairly and taken back to sit at rear away from rail. Last into straight before running past beaten horses.
Began well and soon in box seat before being shuffled back to 3rd turning for home. Found little in straight under hard riding.
Rolled forward, settling 4th early before being shuffled back when pace slacked. Stayed on rail entering straight, one-paced.
Began well, cut to rail but got close to heels and pulled out 1100m to go forward and sit behind leader at turn. Tired shortly after entering straight.
Driven forward from wide barrier, emerged to lead nearing the turn, pressed by pursuing rivals passing 250M, shifted out on a number of occasions but found enough to hold on.
Unable to slot in from 13, in mid-division and no closer than 3-wide throughout, found less than expected when pressed on 450M, closed moderately to go 2nd near 50M but unable to overhaul the winner.
Raced keenly in a 3-wide position without cover, moved up to a contending position passing 500M, strongly pressed winner from 250M but always held, run ended 50M from home.
Restrained in midfield along the fence, not much room turning home, shifted out to improve 300M, stayed on in good style and nearly claimed 3rd in the end.
Began only fairly, assumed a midfield position and raced keenly between horses, into clear 400M, stayed on reasonable well for 5th.
Set early pace, led to near 950M, driven inside 400M but not pace to challenge leaders, kept on evenly over final 200M.
Broke sharply, restrained to sit behind leaders, within striking distance always, was able to keep up with leaders early straight but turned one pace final 200M.
Held up behind midfield 5Ls off the pace, waited with until 400M, stayed on fairly and never threatened.
Rushed to a midfield position along the fence, crowded for room 1000M and lost ground, kept on same pace in straight, no impression on leaders.
Never far off the pace, within 3Ls of leader always, raced in restricted room nearing 300M and again at 200M, but had not much to offer over the final stages.
Reserved near the rear, shaken up and bid widest passing 400M, made limited progress.
Switched off to last on jumping from 14, became detached after first 200M, hustled along in middle stages, lacked further response in straight.
Close up from the start, chased the pace 2-wide, weakened 300M and dropped away to finish near last.
Dropped back to near the rear, switched to 3-wide passing 700M, found little under pressure, in straight, already beaten nearing 200M.
Broke start, reloaded. Jumped well, motored to front while crossing to fence. Kicked clear entering straight and kept finding for comfortable win.
Restrained, slipping between horses 4L from leader. Waited turn, had to switch course in straight to get run, finished strongly.
Rolled forward outside leader but trapped wide without cover until 1000m when crossed. Shaken up 350m but unable match strides with winner.
Began well, slotting into box seat behind leader. Came off fence entering straight but unable to go with winner. One-paced final stages.
Ridden forward but unable find cover and trapped wide from 800m. Covered extra ground turn, kept on one-paced in straight.
Taken back from wide draw and found cover between horses at rear. Had to switch course in straight to find passage and kept on steadily.
Began OK, settling 2-back, 1-off. Under pressure to hold position from 600m, one-paced when inconvenienced 250m. Lame right hind, swollen hock.
Slow into stride, tagging on to field 3-wide at 1200m. Peeled out 600m, widest into straight, kept on one-paced.
Fractious in gate, began awkwardly, taken forward, then raced on heels into turn. One-paced in straight. Lame right fore.
Not rushed, sticking to rail behind midfield. Stayed on rail entering straight but one-paced under hard riding final 400m.
Taken forward along rail but difficult to settle when crossed 1100m. Gave ground soon after entering straight.
Taken back but held 4-wide 1200m. Took off around field to sit outside leader before turn. Gave ground soon after entering straight.
Outpaced, moving quickly to rail at rear. Made ground early in straight but one-paced from 300m. Lame left fore.
Blundered start, ridden vigorously to make ground, struck heels 1400m and blundered, dropping to last. Never competitive after that.
Jumped well, restrained from wide draw, positioned 5-6 lengths back, 3 wide with cover, swung widest turning in, made many lengths down middle, won comfortably.
Broke well from widest draw, ridden forward to take the lead, was uncontested for the majority of the race, 2 lengths clear entering straight, run down final 50m.
Began with line, unable to get in and positioned 3 wide behind midfield, 4-5 lengths back, swung wider turning in, made good ground in straight to take 3rd.
Began well, positioned nicely behind leader at rail, traveled comfortably throughout, kept on evenly in straight to make frame.
Jumped OK, took a position 2 wide with cover on 5th, 2-3 lengths back, start ridden turning in, stayed on well without looking like testing first few.
Away well, settled 2 wide with cover in midfield, about 4 lengths back, did not have a clear run until 200m, ran on fairly.
Jumped fairly, positioned 4-5 lengths back on rail, kept to inside and made steady progress in straight.
Began well, pushed to take the position 2-3 lengths back on rail, kept on one-paced under pressure in straight.
Began fairly from a tricky gate, made contact and taken wider near 1100m, travelled 3 wide with no cover, 2-3 lengths back, ridden turning in but failed to respond and was one-paced in straight.
Average to begin, positioned 5-6 lengths back on rail, no response when asked in straight.
Jumped well, pushed to sit 2 wide without cover in 2nd, ok run to turn, niggled early in the straight, but found little.
Moderate break, drifted back to be a clear last, was 9 lengths away at 800M, hard ridden after entering straight but showed nothing.
Settled 2 wide with cover in midfield, 3-4 lengths behind, under pressure and shifted out 500m, tired shortly after entering straight. (See racing incidents)
Slow to begin, was difficult to settle before the first turn, kept 2 wide with cover at rear, ridden after entering straight but failed to respond and eased.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Very sluggish at start and given reminders early in midfield, took closer order up the Rock to track the leader into straight, asserted authority inside final 30 metres.
Jumped moderately, ridden to lead and attempted to make all, caught final 30 metres.
Jumped well, settled in rear of midfield, did not find much room early in straight, finished off race nicely.
Slow away, remained in last few, saved ground turning in, fought on steadily along rails to be nearest at finish.
Ridden along behind midfield, took closer order around the bend, saved ground turning in, one-paced under pressure.
Slowly away, niggled along in last few, made significant progress inside final 300 metres.
Taken back from the widest gate, trailed the field to straight, ran on past beaten horses inside final 200 metres.
Settled mainly in forward of midfield, found nil in straight.
Broke well, traveled 3-wide in a prominent position, yielded ground from approaching home turn.
Jumped fairly, raced wide without cover better than midfield, closer up on home bend, faded under pressure after straightening.
Jumped moderately, soon picked up to race outside leader, remained same into straight, dropped out under pressure. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Rated 1 out 1 back. Rallied 3 deep prior to the home turn and maintained a sound gallop to score maiden win.
Camped in 5th position on the rails with cover. Peeled out rounding the home turn & chased gamely all the up the running.
Made its run from 4th last, on the paint with cover. Finished off soundly.
Had no excuses after box seating. Stayed on evenly in the run to the line.
Parked 3rd from the rear, 1 off with cover. Finished off one paced.
Didn't show any early pace settling just off midfield the fence, had cover. Was dour in the run home.
Speared forward and raced outside the leader in 2nd position. Gave ground inside the furlong.
Jumped awkwardly, settling behind midfield, 2 wide with cover. Never quickened in the home stretch.
Raced at the tail of the field, on the paint with cover. Only plodded to the line.
Not the best to begin settling at the rear of the field, 2 deep with cover. Failed to close off.
Camped midfield, 1 off with cover. Struggled in the final stretch.
Sent forward and led at good early fractions on the fence. Was a spent force on straightening.
Hard ridden to occupy the box seat, suited by the fast pace, ran on strongly to score by a neck.
Began awkwardly, then settled 2.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, dashed well to get 2nd.
Sent forward to share the lead without cover, despite harmed by the fast pace, hung on well for 3rd but without any threats to the first two.
Settled worse than midfield about 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, suited by the fast pace, finished off well but without any serious threats.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, benefited by the fast pace, ran on ok.
Jumped slowly, then settled 7.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, benefited by the fast pace, ran on nicely.
Taken back from a wide gate, travelled 6Ls off the leader 2-3 wide with cover, despite benefited by the fast pace, ran on only fairly.
Sent forward but failed to obtain the lead, travelled 3Ls off the fast pace 2 wide with cover, never looked likely.
Hard ridden forward to take the fence and led by a neck at fast sectionals, stayed on until 200M flattened badly. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Jumped slowly, then showed no early pace despite hard ridden along, raced at rear throughout, never a factor.
Failed to muster despite niggled along, settled 4.5Ls off the fast pace 2-3 wide, weakened soon after straightening.
Began awkwardly, then failed to cross despite hard ridden along, travelled 1L off the fast pace 3 wide without cover throughout, flattened badly 150M.
Began well, with leading trio back stretch before easing into box seat final turn. Urged forward 350m, took lead 300m, just held.
Jumped fairly, taken back to rail but switched out 600m and crowded 500m. Found passage between horses in straight, finished strongly. Just failed.
Got off well but over-raced turning into back stretch. Close on heels entering turn, looked chance early in straight but peaked final 100m.
Began well but eased behind leading pack, hampered 600s, shifted out and bumped. Checked and unbalanced 500m, kept on well in straight.
One of the first out, strolling forward but 3-wide. Left without cover 800m, rolled forward to lead into straight, kept on well to 50mm before swamped.
Taken back from start and soon at rear but away from fence. Last into home straight but made ground steadily to be closest at finish.
Allowed to stride forward at own pace but held 3-wide. Taken wider entering straight but one-paced under hard riding.
Began fairly, shaken up and made ground between horses before checked 1000m. Bumped 600m, got head up 500m, one-paced.
Took time to muster, ridden forward and held 3-wide with cover. Switched to rail entering straight, made some ground, one-paced from 200m.
Began well and allowed to stride forward but caught 4-wide without cover. Covered extra ground turn and tired after straightening for home.
Jumped well and mustered along rail to lead back stretch. Steadied 600m when crossed, hit rail and became unbalanced, Gave ground quickly.
Cut in to rail soon after start but outpaced and dropped back. Never a factor after checked 500m.
Jumped well but settled behind leader. Shuffled back 1700m, came off fence 1000m but shifted back in final turn. Had to switch out in straight to get run and finished strongly.
Not pushed, settling at rear close to rail. Last at 1600m, off fence 1000m, 3-wide final turn, finished strongly centre course to just miss.
Jumped OK but tightened 2000m. Lost position back stretch, last at turn. Cut in to rail, ran on steadily from 500m to be closest at finish.
Settled behind pacemakers, got close to heels 1800m dropping 2-back, 1-off back stretch. Took off approaching home turn, led from 500m, kept on well till swamped final 50m.
Began awkwardly, dropping to rear away from fence. Unhappy with slow pace, took off from 800m to sit outside leader. Kept on well till flattened 50m.
Taken across behind runners from wide draw and last on settling. Improved position back stretch, 3-wide final turn, made ground till flattened 100m.
Shaken up to go forward, led to 1700m before easing into box seat before 2nd turn. Hard ridden from 600m but only one paced.
Taken forward between horses but left wide without cover when outside runners shot ahead 1600m. Wide back stretch, made forward move 500m, then one-paced. Rider said saddle shifted 800m.
Ridden up inside early leader first turn, led 1800m before easing to 3rd 1600m. Hard ridden from 800m, found little, eased final 200m.
Caught 3-wide first turn, rolled forward to lead 1600m, cutting to fence and slowing pace. Overtaken final turn, gave ground quickly in straight. Unacceptable performance.
Ridden forward from wide draw to sit outside leader from first to second turn. Under pressure back stretch and beaten horse from 800m. Unacceptable performance. Lame right front leg.
Trapped 4-wide first turn and ridden forward to sit outside leader from 1600m to 700m when gave ground abruptly. Mucus in trachea. Unacceptable performance.
Hard ridden to take rail, then led by 1L casually at slow sectionals, made all without much pressure thereafter.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, hung in in straight, dashed strongly 300M for 2nd despite all negative racing situations.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, closed off well for 3rd.
Hard ridden forward, 1L off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the slow sectionals, ran on ok.
Pushed early but not muster, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, lack room 400-200M, dashed well.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, 7.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow tempo, blocked most straight, dashed well to the line.
Eased at start, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Settled in midfield along the rails, 3Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow pace, no progress.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader, raced keenly, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, emptied 250M.
At back, 5.5Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Hard ridden to occupy box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, reduced quickly 250M.
Taken back from wide draw and last on settling. Waited until entering straight, shifted in 300m for run but bumped and checked, shifted out 200m, found split and motored home.
Jumped best, pressured back stretch and dropped to 3rd. Hugged rail entering straight, took lead 200m, kept on well till caught final strides. Rider reported saddle shifted early in race.
Slow, cut quickly to rail at rear, well back entering straight, bumped and unbalanced 300m when shifted out to find run, kept on steadily to snatch 3rd on line.
Ridden forward to find cover, settling 2-back, 1-off back stretch. Made forward move wide from 600m, joint leader 200m, shifted in under pressure 150m, one-paced.
Slow into stride, cut to fence and rolled forward to sit midfield. Peeled out entering straight and kept on steadily.
Outpaced, settling near rear away from fence. Taken wide turning for home, widest in straight, kept on without threatening.
Ridden forward but unable to find cover and raced wide thereafter. Kept on steadily under hard riding in straight.
Pushed forward from inside draw and with leading trio till forging ahead final turn. Caught 200m and weakened steadily.
Taken back from wide draw and checked shortly after. Peeled wide turning for home but found little under hard riding.
Began awkwardly, recovered and rolled forward but wide back stretch. No cover from 600m. Shifted in 350m but spent force soon after.
Taken forward, slipping into box seat back stretch, then 2-back into final turn. Gave ground shortly after entering straight.
Hard ridden to go forward, led from 1000m, dropping to 2nd final turn. Kept on steadily to 200m before tiring quickly.
Began awkwardly and lost ground, tracked leader in a slowly run race, went for inside gap passing 350M, closed determinedly along the rail and got up near 150M under strong handling.
Allowed an uncontested lead, set very slow pace in the first half, kept on steadily in the run to the line, beaten to 2nd near 150M while clearly best of the rest.
Well reserved in midfield, shaken up nearing 400M, laid in early straight, did best work late to get up for 3rd 50M out.
Settled at the back, 6-7Ls off the slow pace in middle stages, switched wide 500M, stayed on mildly in straight.
Never far off, the pace, ran on one paced final 300M, raced tight near 100M but managed to get up for 5th just in time.
Broke well, raced keenly up front, caught 3-wide no cover for much of the way, not able to quicken in straight after a tough journey.
Soon taken across to the rail, held up behind midfield, shuffled back to near last turning for home, made limited progress when taken out to challenge.

Up with pace early stages, tracked leader 2-wide from 1300M, held a good striking position turning into straight and found disappointingly little under pressure, remained one pace and weakened over finals stages.
Restrained in midfield along the fence, lacked the necessary response and stayed on one pace over final 300M.
Raced 3-wide first 900M then slotted into a 2-wide position near the rear, kept on same pace under pressure, never a threat to main rivals.
Slow to begin, moved into a rearward position, not helped by slow pace and taken to 3-wide 1000M, bid wider home turn, closed off the race only fairly, no extra 100M.
Switched off to rear of the field, niggled along passing 500M but lacked the needed response, first to be beaten.

Broke well from the widest gate, quickly led and crossed for rails coming out of back straight, kicked over 2L clear approaching the 200 metres, held on under pressure.
Settled just better than midfield, commenced move around home bend, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Slightly slow away, settled in midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, produced good late impression inside final 100 metres.
Broke well from a wide gate, travelled wide without cover better than midfield, made steady progress inside final 300 metres down the centre of the track.
Settled in rear, took closer order around the bend, inconvenienced over 200 metres out before producing good late impression closing stages.
Slowly away, settled well behind, made significant progress down the centre of the straight, did best work late.
Jumped moderately, soon picked up to be just worse than midfield racing 3-wide, made no impression in straight. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Jumped moderately, gradually picked up to prominent one-back position in 3rd on rails, soon faded in straight. (Blood and mucus in trachea)
Very sluggish at start, settled towards the rear on rails, raced greenly and reluctant to maintain position approaching home turn, kept on before making late headway close to home.
Jumped well, soon found itself in rear of midfield despite niggled along, similar turning in, faded under pressure.
Broke well, chased leader to straight, soon weakened.
Jumped moderately, settled in last few, lost position dropping to last around the bend and hung out, made no impression in straight.
Was obliged to do some work early to go forward and take up the outright lead on the rails after the 800m. Was never headed thereafter and finished off willingly.
Was posted deep early, before slotting in to course 3 wide without cover just off the speed. Chased gamely all the way down the running.
Raced with cover on the circle, 3 deep, ahead of midfield. Maintained a good gallop right to the post.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race box seating. Kept battling away in the final stretch.
Couldn't go the early speed of the race, drifted back, and was checked near the 800m to race at the rear on the paint with cover. Ran on late.
Camped third from the rear, 2 wide with cover. Swung deep on the home turn, made some late headway.
Settled in about 5th position, 1 off with cover. Battled away at the same pace in the run home.
Camped midfield the fence with cover. Failed to quicken in the straight and was one paced.
Settled worse than midfield, was on the fence with cover near the 800m. Struggled in the home stretch.
Began awkwardly settling last, 2 deep with cover. Came wide on the home turn, failed to close off.
Settled in second position outside the leader. Weakened early in the straight after having every chance.
Settled after the 800m 1 off the paint with cover, behind midfield. Was well beaten by the furlong.
Camped handy, settled 1-1/2Ls off the leader 2 wide with cover, finished off strongly when asked for run 300M to score by a short head.
Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, dashed on well to get 2nd, just beaten by a narrow margin.
Hard ridden forward to park outside the leader, stayed on gamely until final 100M weakened for 3rd.
Settled worse than midfield about 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, ran on steadily but without any threat to the placegetter. (Questioned for riding, see incident report)
Taken back, travelled 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, swung wide turning in, made some ground in straight without any serious threat.
Lost significant amount of ground at start, then gradually improved rounding the Home Turn however trapped 4 wide without cover throughout, never looked likely. (See incident report)
Showed no early pace, travelled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, passed some tired runners.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, never ran on.
Rolled forward to take the fence and led by 1/2L, flattened badly 300M.
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along, settled 5Ls off the leader 3 wide with cover, never looked threat.
Crowded start then ridden along to settle 3Ls 3 wide without cover throughout, weakened soon after straightening.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, flattened soon after straightening.
Began fairly, quickly mustered while switching out to sit alongside leader 800m, kicked 350m pulling clear for easy win.
Began fairly, pressed forward to sit behind leaders with cover. Got close to heels 800m, under pressure from 400m, ran on well.
Began awkwardly, pressed forward between early leaders close to outer rail, checked 300m, recovered and ran on steadily.
Crowded out start, bumping another and dropping behind midfield. Pressed forward entering course proper but hung out 400m and difficult to ride. Kept on steadily.
Bumped and unbalanced start, switched to outer rail while improving position. Switched in 400m for clear run and kept on steadily.
Jumped well to lead, joined by winner 800m, kept on well to 400m before giving ground gradually.
Jumped OK and ridden along to hold position behind leading pair. Came off bridle 600m, under pressure from 400m, but only one-paced.
Checked and lost ground start, becoming detached from field. Tagged on to main bunch 600m, hard ridden from 400m, one-paced.
Began fairly, then used to stay in touch with leaders. Failed to respond when urged 600m, yielding ground steadily from 400m.
Began fairly, outpaced and dropped to rear along outer fence. In last pair entering course proper, found little when asked.
Came out running along outsider rail, stayed with leading trio to course proper when lay in and failed to stretch out, dropping back. Unacceptable performance (See racing incidents).
Began well but held in centre course behind leading pack. Started to give ground when racing alone, finishing tailed off.
Jumped fairly and held wide into first turn dropping to behind midfield. Kept wide back stretch and final turn, hard ridden from 500m making ground gradually to hit front final strides.
Began well but changed strides passing 1600m and shifted in, settling 2-back the fence. Peeled out turning for home, pressed forward to lead 400m, kept on well till caught final strides.
Began awkwardly, dropping to clear last despite being given reminders. Became detached from field and 3L last entering final turn. Switched wide entering straight and ran on strongly under whip.
Pressed forward from wide draw but kept wide, dropping to 3rd first turn. Rolled forward 1200m, clear lead into final turn, joined 400m but kept on well before flattened 50m.
Outpaced early, dropping to behind midfield away from fence. Improved position back stretch, 5th into straight, kept on steadily.
Began OK but crowded and checked 1600m dropping towards rear. Stayed on fence, raced tight 500m when improving, kept on steadily in straight.
Pressed forward from wide draw but unable cut to fence and held 3-wide first turn and back stretch. Covered extra ground final turn, one paced in straight.
Last to leave gate and cut quickly to fence towards rear. Not pushed back stretch, shifted twice around turn to get running, kept on steadily in straight.
Outpaced, dropping to rear away from fence. Pushed forward entering turn, raced tight 500m, kept on one-paced in straight.
Began well, pressed forward 3-wide into first turn, cutting to rail to lead at 1500m. Joined up front 1200m, 2nd into final turn, gave ground gradually from 400m.
Began well, rolled forward 4-wide to first turn before settling outside leader at 1500m. Slipped back to 3rd entering final turn and gave ground steadily from 300m.
Began fairly and pressed forward despite being held wide. Continued to race wide in 6th place back stretch but spent force by 400m.
Pressed forward from wide draw but failed to muster and held wide in midfield without cover. Gave ground soon after straightening. Unacceptable performance.
Began well but crowded 1600m dropping to 5th along fence. Travelled OK back stretch before giving ground from turn. Bled from both nostrils.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, made steady ground 350M to score.
Pushed forward, 3Ls off the fast pace on the fence, held up most straight, ran on strongly, just missed.
Pushed to take rail and led by 2Ls at fast sectionals, hung on strongly until 100M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Eased back, 8Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M whilst laying in.
Settled in midfield, 5Ls off the leader along the fence, favoured by the fast tempo, made some ground 250M.
Hard ridden forward, 3Ls off the fast pace 3 wide all the way, just held ground in straight.
Eased at start, too cover at rear, 11Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M.
Eased back, 8Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, made steady ground 300M, blocked 200M.
Hard ridden forward, 3Ls off the fast pace, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, flattened in straight.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, no progress in straight.
Slow away, hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 6Ls off the leader on the fence, suited by the fast pace, no progress, checked 100M.
Eased back, 9Ls off the leader 2-4 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, no progress.
Pressed forward, just off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the fast pace, soon emptied 400M.
Very slow away, at rear, suited by the fast tempo, but never competitive.
Ridden forward from wide draw to sit outside leader before turn. Picked up momentum after entering straight and kept on gamely under hard riding.
Began fairly, pressed forward, taking box seat before turn. Saved ground turn, switched out 250m to find passage, ran on well.
Checked soon after start, cut to rail 3-back from leader. Saved ground on rail into straight, got split 150m, bolted through for third.
Began moderately, ridden along 3-wide with cover. Improved position turn, shifted out 200m to get run and kept on steadily.
Pressed forward to lead on settling, cutting in to fence. Caught soon after entering straight but kept on well till swamped final strides.
Began fairly, picked up momentum to sit behind leading pack in a 1-off position. Pressed forward entering straight but peaked 200m. Eased final strides when awkwardly placed.
Outpaced, slipping back gradually to sit at rear away from fence. Very wide entering straight but closed off nicely.
Slow into stride, cut in behind horses to sit in last pair along fence. Stayed on rail early in straight, shifted out 300m for run, kept on steadily.
Lost ground soon after start, cut to rail at rear. Improved around turn, but only one-paced in straight.
Hard ridden from outside draw to go forward, sitting 3-wide behind leaders into turn. Gave ground steadily from 300m.
Restrained and taken across behind runners but kept away from fence. Shaken up entering straight but little response.
Ridden forward from widest draw but unable slot in and held 4-wide in 4th place into and around turn. Kept on early in straight before tiring 200m.
Hard ridden from wide draw but failed to muster and held towards rear. Given reminders entering straight but limited response.
Began fairly, settling midfield away from the fence. Wide entering straight but found nothing, drifting back gradually.
Slow to begin, not hurried, settled near last 5Ls off the pace, switched out passing 500M, quickened sharply turning home, led near 200M, continued on strongly.
Unable to slot in from wide barrier, 4-wide no cover for much of the way, ran on well on straightening but always held by winner final 200M.
Began well, restrained to a 3-wide position behind midfield, driven nearing 400M, lacked acceleration of first two but stayed on to go 3rd 150M from home.
Never far off the pace, raced 3-wide to straight, moved to a striking position 450M, couldn't match the finishing kick of first three on straightening, kept on same pace for a distant 4th.
Rousted along early stages, crossed to race outside leader, remained same pace entering straight, weakened final stages.
Broke sharply, settled 2-wide in the group chasing leaders, lacked further response passing 300M, kept on same pace to line.
Slightly slow out, assumed a midfield position in midfield, failed to make significant headway final 400M, never threatened. (Blood in trachea.)
Slow to begin, held up in a rearward position on the inside, made some minor progress on straightening, had to shift out near 100M for clear run.
Held up midfield along the fence, badly held up by a weakening runner until 300M, ran on only fairly when clear.
Slow to begin, raced at the back, hung out rounding the turn, continued to lay out in straight, not picked up the pace.
Sent forward, led to 250M, found no extra.
Began well enough from draw 1, tracked leader in a steadily run race, under pressure and outpaced nearing 400M, weakened to last mid-straight.
Began OK, taken forward but wide before getting cover at turn. Peeled 5-wide entering straight, shot to the front 250m, bolted in.
Crowded shortly after start and taken behind runners to rail. Made ground home turn, switched out 400m, ran on strongly.
Began fairly holding fence 4L from leader. Edged closer at turn, wide into straight, ran on steadily without looking dangerous.
Ridden along early but failed to muster settling 4-back along fence. Switched out entering straight and ran on steadily to just miss a place.
Began well, quickly on rail, slipping into box seat by turn. Got split between horses 300m, looked a chance before one-paced final 200m.
Shaken up to go forward but trapped 3-wide without cover 800m. Rolled forward 3-wide to sit outside leader into straight, bumped 250m when giving ground.
Outpaced early, dropping back to a 1-off position at rear. Peeled wide entering straight and kept on steadily.
Pressed forward, sitting on hind quarters of leader before moving alongside entering straight. Kept on till 200m when flattened.
Taken forward but wide before badly hampered and taken extremely wide 700m out and dropping to last. Ran past beaten horses late.
Strode forward at steady pace before getting close to heels 700m, hanging out badly and severely checked, dropping back. Racing manners deemed unacceptable (See Racing Incidents).
Ridden forward from wide draw to lead on settling. Harassed by two others around turn, bumped when giving ground 250m.
Ridden along from wide draw but held wide, then taken behind runners to rail, dropping to last. Never competitive.
Began nicely, pressed on to race outside leader, moved up on circle, took a narrow lead turning, was headed but fought back strongly final 200m to outlast rival in shadows.
Landed ideal spot 1 out 1 back, all favours in run, came into equation from bend, hit lead passing 300m and kept giving but eventual winner fought back to deny victory.
Even break, raced 4ls back on rails behind midfield, used little in mid-section, in traffic turning, closed well when clear final 250m doing best work late for placing.
Out in line, took a trail 2-3ls back on rails, ideal run throughout, there to bend, didn't have a dash but stayed on soundly to make frame.
Away nicely, able to hold leaders back, ideal run in mid-section, right there turning, stuck on evenly when clear final 300m and just missed out on frame.
No early pace and dropped in behind midfield, raced 2 and 3 wide 5ls back, made run wider turning, made steady progress to be nearest on line.
Drifted back from the middle of lien, shared rear 6ls or so away in running line, made a wide run turning, made some headway in straight without threatening.
Began with rest, pressed forward from a wide alley to take up running. Set terms in front 1L clear, challenged on bend, lost advantage at 300m and couldn't sustain effort folding up late.

No early speed as expected, raced behind midfield 5-6ls back on fence, fair trip thereafter, back with plenty to beat turning, came wider but only responded fairly final 300m and couldn't get much closer.
Began ok, able to slot into midfield from a tricky gate, no excuses after reasonable run in midfield, didn't have a dash in straight and struggled final furlong.
Settled near to rear 6-7ls back on rails, steady tempo in mid-section not to suit, still well back turning, just passed a few tired ones late.
Began well, pressed on in search of spot, posted 3 wide without cover throughout, did share of work to bend, soon under pressure after challenging on bend, dropped out final 300m.
Began nicely, unable to show enough speed to slot in and travelled 3 wide with cover in midfield 4ls back, weakened out soon after straightening.
Broke well from a tricky draw, pushed to take the 2 wide position close to leader, 1 out 1 back, travelled nicely throughout, ridden 300M, kicked away, won comfortably.
Began fairly, positioned 2 wide with cover in 5th, ridden 400M, ran home strongly without posing any threat to winner.
Slowly away, recovered quickly to sit 3-4 lengths back on rail, hard ridden turning in, closed off nicely.
Slightly slow out but recovered quickly to settle 2 wide with cover just off midfield, switched out in straight, ran home well to get 4th.
Average to begin, settled 6 lengths back on rail, shifted to 2 wide at 800M, ridden before turning in and swung widest in straight, ran home very strongly to be nearest on line.
Began fairly, difficult to settle when positioned 2 wide before midfield in the first section, pushed to improve its position into the lead near 1200M, held a 1L advantage turning in, weakened 200M.
Slowly away, taken back to race at the back of the field, ridden along and swung wide turning in, made limited progress in straight.
Broke OK, settled behind midfield with cover, was 6-7 lengths behind in the back straight, hard ridden from 400M, ran on fairly.
Jumped nicely, took the lead for the 1st section, surrended lead and remained a length behind the leader before turn, ridden turning in, kept on steadily without quickening in straight.
Began fairly, sat 2 wide with cover in midfield, 4-5 lengths back, don't have required response when asked early in straight.
Slightly slow out from wide draw, positioned 7 lengths back, 1 out with cover, rearward to bend, made no real progress.
Broke well, settled 2-3 lengths behind the leader on rail, ridden before turning, found nothing in straight.
Slowly away, restrained to race at the back of the field on rails, dropped out early in straight, tailed out.
Broke well from the widest draw, but 3 wide without cover for the majority of the race, weakened early, tailed out.

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
