Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Waited with, saved a lot of ground on rails turning in, badly baulked for a run until inside final 200 metres, quickened well to snatch race near line.
Began well, raced outside leader before taking over passing the 800 metres, led until caught in the shadows of the post.
Settled wide in midfield after beginning from a poor gate, came to challenge under pressure turning in, ran on steadily without threatening.
Jumped fairly from the one draw, settled in midfield on rails, met minor interference 800 metres out, switched off heels for a run 200 metres, finished off race well.
Jumped well, taken back to race wide in midfield turning into far side, lost position approaching the Rock, wide turn, ran home nicely to be nearest at finish.
Showed speed early, settling one back on rails when hampered and shuffled back to 3L 5th far side, saved ground on rails turning in, ran home one-paced.
Contested early lead, settled one back on rails far side, kept on before weakening inside final 100 metres. (Bled)
Jumped fairly from a poor gate, settled wide in last few, hampered approaching the Rock, remained wide around the bend, produced good late impression inside final 200 metres.
Niggled along, soon picked up a prominent spot in 4th about 2L off the speed, remained similar turning in, one-paced under pressure when checked over 70 metres out.
Contested lead early, raced prominently without cover most of way, weakened under pressure from the 200 metres.
Soon outpaced.
Never seen with a chance.
Speared through and lead on the paint after the 700m. Made every post a winner thereafter to score effortless win.
Stalked the leader on the paint. Chased gamely all the way down the running.
Crowded at the start then drifted back to settle a distant 2nd last, 2 deep with cover. Came wide in the straight and motored home. (see incident report)
Had every possible hope after settling 2nd, 1 off, no cover. Held on to finish in the frame.
Was handy in the run, 2 wide with cover. Finished off steadily.
Parked 3 back the paint, had cover. Maintained an even gallop in the straight.
Raced on the speed coursing 3 deep without cover. Never likely and was well beaten after the furlong.
Settled a long last racing close to the fence, had cover. Passed tired runners in the home straight.
Raced midfield, 2 wide with cover. Kept on at the same pace in the run home.
Camped back in the field, 2-3 deep with cover. Was flat in the home straight.
Lost ground after beginning awkwardly, but recovered to travel close to the running worse than midfield, had cover. Failed to close off.
On the speed early then drifted back to race 3 deep midfield with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
At rear, travelled 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, swung wide turning in, benefited by the fast pace, dashed on strongly to score by a short head.
Settled worse than midfield 5Ls off the leader 3 wide with cover, suited by the fast pace, finished off well to get 2nd.
Taken back, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, benefited by the fast pace, closed off well for 3rd.
Settled in front of midfield 2Ls off the leader, despite harmed by the fast pace and hung in over the final stages, ran on well.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, despite harmed by the fast pace, ran on steadily.
Began smartly, then gradually taken back to settle 3.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, suited by the fast pace, however crowded 150M, not tested thereafter.
Began only fairly, then ridden forward to take the fence and led 800M at fast sectionals, weakened badly 100M.
Sent forward to travel 1/2Ls outside the leader, harmed by the fast pace, kept on steadily until inside 50M checked.
Settled worse than midfield about 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, suited by the fast pace, however badly held up inside 150M, not tested thereafter.
Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, however badly held up inside 150M, not tested thereafter.
Settled worse than midfield about 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite benefited by the fast pace, never ran on.
Ridden forward to travel 2Ls off the fast pace 3 wide without cover throughout, weakened soon after straightening.
Crowded start, last on settling. Trailed field to 400m, taken wide 300m and finished strongly down centre track to win close home.
Began fairly, ridden along but hampered 1000m, settling 2-back the fence. Saved ground turn, got split 100m, finished strongly.
Pressed forward before easing 2-back, 1-off back stretch. Hard-ridden from 300m making ground gradually to be closest at finish.
Taken back from wide draw and cut to rail towards rear. Under pressure entering straight, ran on steadily until final stages when tightened. Not fully tested.
Began well, led for few strides before taking sit behind leader back stretch. Given reminders 300m, kept on steadily before swamped near line.
Began fairly, shuffled back turning into back stretch. Stayed on rail, saved ground turn, shifted out in straight, bumping another 150m. Not ridden out final stages. (See racing incidents).
Outpaced, slipping towards rear away from fence. Taken wide turning for home and ran on steadily down centre track.
Pressed forward from wide draw to lead 1100m, cutting in to fence. Kicked clear 400m, still in front 100m, swamped.
Ridden along early but held wide and without cover from 700m. Unbalanced when bumped turn, one-paced in straight, crowded out 150m.
Rolled forward between horses, settling 3-back away from fence back stretch. On heels 600m, kept on steadily before bumped and unbalanced 150m. Eased.
Began well racing alongside leaders before checked 1000m, dropping 1-back, 1-off back stretch. Kept on steadily to 150m before flattened.
Began fairly, wide into back stretch, settled behind midfield before close on heels 800m. One-paced, tiring from 200m.
Pressed forward to lead at 1500m, cutting to rail 1400m. Slowed pace back stretch, kicked 300m, kept on well holding off late challenge.
Bumped start, not hurried settling along rail behind midfield. Shift out entering straight when close to heels, ran on strongly, bumped from behind 100m, kept on well.
Began OK but not hurried dropping to near last along rail. Taken wide and pressed forward 300m, bumped 150m when racing greenly, shifted in abruptly, just got up to place.
Patiently ridden in midfield along fence, hugged rail saving ground both turns, pressed forward in straight to look chance at 200m, swamped 50m.
Pressed forward to hold narrow lead before slipping into box seat from 1500m. Came off fence 300m, looked chance 200m, flattened 50m.
Taken back from wide draw, dropping to last but away from rail. Not asked for effort until 600m, taken wide straight, kept on one-paced.
Taken forward 3-wide into first turn, settled behind midfield back stretch, switched out entering straight and ran on steadily until severely checked 50m.
Slow into stride, dropping to near rear but away from fence. Shaken up 700m, took final turn 3-wide, kept on steadily until checked 100m.
Bumped start, hard ridden but failed to muster, settling 3-back the fence. Lay out 600m, shifted out 200m when run closed, bumping another. Hampered closing stages when beaten.
Pressed forward from wide draw to sit outside leader from 1400m. Put under pressure turning for home, kept on steadily till 200m, flattened.
Ridden up early, settling 1-off, 1-back first turn. Held together back stretch, shaken up 300m but found nothing. Steadied 250m when losing ground.
Ridden forward to sit 3-back, 1-off back stretch. Got close to heels 900m, rolled forward from 600m to sit outside leader entering straight. Gave ground from 200m.
Pushed to take rail and led comfortably by 1.5Ls at slow sectionals, kicked away 300M to score.
Midfield along the fence, 4Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 200M for 2nd.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow pace, ran on well for 3rd.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, enjoyed the slow sectionals, just held ground in straight.
Eased back early, 4Ls off the leader, raced keenly, steadily moved forward 800M to take the advantages of the slow pace, ran on well until 100M flattened.
Pushed to hold midfield spot, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 200M.
At rear, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed strongly 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M, lack room 50M.
In front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, emptied in straight.
Very slow away, at rear, 6.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, blocked and checked 200M, just ran on.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no turn of foot.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, flattened 300M.
Rolled forward along rail before becoming unbalanced 800m when made contact with another. Recovered, kicked through to lead 600m, got clear 150m, held.
Outpaced, cut to rail, waited. Peeled out 500m, widest into straight, ran on strongly from 300m down centre track to miss narrowly.
Began fairly, mustered along rail, improved position turn, kept on strongly in straight to be nearest at finish.
Began fairly, ridden along own pace, cut to rail and saved ground turn. Kept on steadily in straight.
Checked on jumping and last on settling. Trailed field to straight, still last 200m, finished off nicely.
Pressed forward but bumped and unbalanced 750m dropping to 6th. Took turn wide, one-paced in straight.
Pressed forward between horses but tightened 550m losing ground. Shifted out 400m to obtain run but only one-paced.
Ridden along early to hold forward position, wide into turn, bumped and unbalance 500m. One-paced in straight.
Pressed forward from wide draw to lead early before being passed on the inside 600m. Gave chase to 200m before tiring.

Raced tight after start, unbalanced and lost ground. Improved turn, kept on in straight before shifting out abruptly 200m bumping another. Crowded 150m, struck heels and blundered. No run final stages.
Kicked before start but cleared to run. Pressed forward from wide draw and raced without cover throughout. Gave ground shortly after entering straight.
Outpaced, dropped back to rear and cut to rail. Never competitive.
Settled just off the pace, travelled strongly throughout, quickened to lead 250M, kicked clear in the final 200M for a comfortable victory.
Switched off to the rear, over 10Ls off the pace in early stages, switched out and moved closer to pace nearing 600M, stayed on to go 2nd inside 100M but couldn't get near to the winner.
In touch, always within 3Ls of leader, ran on fairly in the straight and just prevailed in a blanket finish for 3rd.
Settled behind midfield, unable to improve passing 450M when held up behind horses, did some solid late work final 200M and just missed 3rd.
Positioned 4Ls off leader, switched to 3-wide and without cover passing 800M, kept on evenly in straight, no danger to winner.
Took lead from 1100M, led uncontested to straight, headed by winner 250M, faded final 100M and was swamped.
Led early stages, chased leader from 1200M, kept on same pace under pressure.
Near the rear, wide bid nearing 400M, made limited progress in straight, never got to leaders.
Settled towards the rear along the inside, not quickened under pressure, kept on same pace.
Raced along the fence in mid-division, found little turning in and no extra passing 200M.
Held up towards the rear, outpaced and shuffled back to rear rounding home turn, made no real progress turning in.
Held up midfield, came under pressure 500M, weakened to last mid-straight.
Pressed forward, taking lead 1500m and crossing to rail 1400m. Ridden along at own pace, kicked clear 200m, kept on well without being threatened.
Taken forward from wide draw, cutting in 1400m to sit on hind quarters of leader. Under pressure entering straight, kept on steadily but unable close gap.
Ridden along early before settling 1-back, 1-off at first turn. Shaken up on straightening, kept on well but unable close gap.
Began well, holding rail until passed entering first turn, dropping two-back. Saved ground final turn, switched out 300m to make run, switched in again 150m, kept on without looking dangerous.
Brushed gate and began only fairly. Ridden along 1700m to hold position before eased behind horse crossing it. Bumped and unbalanced 200m but kept on between horses.
Began fairy, picked up momentum and settled midfield away from fence. Made little headway thereafter. Lame right front.
Jumped with field, not pressed and settled on rail 4L from leader. No change back stretch, shifted out under pressure 200m and bumped another. One-paced.
Began fairly, outpaced and settled at rear. Became detached from field back stretch, still last 200m, ran past beaten horses.
Pressed forward between horses before crossing to rail in slipstream of leader. Gave ground from 200m despite remainders.
Pressed forward from widest draw and trapped 3-wide in midfield without cover. Beaten horse soon after entering straight.
Slow into stride, ridden along to make ground but held wide first turn. Settled towards rear, shaken up 300m but found little.
Outpaced early and dropped to rear. Shaken up around final turn but failed to muster and finished tailed off.

Ridden clear to cross from a wide draw, soon ceded advantage to avoid a speed battle, renewed effort turning into straight, quickened to soon draw clear after 300 metres, just held off fast-finishing runner-up at line.
Jumped well, settled just off the pace on rails, baulked briefly after straightening, quickened well to challenge, closed well but the post came too soon.
Jumped fairly, raced keenly in midfield early, became 5th about 3L back coming out of back straight, gained closer on turn, ran home steadily and never really mattered.
Jumped well, shifted back steadily to be just behind midfield around the bend, finished off race nicely.
Jumped moderately from the one draw, niggled along to muster before settling in mid-division on rails, saved ground turning in, kept on steadily without quickening.
Jumped fairly, gradually settled in last few, produced for a run inside final 300 metres, made modest headway without threatening.
Settled just worse than midfield, commenced move approaching home turn, switched for a run 300 metres out, one-paced under pressure.
Jumped awkwardly losing ground, settled at the back, inconvenienced on straightening, made up good ground under pressure down the centre of the track.
Travelled in last few throughout, briefly baulked over 200 metres out, produced good late impression closing stages.
Travelled behind midfield throughout, kept on same pace in the run home.
Jumped moderately, picked up steadily to a prominent position, improved further to join leaders 3-wide around home bend, soon weakened after straightening.
Settled wide without cover in rear of midfield from a wide draw, remained similar into straight, ran home one-paced.
Began moderately from the widest gate, rushed up to take up running 800 metres out, led until headed by early leader and eventual winner upon straightening, folded up quickly.
Jumped fairly from a wide gate, raced keenly mainly in forward of midfield position without cover, one-paced when bumped 300 metres out, dropped out.
Maintained the 1 off position, midfield with cover. Hit the front near the 250m and went on to win convincingly.
Settled in last position 1 off with cover. Came widest in the straight and finished off well.
Settled worse than midfield, but posted 3 wide without cover for most of the trip. Made good late ground.
Parked in 4th position, 1 off the fence. Worked to second position at the furlong, grudgingly gave ground late.
Camped a distant second close to the running rail. Kept on at the same speed in the run to the line.
Travelled at the rear of the field, 2 deep with cover. Worked home steadily without threatening towards the outside.
Made its run from behind midfield, on the fence with cover, after not beginning well. Passed tiring runners in the straight, was one paced.
Had no excuses after tracking the favorite, settling behind midfield. Failed to close off.
Dipped at the start then was aggressively ridden to take up the lead on the fence within the first furlong. Set fast pace and led by a margin, was gassed near the 300m.
Raced in third position, on the rails with cover. Was a spent force early in the straight.
Settled back in the field, on the paint with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, closed off impressively to score by 1-3/4Ls.
Taken back, travelled 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, swung wide turning in, dashed on strongly to get 2nd but never match with the winner.
Pushed to obtain midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on well to get 3rd.
Taken back to rear, travelled 8Ls behind the leader on the fence, stayed inside, finished off well but without any serious threats.
Settled worse than midfield 6Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, swung wide turning in, made some ground gradually.
At rear, travelled 7.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, made some ground after straightening.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, under pressure rounding the Home Turn, ran on only fairly.
Camped handy, travelled 1.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide without cover, kept on one pace until 250M weakened.
Rolled forward to take the fence and led by 1.5Ls, weakened over the last furlong. (Questioned for riding, see incident report)
Taken back as usual, settled 5.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, never ran on.
Rolled forward to obtain the box seat, never looked likely after straightening.
Camped handy, however travelled 3 wide without cover throughout, flattened badly rounding the Home Turn, tailed out.
Raced midfield, travelled 4.5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, eased down rounding the Home Turn. (Irregular heart rhythm)
Dropped in at tail, raced rail last pair, switched 3 wide 1000m, progress on turn, widest into stretch, swept to lead 300m, held on.
Good break, raced 1 off with cover midfield, shuffled back 800m to 3rd last, forced back & wide for run at 400m, closing all the way to wire.
Awkward start, taken behind, covered 1 off behind midfield, shuffled to last pair 1200m, driven on turn, quickened to nab rail 300m, strong closer.
Broke OK, sat behind midfield, 4 wide no cover & progress 1000m, driven turning in, vied for lead 300m, outpaced & boxed on.
Smart start, tracked leader 3L back on rail, closed gap 800m, switched 3 wide & driven in 3rd at 400m, outpaced & battled on evenly.
Tardy start, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, niggled 800m, driven turning in, kept on one pace.
Sharp break, sat 5th 3 wide no cover, ridden 600m, under pressure turning in, one-paced & weakened to wire.
Awkward start, sat last pair on outer, switched 4 wide with cover 1200m, progress on turn, shaken up 400m, found little.
Broke well, pressed lead & over-raced early, restrained 1st turn to 3rd 1 off with cover, dropped back 1000m, all out 430m, bumped 300m, no extra.
Fair break, prominent 3 wide no cover 1st turn, rolled to 2nd 1 off, pressed lead 600m, led all out 430m, headed 300m, faded in run.
Sluggish start & bustled early, sat rail behind midfield, ridden 600m, bumped when struggling 300m, found nothing in run home.
Fast start to lead on rail, extended clear 1st turn, steadied pace 1000m, pressured & headed 430m, no extra & faded tamely.
Broke well, sat handy 3 wide with cover, cruised 4 wide into stretch, shaken up to lead 300m, powered clear for wide-margin win.
Awkward start, over-raced 4 wide with cover, snagged to 3 wide near rear, widest into stretch, strong closer to grab 2nd, no chance with winner.
Raced midfield 1 off with cover, switched out & held up into stretch, driven 300m, quickened to 2nd, tapered late & mugged for 2nd at wire.
Fast start, tracked 1 back on rail, hemmed in early in stretch, hard-ridden to close 300m, kept on for late gains.
Fair break, outpaced early & niggled along near rear, driven 400m, stayed on but progress checked 75m, ran on late.
Speed to lead on fence, shaken up 350m, headed 250m, boxed on but tapered in run.
Missed break, raced 1 off with cover near rear, ridden 350m, ran on for moderate inroads.
Slow start, raced at rear 1 off with cover, last turning in, not clear run & switched wide 300m, closed off soundly without threatening.
Fast start to shadow leader 1 off no cover, driven to press lead 300m, outpaced & tapered, swamped closing stages.
Tardy start, trapped 4 wide no cover midfield, forced wider into stretch & driven under pressure, found little & faded to wire.
Sharp start, over-raced early, sat handy 1 off with cover, not clear run in home stretch, driven 100m, barged rival, not fully tested.
Tardy start, slotted 3 wide with cover midfield, over-raced 900m, driven 400m, found little & weakened tamely.
Broke well, raced midfield on rail, ridden turning in, outpaced & weakened, badly hampered close home.

Placing: FE
Comment: Pushed forward from widest gate to 3rd 3 wide no cover, ridden turning in, no extra & faded from 300m, impeded & fell 75m.
Behind midfield, 6Ls off the leader 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 300M, scored with plenty in hand.
Eased back as usual, 7Ls off the leader 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M for 2nd.
Obtained a more prominent spot in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, little dash 200M for 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the slow pace 3 wide, moved forward 800M, just held ground in straight.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader along the fence, blocked 400-200M, dashed well when clear despite not suited by the slow pace, creditable debut run.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, ran on fairly.
Pushed to sit 2.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, made early move 800M to take advantages of the slow pace, ran on in the lead until 200M flattened.
Box seat, benefited by the slow sectionals, out of fuel 250M.
Pushed to keep up behind midfield, 6Ls off the leader on the rails, harmed by the slow tempo, blocked most straight, just ran on.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, blocked most straight and checked twice, not tested.
Prominent, 3Ls off the slow pace on the fence, weakened 300M.
Pushed to take rail and led by 1.5Ls at slow sectionals, soon reduced 300M.
Eased back, harmed by the slow pace, never progressed.
Jumped well but not pressured settling towards the rear in a one-off position. Not asked until passing 500m, taken wide into straight and ran on strongly down centre track to win close home.
Jumped well, led field to 1400m before easing to 3rd along rail. Popped off fence before turn, shot to the front 300m, well clear 200m, run down closing stages.
Outpaced early, dropping to rear away from fence. Close to heels around turn, ran on well in straight when runs opened between horses.
Began awkwardly, tightened 1500m and difficult to settle passing 1400m, steadied 1300m. Entered straight behind horses, close to heels 200m, finished off nicely when clear.
Ridden forward gradually, settling 3-back, 1-off at 800m. Edged closer rounding turn, looked chance 200m, no extra.
Ridden forward 3-wide in midfield and left without cover from 900m. Bumped shortly after entering straight but only one-paced under pressure.
Jumped well, allowed to roll forward inside leader from 1400m. Took lead entering straight, collared 300m, one-paced.
Tightened shortly after start but allowed to roll forward sitting one-back, one-off at turn. One-paced under hard riding from 300m.
Taken back from wide gate, last on settling but kept away from fence. Taken out entering straight and ran past beaten horses.
Began well, pulling hard along rail 2-back from leader. Edged closer entering straight before one-paced from 300m. Bumped from behind 200m.
Taken back from wide gate, settling at the rear away from fence. Very wide entering straight but found little under pressure.
Ridden forward from wide draw to lead from 1400m but kept wide by inside horse. Collared soon after turning for home and became unbalanced 200m when giving ground.
Jumped with field, moving quickly to the rail in midfield, Given reminders entering straight but soon beaten.
Jumped fairly and settled in midfield. Under pressure from 600m to hold position but failed to muster. Hands and heels final 400m.

Settled beautifully along the fence in 5t, well behind leader first 800M, moved closer to track leader passing 600M, badly held up early straight, switched out and closed strongly, got up 50M from home.
Took up running as expected, led uncontested at a steady pace, continued on well when driven out 350M, headed near 50M.
Not hurried, in 4th place 6-7Ls behind pace early stages, moved to a striking position home turn, kept on steadily under constant urging but not finishing pace of winner, held on for 3rd.
Patiently held up, over 10Ls off the pace early stages, niggled along 600M but had little room until 400M when a gap opened up, closed fastest of all to almost claim 3rd at the finish.
Settled 2-wide behind midfield, stayed on well over final 400M.
Held up towards the rear after beginning slowly, found clear run 350M, closed off well, narrowly missed frame.
Began awkwardly, settled in midfield along the fence, had to shift out 250M for clear run, stayed on without threatening.
Assumed a 2-wide position in midfield, kept on same pace final 400M, never seriously threatened.
Settled in 3rd, 5Ls off the runaway leader early stages, moved closer nearing 900M but hung out home turn, lacked further response from 200M.
Sent forward, chased runaway leader, came under pressure 500M, weakened and out of contention mid-straight.
Settled towards the rear, switched wide 600M but never picked up the pace.
At the rear, taken wide and pushed along 500M, briefly responded to riding turning in, soon no extra.
Checked when crowded start, settling toward rear in a 1-off position. Peeled out entering straight, shaken up 250m, picked up momentum to hit front 150m, pulled clear.
Not rushed, settling toward rear but away from fence. Got split soon after entering straight, shifted out 200m and kept on well.
Jumped well, led initially before sitting on hind quarters of leader. Travelled strongly around turn, took lead 300m, kept on steadily when passed.
Bumped, unbalanced start, then ridden forward to sit 2-back, 1-off. Hard ridden from 400m with a few reminders and kept on steadily.
Began only fairly but mustered quickly, taking lead from 1300m. Collared 300m out but kept on one-paced to line.
Ridden early but didn't muster and dropped to last pair away from fence. Awkwardly placed early in straight, shifted out gradually, made ground down centre track.
Began fairly, pressed forward to sit behind leading pack. Given reminders entering straight before awkwardly placed final stages and not fully tested. Had blood in trachea.
Ridden along from wide draw but held deep, steadied 1000m, then travelled keenly before checked 600m. Turned wide, hard ridden but one-paced.
Began OK, pressed forward but refused to settle until turn. Given reminders 400m but only one-paced.
Jumped with field, pressed forward but wide before getting cover entering turn. Hung out under pressure in straight. One-paced.
Shifted out at start, bumping another. Pressed forward to sit two-back from leader, cutting in to rail entering turn. Raced tight early in straight but found little when clear 300m.
Taken out at start, pressed forward and held 3-wide without cover behind leading pair. Gave ground soon after straightening.
Began fairly from widest draw, eased and settled in last pair away from fence. Taken very wide entering straight but found nothing.
Away well, positioned 3 wide without cover, 1.5 lengths back, ridden early in the straight, ran home strongly to score by a length.
Broke well, raced 2 wide with cover in 5th, in traffic early in the straight, worked home nicely when clear final 200M.
Moderate break, settled 4 lengths back in midfield, no run early in the straight, finished the race strongly when clear 150M, just missed 2nd. (See racing incidents)
Jumped well, took spot outside the leader, ridden early in the straight, matched it with eventual winner to 150M, kept on evenly to make frame.
Slowly away, settled 4-5 lengths back on rail, angled out passing 400M, ran home nicely without threatening first few.
Away with them, sat 3 wide with cover, 3-4 lengths back, swung wider turning in, made some progress to 200M but no extra late.
Began well, took the lead and travelled comfortably, ridden 350M, but only one-paced final 200M.
Average break, restrained from the widest draw, positioned 5-6 lengths back at rear, switched out early in the straight but found little.
Taken back from a wide draw, sat 3 wide with cover at rear, shifted wider in the straight, only one-paced thereafter.
Bumped start, sat in midfield, 2-3 lengths back, no response under pressure in straight, weakened 250M.
Drifted back to last, 6-7 lengths from the leader, swung widest turning in but showed no acceleration and just battled in straight.
Jumped well from the wide draw, trapped 4 wide without cover, 2-3 lengths back in midfield, no response when asked in straight and faded after a hard run.
Broke well, pushed vigorously to sit behind the leader on rail, ridden before turning in, found nothing in straight and dropped out tamely.
Began awkwardly when bumped, positioned 2 wide, 4-5 lengths back behind midfield, showed nothing in straight.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Soon taken well behind and waited with, commenced move over 400 metres out, ran on well down the centre of the track to snatch victory final strides.
Broke well, soon obtained cover and settled mostly 2L back in 4th on rails, switched out for a run on straightening, hit the front 150 metres out but only to be collared in the shadows of the post.
Jumped fairly, settled in 5th mainly in forward of midfield, soon came to challenge on straightening, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Jumped fairly, settled just behind midfield, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.

Broke well, soon pulled to the front and crossed to rails over 1200M out, ceded advantage 900M out, renewed effort on straightening to hit the front briefly over 200M out when unable to sustain under pressure.
Broke well, settled in midfield on rails, finished off nicely.
Jumped well from a high draw, settled one-out-one-back in 3rd, came to challenge on straightening, kept on same pace.
Niggled along early, unable to obtain cover and raced wide in midfield throughout, ran home steadily without threatening.
Broke well, soon shifted back to trail the field, remained last to straight, ran on past some well-beaten horses closing stages. (Lame)

Slow out from a high draw, soon rushed up to join leaders out wide around stables bend, took up running at far side and led until finding no extra inside final 300 metres. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Slightly slow out, niggled along to pick up on rails to just worse than midfield, remained similar to straight, made no impression.
Travelled behind midfield, 3 deep without cover for most of the trip. Rattled home nicely down the outside to claim victory 50m from home, despite shifting ground inwards over the latter stages.
Led early before handing up and settling in 2nd position, close to the rail, had cover at stages. Had a good trailing position turning for home, ran on well.
Settled worse than midfield, 2 wide with cover. Peeled out near the 800m and circled the field to lead on the fence. Maintained a good gallop down the running.
Made its run from the rear of the field, 2 deep with cover. Worked home well late to make the frame.
Settled in 4th position, on the fence with cover. Railed up turning for home and finished off evenly.
Travelled in 3rd position, 2 wide with cover. Got shuffled back after the 800m to race midfield. Was one paced in the home stretch.
Worked forward and led after the 1400m at a slow tempo on the fence. Was challenged after the 800m and was a spent force 200m from home.
Parked midfield, 2 wide with cover. Rushed forward after the 800m and raced on the speed 3 deep without cover. Was paddling the last 100m. (Blood in trachea)
Camped on the paint just behind midfield, had cover. Kept to the inside in the straight, was giving ground inside the furlong.
Travelled back in the field on the paint with cover. Raced keenly at times throughout the event, failed to close off.
Settled in last position, 2-3 deep with cover. Struggled in the home stretch.
Settled worse than midfield 8Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, swung wide turning in, dashed on strongly to score by 1/2Ls.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls off the leader 2 wide with cover, finished off well to get 2nd.
Eased start, then gradually moved up to take the fence and led from 1100M, led by 2Ls rounding the Home Turn, stayed on strongly until final 50M weakened.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, switched wide turning in, ran on nicely.
Hard ridden to take the fence and led by 1.5Ls, found cover 800M, ran on well until 50M weakened.
Ridden forward to settle 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, travelled nicely until 250M blocked, then had difficulty to find a clear run to the line.
Raced midfield, travelled 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, made some ground after straightening until final 50M had difficulty find a clear run to the line.
Camped handy, settled 3Ls off the leader 2 wide without cover, kept on one pace until 100M flattened.
Eased start, then settled 9Ls off the leader 2 wide with cover, never ran on.
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along, settled 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, well beaten rounding the Home Turn.
Always last few, never looked likely.
Taken back from a wide gate, trapped 3 wide with cover throughout, never a factor, tailed out.
Broke well, tracked 1 back on rail, switched out & driven in pursuit turning in, grinding run to lead 100m, in command at wire.
Awkward start, soon led on rail, upped tempo 600m, dogged stretch run, headed 100m, no extra, tapered late.
Steadied start, crossed to rail behind midfield, ridden 500m, stayed on to claim 3rd close home.
Tardy start, recovered to race fore of midfield on rail, driven 450m, kept on soundly without threatening.
Good break, camped rail midfield, ridden 500m, maintained position in sound run home.
Sharp start, disputed early lead, settled 2nd 1 off, ridden 600m, outpaced turning in, boxed on evenly.
Slow start, raced rail near rear, briefly to tail 600m, shaken up 400m, closed off for decent inroads.
Fair break, settled 1 off with cover behind midfield, rolled to mid rank 900m, ridden wide for progress 600m, kept on same speed.
Tardy start, bustled early to midfield 1 off with cover, advanced 900m to 3rd 3 wide no cover, driven 450m, found little, tepid run to wire.
Snagged to tail at break, 3 wide for minor progress 650m, very wide into stretch, kept on past beaten rivals.
Dropped in from wide gate, over-raced 1 off near rear, driven 500m, struggled in stretch run.
Broke well, over-raced early & snagged back to midfield 3 wide no cover, ridden 600m & weakened out from that point.
Smart break, dropped in to rail midfield, switched wide into stretch & gathered, driven 200m, swept to lead 50m & in command at wire.
Sharp start, dropped in 1 off with cover 5th, wide into stretch, ridden 300m, cut down leader approaching 50m but immediately passed.
Speedy break, raced 1 off 1 back, switched 3 wide & driven home turn, quickened to narrow lead 150m, all out & headed 50m, no extra.
Fast start to edge lead on rail, driven turning in, all out & headed 150m, boxed on when beaten.
Good start, tracked 1 back on rail, hard driven into stretch, kept on one pace to wire.
Sharp break, pressed leader 1 off no cover, hard-ridden turning in, outpaced & tapered to wire.
Broke OK, niggled behind midfield 1 off with cover, driven 400m, kept on same pace.
Dropped in to race rail near rear, driven 300m, outpaced & kept on at even speed.
Missed break, niggled 1 off with cover near tail, switched wide & driven final turn, plugged on tamely.
Tardy & crowded start, niggled at tail, hard-ridden 300m, found nothing & never a factor.
Pushed to take rail and led by 1L at soft sectionals, never being challenged.
Hard ridden to occupy the box seat, benefited by the slow pace, ran on well for 2nd.
Midfield along the fence, 4Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground for 3rd.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Pressed forward, 1Ls off and outside the leader, enjoyed the slow tempo, flattened 200M.
In front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, flattened 200M.
Eased at start, 7Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Behind midfield, 5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, lack turn of foot.
Slow away, always at rear.
Eased back, never competitive.
Pushed to take a midfield spot, 4Ls off the leader 2-3wide, not suited by the slow tempo, soon reduced 300M.
Pressed forward to lead on settling, slowed pace back stretch, given a few reminders in straight and kept kicking to the line.
Steadied shortly after start, then raced ungenerously after passing 900m. Reluctant to switch out in straight but finished off nicely when clear.
Began well, settled on hindquarters of leader before dropping to 3rd when another moved up 700m. Kept on gamely under pressure final 400m, losing quinella spot on the line.
Jumped best before taking sit behind leader back stretch. Saved ground turn, kept on steadily in straight only to lose 3rd placing in final strides.
Began well but held wide, then rolled forward when pace slacked to sit outside leader 700m. Without cover turning for home, one-paced in straight.
Began fairly and taken to fence quickly 3-back from leader. Put under pressure turning for home but only one-paced.
Began fairly but ridden forward to sit 1-back, 1-off back stretch. Given reminders entering straight but made little headway.
Slow into stride, taken across behind runners to fence, and improved position back stretch. Found little in straight. Had substantial amount of mucus in trachea.
Began fairly, pressed forward 3-wide into back stretch, before being eased to find cover at rear. One-paced in straight.
Began fairly, ridden along to find cover, got head up several times, settling between horses at rear. One-paced in straight.
Began fairly, outpaced and settled in last pair away from fence. Beaten horse from 600m.
Began fairly, taken to fence and last on settling. Never competitive after that.
Managed to find cover making the 1st turn under good handling, within striking distance always, quickened to lead near 100M and readily held off the persistent 2nd.
Travelled strongly in a 2-wide spot behind midfield, headway from 400M, quickened well to chase winner final 200M but was readily held.
Forwardly placed from the start, tracked leader in 3rd, ran on well and briefly led inside 200M, outpaced by first two final stages.
In 5th place about 4Ls off leader, took inside route final 250M, stayed on mildly.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, pushed along entering home turn, laboured hard but lacked acceleration in straight, plodded on final 200M.
Chased leader 2-wide, came under pressure home turn, kept on same pace, lacked further response final 200M.
Failed to muster, settled in mid-division, waited with until 350M, not quickened and no impression on leaders.
Guided to a rearward spot along the fence, driven along passing 500M, made limited progress.
Not hurried, slipped back to the rear, bustled along 500M but failed to make any real progress.
Restrained to a rearward position 7Ls off the pace, shaken up nearing 400M, came wide into straight and failed to be a factor.
Sped to the lead, led at good pace to straight, headed inside 200M, no extra.
Stood flat-footed and missed the start, ended up at the rear, lacked the needed response entering the straight, never involved.

Moderate start from a poor draw, gradually improved to settle just off the pace, 3 wide around the bend and into the straight, quickened well clear over 200 meters out, won readily.
Waited with, saved ground on inside turning for home, baulked and switched for a run 300 metres out, finished off race well.

Jumped well, steadied pace and obtained cover 1000 metres out, carried backward to 6th just better than midfield rounding home bend, renewed effort turning in getting to as close as 2.5L 2nd 200 metres out, run ended shortly.
Settled well behind and off the rails, made up good ground down the centre of the straight, nearest at finish.
Jumped fairly, settled in last few, saved ground on inside turning in, ran on past beaten horses in straight.
Jumped moderately, gradually improved to midfield on rails, hugging inside rails turning in but baulked briefly on straightening, kept on same pace.
Jumped well from the two gate, settled just off the speed on rails, faded under pressure on straightening.
Midfield, steadied and lost position 1000 metres out, jostled between runners coming out of far side racing keenly, baulked behind runners in straight, ran home one-paced.

Ridden forward to lead from a middle gate, steadied pace after obtaining rails run 1000 metres out, second inside leader around the bend before inconvenienced, kept on before fading under pressure inside final 300 metres.
Jumped moderately, settled mainly in midfield, found nothing under pressure in straight.
Close up early, gradually dropped back to midfield racing wide around home bend and into straight, soon faded.
Jumped fairly, gradually shuffled back towards the rear racing wide around home bend and into straight, failed to quicken when asked. (Bled)
Jumped moderately from a wide gate, raced wide in midfield before making short-lived effort around the bend, dropped quickly out of contention in straight.
Began moderately, gradually picked up to join leaders passing 1000 metres, led 2-wide coming out of back straight, folded up quickly after home turn.
Raced prominently the grandstand side, no cover. Hit the front near the 350m and drew away to win nicely.
Tracked the leaders the stands rail. Finished off well under vigorous riding.
Made its run from midfield, had cover, about 3 from the outside fence. finished off nicely after obtaining clear running passing the 500m.
Parked midfield 4 from the stands rail, had cover. Shifted in approaching the 350m towards the far side. Finished off steadily to make the frame.
Vied for the lead 3 off the outside rail, no cover. Was under pressure at the 300m, began to tire soon after.
Raced prominently 4 from the stands rail, no cover. Failed to respond to riders urgings and gradually gave ground over the final furlong.
Raced with the leaders, 5 from the grandstand rail, no cover. Gave in quickly inside the final 100m.
Settled in last position closer to the middle of the track, had cover. Only plodded to the line.
Camped midfield, 5 from the outside rail, had cover. Commenced to tire passing the 300m.
Raced on the speed near the stands rail, no cover. Was giving ground after the 300m despite being pressured.
Travelled midfield towards the center of the track, without cover. Was under pressure a long way from home and never responded.
Settled at the rear, had cover about 7 off the outside rail, switched in towards the middle of the track near the 400m. Failed to respond to pressure, struggled thereafter.
Raced midfield along the middle of the course, no cover. Was a beaten horse after the 400m.
Rolled forward to settle 1/2L behind the leader on the stands rail, battled on strongly and kicked clear 100M to score by 1-1/4Ls.
Sent forward to take the lead on stands side, battled on gamely until 100M weakened to get 2nd.
Niggled along throughout to settle 3Ls behind the leader on stands rail, kept on well to get 3rd but without any serious threat.
Settled prominent, but never made any impressive acceleration to get better result.
At rear, settled 5Ls behind the leader, switched to middle of the track 300M, made some late ground.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader, ran on only fairly.
At rear, travelled 4Ls behind the leader on stands rail, ran on only fairly.
Showed good early pace to settle in a prominent position, however weakened 250M.
Raced midfield, travelled 6Ls behind the leader, dropped off near the course proper.
Never looked competitive.
Always last few, never a factor.
Dropped in at break, raced behind midfield 3 wide with cover, switched widest & driven into stretch, strong run to lead 100m, drew clear.
Fair break, ridden initially, sat 5th 3 wide no cover, progress on turn to lead 350m, all out & headed 100m.
Tardy break, pushed on to midfield 1 off with cover, switched out & driven 400m, stayed on soundly to snatch 3rd last stride.
Driven from gate to race 2nd 1 off no cover, hard-ridden to press lead turning in, battled on one pace.
Awkward start, sat 3 wide with cover near rear, very wide turning in, veered left in stretch, corrected & ran on steadily.
Sharp start to lead, to rail 900m, headed 350m, tapered to wire.
Smart break, snagged back to 4th 1 off with cover, driven & all out turning in, found little, eased when beaten.
Sharp break, soon outpaced & scrubbed along on rail midfield, outpaced turning in, tepid stretch run.
Rousted on rail to race 1 back in 3rd, vigorously ridden throughout, outpaced turning in, faded & eased.
Slow break, niggled along 1 off with cover near rear, hard-driven 400m, never a factor.
Rousted from gate, lacked pace & bustled at tail, hard-ridden into stretch, struggled in run to wire.
Raced rail near rear, driven home turn, found nothing & faded weakly.
Missed break, recovered to camp rail midfield, over-raced 1000m, switched out & not clear run in stretch, to inner again 250m & quickened, led 50m.
Fast start to lead, restrained to 2nd 1 off no cover 1200m, cruised to lead 400m & kicked on, tapered & headed 50m, no extra.
Tardy start, rolled to midfield 1 off with cover, over-raced 1000m, switched out & shaken up 350m, limited response, closed of steadily to claim 3rd.
Smart start to track 1-back on rail, ridden 430m, progress & switched out 300m, 2nd when shifted into rival & unbalanced 150m, mugged for 3rd.
Broke OK, snagged back to midfield 3 wide with cover, driven & switched out into stretch, stayed on soundly without threatening.
Missed break, bustled to rail behind midfield, off heels 600m, ridden 400m, not clear ground initially, stayed on evenly for minor inroads.
Broke well, raced on rail to outright lead 1200m, ridden 400m & headed, boxed on one-pace until faded out in closing stages.
Fair break, sat 1 off with cover fore of midfield, ridden into stretch, one-paced & tapering when bumped & checked off heels 150m, no extra.
Lacked pace & bustled early, settled 3 wide with cover near rear, switched out & shaken up turning in, plugged on moderately.
Broke well & bustled to sit handy 3 wide no cover, driven turning in, found nothing & weakened.
Snagged from wide gate to behind midfield 3 wide with cover, progress on turn, wide into stretch & driven, plodded home tamely.
Missed break & rousted, settled 1 off behind midfield, under pressure & ridden 700m, struggled in run home.
Broke OK out wide, taken back to rear, ridden widest turning in, never a factor & well beaten, passed eased-down rival late.
Missed break & rousted early, raced rail in rear, hard-ridden & switched wide turning in, never a factor & eased when well beaten.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, pace good, led 250M but under severely challenges, just won in the ding-dong finish.
Settled in front of midfield along the fence, 4Ls off the good pace, closed off strongly 350M, once dominated 100M, just beaten in a ding-dong finished.
At back, 8Ls off the good pace 2 wide, progressed steadily 300M for 3rd.
Settled in front of midfield, 4Ls off the good pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden to take rail and shared the lead at good sectionals, hung on until 200M overhauled and flattened.
Eased to rear and took rail, 10Ls off the good pace, checked 250M, made some ground 200M.
Slow away, 6Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide and hung out, ran on ok.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 8Ls off the good pace, trapped 3-4 wide, ran on ok in straight.
Midfield along the fence, 6Ls off the good pace, never improved.
Slow away, 5.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, no turn of foot.
Eased at start and checked, 10Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, no progress.
Midfield, 5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide, emptied 300M.
Pushed to share the lead 2 wide at good sectionals, soon reduced 300M.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the good pace 2 wide, faded rapidly 400M.
Began well, pressed forward taking sit behind leader at turn. Got split shortly after straightening, kicked clear 250m, kept on well.
Began awkwardly and raced in restricted room before settling 4-back along fence. Taken wide entering straight and finished strongly down centre track.
Began fairly, mustered quickly to sit 3-back along fence at turn. Came off fence 250m to pass tiring horse and kept on steadily.
Jumped OK, allowed to roll forward sitting 3-back, 1-off into straight. Kept on steadily without looking dangerous.
Began fairly, not pressured settling toward rear away from fence. Very wide in straight, ran on smartly before peaking final stages.
Began well, pressed forward and held 3-wide into turn. Taken wider entering straight but only one-paced.
Jumped inwards, ridden but failed to muster. dropping to rear and wide. Last entering straight, ran past tired horses.
Began fairly, restrained and taken across behind runners but away from fence. One-paced in straight under hard riding.
Jumped best, pressed forward before settling 1-off, 1-back at turn. Surged forward entering straight, looked chance but flattened 100m.
Pressed forward from inside draw to lead passing 1000m. Collared 400m, kept on to 200m before tiring.
Began well, pressed forward to sit outside leader at turn, hit the front 400m before giving ground from from 200m.
Crowded start, in last pair to straight. Did not respond when given reminders 300m and not ridden out final stages.
Taken back and soon guided to the fence, improved to midfield near 1200M, ran on strongly up the rails final 400M, led 150M, continued on well towards the finish.
Held up 2-wide behind midfield, switched out passing 500M, ran on well to go 2nd 100M but always held by winner final stages.
Tracked leader on the fence, ran on steadily in straight but not finishing pace of first two over final 150M.
Towards the rear, 6Ls off the pace turning home, didn't have the clearest of runs 400M-200M, switched out and closed off soundly.
Took up running, set good pace middle stages, hung under pressure mid-straight, headed 150M, weakened towards the line.
Placed ahead of midfield, kept on evenly under pressure, always held by leaders and lacked a further response passing 200M. (Jockey fined for not riding out all the way to the end)
Began awkwardly, got closer to race behind midfield before the turn, stayed on without threat.
Dropped back to a rearward spot, saved ground on the inside, made limited progress over final 400M and not getting to leaders.
Caught wide early stages, restrained and tucked in for cover before home turn, ran on only fairly from off the pace passing 400M, never threatened.
Restrained to a rearward spot along the 3-path, raced keenly in early and middle stages, taken widest home straight but never picked up the pace.
Held up behind midfield, given reminders nearing 600M but didn't respond to riding, eased over final 150M.
Positioned 3-wide ahead of midfield, struggled to keep up passing 600M, soon beaten and eased over final 250M.
Close up but travelled 3-wide no cover throughout, found no extra passing 300M, weakened rapidly.
Chased leader, didn't respond to riding nearing home straight, soon out of contention.
Began fairly, not pressured, dropping to last pair but wide. Revved up from 800m, swopped around horses turn, joint leader at 200m, inched ahead for narrow win.
Began well, pressed forward but held 4-wide without cover back stretch. Covered extra ground final turn, hit the front 200m, unable hold off winner.
Pressed forward from wide draw, settling behind midfield well away from rail. Improved position final turn, ran on steadily in straight without looking dangerous.
Began fairly, outpaced and dropped to last but wide. Taken further out entering straight and ran on steadily.
Began fairly, shaken up and pressed forward to lead 1500m. Collared 300m and gave ground steadily.
Jumped fairly, no pace and slipped to rear but wide. Well back entering straight but made good ground final 200m.
Began awkwardly, not hurried, settling 7L behind leader. Peeled out entering straight but only one-paced to line.
Began best, led initially before easing behind leading pair. Inched forward turn, looked chance entering straight, flattened 200m.
Came out running along rail before taking box seat back stretch. Kept on steadily early in straight before tiring from 200m.
Began well, not pressured, settling in midfield away from rail. Took inside run entering straight, tired quickly from 200m.
Slow, dropped to rear. Not hurried back stretch but did not respond when put under pressure. Jockey said horse did not appreciate kickback (See Racing Incidents).

Jumped with field, raced keenly before awkwardly placed 1300m. Gave ground soon after entering straight. Run considered unacceptable. Had blood in trachea and confirmed roarer. (See Racing Incidents).
Began awkwardly, pressed forward to sit 2-back and close to rail on settling. Gave ground quickly after entering straight. Run considered unacceptable.
Jumped OK, ridden along in midfield until 1000m when started to give ground, finishing tailed off. Run considered unacceptable.
Jumped well, pressed on to take the lead easily, travelled comfortably to turn, kicked at 350M, kept going nicely to score with some in hand.
Began awkwardly, recovered quickly to take the position 2-3 lengths back in midfield on rails, eased on turning in, ran home strongly to grab 2nd.
Away well, settled behind leader back on rail, improved position before turn, ridden early in the straight, matched eventual winner until 150M, stayed on well for 3rd.
Slightly slow out, pushed to sit 2 wide with cover, 2-3 lengths back, kept inside in straight, made steady progress to make frame.
Jumped fairly from wide gate, settled in the rear division 8 lengths back, ridden after straightening, ran home well without threatening first few.
Began well from gate 1, ended up 4-5 lengths back on rail, soft run to turn, kept on at one-pace under pressure in straight, dead-heat for 6th.
Began fairly, restrained from the widest draw and settled last, 8 lengths back, well back turning, no daylight early in straight, closed very well without clear running to dead-heat for 6th.
Away with them, ended up 3 wide with cover, 6-7 lengths back, plenty to do and swung widest after turning in, kept on fairly.
Began well, sat 2 wide first outside the leader, ridden before turning in, failed to respond in straight and dropped off when condition gave out.
Restrained from a tricky gate, difficult to settle early, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, 4-5 lengths back, taken wider in straight, only one-paced to close.
Taken forward after start from the wide draw, raced 3 wide without cover throughout the majority of the race, weakened sharply after turning in.
Average break, unable to get in and positioned 3 wide in midfield, 3-4 lengths back, close enough turning but lacked usual finish and showed no response final 300M. (See racing incident)
Taken back from gate 11, difficult to settle early, positioned 6-7 lengths back on rail, showed nothing in straight.
Began fairly, positioned 2 wide with cover, 5 lengths back, ridden before turning in, no response in straight.

Broke well settling one-out-one-back, raced freely when lost cover briefly passing 800M, commenced move approaching straight, gained upper hand under pressure inside final 200 metres despite a difficult ride while hanging in.

Jumped moderately, settled in forward of midfield on rails, inconvenienced 600 metres out, gained closer to 2L 6th turning in, baulked for a run most of way in straight until over 100 metres out, finished off race nicely.
Began moderately, soon took up running, obtained rails run passing the Rock, headed under pressure 200 metres out, kept on to the line.
Jumped moderately, soon improved and settled one back on rails, similar turning in, could only keep on at the same pace without quickening under pressure.

Travelled wide behind midfield after beginning from a wide gate, gained closer passing the 600M mark, came under pressure around the bend, made steady progress in straight without troubling the placegetters.
Jumped fairly, tightened at start, soon taken across for rails run behind midfield, produced good late impression in straight.
Jumped fairly from a poor draw, travelled wide without cover in midfield far side, took closer order from the Rock, came 3-wide in prominent position turning in, soon faded.
Niggled at in midfield early stages, carried backward a bit passing the Rock, baulked behind runners between 200 and 100 metres out, finished off race nicely.
Travelled 3-wide in midfield, shifted in for cover mid-way down far side, took closer order turning in, faded gradually in straight.
Jumped awkwardly losing ground, trailed the field to straight, ran home one-paced.
Began from the widest gate, soon taken back to race in rear, found nil in straight.

Effectively settled 1 back out 1 back. Made a winning move by shifting out and improving around runners to lead on the fence after the 800m. Had plenty of momentum approaching the home turn and closed off soundly.
Made its run from last position close to the rail with cover. Took off 4 deep and coursed 3 deep without cover after the 800m. Swung the home turn widest & finished off gamely.
Eventually crossed after the 1400m, to race outside the leader. Let a couple improve around at the 700m and took up a trailing position. Plugged away in the home stretch.
Enjoyed the box seat. Got shuffled back after the 800m, was dour in the home stretch.
Settled in 6th position, 2 wide with cover. Got moving after the 800m, landing in second position outside the leader. Kept on plugging away down the running.
Didn't enjoy the best of trips, being bumped near the 1400m, when racing 5th, about 3L back the fence, with cover. Copped a check near the 600m, and was never in the hunt thereafter.
Led along the fence. Was headed after the 600m, and was a spent force thereafter.
At rear, travelled 6.5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly to score by a narrow margin.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, dropped to near last 700M, despite all the unfavorable circumstances, dashed on well to get 2nd.
Ridden forward to take the fence and led by 1L at slow tempo, hung on well until inside 30M beaten by a narrow margin.
At rear, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, despite hampered by the slow pace, ran on well until near 100M hampered by the inference.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, benefited by the slow sectionals, just held ground in straight until near 100M hampered by the inference.
Began awkwardly then pushed to settle 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, kept on one pace to the line.
Settled worse than midfield 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, never ran on.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls behind the leader 3 wide without cover at slow sectionals, never shown any turn of foot after straightening.
Sent forward to settle 1L outside the leader at slow sectionals, under pressure rounding the Home Turn, weakened 300M.
Settled worse than midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide with cover, never a threat.
Rolled forward to settle 2.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide with cover, dropped off 600M.
Good speed & bustled to lead, soon to rail, extended 1L clear out of backstretch, driven 300m & quickened, wandered off a line but in command.
Slow start, raced rail midfield, 3L back & ridden turning in, closed off soundly under strong drive, always held, checked last strides.
Missed break & adrift at tail, niggled to join pack 700m, 6L back & ridden 400m, closed off well to go 3rd 75m & kept on soundly.
Taken behind at break, sat 1 off behind midfield, 4L back & switched out home turn, driven 300m, closed off to just miss frame.
Fast start & ridden initially to settle 2nd 1 off no cover, driven turning in, boxed on one pace.
Tardy break, bustled & recovered to race 1 back on rail, ridden 400m, rolled off fence & every chance turning in, outpaced & tapered.
Sharp start, tracked pace 1 off with cover, hard-ridden 400m, kept on same speed.
Broke OK, rolled on to race handy 3 wide no cover, hard-ridden 300m, outpaced & faded in run.
Broke with others, bustled early, caught wide behind midfield, 6L back & driven into stretch, plodded on same speed.
Broke with others, niggled along 3 wide with cover midfield, hard-ridden turning in, found little, plugged tamely to wire.
Fast to stride, eased back to 3 wide with cover behind midfield, ridden 600m & soon under pressure 1 from tail, struggled in run.
Fair break out wide, lacked pace, soon ridden at tail, wide & detached turning in, never a factor.
Speed To lead on rail, headed narrowly 1000m, led again 900m, shaken up turning in, quickened clear, ran home strongly.
Rousted early, railed behind midfield, niggled along, switched out 400m & wide into stretch, strong run to 2nd 100m, closed to wire.
Quick to stride, settled back 1 off with cover midfield, switched out & shaken up home turn, briefly 2nd at 150m, ran home soundly for clear 3rd.
Fast break, slotted 1 back on rail in 3rd, driven 400m, boxed on one pace.
Broke OK, settled back near tail 1 off with cover, ridden 600m, 7L back & outpaced turning in, stayed on for late headway.
Good break wide, trapped 3 wide no cover & taken back, found cover behind midfield 450m, very wide home turn, plugged on dourly.
Sharp start, snagged to 4th 1 off with cover, ridden 450m, switched out into stretch, outpaced & stayed on evenly.
Tardy start, bustled early, niggled along at tail on rail, driven 500m, stayed on for modest inroads.
Awkward start, raced 3 wide with cover near tail, 7L back & very wide into home turn, plugged on one pace.
Broke with others, settled rail midfield, driven 500m, outpaced & found little in tame stretch run.
Bustled from wide gate, narrow lead 1000m, restrained 900m to sit 2nd 1 off no cover, driven turning in, emptied 200m & faded out.
Pushed to take rail and shared the lead at fast sectionals, just hung on well enough to win by a narrow margin.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, made steady ground 200M, just missed by a narrow margin.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders along the fence, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 250M for 3rd.
Behind midfield, 5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, made steady ground in straight, lack room 200M.
Eased to rear for cover, 7Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made some ground 200M.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leaders on the fence, favoured by the fast tempo, ran on just ok, on heels 150M.
Pushed to occupy box seat, not suited by the fast pace, out of fuel 150M.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, 9Ls off the leaders, benefited by the fast tempo, made late ground 150M.
Hard ridden forward to cross, shared the lead 2 wide at fast sectionals, emptied 200M.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the fast pace, flattened 150M.
Slow away, pushed to gain a midfield spot but trapped 3 wide, 3.5Ls off the leaders, suited by the fast pace, flattened 150M.
Pushed early but not muster, 7Ls off the leaders at rear, trapped 3 wide throughout, suited by the fast tempo, no progress.
Began well, rolled forward settling 3-back, 1-off back stretch. Urged forward from 500m, hit front 200m, kept on well under hands and heels riding.
Jumped well but not pressured, settling well back away from fence. Taken very wide into straight and ran on strongly under hard riding.
Quickly into stride, sitting 1-back, 1-off first turn. No change along back stretch, urged forward from 400m, joint leader 200m, kept on steadily.
Slow, given reminders while edging towards rail. Waited back stretch, peeled wide into straight, ran on steadily under whip.
Jumped with field, pressed forward to take box seat. Stayed on rail turning for home, one-paced under whip from 300m.
Began well, pressed forward to lead first turn, cutting to rail 1500m. Challenged around final turn, collared soon after entering straight, one-paced.
Began fairly, gradually shifted to rail, settling 4-back first turn. Shaken up from 400m, had clear running in straight but only one-paced.
Ridden forward from gate 7 before crossed 1500m. Sat outside leader back stretch, moved alongside turning for home, gave ground gradually from 250m.
Crowded out shortly after start, steadied 1400m, settling 4-back, 1-off back stretch. Taken wide into straight but found little under pressure.
Began OK but not pressured, settling along fence 3-back from leader. Stayed on rail entering straight, shaken up 350m, kept on one-paced until 50m when close on heels.
Began fairly, taken across behind runners, clear last back stretch. Taken 3-wide 600m, shaken up but found little under hard riding.
Jumped OK but outpaced and taken across behind runners but away from fence. Under pressure from 500m but no response.
Dropped back to the rear but no closer than 3-wide throughout, switched widest turning in, quickened smartly under hands and heels riding, swept to the lead 50M out, won with something in hand.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, picked up well passing 250M, briefly led inside 100M, not finishing pace of winner final stages.
Held up behind midfield along the 3-path, bid wide near 400M, stayed on well for 3rd.
Vigorously driven early from wide draw, crossed to the lead 700M, headed 100M, weakened towards the line.
Handily placed behind leaders, kept on evenly turning in, not pace of first few final 200M.
Settled 3-wide in mid-division, ran on mildly and was never a serious threat to leaders.
Began awkwardly and lost ground, held up near the rear, stayed on only fairly, steadied 50M from home.
Sent to the lead early but proved difficult to settle, travelled better when obtained cover behind leader, lacked further response when asked, kept on same pace final 300M.
Caught wide no cover early stages, strode forward to join leader near 700M, run ended near 150M, weakened towards the finish.
3-wide no cover and raced keenly down the back straight, chased the pace home turn, weakened passing 300M.
Held up midfield along the fence, lacked a rally turning in, soon weakened.
Settled at the rear, 5-6Ls off the pace passing 400M, found nothing under pressure.
