Slowly away, settled in last few and waited with, saved ground on inside turning in, ran on well inside final 400 metres to gain upper hand closing stages.
Soon taken back to rear from a wide gate, trailed the field to straight, ran on well down the centre of track to be nearest at finish.
Jumped fairly settling behind midfield, ran on well between runners to hold every chance throughout closing stages.
Settled in last few, commenced move 600 metres out and shifted widest turning in, ran on to hit the front briefly over 150 metres out only to be swamped late.
Settled in forward of midfield on rails early, took closer order in 4th approaching home bend, looked to hold some chance under pressure over 200 metres out but unable to sustain effort.
Travelled in midfield on rails, saved ground on inside turning in, kept on steadily without quickening.
Began well, settled mainly in 4th just over 2 lengths off the speed, became 5th and slightly further back on home bend, kept on before fading closing stages.
Jumped well, settled in midfield early stages before shifting back for cover, commenced move turning in but was baulked early in straight, ran home one-paced down the centre of the track.
Settled in midfield, wide around home bend, found nothing in straight.

Broke well from a wide gate, well there and off the rails down far side, came across to eyeball the leader coming out, hit the front briefly passing 400 metres only to overhauled inside final 200 metres.
Not far off early, lost position over 1100 metres out, found nothing in straight.
Ridden along for prominent positions, gaining close-up 3rd after first 400 metres, dropped out of contention on straightening. (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Given reminders early after jumping from the wide gate to assume lead, crossed to rails approaching home bend when soon joined, folded up quickly in straight.
Raced 3 wide no cover, midfield. Scraped to the lead approaching the 150m, and scored a dour win.
Eventually crossed to lead on the fence after the 900m. Finished off gamely.
Settled in fourth position, 1 off with cover. Maintained a steady gallop right to the line.
Settled midfield on the fence, had cover. Got going late to finish in the frame.
Made its run from the rear, on the paint with cover. Kept to the inside in the straight and closed off well.
Travelled worse than midfield, on the rails with cover. Finished of fairly.
Camped behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Was one paced over the final furlong.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race outside the leader. Commenced to tire after the 100m.
Had no excuses after box seating. Was a beaten horse early in the straight and gave in easily after the 400m.
Raced towards the rear, 2 wide with cover. Failed to make ground in the final stretch.
Tightened for room at the start, settling back in the field, on the paint, had cover. Plugged home.
Crowded at the start and then settled at the tail of the field, 1 off with cover. Didn't run on.
Travelled at the rear of the field, 3 deep with cover. Failed to close off.
Settled midfield, 2 deep with cover. Struggled in the straight finishing well back.
Camped handy, travelled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, dashed on strongly when found a clear room over the last furlong.
Ridden forward to take the fence and led by 1L, hung on well until final 50M weakened to get 2nd, just beaten by a neck.
Settled prominent, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide with cover, dashed on well for 3rd.
Began slowly, then settled 10Ls behind the leader on the fence, stayed inside, ran on well to get 4th despite difficult to find a clear run over the last furlong.
Eased to settle worse than midfield, 9Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on steadily.
Raced midfield, travelled 5.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, ran on only fairly.
Settled worse than midfield about 8.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, made some ground in straight.
Taken back from a wide gate, settled 9.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, ran on fairly.
Raced midfield, travelled 7Ls off the leader on the fence, ran on fairly.
Camped handy, settled 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide without cover, kept on one pace until 200M weakened.
Raced midfield, travelled 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, never ran on after straightening.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, never looked likely.
Ridden forward to occupy the box seat, flattened 250M.
Raced midfield, travelled 7Ls behind the leader 3 wide without cover throughout, weakened badly 250M.
Speed to lead, to rail 1000m, shaken up in front 400m, held all in run to wire, made all.
Fair break, bustled initially, sat 1 off with cover fore of midfield, switched out & driven 400m, ran on to edge 2nd 100m, just held.
Fast start, shadowed leader 1 off no cover, ridden under pressure in 2nd 430m, battled to wire but always held & relegated to 3rd at 100m.
Good break, raced rail 1 back, boxed in early in stretch, ridden under pressure 200m, chased winner one pace.
Smart start, settled midfield 1 off with cover, switched out 400m, ridden in pursuit, closed off soundly.
Missed break, raced rail near rear, niggled for progress 800m, ridden 4.5L back home turn, not clear run, switched out 200m & kept on soundly.
Snagged back, raced wide with cover near rear, 5L back & driven wide into stretch, closed off well centre track for solid gains.
Broke OK, raced rail behind midfield, rolled handier 700m, switched out & shaken up 400m, one-paced to wire.
Slow start, sat 1 off with cover near rear, ridden under pressure 600m, switched wide into stretch, ran on for minor inroads.
Broke OK, niggled 1 off with cover behind midfield, progress 700m, ridden under pressure home turn, plugged on one pace until tapered out late.
Broke well out wide, sat 3 deep with cover fore of midfield, driven turning in, outpaced & weakened out.
Smart start, snagged to race at tail, hard ridden 400m, passed beaten rivals in tepid run to wire.
Smart break, driven from wide gate to stalk leader 3 wide no cover, hard-ridden 400m, soon emptied & weakened tamely.
Fair break from widest gate, trapped 4 wide no cover midfield, ridden 450m, found little & faded out in stretch run.
Smart start, tracked in 3rd 1 back on rail, shaken up in pursuit 300m, to 2nd 200m & switched out to challenge, led 50m, held on cosily.
Taken behind at start, camped rail near rear, smooth progress into stretch but not clear run, switched out 200m, closed late to press winner.
Fast break to lead on rail, shaken up under pressure 400m, kicked on & 1L clear 200m, all out when headed 50m, tapered late.
Awkward break, recovered to sit rail midfield, switched out 450m for progress to 4th, ran home evenly.
Broke OK, settled rail midfield, driven turning in & switched out, boxed on soundly.
Broke OK, dropped out 1 off with cover behind midfield, progress & ridden 600m, stayed on dourly.
Sharp start, unable to slot & parked 3 wide no cover midfield, ridden 600m, wide into stretch, stayed on one pace.
Taken back to 1 off with cover near rear, shoved along for progress 700m, crowded 350m, switched off heels 150m, ran on late for minor gains.
Taken behind to rail at tail, switched very wide final turn, stayed on centre-track for modest inroads.
Fast start to dispute lead, settled 2nd 1 off with cover, every chance when driven 300m, found nothing & faded.
Smart break, settled midfield 1 off with cover, progress 500m, hard-ridden into stretch, outpaced & struggled in run to wire.
Good break, camped handy 1 off with cover, switched 3 wide & advanced 700m, driven to press lead, hung wide home turn, faded in run.
Rousted at break, taken back to 3 wide with cover near rear, ridden 700m, found little in stretch & never a factor.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, made all but just by a very narrow margin.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, pace slow, held up 400-200M, dashed well when clear, just missed by a short head.
Eased at start, 6Ls off the leader 3 wide, blocked 400-200M, dashed strongly when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, blocked 400-200M, dashed well when clear.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 5Ls off the leader on the rails, harmed by the slow pace, blocked whole straight, never tested.
In front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, blocked 400-200M, just held ground when clear.
Trapped very wide early, pushed forward to sit outside the lead, benefited by the slow sectionals, flattened 250M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, blocked most straight, dashed well when clear.
Eased to sit 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, ran on until 200M flattened.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash in straight, hampered 50M.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 3-4 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, moved forward 800M, lack turn of foot in straight.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 5Ls off the leader 3-4 wide, not suited by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, 8Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, ran on ok.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader, trapped 4-5 wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
Quickly into stride, cut to rail and set steady pace. Given more rein when joined 1200m, kicked clear entering straight, kept on well to the line.
Began well but not pressured, settling 2-back, 1-off back stretch. Crept closer turn, 3-wide into straight, picked up momentum 300m and finished off strongly.
Crowded out start, cut to rail and allowed to settle, waited patiently back stretch and turn, peeled out 350m, finished off strongly.
Caught on wrong foot at start, settled at rear, dropping to last before turn. Stayed inside horses in straight and ran on well final 250m.
Jumped with field, not pressured settling 2-back along fence. Stayed on rail entering straight and kept on steadily without looking dangerous.
Began well, ridden along inside leader initially before being eased into box seat 1300m. Got a nice tow into straight, looked chance before giving ground gradually from 250m.
Crowded out start, dropped to last along rail. Improved position before turn, given reminders 300m, kept on one-paced.
Allowed to slide forward but wide, revved up 1400m to join leader at 1200m, slipped back entering turn, beaten horse soon after straightening.
Jumped OK but crowded for room 1400m, settling 4-back, one-off. Covered extra ground turn, given reminders but beaten horse from 200m.
Jumped fairly, ridden along to hold position behind midfield. Switched out for run around turn but found nothing when asked 350m, not pushed final stages.
Sent forward from wide barrier to clear the field, crossed to lead on the fence 800M, waited with until 300M, continued on strongly to the line.
Held up midfield along the fence, held up behind eventual winner from 300M to 200M, shifted out to continue his bid but was always held.
Showed good early pace to secure a rail position, tracked leaders home turn, kept on evenly turning in, lacked further response final 200M.
Settled towards the rear along the inside, angled out to clear passing 300M, hung out under pressure mid-straight, ran on for non-threatening 4th.
Reared as the start was effected, lost ground and detached in last, stayed on mildly over final 400M.
Driven forward to a 2-wide spot just behind leader, kept on same pace turning in, weakened passing 150M.
Restrained to a 3-wide spot behind mid-division, stayed on only fairly and not getting to leaders.
Unable to slot in, caught 4-wide without cover turning for home, not quickened when asked.
Held up midfield, had every chance turning in, not picked up the pace, steadily retreated passing 250M.
Dropped back, settled near the rear in a compact field, had no offering when placed under pressure, never involved.
Never far off in a 3-wide position 2-3Ls off the pace, soon no extra entering home straight, gave way rapidly.
Ridden along early to find cover, settling midfield away from rail. Shifted out 800m and left without cover, pressed forward from 600m, joined leaders 200m, pulled away gradually.
Severely checked start, dropping to last but kept away from rail. Well back entering straight, found gap 300m and finished strongly under whip.
Not pressured early and switched to a one-off position passing 1200m. Taken wide entering straight and ran on strongly under hard riding.
Began fairly, outpaced and dropped to rear along rail. Made ground turn, had to switch in 300m when run closed, kept on well.
Jumped best but did not persevere, dropping to 3rd 1-off, 1-back before turn. Peeled out 500m to make run, looked chance when with leading pack 200m, flattened late.
Pressed forward along rail to take up the running from 1100m. Still in front 200m, flattened final 50m.
Taken across behind runners from wide draw and last at turn. Stayed close to rail entering straight and doing best work final 200m.
Began well, not pressured settling 6th 3-back from leader. Took closer order turn to sit behind leading pack 400m before turning one-paced.
Allowed to find feet, travelling 3-wide mostly, at times without cover. Very wide into straight but only one-paced.
Jumped fairly, ridden along to find cover but kept wide. Covered extra ground turn and found little in straight.
Ridden along early to stay with leading pack before settling fifth. Got shuffled back turn, under hands and heels riding final 300m.
Crowded out start and lost left front plate, pressed forward to grab box seat before turn. Still in contention 200m before tiring badly. Jockey reported abnormal breathing noises.
Began well, pressed forward but wide, sitting outside leader to and around turn. Kept on early straight before tiring badly final 200m.
Broke sharply, well-placed behind the leader on rail, enjoyed the slow sectionals, travelled comfortably throughout, took inside run in straight, closed off well and scored by a length.
Jumped well, raced 3 wide with cover, 3-4 lengths back in midfield, not favoured by the slow sectionals, taken wide in the straight and ran home strongly.
Away nicely, took the lead easily and set a slow tempo, ridden after turning in, stayed on well until 200M, held on for 3rd.
Broke nicely from wide gate, raced 2 wide with cover, 2 lengths back, travelled comfortably throughout, ridden turning in, finished the race well, just missed 3rd.
Slowly away, travelled 3 lengths back on rail throughout, tracked eventual winner turning in and kept on evenly to just miss frame.
Away well, placed 2 wide with cover, 3-4 lengths back, difficult to settle for some distance after the 1100M, ridden early in the straight, made some progress to finish on heels of placegetters.
Began awkwardly, settled 5 lengths back, 2 wide with cover behind midfield, not suited by the slow sectionals, ridden before turning in and came wide in straight, finished the race very well.
Average to begin, sat 3-4 lengths back on fence in midfield, did not have much room in straight, just stayed on fairly when clear.
Broke nicely, pushed to take the 1 out 1 back position, enjoyed nice run with slow sectionals but failed to respond in straight.
Taken back from gate 9, settled 7-8 lengths back at rear, harmed by the slow tempo, made some minor progress in straight.
Off slowly from wide gate, sat 6 lengths back on rails, at the back of the field, found little when asked in straight.
Bumped start, sat 5-6 lengths back on rail until taken to 3 wide with cover at 1200M, ridden before turning in, showed no response in straight.
Began fairly from wide draw, raced 3 wide with no cover, 2-3 lengths back, no response when asked in straight, faded thereafter.
Taken back from the widest gate, sat at the back of the field, 6-7 lengths back, taken to a position 3 wide with cover near 1000M, driven turning in, found nothing in stretch.

Taken behind from widest gate to rail at tail, progress from 600m, 6L back & ridden 400m, switched out 300m, strong run to lead last stride.
Broke OK, camped 1 off with cover fore of midfield, switched out 600m for wide advance, led 250m, tapered late & mugged on line.
Tardy break, raced 1 off with cover midfield, switched wide & driven 300m, ran home soundly for 3rd.
Smart start & bustled to settle handy on rail, switched 1 off & tight for room 300m, clear 200m & ran home soundly without threatening.
Niggled at break, sat rail behind midfield, 5L back & ridden 400m, switched out 250m, stayed on for solid inroads.
Dropped in at break to rail near rear, ridden 500m, wide into stretch, ran on soundly without threatening.
Disputed early lead, snagged back 1st turn to 1 off 1 back, 3 wide & driven to press lead 300m, battled in 2nd until tapered out final 150m.
Good break to dispute lead, settled 1 back 2nd on rail 1200m, switched 1 off no cover 900m, narrow lead 300m, headed 250m & swamped.
Bustled at break, raced rail midfield, ridden 500m, switched out on turn, outpaced & plodded on tamely.
Rousted early strides, caught wide no cover to 1100m, slotted 1 off near rear, advanced 3 wide 700m, driven 500m, emptied turning in & faded.
Broke well & bustled 3 deep 1st turn to secure lead, to rail 1100m & set tempo, driven under pressure 400m, headed 300m & weakened out.
Settled back 1 off with cover near tail, last at 600m & ridden, detached turning in, never a factor.
Taken back from wide gate, travelled 4.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite harmed the slow pace, dashed strongly to score by 3/4L.
Hard ridden forward to take the fence and led at slow sectionals, hung on well until 50M weakened to get 2nd.
Eased back, settled 5Ls behind the leader 2-3 wide with cover, harmed by the slow tempo, finished off strongly to get 3rd.
Hard ridden to park outside the leader, suited by the slow pace, kept on steadily to the line.
Rolled forward to occupy the box seat, benefited by the slow pace, kept on one pace to the line.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, ran on only fairly.
Camped midfield, travelled 4Ls off the leader 2 wide with cover, harmed by the slow tempo, ran on fairly.
Prominent, settled 1.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, despite benefited by the slow sectionals, flattened over the last furlong.
Settled in front of midfield about 3Ls off the slow tempo with cover, never ran on.
Always at rear, never looked likely.
Raced midfield, travelled 3.5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, under pressure rounding the Home Turn, weakened badly thereafter.
Camped handy, travelled 2Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, suited by the very slow pace, dashed strongly to score by a neck.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite harmed by the very slow tempo, finished off well for 2nd.
Ridden forward to take the fence and led by 1/2L at very slow sectionals, kept on well to the line for 3rd.
Settled worse than midfield 4Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, despite harmed by the very slow sectionals, dashed well for 4th.
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, despite harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Settled worse than midfield 4.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite harmed by the very slow tempo, made some late ground in straight.
Gradually moved forward to park outside the leader, despite benefited by the very slow sectionals, flattened over the last furlong.
Raced midfield, 3Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover throughout, not suited by the very slow tempo, no dash.
At rear, settled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, hampered by the very slow tempo, never looked likely.
Ridden forward to obtain the box seat, benefited by the very slow pace, however never made any good turn of foot and weakened badly 100M.
Camped handy, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, soon weakened after straightening.
Taken back from wide gate, harmed by the very slow sectionals, never ran on.
Awkward start, bustled to dispute early lead, settled 1 back on rail, switched out 600m & upsides leader 400m, led 300m & dashed clear.
Bumped start, rolled to sit handy, slotted 3 back 3rd on rail at 1000m, ridden home turn, momentum to 2nd 230m, boxed on in pursuit.
Tardy start, sat rail midfield, niggled 600m, switched out 400m & driven into stretch, ran on centre track to take 3rd close home.
Broke well, sat behind midfield on rail, switched out & hard ridden home turn, stayed on for sound inroads.
Sound break, snagged to 1 off near rear, ridden 450m & 3 wide final turn, caught in pocket in stretch & not fully tested.
Taken behind to race at tail, 10L last & ridden 500m, progress but not clear run in stretch until 150m, kept on evenly in closing stage.
Snagged back & crossed to rail, raced near rear, hard driven 450m, ran home evenly.
Broke well, camped midfield 1 off with cover, driven & wide home turn, plugged on one pace centre track.
Sharp start to dispute early lead, settled rail fore of midfield, ridden turning in, outpaced in tame stretch run.
Fast break, snagged back to race behind midfield 1 off with cover, driven under pressure 400m, found little in tepid run to wire.
Crowded start, rolled to lead 1st turn, to rail 1100m & extended in backstretch, all out & headed turning in, folded tamely.
Crowded start & bumped, settled 1 off no cover 4th, niggled 600m, ridden 400m, outpaced & struggling when impeded 150m.
Jumped well, settled in 2L 4th just off the rails, commenced moved entering straight and ran on well, asserted authority inside final 100 metres.
Broke well, settled 2 wide without cover in 2L 3rd early, improving to 1L 2nd far side, kept on steadily without quickening under pressure in the run home.
Soon taken back from a wide gate, waited with, finished off race well down the centre of the straight, did best work late.
Broke well from the middle draw, gradually crossed to take up running setting a steady pace, led until finding no extra over 100 metres out.
Soon restrained to behind midfield from a wide gate, fanned wide into the straight, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Jumped fairly, settled in midfield, kept on well in the run home.
Jumped fairly, settled in forward of midfield on rails, 3L 5th round home bend, kept on steadily without threatening.
Slightly slow away, soon obtained rails run in midfield, kept on same pace without quickening in straight.
Slightly slow out and soon taken across, settled behind midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, kept on one pace under pressure.
Jumped fairly, settled in midfield or just worse far side, one-paced under pressure in straight.
Jumped well, settled one back on rails, remained same into straight, soon dropped out.
Soon taken back from the widest gate, remained well behind throughout, found nil in straight.
Pushed to take rail and shared the lead at good pace, kicked away 200M to win.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the good pace along the rails, made steady ground 200M for 2nd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, made ground 300M for 3rd.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, made some ground 200M.
Struggled to keep up with the field, 8Ls off the good pace on the fence, progressed steadily 200M, lack room, on heels concluding stages.
Hard ridden early but not muster enough to cross, quickly eased back to cross, 3.5Ls off the good pace, ran on ok, on heels concluding stages.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, pace good, ran on until 100M flattened.
Eased at start to cross behind the field and took rail, 7Ls off the good pace, ran on ok in straight.
Hard ridden to share lead at good pace 2 wide, ran on until 150M emptied.
Eased back, 7Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide, no progress.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the good pace, taken very wide at bends, weakened 400M.
Pressed forward, 2Ls off the good pace, hung out badly at bends, faded 400M.
Began OK, not pressured, settling towards rear in a one-off position. Taken very wide entering straight, finished strongly down centre track to just win.
Began well, stayed with leading pack to back stretch before easing 2-back, one-off. Held in pocket entering final turn, switched out 250m, hit front 150m, run down near line.
Jumped with field, cut to rail entering back stretch, settling midfield. No clear run early in straight, hampered 200m, finished off nicely when clear.
Began well but outpaced, dropping to near rear. Picked up momentum 350m, forced to switch out 200m when disappointed for run, kept on well.
Began well, lost place first turn, mustered to grab box seat. Unbalanced, bumped 200m when shifting ground, rolled forward, looked chance before swamped 50m.
Ridden forward but held wide and unable to cross runners. Left without cover from 800m when leading pair crossed to rail. Kept on steadily early in straight before tiring.
Began OK, ridden along but didn't muster, settling behind midfield along rail. Held for running early straight, ran on fairly when clear.
Slow into stride, taken across behind runners but held 3-wide back stretch. Swung very wide into straight but only one-paced.
Pressed to go forward, taking lead on settling but very wide. Crossed to rail 900m, led field to 200m before tiring.
Jumped fairly but outpaced, dropping to last back stretch. Stayed on rail entering straight but found little under pressure.
Pressed forward and caught 3-wide with cover entering back stretch. Gave ground soon after entering straight.
Ridden forward to sit outside leader but kept very wide until 900m. Gave ground quickly in straight and finished tailed off. Run deemed unacceptable.
Broke well from inside draw, restrained to a spot behind midfield 3-4Ls off the pace, got held up on the inside until 200M, quickened up strongly to get up last stride.
Settled just off the pace in the first half, moved up to the lead 750M, responded well in straight, about 1.5L up passing 100M, got nailed last stride.
Taken back from wide draw, settled in last 6-7Ls off the pace, held up for clear run turning home, forced his way out inside 250M, closed off well to claim 3rd.
Made some use early to clear the field, led 1300M to 750M, all out on straightening but lacked further response, kept on same pace to hold 4th about 2-3Ls adrift of the first 3.
Soon obtained a spot by the rail, never far away from leaders, held up for clear running 400M-300M, went 3rd 200M and briefly loomed a threat, run ended near 100M and faded.
Dropped back and soon taken across to the fence, settled near the rear 6Ls off the pace, shifted out for clear run early straight, made limited progress only.
Always in touch, 2Ls off leader passing 400M and appeared to be going well, not quickened under pressure however, weakened out of contention 150M.
Fractious in stalls, began awkwardly and lost ground, held up behind midfield, 3-wide form 900M, nudged along 400M, shifted out sharply nearing 200M, not picked up the pace when straightened up.
Raced keenly in mid-division, awkwardly placed behind a weakening rival turning in, found little under when driven out final 200M.
Sat near the rear early stages, pushed to 4-wide without cover entering back straight, covered more ground than others, swung widest home, came up empty. (Lame next day.)
Held up 3-wide in mid-division, first to make his move passing 500M, laboured hard but ran on at same pace only, checked 150M and eased.
Close up, caught 3-wide no cover until 600M, had little left passing 350M, soon beaten.

Driven along to contest lead early, hit the front coming out of back straight and obtain rails run shortly after, kicked 2L clear upon straightening, won soundly.
Waited with, switched out for a run upon straightening, ran on well down the centre of the straight, did best work late.
Mainly wide in midfield to straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Jumped moderately from the one draw, settled mainly in midfield on rails, commenced run turning in, made steady progress along rails until finding no extra inside final 200 metres.
Jumped fairly, soon dropped well back, trailed the field to straight but saved ground turning in, sustained progress down inside to be nearest at finish.
Jumped fairly, midfield early stages before losing position and dropped behind midfield on rails, saved ground on inside turning in, fought on steadily without threatening.
Broke well, soon taken back to settle in midfield, shuffled further back on home bend, produced some late impression inside final 200 metres.
Pressed on to soon take up running, crossing to rails passing 1000 metres before ceded advantage shortly after, remained close up into straight, folded up quickly.
Midfield early stages, lost position coming out of far side, dropped further back into the straight, no further impression.
Soon taken back from the widest gate, remained in rear and wide throughout, found nothing.
Jumped moderately, gradually improved to a prominent and wide position before home bend, dropped out from 3rd into straight.
Niggled along in midfield, improving to 4th some 2L back onto home bend, folded up quickly in straight.
Stalked the leaders on the stands rail, had cover. Forced its way into clear running after the 300m, and extended nicely for debut win.
Wasn't the best to begin then crowded after the start settling ahead of midfield, about 4 from grandstand side, had cover. Finished off well.
Vied for leading duties, 1 off no cover. Was in front at the 400m, grudgingly gave way over the final stages, did have tendency to lay in for most of the trip.
Settled on the speed, the stands rail, no cover. Was one paced on the final 150m.
Badly crowded at the start, settled at the rear, with cover. Finished off willingly late.
Travelled with the leaders 3 from grandstand side no cover. Faded over the concluding stages.
Raced in the leading division 4 from the grandstand fence, no cover. Hung in after the 300m, and proved difficult to ride thereafter, giving ground from the 200m.
Tracked the speed, 1 off the stands rail. Was severely checked near the 300m, and was a beaten commodity from then on.
Recovered after being badly crowded at the start to race on the speed about 5 from the stands rail, no cover. Was well truly beaten after the furlong.
Parked midfield, nearer to the middle of the track, had some cover. Laid out after the 500m and was checked soon after. Was never in the hunt.
Began awkwardly settling midfield, about 5-6 off the stands rail, had cover. Was under pressure joining the course proper and gave little thereafter.
Began very awkwardly, settling ahead of midfield, towards the center of the track no cover. Struggled after the 400m.
Camped off the speed closer to the middle of the track, no cover. Commenced to yield ground passing the 400m.
Settled in last position. Failed to pass another runner throughout, finished tailed out. (To trial)
Rolled forward to occupy the box seat, benefited by the slow pace, ran on strongly to score by 1L.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, despite harmed by the slow pace, ran on strongly to get 2nd.
Sent forward to settle 1L behind outside the leader, benefited by the slow pace, stayed on gamely to get 3rd.
Raced midfield, settled 5.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite harmed by the slow pace, ran on well.
At rear, travelled 9Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite hampered by the slow pace, dashed on strongly in straight.
Prominent, settled 2.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, despite suite by the slow pace, just held ground.
Hard ridden forward to take the fence and led by 1L at slow sectionals, weakened 200M.
Raced midfield, travelled 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, not suited by the slow pace, ran on fairly.
Settled worse than midfield about 7Ls behind the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow sectionals, ran on fairly.
Raced midfield, trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, never looked likely.
Settled worse than midfield 6.5Ls behind the leader 3 wide with cover, not suited by the slow tempo, never ran on.
Settled in front of midfield about 3.5Ls off the slow pace, kept on until 250M weakened badly.
Always at rear, settled 8Ls behind the leader 2 wide with cover, not suited by the slow tempo, never ran on.
Smart break, caught wide no cover near rear, advanced 900m & found cover, 6L 5th & niggled 500m, led easily 250m under hands & heels, not extended.
Bumped at break & bustled early, raced fore of midfield 1 off with cover, 4L 4th & niggled 600m, driven 400m, closed off soundly, snagged 2nd.
Sharp start, bustled initially to 2nd 1 off no cover, slotted rail 1000m, pressed lead turning in, no match for winner at 250m, chased to wire, lost 2nd late.
Fast break & soon led on rail, extended 2L clear out of backstretch, shaken up 350m, found nothing & headed 250m, faded.
Bumped start, settled rail midfield, off heels 900m & lost ground, 8L back & ridden 600m, kept on for fair inroads.
Broke well, raced 3rd 1 off without cover, bumped 1000m, progress to press 2nd turning in, all out 400m, emptied 300m & weakened tamely.
Slow start, raced rail in rear, off heels 950m & switched 1 off, ridden 400m, shifted centre track in tepid run home.
Smart start, snagged to race 1 off with cover near rear, checked 950m, shaken up 400m but never a factor.
Smart start to sit handy on rail, crowded & hung out 1000m, intractable to 800m & lost lengths, driven in stretch but found nothing & faded out.
Broke OK, bustled to settle rail 3 back, switched 3 wide 700m & advanced, 3rd & driven turning in, gradual progress to lead 100m, drew clear.
Driven from wide gate, caught 3 deep no cover 5th, rolled to lead 900m, sent on 400m, headed 100m & tapered, just held on for 2nd.
Smart start, slotted midfield 1 off, advanced 3 deep home turn, driven 300m, stayed on well to just miss 2nd.
Broke OK, camped midfield 1 off, pushed 3 wide exiting backstretch, forced wide & driven home turn, closed off grittily.
Rousted to settle 1 off with cover 4th, advanced 3 wide to dispute 2nd at 800m, every chance turning in, outpaced but boxed on soundly.
Fair start, sat rail midfield, switched out & ridden turning in, stayed on evenly.
Outpaced early, raced rail last pair, switched out 500m, driven into home stretch, grinding run centre track for minor inroads.
Broke well, restrained to race 1 off near rear, some progress on turn, driven wide into stretch, battled on one pace.
Rousted to dispute early lead, settled 2nd outside leader, lost place 900m & shuffled back, ridden approaching home turn, tapered to wire.
Taken back to rail behind midfield, switched out & driven into home turn, plodded on one pace.
Broke well & bustled to race 3rd on rail, shuffled back exiting backstretch, ridden final turn, struggled thereafter.
Snagged to tail, closed up to race last pair 1 off, driven at tail turning for home, plugged on tamely.
Rousted to lead 1st turn, headed 900m, 4th & ridden under pressure home turn, found nothing & faded out.
Tardy start, raced in rear until progress 1000m, stuck wide thereafter & bustled out of backstretch, very wide turning in, soon beaten.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, being challenged 350M but soon drifted away to score easily.
Eased to obtain the box seat, benefited by the slow pace, ran on well for 2nd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed well 300M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, checked 900M, 4Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 6Ls off the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 4Ls off the slow pace, trapped 3-4 wide, made early move 600M, ran on until 200M flattened.
Eased back, 10Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Behind midfield, 7Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
At back, 7Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on fairly.
Hard ridden forward, just off the leaders 2 wide, suited by the slow sectionals, reduced quickly 400M.
Hard ridden forward, on heels 900M, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, emptied 250M.
Never competitive.
Never a factor.
Jumped well, ridden along but wide first turn, settled 2-back, one-off back stretch. Urged forward from 700m, 3-wide into straight, hit front 300m and pulled clear.
Jumped well but unable match early pace, slipping back to behind midfield. Took closer order final turn, ran on strongly final 300m.
Began fairly, trapped very wide first turn, shuffled back to rear along fence. Edged closer around final turn, switched out straight, doing best work final 200m.
Slow into stride, cut quickly to rail and improved position around first turn. Saved ground final turn, ran on steadily in straight.
Began awkwardly but ridden along to grab box seat turning into back stretch. Checked on heels entering straight and one-paced thereafter.
Began fairly, trapped 4-wide first turn dropping to rear away from fence. Urged forward 700m and kept on one-paced in straight.
Ridden along early but held very wide first turn, dropping back to last. Stayed at rear back stretch, took inside run final turn, kept on one-paced in straight.
Pressed forward but wide to lead on settling, cutting to fence 1300m. Collared shortly after entering straight and gave ground gradually.
Difficult to load, began awkwardly, mustered but held wide, dropping back to clear last at 800m. Taken wide into straight, picking up momentum final 200m.
Pressed forward but wide before settling on hind-quarters of leader from 1300m. Faded quickly final 300m.
Jumped moderately from a wide draw, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, failed to close off in straight.
Began OK but became unbalanced passing 1400m and failed to hold position despite being ridden along. Checked from heels entering straight, faded.
Pressed forward from outside draw and trapped wide without cover behind leading pair. Gave ground abruptly on entering straight and collapsed after the race.
Began OK but became unbalanced several times racing between horses and reluctant to maintain position. Gave ground abruptly in straight. Unacceptable performance. (See Racing Incidents).
Always close up in 3rd, ideally placed to strike turning in, loomed outside leaders 300M, ran on to hit the lead near 50M, fought hard for victory.
Driven forward from wide barrier, crossed to share the lead 2-wide, took narrow lead 200M, unable to hold off winner nearing 50M.
Reserved in mid-division, saved ground on the inside, ran on steadily to chase leader, went 3rd near 50M.
Held up 2-wide in midfield about 4Ls off the good pace, stayed on evenly to get within 1 length of the winner, encouraging debut.
Settled behind midfield 5Ls away from the pace, into clear 400M, stayed on for moderate 5th.
Quickly into stride, shared lead on the fence, driven out 250M, soon headed, kept on same pace to the line.
Mildly urged after the start, tracked leaders along the fence, had difficulty obtaining clear running early straight but ran on only fairly when given every chance from 200M.
Settled behind midfield, kept on only fairly in straight, never a threat to leaders.
Travelled behind midfield, caught wide first half of the race, stayed on fairly final 400M, never got to leaders.
Taken back to a rearward spot, well off the pace in middle stages, switched wide 400M, made minor progress.
Dropped back to last , raced well off the pace, 10Ls off leaders 400M, made limited progress and ran past beaten runners only.
Began only fairly, settled near the rear 10Ls off the pace, struggled to pick up when the race got serious, never involved.
In mid-division and no closer than 3-wide throughout, failed to pick up turning in, weakened badly final 150M.
Urged forward, 3-wide no cover chasing the pace, outpaced 600M out, no extra mid-straight and dropped away to last.
Pressed forward from wide draw to sit on hind-quarters of leader at turn. Rolled forward entering straight, took lead 300m, kept on well.
Ridden along but forced to switch out twice when unable find cover, settling 3-wide in midfield. Very wide into straight, picked up momentum from 200m and finished strongly.
Began well but not pressured, settling 3rd 2L from leader. Shaken up entering straight and made ground steadily under hard riding.
Jumped OK, not pressured, settling midfield between horses. Close on heels early straight but finished off nicely when clear 200m.
Pulled early, settling towards rear before checked 800m. Well back entering straight but rallied nicely final 200m.
Switched off soon after jump, trailing field before hampered 800m. Ran on steadily in straight. Jockey told ride lacked decisiveness. (See Racing Incidents).
Missed the start, shifted out abruptly and checked. Stuck to rail, improved to midfield, one-paced in straight under hard riding.
Pressed forward to lead on settling. Collared shortly after entering straight, kept on one-paced until flattened 100m.
Ridden along early to hold box seat before turn. Raced tightly passing 700m, kept on early in straight, tired late.
Ridden forward and trapped 3-wide without cover before turn. Taken wide into straight but only one-paced.
Began OK and ridden along behind leading pack around turn. Made ground early in straight before flattened 200m.
Restrained, taken across behind horses to rail, settling in last pair. Never competitive.
Began well, positioned 2 wide with cover, 2-3 lengths back, travelled comfortably throughout, ridden after turning in, finished the race well to score a strong win.
Average to begin, settled 2 wide with cover, 3-4 lengths back in midfield, ridden after turning in, finished off well but couldn't pour back the winner.
Slowly away, positioned 3 wide with no cover behind midfield, 4-5 lengths back, hard ridden early in the straight and closed off strongly to take place.
Began fairly from a tricky gate, sat 3-4 wide with no cover for the majority of the race, 5 lengths back, taken widest in straight and ran home very well, just missed 3rd.
Moderate break, taken back to sit 2 wide with cover behind midfield, 6 lengths back, no clear running early in straight, finished the race well when clear.
Began nicely from wide gate, sent forward to take the position outside leader, travelled well throughout, there to 300M, no extra acceleration at business end.
Began well, sat comfortably behind the leader on rail, 1-2 lengths back, no clear running early in straight, finished the race fairly when clear.
Began fairly, positioned 6-7 lengths back on rail towards rear, took inside runs turning, no daylight most of the straight, never got a real crack at them.
Slowly away, sat last on rail, 9 lengths back, well back turning, taken wide in straight and made some progress without threatening.
Jumped with them, sat 2-3 lengths back on rail, no clear run until 300M, showed no response when clear.
Taken back from the widest draw, sat 3 wide with cover at rear, taken wider in straight, only made minor progress.
Broke nicely, pressed forward to take the lead 1200M, under pressure soon after turning in, weakened sharply after passing 300M.
Began fairly from gate 1, settled in midfield on rails, showed no response in straight.
Jumped well, pushed early to take the lead, travelled well throughout, stayed on well and scored by a nose.
Away well, positioned 3 wide without cover, 2-3 lengths back in midfield, ridden after turning in, finished the race strongly, just missed.
Jumped fairly, sent forward to sit on rail close to the leader, travelled comfortably, in behind horses early in straight, finished off nicely when clear.
Taken back from the widest gate, settled 2 wide with cover at rear, 5-6 lengths back, taken wide in straight and finished off very strongly to make frame.
Away with them, positioned 2 wide with cover in midfield, 3-4 lengths back, ridden at turn and made some progress in straight, posed no threat to the first few.
Began fairly, sat 2-3 lengths back on rail, difficult to settle shortly after 1000M, took inside runs but no clear running and steadied near 200M, ran on thereafter.
Jumped well, positioned 2 wide close to the leader, soft there to 300M but showed little response to riding thereafter, ran home one-paced.
Moderately away, settled 3-4 lengths back on rail in midfield, showed no response to riding in straight.
Average to begin, taken back to sit on rail, 5 lengths back, came 2 wide at 800M, in traffic early in straight, bumped near 150M, ran on thereafter.
Drifted back to last, 6 lengths back on rail, taken to the centre of the track in straight, made no real progress.
Jumped well from gate 13, raced 4 wide without cover for the majority of the race, last turning in, ran widest in straight, inconvenienced close home.
Average break, raced wide without cover behind midfield, swung wide in straight, showed no response to riding.
Jumped fairly from a wide draw, taken back to sit at rear, 4-5 lengths back, taken wide before turning in, showed no response to riding in straight, severely checked close to home.

Placing: FE
Comment: Began well, settled 2 wide with cover in midfield, 2-3 lengths back, taken to the centre of the track in straight but found little, crowded & fell near 150M. (See racing incidents)
